 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet yaḥ śvetatvam upāgataḥ kṛtayuge tretāyuge raktatāṃ yugme yaḥ kapilaḥ kalau sa bhagavān kṛṣṇatvam abhyāgataḥ yaṃ vedāntavido vadanti munayo yo yogibhir gīyate sa brahmā yadi vā haro yadi hariḥ pāyāj jagad durgateḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ svayam ko nyo hi puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet lakṣmīmaṭhanivāso haṃ gopālākhyo dvijottamaḥ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ tu namaskṛtya likhyāmi muktikāmyayā śibirād dhāstinapuraṃ prāpya bhārata saṃjayaḥ praviveśa mahāprājño dhṛtarāṣṭraniveśanam śokenāpahataḥ sūto vihvalan bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ cintayan vaiśasaṃ ghoraṃ sūtaputrasya pāṇḍavaiḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ śaratalpe mahātmānaṃ śayānam aparājitam yudhiṣṭhira upāgamya praṇipatyedam abravīt yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śamo bahuvidhākāraḥ sūkṣma uktaḥ pitāmahac na ca me hṛdaye śāntir asti kṛtvedam īdṛśama asminn arthe bahuvidhā śāntir uktā tvayānaghac svakṛte kā nu śāntiḥ syāc chamād bahuvidhād apia śarācitaśarīraṃ hi tīvravraṇam udīkṣya cac śamaṃ nopalabhe vīra duṣkṛtāny eva cintayana rudhireṇāvasiktāṅgaṃ prasravantaṃ yathācalamc tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣavyāghra sīde varṣāsv ivāmbujama ataḥ kaṣṭataraṃ kiṃ nu matkṛte yat pitāmahaḥc imām avasthāṃ gamitaḥ pratyamitrai raṇājiree tathaivānye nṛpatayaḥ sahaputrāḥ sabāndhavāḥf matkṛte nidhanaṃ prāptāḥ kiṃ nu kaṣṭataraṃ tataḥa vayaṃ hi dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca kālamanyuvaśānugāḥc kṛtvedaṃ ninditaṃ karma prāpsyāmaḥ kāṃ gatiṃ nṛpad idaṃ tu dhārtarāṣṭrasya śreyo manye janādhipad imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaṃ yad asau tvāṃ na paśyatia ahaṃ tava hy antakaraḥ suhṛdvadhakaras tathāc na śāntim adhigacchāmi paśyaṃs tvāṃ duḥkhitaṃ kṣitaud duryodhano hi samare sahasainyaḥ sahānujaḥd nihataḥ kṣatradharme smin durātmā kulapāṃsanaḥd na sa paśyati duṣṭātmā tvām adya patitaṃ kṣitaud ataḥ śreyo mṛtaṃ manye neha jīvitam ātmanaḥd ahaṃ hi samare vīra gamitaḥ śatrubhiḥ kṣayamd abhaviṣyaṃ yadi purā saha bhrātṛbhir acyutad na tvām evaṃ suduḥkhārtam adrākṣaṃ sāyakārditamd nūnaṃ hi pāpakarmāṇo dhātrā sṛṣṭāḥ sma he nṛpad anyasminn api loke hi yathā mucyema kilbiṣātd tathā praśādhi māṃ rājan mama ced icchasi priyam bhīṣma uvācaa paratantraṃ kathaṃ hetum ātmānam anupaśyasic karmaṇy asmin mahābhāga sūkṣmaṃ hy etad atīndriyama atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc saṃvādaṃ mṛtyugautamyoḥ kālalubdhakapannagaiḥa gautamī nāma kaunteya sthavirā śamasaṃyutāc sarpeṇa daṣṭaṃ svaṃ putram apaśyad gatacetanama atha taṃ snāyupāśena baddhvā sarpam amarṣitaḥc lubdhako rjunako nāma gautamyāḥ samupānayata tāṃ cābravīd ayaṃ te sa putrahā pannagādhamaḥc brūhi kṣipraṃ mahābhāge vadhyatāṃ kena hetunāa agnau prakṣipyatām eṣa cchidyatāṃ khaṇḍaśo pi vāc na hy ayaṃ bālahā pāpaś ciraṃ jīvitum arhati gautamy uvācaa visṛjainam abuddhis tvaṃ na vadhyo rjunaka tvayāc ko hy ātmānaṃ guruṃ kuryāt prāptavye sati cintayana plavante dharmalaghavo loke mbhasi yathā plavāḥc majjanti pāpaguravaḥ śastraṃ skannam ivodaked yadi vāsmiṃs tu nihate pannage rjunaka tvayād jīved ayaṃ bālako me tan na me rjunaka priyama na cāmṛtyur bhavitā vai hate sminko vātyayaḥ syād ahate smiñ janasyab hatvā cainaṃ nāmṛtaḥ syād ayaṃ meb jīvaty asmin ko tyayaḥ syād ayaṃ teb nāsyāmṛtatvaṃ bhavitā vai hate smiñb jīvaty asmin ko vyasuḥ syād anantec asyotsarge prāṇayuktasya jantormṛtyor lokaṃ ko nu gacched anantam lubdhaka uvācaa jānāmy evaṃ neha guṇāguṇajñāḥsarve niyuktā guravo vai bhavantic svasthasyaite tūpadeśā bhavantitasmāt kṣudraṃ sarpam enaṃ haniṣyea samīpsantaḥ kālayogaṃ tyajantisadyaḥ śucaṃ tv arthavidas tyajantic śreyaḥ kṣayaḥ śocatāṃ nityaśo hitasmāt tyājyaṃ jahi śokaṃ hate smin gautamy uvācaa na caivārtir vidyate smadvidhānāṃdharmārāmaḥ satataṃ sajjano hic nityāyasto bālajano na cāstidharmo hy eṣa prabhavāmy asya nāhama na brāhmaṇānāṃ kopo sti kutaḥ kopāc ca yātanāc mārdavāt kṣamyatāṃ sādho mucyatām eṣa pannagaḥ lubdhaka uvācaa hatvā lābhaḥ śreya evāvyayaṃ syātsadyo lābho balavadbhiḥ praśastaḥc kālāl lābho yas tu sadyo bhavetahate śreyaḥ kutsite tvīdṛśe syāt gautamy uvācaa kārthaprāptir gṛhya śatruṃ nihatyakā vā śāntiḥ prāpya śatruṃ namuktvāc kasmāt saumya bhujage na kṣameyaṃmokṣaṃ vā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsya kuryām lubdhaka uvācaa asmād ekasmād bahavo rakṣitavyānaiko bahubhyo gautami rakṣitavyaḥc kṛtāgasaṃ dharmavidas tyajantisarīsṛpaṃ pāpam imaṃ jahi tvam gautamy uvācaa nāsmin hate pannage putrako mesaṃprāpsyate lubdhaka jīvitaṃ vaic guṇaṃ cānyaṃ nāsya vadhe prapaśyetasmāt sarpaṃ lubdhaka muñca jīvam lubdhaka uvācaa vṛtraṃ hatvā devarāṭ śreṣṭhabhāg vaiyajñaṃ hatvā bhāgam avāpa caivac śūlī devo devavṛttaṃ kuru tvaṃkṣipraṃ sarpaṃ jahi mā bhūd viśaṅkā bhīṣma uvācaa asakṛt procyamānāpi gautamī bhujagaṃ pratic lubdhakena mahābhāgā pāpe naivākaron matima īṣad ucchvasamānas tu kṛcchrāt saṃstabhya pannagaḥc utsasarja giraṃ mandāṃ mānuṣīṃ pāśapīḍitaḥa ko nv arjunaka doṣo tra vidyate mama bāliśac asvatantraṃ hi māṃ mṛtyur vivaśaṃ yad acūcudata tasyāyaṃ vacanād daṣṭo na kopena na kāmyayāc tasya tat kilbiṣaṃ lubdha vidyate yadi kilbiṣam lubdhaka uvācaa yady anyavaśagenedaṃ kṛtaṃ te pannagāśubhamc kāraṇaṃ vai tvam apy atra tasmāt tvam api kilbiṣīa mṛtpātrasya kriyāyāṃ hi daṇḍacakrādayo yathāc kāraṇatve prakalpyante tathā tvam api pannagaa kilbiṣī cāpi me vadhyaḥ kilbiṣī cāsi pannagac ātmānaṃ kāraṇaṃ hy atra tvam ākhyāsi bhujaṃgama sarpa uvācaa sarva ete hy asvavaśā daṇḍacakrādayo yathāc tathāham api tasmān me naiṣa hetur matas tavaa atha vā matam etat te te py anyonyaprayojakāḥc kāryakāraṇasaṃdeho bhavaty anyonyacodanāta evaṃ sati na doṣo me nāsmi vadhyo na kilbiṣīc kilbiṣaṃ samavāye syān manyase yadi kilbiṣamd kilbiṣaṃ manyase hi tvaṃ vadhyam evaṃ prabhāṣase lubdhaka uvācaa kāraṇaṃ yadi na syād vai na kartā syās tvam apy utac vināśe kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ ca tasmād vadhyo si me mataḥa asaty api kṛte kārye neha pannaga lipyatec tasmān nātraiva hetuḥ syād vadhyaḥ kiṃ bahu bhāṣase sarpa uvācaa kāryābhāve kriyā na syāt saty asaty api kāraṇec tasmāt tvam asmin hetau me vācyo hetur viśeṣataḥa yady ahaṃ kāraṇatvena mato lubdhaka tattvataḥc anyaḥ prayoge syād atra kilbiṣī jantunāśane lubdhaka uvācaa vadhyas tvaṃ mama durbuddhe bālaghātī nṛśaṃsakṛtc bhāṣase kiṃ bahu punar vadhyaḥ san pannagādhama sarpa uvācaa yathā havīṃṣi juhvānā makhe vai lubdhakartvijaḥc na phalaṃ prāpnuvanty atra paraloke tathā hy aham bhīṣma uvācaa tathā bruvati tasmiṃs tu pannage mṛtyucoditec ājagāma tato mṛtyuḥ pannagaṃ cābravīd idama kālenāhaṃ praṇuditaḥ pannaga tvām acūcudamc vināśahetur nāsya tvam ahaṃ vā prāṇinaḥ śiśoḥa yathā vāyur jaladharān vikarṣati tatas tataḥc tadvaj jaladavat sarpa kālasyāhaṃ vaśānugaḥd tadvidhas tadvaśe cāhaṃ kālasya vaśagaś cirama sāttvikā rājasāś caiva tāmasā ye ca ke canac bhāvāḥ kālātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣua jaṅgamāḥ sthāvarāś caiva divi vā yadi vā bhuvic sarve kālātmakāḥ sarpa kālātmakam idaṃ jagata pravṛttayaś ca yā loke tathaiva ca nivṛttayaḥc tāsāṃ vikṛtayo yāś ca sarvaṃ kālātmakaṃ smṛtama ādityaś candramā viṣṇur āpo vāyuḥ śatakratuḥc agniḥ khaṃ pṛthivī mitra oṣadhyo vasavas tathāa saritaḥ sāgarāś caiva bhāvābhāvau ca pannagac sarve kālena sṛjyante hriyante ca tathā punaḥa evaṃ jñātvā kathaṃ māṃ tvaṃ sadoṣaṃ sarpa manyasec atha caivaṃgate doṣo mayi tvam api doṣavān sarpa uvācaa nirdoṣaṃ doṣavantaṃ vā na tvā mṛtyo bravīmy ahamc tvayāhaṃ codita iti bravīmy etāvad eva tua yadi kāle tu doṣo sti yadi tatrāpi neṣyatec doṣo naiva parīkṣyo me na hy atrādhikṛtā vayama nirmokṣas tv asya doṣasya mayā kāryo yathā tathāc mṛtyo vidoṣaḥ syām eva yathā tan me prayojanam bhīṣma uvācaa sarpo thārjunakaṃ prāha śrutaṃ te mṛtyubhāṣitamc nānāgasaṃ māṃ pāśena saṃtāpayitum arhasi lubdhaka uvācaa mṛtyoḥ śrutaṃ me vacanaṃ tava caiva bhujaṃgamac naiva tāvad vidoṣatvaṃ bhavati tvayi pannagaa mṛtyus tvaṃ caiva hetur hi jantor asya vināśanec ubhayaṃ kāraṇaṃ manye na kāraṇam akāraṇama dhiṅ mṛtyuṃ ca durātmānaṃ krūraṃ duḥkhakaraṃ satāmc tvāṃ caivāhaṃ vadhiṣyāmi pāpaṃ pāpasya kāraṇam mṛtyur uvācaa vivaśau kālavaśagāv āvāṃ tad diṣṭakāriṇauc nāvāṃ doṣeṇa gantavyau yadi samyak prapaśyasi lubdhaka uvācaa yuvām ubhau kālavaśau yadi vai mṛtyupannagauc harṣakrodhau kathaṃ syātām etad icchāmi veditum mṛtyur uvācaa yāḥ kāś cid iha ceṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvāḥ kālapracoditāḥc pūrvam evaitad uktaṃ hi mayā lubdhaka kālataḥa tasmād ubhau kālavaśāv āvāṃ tad diṣṭakāriṇauc nāvāṃ doṣeṇa gantavyau tvayā lubdhaka karhi cit bhīṣma uvācaa athopagamya kālas tu tasmin dharmārthasaṃśayec abravīt pannagaṃ mṛtyuṃ lubdham arjunakaṃ ca tam kāla uvācaa naivāhaṃ nāpy ayaṃ mṛtyur nāyaṃ lubdhaka pannagaḥc kilbiṣī jantumaraṇe na vayaṃ hi prayojakāḥa akarod yad ayaṃ karma tan no rjunaka codakamc praṇāśahetur nānyo sya vadhyate yaṃ svakarmaṇāa yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tenāyaṃ nidhanaṃ gataḥc vināśahetuḥ karmāsya sarve karmavaśā vayama karmadāyādavāṃl lokaḥ karmasaṃbandhalakṣaṇaḥc karmāṇi codayantīha yathānyonyaṃ tathā vayama yathā mṛtpiṇḍataḥ kartā kurute yad yad icchatic evam ātmakṛtaṃ karma mānavaḥ pratipadyatea yathā chāyātapau nityaṃ susaṃbaddhau nirantaramc tathā karma ca kartā ca saṃbaddhāv ātmakarmabhiḥa evaṃ nāhaṃ na vai mṛtyur na sarpo na tathā bhavānc na ceyaṃ brāhmaṇī vṛddhā śiśur evātra kāraṇama tasmiṃs tathā bruvāṇe tu brāhmaṇī gautamī nṛpac svakarmapratyayāṃl lokān matvārjunakam abravīta naiva kālo na bhujago na mṛtyur iha kāraṇamc svakarmabhir ayaṃ bālaḥ kālena nidhanaṃ gataḥa mayā ca tat kṛtaṃ karma yenāyaṃ me mṛtaḥ sutaḥc yātu kālas tathā mṛtyur muñcārjunaka pannagam bhīṣma uvācaa tato yathāgataṃ jagmur mṛtyuḥ kālo tha pannagaḥc abhūd viroṣo rjunako viśokā caiva gautamīa etac chrutvā śamaṃ gaccha mā bhūś cintāparo nṛpac svakarmapratyayāṃl lokāṃs trīn viddhi manujarṣabhaa na tu tvayā kṛtaṃ pārtha nāpi duryodhanena vaic kālena tat kṛtaṃ viddhi vihatā yena pārthivāḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā babhūva vigatajvaraḥc yudhiṣṭhiro mahātejāḥ papracchedaṃ ca dharmavit yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśāradac śrutaṃ me mahad ākhyānam idaṃ matimatāṃ varaa bhūyas tu śrotum icchāmi dharmārthasahitaṃ nṛpac kathyamānaṃ tvayā kiṃ cit tan me vyākhyātum arhasia kena mṛtyur gṛhasthena dharmam āśritya nirjitaḥc ity etat sarvam ācakṣva tattvena mama pārthiva bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc yathā mṛtyur gṛhasthena dharmam āśritya nirjitaḥa manoḥ prajāpate rājann ikṣvākur abhavat sutaḥc tasya putraśataṃ jajñe nṛpateḥ sūryavarcasaḥa daśamas tasya putras tu daśāśvo nāma bhāratac māhiṣmatyām abhūd rājā dharmātmā satyavikramaḥa daśāśvasya sutas tv āsīd rājā paramadhārmikaḥc satye tapasi dāne ca yasya nityaṃ rataṃ manaḥa madirāśva iti khyātaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpatiḥc dhanurvede ca vede ca nirato yo bhavat sadāa madirāśvasya putras tu dyutimān nāma pārthivaḥc mahābhāgo mahātejā mahāsattvo mahābalaḥa putro dyutimatas tv āsīt suvīro nāma pārthivaḥa rājā paramadhārmikaḥa sarvalokeṣu vikhyātaḥc dharmātmā kośavāṃś cāpi devarāja ivāparaḥa suvīrasya tu putro bhūt sarvasaṃgrāmadurjayaḥc durjayety abhivikhyātaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥd sudurjaya iti khyātaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥa durjayasyendravapuṣaḥ putro gnisadṛśadyutiḥc duryodhano nāma mahān rājāsīd rājasattamad ikṣvākos tu śataṃ putrā daśāśvo daśamaḥ smṛtaḥd māhiṣmatyām abhūd rājā madirāśvas tato bhavatd tasya ca dyutimān nāma suvīras tasya cātmajaḥd durjayas tasya tasyāpi duryodhana iti smṛtaḥa tasyendrasamavīryasya saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥc viṣayaś ca prabhāvaś ca tulyam evābhyavartatad viṣaye vāsavas tasya samyag eva pravarṣatia ratnair dhanaiś ca paśubhiḥ sasyaiś cāpi pṛthagvidhaiḥc nagaraṃ viṣayaś cāsya pratipūrṇaṃ tadābhavata na tasya viṣaye cābhūt kṛpaṇo nāpi durgataḥc vyādhito vā kṛśo vāpi tasmin nābhūn naraḥ kva citd vyādhito durgataś caiva puruṣaḥ pratyadṛśyataa sudakṣiṇo madhuravāg anasūyur jitendriyaḥc dharmātmā cānṛśaṃsaś ca vikrānto thāvikatthanaḥa yajvā vadānyo medhāvī brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥc na cāvamantā dātā ca vedavedāṅgapāragaḥa taṃ narmadā devanadī puṇyā śītajalā śivāc cakame puruṣaśreṣṭhaṃ svena bhāvena bhārataa tasya jajñe tadā nadyāṃ kanyā rājīvalocanāc nāmnā sudarśanā rājan rūpeṇa ca sudarśanāa tādṛgrūpā na nārīṣu bhūtapūrvā yudhiṣṭhirac duryodhanasutā yādṛg abhavad varavarṇinīa tām agniś cakame sākṣād rājakanyāṃ sudarśanāmb sā cāgniśaraṇe rājñaḥ śuśrūṣākṛtaniścayāb niyuktā pitṛsaṃdeśād ārirādhayiṣuḥ śikhimb tasyā manoramaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā devo hutāśanaḥb agniḥb manmathena samāviṣṭaḥ patnītve yatate mithaḥb bhaja mām anavadyāṅgi kāmāt kamalalocaneb rambhoru mṛgaśāvākṣi pūrṇacandranibhānaneb tavedaṃ padmapatrākṣaṃ mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā manoharamb bhrūlatālalitaṃ kāntam anaṅgo bādhate hi māmb lalāṭaṃ candralekhābhaṃ śiroruhavibhūṣitamb dṛṣṭvā te patralekhāṅkam anaṅgo bādhate bhṛśamb bālātapenākulitaṃ sasvedapulakodgamamb bimbādharoṣṭhaṃ vadanaṃ vibuddham iva paṅkajamb atīva cāruvibhrāntaṃ mudam āvahate mamab dantaprākāraniyatā vāṇī tava surakṣitāb tāmrapallavasaṃkāśā jihveyaṃ te manoharāb samāḥ snigdhāḥ sujātāś ca sahitāś ca dvijās tavab dvijapriye prasīdasva bhaja māṃ subhagā hy asib manojñaṃ sukṛtāpāṅgaṃ mukhaṃ tava manoharamb stanau te saṃhatau bhīru hārābharaṇabhūṣitaub pakvabilvapratīkāśau karkaśau saṃgamakṣamaub bhīṣmaḥb gambhīranābhisubhage bhaja māṃ varavarṇinib saivam uktā virahite pāvakena mahātmanāb īṣad ākampihṛdayā vrīḍitā vākyam abravītb nanu nāma kulīnānāṃ kanyakānāṃ viśeṣataḥb mātā pitā prabhavataḥ pradāne bāndhavāś ca yeb pāṇigrahaṇamantraiś ca hute caiva vibhāvasaub satāṃ madhye niviṣṭāyāḥ kanyāyāḥ śaraṇaṃ patiḥb sāhaṃ nātmavaśā deva pitaraṃ varayasva meb atha nāticirāt kālād rājā duryodhanaḥ kilab yajñasaṃbhāranipuṇān mantrīn āhūya coktavānb yajñaṃ yakṣye ham iti vai saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu meb tataḥ samāhitas tasya yajño brāhmaṇasattamaiḥc bhūtvā ca brāhmaṇaḥ sākṣād varayām āsa taṃ nṛpamd viprarūpī hutavaho nṛpaṃ kanyām ayācatad na tu rājā pradānāya tasmai bhāvam akalpayata daridraś cāsavarṇaś ca mamāyam iti pārthivaḥc na ditsati sutāṃ tasmai tāṃ viprāya sudarśanāmd iti tasmai na vai kanyāṃ ditsāṃ cakre narādhipaḥa tato sya vitate yajñe naṣṭo bhūd dhavyavāhanaḥc tato duryodhano rājā vākyam āhartvijas tadāa duṣkṛtaṃ mama kiṃ nu syād bhavatāṃ vā dvijarṣabhāḥc yena nāśaṃ jagāmāgniḥ kṛtaṃ kupuruṣeṣv ivaa na hy alpaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ no sti yenāgnir nāśam āgataḥc bhavatāṃ vātha vā mahyaṃ tattvenaitad vimṛśyatāma etad rājño vacaḥ śrutvā viprās te bharatarṣabhac niyatā vāgyatāś caiva pāvakaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥa tān darśayām āsa tadā bhagavān havyavāhanaḥb atha dīkṣām upetasya yajñe tasya mahātmanaḥb āhito havanārthāya vedyām agniḥ praṇaśyatab tataḥ sa bhīto nṛpatir bhṛśaṃ pravyathitendriyaḥb mantriṇo brāhmaṇāṃś caiva papraccha kim idaṃ bhavetb yajñe samiddho bhagavān naṣṭo me havyavāhanaḥb saṃmantrakuśalais tais tu brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥb amānuṣo vikāro yam iti tair eva bodhitaḥb dharmavighnakaraṃ vīra naitat tvayy upapadyateb stūyatāṃ bhagavān vahnir brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥb ṛtvigbhir mantrakuśalair gīyatāṃ vai hutāśanaḥb atha ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ pāragair vedapāragaiḥb vedatattvārthakuśalaiḥ stutaḥ stomapuraskṛtaiḥb guhyeṣu nāmadheyeṣu kīrtyamāneṣu pāvakaḥc svaṃ rūpaṃ dīptimat kṛtvā śaradarkasamadyutiḥa tato mahātmā tān āha dahano brāhmaṇarṣabhānc varayāmy ātmano rthāya duryodhanasutām itia tatas te kālyam utthāya tasmai rājñe nyavedayanc brāhmaṇā vismitāḥ sarve yad uktaṃ citrabhānunāa tataḥ sa rājā tac chrutvā vacanaṃ brahmavādināmc avāpya paramaṃ harṣaṃ tatheti prāha buddhimāna prāyācata nṛpaḥ śulkaṃ bhagavantaṃ vibhāvasumc nityaṃ sāṃnidhyam iha te citrabhāno bhaved itie tam āha bhagavān agnir evam astv iti pārthivama tataḥ sāṃnidhyam adhyāpi māhiṣmatyāṃ vibhāvasoḥc dṛṣṭaṃ hi sahadevena diśo vijayatā tadāa tatas tāṃ samalaṃkṛtya kanyām ahatavāsasamc dadau duryodhano rājā pāvakāya mahātmanea pratijagrāha cāgnis tāṃ rājaputrīṃ sudarśanāmc vidhinā vedadṛṣṭena vasor dhārām ivādhvarea tasyā rūpeṇa śīlena kulena vapuṣā śriyāc abhavat prītimān agnir garbhaṃ tasyāṃ samādadhea tasyāṃ samabhavat putro nāmnāgneyaḥ sudarśanaḥb sudarśanas tu rūpeṇa pūrṇendusadṛśopamaḥc śiśur evādhyagāt sarvaṃ sa ca brahma sanātanama athaughavān nāma nṛpo nṛgasyāsīt pitāmahaḥc tasyāpy oghavatī kanyā putraś caugharatho bhavata tām oghavān dadau tasmai svayam oghavatīṃ sutāmc sudarśanāya viduṣe bhāryārthe devarūpiṇīma sa gṛhasthāśramaratas tayā saha sudarśanaḥc kurukṣetre vasad rājann oghavatyā samanvitaḥa gṛhasthaś cāvajeṣyāmi mṛtyum ity eva sa prabhoc pratijñām akarod dhīmān dīptatejā viśāṃ patea tām athaughavatīṃ rājan sa pāvakasuto bravītc atitheḥ pratikūlaṃ te na kartavyaṃ kathaṃ canaa yena yena ca tuṣyeta nityam eva tvayātithiḥc apy ātmanaḥ pradānena na te kāryā vicāraṇāa etad vrataṃ mama sadā hṛdi saṃparivartatec gṛhasthānāṃ hi suśroṇi nātither vidyate parama pramāṇaṃ yadi vāmoru vacas te mama śobhanec idaṃ vacanam avyagrā hṛdi tvaṃ dhārayeḥ sadāa niṣkrānte mayi kalyāṇi tathā saṃnihite naghec nātithis te vamantavyaḥ pramāṇaṃ yady ahaṃ tavaa tam abravīd oghavatī yatā mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥc na me tvadvacanāt kiṃ cid akartavyaṃ kathaṃ canaa jigīṣamāṇaṃ tu gṛhe tadā mṛtyuḥ sudarśanamc pṛṣṭhato nvagamad rājan randhrānveṣī tadā sadāa idhmārthaṃ tu gate tasminn agniputre sudarśanec atithir brāhmaṇaḥ śrīmāṃs tām āhaughavatīṃ tadāa ātithyaṃ dattam icchāmi tvayādya varavarṇinic pramāṇaṃ yadi dharmas te gṛhasthāśramasaṃmataḥa ity uktā tena vipreṇa rājaputrī yaśasvinīc vidhinā pratijagrāha vedoktena viśāṃ patea āsanaṃ caiva pādyaṃ ca tasmai dattvā dvijātayec provācaughavatī vipraṃ kenārthaḥ kiṃ dadāmi tea tām abravīt tato vipro rājaputrīṃ sudarśanāmc tvayā mamārthaḥ kalyāṇi nirviśaṅke tad ācaraa yadi pramāṇaṃ dharmas te gṛhasthāśramasaṃmataḥc pradānenātmano rājñi kartum arhasi me priyama tathā saṃchandyamāno nyair īpsitair nṛpakanyayāc nānyam ātmapradānāt sa tasyā vavre varaṃ dvijaḥa sā tu rājasutā smṛtvā bhartur vacanam āditaḥc tatheti lajjamānā sā tam uvāca dvijarṣabhama tato rahaḥ sa viprarṣiḥ sā caivopaviveśa hac saṃsmṛtya bhartur vacanaṃ gṛhasthāśramakāṅkṣiṇaḥa athedhmān samupādāya sa pāvakir upāgamatc mṛtyunā raudrabhāvena nityaṃ bandhur ivānvitaḥa tatas tv āśramam āgamya sa pāvakasutas tadāc tām ājuhāvaughavatīṃ kvāsi yāteti cāsakṛta tasmai prativacaḥ sā tu bhartre na pradadau tadāc karābhyāṃ tena vipreṇa spṛṣṭā bhartṛvratā satīa ucchiṣṭāsmīti manvānā lajjitā bhartur eva cac tūṣṇīṃbhūtābhavat sādhvī na covācātha kiṃ canaa atha tāṃ punar evedaṃ provāca sa sudarśanaḥc kva sā sādhvī kva sā yātā garīyaḥ kim ato mamaa pativratā satyaśīlā nityaṃ caivārjave ratāc kathaṃ na pratyudety adya smayamānā yathā purāa uṭajasthas tu taṃ vipraḥ pratyuvāca sudarśanamc atithiṃ viddhi saṃprāptaṃ pāvake brāhmaṇaṃ ca māma anayā chandyamāno haṃ bhāryayā tava sattamac tais tair atithisatkārair ārjave syā dṛḍhaṃ manaḥa anena vidhinā seyaṃ mām arcati śubhānanāc anurūpaṃ yad atrādya tad bhavān vaktum arhatia kūṭamudgarahastas tu mṛtyus taṃ vai samanvayātc hīnapratijñam atrainaṃ vadhiṣyāmīti cintayana sudarśanas tu manasā karmaṇā cakṣuṣā girāc tyakterṣyas tyaktamanyuś ca smayamāno bravīd idama surataṃ te stu viprāgrya prītir hi paramā mamac gṛhasthasya hi dharmo gryaḥ saṃprāptātithipūjanama atithiḥ pūjito yasya gṛhasthasya tu gacchatib hīnapratijñam atraikaṃ saṃprāptasya tu gacchatic nānyas tasmāt paro dharma iti prāhur manīṣiṇaḥa prāṇā hi mama dārāś ca yac cānyad vidyate vasuc atithibhyo mayā deyam iti me vratam āhitama niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ mayā vākyam etat te samudāhṛtamc tenāhaṃ vipra satyena svayam ātmānam ālabhea pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamamc buddhir ātmā manaḥ kālo diśaś caiva guṇā daśaa nityam ete hi paśyanti dehināṃ dehasaṃśritāḥc sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi karma dharmabhṛtāṃ varaa yathaiṣā nānṛtā vāṇī mayādya samudāhṛtāc tena satyena māṃ devāḥ pālayantu dahantu vāa tato nādaḥ samabhavad hy amitavīryeṇa vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥc hataṃ putraśataṃ sadyas tapasā prapitāmahaa yātudhānāś ca bahavo rākṣasās tigmatejasaḥc manyunāviṣṭadehena sṛṣṭāḥ kālāntakopamāḥa mahān kuśikavaṃśaś ca prītipūrvakamc avākśirā divaṃ nīto dakṣiṇām āśrito diśama viśvāmitrasya vipulā nadī rājarṣisevitāc kauśikīti śivā puṇyā brahmarṣigaṇasevitāa tapovighnakarī caiva pañcacūḍā susaṃmatāc rambhā nāmāpsarāḥ śāpād yasya śailatvam āgatāa tathaivāsya bhayād baddhvā vasiṣṭhaḥ salile purāc ātmānaṃ majjayām āsa vipāśaḥ punar utthitaḥa tadāprabhṛti puṇyā hi vipāśābhūn mahānadīc vikhyātā karmaṇā tena vasiṣṭhasya daridra iti matvā vai gādhiḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥa pratyākhyāya punar yāntam abravīd rājasattamaḥc śulkaṃ pradīyatāṃ mahyaṃ tato vetsyasi me sutām ṛcīka uvācaa kiṃ prayacchāmi rājendra tubhyaṃ śulkam ahaṃ nṛpac duhitur brūhy asaṃsakto mātrābhūt te vicāraṇā gādhir uvācaa candraraśmiprakāśānāṃ hayānāṃ vātaraṃhasāmc ekataḥ śyāmakarṇānāṃ sahasraṃ dehi bhārgava bhīṣma uvācaa tataḥ sa bhṛguśārdūlaś cyavanasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥc abravīd varuṇaṃ devam ādityaṃ patim ambhasāma ekataḥ śyāmakarṇānāṃ hayānāṃ candravarcasāmc sahasraṃ vātavegānāṃ bhikṣe tvāṃ devasattamaa tatheti varuṇo deva ādityo bhṛgusattamamc uvāca yatra te chandas tatrotthāsyanti vājinaḥa dhyātamātre ṛcīkena hayānāṃ candravarcasāmc gaṅgājalāt samuttasthau sahasraṃ vipulaujasāma adūre kanyakubjasya gaṅgāyās tīram uttamamc aśvatīrthaṃ tad adyāpi mānavāḥ paricakṣatea tat tadā gādhaye tāta sahasraṃ vājināṃ śubhamc ṛcīkaḥ pradadau prītaḥ śulkārthaṃ japatāṃ varaḥa tataḥ sa vismito rājā gādhiḥ śāpabhayena cac dadau tāṃ samalaṃkṛtya kanyāṃ bhṛgusutāya vaia jagrāha pāṇiṃ vidhinā tasya brahmarṣisattamaḥc sā ca taṃ patim āsādya paraṃ harṣam avāpa haa sa tutoṣa ca viprarṣis tasyā vṛttena bhāratac chandayām āsa caivaināṃ vareṇa varavarṇinīmd sā ca vavre varaṃ tasmāt putraṃ brahmarṣisattamama mātre tat sarvam ācakhyau sā kanyā rājasattamamc atha tām abravīn mātā sutāṃ kiṃ cid avāṅmukhīma mamāpi putri bhartā te prasādaṃ kartum arhatic apatyasya pradānena samarthaḥ sa mahātapāḥa tataḥ sā tvaritaṃ gatvā tat sarvaṃ pratyavedayatc mātuś cikīrṣitaṃ rājann ṛcīkas tām athābravīta guṇavantam apatyaṃ vai tvaṃ ca sā udumbaramc pariṣvajethāḥ kalyāṇi tata iṣṭam avāpsyathaḥa carudvayam idaṃ caiva mantrapūtaṃ śucismitec tvaṃ ca sā copayuñjīthāṃ tataḥ putrāv avāpsyathaḥa tataḥ satyavatī hṛṣṭā mātaraṃ pratyabhāṣatac yad ṛcīkena kathitaṃ tac cācakhyau carudvayamd atha mātā sutā cāpi vyatyāsena carudvayamd bhuktavatyau mahārāja tato garbham upeṣyataḥd dṛṣṭvā kadā cit svāṃ bhāryām ṛcīkas tv abravīd vacaḥa tām uvāca tato mātā sutāṃ satyavatīṃ tadāc putri mūrdhnā prapannāyāḥ kuruṣva vacanaṃ mamaa bhartrā ya eṣa dattas te carur mantrapuraskṛtaḥc etaṃ prayaccha mahyaṃ tvaṃ madīyaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇa caa vyatyāsaṃ vṛkṣayoś cāpi karavāva śucismiteb vṛkṣayor api vyatyāsaṃ kuryāva varavarṇinic yadi pramāṇaṃ vacanaṃ mama mātur anindited svam apatyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ hi sarva icchaty anāvilama vyaktaṃ bhagavatā cātra kṛtam evaṃ bhaviṣyatic tato me tvaccarau bhāvaḥ pādape ca sumadhyamee kathaṃ viśiṣṭo bhrātā te bhaved ity eva cintayaa tathā ca kṛtavatyau te mātā satyavatī ca sāc atha garbhāv anuprāpte ubhe te vai yudhiṣṭhiraa dṛṣṭvā garbham anuprāptāṃ bhāryāṃ sa ca mahān ṛṣiḥc uvāca tāṃ satyavatīṃ durmanā bhṛgusattamaḥa vyatyāsenopayuktas te carur vyaktaṃ bhaviṣyatic vyatyāsaḥ pādape cāpi suvyaktaṃ te kṛtaḥ śubhea mayā hi viśvaṃ yad brahma tvaccarau saṃniveśitamc kṣatravīryaṃ ca sakalaṃ carau tasyā niveśitama trilokavikhyātaguṇaṃ tvaṃ vipraṃ janayiṣyasic sā ca kṣatraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vai tata etat kṛtaṃ mayāa vyatyāsas tu kṛto yasmāt tvayā mātrā tathaiva cac tasmāt sā brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ mātā te janayiṣyatia kṣatriyaṃ tūgrakarmāṇaṃ tvaṃ bhadre janayiṣyasic na hi te tat kṛtaṃ sādhu mātṛsnehena bhāminia sā śrutvā na tapāmi yathābalamd śacīd etena satyavākyena pādaḥ kumbhasya pūryatāmd karmaṇā manasā vācā nāvamanye puraṃdaramd bhīṣmaḥd etena satyavākyena pādaḥ kumbhasya pūryatāmd atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ provāca tad asaṃdigdhaṃ vacanaṃ patageśvaraḥdA udyataṃ gurukṛtye māṃ bhagavan dharmaniścitamdA vimokṣaṇārthaṃ mātur hi dāsabhāvād aninditamdA kadrūsakāśam amṛtaṃ mayā hartavyam īśvaradA tadā me jananī deva dāsabhāvāt pramokṣyatedA tatrāmṛtaṃ prajvalito nityam īśvara rakṣatidA hiraṇyaretā bhagavān pākaśāsanaśāsanātdA tatra me devadeveśa bhayaṃ tīvram athāviśatdA jvalantaṃ pāvakaṃ dṛṣṭvā pakṣitvaṃ cātmanaḥ prabhodA samatikramituṃ śakyaḥ kathaṃ syāt pāvako mayādA tasyābhyupāyaṃ varada vaktum īśo si me prabhodA tam abravīn mahābhāga tapyamānaṃ vihaṃgamamdA agneḥ saṃśamanopāyam utsmayan sa punaḥ punaḥdA payasā śāmyate vatsa sarpiṣā ca hutāśanaḥdA śarīrastho pi bhūtānāṃ kiṃ punaḥ prajvalan bhuvidA navanītaṃ payo vāpi pāvake tvaṃ samādadheḥdA bhīṣmaḥdA tato gaccha yathākāmaṃ na tvā dhakṣyati pāvakaḥdA pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥdA jagāma gokulaṃ kiṃ cin navanītajihīrṣayādA navanītaṃ tathāpaśyan mathitaṃ kalaśe sthitamdA tad ādāya tato gacchad yatas tad rakṣyate mṛtamdA sa tatra gatvā patagas tiryak toyaṃ mahābalaḥdA hutāśanam apakramya navanītam apātayatdA so rciṣmān mandavego bhūt sarpiṣā tena tarpitaḥdA dhūmaketur na jajvāla dhūmam eva sasarja hadA tam atītyāśu garuḍo hṛṣṭātmā jātavedasamdA rakṣāṃsi samatikrāmat pakṣavātena pātayandA te patanti śirobhiś ca jānubhiś caraṇais tathādA utsṛjya śastrāvaraṇaṃ pakṣipakṣasamāhatāḥdA utplutya cāvṛtān nāgān hatvā cakraṃ vyatītya cadA arāntareṇa śirasā bhittvā jālaṃ samādravatdA sa bhittvā śirasā jālaṃ vajravegasamo balīdA ujjahāra tataḥ śīghram amṛtaṃ bhujagāśanaḥdA tad ādāyādravac chīghraṃ garuḍaḥ śvasano yathādA atha saṃnāham akarod vṛtrahā vibudhaiḥ sahadA tato mātalisaṃyuktaṃ haribhiḥ svarṇamālibhiḥdA āruroha rathaṃ śīghraṃ sūryāgnisamatejasamdA so bhyadravat pakṣirājaṃ vṛtrahā pākaśāsanaḥdA udyamya niśitaṃ vajraṃ vajrahasto mahābalaḥdA tathaiva garuḍo rājan vajrahastaṃ samādravatdA tato vai mātaliṃ prāha śīghraṃ vāhaya vājinaḥdA atha divyaṃ mahāghoraṃ garuḍāya sasarja hadA vajraṃ sahasranayanas tigmavegaparākramaḥdA utsisṛkṣantam ājñāya vajraṃ vai tridaśeśvaramdA tūrṇaṃ vegataro bhūtvā jagāma patatāṃ varaḥdA pitāmahanisargeṇa jñātvā labdhavaraḥ khagaḥdA āyudhānāṃ varaṃ vajram atha śakram uvāca hadA vṛtrahann eṣa vajras te varo labdhaḥ pitāmahātdA ataḥ saṃmānam ākāṅkṣan muñcāmy ekaṃ tanūruhamdA etenāyudharājena yadi śakto si vṛtrahandA hanyās tvaṃ parayā śaktyā gacchāmy aham anāmayaḥdA tat tu tūrṇaṃ tadā vajraṃ svena vegena bhāratadA jaghāna parayā śaktyā na cainam adahad bhṛśamdA tato devarṣayo rājan gacchanto vai vihāyasādA dṛṣṭvā vajraṃ viṣaktaṃ taṃ pakṣiparṇe bruvan vacaḥdA suparṇaḥ pakṣigaruḍo yasya parṇe varāyudhamdA viṣaktaṃ devarājasya vṛtrahantuḥ sanātanamdA evaṃ suparṇo vihago vainateyaḥ pratāpavāndA ṛṣayas taṃ vijānanti cāgneyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ punaḥdA vedābhiṣṭutam atyantaṃ svargamārgaphalapradamdA tanu parṇaṃ suparṇasya jagṛhur barhiṇas tathādA bhīṣmaḥdA mayūrā vismitāḥ sarve ādravanti sma vajriṇamdA tato vajraṃ sahasrākṣo dṛṣṭvā saktaṃ varāyudhamdA ṛṣīṃś ca dṛṣṭvā sahasā suparṇam idam abravītdA na te suparṇa paśyāmi prabhāvaṃ tena yodhayedA ity ukte na mayā rakṣā śakyā kartum ato nyathādA idaṃ vajraṃ mayā sārdhaṃ nivṛttaṃ hi yathāgatamdA tataḥ sahasranayane nivṛtte garuḍas tathādA garuḍaḥdA kadrūm abhyāgamat tūrṇam amṛtaṃ gṛhya bhāratadA tadāhṛtaṃ mayā śīghram amṛtaṃ jananīkṛtedA kadrūḥdA adāsī sā bhavatv adya vinatā dharmacāriṇīdA svāgataṃ svāhṛtaṃ cedam amṛtaṃ vinatātmajadA adāsī jananī te dya putra kāmavaśā śubhādA evam ukte tadā sā ca saṃprāptā vinatā gṛhamdA upanīya yathānyāyaṃ vihago balināṃ varaḥdA smṛtvā nikṛtyā vijayaṃ mātuḥ saṃpratipadyatadA vadhaṃ ca bhujagendrāṇāṃ ye vālās tasya vājinaḥdA babhūvur asitaprakhyā nikṛtyā vai jitaṃ tvayādA tām uvāca tato nyāyaṃ vihago balināṃ varaḥdA ujjahārāmṛtaṃ tūrṇam utpapāta ca raṃhasādA tad gṛhītvāmṛtaṃ tūrṇaṃ prayāntam aparājitamdA kadrūr bhujaṃgajananī suparṇam idam abravītdA kimarthaṃ vainateya tvam āhṛtyāmṛtam uttamamdA punar harasi durbuddhe mā jātu vṛjinaṃ kṛthāḥdA suparṇaḥdA amṛtāharaṇaṃ me dya yat kṛtaṃ jananīkṛtedA bhavatyā vacanād etad āharāmṛtam ity utadA āhṛtaṃ tad idaṃ śīghraṃ muktā ca jananī mamadA harāmy eṣa punas tatra yata etan mayāhṛtamdA yadi māṃ bhavatī brūyād amṛtaṃ me ca dīyatāmdA tathā kuryāṃ na vā kuryāṃ na hi tvam amṛtakṣamādA bhīṣmaḥdA mayā dharmeṇa satyena vinatā ca samuddhṛtādA tato gatvātha garuḍaḥ puraṃdaram uvāca hadA idaṃ mayā vṛtrahantar hṛtaṃ te mṛtam uttamamdA mātrarthe hi tathaivedaṃ gṛhāṇāmṛtam āhṛtamdA mātā ca mama deveśa dāsītvam upajagmuṣīdA bhujaṃgamānāṃ mātur vai sā muktāmṛtadarśanātdA etac chrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ suparṇam anumanyatedA uvāca ca mudā yukto diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti vāsavaḥdA ṛṣayo ye sahasrākṣam upāsanti suraiḥ sahadA te sarve ca mudā yuktā viśve devās tathaiva cadA tatas tam ṛṣayaḥ sarve devāś ca bharatarṣabhadA ūcuḥ puraṃdaraṃ hṛṣṭā garuḍo labhatāṃ varamdA tataḥ śacīpatir vākyam uvāca prahasann ivadA janiṣyati hṛṣīkeśaḥ svayam evaiṣa pakṣirāṭdA keśavaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ śūraputrasya veśmanidA svayaṃ dharmasya rakṣārthaṃ vibhajya bhujagāśanaḥdA eṣa te pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha garuḍo tha patatrirāṭdA suparṇo vainateyaś ca kīrtito bhadram astu tedA tad etad dadatāṃ śreṣṭha mayākhyānaṃ prakīrtitamdA suparṇasya mahābāho kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa brāhmaṇānāṃ tu ye loke pratiśrutya pitāmahac na prayacchanti mohāt te ke bhavanti mahāmated dānadharmeṣu bho bhīṣma sadaiva niścayo hi mea etan me tattvato brūhi dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varac pratiśrutya durātmāno na prayacchanti ye narāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa yo na dadyāt pratiśrutya svalpaṃ vā yadi vā bahuc āśās tasya hatāḥ sarvāḥ klībasyeva prajāphalama yāṃ rātriṃ jāyate pāpo yāṃ ca rātriṃ vinaśyatic etasminn antare yad yat sukṛtaṃ tasya bhāratae yac ca tasya hutaṃ kiṃ cit sarvaṃ tasyopahanyatee dattaṃ vā bharatarṣabhae tapas taptam atho vāpia atraitad vacanaṃ prāhur dharmaśāstravido janāḥc niśamya bharataśreṣṭha buddhyā paramayuktayāa api codāharantīmaṃ dharmaśāstravido janāḥc aśvānāṃ śyāmakarṇānāṃ sahasreṇa sa mucyatea atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc sṛgālasya ca saṃvādaṃ vānarasya ca bhārataa tau sakhāyau purā hy āstāṃ mānuṣatve paraṃtapac anyāṃ yoniṃ samāpannau sārgālīṃ vānarīṃ tathād saṃbhāṣamāṇau tu tataḥ sakhyaṃ tatra parasparama tataḥ parāsūn khādantaṃ sṛgālaṃ vānaro bravītc śmaśānamadhye saṃprekṣya pūrvajātim anusmarana kiṃ tvayā pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ sudāruṇamc yas tvaṃ śmaśāne mṛtakān pūtikān atsi kutsitāna evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca sṛgālo vānaraṃ tadāc brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya na mayā tad upākṛtama tatkṛte pāpikāṃ yonim āpanno smi plavaṃgamac tasmād evaṃvidhaṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣayāmi bubhukṣitaḥd etan mayā te kathitaṃ sṛgālo haṃ yathābhavamd vānara uvācad tvaṃ tu vānaratāṃ prāptaḥ karmaṇā kena tad vadad pārakyāṇi purā lobhāt phalāny apahṛtāni cad bhīṣma uvācad tenāhaṃ karmadoṣeṇa vānaratvam upāgataḥd evaṃ tau kathayitvā tu karmadoṣān parasparamd sṛgālo vānaraś cāpi pratiyātau yathāgatamd bhīṣma uvācad sṛgālo vānaraṃ prāha punar eva nṛpottamad kiṃ tvayā pātakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenāsi vānaraḥd sa cāpy āha brāhmaṇānāṃ phalāhāraḥ plavaṃgamaḥd tasmān na brāhmaṇasvaṃ tu hartavyaṃ viduṣā sadād sīmāvivāde moktavyaṃ dātavyaṃ ca pratiśrutama ity etad bruvato rājan brāhmaṇasya mayā śrutamc kathāṃ kathayataḥ puṇyāṃ dharmajñasya purātanīma śrutaṃ cāpi mayā bhūyaḥ kṛṣṇasyāpi viśāṃ patec kathāṃ kathayataḥ pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ prati pāṇḍavad na hartavyaṃ vipradhanaṃ kṣantavyaṃ teṣu nityaśaḥd bālāś ca nāvamantavyā daridrāḥ kṛpaṇā apia evam eva ca māṃ nityaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ saṃdiśanti vaic pratiśrutya bhaved deyaṃ nāśā kāryā hi brāhmaṇaiḥa brāhmaṇo hy āśayā pūrvaṃ kṛtayā pṛthivīpatec susamiddho yathā dīptaḥ pāvakas tadvidhaḥ smṛtaḥa yaṃ nirīkṣeta saṃkruddha āśayā pūrvajātayāc pradaheta hi taṃ rājan kakṣam akṣayyabhug yathāa sa eva hi yadā tuṣṭo vacasā pratinandatic bhavaty agadasaṃkāśo viṣaye tasya bhārataa putrān pautrān paśūṃś caiva bāndhavān sacivāṃs tathāc puraṃ janapadaṃ caiva śāntir iṣṭeva puṣyatia etad dhi paramaṃ tejo brāhmaṇasyeha dṛśyatec sahasrakiraṇasyeva savitur dharaṇītalea tasmād dātavyam eveha pratiśrutya yudhiṣṭhirac yadīcchec chobhanāṃ jātiṃ prāptuṃ bharatasattamaa brāhmaṇasya hi dattena dhruvaṃ svargo hy anuttamaḥc śakyaṃ prāptuṃ viśeṣeṇa dānaṃ hi mahatī kriyāa ito dattena jīvanti devatāḥ pitaras tathāc tasmād dānāni deyāni brāhmaṇebhyo vijānatāa mahad dhi bharataśreṣṭha brāhmaṇas tīrtham ucyatec velāyāṃ na tu kasyāṃ cid gacched vipro hy apūjitaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa mitrasauhṛdabhāvena upadeśaṃ karoti yaḥc jātyāvarasya rājarṣe doṣas tasya bhaven na vāa etad icchāmi tattvena vyākhyātuṃ vai pitāmahac sūkṣmā gatir hi dharmasya yatra muhyanti mānavāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa atra te vartayiṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan yathāgamamb duruktaṃ vacanaṃ rājan yathānyāyaṃ yathāgatamc ṛṣīṇāṃ vadatāṃ pūrvaṃ śrutam āsīd yathā mayāa upadeśo na kartavyo jātihīnasya kasya citc upadeśe mahān doṣa upādhyāyasya bhāṣyated nādhyāpayec chūdram iha tathā naiva ca yājayeta nidarśanam idaṃ rājañ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabhac duruktavacane rājan yathā pūrvaṃ yudhiṣṭhirae brahmāśramapade vṛttaṃ pārśve himavataḥ śubhea tatrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ nānāvṛkṣagaṇāyutamc bahugulmalatākīrṇaṃ mṛgadvijaniṣevitama siddhacāraṇasaṃghuṣṭaṃ ramyaṃ puṣpitakānanamc vratibhir bahubhiḥ kīrṇaṃ tāpasair upaśobhitama brāhmaṇaiś ca mahābhāgaiḥ sūryajvalanasaṃnibhaiḥc niyamavratasaṃpannaiḥ samākīrṇaṃ tapasvibhiḥe dīkṣitair bharataśreṣṭha yatāhāraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥa vedādhyayanaghoṣaiś ca nāditaṃ bharatarṣabhac vālakhilyaiś ca bahubhir yatibhiś ca niṣevitama tatra kaś cit samutsāhaṃ kṛtvā śūdro dayānvitaḥc āgato hy āśramapadaṃ pūjitaś ca tapasvibhiḥa tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā munigaṇān devakalpān mahaujasaḥc vahato vividhā dīkṣāḥ saṃprahṛṣyata bhārataa athāsya buddhir abhavat tapasye bharatarṣabhac tato bravīt kulapatiṃ pādau saṃgṛhya bhārataa bhavatprasādād icchāmi dharmaṃ cartuṃ dvijarṣabhac tan māṃ tvaṃ bhagavan vaktuṃ pravrājayitum arhasia varṇāvaro haṃ bhagavañ śūdro jātyāsmi sattamac śuśrūṣāṃ kartum icchāmi prapannāya prasīda me kulapatir uvācaa na śakyam iha śūdreṇa liṅgam āśritya vartitumc āsyatāṃ yadi te buddhiḥ śuśrūṣānirato bhavad śuśrūṣayā parāṃl lokān avāpsyasi na saṃśayaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa evam uktas tu muninā sa śūdro cintayan nṛpac katham atra mayā kāryaṃ śraddhā dharme parā ca mee vijñātam evaṃ bhavatu kariṣye priyam ātmanaḥa gatvāśramapadād dūram uṭajaṃ kṛtavāṃs tu saḥc tatra vediṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca devatāyatanāni cae niveśya bharataśreṣṭha niyamastho bhavat sukhama abhiṣekāṃś ca niyamān devatāyataneṣu cac baliṃ ca kṛtvā hutvā ca devatāṃ cāpy apūjayata saṃkalpaniyamopetaḥ phalāhāro jitendriyaḥc nityaṃ saṃnihitābhiś ca oṣadhībhiḥ phalais tathāa atithīn pūjayām āsa yathāvat samupāgatānc evaṃ hi sumahān kālo vyatyakrāmat sa tasya vaia athāsya munir āgacchat saṃgatyā vai tam āśramamc saṃpūjya svāgatenarṣiṃ vidhivat paryatoṣayata anukūlāḥ kathāḥ kṛtvā yathāvat paryapṛcchatac ṛṣiḥ paramatejasvī dharmātmā saṃyatendriyaḥa evaṃ sa bahuśas tasya śūdrasya bharatarṣabhac so gacchad āśramam ṛṣiḥ śūdraṃ draṣṭuṃ nararṣabhaa atha taṃ tāpasaṃ śūdraḥ so bravīd bharatarṣabhac pitṛkāryaṃ kariṣyāmi tatra me nugrahaṃ kurua bāḍham ity eva taṃ vipra uvāca bharatarṣabhab atha grāhayituṃ vipraṃ śūdro nīvārataṇḍulānc śucir bhūtvā sa śūdras tu tasyarṣeḥ pādyam ānayatd śucir bhūtvā namaskṛtya tasya pādyam athānayata atha darbhāṃś ca vanyāś ca oṣadhīr bharatarṣabhac pavitram āsanaṃ caiva bṛsīṃ ca samupānayata atha dakṣiṇam āvṛtya bṛsīṃ paramaśīrṣikāmc kṛtām anyāyato dṛṣṭvā tatas tam ṛṣir abravīta kuruṣvaitāṃ pūrvaśīrṣāṃ bhava codaṅmukhaḥ śuciḥc sa ca tat kṛtavāñ śūdraḥ sarvaṃ yad ṛṣir abravīta yathopadiṣṭaṃ medhāvī darbhādīṃs tān yathātathamc havyakavyavidhiṃ kṛtsnam uktaṃ tena tapasvināa ṛṣiṇā pitṛkārye ca sa ca dharmapathe sthitaḥc pitṛkārye kṛte cāpi visṛṣṭaḥ sa jagāma haa atha dīrghasya kālasya sa tapyañ śūdratāpasaḥc vane pañcatvam agamat sukṛtena ca tena vaie ajāyata mahārājarājavaṃśe mahādyutiḥa tathaiva sa ṛṣis tāta kāladharmam avāpya hac purohitakule vipra ājāto bharatarṣabhaa evaṃ tau tatra saṃbhūtāv ubhau śūdramunī tadāc krameṇa vardhitau cāpi vidyāsu kuśalāv ubhaua atharvavede vede ca babhūvarṣiḥ suniścitaḥc kalpaprayoge cotpanne jyotiṣe ca paraṃ gataḥe sakhye cāpi parā prītis tayoś cāpi vyavardhataa pitary uparate cāpi kṛtaśaucaḥ sa bhāratac abhiṣiktaḥ prakṛtibhī rājaputraḥ sa pārthivaḥe abhiṣiktena sa ṛṣir abhiṣiktaḥ purohitaḥa sa taṃ purodhāya sukham avasad bharatarṣabhac rājyaṃ śaśāsa dharmeṇa prajāś ca paripālayana puṇyāhavācane nityaṃ dharmakāryeṣu cāsakṛtc utsmayan prāhasac cāpi dṛṣṭvā rājā purohitame evaṃ sa bahuśo rājan purodhasam upāhasata lakṣayitvā purodhās tu bahuśastaṃ narādhipamc utsmayantaṃ ca satataṃ dṛṣṭvāsau manyumān abhūta atha śūnye purodhās tu saha rājñā samāgataḥc kathābhir anukūlābhī rājānam abhirāmayata tato bravīn narendraṃ sa purodhā bharatarṣabhac varam icchāmy ahaṃ tv ekaṃ tvayā dattaṃ mahādyute rājovācaa varāṇāṃ te śataṃ dadyāṃ kim utaikaṃ dvijottamac snehāc ca bahumānāc ca nāsty adeyaṃ hi me tava purohita uvācaa ekaṃ vai varam icchāmi yadi tuṣṭo si pārthivac yad dadāsi mahārāja satyaṃ tad vada mānṛtam bhīṣma uvācaa bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhirac yadi jñāsyāmi vakṣyāmi ajānan na tu saṃvade purohita uvācaa puṇyāhavācane nityaṃ dharmakṛtyeṣu cāsakṛtc śāntihomeṣu ca sadā kiṃ tvaṃ hasasi vīkṣya māma savrīḍaṃ vai bhavati hi mano me hasatā tvayāc kāmayā śāpito rājan nānyathā vaktum arhasia bhāvyaṃ hi kāraṇenātra na te hāsyam akāraṇamc kautūhalaṃ me subhṛśaṃ tattvena kathayasva me rājovācaa evam ukte tvayā vipra yad avācyaṃ bhaved apic avaśyam eva vaktavyaṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā dvijaa pūrvadehe yathā vṛttaṃ tan nibodha dvijottamac jātiṃ smarāmy ahaṃ brahmann avadhānena me śṛṇua śūdro ham abhavaṃ pūrvaṃ tāpaso bhṛśasaṃyutaḥc ṛṣir ugratapās tvaṃ ca tadābhūr dvijasattamaa prīyatā hi tadā brahman mamānugrahabuddhināc pitṛkārye tvayā pūrvam upadeśaḥ kṛto naghae bṛsyāṃ darbheṣu havye ca kavye ca munisattamaa etena karmadoṣeṇa purodhās tvam ajāyathāḥc ahaṃ rājā ca viprendra paśya kālasya paryayame matkṛte hy upadeśena tvayā prāptam idaṃ phalama etasmāt kāraṇād brahman prahase tvāṃ dvijottamac na tvāṃ paribhavan brahman prahasāmi gurur bhavāna viparyayeṇa me manyus tena saṃtapyate manaḥc jātiṃ smarāmy ahaṃ tubhyam atas tvāṃ prahasāmi vaia evaṃ tavograṃ hi tapa upadeśena nāśitamc purohitatvam utsṛjya yatasva tvaṃ punarbhavea itas tvam adhamām anyāṃ mā yoniṃ prāpsyase dvijac gṛhyatāṃ draviṇaṃ vipra pūtātmā bhava sattama bhīṣma uvācaa tato visṛṣṭo rājñā tu vipro dānāny anekaśaḥc brāhmaṇebhyo dadau vittaṃ bhūmiṃ grāmāṃś ca sarvaśaḥa kṛcchrāṇi cīrtvā ca tato yathoktāni dvijottamaḥc tīrthāni cābhigatvā vai dānāni vividhāni caa dattvā gāś caiva viprāṇāṃ pūtātmā so bhavad dvijaḥc tam eva cāśramaṃ gatvā cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥa tataḥ siddhiṃ parāṃ prāpto brāhmaṇo rājasattamac saṃmataś cābhavat teṣām āśrame śramavāsināma evaṃ prāpto mahat kṛcchram ṛṣiḥ sa nṛpasattamac brāhmaṇena na vaktavyaṃ tasmād varṇāvare janea varjayed upadeśaṃ ca sadaiva brāhmaṇo nṛpac upadeśaṃ hi kurvāṇo dvijaḥ kṛcchram avāpnuyāta eṣitavyaṃ sadā vācā nṛpeṇa dvijasattamātc na pravaktavyam iha hi kiṃ cid varṇāvare janea brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyās trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥc eteṣu kathayan rājan brāhmaṇo na praduṣyatia tasmāt sadbhir na vaktavyaṃ kasya cit kiṃ cid agrataḥc sūkṣmā gatir hi dharmasya durjñeyā hy akṛtātmabhiḥa tasmān maunāni munayo dīkṣāṃ kurvanti cādṛtāḥc duruktasya bhayād rājan nānubhāṣanti kiṃ canaa dhārmikā guṇasaṃpannāḥ satyārjavaparāyaṇāḥc duruktavācābhihatāḥ prāpnuvantīha duṣkṛtama upadeśo na kartavyaḥ kadā cid api kasya citc upadeśād dhi tat pāpaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ samavāpnuyāta vimṛśya tasmāt prājñena vaktavyaṃ dharmam icchatāc satyānṛtena hi kṛta upadeśo hinasti vaia vaktavyam iha pṛṣṭena viniścitya viparyayamc sa copadeśaḥ kartavyo yena dharmam avāpnuyāta etat te sarvam ākhyātam upadeśe kṛte satic mahān kleśo hi bhavati tasmān nopadiśet kva cit yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kīdṛśe puruṣe tāta strīṣu vā bharatarṣabhac śrīḥ padmā vasate nityaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathādṛṣṭaṃ yathāśrutamc rukmiṇī devakīputrasaṃnidhau paryapṛcchataa nārāyaṇasyāṅkagatāṃ jvalantīṃdṛṣṭvā śriyaṃ padmasamānavaktrāmc kautūhalād vismitacārunetrāpapraccha mātā makaradhvajasyaa kānīha bhūtāny upasevase tvaṃsaṃtiṣṭhatī kāni na sevase tvamc tāni trilokeśvarabhūtakāntetattvena me brūhi maharṣikanyea evaṃ tadā śrīr abhibhāṣyamāṇādevyā samakṣaṃ garuḍadhvajasyac uvāca vākyaṃ madhurābhidhānaṃmanoharaṃ candramukhī prasannāa vasāmi satye subhage pragalbhedakṣe nare karmaṇi vartamāneb akrodhane devapare kṛtajñeb jitendriye nityam udīrṇasattvec nākarmaśīle puruṣe vasāmina nāstike sāṃkarike kṛtaghnee na bhinnavṛtte na nṛśaṃsavṛttena cāpi caure na guruṣv asūyea ye cālpatejobalasattvasārāhṛṣyanti kupyanti ca yatra tatrac na devi tiṣṭhāmi tathāvidheṣunareṣu saṃsuptamanoratheṣua yaś cātmani prārthayate na kiṃ cidyaś ca svabhāvopahatāntarātmāc teṣv alpasaṃtoṣarateṣu nityaṃnareṣu nāhaṃ nivasāmi devia vasāmi dharmaśīleṣu dharmajñeṣu mahātmasuc vṛddhaseviṣu dānteṣu sattvajñeṣu mahātmasud avandhyakāleṣu sadā snānaśaucarateṣu cad brahmacaryatapojñānagodvijātipriyeṣu caa strīṣu kṣāntāsu dāntāsu devadvijaparāsu cac vasāmi satyaśīlāsu svabhāvaniratāsu cad viśuddhagṛhabhāṇḍāsu godhānyābhiratāsu cad svadharmaśīleṣu ca dharmavitsud vṛddhopasevānirate ca dānted kṛtātmani kṣāntipare samarthed kṣāntāsu dāntāsu tathābalāsud satyasvabhāvārjavasaṃyutāsud vasāmi devadvijapūjitāsua prakīrṇabhāṇḍām anavekṣyakāriṇīṃsadā ca bhartuḥ pratikūlavādinīmc parasya veśmābhiratām alajjāmevaṃvidhāṃ strīṃ parivarjayāmia lolām acokṣām avalehinīṃ cavyapetadhairyāṃ kalahapriyāṃ cac nidrābhibhūtāṃ satataṃ śayānāmevaṃvidhāṃ strīṃ parivarjayāmia satyāsu nityaṃ priyadarśanāsusaubhāgyayuktāsu guṇānvitāsuc vasāmi nārīṣu pativratāsukalyāṇaśīlāsu vibhūṣitāsua yāneṣu kanyāsu vibhūṣaṇeṣuyajñeṣu megheṣu ca vṛṣṭimatsuc vasāmi phullāsu ca padminīṣunakṣatravīthīṣu ca śāradīṣua śaileṣu goṣṭheṣu tathā vaneṣusaraḥsu phullotpalapaṅkajeṣuc nadīṣu haṃsasvananāditāsukrauñcāvaghuṣṭasvaraśobhitāsua vistīrṇakūlahradaśobhitāsutapasvisiddhadvijasevitāsuc vasāmi nityaṃ subahūdakāsusiṃhair gajaiś cākulitodakāsue matte gaje govṛṣabhe narendresiṃhāsane satpuruṣe ca nityama yasmin gṛhe hūyate havyavāhogobrāhmaṇaś cārcyate devatāś cab yasmiñ jano havyabhujaṃ juhotib gobrāhmaṇaṃ cārcati devatāś cab yasmin yajñe hūyati havyavāheb gobrāhmaṇābhyarcitadevatāsuc kāle ca puṣpair balayaḥ kriyantetasmin gṛhe nityam upaimi vāsama svādhyāyanityeṣu dvijeṣu nityaṃkṣatre ca dharmābhirate sadaivac vaiśye ca kṛṣyābhirate vasāmiśūdre ca śuśrūṣaṇanityayuktea nārāyaṇe tv ekamanā vasāmisarveṇa bhāvena śarīrabhūtāc tasmin hi dharmaḥ sumahān niviṣṭobrahmaṇyatā cātra tathā priyatvama nāhaṃ śarīreṇa vasāmi devinaivaṃ mayā śakyam ihābhidhātumc yasmiṃs tu bhāvena vasāmi puṃsisa vardhate dharmayaśorthakāmaiḥd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd prāyaścittaṃ kṛtaghnānāṃ pratibrūhi pitāmahad mātṝḥ pitṝn gurūṃś caiva ye vamanyanti mohitāḥd ye cāpy anye pare tāta kṛtaghnā nirapatrapāḥd bhīṣmaḥd teṣāṃ gatiṃ mahābāho śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥd kṛtaghnānāṃ gatis tāta narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥd mātāpitṛgurūṇāṃ ca ye na tiṣṭhanta śāsaned kṛmikīṭapipīleṣu jāyante sthāvareṣu cad durlabho hi punas teṣāṃ mānuṣye punarudbhavaḥd atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamd vatsanābho mahāprājño maharṣiḥ saṃśitavrataḥd valmīkabhūto brahmarṣis tapyate sumahat tapaḥd tasmiṃś ca tapyati tapo vāsavo bharatarṣabhad vavarṣa sumahad varṣaṃ savidyut stanayitnumānd tatra saptāhavarṣaṃ tu mumuce pākaśāsanaḥd nimīlitākṣas tad varṣaṃ pratyagṛhṇata vai dvijaḥd tasmin patati varṣe tu śītavātasamanvited viśīrṇadhvastaśikharo valmīko śanitāḍitaḥd tāḍyamāne tatas tasmin vatsanābhe mahātmanid kāruṇyāt tasya dharmas tu ānṛśaṃsyam athākarotd cintayānasya brahmarṣiṃ tapantam atidhārmikamd anurūpā matiḥ kṣipram upajātā svabhāvajād svaṃ rūpaṃ māhiṣaṃ kṛtvā sumahāntaṃ manoharamd trāṇārthaṃ vatsanābhasya catuṣpād upari sthitaḥd yadā tv apagataṃ varṣaṃ vṛṣṭivātasamanvitamd tato mahiṣarūpeṇa dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varad śanair valmīkam utsṛjya prādravad bharatarṣabhad sthite smin vṛṣṭisaṃpāte vīkṣate sma mahātapāḥd diśaś ca vipulās tatra girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi cad dṛṣṭvā ca pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ salilena pariplutāmd jalāśayān sa tān dṛṣṭvā vipraḥ pramudito bhavatd acintayad vismitaś ca varṣāt kenāsmi rakṣitaḥd so paśyat tatra mahiṣam avasthitam adūrataḥd tiryagyonāv api kathaṃ dṛśyate dharmavatsalaḥd ato nu bhadramahiṣaḥ śilāpaṭṭam avasthitaḥd pīvaraś caiva balyaś ca bahumāṃso bhaved ayamd tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā dharmasaṃsaktajā muneḥd kṛtaghnā narakaṃ yānti ye ca viśvastaghātinaḥd niṣkṛtiṃ neha paśyāmi kṛtaghnānāṃ kathaṃ canad ṛte prāṇaparityāgād dharmajñānāṃ vaco yathād akṛtvā bharaṇaṃ pitror adattvā gurudakṣiṇāmd kṛtaghnatāṃ ca saṃprāpya maraṇāntā ca niṣkṛtiḥd ākāṅkṣāyām upekṣāyāṃ copapātakam uttamamd tasmāt prāṇān parityakṣye prāyaścittārtham ity utad sa meruśikharaṃ gatvā niḥsaṅgenāntarātmanād prāyaścittaṃ kartukāmaḥ śarīraṃ tyaktum udyataḥd dharmaḥd nigṛhītaś ca dharmātmā haste dharmeṇa dharmavitd vatsanābha mahāprājña bahuvarṣaśatāyuṣad parituṣṭo smi tyāgena niḥsaṅgena tathātmanaḥd evaṃ dharmabhṛtaḥ sarve vimṛśanti kṛtākṛtamd na kaś cid vatsanābhasya yasya nopahataṃ manaḥd yaś cānavadyaś carati śakto dharmaṃ ca sarvaśaḥd nivartasva mahāprājña pūtātmā hy asi śāśvataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa strīpuṃsayoḥ saṃprayoge sparśaḥ kasyādhiko bhavetc etan me saṃśayaṃ rājan yathāvad vaktum arhasi bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc bhaṅgāśvanena śakrasya yathā vairam abhūt purāa purā bhaṅgāśvano nāma rājarṣir atidhārmikaḥc aputraḥ sa naravyāghra putrārthaṃ yajñam āharata agniṣṭuṃ nāma rājarṣir indradviṣṭaṃ mahābalaḥc prāyaścitteṣu martyānāṃ putrakāmasya ceṣyatea indro jñātvā tu taṃ yajñaṃ mahābhāgaḥ sureśvaraḥc antaraṃ tasya rājarṣer anvicchan niyatātmanaḥd na caivāsyāntaraṃ rājan sa dadarśa mahātmanaḥa kasya cit tv atha kālasya mṛgayām aṭato nṛpac idam antaram ity eva śakro nṛpam amohayata ekāśvena ca rājarṣir bhrānta indreṇa mohitaḥc na diśo vindata nṛpaḥ kṣutpipāsārditas tadāa itaś cetaś ca vai dhāvañ śramatṛṣṇārdito nṛpaḥc saro paśyat suruciraṃ pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇāe so vagāhya saras tāta pāyayām āsa vājinama atha pītodakaṃ so śvaṃ vṛkṣe baddhvā nṛpottamaḥc avagāhya tataḥ snāto rājā strītvam avāpa haa ātmānaṃ strīkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā vrīḍito nṛpasattamaḥc cintānugatasarvātmā vyākulendriyacetanaḥa ārohiṣye kathaṃ tv aśvaṃ kathaṃ yāsyāmi vai puramc agniṣṭuṃ nāma iṣṭaṃ me putrāṇāṃ śatam aurasama jātaṃ mahābalānāṃ vai tān pravakṣyāmi kiṃ tv ahamc dāreṣu cāsmadīyeṣu paurajānapadeṣu caa mṛdutvaṃ ca tanutvaṃ ca viklavatvaṃ tathaiva cab hāvabhāvādilāvaṇyastrīguṇād vā kutūhalamc strīguṇā ṛṣibhiḥ proktā dharmatattvārthadarśibhiḥe vyāyāmaḥ karkaśatvaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca puruṣe guṇāḥa pauruṣaṃ vipranaṣṭaṃ me strītvaṃ kenāpi me bhavatc strībhāvāt katham aśvaṃ tu punar āroḍhum utsahea mahatā tv atha khedena āruhyāśvaṃ narādhipaḥc punar āyāt puraṃ tāta strībhūto nṛpasattamaa putrā dārāś ca bhṛtyāś ca paurajānapadāś ca tec kiṃ nv idaṃ tv iti vijñāya vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥa athovāca sa rājarṣiḥ strībhūto vadatāṃ varaḥc mṛgayām asmi niryāto balaiḥ parivṛto dṛḍhame udbhrāntaḥ prāviśaṃ ghorām aṭavīṃ daivamohitaḥa aṭavyāṃ ca sughorāyāṃ tṛṣṇārto naṣṭacetanaḥc saraḥ suruciraprakhyam apaśyaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtama tatrāvagāḍhaḥ strībhūto vyaktaṃ daivān na saṃśayaḥc atṛpta iva putrāṇāṃ dārāṇāṃ ca dhanasya cad nāmagotrāṇi cābhāṣya dārāṇāṃ mantriṇāṃ tathāa uvāca putrāṃś ca tataḥ strībhūtaḥ pārthivottamaḥc saṃprītyā bhujyatāṃ rājyaṃ vanaṃ yāsyāmi putrakāḥe abhiṣicya sa putrāṇāṃ śataṃ rājā vanaṃ gataḥf evam uktvā putraśataṃ vanam eva jagāma haf sa putrāṇāṃ śataṃ rājā abhiṣicya vanaṃ gataḥa tām āśrame striyaṃ tāta tāpaso bhyavapadyatac tāpasenāsya putrāṇām āśrame py abhavac chatama atha sā tān sutān gṛhya pūrvaputrān abhāṣatac puruṣatve sutā yūyaṃ strītve ceme śataṃ sutāḥa ekatra bhujyatāṃ rājyaṃ bhrātṛbhāvena putrakāḥc sahitā bhrātaras te tha rājyaṃ bubhujire tadāa tān dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛbhāvena bhuñjānān rājyam uttamamc cintayām āsa devendro manyunābhipariplutaḥe upakāro sya rājarṣeḥ kṛto nāpakṛtaṃ mayāa tato brāhmaṇarūpeṇa devarājaḥ śatakratuḥc bhedayām āsa tān gatvā nagaraṃ vai nṛpātmajāna bhrātṝṇāṃ nāsti saubhrātraṃ ye py ekasya pituḥ sutāḥc rājyahetor vivaditāḥ kaśyapasya surāsurāḥa yūyaṃ bhaṅgāśvanāpatyās tāpasasyetare sutāḥc kaśyapasya surāś caiva asurāś ca sutās tathāe yuṣmākaṃ paitṛkaṃ rājyaṃ bhujyate tāpasātmajaiḥa indreṇa bheditās te tu yuddhe nyonyam apātayanc tac chrutvā tāpasī cāpi saṃtaptā praruroda haa brāhmaṇacchadmanābhyetya tām indro thānvapṛcchatac kena duḥkhena saṃtaptā rodiṣi tvaṃ varānanea brāhmaṇaṃ tu tato dṛṣṭvā sā strī karuṇam abravītc putrāṇāṃ dve śate brahman kālena vinipātitea ahaṃ rājābhavaṃ vipra tatra putraśataṃ mayāc samutpannaṃ surūpāṇāṃ vikrāntānāṃ dvijottamaa kadā cin mṛgayāṃ yāta udbhrānto gahane vanec avagāḍhaś ca sarasi strībhūto brāhmaṇottamae putrān rājye pratiṣṭhāpya vanam asmi tato gataḥa striyāś ca me putraśataṃ tāpasena mahātmanāc āśrame janitaṃ brahman nītās te nagaraṃ mayāa teṣāṃ ca vairam utpannaṃ kālayogena vai dvijac etac chocāmi viprendra daivenābhipariplutāa indras tāṃ duḥkhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā abravīt paruṣaṃ vacaḥc purā suduḥsahaṃ bhadre mama duḥkhaṃ tvayā kṛtama indradviṣṭena yajatā mām anādṛtya durmatec indro ham asmi durbuddhe vairaṃ te yātitaṃ mayāa indraṃ tu dṛṣṭvā rājarṣiḥ pādayoḥ śirasā gataḥc prasīda tridaśaśreṣṭha putrakāmena sa kratuḥe iṣṭas tridaśaśārdūla tatra me kṣantum arhasif indraḥ surapatiś caiva vajrahasto mahābalaḥf airāvatagajārūḍhaḥ sahasrākṣa namo stu tea praṇipātena tasyendraḥ parituṣṭo varaṃ dadauc putrā vai katame rājañ jīvantu tava śaṃsa mee strībhūtasya hi ye jātāḥ puruṣasyātha ye bhavana tāpasī tu tataḥ śakram uvāca prayatāñjaliḥc strībhūtasya hi ye jātās te me jīvantu vāsavaa indras tu vismito hṛṣṭaḥ striyaṃ papraccha tāṃ punaḥc puruṣotpāditā ye te kathaṃ dveṣyāḥ sutās tavaa strībhūtasya hi ye jātāḥ snehas tebhyo dhikaḥ kathamc kāraṇaṃ śrotum icchāmi tan me vaktum ihārhasi stry uvācaa striyās tv abhyadhikaḥ sneho na tathā puruṣasya vaic tasmāt te śakra jīvantu ye jātāḥ strīkṛtasya vai bhīṣma uvācaa evam ukte tatas tv indraḥ prīto vākyam uvāca hac sarva eveha jīvantu putrās te satyavādinia varaṃ ca vṛṇu rājendra yaṃ tvam icchasi suvratac puruṣatvam atha strītvaṃ matto yad abhikāṅkṣasi stry uvācaa strītvam eva vṛṇe śakra prasanne tvayi vāsavaa evam uktas tu devendras tāṃ striyaṃ pratyuvāca hac puruṣatvaṃ kathaṃ tyaktvā strītvaṃ rocayase vibhoa evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca strībhūto rājasattamaḥc striyāḥ puruṣasaṃyoge tiryak tu navamaḥ smṛtaḥd etāni nava sargāṇi tattvāni ca mahāmuned caturviṃśati tattvāni tattvasaṃkhyāni te naghad sarvasya prabhavaḥ pūrvam ukto nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥd avyayaḥ prabhavaś caiva avyaktasya prāgudīcīṃ diśaṃ devaḥ pratasthe puruṣottamaḥdA diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva bhāsayan svena tejasādA tam ahaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ vrajantam amitaujasamdA anuvavrāja vegena śanair gacchantam avyayamdA yojanānāṃ so haṃ prapannaḥ śaraṇaṃ devadevaṃ sanātanamdA prāñjalir manasā bhūtvā vākyam etat tadoktavāndA bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa bhavadbhūtakṛd avyayadA śaraṇaṃ saṃprapannaṃ māṃ trātum arhasy ariṃdamadA ahaṃ tu tattvajijñāsuḥ ko si kasyāsi kutra vādA saṃprāptaḥ padavīṃ deva sa māṃ saṃtrātum arhasidA āvirbhūtaḥ purāṇātmā mām ehīti sanātanaḥdA tato parāntato devo viśvasya gatir ātmavāndA mohayām āsa māṃ tatra durvibhāvyavapur vibhuḥdA svabhāvam ātmanas tatra darśayan svayam ātmanādA śramaṃ me janayām āsa bhayaṃ cābhayadaḥ prabhuḥdA khinna ity eva māṃ matvā bhagavān avyayo cyutaḥdA śabdenāśvāsayām āsa jagāhe ca tamo mahatdA ahaṃ tu khedānugataḥ śramāc calapadaś carandA manasā devadeveśaṃ dhyātuṃ samupacakramedA tathā gataṃ tu māṃ jñātvā bhagavān amitadyutiḥdA tamaḥ praṇāśayām āsa mamānugrahakāṅkṣayādA tataḥ pranaṣṭe tamasi tam ahaṃ dīptatejasamdA apaśyaṃ tejasā vyāptaṃ madhyāhna iva bhāskaramdA svayaṃprabhāṃś ca puruṣān striyaś ca paramādbhutāḥdA apaśyam aham avyagraṃ tasmin deśe sahasraśaḥdA na tatra dyotate sūryo nakṣatrāṇi tathaiva cadA na tatra candramā bhāti na vāyur vāti pāṃsulaḥdA tatra tūryāṇy anekāni gītāni madhurāṇi cadA adṛśyāni manojñāni śrūyante sarvatodiśamdA sravanti vaiḍūryalatāḥ padmotpalajhaṣākulāḥdA muktāsikatavaprāś ca sarito nirmalodakāḥdA agatis tatra devānām asurāṇāṃ tathaiva cadA gandharvanāgayakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ tathaiva cadA vākyaviśāradaḥdA śabdānusārī tu tatas taṃ deśam aham āvrajamdA tatrāpaśyaṃ tataś cāhaṃ śrīmaddhaṃsayutaṃ saraḥdA sa tat saraḥ samāsādya bhagavān ātmavittamaḥdA bhośabdapratisṛṣṭena bhāsvatāmdA agnīnām apraṇītānām iddhānām indhanair vinādA dīptānām ājyasiktānāṃ sthāneṣv arciṣmatāṃ sadādA dīptis teṣām anājyānāṃ prāptājyānām ivābhavatdA aniddhānām iva satām iddhānām iva bhāsvatāmdA athāhaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ nāpaśyaṃ tatra saṃgatamdA tataḥ saṃmoham āpanno viṣādam agamaṃ paramdA apaśyaṃ cāgnihotrāṇi śataśo tha sahasraśaḥdA vidhinā saṃpraṇītāni dhiṣṇyeṣv ājyavatāṃ tadādA asaṃmṛṣṭatalāś damena cae toṣayitvā śubhān kāmān prāpnuvaṃs te janārdanaa tejasāṃ tapasāṃ caiva nidhiḥ sa bhagavān ihac śubhāśubhānvitān bhāvān visṛjan saṃkṣipann apie āste devyā sahācintyo yaṃ prārthayasi śatruhana hiraṇyakaśipur yo bhūd dānavo merukampanaḥc tena sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ śarvāt prāptaṃ samārbudama tasyaiva putrapravaro mandaro nāma viśrutaḥc mahādevavarāc chakraṃ varṣārbudam ayodhayata viṣṇoś cakraṃ ca tad ghoraṃ vajram ākhaṇḍalasya cac śīrṇaṃ purābhavat tāta grahasyāṅgeṣu keśavad yat tad bhagavatā pūrvaṃ dattaṃ cakraṃ tavānaghad jalāntaracaraṃ hatvā daityaṃ ca balagarvitamd utpāditaṃ vṛṣāṅkena dīptajvalanasaṃnibhamd dattaṃ bhagavatā tubhyaṃ durdarśaṃ tejasādbhutamd na śakyaṃ draṣṭum anyena varjayitvā pinākinamd sudarśanaṃ bhavety evaṃ bhavenoktaṃ tadā tu tatd sudarśanaṃ tadā tasya loke nāma pratiṣṭhitamd taj jīrṇam abhavat tāta grahasyāṅgeṣu keśavad grahasyātibalasyāṅge varadattasya dhīmataḥd na śastrāṇi vahanty aṅge cakravajraśatāny apid sadṛśaṃ bhavatety uktaṃ darśanena tathāstu tata ardyamānāś ca vibudhā graheṇa subalīyasāc śivadattavarāñ jaghnur asurendrān surā bhṛśama tuṣṭo vidyutprabhasyāpi trilokeśvaratām adātc śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ sarvalokeśvaro bhavate mamaivānucaro nityaṃ bhavitāsīti cābravīta tathā putrasahasrāṇām ayutaṃ ca dadau prabhuḥc kuśadvīpaṃ ca sa dadau rājyena bhagavān ajaḥa tathā śatamukho nāma dhātrā sṛṣṭo mahāsuraḥc yena varṣaśataṃ sāgram ātmamāṃsair huto nalaḥe taṃ prāha bhagavāṃs tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ karomīti śaṃkaraḥa taṃ vai śatamukhaḥ prāha yogo bhavatu me dbhutaḥc balaṃ ca daivataśreṣṭha śāśvataṃ saṃprayaccha med tatheti bhagavān āha tasya tad vacanaṃ vibhuḥa svāyaṃbhuvaḥ kratuś cāpi putrārtham abhavat purāc āviśya yogenātmānaṃ trīṇi varṣaśatāny apia tasya devo dadat putrān sahasraṃ kratusaṃmitānc yogeśvaraṃ devagītaṃ vettha kṛṣṇa na saṃśayaḥd yājñavalkya iti khyāta ṛṣiḥ paramadhārmikaḥd ārādhya sa mahādevaṃ prāptavāñ jñānam uttamamd vedavyāsaś ca yogātmā parāśarasuto muniḥd so pi śaṃkaram ārādhya prāptavān atulaṃ yaśaḥa vālakhilyā maghavatā avajñātāḥ purā kilac taiḥ kruddhair bhagavān rudras tapasā toṣito hy abhūta tāṃś cāpi daivataśreṣṭhaḥ prāha prīto jagatpatiḥc suparṇaṃ somahartāraṃ tapasotpādayiṣyathad atrer bhāryā sutaṃ dattaṃ somaṃ durvāsasaṃ prabhoḥa mahādevasya roṣāc ca āpo naṣṭāḥ purābhavanc tāś ca saptakapālena devair anyāḥ pravartitāḥd tataḥ pānīyam abhavat prasanne tryambake bhuvia atrer bhāryāpi bhartāraṃ saṃtyajya brahmavādinīc nāhaṃ tasya muner bhūyo vaśagā syāṃ kathaṃ canae ity uktvā sā mahādevam agacchac charaṇaṃ kilaa nirāhārā bhayād atres trīṇi varṣaśatāny apic aśeta musaleṣv eva prasādārthaṃ bhavasya sāa tām abravīd dhasan devo bhavitā vai sutas tavab vinā bhartrā carudreṇa bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥb vikarṇaś ca mahādevaṃ tathā bhaktasukhāvahamb prasādya bhagavān siddhiṃ prāptavān madhusūdanac vaṃśe tavaiva nāmnā tu khyātiṃ yāsyati cepsitāma śākalyaḥ saṃśitātmā vai nava varṣaśatāny apic ārādhayām āsa bhavaṃ manoyajñena keśavaa taṃ cāha bhagavāṃs tuṣṭo granthakāro bhaviṣyasic vatsākṣayā ca te kīrtis trailokye vai bhaviṣyatie akṣayaṃ ca kulaṃ te stu maharṣibhir alaṃkṛtamf bhaviṣyati dvijaśreṣṭha sūtrakartā sutas tavaa sāvarṇiś cāpi vikhyāta ṛṣir āsīt kṛte yugec iha tena tapas taptaṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣaśatāny athaa tam āha bhagavān rudraḥ sākṣāt tuṣṭo smi te naghac granthakṛl lokavikhyāto bhavitāsy ajarāmaraḥd śakreṇa tu purā devo vārāṇasyāṃ janārdanad ārādhito bhūd bhaktena digvāsā bhasmaguṇṭhanaḥd ārādhya sa mahādevaṃ devarājyam avāptavānd nāradena tu bhaktyāsau bhava ārādhitaḥ purād tasya prīto mahādevo jagau devagurur guruḥd tejasā tapasā kīrtyā tvatsamo na bhaviṣyatid gītenaiva ca divyena nityaṃ mām anuyāsyasid śākalyo granthakartā ca sāvarṇiś ca tathābhavatd bāṇaḥ skandasamatvaṃ ca kāmo darpavimokṣaṇamd lavaṇo vadhyatām anyair daśāsyaś ca punar balamd antako ntam anuprāptas tasmāt ko nyo paraḥ prabhuḥa mayāpi ca yathā dṛṣṭo devadevaḥ purā vibhuḥc sākṣāt paśupatis tāta tac cāpi śṛṇu mādhavaa yadarthaṃ ca mahādevaḥ prayatena mayā purāc ārādhito mahātejās tac cāpi śṛṇu vistaramc mahādevo mayā prabhuḥc yatnena mahatā cāpia yad avāptaṃ ca me pūrvaṃ devadevān maheśvarātc tat sarvam akhilenādya kathayiṣyāmi te naghaa purā kṛtayuge tāta ṛṣir āsīn mahāyaśāḥc vyāghrapāda iti khyāto vedavedāṅgapāragaḥe tasyāham abhavaṃ putro dhaumyaś cāpi mamānujaḥa kasya cit tv atha kālasya dhaumyena saha mādhavac āgaccham āśramaṃ krīḍan munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanāma tatrāpi ca mayā dṛṣṭā duhyamānā payasvinīc lakṣitaṃ ca mayā kṣīraṃ svāduto hy amṛtopamamd tadāprabhṛti caivāham arudaṃ madhusūdanad dīyatāṃ dīyatāṃ kṣīraṃ mama mātar itīritama tataḥ piṣṭaṃ samāloḍya suranandinīb tasyāhaṃ tat payaḥ pītvā rasena hy amṛtopamamb jñātvā kṣīraguṇāṃś caiva upalabhya hi saṃbhavamc tataḥ piṣṭarasaṃ tāta na me prītim udāvahata tato ham abruvaṃ bālyāj jananīm ātmanas tadāc kṣīrodanasamāyuktaṃ bhojanaṃ ca prayaccha med nedaṃ kṣīraudanaṃ mātar yat tvaṃ me dattavaty asid abhāvāc caiva dugdhasya duḥkhitā jananī tadāa tato mām abravīn mātā duḥkhaśokasamanvitāc putrasnehāt pariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya mādhavaa kutaḥ kṣīrodanaṃ vatsa munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanāmc vane nivasatāṃ nityaṃ kandamūlaphalāśināmd āsthitānāṃ nadīṃ divyāṃ vālakhilyair niṣevitāmd kutaḥ kṣīraṃ vanasthānāṃ ākāśam āpūrya varaṃ tasmād vṛṇīmahed agnir āpo nilaḥ pṛthvī khaṃ buddhiś ca mano mahānd sraṣṭā caiṣāṃ bhaved yo nyo brūhi kaḥ parameśvarātd mano matir ahaṃkāras tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi cad brūhi caiṣāṃ brūhi kaḥ parameśvarātd daityadānavamukhyānām ādhipatyārimardanātd ko nyaḥ śaknoti deveśād ṛte saṃpādituṃ sutānd dikkālasūryatejāṃsi grahavāyvindutārakāḥd viddhi tv ete mahādevād brūhi kaḥ parameśvarātd athotpattivināśe vā yajñasya tripurasya vād daityadānavamukhyānām ādhipatyārimardanaḥd kiṃ cātra bahubhiḥ sūktair hetuvādaiḥ puraṃdarad sahasranayanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvām eva surasattamad cāsuraiḥ surāḥd abhighāteṣu devānāṃ sayakṣoragarakṣasāmd parasparavināśeṣu svasthānaiśvaryado bhavaḥd andhakasyātha śumbhasya duṃdubher mahiṣasya cad yakṣendrabalarakṣaḥsu nivātakavaceṣu cad sthitā kāntā anaṅgaḥ kena nirjitaḥd brūhīndra paramaṃ sthānaṃ kasya devaiḥ praśasyated śmaśāne kasya krīḍārthaṃ nṛtye vā ko bhibhāṣyated kasyaiśvaryaṃ samānaṃ vā bhūtaiḥ ko vāpi krīḍated kasya tulyabalā devagaṇā aiśvaryadarpitāḥd ghuṣyate hy acalaṃ sthānaṃ kasya trailokyapūjitamd varṣate tapate ko nyo jvalate tejasā ca kaḥd kasmād oṣadhisaṃpattiḥ ko vā dhārayate vasud prakāmaṃ krīḍate ko vā mamākhyātaṃ kāraṇaṃ lokakāraṇamd nāsti ceśāt paraṃ śakra taṃ prapadya yadīcchasid pratyakṣaṃ nanu te sureśa viditaṃ saṃyogaliṅgodbhavaṃd trailokyaṃ savikāranirguṇagaṇaṃ brahmādiretodbhavamd yad brahmendramahendraviṣṇusahitā devāś ca daityāsurād nānyaṃ kāmasahasrakalpitadhiyaḥ śaṃsanti īśāt paramd taṃ devaṃ sacarācarasya jagato vyākhyātavedyottamaṃd kāmārthī varayāmi saṃyatamanā mokṣāya prasīdati me rudraḥ kim etad iti cintayane athāpaśyaṃ kṣaṇenaiva tam evairāvataṃ punaḥa haṃsakundendusadṛśaṃ mṛṇālakumudaprabhamc vṛṣarūpadharaṃ sākṣāt kṣīrodam iva sāgarama kṛṣṇapucchaṃ mahākāyaṃ vasiṣṭhas tvam ṛṣīṇāṃ ca grahāṇāṃ sūrya ucyasea āraṇyānāṃ paśūnāṃ ca siṃhas tvaṃ parameśvaraḥc grāmyāṇāṃ govṛṣaś cāsi bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥa ādityānāṃ bhavān viṣṇur vasūnāṃ caiva pāvakaḥc pakṣiṇāṃ dharmaṃ yaśaś cāgryam āyuś caivādadad bhavaḥa ṛṣir gṛtsamado nāma śakrasya dayitaḥ sakhāc prāhājamīḍhaṃ bhagavān bṛhaspatisamadyutiḥa vasiṣṭho nāma bhagavāṃś cākṣuṣasya manoḥ sutaḥc śatakrator akārṣīs tvaṃ sudurmatea evam uktvā mahākrodhāt prāha ruṣṭaḥ punar vacaḥc prajñayā rahito duḥkhī nityaṃ bhīto vanecaraḥe daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśāṣṭau ca śatāni caa naṣṭapānīyayavase mṛgair anyaiś ca varjitec ayajñīyadrume deśe rurusiṃhaniṣevitee bhavitā tvaṃ mṛgaḥ krūro mahāduḥkhasamanvitaḥa tasya vākyasya nidhane pārtha jāto hy ahaṃ mṛgaḥc tato māṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptaṃ prāha yogī maheśvaraḥa ajaraś cāmaraś caiva bhavitā duḥkhavarjitaḥc sāmyaṃ samas tu te saukhyaṃ yuvayor vardhatāṃ kratuḥa anugrahān evam eṣa karoti bhagavān vibhuḥc paraṃ dhātā vidhātā ca sukhaduḥkhe ca sarvadāa acintya eṣa bhagavān karmaṇā manasā girāc na me tāta yudhiśreṣṭha vidyayā paṇḍitaḥ samaḥd vāsudevas tadovāca punar matimatāṃ varaḥd suvarṇākṣo mahādevas tapasā toṣito mayād tato tha bhagavān āha prīto māṃ vai yudhiṣṭhirad annāt priyataraḥ kṛṣṇa matprasādād bhaviṣyasid aparājitaś ca yuddheṣu tejaś caivānalopamamd evaṃ sahasraśaś cātmā mahādevo varaṃ dadaud maṇimanthe tha śaile vai purā saṃrādhito mayād varṣāyutasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraśatam eva cad tato māṃ bhagavān prīta idaṃ vacanam abravītd varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yas te manasi vartated tataḥ praṇamya śirasā idaṃ vacanam abruvamd yadi prīto mahādevo bhaktyā paramayā prabhuḥd nityakālaṃ taveśāna bhaktir bhavatu me sthirād evam astv iti bhagavāṃs tatroktvāntaradhīyatad jaigīṣavyas tathā prāha jagaddhātā maheśvaraḥ jaigīṣavya uvācaa mamāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ dattaṃ bhagavatā purāc yatnenālpena balinā vārāṇasyāṃ yudhiṣṭhirad parāśaraś cāha muniḥ purā mama ca toṣitaḥ gārgya uvācaa catuḥṣaṣṭyaṅgam adadāt kālajñānaṃ mamādbhutamc sarasvatyās taṭe tuṣṭo manoyajñena pāṇḍavaa tulyaṃ mama sahasraṃ tu sutānāṃ brahmavādināmc āyuś caiva saputrasya saṃvatsaraśatāyutam parāśara uvācaa prasādyāhaṃ purā śarvaṃ manasācintayaṃ nṛpac mahātapā mahātejā mahāyogī mahāyaśāḥe vedavyāsaḥ śriyāvāso brahmaṇyaḥ karuṇātmakaḥa api nāmepsitaḥ putro mama syād vai maheśvarātb tad abhijñāya mām āha śaṃkaras tripurārdanaḥb pitṛkanyā vasoḥ putrī śāpād dāśagṛhoditāb tasyāṃ viṣṇukṛtā nāma vidyayā śodhakaḥ satāmc iti matvā hṛdi mataṃ prāha māṃ surasattamaḥa mayi saṃbhavatas tasya phalāt kṛṣṇo bhaviṣyatic sāvarṇasya manoḥ sarge saptarṣiś ca bhaviṣyatia vedānāṃ ca sa vai vyastā kuruvaṃśakaras tathāc itihāsasya kartā ca putras te jagato hitaḥa bhaviṣyati mahendrasya dayitaḥ sa mahāmuniḥc ajaraś cāmaraś caiva parāśara sutas tavaa evam uktvā sa bhagavāṃs tatraivāntaradhīyatac yudhiṣṭhira mahāyogī vīryavān akṣayo vyayaḥd māṇḍavyaś cāha deveśa bhakto lokahite bhave māṇḍavya uvācaa acauraś cauraśaṅkāyāṃ śūle bhinno hy ahaṃ yadāc tatrasthena stuto devaḥ prāha māṃ vai maheśvaraḥa mokṣaṃ prāpsyasi śūlāc ca jīviṣyasi samārbudamc rujā śūlakṛtā caiva na te vipra bhaviṣyatie ādhibhir vyādhibhiś caiva varjitas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasif amarṣaṃ saphalaṃ kartuṃ śakto nirvighnadharmabhāka pādāc caturthāt saṃbhūta ātmā yasmān mune tavac tvaṃ bhaviṣyasy anupamo janma vai saphalaṃ kurua tīrthābhiṣekaṃ saphalaṃ tvam avighnena cāpsyasic svargaṃ caivākṣayaṃ vipra vidadhāmi tavorjitama evam uktvā tu bhagavān vareṇyo vṛṣavāhanaḥc maheśvaro mahārāja kṛttivāsā mahādyutiḥe sagaṇo daivataśreṣṭhas tatraivāntaradhīyata gālava uvācaa viśvāmitrābhyanujñāto hy ahaṃ pitaram āgataḥc abravīn māṃ tato mātā duḥkhitā rudatī bhṛśama kauśikenābhyanujñātaṃ putraṃ vedavibhūṣitamc na tāta taruṇaṃ dāntaṃ pitā tvāṃ paśyate naghaa śrutvā jananyā vacanaṃ nirāśo gurudarśanec niyatātmā mahādevam apaśyaṃ so bravīc ca māma pitā mātā ca te tvaṃ ca putra mṛtyuvivarjitāḥc bhaviṣyatha viśa kṣipraṃ draṣṭāsi pitaraṃ kṣayea anujñāto bhagavatā gṛhaṃ gatvā yudhiṣṭhirac apaśyaṃ pitaraṃ tāta iṣṭiṃ kṛtvā viniḥsṛtama upaspṛśya gṛhītvedhmaṃ kuśāṃś ca śaraṇād gurūnc tān visṛjya ca māṃ prāha pitā sāsrāvilekṣaṇaḥa praṇamantaṃ pariṣvajya mūrdhni cāghrāya pāṇḍavac diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo si me putra kṛtavidya ihāgataḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa etāny atyadbhutāny eva karmāṇy atha mahātmanaḥc proktāni munibhiḥ śrutvā vismayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥa tataḥ kṛṣṇo bravīd vākyaṃ punar matimatāṃ varaḥc yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dharmanityaṃ puruhūtam iveśvaraḥd vāsudeva uvācad upamanyur mayi prāha tapann iva divākaraḥd aśubhaiḥ pāpakarmāṇo ye narāḥ kaluṣīkṛtāḥd īśānaṃ na prapadyante tamorājasavṛttayaḥd īśvaraṃ saṃprapadyante dvijā bhāvitabhāvanāḥd sarvathā vartamāno pi yo bhaktaḥ parameśvared sadṛśo raṇyavāsīnāṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanāmd brahmatvaṃ keśavatvaṃ vā śakratvaṃ vā suraiḥ sahad trailokyasyādhipatyaṃ vā tuṣṭo rudraḥ prayacchatid manasāpi śivaṃ tāta ye prapadyanti mānavāḥd vidhūya sarvapāpāni devaiḥ saha vasanti ted bhittvā chittvā ca kūlāni hatvā sarvam idaṃ jagatd yajed devaṃ virūpākṣaṃ na sa pāpena lipyated sarvalakṣaṇahīno pi yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥd sarvaṃ tudati tat pāpaṃ bhāvayañ chivam ātmanād kīṭapakṣipataṃgānāṃ tiraścām api keśavad mahādevaprapannānāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kva citd evam eva mahādevaṃ bhaktā ye mānavā bhuvid na te saṃsāravaśagā iti me niścitā matiḥd tataḥ kṛṣṇo bravīd vākyaṃ dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhirama ādityacandrāv anilānalau cadyaur bhūmir āpo vasavo tha viśvec dhātāryamā śukrabṛhaspatī carudrāḥ sasādhyā varuṇo vittagopaḥa brahmā śakro māruto brahma satyaṃvedā yajñā dakṣiṇā vedavāhāḥc somo yaṣṭā yac ca havyaṃ haviś carakṣā dīkṣā niyamā ye ca ke cita svāhā vaṣaḍ brāhmaṇāḥ saurabheyādharmaṃ cakraṃ kālacakraṃ caraṃ cac yaśo damo buddhimatī sthitiś caśubhāśubhaṃ munayaś caiva saptaa agryā buddhir manasā darśane casparśe siddhiḥ karmaṇāṃ yā ca siddhiḥc gaṇā devānām ūṣmapāḥ somapāś calekhāḥ suyāmās tuṣitā brahmakāyāḥa ābhāsvarā gandhapā dṛṣṭipāś cavācā viruddhāś ca manoviruddhāḥc śuddhāś ca nirvāṇaratāś ca devāḥsparśāśanā darśapā ājyapāś caa cintāgatā ye ca deveṣu mukhyāye cāpy anye devatāś cājamīḍhac suparṇagandharvapiśācadānavāyakṣās tathā pannagāś cāraṇāś caa sūkṣmaṃ sthūlaṃ mṛdu yac cāpy asūkṣmaṃsukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhaduḥkhāntaraṃ cac sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ yat parāṇāṃ paraṃ caśarvāj jātaṃ viddhi yat kīrtitaṃ mea tatsaṃbhūtā bhūtakṛto vareṇyāḥsarve devā bhuvanasyāsya gopāḥc āviśyemāṃ dharaṇīṃ ye bhyarakṣanpurātanīṃ tasya devasya sṛṣṭima vicinvantaṃ manasā toṣṭuvīmikiṃ cit tattvaṃ prāṇahetor nato smic dadātu devaḥ sa varān iheṣṭānabhiṣṭuto naḥ prabhur avyayaḥ sadāa imaṃ stavaṃ saṃniyamyendriyāṇiśucir bhūtvā yaḥ puruṣaḥ paṭhetac abhagnayogo niyato bdam ekaṃsa prāpnuyād aśvamedhe phalaṃ yata vedān kṛtsnān brāhmaṇaḥ prāpnuyāc cajayed rājā pṛthivīṃ cāpi kṛtsnāmc vaiśyo lābhaṃ prāpnuyān naipuṇaṃ caśūdro gatiṃ pretya tathā sukhaṃ caa stavarājam imaṃ kṛtvā rudrāya dadhire manaḥc sarvadoṣāpahaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca yaśasvinama yāvanty asya śarīreṣu romakūpāṇi bhāratac tāvad varṣasahasrāṇi svarge vasati mānavaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yad idaṃ sahadharmeti procyate bharatarṣabhac pāṇigrahaṇakāle tu strīṇām etat kathaṃ smṛtama ārṣa eṣa bhaved dharmaḥ prājāpatyo tha vāsuraḥc yad etat sahadharmeti pūrvam uktaṃ maharṣibhiḥa saṃdehaḥ sumahān eṣa viruddha iti me matiḥc iha yaḥ sahadharmo vai pretyāyaṃ vihitaḥ kva nua svarge mṛtānāṃ bhavati sahadharmaḥ pitāmahac pūrvam ekas tu mriyate kva caikas tiṣṭhate vadaa nānākarmaphalopetā nānākarmanivāsinaḥc nānānirayaniṣṭhāntā mānuṣā bahavo yadāa anṛtāḥ striya ity evaṃ sūtrakāro vyavasyatic yadānṛtāḥ striyas tāta sahadharmaḥ kutaḥ smṛtaḥa anṛtāḥ striya ity evaṃ vedeṣv api hi paṭhyatec dharmo yaṃ paurvikī saṃjñā upacāraḥ kriyāvidhiḥa gahvaraṃ pratibhāty etan mama cintayato niśamc niḥsaṃdeham idaṃ sarvaṃ pitāmaha yathā śrutiḥa yad etad yādṛśaṃ caitad yathā caitat pravartitamc nikhilena mahāprājña bhavān etad bravītu me bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc aṣṭāvakrasya saṃvādaṃ diśayā saha bhārataa niveṣṭukāmas tu purā aṣṭāvakro mahātapāḥc ṛṣer atha vadānyasya kanyāṃ vavre mahātmanaḥa suprabhāṃ nāma vai nāmnā rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvic guṇaprabarhāṃ śīlena sādhvīṃ cāritraśobhanāma sā tasya dṛṣṭvaiva mano jahāra śubhalocanāc vanarājī yathā citrā vasante kusumācitāa ṛṣis tam āha deyā me sutā tubhyaṃ śṛṇuṣva meb ananyastrījanaḥ prājño hy apravāsī priyaṃvadaḥb surūpaḥ saṃmato vīraḥ śīlavān bhogabhuk śuciḥb dārānumatayajñaś ca sunakṣatrām athodvahetb sabhṛtyaḥ svajanopeta iha pretya ca modatec gaccha tāvad diśaṃ puṇyām uttarāṃ drakṣyase tataḥ aṣṭāvakra uvācaa kiṃ draṣṭavyaṃ mayā tatra vaktum arhati me bhavānc tathedānīṃ mayā kāryaṃ yathā vakṣyati māṃ bhavān vadānya uvācaa dhanadaṃ samatikramya himavantaṃ tathaiva cac rudrasyāyatanaṃ dṛṣṭvā siddhacāraṇasevitama prahṛṣṭaiḥ pārṣadair juṣṭaṃ nṛtyadbhir vividhānanaiḥc divyāṅgarāgaiḥ paiśācair vanyair nānāvidhais tathāa pāṇitālasatālaiś ca śamyātālaiḥ samais tathāc saṃprahṛṣṭaiḥ pranṛtyadbhiḥ śarvas tatra niṣevyatea iṣṭaṃ kila girau sthānaṃ tad divyam anuśuśrumac nityaṃ saṃnihito devas tathā pāriṣadāḥ śubhāḥa tatra devyā tapas taptaṃ śaṃkarārthaṃ suduścaramc atas tad iṣṭaṃ devasya tathomāyā iti śrutiḥa tatra kūpo mahān pārśve devasyottaratas tathāc ṛtavaḥ kālarātriś ca ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥa sarve devam upāsante rūpiṇaḥ kila tatra hac tad atikramya bhavanaṃ tvayā yātavyam eva hia tato nīlaṃ vanoddeśaṃ drakṣyase meghasaṃnibhamc ramaṇīyaṃ manogrāhi tatra drakṣyasi vai striyama tapasvinīṃ mahābhāgāṃ vṛddhāṃ dīkṣām anuṣṭhitāmc draṣṭavyā sā tvayā tatra saṃpūjyā caiva yatnataḥa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vinivṛttas tvaṃ tataḥ pāṇiṃ grahīṣyasic yady eṣa samayaḥ satyaḥ sādhyatāṃ tatra gamyatām aṣṭāvakra uvācaa tathāstu sādhayiṣyāmi tatra yāsyāmy asaṃśayamc yatra tvaṃ vadase sādho bhavān bhavatu satyavāk bhīṣma uvācaa tato gacchat sa bhagavān uttarām uttamāṃ diśamc himavantaṃ giriśreṣṭhaṃ siddhacāraṇasevitama sa gatvā dvijaśārdūlo himavantaṃ mahāgirimc abhyagacchan nadīṃ puṇyāṃ bāhudāṃ dharmadāyinīma aśoke vimale tīrthe snātvā tarpya ca devatāḥc tatra vāsāya śayane kauśye sukham uvāsa haa tato rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ prātar utthāya sa dvijaḥc snātvā prāduścakārāgniṃ hutvā caiva vidhānataḥa rudrāṇīkūpam āsādya hrade tatra samāśvasatc viśrāntaś ca samutthāya kailāsam abhito yayaua so paśyat kāñcanadvāraṃ dīpyamānam iva śriyāc mandākinīṃ ca nalinīṃ dhanadasya mahātmanaḥa atha te rākṣasāḥ sarve ye bhirakṣanti padminīmc pratyutthitā bhagavantaṃ maṇibhadrapurogamāḥa sa tān pratyarcayām āsa rākṣasān bhīmavikramānc nivedayata māṃ kṣipraṃ dhanadāyeti cābravīta te rākṣasās tadā rājan bhagavantam athābruvanc asau vaiśravaṇo rājā svayam āyāti te ntikama vidito bhagavān asya kāryam āgamane ca yatc paśyainaṃ tvaṃ mahābhāgaṃ jvalantam iva tejasāa tato vaiśravaṇo bhyetya aṣṭāvakram aninditamc vidhivat kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā tato brahmarṣim abravīta sukhaṃ prāpto bhavān kaccit kiṃ vā mattaś cikīrṣasic brūhi sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ vakṣyasi dvijaa bhavanaṃ praviśa tvaṃ me yathākāmaṃ dvijottamac satkṛtaḥ kṛtakāryaś ca bhavān yāsyaty avighnataḥa prāviśad bhavanaṃ svaṃ vai gṛhītvā taṃ dvijottamamc āsanaṃ svaṃ dadau caiva pādyam arghyaṃ tathaiva caa athopaviṣṭayos tatra maṇibhadrapurogamāḥc niṣedus tatra kauberā yakṣagandharvarākṣasāḥa tatas teṣāṃ niṣaṇṇānāṃ dhanado vākyam abravītc bhavacchandaṃ samājñāya nṛtyerann apsarogaṇāḥa ātithyaṃ paramaṃ kāryaṃ śuśrūṣā bhavatas tathāc saṃvartatām ity uvāca munir madhurayā girāa athorvarā miśrakeśī rambhā caivorvaśī tathāc alambusā ghṛtācī ca citrā citrāṅgadā ruciḥa manoharā sukeśī ca sumukhī hāsinī prabhāc vidyutā praśamā dāntā vidyotā ratir eva caa etāś cānyāś ca vai bahvyaḥ pranṛttāpsarasaḥ śubhāḥc avādayaṃś ca gandharvā vādyāni vividhāni caa atha pravṛtte gāndharve divye ṛṣir upāvasatc divyaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tatra raman vai sumahātapāḥa tato vaiśravaṇo rājā bhagavantam uvāca hac sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro yātas tava vipreha paśyataḥa hāryo yaṃ viṣayo brahman gāndharvo nāma nāmataḥc chandato vartatāṃ vipra yathā vadati vā bhavāna atithiḥ pūjanīyas tvam idaṃ ca bhavato gṛhamc sarvam ājñāpyatām āśu paravanto vayaṃ tvayia atha vaiśravaṇaṃ prīto bhagavān pratyabhāṣatac arcito smi yathānyāyaṃ gamiṣyāmi dhaneśvaraa prīto smi sadṛśaṃ caiva tava sarvaṃ dhanādhipac tava prasādād bhagavan maharṣeś ca mahātmanaḥe niyogād adya yāsyāmi vṛddhimān ṛddhimān bhavaa atha niṣkramya bhagavān prayayāv uttarāmukhaḥb kailāse śaṃkarāvāsam abhivīkṣya praṇamya cab gaurīśaṃ śaṃkaraṃ dāntaṃ śaraṇāgatavatsalamb gaṅgādharaṃ gopatigaṃ gaṇāvṛtam akalmaṣamc kailāsaṃ mandaraṃ haimaṃ sarvān anucacāra haa tān atītya mahāśailān kairātaṃ sthānam uttamamc pradakṣiṇaṃ tataś cakre prayataḥ śirasā namane dharaṇīm avatīryātha pūtātmāsau tadābhavata sa taṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā triḥ śailaṃ cottarāmukhaḥc samena bhūmibhāgena yayau prītipuraskṛtaḥa tato paraṃ vanoddeśaṃ ramaṇīyam apaśyatac sarvartubhir mūlaphalaiḥ pakṣibhiś ca samanvitame ramaṇīyair vanoddeśais tatra tatra vibhūṣitama tatrāśramapadaṃ divyaṃ dadarśa bhagavān athac śailāṃś ca vividhākārān kāñcanān ratnabhūṣitāne maṇibhūmau niviṣṭāś ca puṣkariṇyas tathaiva caa anyāny api suramyāṇi dadarśa subahūny athac bhṛśaṃ tasya mano reme maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥa sa tatra kāñcanaṃ divyaṃ sarvaratnamayaṃ gṛhamc dadarśādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ dhanadasya gṛhād varama mahānto yatra vividhāḥ prāsādāḥ parvatopamāḥc vimānāni ca ramyāṇi ratnāni vividhāni caa mandārapuṣpaiḥ saṃkīrṇā tathā mandākinī nadīc svayaṃprabhāś ca maṇayo vajrair bhūmiś ca bhūṣitāa nānāvidhaiś ca bhavanair vicitramaṇitoraṇaiḥc muktājālaparikṣiptair maṇiratnavibhūṣitaiḥe manodṛṣṭiharai ramyaiḥ sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaṃ śubhaiḥa ṛṣiḥ samantato paśyat tatra tatra manoramamc tato bhavat tasya cintā kva me vāso anujñātaḥ prasthito gandhamādanamc tasya cottarato deśe dṛṣṭaṃ tad daivataṃ mahata tayā cāham anujñāto bhavāṃś cāpi prakīrtitaḥc śrāvitaś cāpi tad vākyaṃ gṛham abhyāgataḥ prabhoa tam uvāca tato vipraḥ pratigṛhṇīṣva me sutāmc nakṣatratithisaṃyoge pātraṃ hi paramaṃ bhavān bhīṣma uvācaa aṣṭāvakras tathety uktvā pratigṛhya ca tāṃ prabhoc kanyāṃ paramadharmātmā prītimāṃś cābhavat tadāa kanyāṃ tāṃ pratigṛhyaiva bhāryāṃ paramaśobhanāmc uvāsa muditas tatra āśrame sve gatajvaraḥd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd vaiśyayonyāṃ samutpannāḥ śūdrayonyāṃ tathaiva cad brahmarṣaya iti proktāḥ purāṇā dvijasattamāḥd katham etan mahārāja tattvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasid bhīṣmaḥd viruddham iha paśyāmi viyonau brāhmaṇo bhavetd alaṃ kautūhalenātra nibodha tvaṃ yudhiṣṭhirad śubhetaraṃ śubhaṃ vāpi na cintayitum arhasid īśanty ātmana tapojñānasamanvitaiḥd pravartitāni kāryāṇi pramāṇāny eva sattamad bhāryāś catasro rājendra brāhmaṇasya svadharmataḥd brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabhad rājñāṃ tu kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabhad vaiśyasya vaiśyā vihitā śūdrā ca bharatarṣabhad śūdrasyaikā smṛtā bhāryā pratilome tu saṃkaraḥd śūdrāyās tu naraśreṣṭha catvāraḥ patayaḥ smṛtāḥd varṇottamāyās tu patiḥ savarṇas tv eka eva saḥd dvau kṣatriyāyā vihitau brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyas tathād vaiśyāyās tu naraśreṣṭha vihitāḥ patayas trayaḥd savarṇaḥ kṣatriyaś caiva brāhmaṇaś ca viśāṃ pated evaṃ vidhim anusmṛtya tatas te ṛṣibhiḥ purād utpāditā mahātmānaḥ putrā brahmarṣayaḥ purād purāṇābhyām ṛṣibhyāṃ tu mitreṇa varuṇena cad vasiṣṭho tha tathāgastyo barhiṣadbhis tathaiva cad kakṣīvān ārṣṭiṣeṇaś ca puruṣaḥ kakṣa eva cad māmateyasya vai putrā gautamasyātmajāḥ smṛtāḥd vatsapriyaś ca bhagavān sthūlaraśmis tathākṣaṇiḥd gautamasyaiva tanayā ye dāsyāṃ janitā hy utad kapiṃjalādo brahmarṣiś caṇḍālyām udapadyatad vainateyas tathā pakṣī turyāyāṃ ca vasiṣṭhataḥd prasādāc ca vasiṣṭhasya śulkābhyupagamena cad adṛśyantyāḥ pitā vaiśyo nāmnā citramukhaḥ purād brāhmaṇatvam anuprāpto brahmarṣitvaṃ ca kauravad vaiśyaś citramukhaḥ kanyāṃ vasiṣṭhatanayasya vaid śubhāṃ prādād yato jāto brahmarṣis tu parāśaraḥd tathaiva dāśakanyāyāṃ satyavatyāṃ mahān ṛṣiḥd parāśarāt prasūtaś ca vyāso yogamayo muniḥd vibhaṇḍakasya mṛgyāṃ ca tapoyogātmako muniḥd ṛśyaśṛṅgaḥ samutpanno brahmacārī mahāyaśāḥd śāṅgaryāṃ ca mandapālasya catvāro brahmavādinaḥd jātā brahmarṣayaḥ puṇyā yaiḥ stuto havyavāhanaḥd droṇaś ca stambamitraś ca śārisṛkvaś ca buddhimānd jaritāriś ca vikhyātāś catvāraḥ sūryasaṃnibhāḥd maharṣeḥ kālavṛkṣasya śakuntyām eva jajñivānd hiraṇyahasto bhagavān maharṣiḥ kāñcanaprabhaḥd pāvakāt tāta saṃbhūtā manasā ca maharṣayaḥd pitāmahasya rājendra pulastyapulahādayaḥd savarṇaś cāpi rājarṣiḥ savarṇāyām ajāyatad mṛṇmayyāṃ bharataśreṣṭha ādityena vivasvatād śāṇḍilyaś cāgnito jātaḥ kāśyapasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥd śaradvataḥ śarastambāt kṛpaś ca kṛpayā sahad padmāc ca jajñe rājendra somapasya mahātmanaḥd reṇuś ca reṇukā caiva rāmamātā yaśasvinīd yamunāyāṃ samudbhūtaḥ somakena mahātmanād arkadatto mahān ṛṣiḥ prathitaḥ pṛthivītaled agner āhavanīyāc ca drupadasyendravarcasaḥd dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca saṃbhūto vedyāṃ kṛṣṇā ca bhāratad vyāghrayonyāṃ tato jātā vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥd ekonaviṃśatiḥ putrāḥ khyātā vyāghrapadādayaḥd mandhaś ca bādalomaś ca jābāliś ca mahān ṛṣiḥd manyuś caivopamanyuś ca setukarṇas tathaiva cad ete cānye ca vikhyātāḥ pṛthivyāṃ gotratāṃ gatāḥd viśvakāśasya rājarṣer aikṣvākos tu mahātmanaḥd bālāśvo nāma putro bhūc chikhāṃ bhittvā viniḥsṛtaḥd māndhātā caiva rājarṣir yuvanāśvena dhīmatād svayaṃ dhṛto tha garbheṇa divyāstrabalasaṃyutaḥd gaurikaś cāpi rājarṣiś cakravartī mahāyaśāḥd bāhudāyāṃ samutpanno nadyāṃ rājñā subāhunād bhūmeś ca putro narakaḥ saṃvartaś caiva puṣkalaḥd adbhiś caiva mahātejā ṛṣir gārgyo hy ajāyatad ete cānye ca bahavo rājanyā brāhmaṇās tathād nadīnāṃ ca sādhūnāṃ ca mahātmanāmd prabhavo nādhigantavyaḥ strīṇāṃ duścaritasya cad tan nātra cintā kartavyā maharṣīṇāṃ samudbhaved yathā sarvagato hy agnis tathā tejo mahātmasudA yudhiṣṭhiraḥdA
