bhārata yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa sarvaśāstravidhānajña rājadharmārthavittamac atīva saṃśayacchettā bhavān vai prathitaḥ kṣitaua kaś cit tu saṃśayo me sti tan me brūhi pitāmahac asyām āpadi kaṣṭāyām anyaṃ pṛcchāma kaṃ vayama yathā nareṇa kartavyaṃ yaś ca dharmaḥ sanātanaḥc etat sarvaṃ mahābāho bhavān vyākhyātum arhatia catasro vihitā bhāryā brāhmaṇasya pitāmahac brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā ca ratim icchataḥa tatra jāteṣu putreṣu sarvāsāṃ kurusattamac ānupūrvyeṇa kas teṣāṃ pitryaṃ dāyādyam arhatia kena vā kiṃ tato hāryaṃ pitṛvittāt pitāmahac etad icchāmi kathitaṃ vibhāgas teṣu yaḥ smṛtaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyas trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥc eteṣu vihito dharmo brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhiraa vaiṣamyād atha vā lobhāt kāmād vāpi paraṃtapac brāhmaṇasya bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtāa śūdrāṃ śayanam āropya brāhmaṇaḥ pīḍito bhavetc prāyaścittīyate cāpi vidhidṛṣṭena hetunāa tatra jāteṣv apatyeṣu dviguṇaṃ syād yudhiṣṭhirac atas te niyamaṃ vitte saṃpravakṣyāmi bhārataa lakṣaṇyo govṛṣo yānaṃ yat pradhānatamaṃ bhavetc brāhmaṇyās tad dharet putra ekāṃśaṃ vai pitur dhanāta śeṣaṃ tu daśadhā kāryaṃ brāhmaṇasvaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac tatra tenaiva hartavyāś catvāro ṃśāḥ pitur dhanāta kṣatriyāyās tu yaḥ putro brāhmaṇaḥ so py asaṃśayaḥc sa tu mātṛviśeṣeṇa trīn aṃśān hartum arhatia varṇe tṛtīye jātas tu vaiśyāyāṃ brāhmaṇād apic dviraṃśas tena hartavyo brāhmaṇasvād yudhiṣṭhiraa śūdrāyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto nityādeyadhanaḥ smṛtaḥc alpaṃ vāpi pradātavyaṃ śūdrāputrāya bhārataa daśadhā pravibhaktasya dhanasyaiṣa bhavet kramaḥc savarṇāsu tu jātānāṃ samān bhāgān prakalpayeta abrāhmaṇaṃ tu manyante śūdrāputram anaipuṇātc triṣu varṇeṣu jāto hi brāhmaṇād brāhmaṇo bhaveta smṛtā varṇāś ca catvāraḥ pañcamo nādhigamyatec haret tu daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ śūdrāputraḥ pitur dhanāta tat tu dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhatic avaśyaṃ hi dhanaṃ deyaṃ śūdrāputrāya bhārataa ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharma iti tasmai pradīyatec yatra tatra samutpanno guṇāyaivopakalpatea yadi vāpy ekaputraḥ syād aputro yadi vā bhavetc nādhikaṃ daśamād dadyāc chūdrāputrāya bhāratad smṛta ekaś caturbhāgaḥ kanyābhāgas tu dharmataḥd abhrātṛkā samagrārhā cārthasyety apare viduḥa traivārṣikād yadā bhaktād adhikaṃ syād dvijasya tuc yajeta tena dravyeṇa na vṛthā sādhayed dhanama trisāhasraparo dāyaḥ striyo deyo dhanasya vaic tac ca bhartrā dhanaṃ dattaṃ nādattaṃ bhoktum arhatia strīṇāṃ tu patidāyādyam upabhogaphalaṃ smṛtamc nāpahāraṃ striyaḥ kuryuḥ pativittāt kathaṃ canaa striyās tu yad bhaved vittaṃ pitrā dattaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac brāhmaṇyās tad dharet kanyā yathā putras tathā hi sāe sā hi putrasamā rājan vihitā kurunandanaa evam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ dharmeṣu bharatarṣabhac etad dharmam anusmṛtya na vṛthā sādhayed dhanam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śūdrāyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto yady adeyadhanaḥ smṛtaḥc kena prativiśeṣeṇa daśamo py asya dīyatea brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jāto brāhmaṇaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥc kṣatriyāyāṃ tathaiva syād vaiśyāyām api caiva hia kasmāt te viṣamaṃ bhāgaṃ bhajeran nṛpasattamac yadā sarve trayo varṇās tvayoktā brāhmaṇā iti bhīṣma uvācaa dārā ity ucyate loke nāmnaikena paraṃtapac proktena caikanāmnāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ sumahān bhaveta tisraḥ kṛtvā puro bhāryāḥ paścād vindeta brāhmaṇīmc sā jyeṣṭhā sā ca pūjyā syāt sā ca tābhyo garīyasīa snānaṃ prasādhanaṃ bhartur dantadhāvanam añjanamc havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca yac cānyad dharmayuktaṃ bhaved gṛhea na tasyāṃ jātu tiṣṭhantyām anyā tat kartum arhatic brāhmaṇī tv eva tat kuryād brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhiraa annaṃ pānaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni cac brāhmaṇyai tāni deyāni bhartuḥ sā hi garīyasīa manunābhihitaṃ śāstraṃ yac cāpi kurunandanac tatrāpy eṣa mahārāja dṛṣṭo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa atha ced anyathā kuryād yadi kāmād yudhiṣṭhirac yathā brāhmaṇacaṇḍālaḥ pūrvadṛṣṭas tathaiva saḥa brāhmaṇyāḥ sadṛśaḥ putraḥ kṣatriyāyāś ca yo bhavetc rājan viśeṣo nāsty atra varṇayor ubhayor apia na tu jātyā samā loke brāhmaṇyāḥ kṣatriyā bhavetc brāhmaṇyāḥ prathamaḥ putro bhūyān syād rājasattamae bhūyo pi bhūyasā hāryaṃ pitṛvittād yudhiṣṭhiraa yathā na sadṛśī jātu brāhmaṇyāḥ kṣatriyā bhavetc kṣatriyāyās tathā vaiśyā na jātu sadṛśī bhaveta śrīś ca rājyaṃ ca kośaś ca kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac vihitaṃ dṛśyate rājan sāgarāntā ca medinīa kṣatriyo hi svadharmeṇa śriyaṃ prāpnoti bhūyasīmc rājā daṇḍadharo rājan rakṣā nānyatra kṣatriyāta brāhmaṇā hi mahābhāgā devānām api devatāḥc teṣu rājā pravarteta pūjayā vidhipūrvakama praṇītam ṛṣibhir jñātvā dharmaṃ śāśvatam avyayamc lupyamānāḥ svadharmeṇa kṣatriyo rakṣati prajāḥa dasyubhir hriyamāṇaṃ ca dhanaṃ dārāś ca sarvaśaḥc sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ trātā bhavati pārthivaḥa bhūyān syāt kṣatriyāputro vaiśyāputrān na saṃśayaḥc bhūyas tenāpi hartavyaṃ pitṛvittād yudhiṣṭhirad vaiśyāputro pi bhūyāṃś ca śūdrāputrān na saṃśayaḥd bhayaṃ saṃjanayaty eva tasmād deyadhanas tv asau yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa uktaṃ te vidhivad rājan brāhmaṇasve pitāmahac itareṣāṃ tu varṇānāṃ kathaṃ viniyamo bhavet bhīṣma uvācaa kṣatriyasyāpi bhārye dve vihite kurunandanac tṛtīyā ca bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtāa eṣa eva kramo hi syāt kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhirac aṣṭadhā tu bhavet kāryaṃ kṣatriyasvaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraa kṣatriyāyā haret putraś caturo ṃśān pitur dhanātc yuddhāvahārikaṃ yac ca pituḥ syāt sa harec ca tata vaiśyāputras tu bhāgāṃs trīn śūdrāputras tathāṣṭamamc so pi dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhatia ekaiva hi bhaved bhāryā vaiśyasya kurunandanac dvitīyā vā bhavec chūdrā na tu dṛṣṭāntataḥ smṛtāa vaiśyasya vartamānasya vaiśyāyāṃ bharatarṣabhac śūdrāyāṃ caiva kaunteya tayor viniyamaḥ smṛtaḥa pañcadhā tu bhavet kāryaṃ vaiśyasvaṃ bharatarṣabhac tayor apatye vakṣyāmi vibhāgaṃ ca janādhipaa vaiśyāputreṇa hartavyāś catvāro ṃśāḥ pitur dhanātc pañcamas tu bhaved bhāgaḥ śūdrāputrāya bhārataa so pi dattaṃ haret pitrā nādattaṃ hartum arhatic tribhir varṇais tathā jātaḥ śūdro deyadhano bhaveta śūdrasya syāt savarṇaiva bhāryā nānyā kathaṃ canac śūdrasya samabhāgaḥ syād yadi putraśataṃ bhaveta jātānāṃ samavarṇāsu putrāṇām aviśeṣataḥc sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ samabhāgo dhane smṛtaḥa jyeṣṭhasya bhāgo jyeṣṭhaḥ syād ekāṃśo yaḥ pradhānataḥc eṣa dāyavidhiḥ pārtha pūrvam uktaḥ svayaṃbhuvāa samavarṇāsu jātānāṃ viśeṣo sty aparo nṛpac vivāhavaiśeṣyakṛtaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvo viśiṣyatea harej jyeṣṭhaḥ pradhānāṃśam ekaṃ tulyāsuteṣv apic madhyamo madhyamaṃ caiva kanīyāṃs tu kanīyasama evaṃ jātiṣu sarvāsu savarṇāḥ śreṣṭhatāṃ gatāḥc maharṣir api caitad vai mārīcaḥ kāśyapo bravīt yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa arthāśrayād vā kāmād vā varṇānāṃ vāpy aniścayātc ajñānād vāpi varṇānāṃ jāyate varṇasaṃkaraḥa teṣām etena vidhinā jātānāṃ varṇasaṃkarec ko dharmaḥ kāni karmāṇi tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa cāturvarṇyasya karmāṇi cāturvarṇyaṃ ca kevalamc asṛjat sa ha yajñārthe pūrvam eva prajāpatiḥa bhāryāś catasro viprasya dvayor ātmāsya jāyatec ānupūrvyād dvayor hīnau mātṛjātyau prasūyataḥa paraṃ śavād brāhmaṇasyaiṣa putraḥśūdrāputraṃ pāraśavaṃ tam āhuḥc śuśrūṣakaḥ svasya kulasya sa syātsvaṃ cāritraṃ nityam atho na jahyāta sarvān upāyān api saṃpradhāryasamuddharet svasya kulasya tantumc jyeṣṭho yavīyān api yo dvijasyaśuśrūṣavān dānaparāyaṇaḥ syāta tisraḥ kṣatriyasaṃbandhād dvayor ātmāsya jāyatec hīnavarṇas tṛtīyāyāṃ śūdra ugra iti smṛtaḥa dve cāpi bhārye vaiśyasya dvayor ātmāsya jāyatec śūdrā śūdrasya cāpy ekā śūdram eva prajāyatea ato viśiṣṭas tv adhamo gurudārapradharṣakaḥc bāhyaṃ varṇaṃ janayati cāturvarṇyavigarhitama ayājyaṃ kṣatriyo vrātyaṃ sūtaṃ stomakriyāparamc vaiśyo vaidehakaṃ cāpi maudgalyam apavarjitama śūdraś caṇḍālam atyugraṃ vadhyaghnaṃ bāhyavāsinamc brāhmaṇyāṃ saṃprajāyanta ity ete kulapāṃsanāḥe ete matimatāṃ śreṣṭha varṇasaṃkarajāḥ prabhoa bandī tu jāyate vaiśyān māgadho vākyajīvanaḥc śūdrān niṣādo matsyaghnaḥ kṣatriyāyāṃ vyatikramāta śūdrād āyogavaś cāpi vaiśyāyāṃ grāmadharmiṇaḥc brāhmaṇair apratigrāhyas takṣā sa vanajīvanaḥa ete pi sadṛśaṃ varṇaṃ janayanti svayoniṣuc mātṛjātyāṃ prasūyante pravarā hīnayoniṣua yathā caturṣu varṇeṣu dvayor ātmāsya jāyatec ānantaryāt tu jāyante tathā bāhyāḥ pradhānataḥa te cāpi sadṛśaṃ varṇaṃ janayanti svayoniṣuc parasparasya vartanto janayanti vigarhitāna yathā ca śūdro brāhmaṇyāṃ jantuṃ bāhyaṃ prasūyatec evaṃ bāhyatarād bāhyaś cāturvarṇyāt prasūyatea pratilomaṃ tu vartanto bāhyād bāhyataraṃ punaḥc hīnā hīnāt prasūyante varṇāḥ pañcadaśaiva tea agamyāgamanāc caiva vartate varṇasaṃkaraḥc vrātyānām atra jāyante sairandhrā māgadheṣu cae prasādhanopacārajñam adāsaṃ dāsajīvanama ataś cāyogavaṃ sūte vāgurāvanajīvanamc maireyakaṃ ca vaidehaḥ saṃprasūte tha mādhukama niṣādo mudgaraṃ sūte dāśaṃ nāvopajīvinamc mṛtapaṃ cāpi caṇḍālaḥ śvapākam atikutsitama caturo māgadhī sūte krūrān māyopajīvinaḥc māṃsasvādukaraṃ sūdaṃ saugandham iti saṃjñitama vaidehakāc ca pāpiṣṭhaṃ krūraṃ bhāryopajīvinamc niṣādān madranābhaṃ ca kharayānaprayāyinama caṇḍālāt pulkasaṃ cāpi kharāśvagajabhojinamc mṛtacelapraticchannaṃ bhinnabhājanabhojinama āyogavīṣu jāyante hīnavarṇāsu te trayaḥc kṣudro vaidehakād andhro bahir grāmapratiśrayaḥa kārāvaro niṣādyāṃ tu carmakārāt prajāyatec caṇḍālāt pāṇḍusaupākas tvaksāravyavahāravāna āhiṇḍiko niṣādena vaidehyāṃ saṃprajāyatec caṇḍālena tu saupāko maudgalyasamavṛttimāna niṣādī cāpi caṇḍālāt putram antāvasāyinamc śmaśānagocaraṃ sūte bāhyair api bahiṣkṛtama ity etāḥ saṃkare jātyaḥ pitṛmātṛvyatikramātc pracchannā vā prakāśā vā veditavyāḥ svakarmabhiḥa caturṇām eva varṇānāṃ dharmo nānyasya vidyatec varṇānāṃ dharmahīneṣu saṃjñā nāstīha kasya cita yadṛcchayopasaṃpannair yajñasādhubahiṣkṛtaiḥc bāhyā bāhyais tu jāyante yathāvṛtti yathāśrayama catuṣpathaśmaśānāni śailāṃś cānyān vanaspatīnb caityadrumasmaśāneṣu śaileṣūpavaneṣu cab kārṣṇāyasam alaṃkāraṃ parigṛhya ca nityaśaḥb vaseyur ete pitryais tu vartayantaḥ svakarmabhiḥc yuñjante cāpy alaṃkārāṃs tathopakaraṇāni caa gobrāhmaṇārthe sāhāyyaṃ kurvāṇā vai na saṃśayaḥc ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ satyavākyam atha kṣamāa svaśarīraiḥ paritrāṇaṃ bāhyānāṃ siddhikārakamc manujavyāghra bhavati tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥa yathopadeśaṃ parikīrtitāsunaraḥ prajāyeta vicārya buddhimānc vihīnayonir hi suto vasādayettitīrṣamāṇaṃ salile yathopalama avidvāṃsam alaṃ loke vidvāṃsam api vā punaḥc nayante hy utpathaṃ nāryaḥ kāmakrodhavaśānugama svabhāvaś caiva nārīṇāṃ narāṇām iha dūṣaṇamc ityarthaṃ na prasajjante pramadāsu vipaścitaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa varṇāpetam avijñātaṃ naraṃ kaluṣayonijamc āryarūpam ivānāryaṃ kathaṃ vidyāmahe nṛpa bhīṣma uvācaa yonisaṃkaluṣe jātaṃ nānācārasamāhitamc karmabhiḥ sajjanācīrṇair vijñeyā yoniśuddhatāa anāryatvam anācāraḥ krūratvaṃ niṣkriyātmatāc puruṣaṃ vyañjayantīha loke kaluṣayonijama pitryaṃ vā bhajate śīlaṃ mātṛjaṃ vā tathobhayamc na kathaṃ cana saṃkīrṇaḥ prakṛtiṃ svāṃ niyacchatia yathaiva sadṛśo rūpe mātāpitror hi jāyatec vyāghraś citrais tathā yoniṃ puruṣaḥ svāṃ niyacchatia kulasrotasi saṃchanne yasya syād yonisaṃkaraḥc saṃśrayaty eva tacchīlaṃ naro lpam api vā bahua āryarūpasamācāraṃ carantaṃ kṛtake pathic svavarṇam anyavarṇaṃ vā svaśīlaṃ śāsti niścayea nānāvṛtteṣu bhūteṣu nānākarmarateṣu cac janmavṛttasamaṃ loke suśliṣṭaṃ na virajyatea śarīram iha sattvena narasya parikṛṣyatec jyeṣṭhamadhyāvaraṃ sattvaṃ tulyasattvaṃ pramodatea jyāyāṃsam api śīlena vihīnaṃ naiva pūjayetc api śūdraṃ tu sadvṛttaṃ dharmajñam abhipūjayetd ātmānam ātmanākhyāti karmasvaiḥ karmabhir naraḥd svaśīlacāritrakṛtaiḥ karmair vāpi sicśubhāśubhaiḥa ātmānam ākhyāti hi karmabhir naraḥsvaśīlacāritrakṛtaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥc pranaṣṭam apy ātmakulaṃ tathā naraḥpunaḥ prakāśaṃ kurute svakarmabhiḥa yoniṣv etāsu sarvāsu saṃkīrṇāsv itarāsu cac yatrātmānaṃ na janayed budhas tāḥ parivarjayet yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa brūhi putrān kuruśreṣṭha varṇānāṃ tvaṃ pṛthak pṛthakc kīdṛśyāṃ kīdṛśāś cāpi putrāḥ kasya ca ke ca tea vipravādāḥ subahuśaḥ śrūyante putrakāritāḥc atra no muhyatāṃ rājan saṃśayaṃ chettum arhasid bhīṣmaḥd ātmā putras tu vijñeyaḥ prathamo bahudhā pared sve kṣetre saṃskṛte yas tu putram utpādayet svayamd tam aurasaṃ vijānīyāt putraṃ prathamakalpitamd agniṃ prajāpatiṃ ceṣṭvā varāya pratipāditād putrikā syād duhitari saṃkalpenāpi vā sutaḥd talpe jātaḥ pramītasya klībasya patitasya vād svadharmeṇa niyukto yaḥ sa putraḥ kṣetrajaḥ smṛtaḥd mātā pitā ca dadyātāṃ yam adbhiḥ putram āpadid sadṛśaṃ prītisaṃyuktau vijñeyo dāttakaḥ sutaḥd sadṛśaṃ tu prakuryād yaṃ guṇadoṣavicakṣaṇamd putraṃ putraguṇair yuktaṃ vijñeyas tu sa kṛtrimaḥd utpadyate yas tu gūḍhaṃ na ca jñāyeta kasya citd sa bhaved gūḍhajo nāma tasya syād yasya talpajaḥd mātāpitṛbhyām utsṛṣṭaṃ tayor anyatareṇa vād yaḥ putraṃ pratigṛhṇīyād apaviddhaḥ sa ucyated pitṛveśmani kanyā tu yaṃ putraṃ janayed rahaḥd kānīnaṃ taṃ vaden nāmnā voḍhuḥ kanyāsamudbhavaḥd yā garbhiṇī saṃskriyate jñātājñātāpi vā satīd voḍhuḥ sa garbho bhavati sahoḍha iti cocyated yā patyā vā parityaktā atha vā svecchayāpi vād utpādayed akṣatāyāṃ sa paunarbhava ucyated mātāpitṛvihīno vā sakto vā syād akāraṇātd ātmānaṃ sparśayed yas tu svayaṃdattaḥ sa ucyated krīṇīyād yas tv apatyārthaṃ mātāpitror yam antikātd sa sutas tasya sadṛśaḥ krīto nāma budhaiḥ smṛtaḥd dvādaśaite pare prāhur evaṃ dharmasya pāṭhakāḥd sā ced akṣatayoniḥ syād gatapratyāgatāpi vād paunarbhavena bhartrā sā punaḥ saṃskāram arhatid yaṃ brāhmaṇas tu śūdrāyāṃ kāmād utpādayet sutamd sa pārayann eva śavas tasmāt pāraśavaḥ smṛtaḥd dāsyāṃ vā dāsadāsyāṃ vā yaḥ śūdrasya suto bhavetd so nujñāto hared aṃśam iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥd kṣetrajādīn sutān etān ekādaśa yathoditānd putrapratinidhīn āhuḥ kriyālopān manīṣiṇaḥd bhrātṝṇām ekajātānām ekaś cet putravān bhavetd sarvāṃs tāṃs tena putreṇa putriṇo manur abravītd sarvāsām ekapatnīnām ekā cet putriṇī bhavetd sarvās tās tena putreṇa prāha putravatīr manuḥ bhīṣma uvācaa ātmā putras tu vijñeyas tasyānantarajaś ca yaḥc niyuktajaś ca vijñeyaḥ sutaḥ prasṛtajas tathāa patitasya ca bhāryāyāṃ bhartrā susamavetayāc tathā dattakṛtau putrāv adhyūḍhaś ca tathāparaḥa ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajāś cāpi kānīnāpasadās tathāc ity ete te samākhyātās tān vijānīhi bhārata yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajāḥ ke syuḥ ke vāpy apasadās tathāc etat sarvaṃ yathātattvaṃ vyākhyātuṃ me tvam arhasi bhīṣma uvācaa triṣu varṇeṣu ye putrā brāhmaṇasya yudhiṣṭhirac varṇayoś ca dvayoḥ syātāṃ yau rājanyasya bhārataa eko dvivarṇa evātha tathātraivopalakṣitaḥc ṣaḍ apadhvaṃsajās te hi tathaivāpasadāñ śṛṇua caṇḍālo vrātyavenau ca brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāsu cac vaiśyāyāṃ caiva śūdrasya lakṣyante pasadās trayaḥa māgadho vāmakaś caiva dvau vaiśyasyopalakṣitauc brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāyāṃ ca kṣatriyasyaika eva tua brāhmaṇyāṃ lakṣyate sūta ity ete pasadāḥ smṛtāḥc putrareto na śakyaṃ hi mithyā kartuṃ narādhipa yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kṣetrajaṃ ke cid evāhuḥ sutaṃ ke cit tu śukrajamc tulyāv etau sutau kasya tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa retajo vā bhavet putras tyakto vā kṣetrajo bhavetc adhyūḍhaḥ samayaṃ bhittvety etad eva nibodha me yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa retojaṃ vidma vai putraṃ kṣetrajasyāgamaḥ kathamc adhyūḍhaṃ vidma vai putraṃ hitvā ca samayaṃ katham bhīṣma uvācaa ātmajaṃ putram utpādya yas tyajet kāraṇāntarec na tatra kāraṇaṃ retaḥ sa kṣetrasvāmino bhaveta putrakāmo hi putrārthe yāṃ vṛṇīte viśāṃ patec tatra kṣetraṃ pramāṇaṃ syān na vai tatrātmajaḥ sutaḥa anyatra kṣetrajaḥ putro lakṣyate bharatarṣabhac na hy ātmā śakyate hantuṃ dṛṣṭāntopagato hy asaua kaś cic ca kṛtakaḥ putraḥ saṃgrahād eva lakṣyatec na tatra retaḥ kṣetraṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syād yudhiṣṭhira yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kīdṛśaḥ kṛtakaḥ putraḥ saṃgrahād eva lakṣyatec śukraṃ kṣetraṃ pramāṇaṃ vā yatra lakṣyeta bhārata bhīṣma uvācaa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ saṃtyaktaṃ pathi yaṃ tu pralakṣayetc na cāsya mātāpitarau jñāyete sa hi kṛtrimaḥa asvāmikasya svāmitvaṃ yasmin saṃpratilakṣayetc savarṇas taṃ ca poṣeta savarṇas tasya jāyate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa katham asya prayoktavyaḥ saṃskāraḥ kasya vā kathamc deyā kanyā kathaṃ ceti tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa ātmavat tasya kurvīta saṃskāraṃ svāmivat tathāa tyakto mātāpitṛbhyāṃ yaḥ savarṇaṃ pratipadyatec tad gotravarṇatas tasya kuryāt saṃskāram acyutad saṃskṛtasya satas tasya varṇagotraṃ bhavaty utaa atha deyā tu kanyā syāt tadvarṇena yudhiṣṭhirac saṃskartuṃ mātṛgotraṃ ca mātṛvarṇaviniścayea kānīnādhyūḍhajau cāpi vijñeyau putrakilbiṣauc tāv api svāv iva sutau saṃskāryāv iti niścayaḥa kṣetrajo vāpy apasado ye dhyūḍhās teṣu cāpy athac ātmavad vai prayuñjīran saṃskāraṃ brāhmaṇādayaḥa dharmaśāstreṣu varṇānāṃ niścayo yaṃ pradṛśyatec etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa darśane kīdṛśaḥ snehaḥ saṃvāse ca pitāmahac mahābhāgyaṃ gavāṃ caiva tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa hanta te kathayiṣyāmi purāvṛttaṃ mahādyutec nahuṣasya ca saṃvādaṃ maharṣeś cyavanasya caa purā maharṣiś cyavano bhārgavo bharatarṣabhac udavāsakṛtārambho babhūva sumahāvrataḥa nihatya mānaṃ krodhaṃ ca praharṣaṃ śokam eva cac varṣāṇi dvādaśa munir jalavāse dhṛtavrataḥa ādadhat sarvabhūteṣu visrambhaṃ paramaṃ śubhamc jalecareṣu sattveṣu śītaraśmir iva prabhuḥa sthāṇubhūtaḥ śucir bhūtvā daivatebhyaḥ praṇamya cac gaṅgāyamunayor madhye jalaṃ saṃpraviveśa haa gaṅgāyamunayor vegaṃ subhīmaṃ bhīmaniḥsvanamc pratijagrāha śirasā vātavegasamaṃ javea gaṅgā ca yamunā caiva saritaś cānugās tayoḥc pradakṣiṇam ṛṣiṃ cakrur na cainaṃ paryapīḍayana antarjale sa suṣvāpa kāṣṭhabhūto mahāmuniḥc tataś cordhvasthito dhīmān abhavad bharatarṣabhaa jalaukasāṃ sa sattvānāṃ babhūva priyadarśanaḥc upājighranta ca tadā matsyās taṃ hṛṣṭamānasāḥe tatra tasyāsataḥ kālaḥ samatīto bhavan mahāna tataḥ kadā cit samaye kasmiṃś cin matsyajīvinaḥc taṃ deśaṃ samupājagmur jālahastā mahādyutea niṣādā bahavas tatra matsyoddharaṇaniścitāḥc vyāyatā balinaḥ śūrāḥ salileṣv tena rājñā hṛṣṭena tad vacaḥc cyavanaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ parapuraṃjayama sajjīkuru rathaṃ kṣipraṃ yas te sāṃgrāmiko mataḥc sāyudhaḥ sapatākaś ca saśaktiḥ kaṇayaṣṭimāna kiṅkiṇīśatanirghoṣo yuktas tomarakalpanaiḥc gadākhaḍganibaddhaś ca parameṣuśatānvitaḥa tataḥ sa taṃ tathety uktvā kalpayitvā mahārathamc bhāryāṃ vāme dhuri tadā cātmānaṃ dakṣiṇe tathāa tridaṃṣṭraṃ vajrasūcyagraṃ pratodaṃ tatra cādadhatc sarvam etat tato dattvā nṛpo vākyam athābravīta bhagavan kva ratho yātu bravītu bhṛgunandanaḥc yatra vakṣyasi viprarṣe tatra yāsyati te rathaḥa evam uktas tu bhagavān pratyuvācātha taṃ nṛpamc itaḥprabhṛti yātavyaṃ padakaṃ padakaṃ śanaiḥa śramo mama yathā na syāt tathā me chandacāriṇauc sukhaṃ caivāsmi voḍhavyo janaḥ sarvaś ca paśyatua notsāryaḥ pathikaḥ kaś cit tebhyo dāsyāmy ahaṃ vasuc brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ye kāmān arthayiṣyanti māṃ pathia sarvaṃ dāsyāmy aśeṣeṇa dhanaṃ ratnāni caiva hic kriyatāṃ nikhilenaitan mā vicāraya pārthivaa tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā bhṛtyān athābravītc yad yad brūyān munis tat tat sarvaṃ deyam aśaṅkitaiḥa tato ratnāny anekāni striyo yugyam ajāvikamc kṛtākṛtaṃ ca kanakaṃ gajendrāś cācalopamāḥa anvagacchanta tam ṛṣiṃ rājāmātyāś ca sarvaśaḥc hāhābhūtaṃ ca tat sarvam āsīn nagaram ārtimata tau tīkṣṇāgreṇa sahasā pratodena pracoditauc pṛṣṭhe viddhau kaṭe caiva nirvikārau tam ūhatuḥa vepamānau virāhārau pañcāśad rātrakarśitauc kathaṃ cid ūhatur vīrau daṃpatī taṃ rathottamama bahuśo bhṛśaviddhau tau kṣaramāṇau kṣatodbhavamc dadṛśāte mahārāja puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukaua tau dṛṣṭvā pauravargas tu bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇaḥc abhiśāpabhayāt trasto na ca kiṃ cid uvāca haa dvandvaśaś cābruvan sarve paśyadhvaṃ tapaso balamc kruddhā api muniśreṣṭhaṃ vīkṣituṃ naiva śaknumaḥd brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran nānyo varṇaḥ kathaṃ canad īdṛśaṃ ratham āruhya ko nyo jīvitum utsaheta aho bhagavato vīryaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥc rājñaś cāpi sabhāryasya dhairyaṃ paśyata yādṛśama śrāntāv api hi kṛcchreṇa ratham etaṃ samūhatuḥc na caitayor vikāraṃ vai dadarśa bhṛgunandanaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa tataḥ sa nirvikārau tau dṛṣṭvā bhṛgukulodvahaḥc vasu viśrāṇayām āsa yathā vaiśravaṇas tathāa tatrāpi rājā prītātmā yathājñaptam athākarotc tato sya bhagavān prīto babhūva munisattamaḥa avatīrya rathaśreṣṭhād daṃpatī tau mumoca hac vimocya caitau vidhivat tato vākyam uvāca haa snigdhagambhīrayā vācā bhārgavaḥ suprasannayāc dadāni vāṃ varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tad brūtām iti bhārataa sukumārau ca tau vidvān karābhyāṃ munisattamaḥc pasparśāmṛtakalpābhyāṃ snehād bharatasattamaa athābravīn nṛpo vākyaṃ śramo nāsty āvayor ihac viśrāntau svaḥ prabhāvāt te dhyānenaiveti bhārgavaa atha tau bhagavān prāha prahṛṣṭaś cyavanas tadāc na vṛthā vyāhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yan mayā tad bhaviṣyatia ramaṇīyaḥ samuddeśo gaṅgātīram idaṃ śubhamc kaṃ cit kālaṃ vrataparo nivatsyāmīha pārthivaa gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ putra viśrāntaḥ punar eṣyasic ihasthaṃ māṃ sabhāryas tvaṃ draṣṭāsi śvo narādhipaa na ca manyus tvayā kāryaḥ śreyas te samupasthitamc yat kāṅkṣitaṃ hṛdisthaṃ te tat sarvaṃ saṃbhaviṣyatia ity evam uktaḥ kuśikaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanāc provāca muniśārdūlam idaṃ vacanam arthavata na me manyur mahābhāga pūto smi bhagavaṃs tvayāc saṃvṛttau yauvanasthau svo vapuṣmantau balānvitaua pratodena vraṇā ye me sabhāryasya kṛtās tvayāc tān na paśyāmi gātreṣu svastho smi saha bhāryayāa imāṃ ca devīṃ paśyāmi mune divyāpsaropamāmc śriyā paramayā yuktāṃ yathādṛṣṭāṃ mayā purāa tava prasādāt saṃvṛttam idaṃ sarvaṃ mahāmunec naitac citraṃ tu bhagavaṃs tvayi satyaparākramaa ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ cyavanaḥ kuśikaṃ tadāc āgacchethāḥ sabhāryaś ca tvam iheti narādhipaa ity uktaḥ samanujñāto rājarṣir abhivādya tamc prayayau vapuṣā yukto nagaraṃ devarājavata tata enam upājagmur amātyāḥ sapurohitāḥc balasthā gaṇikāyuktāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tathāa tair vṛtaḥ kuśiko rājā śriyā paramayā jvalanc praviveśa puraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ pūjyamāno tha bandibhiḥa tataḥ praviśya nagaraṃ kṛtvā sarvāhṇikakriyāḥc bhuktvā sabhāryo rajanīm uvāsa sa mahīpatiḥa tatas tu tau navam abhivīkṣya yauvanaṃparasparaṃ vigatajarāv ivāmarauc nanandatuḥ śayanagatau vapurdharauśriyā yutau dvijavaradattayā tayāa sa cāpy ṛṣir bhṛgukulakīrtivardhanastapodhano vanam abhirāmam ṛddhimatc manīṣayā bahuvidharatnabhūṣitaṃsasarja yan nāsti śatakrator api bhīṣma uvācaa tataḥ sa rājā rātryante pratibuddho mahāmanāḥc kṛtapūrvāhṇikaḥ prāyāt sabhāryas tad vanaṃ pratia tato dadarśa nṛpatiḥ prāsādaṃ sarvakāñcanamc maṇistambhasahasrāḍhyaṃ gandharvanagaropamame tatra divyān abhiprāyān dadarśa kuśikas tadāa parvatān ramyasānūṃś ca nalinīś ca sapaṅkajāḥc citraśālāś ca vividhās toraṇāni ca bhāratae śādvalopacitāṃ bhūmiṃ tathā kāñcanakuṭṭimāma sahakārān praphullāṃś ca ketakoddālakān dhavānc aśokān mucukundāṃś ca phullāṃś caivātimuktakāna campakāṃs tilakān bhavyān panasān vañjulān apic puṣpitān karṇikārāṃś ca tatra tatra dadarśa haa śyāmāṃ vāraṇapuṣpīṃ ca tathāṣṭāpadikāṃ latāmc tatra tatra parikḷptā dadarśa sa mahīpatiḥa vṛkṣān padmotpaladharān sarvartukusumāṃs tathāc vimānacchandakāṃś cāpi prāsādān padmasaṃnibhāna śītalāni ca toyāni kva cid uṣṇāni bhāratac āsanāni vicitrāṇi śayanapravarāṇi caa paryaṅkān sarvasauvarṇān parārdhyāstaraṇāstṛtānc bhakṣyabhojyam anantaṃ ca tatra tatropakalpitama vāṇīvādāñ chukāṃś cāpi śārikābhṛṅgarājakānc kokilāñ chatapatrāṃś ca koyaṣṭimakakukkuṭāna mayūrān kukkuṭāṃś cāpi putrakāñ jīvajīvakānc cakorān vānarān haṃsān sārasāṃś cakrasāhvayāna samantataḥ praṇaditān dadarśa sumanoharānc kva cid apsarasāṃ saṃghān gandharvāṇāṃ ca pārthivaa kāntābhir aparāṃs tatra pariṣvaktān dadarśa hac na dadarśa ca tān bhūyo dadarśa ca punar nṛpaḥa gītadhvaniṃ sumadhuraṃ tathaivādhyayanadhvanimc haṃsān sumadhurāṃś cāpi tatra śuśrāva pārthivaḥa taṃ dṛṣṭvātyadbhutaṃ rājā manasācintayat tadāc svapno yaṃ cittavibhraṃśa utāho satyam eva tua aho saha śarīreṇa prāpto smi paramāṃ gatimc uttarān vā kurūn puṇyān atha vāpy amarāvatīma kiṃ tv idaṃ mahad āścaryaṃ saṃpaśyāmīty acintayatc evaṃ saṃcintayann eva dadarśa munipuṃgavama tasmin vimāne sauvarṇe maṇistambhasamākulec mahārhe śayane divye śayānaṃ bhṛgunandanama tam abhyayāt praharṣeṇa narendraḥ saha bhāryayāc antarhitas tato bhūyaś cyavanaḥ śayanaṃ ca tata tato nyasmin vanoddeśe punar eva dadarśa tamc kauśyāṃ bṛsyāṃ samāsīnaṃ japamānaṃ mahāvratame evaṃ yogabalād vipro mohayām āsa pārthivama kṣaṇena tad vanaṃ caiva te caivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥc gandharvāḥ pādapāś caiva sarvam antaradhīyataa niḥśabdam abhavac cāpi gaṅgākūlaṃ punar nṛpac kuśavalmīkabhūyiṣṭhaṃ babhūva ca yathā purāa tataḥ sa rājā kuśikaḥ sabhāryas tena karmaṇāc vismayaṃ paramaṃ prāptas tad dṛṣṭvā mahad adbhutama tataḥ provāca kuśiko bhāryāṃ harṣasamanvitaḥc paśya bhadre yathā bhāvāś citrā dṛṣṭāḥ sudurlabhāḥa prasādād bhṛgumukhyasya kim anyatra tapobalātc tapasā tad avāpyaṃ hi yan na śakyaṃ manorathaiḥa trailokyarājyād api hi tapa eva viśiṣyatec tapasā hi sutaptena krīḍaty eṣa tapodhanaḥa aho prabhāvo brahmarṣeś cyavanasya mahātmanaḥc icchann eṣa tapovīryād anyāṃl lokān sṛjed apia brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran puṇyavāgbuddhikarmaṇaḥc utsahed iha kartuṃ hi ko nyo vai cyavanād ṛted brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ loke tal labdhvā durlabhaṃ tapaḥd siddhis tatrāpi duṣprāpā siddher api parā gatiḥa brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ loke rājyaṃ hi sulabhaṃ naraiḥc brāhmaṇyasya prabhāvād dhi rathe yuktau svadhuryavata ity evaṃ cintayānaḥ sa viditaś cyavanasya vaic saṃprekṣyovāca sa nṛpaṃ kṣipram āgamyatām itia ity uktaḥ sahabhāryas tam abhyagacchan mahāmunimc śirasā vandanīyaṃ tam avandata sa pārthivaḥa tasyāśiṣaḥ prayujyātha sa munis taṃ narādhipamc niṣīdety abravīd dhīmān sāntvayan puruṣarṣabhaa tataḥ prakṛtim āpanno bhārgavo nṛpate nṛpamc uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā tarpayann iva bhārataa rājan samyag jitānīha pañca pañcasu yat tvayāc manaḥṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi kṛcchrān mukto si tena vaia samyag ārādhitaḥ putra tvayāhaṃ vadatāṃ varac na hi te vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cit susūkṣmam api vidyatea anujānīhi māṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgatamc prīto smi tava rājendra varaś ca pratigṛhyatām kuśika uvācaa agnimadhyagatenedaṃ bhagavan saṃnidhau mayāc vartitaṃ bhṛguśārdūla yan na dagdho smi tad bahua eṣa eva varo mukhyaḥ prāpto me bhṛgunandanac yat prīto si samācārāt kulaṃ pūtaṃ mamānaghaa eṣa me nugraho vipra jīvite ca prayojanamc etad rājyaphalaṃ caiva tapaś caitat paraṃ mamaa yadi tu prītimān vipra mayi tvaṃ bhṛgunandanac asti me saṃśayaḥ kaś cit tan me vyākhyātum arhasi cyavana uvācaa varaś ca gṛhyatāṃ matto yaś ca te saṃśayo hṛdic taṃ ca brūhi naraśreṣṭha sarvaṃ saṃpādayāmi te kuśika uvācaa yadi prīto si bhagavaṃs tato me vada bhārgavac kāraṇaṃ śrotum icchāmi madgṛhe vāsakāritama śayanaṃ caikapārśvena divasān ekaviṃśatimc akiṃcid uktvā gamanaṃ bahiś ca munipuṃgavaa antardhānam akasmāc ca punar eva ca darśanamc punaś ca śayanaṃ vipra divasān ekaviṃśatima tailābhyaktasya gamanaṃ bhojanaṃ ca gṛhe mamac samupānīya vividhaṃ yad dagdhaṃ jātavedasāe niryāṇaṃ ca rathenāśu sahasā yat kṛtaṃ tvayāa dhanānāṃ ca visargasya vanasyāpi ca darśanamc prāsādānāṃ bahūnāṃ ca kāñcanānāṃ mahāmunea maṇividrumapādānāṃ paryaṅkānāṃ ca darśanamc punaś cādarśanaṃ tasya śrotum icchāmi kāraṇama atīva hy atra muhyāmi cintayāno divāniśamc na caivātrādhigacchāmi sarvasyāsya viniścayame etad icchāmi kārtsnyena satyaṃ śrotuṃ tapodhana cyavana uvācaa śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣeṇa yad idaṃ yena hetunāc na hi śakyam anākhyātum evaṃ pṛṣṭena pārthivaa pitāmahasya vadataḥ purā devasamāgamec śrutavān asmi yad rājaṃs tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇua brahmakṣatravirodhena bhavitā kulasaṃkaraḥc pautras te bhavitā rājaṃs tejovīryasamanvitaḥa tataḥ svakularakṣārtham ahaṃ tvā samupāgamamc cikīrṣan kuśikocchedaṃ saṃdidhakṣuḥ kulaṃ tavaa tato ham āgamya purā tvām avocaṃ mahīpatec niyamaṃ kaṃ cid ārapsye śuśrūṣā kriyatām itia na ca te duṣkṛtaṃ kiṃ cid aham āsādayaṃ gṛhec tena jīvasi rājarṣe na bhavethās tato nyathāa etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya divasān ekaviṃśatimc supto smi yadi māṃ kaś cid bodhayed iti pārthivaa yadā tvayā sabhāryeṇa saṃsupto na prabodhitaḥc ahaṃ tadaiva te prīto manasā rājasattamaa utthāya cāsmi niṣkrānto yadi māṃ tvaṃ mahīpatec pṛccheḥ kva yāsyasīty evaṃ śapeyaṃ tvām iti prabhoa antarhitaś cāsmi punaḥ punar eva ca te gṛhec yogam āsthāya saṃviṣṭo divasān ekaviṃśatima kṣudhito mām asūyethāḥ śramād veti narādhipac etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya karśitau vāṃ mayā kṣudhāa na ca te bhūt susūkṣmo pi manyur manasi pārthivac sabhāryasya naraśreṣṭha tena te prītimān ahama bhojanaṃ ca samānāyya yat tad ādīpitaṃ mayāc krudhyethā yadi mātsaryād iti tan marṣitaṃ ca ted rathena vāhitaś cāpi śramāt krodhodbhavāya tea tato haṃ ratham āruhya tvām avocaṃ narādhipac sabhāryo māṃ vahasveti tac ca tvaṃ kṛtavāṃs tathāa aviśaṅko narapate prīto haṃ cāpi tena tec dhanotsarge pi ca kṛte na tvāṃ krodhaḥ pradharṣayata tataḥ prītena te rājan punar etat kṛtaṃ tavac sabhāryasya vanaṃ bhūyas tad viddhi manujādhipaa prītyarthaṃ tava caitan me svargasaṃdarśanaṃ kṛtamc yat te vane smin nṛpate dṛṣṭaṃ divyaṃ nidarśanama svargoddeśas tvayā rājan saśarīreṇa pārthivac muhūrtam anubhūto sau sabhāryeṇa nṛpottamaa nidarśanārthaṃ tapaso dharmasya ca narādhipac tatra yāsīt spṛhā rājaṃs tac cāpi viditaṃ mamaa brāhmaṇyaṃ kāṅkṣase hi tvaṃ tapaś ca pṛthivīpatec avamanya narendratvaṃ devendratvaṃ ca pārthivaa evam etad yathāttha tvaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ tāta durlabhamc brāhmaṇye sati carṣitvam ṛṣitve ca tapasvitāa bhaviṣyaty eṣa te kāmaḥ kuśikāt kauśiko dvijaḥc tṛtīyaṃ puruṣaṃ prāpya brāhmaṇatvaṃ gamiṣyatia vaṃśas te pārthivaśreṣṭha bhṛgūṇām eva tejasāc pautras te bhavitā vipra tapasvī pāvakadyutiḥa yaḥ sa devamanuṣyāṇāṃ bhayam utpādayiṣyatib jamadagnau mahābhāga tapasā bhāvitātmanib sa cāpi bhṛguśārdūlas taṃ vedaṃ dhārayiṣyatic trayāṇāṃ caiva lokānāṃ satyam etad bravīmi tea varaṃ gṛhāṇa rājarṣe yas te manasi vartatec tīrthayātrāṃ gamiṣyāmi purā kālo tivartate kuśika uvācaa eṣa eva varo me dya yat tvaṃ prīto mahāmunec bhavatv etad yathāttha tvaṃ tapaḥ pautre mamānaghae brāhmaṇyaṃ me kulasyāstu bhagavann eṣa me varaḥa punaś cākhyātum icchāmi bhagavan vistareṇa vaic katham eṣyati vipratvaṃ kulaṃ me bhṛgunandanae kaś cāsau bhavitā bandhur mama kaś cāpi saṃmataḥ cyavana uvācaa avaśyaṃ kathanīyaṃ me tavaitan narapuṃgavac yadarthaṃ tvāham ucchettuṃ saṃprāpto manujādhipaa bhṛgūṇāṃ kṣatriyā yājyā nityam eva janādhipac te ca bhedaṃ gamiṣyanti daivayuktena hetunāa kṣatriyāś ca bhṛgūn sarvān vadhiṣyanti narādhipac ā garbhād anukṛntanto daivadaṇḍanipīḍitāḥa tata utpatsyate smākaṃ kule gotravivardhanaḥc aurvo nāma mahātejā jvalanārkasamadyutiḥa sa trailokyavināśāya kopāgniṃ janayiṣyatic mahīṃ saparvatavanāṃ yaḥ kariṣyati bhasmasāta kaṃ cit kālaṃ tu taṃ vahniṃ sa eva śamayiṣyatic samudre vaḍavāvaktre prakṣipya munisattamaḥa putraṃ tasya mahābhāgam ṛcīkaṃ bhṛgunandanamc sākṣāt kṛtsno dhanurvedaḥ samupasthāsyate naghaa kṣatriyāṇām abhāvāya daivayuktena hetunāc sa tu taṃ pratigṛhyaiva putre saṃkrāmayiṣyatia jamadagnau mahābhāge tapasā bhāvitātmanic sa cāpi bhṛguśārdūlas taṃ vedaṃ dhārayiṣyatia kulāt tu tava dharmātman kanyāṃ so dhigamiṣyatib kṣatrahantā bhaved dhiṃsram iti devaṃ sanātanamb nārāyaṇam upāsyāsya varāt taṃ putram icchatic udbhāvanārthaṃ bhavato vaṃśasya nṛpasattamaa gādher duhitaraṃ prāpya pautrīṃ tava mahātapāḥc brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatradharmāṇaṃ rāmam utpādayiṣyatia kṣatriyaṃ viprakarmāṇaṃ bṛhaspatim ivaujasāc viśvāmitraṃ tava kule gādheḥ putraṃ sudhārmikame tapasā mahatā yuktaṃ pradāsyati mahādyutea striyau tu kāraṇaṃ tatra parivarte bhaviṣyataḥc pitāmahaniyogād vai nānyathaitad bhaviṣyatia tṛtīye puruṣe tubhyaṃ brāhmaṇatvam upaiṣyatic bhavitā tvaṃ ca saṃbandhī bhṛgūṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām bhīṣma uvācaa kuśikas tu muner vākyaṃ cyavanasya mahātmanaḥc śrutvā hṛṣṭo bhavad rājā vākyaṃ cedam uvāca hae evam astv iti dharmātmā tadā bharatasattamaa cyavanas tu mahātejāḥ punar eva narādhipamc varārthaṃ codayām āsa tam uvāca sa pārthivaḥa bāḍham evaṃ grahīṣyāmi kāmaṃ tvatto mahāmunec brahmabhūtaṃ kulaṃ me stu dharme cāsya mano bhaveta evam uktas tathety evaṃ pratyuktvā cyavano muniḥc abhyanujñāya nṛpatiṃ tīrthayātrāṃ yayau tadāa etat te kathitaṃ sarvam aśeṣeṇa mayā nṛpac bhṛgūṇāṃ kuśikānāṃ ca prati saṃbandhakāraṇama yathoktaṃ muninā cāpi tathā tad abhavan nṛpac janma rāmasya ca muner viśvāmitrasya caiva ha yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa muhyāmīva niśamyādya cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥc hīnāṃ pārthivasaṃghātaiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ pṛthivīm imāma prāpya rājyāni śataśo mahīṃ jitvāpi bhāratac koṭiśaḥ kurunandanaḥc nāśrame rocayad vāsaṃ vīramārgābhikāṅkṣayāa tato yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāha pāṇḍavān bharatarṣabhac pitāmahasya yad vākyaṃ tad vo rocatv iti prabhuḥa tatas tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve draupadī ca yaśasvinīc yudhiṣṭhirasya tad vākyaṃ bāḍham ity abhyapūjayan yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yānīmāni bahir vedyāṃ dānāni paricakṣatec tebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ kiṃ dānaṃ mataṃ te kurupuṃgavaa kautūhalaṃ hi paramaṃ tatra me vartate prabhoc dātāraṃ dattam anveti yad dānaṃ tat pracakṣva me bhīṣma uvācaa abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo vyasane cāpy anugrahamc yac cābhilaṣitaṃ dadyāt tṛṣitāyābhiyācatea dattaṃ manyeta yad dattvā tad dānaṃ śreṣṭham ucyatec dattaṃ dātāram anveti yad dānaṃ bharatarṣabhaa hiraṇyadānaṃ godānaṃ pṛthivīdānam eva cac etāni vai pavitrāṇi tārayanty api duṣkṛtama etāni puruṣavyāghra sādhubhyo dehi nityadāc dānāni hi naraṃ pāpān mokṣayanti na saṃśayaḥa yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāsya dayitaṃ gṛhec tat tad guṇavate deyaṃ tad evākṣayam icchatāa priyāṇi labhate loke priyadaḥ priyakṛt tathāc priyo bhavati puruṣasattamaḥa kṛśāya hrīmate tāta vṛttikṣīṇāya sīdatec apahanyāt kṣudhaṃ yas tu na tena puruṣaḥ samaḥa hriyā tu niyatān sādhūn putradāraiś ca karśitānc ayācamānān kaunteya sarvopāyair nimantrayaa āśiṣaṃ ye na deveṣu na martyeṣu ca kurvatec arhanto nityasattvasthā yathālabdhopajīvinaḥa āśīviṣasamebhyaś ca tebhyo rakṣasva bhāratac tāny uktair upajijñāsya tathā dvijavarottamāna kṛtair āvasathair nityaṃ sapreṣyaiḥ saparicchadaiḥc nimantrayethāḥ kauravya sarvakāmasukhāvahaiḥa yadi te pratigṛhṇīyuḥ śraddhāpūtaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac kāryam ity eva manvānā dhārmikāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥa vidyāsnātā vratasnātā ye vyapāśrityajīvinaḥc gūḍhasvādhyāyatapaso brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥa teṣu śuddheṣu dānteṣu svadāranirateṣu cac yat kariṣyasi kalyāṇaṃ tat tvā lokeṣu dhāsyatia yathāgnihotraṃ suhutaṃ sāyaṃ prātar dvijātināc tathā bhavati dattaṃ vai dvijebhyo tha kṛtātmanāa eṣa te vitato yajñaḥ śraddhāpūtaḥ sadakṣiṇaḥc viśiṣṭaḥ sarvayajñebhyo dadatas tāta vartatāma nivāpo dānasadṛśas tādṛśeṣu yudhiṣṭhirac nivapan pūjayaṃś caiva teṣv ānṛṇyaṃ nigacchatia ya eva no na kupyanti na lubhyanti tṛṇeṣv apic ta eva naḥ pūjyatamā ye cānye priyavādinaḥa ye no na bahu manyante na pravartanti cāparec putravat paripālyās te namas tebhyas tathābhayama ṛtvikpurohitācāryā mṛdubrahmadharā hi tec kṣatreṇāpi hi saṃsṛṣṭaṃ tejaḥ śāmyati vai dvijea asti me balavān asmi rājāsmīti yudhiṣṭhirac brāhmaṇān mā sma paryaśnīr vāsobhir aśanena caa yac chobhārthaṃ balārthaṃ vā vittam asti tavānaghac tena te brāhmaṇāḥ pūjyāḥ svadharmam anutiṣṭhatāa namaskāryās tvayā viprā vartamānā yathātathamc yathāsukhaṃ yathotsāhaṃ lalantu tvayi putravata ko hy anyaḥ suprasādānāṃ suhṛdām alpatoṣiṇāmc vṛttim arhaty upakṣeptuṃ tvad anyaḥ kurusattamaa yathā patyāśrayo dharmaḥ strīṇāṃ loke sanātanaḥc sa devaḥ sā gatir pṛthivyāṃ nāsti kaś canac tvatto pi me priyatarā brāhmaṇā bharatarṣabhaa bravīmi satyam etac ca yathāhaṃ pāṇḍunandanac tena satyena gaccheyaṃ lokān yatra sa śaṃtanuḥa paśyeyaṃ ca satāṃ lokāñ chucīn brahmapuraskṛtānc tatra me tāta gantavyam ahnāya ca cirāya caa so ham etādṛśāṃl lokān dṛṣṭvā bharatasattamac yan me kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu na tapye tena pārthiva yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yau tu syātāṃ caraṇenopapannauyau vidyayā sadṛśau janmanā cac tābhyāṃ dānaṃ katarasmai viśiṣṭamayācamānāya ca yācate ca bhīṣma uvācaa śreyo vai yācataḥ pārtha dattam āhur ayācatec arhattamo vai dhṛtimān kṛpaṇād adhṛtātmanaḥa kṣatriyo rakṣaṇadhṛtir brāhmaṇo narthanādhṛtiḥc brāhmaṇo dhṛtimān vidvān devān prīṇāti tuṣṭimāna yācñām āhur anīśasya abhihāraṃ ca bhāratac udvejayati yācan hi sadā bhūtāni dasyuvata mriyate yācamāno vai tam anu mriyate dadatc dadat saṃjīvayaty enam ātmānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraa ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmo yācate yat pradīyatec ayācataḥ sīdamānān sarvopāyair nimantrayaa yadi vai tādṛśā rāṣṭre vaseyus te dvijottamāḥc bhasmacchannān ivāgnīṃs tān budhyethās tvaṃ prayatnataḥa tapasā dīpyamānās te daheyuḥ pṛthivīm apib apūjyamānāḥ kauravya pūjārhās te tathāvidhāḥc pūjyā hi karṣakāḥa annāni prātaḥsavane niyatā brahmacāriṇaḥc brāhmaṇās tāta bhuñjānās tretāgnīn prīṇayantu tea mādhyaṃdinaṃ te savanaṃ dadatas tāta vartatāmc gā hiraṇyāni vāsāṃsi tenendraḥ prīyatāṃ tavaa tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ tat te vaiśvadevaṃ yudhiṣṭhirac yad devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca viprebhyaś ca prayacchasia ahiṃsā sarvabhūtebhyaḥ saṃvibhāgaś ca sarvaśaḥc damas tyāgo dhṛtiḥ satyaṃ bhavatv avabhṛthāya tea eṣa te vitato yajñaḥ śraddhāpūtaḥ sadakṣiṇaḥc viśiṣṭaḥ sarvayajñebhyo nityaṃ tāta pravartatāmd yat kiṃ cit pāṇḍaraṃ puṣpaṃ yat kiṃ cid anulepanamd alakṣmīparihārāya nityaṃ deyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dānaṃ yajñakriyā ceha kiṃ svit pretya mahāphalamc kasya jyāyaḥ phalaṃ proktaṃ kīdṛśebhyaḥ kathaṃ kadād nityānuṣṭhānayuktāś cet pratigṛhṇanti sādhavaḥa etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ yāthātathyena bhāratac vidvañ jijñāsamānāya dānadharmān pracakṣva mea antarvedyāṃ ca yad dattaṃ śraddhayā cānṛśaṃsyataḥc kiṃ svin niḥśreyasaṃ tāta tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa raudraṃ karma kṣatriyasya satataṃ tāta vartatec tasya vaitānikaṃ karma dānaṃ caiveha pāvanama na tu pāpakṛtāṃ rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇanti sādhavaḥa yājakā dvijasattamāḥa dhane satyapradātṝṇāṃc etasmāt kāraṇād yajñair yajed rājāptadakṣiṇaiḥa atha cet pratigṛhṇīyur dadyād aharahar nṛpaḥc śraddhām āsthāya paramāṃ pāvanaṃ hy etad uttamama brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayed dravyais tato yajñe yatavrataḥc maitrān sādhūn vedavidaḥ śīlavṛttataponvitāna yat te tena kariṣyanti kṛtaṃ tena bhaviṣyatic yajñān sādhaya sādhubhyaḥ svādvannān dakṣiṇāvataḥa iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ ca manyethā ātmānaṃ dānakarmaṇāc pūjayethā yāyajūkāṃs tavāpy aṃśo bhaved yathād vidvadbhyaḥ saṃpradānena tatrāpy aṃśo sya pūjayād yajvabhyaś cātha vidvadbhyo dattvā lokaṃ pradāpayetd pradadyāj jñānadātṝṇāṃ jñānadānāṃśabhāg bhaveta prajāvato bharethāś ca brāhmaṇān bahubhāriṇaḥc prajāvāṃs tena bhavati yathā janayitā tathāa yāvato vai sādhudharmān santaḥ saṃvartayanty utac sarve te cāpi bhartavyā narā ye bahubhāriṇaḥa samṛddhaḥ saṃprayacchasva brāhmaṇebhyo yudhiṣṭhirac dhenūr anaḍuho nnāni cchatraṃ vāsāṃsy upānahaua ājyāni yajamānebhyas tathānnādyāni bhāratac aśvavanti ca yānāni veśmāni śayanāni caa ete deyā vyuṣṭimanto laghūpāyāś ca bhāratac ajugupsāṃś ca vijñāya brāhmaṇān vṛttikarśitāna upacchannaṃ prakāśaṃ vā vṛttyā tān pratipādayac rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ śreyas tat kṣatriyān pratia evaṃ pāpair vimuktas tvaṃ pūtaḥ svargam avāpsyasic sraṃsayitvā punaḥ kośaṃ yad rāṣṭraṃ pālayiṣyasia tataś ca brahmabhūyastvam avāpsyasi dhanāni cac ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca vṛttiṃ saṃrakṣa bhārataa putravac cāpi bhṛtyān svān prajāś ca paripālayac yogakṣemaś ca te nityaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv astu bhāratad tadarthaṃ jīvitaṃ te stu mā tebhyo pratipālanamd anartho brāhmaṇasyaiṣa yad vittanicayo mahānd śriyā hy abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃvāso darpayet saṃpramohayetd brāhmaṇeṣu pramūḍheṣu dharmo vipraṇaśed dhruvamd dharmapraṇāśe bhūtānām abhāvaḥ syān na saṃśayaḥd yo rakṣibhyaḥ saṃpradāya rājā rāṣṭraṃ vilumpatid yakṣye rāṣṭrād dhanaṃ tasmād ānayadhvam iti bruvand yac cādāya tad ājñaptaṃ bhītaṃ dattaṃ sudāruṇamd yajed rājā na taṃ yajñaṃ praśaṃsanty asya sādhavaḥd apīḍitāḥ susaṃvṛddhā ye dadaty anukūlataḥd tādṛśenābhyupāyena yaṣṭavyaṃ nodyamāhṛtaiḥd yadā pariniṣicyeta nihito vai yathāvidhid tadā rājā mahāyajñair yajeta bahudakṣiṇaiḥd vṛddhabāladhanaṃ rakṣyam andhasya kṛpaṇasya cad na khātapūrvaṃ kurvīta na rudantīdhanaṃ haretd hṛtaṃ kṛpaṇavittaṃ hi rāṣṭraṃ hanti nṛpaśriyamd dadyāc ca mahato bhogān kṣudbhayaṃ praṇudet satāmd yeṣāṃ svādūni bhojyāni samavekṣyanti bālakāḥd nāśnanti vidhivat tāni kiṃ nu pāpataraṃ tataḥd yadi te tādṛśo rāṣṭre vidvān sīdet kṣudhā dvijaḥd bhrūṇahatyāṃ ca gacchethāḥ kṛtvā pāpam ivottamamd dhik tasya jīvitaṃ rājño rāṣṭre yasyāvasīdatid dvijo nyo vā manuṣyo pi śibir āha vaco yathād yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ snātakaḥ sīdati kṣudhād avṛddhim eti tad rāṣṭraṃ vindate saha rājakamd krośantyo yasya vai rāṣṭrād dhriyante tarasā striyaḥd krośatāṃ patiputrāṇāṃ mṛto sau na sa jīvatia arakṣitāraṃ hartāraṃ viloptāram adāyakamc taṃ sma rājakaliṃ hanyuḥ prajāḥ saṃbhūya nirghṛṇama ahaṃ vo rakṣitety uktvā yo na rakṣati bhūmipaḥc sa saṃhatya nihantavyaḥ śveva sonmāda āturaḥa pāpaṃ kurvanti yat kiṃ cit prajā rājñā hy arakṣitāḥc caturthaṃ tasya pāpasya rājā bhārata vindatia apy āhuḥ sarvam eveti bhūyo rdham iti niścayaḥc caturthaṃ matam asmākaṃ manoḥ śrutvānuśāsanama śubhaṃ vā yat prakurvanti prajā rājñā surakṣitāḥc caturthaṃ tasya puṇyasya rājā cāpnoti bhārataa jīvantaṃ tvānujīvantu prajāḥ sarvā yudhiṣṭhirac parjanyam iva bhūtāni mahādrumam iva dvijāḥa kuberam iva rakṣāṃsi śatakratum ivāmarāḥc jñātayas tvānujīvantu suhṛdaś ca paraṃtapa yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyam itīyaṃ śruticodanāc bahudeyāś ca rājānaḥ kiṃ svid deyam anuttamam bhīṣma uvācaa ati dānāni sarvāṇi pṛthivīdānam ucyatec acalā hy akṣayā bhūmir dogdhrī kāmān anuttamāna dogdhrī vāsāṃsi ratnāni paśūn vrīhiyavāṃs tathāc bhūmidaḥ sarvabhūteṣu śāśvatīr edhate samāḥa yāvad bhūmer āyur iha tāvad bhūmida edhatec na bhūmidānād astīha paraṃ kiṃ cid yudhiṣṭhiraa apy alpaṃ pradaduḥ pūrve pṛthivyā iti naḥ śrutamc bhūmim ete daduḥ sarve ye bhūmiṃ bhuñjate janāḥa svakarmaivopajīvanti narā iha paratra cac bhūmir bhūtir mahādevī dātāraṃ kurute priyama ya etāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād akṣayāṃ pṛthivīpatiḥc punar naratvaṃ saṃprāpya bhavet sa pṛthivīpatiḥa yathā dānaṃ tathā bhoga iti dharmeṣu niścayaḥc saṃgrāme vā tanuṃ jahyād dadyād vā pṛthivīm imāma ity etāṃ kṣatrabandhūnāṃ vadanti param āśiṣamc punāti dattā pṛthivī dātāram iti śuśrumaa api pāpasamācāraṃ brahmaghnam api vānṛtamc saiva pāpaṃ pāvayati saiva pāpāt pramocayeta api pāpakṛtāṃ rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇanti sādhavaḥc pṛthivīṃ nānyad icchanti pāvanaṃ jananī yathāa nāmāsyāḥ priyadatteti guhyaṃ devyāḥ sanātanamc dānaṃ vāpy atha vā jñānaṃ nāmno syāḥ paramaṃ priyamd ya etāṃ viduṣe dadyāt pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpatiḥd pṛthivyām etad iṣṭaṃ sa rājyād rājyam iti vrajetd punaś ca jananaṃ prāpya rājaiva syān na saṃśayaḥe tasmāt prāpyaiva pṛthivīṃ dadyād viprāya pārthivaḥa nābhūmipatinā bhūmir adhiṣṭheyā kathaṃ canac na vā pātreṇa vā gūhed antardhānena vā carete ye cānye bhūmim iccheyuḥ kuryur evam asaṃśayama yaḥ sādhor bhūmim ādatte na bhūmiṃ vindate tu saḥc bhūmiṃ tu dattvā sādhubhyo vindate bhūmim eva hie pretyeha ca sa dharmātmā saṃprāpnoti mahad yaśaḥf ekāhārakarīṃ dattvā ṣaṣṭisāhasram ūrdhvagaḥf tāvaty āharaṇe hṛtvā narakaṃ dviguṇottarama yasya viprānuśāsanti sādhor bhūmiṃ sadaiva hic na tasya śatravo rājan praśāsanti vasuṃdharāma yat kiṃ cit puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ kurute vṛttikarśitaḥc api gocarmamātreṇa bhūmidānena pūyated daśahastena vaṃśena daśavaṃśān samantataḥd pañcahastādhikaṃ dadyād etad gocarma ucyatea ye pi saṃkīrṇakarmāṇo rājāno raudrakarmiṇaḥc tebhyaḥ pavitram ākhyeyaṃ bhūmidānam anuttamama alpāntaram idaṃ śaśvat purāṇā menire janāḥc yo yajed aśvamedhena dadyād vā sādhave mahīma api cet sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā śaṅkerann api paṇḍitāḥc aśakyam ekam evaitad bhūmidānam anuttamama suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vastraṃ maṇimuktāvasūni cac sarvam etan mahāprājña dadāti vasudhāṃ dadata tapo yajñaḥ śrutaṃ śīlam alobhaḥ satyasaṃdhatāc gurudaivatapūjā ca nātivartanti bhūmidama bhartur niḥśreyase yuktās tyaktātmāno raṇe hatāḥc brahmalokagatāḥ siddhā nātikrāmanti bhūmidama yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa svaputraṃ bharate sadāc anugṛhṇāti dātāraṃ tathā sarvarasair mahīa mṛtyor vai kiṃkaro daṇḍas tāpo vahneḥ sudāruṇaḥc ghorāś ca vāruṇāḥ pāśā nopasarpanti bhūmidama pitṝṃś ca pitṛlokasthān devaloke ca devatāḥc saṃtarpayati śāntātmā yo dadāti vasuṃdharāma kṛśāya mriyamāṇāya vṛttimlānāya sīdatec bhūmiṃ vṛttikarīṃ dattvā satrī bhavati mānavaḥa yathā dhāvati gaur vatsaṃ kṣīram abhyutsṛjanty utac evam eva mahābhāga bhūmir bhavati bhūmidama halakṛṣṭāṃ mahīṃ dattvā sabījāṃ saphalām apic udīrṇaṃ vāpi śaraṇaṃ tathā bhavati kāmadaḥa brāhmaṇaṃ vṛttasaṃpannam āhitāgniṃ śucivratamc naraḥ pratigrāhya mahīṃ na yāti yamasādanama yathā candramaso vṛddhir ahany ahani jāyatec tathā bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye vivardhatea atra gāthā bhūmigītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥc yāḥ śrutvā jāmadagnyena dattā bhūḥ kāśyapāya vaia mām evādatta māṃ datta māṃ dattvā mām avāpsyathac asmiṃl loke pare caiva tataś cājanane punaḥa ya imāṃ vyāhṛtiṃ veda brāhmaṇo brahmasaṃśritaḥc śrāddhasya hūyamānasya brahmabhūyaṃ sa gacchatia kṛtyānām abhiśastānāṃ duriṣṭaśamanaṃ mahatc prāyaścittam ahaṃ kṛtvā punāty ubhayato daśaa punāti ya idaṃ veda veda cāhaṃ tathaiva cac prakṛtiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhūmir vai śāśvatī matāa abhiṣicyaiva nṛpatiṃ śrāvayed imam āgamamc yathā śrutvā mahīṃ dadyān nādadyāt sādhutaś ca tāma so yaṃ kṛtsno brāhmaṇārtho rājārthaś cāpy asaṃśayamc rājā hi dharmakuśalaḥ prathamaṃ bhūtilakṣaṇama atha yeṣām adharmajño rājā bhavati nāstikaḥc na te sukhaṃ prabudhyante na sukhaṃ prasvapanti caa sadā bhavanti codvignās tasya duścaritair narāḥc yogakṣemā hi bahavo rāṣṭraṃ nāsyāviśanti tata atha yeṣāṃ punaḥ prājño rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥc sukhaṃ te pratibudhyante susukhaṃ prasvapanti caa tasya rājñaḥ śubhair āryaiḥ karmabhir nirvṛtāḥ prajāḥc yogakṣemeṇa vṛṣṭyā ca vivardhante svakarmabhiḥa sa kulīnaḥ sa puruṣaḥ sa bandhuḥ sa ca puṇyakṛtc sa dātā sa ca vikrānto yo dadāti vasuṃdharāma ādityā iva dīpyante tejasā bhuvi mānavāḥc dadanti vasudhāṃ sphītāṃ ye vedaviduṣi dvijea yathā bījāni rohanti prakīrṇāni mahītalec tathā kāmāḥ prarohanti bhūmidānasamārjitāḥa ādityo varuṇo viṣṇur brahmā somo hutāśanaḥc śūlapāṇiś ca bhagavān pratinandanti bhūmidama bhūmau jāyanti puruṣā bhūmau niṣṭhāṃ vrajanti cac caturvidho hi loko yaṃ yo bhūmidāḥa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhiraa iṣṭvā kratuśatenātha mahatā dakṣiṇāvatāc maghavā vāgvidāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ papracchedaṃ bṛhaspatima bhagavan kena dānena svargataḥ sukham edhatec yad akṣayaṃ mahārghaṃ ca tad brūhi vadatāṃ varaa ity uktaḥ sa surendreṇa tato devapurohitaḥc bṛhaspatir mahātejāḥ pratyuvāca śatakratuma suvarṇadānaṃ godānaṃ bhūmidama bhartur niḥśreyase yuktās tyaktātmāno raṇe hatāḥc brahmalokagatāḥ śūrā nātikrāmanti bhūmidama pañca pūrvādipuruṣāḥ ṣaṭ ca ye vasudhāṃ gatāḥc ekādaśa dadad bhūmiṃ paritrātīha mānavaḥa ratnopakīrṇāṃ vasudhāṃ yo dadāti puraṃdarac sa muktaḥ sarvakaluṣaiḥ svargaloke mahīyatea mahīṃ sphītāṃ dadad rājā sarvakāmaguṇānvitāmc rājādhirājo bhavati tad dhi dānam anuttamama sarvakāmasamāyuktāṃ kathayantīha yāvad dharati gaur iyama puṇyām ṛddharasāṃ bhūmiṃ yo dadāti puraṃdarac na tasya lokāḥ kṣīyante bhūmidānaguṇārjitāḥa sarvathā pārthiveneha satataṃ bhūtim icchatāc bhūr deyā vidhivac chakra kṛśabhṛtyaṃ priyātithimc ye bharanti dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ nopasarpanti te yamama brāhmaṇeṣv ṛṇabhūtaṃ syāt pārthivasya puraṃdarac itareṣāṃ tu varṇānāṃ tārayet kṛśadurbalāna nācchindyāt sparśitāṃ bhūmiṃ modate ca sukhaṃ svarge devagandharvapūjitaḥc yo dadāti mahīṃ samyag vidhineha dvijātayea śatam apsarasaś caiva divyamālyavibhūṣitāḥc upatiṣṭhanti devendra sadā bhūmipradaṃ naramc brahmaloke dharāpradamc upatiṣṭhanti bhūtānia śaṅkhaṃ bhadrāsanaṃ chatraṃ varāśvā varavāraṇāḥc bhūmipradānāt puṣpāṇi hiraṇyanicayās tathāa ājñā sadāpratihatā jayaśabdo bhavaty athac bhūmidānasya puṣpāṇi phalaṃ svargaḥ puraṃdaraa hiraṇyapuṣpāś cauṣadhyaḥ kuśakāñcanaśāḍvalāḥc amṛtaprasavāṃ bhūmiṃ prāpnoti puruṣo dadata nāsti bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥc nāsti satyasamo dharmo nāsti dānasamo nidhiḥa etad āṅgirasāc chrutvā vāsavo vasudhām imāmc vasuratnasamākīrṇāṃ dadāv āṅgirase tadāa ya imaṃ śrāvayec chrāddhe bhūmidānasya saṃstavamc na tasya rakṣasāṃ bhāgo nāsurāṇāṃ bhavaty utaa akṣayaṃ ca bhaved dattaṃ pitṛbhyas tan na saṃśayaḥc tasmāc chrāddheṣv idaṃ vipro bhuñjataḥ śrāvayed dvijāna ity etat sarvadānānāṃ śreṣṭham uktaṃ tavānaghac mayā bharataśārdūla kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kāni dānāni loke smin dātukāmo mahīpatiḥc guṇādhikebhyo viprebhyo dadyād bharatasattamaa kena tuṣyanti te sadyas tuṣṭāḥ kiṃ pradiśanty utac śaṃsa me tan mahābāho phalaṃ puṇyakṛtaṃ mahata dattaṃ kiṃ phalavad rājann iha loke paratra cac bhavataḥ śrotum icchāmi tan me vistarato vada bhīṣma uvācaa imam arthaṃ purā pṛṣṭo nārado devadarśanaḥc yad uktavān asau tan me gadataḥ śṛṇu bhārata nārada uvācaa annam eva praśaṃsanti devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purāc lokatantraṃ hi yajñāś ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitama annena sadṛśaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyatic tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātum icchanti mānavāḥa annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke prāṇāś cānne pratiṣṭhitāḥc annena dhāryate sarvaṃ viśvaṃ jagad idaṃ prabhoa annād gṛhasthā loke smin bhikṣavas tata eva cac annāt prabhavati prāṇaḥ pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥa kuṭumbaṃ pīḍayitvāpi brāhmaṇāya mahātmanec dātavyaṃ bhikṣave cānnam ātmano bhūtim icchatāa brāhmaṇāyābhirūpāya yo dadyād annam arthinec nidadhāti nidhiṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pāralaukikam ātmanaḥa śrāntam adhvani vartantaṃ vṛddham arham upasthitamc arcayed bhūtim anvicchan gṛhastho gṛham āgatama krodham utpatitaṃ hitvā suśīlo vītamatsaraḥc annadaḥ prāpnute rājan divi ceha ca yat sukhama nāvamanyed abhigataṃ na praṇudyāt kathaṃ canac api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṃ vipraṇaśyatia yo dadyād aparikliṣṭam annam adhvani vartatec śrāntāyādṛṣṭapūrvāya sa mahad dharmam āpnuyāta pitṝn devān ṛṣīn viprān atithīṃś ca janādhipac yo naraḥ prīṇayaty annais tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahata kṛtvāpi pāpakaṃ karma yo dadyād annam arthinec brāhmaṇāya viśeṣeṇa na sa pāpena yujyatea brāhmaṇeṣv akṣayaṃ dānam annaṃ śūdre mahāphalamc annadānaṃ ca śūdre ca brāhmaṇe ca viśiṣyatea na pṛcched gotracaraṇaṃ svādhyāyaṃ deśam eva vāc bhikṣito brāhmaṇeneha janma vānnaṃ prayācitaḥd āśayābhyāgataṃ vipraṃ bhojanārtham upasthitama annadasyānnavṛkṣāś ca sarvakāmaphalānvitāḥc bhavantīhātha vāmutra nṛpate nātra saṃśayaḥa āśaṃsante hi pitaraḥ suvṛṣṭim iva karṣakāḥc asmākam api putro vā pautro vānnaṃ pradāsyatia brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ svayaṃ dehīti yācatec akāmo vā sakāmo vā dattvā puṇyam avāpnuyāta brāhmaṇaḥ sarvabhūtānām atithiḥ prasṛtāgrabhukc viprā yam abhigacchanti bhikṣamāṇā gṛhaṃ sadāa satkṛtāś ca nivartante tad atīva pravardhatec mahābhoge kule janma pretya prāpnoti bhārataa dattvā tv annaṃ naro loke tathā sthānam anuttamamc mṛṣṭamṛṣṭānnadāyī tu svarge vasati satkṛtaḥa annaṃ prāṇā narāṇāṃ hi sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitamc annadaḥ paśumān putrī dhanavān bhogavān apia prāṇavāṃś cāpi bhavati rūpavāṃś ca tathā nṛpac annadaḥ prāṇado loke sarvadaḥ procyate tu saḥa annaṃ hi dattvātithaye brāhmaṇāya yathāvidhic pradātā sukham āpnoti devaiś cāpy abhipūjyatea brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtaṃ kṣetraṃ carati pādavatc upyate tatra yad bījaṃ tad dhi puṇyaphalaṃ mahata pratyakṣaṃ prītijananaṃ bhoktṛdātror bhavaty utac sarvāṇy anyāni dānāni parokṣaphalavanty utaa annād dhi prasavaṃ viddhi ratim annād dhi bhāratac dharmārthāv annato viddhi roganāśaṃ tathānnataḥa annaṃ hy amṛtam ity āha purākalpe prajāpatiḥc annaṃ bhuvaṃ divaṃ khaṃ ca sarvam anne pratiṣṭhitama annapraṇāśe bhidyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥc balaṃ balavato pīha praṇaśyaty annahānitaḥa āvāhāś ca vivāhāś ca yajñāś cānnam ṛte tathāc na vartante naraśreṣṭha brahma cātra pralīyatea annataḥ sarvam etad dhi yat kiṃ cit sthāṇu jaṅgamamc triṣu lokeṣu dharmārtham annaṃ deyam ato budhaiḥa annadasya manuṣyasya balam ojo yaśaḥ sukhamc kīrtiś ca vardhate śaśvat triṣu lokeṣu pārthivaa megheṣv ambhaḥ saṃnidhatte prāṇānāṃ pavanaḥ śivaḥc tac ca meghagataṃ vāri śakro varṣati bhārataa ādatte ca rasaṃ bhaumam ādityaḥ svagabhastibhiḥc vāyur ādityatas tāṃś ca rasān devaḥ prajāpatiḥa tad yadā meghato vāri patitaṃ bhavati kṣitauc tadā vasumatī devī snigdhā bhavati bhārataa tataḥ sasyāni rohanti yena vartayate jagatc māṃsamedosthiśukrāṇāṃ prādurbhāvas tataḥ punaḥa saṃbhavanti tataḥ śukrāt prāṇinaḥ pṛthivīpatec agnīṣomau hi tac chukraṃ prajanaḥ puṣyataś ca haa evam annaṃ ca sūryaś ca pavanaḥ śukram eva cac eka eva smṛto rāśir yato bhūtāni jajñirea prāṇān dadāti bhūtānāṃ tejaś ca bharatarṣabhac gṛham abhyāgatāyāśu yo dadyād annam arthine bhīṣma uvācaa nāradenaivam ukto ham adām annaṃ sadā nṛpac anasūyus tvam apy annaṃ tasmād dehi gatajvaraḥa dattvānnaṃ vidhivad rājan viprebhyas tvam api prabhoc yathāvad anurūpebhyas tataḥ svargam avāpsyasia annadānāṃ hi ye lokās tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇu narādhipac bhavanāni prakāśante divi teṣāṃ mahātmanāme nānāsaṃsthānarūpāṇi nānāstambhānvitāni caa candramaṇḍalaśubhrāṇi kiṅkiṇījālavanti cac taruṇādityavarṇāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi caa anekaśatabhaumāni sāntarjalavanāni cac vaiḍūryārkaprakāśāni raupyarukmamayāni caa sarvakāmaphalāś cāpi vṛkṣā bhavanasaṃsthitāḥc vāpyo vīthyaḥ sabhāḥ kūpā dīrghikāś caiva sarvaśaḥa ghoṣavanti ca yānāni yuktāny atha sahasraśaḥc bhakṣyabhojyamayāḥ śailā vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni caa kṣīraṃ sravantyaḥ saritas tathā caivānnaparvatāḥc prāsādāḥ pāṇḍurābhrābhāḥ śayyāś ca kanakojjvalāḥe tān annadāḥ prapadyante tasmād annaprado bhavaa ete lokāḥ puṇyakṛtām annadānāṃ mahātmanāmc tasmād annaṃ viśeṣeṇa dātavyaṃ mānavair bhuvi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śrutaṃ me bhavato vākyam annadānasya yo vidhiḥc nakṣatrayogasyedānīṃ dānakalpaṃ bravīhi me bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc devakyāś caiva saṃvādaṃ devarṣer nāradasya caa dvārakām anusaṃprāptaṃ nāradaṃ devadarśanamc papracchainaṃ tataḥ praśnaṃ devakī dharmadarśinīa tasyāḥ saṃpṛcchamānāyā devarṣir nāradas tadāc ācaṣṭa vidhivat sarvaṃ yat tac chṛṇu viśāṃ pate nārada uvācaa kṛttikāsu mahābhāge pāyasena sasarpiṣāc saṃtarpya brāhmaṇān sādhūṃl lokān āpnoty anuttamāna rohiṇyāṃ prathitair māṃsair māṣair annena sarpiṣāc payo nupānaṃ dātavyam ānṛṇyārthaṃ dvijātayea dogdhrīṃ dattvā savatsāṃ tu nakṣatre somadaivatec gacchanti mānuṣāl lokāt svargalokam anuttamama ārdrāyāṃ kṛsaraṃ dattvā tailamiśram upoṣitaḥc naras tarati durgāṇi kṣuradhārāṃś ca parvatāna apūpān punarvasau dattvā tathaivānnāni śobhanec yaśasvī rūpasaṃpanno bahvanne jāyate kulea puṣye tu kanakaṃ dattvā kṛtaṃ cākṛtam eva cac anālokeṣu lokeṣu somavat sa virājatea āśleṣāyāṃ tu yo rūpyam ṛṣabhaṃ vā prayacchatic sa sarvabhayanirmuktaḥ śātravān adhitiṣṭhatia maghāsu tilapūrṇāni vardhamānāni mānavaḥb tāmrāṇi tilapātrāṇi triṃśatpalamitāni tuc pradāya putrapaśumān iha pretya ca modatea phalgunīpūrvasamaye brāhmaṇānām upoṣitaḥc bhakṣān phāṇitasaṃyuktān dattvā saubhāgyam ṛcchatia ghṛtakṣīrasamāyuktaṃ vidhivat ṣaṣṭikaudanamc uttarāviṣaye dattvā svargaloke mahīyatea yad yat pradīyate dānam uttarāviṣaye naraiḥc mahāphalam anantaṃ ca bhavatīti viniścayaḥa haste hastirathaṃ dattvā caturyuktam upoṣitaḥc prāpnoti paramāṃl lokān puṇyakāmasamanvitāna citrāyām ṛṣabhaṃ dattvā puṇyān gandhāṃś ca bhāratac caraty apsarasāṃ loke ramate nandane tathāa svātāv atha dhanaṃ dattvā yad iṣṭatamam ātmanaḥc prāpnoti lokān sa śubhān iha caiva mahad yaśaḥa viśākhāyām anaḍvāhaṃ dhenuṃ dattvā ca dugdhadāmc saprāsaṅgaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ sadhānyaṃ vastrasaṃyutama pitṝn devāṃś ca prīṇāti pretya cānantyam aśnutec na ca durgāṇy avāpnoti svargalokaṃ ca gacchatia dattvā yathoktaṃ viprebhyo vṛttim iṣṭāṃ sa vindatic narakādīṃś ca saṃkleśān nāpnotīti viniścayaḥa anurādhāsu prāvāraṃ vastrāntaram upoṣitaḥc dattvā yugaśataṃ cāpi naraḥ svarge mahīyatea kālaśākaṃ tu viprebhyo dattvā martyaḥ samūlakamc jyeṣṭhāyām ṛddhim iṣṭāṃ vai gatim iṣṭāṃ ca vindatia mūle mūlaphalaṃ dattvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥc pitṝn prīṇayate cāpi gatim iṣṭāṃ ca gacchatia atha pūrvāsv aṣāḍhāsu dadhipātrāṇy upoṣitaḥc kulavṛttopasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe vedapāragee pradāya jāyate pretya kule subahugokulea udamanthaṃ sasarpiṣkaṃ prabhūtamadhuphāṇitamc dattvottarāsv aṣāḍhāsu sarvakāmān avāpnuyāta dugdhaṃ tv abhijite yoge dattvā madhughṛtāplutamc dharmanityo manīṣibhyaḥ svargaloke mahīyatea śravaṇe kambalaṃ dattvā vastrāntaritam eva cac śvetena yāti yānena sarvalokān asaṃvṛtāna goprayuktaṃ dhaniṣṭhāsu yānaṃ dattvā samāhitaḥc vastraraśmidharaṃ sadyaḥ pretya rājyaṃ prapadyatea gandhāñ śatabhiṣagyoge dattvā sāgurucandanānc prāpnoty apsarasāṃ lokān pretya gandhāṃś ca śāśvatāna pūrvabhādrapadāyoge rājamāṣān pradāya tuc sarvabhakṣaphalopetaḥ sa vai pretya sukhī bhaveta aurabhram uttarāyoge yas tu māṃsaṃ prayacchatic sa pitṝn prīṇayati vai pretya cānantyam aśnutea kāṃsyopadohanāṃ dhenuṃ revatyāṃ yaḥ prayacchatic sā pretya kāmān ādāya dātāram upatiṣṭhatia ratham aśvasamāyuktaṃ dattvāśvinyāṃ narottamaḥc hastyaśvarathasaṃpanne varcasvī jāyate kulea bharaṇīṣu dvijātibhyas tiladhenuṃ pradāya vaic gāḥ suprabhūtāḥ prāpnoti naraḥ pretya yaśas tathā bhīṣma uvācaa ity eṣa lakṣaṇoddeśaḥ prokto nakṣatrayogataḥc devakyā nāradeneha sā snuṣābhyo bravīd idam bhīṣma uvācaa sarvān kāmān prayacchanti ye prayacchanti kāñcanamc ity evaṃ bhagavān atriḥ pitāmahasuto bravīta pavitraṃ śucy athāyuṣyaṃ pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ ca tatc suvarṇaṃ manujendreṇa hariścandreṇa kīrtitama pānīyadānaṃ paramaṃ dānānāṃ manur abravītc tasmād vāpīś ca kūpāṃś ca taḍāgāni ca khānayeta ardhaṃ pāpasya harati puruṣasyeha karmaṇaḥc kūpaḥ pravṛttapānīyaḥ supravṛttaś ca nityaśaḥa sarvaṃ tārayate vaṃśaṃ yasya khāte jalāśayec gāvaḥ pibanti viprāś ca sādhavaś ca narāḥ sadāa nidāghakāle pānīyaṃ yasya tiṣṭhaty avāritamc sa durgaṃ viṣamaṃ kṛcchraṃ na kadā cid avāpnutea bṛhaspater bhagavataḥ pūṣṇaś caiva bhagasya cac aśvinoś caiva vahneś ca prītir bhavati sarpiṣāa paramaṃ bheṣajaṃ hy etad yajñānām etad uttamamc rasānām uttamaṃ caitat phalānāṃ caitad uttamama phalakāmo yaśaskāmaḥ puṣṭikāmaś ca nityadāc ghṛtaṃ dadyād dvijātibhyaḥ puruṣaḥ śucir ātmavāna ghṛtaṃ māse āśvayuji viprebhyo yaḥ prayacchatic tasmai prayacchato rūpaṃ prītau devāv ihāśvinaua pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ dvijebhyo yaḥ prayacchatic gṛhaṃ tasya na rakṣāṃsi dharṣayanti kadā canaa pipāsayā na mriyate sopacchandaś ca dṛśyatec na prāpnuyāc ca vyasanaṃ karakān yaḥ prayacchatia prayato brāhmaṇāgrebhyaḥ śraddhayā parayā yutaḥc upasparśanaṣaḍbhāgaṃ labhate puruṣaḥ sadāa yaḥ sādhanārthaṃ kāṣṭhāni brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchatic pratāpārthaṃ ca rājendra vṛttavadbhyaḥ sadā naraḥa sidhyanty arthāḥ sadā tasya kāryāṇi vividhāni cac upary upari śatrūṇāṃ vapuṣā dīpyate ca saḥa bhagavāṃś cāsya suprīto vahnir bhavati nityaśaḥc na taṃ tyajante paśavaḥ saṃgrāme ca jayaty apia putrāñ chriyaṃ ca labhate yaś chatraṃ saṃprayacchatic cakṣurvyādhiṃ na labhate yajñabhāgam athāśnutea nidāghakāle varṣe vā yaś chatraṃ saṃprayacchatic nāsya kaś cin manodāhaḥ kadā cid api jāyatee kṛcchrāt sa viṣamāc caiva vipra mokṣam avāpnutea pradānaṃ sarvadānānāṃ śakaṭasya viśiṣyatec evam āha mahābhāgaḥ śāṇḍilyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dahyamānāya viprāya yaḥ prayacchaty upānahauc yat phalaṃ tasya bhavati tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa upānahau prayacched yo brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥc mardate kaṇṭakān sarvān viṣamān nistaraty apie sa śatrūṇām upari ca saṃtiṣṭhati yudhiṣṭhiraa yānaṃ cāśvatarīyuktaṃ tasya śubhraṃ viśāṃ patec upatiṣṭhati kaunteya rūpyakāñcanabhūṣaṇame śakaṭaṃ damyasaṃyuktaṃ dattaṃ bhavati caiva hi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yat phalaṃ tiladāne ca bhūmidāne ca kīrtitamc gopradāne nnadāne ca bhūyas tad brūhi kaurava bhīṣma uvācaa śṛṇuṣva mama kaunteya tiladānasya yat phalamc niśamya ca yathānyāyaṃ prayaccha kurusattamaa pitṝṇāṃ prathamaṃ bhojyaṃ tilāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvāc tiladānena vai tasmāt pitṛpakṣaḥ pramodatea māghamāse tilān yas tu brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchatic sarvasattvasamākīrṇaṃ narakaṃ sa na paśyatia sarvakāmaiḥ sa yajate yas tilair yajate pitṝnc na cākāmena dātavyaṃ tilaśrāddhaṃ kathaṃ canaa maharṣeḥ kaśyapasyaite gātrebhyaḥ prasṛtās tilāḥc tato divyaṃ gatā bhāvaṃ pradāneṣu tilāḥ prabhoa pauṣṭikā rūpadāś caiva tathā pāpavināśanāḥc tasmāt sarvapradānebhyas tiladānaṃ viśiṣyatea āpastambaś ca medhāvī śaṅkhaś ca likhitas tathāc maharṣir gautamaś cāpi tiladānair divaṃ gatāḥa tilahomaparā viprāḥ sarve saṃyatamaithunāḥc samā gavyena haviṣā pravṛttiṣu ca saṃsthitāḥa sarveṣām eva dānānāṃ tiladānaṃ paraṃ smṛtamc akṣayaṃ sarvadānānāṃ tiladānam ihocyatea utpanne ca purā havye kuśikarṣiḥ paraṃtapac tilair agnitrayaṃ hutvā prāptavān gatim uttamāma iti proktaṃ kuruśreṣṭha tiladānam anuttamamc vidhānaṃ yena vidhinā tilānām iha śasyatea ata ūrdhvaṃ nibodhedaṃ devānāṃ yaṣṭum icchatāmc samāgamaṃ mahārāja brahmaṇā vai svayaṃbhuvāa devāḥ sametya brahmāṇaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ yiyakṣavaḥc śubhaṃ deśam ayācanta yajema iti pārthiva devā ūcuḥa bhagavaṃs tvaṃ prabhur bhūmeḥ sarvasya tridivasya cac yajemahi mahābhāga yajñaṃ bhavadanujñayāe nānanujñātabhūmir hi yajñasya phalam aśnutea tvaṃ hi sarvasya jagataḥ sthāvarasya carasya cac prabhur bhavasi tasmāt tvaṃ samanujñātum arhasi brahmovācaa dadāmi medinībhāgaṃ bhavadbhyo haṃ surarṣabhāḥc yasmin deśe kariṣyadhvaṃ yajñaṃ kāśyapanandanāḥ devā ūcuḥa bhagavan kṛtakāmāḥ smo yakṣyāmas tv āptadakṣiṇaiḥc imaṃ tu deśaṃ munayaḥ paryupāsanta nityadā bhīṣma uvācaa tato gastyaś ca kaṇvaś ca bhṛgur atrir vṛṣākapiḥc asito devalaś caiva devayajñam upāgamana tato devā mahātmāna ījire yajñam acyutac tathā samāpayām āsur yathākālaṃ surarṣabhāḥa ta iṣṭayajñās tridaśā himavaty acalottamec ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ kratos tasya bhūmidānaṃ pracakrirea prādeśamātraṃ bhūmes tu yo dadyād anupaskṛtamc na sīdati sa kṛcchreṣu na ca durgāṇy avāpnutea śītavātātapasahāṃ gṛhabhūmiṃ susaṃskṛtāmc pradāya suralokasthaḥ puṇyānte pi na cālyatea mudito vasate prājñaḥ śakreṇa saha pārthivac pratiśrayapradātā ca so pi svarge mahīyatea adhyāpakakule jātaḥ śrotriyo niyatendriyaḥc gṛhe yasya vaset tuṣṭaḥ pradhānaṃ lokam aśnutea tathā gavārthe śaraṇaṃ śītavarṣasahaṃ mahatc āsaptamaṃ tārayati kulaṃ bharatasattamaa kṣetrabhūmiṃ dadal loke putra śriyam avāpnuyātc ratnabhūmiṃ pradattvā tu kulavaṃśaṃ vivardhayeta na coṣarāṃ na nirdagdhāṃ mahīṃ dadyāt kathaṃ canac na śmaśānaparītāṃ ca na ca pāpaniṣevitāma pārakye bhūmideśe tu pitṝṇāṃ nirvapet tu yaḥc tad bhūmisvāmipitṛbhiḥ śrāddhakarma vihanyatea tasmāt krītvā mahīṃ dadyāt svalpām api vicakṣaṇaḥc piṇḍaḥ pitṛbhyo datto vai tasyāṃ bhavati śāśvataḥa aṭavīparvatāś caiva nadītīrthāni yāni cac sarvāṇy asvāmikāny āhur na hi tatra parigrahaḥa ity etad bhūmidānasya phalam uktaṃ viśāṃ patec ataḥ paraṃ tu godānaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi te naghaa gāvo dhikās tapasvibhyo yasmāt sarvebhya eva cac tasmān maheśvaro devas tapas tābhiḥ samāsthitaḥa brahmaloke vasanty etāḥ somena saha bhāratac āsāṃ brahmarṣayaḥ siddhāḥ prārthayanti parāṃ gatimd tāṃ prāpnuvanti gāṃ dattvā vimuktāḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥa payasā haviṣā dadhnā śakṛtāpy atha carmaṇāc asthibhiś copakurvanti śṛṅgair vālaiś ca bhārataa nāsāṃ śītātapau syātāṃ sadaitāḥ karma kurvatec na varṣaṃ viṣamaṃ vāpi duḥkham āsāṃ bhavaty utaa brāhmaṇaiḥ sahitā yānti tasmāt parataraṃ padamc ekaṃ gobrāhmaṇaṃ tasmāt pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥa rantidevasya yajñe tāḥ paśutvenopakalpitāḥc tataś carmaṇvatī rājan gocarmabhyaḥ pravartitāa paśutvāc ca vinirmuktāḥ pradānāyopakalpitāḥc tā imā vipramukhyebhyo yo dadāti mahīpatee nistared āpadaṃ kṛcchrāṃ viṣamastho pi pārthivaa gavāṃ sahasradaḥ pretya narakaṃ na prapaśyatic sarvatra vijayaṃ cāpi labhate manujādhipaa amṛtaṃ vai gavāṃ kṣīram ity āha tridaśādhipaḥc tasmād dadāti yo dhenum amṛtaṃ sa prayacchatia agnīnām avyayaṃ hy etad dhaumyaṃ vedavido viduḥc tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ sa haumyaṃ saṃprayacchatia svargo vai mūrtimān eṣa vṛṣabhaṃ yo gavāṃ patimc vipre guṇayute dadyāt sa vai svarge mahīyatea prāṇā vai prāṇinām ete procyante bharatarṣabhac tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ prāṇān vai sa prayacchatia gāvaḥ śaraṇyā bhūtānām iti vedavido viduḥc tasmād dadāti yo dhenuṃ śaraṇaṃ saṃprayacchatia na vadhārthaṃ pradātavyā na kīnāśe na nāstikec gojīvine na dātavyā tathā gauḥ puruṣarṣabhad gorasānāṃ na vikretur apañcayajanasya caa dadāti tādṛśānāṃ vai naro gāḥ pāpakarmaṇāmc akṣayaṃ narakaṃ yātīty evam āhur manīṣiṇaḥa na kṛśāṃ pāpavatsāṃ vā vandhyāṃ rogānvitāṃ tathāc na vyaṅgāṃ na pariśrāntāṃ dadyād gāṃ brāhmaṇāya vaia daśagosahasradaḥ samyak śakreṇa saha modatec akṣayāṃl labhate lokān naraḥ śatasahasradaḥa ity etad gopradānaṃ ca tiladānaṃ ca kīrtitamc tathā bhūmipradānaṃ ca śṛṇuṣvānne ca bhārataa annadānaṃ pradhānaṃ hi kaunteya paricakṣatec annasya hi pradānena rantidevo divaṃ gataḥa śrāntāya kṣudhitāyānnaṃ yaḥ prayacchati bhūmipac svāyaṃbhuvaṃ mahābhāgaṃ sa paśyati narādhipaa na hiraṇyair na vāsobhir nāśvadānena bhāratac prāpnuvanti narāḥ śreyo yathehānnapradāḥ prabhoa annaṃ vai paramaṃ dravyam annaṃ śrīś ca parā matāc annāt prāṇaḥ prabhavati tejo vīryaṃ balaṃ tathāa sadbhyo dadāti yaś cānnaṃ sadaikāgramanā naraḥc na sa durgāṇy avāpnotīty evam āha parāśaraḥa arcayitvā yathānyāyaṃ devebhyo nnaṃ nivedayetc yadanno hi naro rājaṃs tadannās tasya devatāḥa kaumudyāṃ śuklapakṣe tu yo nnadānaṃ karoty utac sa saṃtarati durgāṇi pretya cānantyam aśnutea abhuktvātithaye cānnaṃ prayacched yaḥ samāhitaḥc sa vai brahmavidāṃ lokān prāpnuyād bharatarṣabhaa sukṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāptaś cānnadaḥ puruṣas taretc pāpaṃ tarati caiveha duṣkṛtaṃ cāpakarṣatia ity etad annadānasya tiladānasya caiva hac bhūmidānasya ca phalaṃ godānasya ca kīrtitam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śrutaṃ dānaphalaṃ tāta yat tvayā parikīrtitamc annaṃ tu te viśeṣeṇa praśastam iha bhārataa pānīyadānaṃ paramaṃ kathaṃ ceha mahāphalamc ity etac chrotum icchāmi vistareṇa pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa hanta te vartayiṣyāmi yathāvad bharatarṣabhac gadatas tan mamādyeha śṛṇu satyaparākramae pānīyadānāt prabhṛti sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi te naghaa yad annaṃ yac ca pānīyaṃ saṃpradāyāśnute naraḥc na tasmāt paramaṃ dānaṃ kiṃ cid astīti me matiḥa annāt prāṇabhṛtas tāta pravartante hi sarvaśaḥc tasmād annaṃ paraṃ loke sarvadāneṣu kathyatea annād balaṃ ca tejaś ca prāṇināṃ vardhate sadāc annadānam atas tasmāc chreṣṭham āha prajāpatiḥa sāvitryā hy api kaunteya śrutaṃ te vacanaṃ śubhamc yataś caitad yathā caitad devasatre mahāmatea anne datte nareṇeha prāṇā dattā bhavanty utac prāṇadānād dhi paramaṃ na dānam iha vidyatea śrutaṃ hi te mahābāho lomaśasyāpi tad vacaḥc prāṇān dattvā kapotāya yat prāptaṃ śibinā purāa tāṃ gatiṃ labhate dattvā dvijasyānnaṃ viśāṃ patec gatiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ gacchanti prāṇadā iti naḥ śrutama annaṃ cāpi prabhavati pānīyāt kurusattamac nīrajātena hi vinā na kiṃ cit saṃpravartatea nīrajātaś ca bhagavān somo grahagaṇeśvaraḥc amṛtaṃ ca sudhā caiva svāhā caiva vaṣaṭ tathāa annauṣadhyo mahārāja vīrudhaś ca jalodbhavāḥc yataḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ prāṇāḥ saṃbhavanti viśāṃ patea devānām amṛtaṃ cānnaṃ nāgānāṃ ca sudhā tathāc pitṝṇāṃ ca svadhā proktā paśūnāṃ cāpi vīrudhaḥa annam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ prāṇān āhur manīṣiṇaḥc tac ca sarvaṃ naravyāghra pānīyāt saṃpravartatea tasmāt pānīyadānād vai na paraṃ vidyate kva citc tac ca dadyān naro nityaṃ ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥa dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ jaladānaṃ viśāṃ patec śatrūṃś cāpy adhi kaunteya sadā tiṣṭhati toyadaḥa sarvakāmān avāpnoti kīrtiṃ caiveha śāśvatīmc pretya cānantyam āpnoti pāpebhyaś ca pramucyatea toyado manujavyāghra svargaṃ gatvā mahādyutec akṣayān samavāpnoti lokān ity abravīn manuḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa tilānāṃ kīdṛśaṃ dānam atha dīpasya caiva hac annānāṃ vāsasāṃ caiva bhūya eva bravīhi me bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc brāhmaṇasya ca saṃvādaṃ yamasya ca yudhiṣṭhiraa madhyadeśe mahān grāmo brāhmaṇānāṃ babhūva hac gaṅgāyamunayor madhye yāmunasya girer adhaḥa parṇaśāleti vikhyāto ramaṇīyo narādhipac vidvāṃsas tatra bhūyiṣṭhā brāhmaṇāś cāvasaṃs tadāa atha prāha yamaḥ kaṃ cit puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇavāsasamc raktākṣam ūrdhvaromāṇaṃ kākajaṅghākṣināsikama gaccha tvaṃ brāhmaṇagrāmaṃ tato gatvā tam ānayac agastyaṃ gotrataś cāpi nāmataś cāpi śarmiṇama śame niviṣṭaṃ vidvāṃsam adhyāpakam anādṛtamc mā cānyam ānayethās tvaṃ sagotraṃ tasya pārśvataḥa sa hi tādṛgguṇas tena tulyo dhyayanajanmanāc apatyeṣu tathā vṛtte samastenaiva dhīmatāe tam ānaya yathoddiṣṭaṃ pūjā kāryā hi tasya mea sa gatvā pratikūlaṃ tac cakāra yamaśāsanamc tam ākramyānayām āsa pratiṣiddho yamena yaḥa tasmai yamaḥ samutthāya pūjāṃ kṛtvā ca vīryavānc provāca nīyatām eṣa so nya ānīyatām itia evam ukte tu vacane dharmarājena sa dvijaḥc uvāca dharmarājānaṃ nirviṇṇo dhyayanena vaie yo me kālo bhavec cheṣas taṃ vaseyam ihācyuta yama uvācaa nāhaṃ kālasya vihitaṃ prāpnomīha kathaṃ canac yo hi dharmaṃ carati vai taṃ tu jānāmi kevalama gaccha vipra tvam adyaiva ālayaṃ svaṃ mahādyutec brūhi vā tvaṃ yathā svairaṃ karavāṇi kim ity uta brāhmaṇa uvācaa yat tatra kṛtvā sumahat puṇyaṃ syāt tad bravīhi mec sarvasya hi pramāṇaṃ tvaṃ trailokyasyāpi sattama yama uvācaa śṛṇu tattvena viprarṣe pradānavidhim uttamamc tilāḥ paramakaṃ dānaṃ puṇyaṃ caiveha śāśvatama tilāś ca saṃpradātavyā yathāśakti dvijarṣabhac nityadānāt sarvakāmāṃs tilā nirvartayanty utaa tilāñ śrāddhe praśaṃsanti dānam etad dhy anuttamamc tān prayacchasva viprebhyo vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇād vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu tilān dadyād dvijātiṣud teṣāṃ māghyāṃ pradānena sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāta tilā bhakṣayitavyāś ca sadā tv ālabhanaṃ ca taiḥc kāryaṃ satatam icchadbhiḥ śreyaḥ sarvātmanā gṛhea tathāpaḥ sarvadā deyāḥ peyāś caiva na saṃśayaḥc puṣkariṇyas taḍāgāni kūpāṃś caivātra khānayeta etat sudurlabhataram iha loke dvijottamac āpo nityaṃ pradeyās te puṇyaṃ hy etad anuttamama prapāś ca kāryāḥ pānārthaṃ nityaṃ te dvijasattamac bhukte py atha pradeyaṃ te pānīyaṃ vai viśeṣataḥa ity ukte sa tadā tena yamadūtena vai gṛhānc nītaś cakāra ca tathā sarvaṃ tad yamaśāsanama nītvā taṃ yamadūto pi gṛhītvā śarmiṇaṃ tadāc yayau sa dharmarājāya nyavedayata cāpi tama taṃ dharmarājo dharmajñaṃ pūjayitvā pratāpavānc kṛtvā ca saṃvidaṃ tena visasarja yathāgatama tasyāpi ca yamaḥ sarvam upadeśaṃ cakāra hac pratyetya ca sa tat sarvaṃ cakāroktaṃ yamena tata tathā praśaṃsate dīpān yamaḥ pitṛhitepsayāb pānīyābhyarthinaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītyā dadyāt tvarānvitaḥb vastre tantupramāṇena dīpe nimiṣavatsaramb gavāṃ lomapramāṇena svargabhogam upāśnuteb jale bindupramāṇena tad etāny upavartayac tasmād dīpaprado nityaṃ saṃtārayati vai pitṝna dātavyāḥ satataṃ dīpās tasmād bharatasattamac devānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca cakṣuṣy āste matāḥ prabhoa ratnadānaṃ ca sumahat puṇyam uktaṃ janādhipac tāni vikrīya yajate brāhmaṇo hy abhayaṃkaraḥa yad vai dadāti viprebhyo brāhmaṇaḥ pratigṛhya vaic ubhayoḥ syāt tad akṣayyaṃ dātur ādātur eva caa yo dadāti sthitaḥ sthityāṃ tādṛśāya pratigrahamc ubhayor akṣayaṃ dharmaṃ taṃ manuḥ prāha dharmavita vāsasāṃ tu pradānena svadāranirato naraḥc suvastraś ca suveṣaś ca bhavatīty anuśuśrumaa gāvaḥ suvarṇaṃ ca tathā tilāś caivānuvarṇitāḥc bahuśaḥ puruṣavyāghra vedaprāmāṇyadarśanāta vivāhāṃś caiva kurvīta putrān utpādayeta cac putralābho hi kauravya sarvalābhād viśiṣyate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bhūya eva kuruśreṣṭha dānānāṃ vidhim uttamamc kathayasva mahāprājña bhūmidānaṃ viśeṣataḥa pṛthivīṃ kṣatriyo dadyād brāhmaṇas tāṃ svakarmaṇāc vidhivat pratigṛhṇīyān na tv anyo dātum arhatia sarvavarṇais tu yac chakyaṃ pradātuṃ phalakāṅkṣibhiḥc vede vā yat samāmnātaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi bhīṣma uvācaa tulyanāmāni deyāni trīṇi tulyaphalāni cac sarvakāmaphalānīha gāvaḥ pṛthvī sarasvatīa yo brūyāc cāpi śiṣyāya dharmyāṃ brāhmīṃ sarasvatīmc pṛthivīgopradānābhyāṃ sa tulyaṃ phalam aśnutea tathaiva gāḥ praśaṃsanti na ca deyaṃ tataḥ paramc saṃnikṛṣṭaphalās tā hi laghvarthāś ca yudhiṣṭhirae mātaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ gāvaḥ sarvasukhapradāḥa vṛddhim ākāṅkṣatā nityaṃ gāvaḥ kāryāḥ pradakṣiṇāḥb saṃtāḍyā na tu pādena gavāṃ madhye ca na vrajetc maṅgalāyatanaṃ devyas tasmāt pūjyāḥ sadaiva hia pracodanaṃ devakṛtaṃ gavāṃ karmasu vartatāmc pūrvam evākṣaraṃ nānyad abhidheyaṃ kathaṃ canaa pracāre vā nipāne vā budho nodvejayeta gāḥc tṛṣitā hy abhivīkṣantyo naraṃ hanyuḥ sabāndhavama pitṛsadmāni satataṃ devatāyatanāni cac pūyante śakṛtā yāsāṃ pūtaṃ kim adhikaṃ tataḥa grāsamuṣṭiṃ paragave dadyāt saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥc akṛtvā svayam āhāraṃ vrataṃ tat sārvakāmikama sa hi putrān yaśorthaṃ ca śriyaṃ cāpy adhigacchatic nāśayaty aśubhaṃ caiva duḥsvapnaṃ ca vyapohati yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa deyāḥ kiṃlakṣaṇā gāvaḥ kāś cāpi parivarjayetc kīdṛśāya pradātavyā na deyāḥ kīdṛśāya ca bhīṣma uvācaa asadvṛttāya pāpāya lubdhāyānṛtavādinec havyakavyavyapetāya na deyā gauḥ kathaṃ canaa bhikṣave bahuputrāya śrotriyāyāhitāgnayec dattvā daśagavāṃ dātā lokān āpnoty anuttamāna yaṃ caiva dharmaṃ kurute tasya puṇyaphalaṃ ca yatb juhoti yad bhojayati yad dadāti gavāṃ rasaiḥc sarvasyaivāṃśabhāg dātā tannimittaṃ pravṛttayaḥd arthasya daśabhāg dātā tan nivṛttapravṛttayea yaś cainam utpādayati yaś cainaṃ trāyate bhayātc yaś cāsya kurute vṛttiṃ sarve te pitaras trayaḥa kalmaṣaṃ guruśuśrūṣā hanti māno mahad yaśaḥc aputratāṃ trayaḥ putrā avṛttiṃ daśa dhenavaḥa vedāntaniṣṭhasya bahuśrutasyaprajñānatṛptasya jitendriyasyac śiṣṭasya dāntasya yatasya caivabhūteṣu nityaṃ priyavādinaś caa yaḥ kṣudbhayād vai na vikarma kuryānmṛdur dāntaś cātitheyaś ca nityamc vṛttiṃ viprāyātisṛjeta tasmaiyas tulyaśīlaś ca saputradāraḥa śubhe pātre ye guṇā gopradānetāvān doṣo brāhmaṇasvāpahārec sarvāvasthaṃ brāhmaṇasvāpahārodārāś caiṣāṃ dūrato varjanīyāḥd yudhiṣṭhira uvācad brāhmaṇasvāpahāreṇa kiyān doṣo bhavaty utad brāhmasvam ucyate kiṃ vā tan me brūhi pitāmahad vipradāre parahṛte viprasvanicaye tathād paritrāyanti śaktās tu namas tebhyo mṛtās tu vād na pālayanti nihatā ye tān vaivasvato yamaḥd daṇḍayan bhartsayan nityaṃ nirayebhyo na muñcatid tathā gavāṃ paritrāṇe pīḍane ca śubhāśubhed vipragoṣu viśeṣeṇa rakṣiteṣu gṛheṣu vād na mṛtaḥ svargam āpnoti putrapautrasamanvitaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa atraiva kīrtyate sadbhir brāhmaṇasvābhimarśanec nṛgeṇa sumahat kṛcchraṃ yad avāptaṃ kurūdvahaa niviśantyāṃ purā pārtha dvāravatyām iti śrutiḥc adṛśyata mahākūpas tṛṇavīrutsamāvṛtaḥa prayatnaṃ tatra kurvāṇās tasmāt kūpāj jalārthinaḥc śrameṇa mahatā yuktās tasmiṃs toye susaṃvṛtea dadṛśus te mahākāyaṃ kṛkalāsam avasthitamc tasya coddharaṇe yatnam akurvaṃs te sahasraśaḥa pragrahaiś carmapaṭṭaiś ca taṃ baddhvā parvatopamamc nāśaknuvan samuddhartuṃ tato jagmur janārdanama kham āvṛtyodapānasya kṛkalāsaḥ sthito mahānc tasya nāsti samuddhartety atha kṛṣṇe nyavedayana sa vāsudevena samuddhṛtaś capṛṣṭaś ca kāmān nijagāda rājāc nṛgas tadātmānam atho nyavedayatpurātanaṃ yajñasahasrayājinama tathā bruvāṇaṃ tu tam āha mādhavaḥśubhaṃ tvayā karma kṛtaṃ na pāpakamc kathaṃ bhavān durgatim īdṛśīṃ gatonarendra tad brūhi kim etad īdṛśama śataṃ sahasrāṇi śataṃ gavāṃ punaḥpunaḥ śatāny aṣṭa śatāyutānic tvayā purā dattam itīha śuśrumanṛpa dvijebhyaḥ kva nu tad gataṃ tavaa nṛgas tato bravīt kṛṣṇaṃ brāhmaṇasyāgnihotriṇaḥc proṣitasya paribhraṣṭā gaur ekā mama godhanea gavāṃ sahasre saṃkhyātā tadā sā paśupair mamac sā brāhmaṇāya me dattā pretyārtham abhikāṅkṣatāa apaśyat parimārgaṃś ca tāṃ yāṃ paragṛhe dvijaḥc mameyam iti covāca brāhmaṇo yasya sābhavata tāv ubhau samanuprāptau vivadantau bhṛśajvarauc bhavān dātā bhavān hartety atha tau māṃ tadocatuḥa śatena śatasaṃkhyena gavāṃ vinimayena vaic yāce pratigrahītāraṃ sa tu mām abravīd idama deśakālopasaṃpannā dogdhrī kṣāntātivatsalāc svādukṣīrapradā dhanyā mama nityaṃ niveśanea kṛśaṃ ca bharate yā gaur mama putram apastanamc na sā śakyā mayā hātum ity uktvā sa jagāma haa tatas tam aparaṃ vipraṃ yāce vinimayena vaic gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ vai tatkṛte gṛhyatām iti brāhmaṇa uvācaa na rājñāṃ pratigṛhṇāmi śakto haṃ svasya mārgaṇec saiva gaur dīyatāṃ śīghraṃ mameti madhusūdanaa rukmam aśvāṃś ca dadato rajataṃ syandanāṃs tathāc na jagrāha yayau cāpi tadā sa brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥa etasminn eva kāle tu coditaḥ kāladharmaṇāc pitṛlokam ahaṃ prāpya dharmarājam upāgamama yamas tu pūjayitvā māṃ tato vacanam abravītc nāntaḥ saṃkhyāyate rājaṃs tava puṇyasya karmaṇaḥa asti caiva kṛtaṃ pāpam ajñānāt tad api tvayāc carasva pāpaṃ paścād vā pūrvaṃ vā tvaṃ yathecchasia rakṣitāsmīti coktaṃ te pratijñā cānṛtā tavac brāhmaṇasvasya cādānaṃ trividhas te vyatikramaḥa pūrvaṃ kṛcchraṃ cariṣye haṃ paścāc chubham iti prabhoc dharmarājaṃ bruvann evaṃ patito smi mahītalea aśrauṣaṃ pracyutaś cāhaṃ yamasyoccaiḥ prabhāṣataḥc vāsudevaḥ samuddhartā bhavitā te janārdanaḥa pūrṇe varṣasahasrānte kṣīṇe karmaṇi duṣkṛtec prāpsyase śāśvatāṃl lokāñ jitān svenaiva karmaṇāa kūpe tmānam adhaḥśīrṣam apaśyaṃ patitaṃ ca hac tiryagyonim anuprāptaṃ na tu mām ajahāt smṛtiḥa tvayā tu tārito smy adya kim anyatra tapobalātc anujānīhi māṃ kṛṣṇa gaccheyaṃ divam adya vaia anujñātaḥ sa kṛṣṇena namaskṛtya janārdanamc vimānaṃ divyam āsthāya yayau divam ariṃdamaa tatas tasmin divaṃ prāpte nṛge bharatasattamac vāsudeva imaṃ ślokaṃ jagāda kurunandanaa brāhmaṇasvaṃ na hartavyaṃ puruṣeṇa vijānatāc brāhmaṇasvaṃ hṛtaṃ hanti nṛgaṃ brāhmaṇagaur ivaa satāṃ samāgamaḥ sadbhir nāphalaḥ pārtha vidyatec vimuktaṃ narakāt paśya nṛgaṃ sādhusamāgamāta pradānaṃ phalavat tatra drohas tatra tathāphalaḥc apacāraṃ gavāṃ tasmād varjayeta yudhiṣṭhira yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa dattānāṃ phalasaṃprāptiṃ gavāṃ prabrūhi me naghac vistareṇa mahābāho na hi tṛpyāmi kathyatām bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc ṛṣer uddālaker vākyaṃ nāciketasya cobhayoḥa ṛṣir uddālakir dīkṣām upagamya tataḥ sutamc tvaṃ mām upacarasveti nāciketam abhāṣatae samāpte niyame tasmin maharṣiḥ putram abravīta upasparśanasaktasya svādhyāyaniratasya cac idhmā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ kalaśaś cābhito jalame vismṛtaṃ me tad ādāya nadītīrād ihāvrajaa gatvānavāpya tat sarvaṃ nadīvegasamāplutamc na paśyāmi tad ity evaṃ pitaraṃ so bravīn muniḥa kṣutpipāsāśramāviṣṭo munir uddālakis tadāc yamaṃ paśyeti taṃ putram aśapat sa mahātapāḥa tathā sa pitrābhihato vāgvajreṇa kṛtāñjaliḥc prasīdeti bruvann eva gatasattvo patad bhuvia nāciketaṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ duḥkhamūrchitaḥc kiṃ mayā kṛtam ity uktvā nipapāta mahītalea tasya duḥkhaparītasya svaṃ putram upagūhataḥc vyatītaṃ tad ahaḥśeṣaṃ sā cogrā tatra śarvarīa pitryeṇāśruprapātena nāciketaḥ kurūdvahac prāspandacchayane kauśye vṛṣṭyā sasyam ivāplutama sa paryapṛcchat taṃ putraṃ ślāghyaṃ pratyāgataṃ punaḥc divyair gandhaiḥ samādigdhaṃ maharṣīṇāṃ nyavedayata kurvan bhavacchāsanam āśu yātohy ahaṃ viśālāṃ ruciraprabhāvāmc vaivasvatīṃ prāpya sabhām apaśyaṃsahasraśo yojanahaimabhaumāma dṛṣṭvaiva mām abhimukham āpatantaṃgṛhaṃ kṛtajñaṃvṛttiglānaṃ tādṛśaṃ pātram āhuḥc vṛttiglāne saṃbhrame vā mahārthekṛṣyarthe vā homahetoḥ prasūtyāma gurvarthe vā bālapuṣṭyābhiṣaṅgādgāvo dātuṃ deśakālo viśiṣṭaḥc antarjātāḥ
