ekabhaktena saṃkṣipetc bhojayec ca dvijān bhaktyā sa mucyed vyādhikilbiṣaiḥa sarvakalyāṇasaṃpūrṇaḥ sarvauṣadhisamanvitaḥc kṛṣibhāgī bahudhano bahuputraś ca jāyatea pauṣamāsaṃ tu kaunteya bhaktenaikena yaḥ kṣapetc subhago darśanīyaś ca yaśobhāgī ca jāyatea pitṛbhakto māghamāsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapetc śrīmatkule jñātimadhye sa mahattvaṃ prapadyatea bhagadaivaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapetc strīṣu vallabhatāṃ yāti vaśyāś cāsya bhavanti tāḥa caitraṃ tu niyato māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapetc suvarṇamaṇimuktāḍhye kule mahati jāyatea nistared ekabhaktena vaiśākhaṃ yo jitendriyaḥc naro vā yadi vā nārī jñātīnāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ vrajeta jyeṣṭhāmūlaṃ tu yo māsam ekabhaktena saṃkṣapetc aiśvaryam atulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pumān strī vābhijāyatea āṣāḍham ekabhaktena sthitvā māsam atandritaḥc bahudhānyo bahudhano bahuputraś ca jāyatea śrāvaṇaṃ niyato māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapetb rūpadraviṇasaṃpannaḥ sukhī bhavati nityaśaḥc yatra tatrābhiṣekeṇa yujyate jñātivardhanaḥd dhanavān kīrtimāṃś caiva kule mahati jāyatea prauṣṭhapadaṃ tu yo māsam ekāhāro bhaven naraḥc dhanāḍhyaṃ sphītam acalam aiśvaryaṃ pratipadyatea tathaivāśvayujaṃ māsam ekabhaktena yaḥ kṣapetc prajāvān vāhanāḍhyaś ca bahuputraś ca jāyatea kārttikaṃ tu naro māsaṃ yaḥ kuryād ekabhojanamc śūraś ca bahubhāryaś ca kīrtimāṃś caiva jāyatea iti māsā naravyāghra kṣapatāṃ parikīrtitāḥc tithīnāṃ niyamā ye tu śṛṇu tān api pārthivaa pakṣe pakṣe gate yas tu bhaktam aśnāti bhāratac gavāḍhyo bahuputraś ca dīrghāyuś ca sa jāyatea māsi māsi trirātrāṇi kṛtvā varṣāṇi dvādaśac gaṇādhipatyaṃ prāpnoti niḥsapatnam anāvilama ete tu niyamāḥ sarve kartavyāḥ śarado daśac dve cānye bharataśreṣṭha pravṛttim anuvartatāa yas tu prātas tathā sāyaṃ bhuñjāno nāntarā pibetc ahiṃsānirato nityaṃ juhvāno jātavedasama ṣaḍbhiḥ sa varṣair nṛpate sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥc agniṣṭomasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa adhivāse so psarasāṃ nṛtyagītavināditeb ramate strīsahasrāḍhye sukṛtī virajā naraḥc taptakāñcanavarṇābhaṃ vimānam adhirohatia pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu brahmaloke mahīyatec tatkṣayād iha cāgamya māhātmyaṃ pratipadyatea yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇam ekāhāro bhaven naraḥc atirātrasya yajñasya sa phalaṃ samupāśnutea daśavarṣasahasrāṇi svarge ca sa mahīyatec tatkṣayād iha cāgamya māhātmyaṃ pratipadyatea yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ caturthaṃ bhaktam aśnutec ahiṃsānirato nityaṃ satyavāṅ niyatendriyaḥa vājapeyasya yajñasya phalaṃ vai samupāśnutec triṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi svarge ca sa mahīyatea ṣaṣṭhe kāle tu kaunteya naraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ kṣapetc aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa cakravākaprayuktena vimānena sa gacchatic catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modatea aṣṭamena tu bhaktena jīvan saṃvatsaraṃ nṛpac gavāmayasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa haṃsasārasayuktena vimānena sa gacchatic pañcāśataṃ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modatea pakṣe pakṣe gate rājan yo śnīyād varṣam eva tuc ṣaṇmāsānaśanaṃ tasya bhagavān aṅgirābravīte ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi divam āvasate ca saḥa vīṇānāṃ vallakīnāṃ ca veṇūnāṃ ca viśāṃ patec sughoṣair madhuraiḥ śabdaiḥ suptaḥ sa pratibodhyatea saṃvatsaram ihaikaṃ tu māsi māsi pibet payaḥc phalaṃ viśvajitas tāta prāpnoti sa naro nṛpaa siṃhavyāghraprayuktena vimānena sa gacchatic saptatiṃ ca sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modatea māsād ūrdhvaṃ naravyāghra nopavāso vidhīyatec vidhiṃ tv anaśanasyāhuḥ pārtha dharmavido janāḥa anārto vyādhirahito gacched anaśanaṃ tu yaḥc pade pade yajñaphalaṃ sa prāpnoti na saṃśayaḥa divaṃ haṃsaprayuktena vimānena sa gacchatic śataṃ cāpsarasaḥ kanyā ramayanty api taṃ narama ārto vā vyādhito vāpi gacched anaśanaṃ tu yaḥc śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ modate divi sa prabhoe kāñcīnūpuraśabdena suptaś caiva prabodhyatea sahasrahaṃsasaṃyukte vimāne somavarcasic sa gatvā strīśatākīrṇe ramate bharatarṣabhaa kṣīṇasyāpyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kṣatasya kṣatarohaṇamc vyādhitasyauṣadhagrāmaḥ kruddhasya ca prasādanama duḥkhitasyārthamānābhyāṃ dravyāṇāṃ pratipādanamc na caite svargakāmasya rocante sukhamedhasaḥd na caitad rocate teṣāṃ ye dhanaiḥ sukhamedhinaḥa ataḥ sa kāmasaṃyukto vimāne hemasaṃnibhec ramate strīśatākīrṇe puruṣo laṃkṛtaḥ śubhea svasthaḥ saphalasaṃkalpaḥ sukhī vigatakalmaṣaḥc anaśnan deham utsṛjya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥa bālasūryapratīkāśe vimāne hemavarcasic vaiḍūryamuktākhacite vīṇāmurajanāditea patākādīpikākīrṇe divyaghaṇṭānināditec strīsahasrānucarite sa naraḥ sukham edhatea yāvanti romakūpāṇi tasya gātreṣu pāṇḍavac tāvanty eva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divi modatea nāsti vedāt paraṃ śāstraṃ nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥc na dharmāt paramo lābhas tapo nānaśanāt parama brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti pāvanaṃ divi ceha cac upavāsais tathā tulyaṃ tapaḥkarma na vidyatea upoṣya vidhivad devās tridivaṃ pratipedirec ṛṣayaś ca parāṃ siddhim upavāsair avāpnuvana divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatāc kṣāntam ekena bhaktena tena vipratvam āgataḥa cyavano jamadagniś ca vasiṣṭho gautamo bhṛguḥc sarva eva divaṃ prāptāḥ kṣamāvanto maharṣayaḥa idam aṅgirasā pūrvaṃ maharṣibhyaḥ pradarśitamc yaḥ pradarśayate nityaṃ na sa duḥkham avāpnutea imaṃ tu kaunteya yathākramaṃ vidhiṃpravartitaṃ hy aṅgirasā maharṣiṇāc paṭheta yo vai śṛṇuyāc ca nityadāna vidyate tasya narasya kilbiṣama vimucyate cāpi sa sarvasaṃkarairna cāsya doṣair abhibhūyate manaḥc viyonijānāṃ ca vijānate rutaṃdhruvāṃ ca kīrtiṃ labhate narottamaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa pitāmahena vidhivad yajñāḥ proktā mahātmanāc guṇāś caiṣāṃ yathātattvaṃ pretya ceha ca sarvaśaḥa na te śakyā daridreṇa yajñāḥ prāptuṃ pitāmahac bahūpakaraṇā yajñā nānāsaṃbhāravistarāḥa pārthivai rājaputrair vā śakyāḥ prāptuṃ pitāmahac nārthanyūnair avaguṇair ekātmabhir asaṃhataiḥa yo daridrair api vidhiḥ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ sadā bhavetc tulyo yajñaphalair etais tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa idam aṅgirasā proktam upavāsaphalātmakamc vidhiṃ yajñaphalais tulyaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraa yas tu kalyaṃ tathā sāyaṃ bhuñjāno nāntarā pibetc ahiṃsānirato nityaṃ juhvāno jātavedasama ṣaḍbhir eva tu varṣaiḥ sa sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥc taptakāñcanavarṇaṃ ca vimānaṃ labhate naraḥa devastrīṇām adhīvāse nṛtyagītanināditec prājāpatye vaset padmaṃ varṣāṇām agnisaṃnibhea trīṇi varṣāṇi yaḥ prāśet satataṃ tv ekabhojanamc dharmapatnīrato nityam agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labheta dvitīye divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśamāsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasame yajñaṃ bahusuvarṇaṃ vā vāsavapriyam āhareta satyavāg dānaśīlaś ca brahmaṇyaś cānasūyakaḥc kṣānto dānto jitakrodhaḥ sa gacchati parāṃ gatima pāṇḍurābhrapratīkāśe vimāne haṃsalakṣaṇec dve samāpte tataḥ padme so psarobhir vaset sahad agnikāryaparo nityaṃ nityaṃ kalyaprabodhanaḥd agniṣṭomasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥd haṃsasārasayuktaṃ ca vimānaṃ labhate naraḥd indraloke ca vasate varastrībhiḥ samāvṛtaḥa tṛtīye divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśamāsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasama atirātrasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamamc mayūrahaṃsasaṃyuktaṃ vimānaṃ labhate naraḥa saptarṣīṇāṃ sadā loke so psarobhir vaset sahac nivartanaṃ ca tatrāsya trīṇi padmāni vai viduḥa divase yaś caturthe tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama vājapeyasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamamc indrakanyābhirūḍhaṃ ca vimānaṃ labhate naraḥa sāgarasya ca paryante vāsavaṃ lokam āvasetc devarājasya ca krīḍāṃ nityakālam avekṣatea divase pañcame yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśamāsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasama alubdhaḥ satyavādī ca brahmaṇyaś cāvihiṃsakaḥc anasūyur apāpastho dvādaśāhaphalaṃ labheta jāmbūnadamayaṃ divyaṃ vimānaṃ haṃsalakṣaṇamb atirātraphalaṃ prāpya apsarobhiḥ pramodatec sūryamālāsamābhāsam ārohet pāṇḍuraṃ gṛhama āvartanāni catvāri tathā padmāni dvādaśac śarāgniparimāṇaṃ ca tatrāsau vasate sukhama divase yas tu ṣaṣṭhe vai muniḥ prāśeta bhojanamc sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama sadā triṣavaṇasnāyī brahmacāry anasūyakaḥc gavāmayasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamama agnijvālāsamābhāsaṃ haṃsabarhiṇasevitamc śātakumbhamayaṃ yuktaṃ sādhayed yānam uttamama tathaivāpsarasām aṅke prasuptaḥ pratibudhyatec nūpurāṇāṃ ninādena mekhalānāṃ ca nisvanaiḥa koṭīsahasraṃ varṣāṇāṃ trīṇi koṭiśatāni cac padmāny aṣṭādaśa tathā patāke dve tathaiva caa ayutāni ca pañcāśad ṛkṣacarmaśatasya cac lomnāṃ pramāṇena samaṃ brahmaloke mahīyatea divase saptame yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama sarasvatīṃ gopayāno brahmacaryaṃ samācaranc sumanovarṇakaṃ caiva madhumāṃsaṃ ca varjayeta puruṣo marutāṃ lokam indralokaṃ ca gacchatic tatra tatra ca siddhārtho devakanyābhir uhyatea phalaṃ bahusuvarṇasya yajñasya labhate naraḥc saṃkhyām atiguṇāṃ cāpi teṣu lokeṣu modatea yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ kṣānto bhuṅkte hany aṣṭame naraḥc devakāryaparo nityaṃ juhvāno jātavedasama pauṇḍarīkasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamamc padmavarṇanibhaṃ caiva vimānam adhirohatia kṛṣṇāḥ kanakagauryaś ca nāryaḥ śyāmās tathāparāḥc vayorūpavilāsinyo labhate nātra saṃśayaḥa yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ bhuṅkte navame navame hanic sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥc puṇḍarīkaprakāśaṃ ca vimānaṃ labhate naraḥa dīptasūryāgnitejobhir divyamālābhir eva cac nīyate rudrakanyābhiḥ so ntarikṣaṃ sanātanama aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ kalpam eva cac koṭīśatasahasraṃ ca teṣu lokeṣu modatea yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ bhuṅkte daśāhe vai gate gatec sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama brahmakanyāniveśe ca sarvabhūtamanoharec aśvamedhasahasrasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamama rūpavatyaś ca taṃ kanyā ramayanti sadā naramc nīlotpalanibhair varṇai raktotpalanibhais tathāa vimānaṃ maṇḍalāvartam āvartagahanāvṛtamc sāgarormipratīkāśaṃ sādhayed yānam uttamama vicitramaṇimālābhir nāditaṃ śaṅkhapuṣkaraiḥc sphāṭikair vajrasāraiś ca stambhaiḥ sukṛtavedikame ārohati mahad yānaṃ haṃsasārasavāhanama ekādaśe tu divase yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥc sadā dvādaśamāsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama parastriyo nābhilaṣed vācātha manasāpi vāc anṛtaṃ ca na bhāṣeta mātāpitroḥ kṛte pi vāa abhigacchen mahādevaṃ vimānasthaṃ mahābalamc svayaṃbhuvaṃ ca paśyeta vimānaṃ samupasthitama kumāryaḥ kāñcanābhāsā rūpavatyo nayanti tamc rudrāṇāṃ tam adhīvāsaṃ divi divyaṃ manoharama varṣāṇy aparimeyāni yugāntam api cāvasetc koṭīśatasahasraṃ ca daśa koṭiśatāni caa rudraṃ nityaṃ praṇamate devadānavasaṃmatamc sa tasmai darśanaṃ prāpto divase divase bhaveta divase dvādaśe yas tu prāpte vai prāśate haviḥc sadā dvādaśamāsān vai sarvamedhaphalaṃ labhetc juhvāno jātavedasamc niyamena samāyuktaḥa ādityair dvādaśais tasya vimānaṃ saṃvidhīyatec maṇimuktāpravālaiś ca mahārhair upaśobhitama haṃsamālāparikṣiptaṃ nāgavīthīsamākulamc mayūraiś cakravākaiś ca kūjadbhir upaśobhitama aṭṭair mahadbhiḥ saṃyuktaṃ brahmaloke pratiṣṭhitamc nityam āvasate rājan naranārīsamāvṛtame ṛṣir evaṃ mahābhāgas tv aṅgirāḥ prāha dharmavitf vimānam adhiruhyāśu brahmaloke mahīyatea trayodaśe tu divase yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai devasatraphalaṃ labheta raktapadmodayaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sādhayen naraḥb tatra gatvā samutthito devakanyābhir āvṛtaḥc jātarūpaprayuktaṃ ca ratnasaṃcayabhūṣitama devakanyābhir ākīrṇaṃ divyābharaṇabhūṣitamc puṇyagandhodayaṃ divyaṃ vāyavyair upaśobhitama tatra śaṅkupatākaṃ ca yugāntaṃ kalpam eva cac ayutāyutaṃ tathā padmaṃ samudraṃ ca tathā vaseta gītagandharvaghoṣaiś ca bherīpaṇavanisvanaiḥc sadā pramuditas tābhir devakanyābhir īḍyatea caturdaśe tu divase yaḥ pūrṇe prāśate haviḥc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai mahāmedhaphalaṃ labheta anirdeśyavayorūpā devakanyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥc mṛṣṭataptāṅgadadharā vimānair anuyānti tama kalahaṃsavinirghoṣair nūpurāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥc kāñcīnāṃ ca samutkarṣais tatra tatra vibodhyatea devakanyānivāse ca tasmin vasati mānavaḥc jāhnavīvālukākīrṇe pūrṇaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ naraḥa yas tu pakṣe gate bhuṅkte ekabhaktaṃ jitendriyaḥc sadā dādaśa māsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasame rājasūyasahasrasya phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamama yānam ārohate nityaṃ haṃsabarhiṇasevitamc maṇimaṇḍalakaiś citraṃ jātarūpasamāvṛtama divyābharaṇaśobhābhir varastrībhir alaṃkṛtamc ekastambhaṃ caturdvāraṃ saptabhaumaṃ sumaṅgalame vaijayantīsahasraiś ca śobhitaṃ gītanisvanaiḥa divyaṃ divyaguṇopetaṃ vimānam adhirohatic maṇimuktāpravālaiś ca bhūṣitaṃ vaidyutaprabhame vased yugasahasraṃ ca khaḍgakuñjaravāhanaḥa ṣoḍaśe divase yas tu saṃprāpte prāśate haviḥc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai somayajñaphalaṃ labheta somakanyānivāseṣu so dhyāvasati nityadāc saumyagandhānuliptaś ca kāmacāragatir bhaveta sudarśanābhir nārībhir madhurābhis tathaiva cac arcyate vai vimānasthaḥ kāmabhogaiś ca sevyatea phalaṃ padmaśataprakhyaṃ mahākalpaṃ daśādhikamc āvartanāni catvāri sāgare yāty asau naraḥa divase saptadaśame yaḥ prāpte prāśate haviḥc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama sthānaṃ vāruṇam aindraṃ ca raudraṃ caivādhigacchatic mārutauśanase caiva brahmalokaṃ ca gacchatia tatra daivatakanyābhir āsanenopacaryatec bhūr bhuvaṃ cāpi devarṣiṃ viśvarūpam avekṣatea tatra devādhidevasya kumāryo ramayanti tamc dvātriṃśad rūpadhāriṇyo madhurāḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥa candrādityāv ubhau yāvad gagane carataḥ prabhoc tāvac caraty asau vīraḥ sudhāmṛtarasāśanaḥa aṣṭādaśe tu divase prāśnīyād ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai sapta lokān sa paśyatia rathaiḥ sanandighoṣaiś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ so nugamyatec devakanyādhirūḍhais tu bhrājamānaiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥa vyāghrasiṃhaprayuktaṃ ca meghasvananināditamc vimānam uttamaṃ divyaṃ susukhī hy adhirohatia tatra kalpasahasraṃ sa kāntābhiḥ saha modatec sudhārasaṃ ca bhuñjīta amṛtopamam uttamama ekonaviṃśe divase yo bhuṅkte ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai sapta lokān sa paśyatia uttamaṃ labhate sthānam apsarogaṇasevitamc gandharvair upagītaṃ ca vimānaṃ sūryavarcasama tatrāmaravarastrībhir modate vigatajvaraḥc divyāmbaradharaḥ śrīmān ayutānāṃ śataṃ samāḥa pūrṇe tha divase viṃśe yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu satyavādī dhṛtavrataḥa amāṃsāśī brahmacārī sarvabhūtahite rataḥc sa lokān vipulān divyān ādityānām upāśnutea gandharvair apsarobhiś ca divyamālyānulepanaiḥc vimānaiḥ kāñcanair divyaiḥ pṛṣṭhataś cānugamyatea ekaviṃśe tu divase yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama lokam auśanasaṃ divyaṃ śakralokaṃ ca gacchatic aśvinor marutāṃ caiva sukheṣv abhirataḥ sadāa anabhijñaś ca duḥkhānāṃ vimānavaram āsthitaḥc sevyamāno varastrībhiḥ krīḍaty amaravat prabhuḥa dvāviṃśe divase prāpte yo bhuṅkte hy ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama dhṛtimān ahiṃsānirataḥ satyavāg anasūyakaḥc lokān vasūnām āpnoti divākarasamaprabhaḥa kāmacārī sudhāhāro vimānavaram āsthitaḥc ramate devakanyābhir divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥa trayoviṃśe tu divase prāśed yas tv ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu mitāhāro jitendriyaḥa vāyor uśanasaś caiva rudralokaṃ ca gacchatic kāmacārī kāmagamaḥ pūjyamāno psarogaṇaiḥa anekaguṇaparyantaṃ vimānavaram āsthitaḥc ramate devakanyābhir divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥa caturviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai juhvāno jātavedasama ādityānām adhīvāse modamāno vasec ciramc divyamālyāmbaradharo divyagandhānulepanaḥa vimāne kāñcane divye haṃsayukte manoramec ramate devakanyānāṃ sahasrair ayutais tathāa pañcaviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu puṣkalaṃ yānam āruheta siṃhavyāghraprayuktaiś ca meghasvananināditaiḥc rathaiḥ sanandighoṣaiś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ so nugamyatea devakanyāsamārūḍhai rājatair vimalaiḥ śubhaiḥc vimānam uttamaṃ divyam āsthāya sumanoharama tatra kalpasahasraṃ vai vasate strīśatāvṛtec sudhārasaṃ copajīvann amṛtopamam uttamama ṣaḍviṃśe divase yas tu prāśnīyād ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu niyato niyatāśanaḥa jitendriyo vītarāgo juhvāno jātavedasamc sa prāpnoti mahābhāgaḥ pūjyamāno psarogaṇaiḥa saptānāṃ marutāṃ lokān vasūnāṃ cāpi so śnutec vimāne sphāṭike divye sarvaratnair alaṃkṛtea gandharvair apsarobhiś ca pūjyamānaḥ pramodatec dve yugānāṃ sahasre tu divye divyena tejasāa saptaviṃśe tu divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu juhvāno jātavedasama phalaṃ prāpnoti vipulaṃ devaloke ca pūjyatec amṛtāśī vasaṃs tatra sa vitṛptaḥ pramodatea devarṣicaritaṃ rājan rājarṣibhir adhiṣṭhitamc adhyāvasati divyātmā vimānavaram āsthitaḥa strībhir manobhirāmābhī ramamāṇo madotkaṭaḥc yugakalpasahasrāṇi trīṇy āvasati vai sukhama yo ṣṭāviṃśe tu divase prāśnīyād ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsāṃs tu jitātmā vijitendriyaḥa phalaṃ devarṣicaritaṃ vipulaṃ samupāśnutec bhogavāṃs tejasā bhāti sahasrāṃśur ivāmalaḥa sukumāryaś ca nāryas taṃ ramamāṇāḥ suvarcasaḥc pīnastanorujaghanā divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥa ramayanti manaḥ kāntā vimāne sūryasaṃnibhec sarvakāmagame divye kalpāyutaśataṃ samāḥa ekonatriṃśe divase yaḥ prāśed ekabhojanamc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai satyavrataparāyaṇaḥa tasya lokāḥ śubhā divyā devarājarṣipūjitāḥc vimānaṃ candraśubhrābhaṃ divyaṃ samadhigacchatia jātarūpamayaṃ yuktaṃ sarvaratnavibhūṣitamc apsarogaṇasaṃpūrṇaṃ gandharvair abhināditama tatra cainaṃ śubhā nāryo divyābharaṇabhūṣitāḥc manobhirāmā madhurā ramayanti madotkaṭāḥa bhogavāṃs tejasā yukto vaiśvānarasamaprabhaḥc divyo divyena vapuṣā bhrājamāna ivāmaraḥa vasūnāṃ marutāṃ caiva sādhyānām aśvinos tathāc rudrāṇāṃ ca tathā lokān brahmalokaṃ ca gacchatia yas tu māse gate bhuṅkte ekabhaktaṃ śamātmakaḥc sadā dvādaśa māsān vai brahmalokam avāpnuyāta sudhārasakṛtāhāraḥ śrīmān sarvamanoharaḥc tejasā vapuṣā lakṣmyā bhrājate raśmivān ivaa divyamālyāmbaradharo divyagandhānulepanaḥc sukheṣv abhirato yogī duḥkhānām avijānakaḥa svayaṃprabhābhir nārībhir vimānastho mahīyatec rudradevarṣikanyābhiḥ satataṃ cābhipūjyatea nānāvidhasurūpābhir nānārāgābhir eva cac nānāmadhurabhāṣābhir nānāratibhir eva cad nānāvidhasugaṃdhābhir nānāveṣābhir eva caa vimāne nagarākāre sūryavat sūryasaṃnibhec pṛṣṭhataḥ somasaṃkāśe udak caivābhrasaṃnibhea dakṣiṇāyāṃ tu raktābhe adhastān nīlamaṇḍalec ūrdhvaṃ citrābhisaṃkāśe naiko vasati pūjitaḥa yāvad varṣasahasraṃ tu jambūdvīpe pravarṣatib tāvad brahmādikā lokā varṣadhārāpramāṇataḥc tāvat saṃvatsarāḥ proktā brahmalokasya dhīmataḥa vipruṣaś caiva yāvantyo nipatanti nabhastalātc varṣāsu varṣatas tāvan nivasaty amaraprabhaḥa māsopavāsī varṣais tu daśabhiḥ svargam uttamamc maharṣitvam athāsādya saśarīragatir bhaveta munir dānto jitakrodho jitaśiśnodaraḥ sadāc juhvann agnīṃś ca niyataḥ saṃdhyopāsanasevitāa bahubhir niyamair evaṃ māsān aśnāti yo naraḥc abhrāvakāśaśīlaś ca tasya vāso nirucyatea divaṃ gatvā śarīreṇa svena rājan yathāmaraḥc svargaṃ puṇyaṃ yathākāmam upabhuṅkte yathāvidhia eṣa te bharataśreṣṭha yajñānāṃ vidhir uttamaḥc vyākhyāto hy ānupūrvyeṇa upavāsaphalātmakaḥa daridrair manujaiḥ pārtha prāpyaṃ yajñaphalaṃ yathāc upavāsam imaṃ kṛtvā gacchec ca paramāṃ gatimd vaiṣṇavīṃ vātha raudrīṃ vā pañcamīṃ brahmacāriṇaḥd saṃvatsaravrataṃ kṛtvā kramante lokam uttamame devadvijātipūjāyāṃ rato bharatasattamaa upavāsavidhis tv eṣa vistareṇa prakīrtitaḥc niyateṣv apramatteṣu śaucavatsu mahātmasua dambhadrohanivṛtteṣu kṛtabuddhiṣu bhāratac acaleṣv aprakampeṣu mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd pitāmahena kathitā dānadharmāśritāḥ kathāḥd mayā śrutā ṛṣīṇāṃ tu saṃnidhau keśavasya cad punaḥ kautūhalam abhūt tām evādhyātmikīṃ pratid kathāṃ kathaya rājendra tvad anyaḥ ka udāharetd eṣa yādavadāyādas tathānujñātum arhatid jñāte tu yasmiñ jñātavyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati bhāratad paścāc chroṣyāmahe rājñāṃ śrāvyān dharmān pitāmahad kautūhalam ṛṣīṇāṃ tu cchettum arhasi sāṃpratamd bhīṣmaḥd ata ūrdhvaṃ mahārāja sāṃkhyayogobhayaśāstrādhigatayāthātmyadarśanasaṃpannayor ācāryayoḥ saṃvādam anuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ tad yathābhagavantaṃ sanatkumāram āsīnam aṅguṣṭhaparvamātraṃ mahati vimānavare yojanasahasramaṇḍale taruṇabhāskarapratīkāśe śayanīye mahati baddhāsanam anudhyāyantamamṛtam anāvartakaram amūrtam akṣayajam athopadiṣṭam upasasarpa bhagavantam ācāryaṃbhagavān ācāryo rudras taṃ provāca  svāgataṃ maheśvara brahmasuta etad āsanam āstāṃ bhagavān ity ukte cāsīno bhagavān anantarūpo rudras taṃ provāca  bhagavān api dhyānam āvartayati ity ukte cāha bhagavān sanatkumāras tatheti d tathety uktaś ca provāca bhagavāñ śaṃkaras tadād parāvarajñaṃ sarvasya trailokyasya mahāmunimd kiṃ vā dhyānena draṣṭavyaṃ yad bhavān anupaśyatid yac ca dhyātvā na śocanti yatayas tattvadarśinaḥd kathaya tvam imaṃ devaṃ dehināṃ yatisattamad yac ca tatpuruṣaṃ śuddham ity uktaṃ yogasāṃkhyayoḥd kim adhyātmādhibhūtaṃ ca tathā cāpy adhidaivatamd kālasaṃkhyā ca kā deva draṣṭavyā tasya brahmaṇaḥd saṃkhyā saṃkhyādanasyaiva yā proktā paramarṣibhiḥd śāstradṛṣṭena mārgeṇa yathāvad yatisattamad yac ca tatpuruṣaṃ śuddhaṃ prabuddham ajaraṃ dhruvamd budhyamānāprabuddhābhyāṃ vidyāvedyaṃ tathaiva cad vimokṣaṃ trividhaṃ caiva brūhi mokṣavidāṃ varad parisaṃkhyāṃ ca sāṃkhyānāṃ dhyānaṃ yogeṣu cārthavatd ekatvadarśanaṃ caiva tathā nānātvadarśanamd ariṣṭāni ca tattvena tathaivotkramaṇāni cad daivatāni ca sarvāṇi nikhilenānupūrvaśaḥd yāny āśritāni deheṣu dehināṃ yatisattamad sarvam etad yathātattvam ākhyāhi munisattamad śreṣṭho bhavān hi sarveṣāṃ brahmajñānām aninditad caturthas tvaṃ trayāṇāṃ tu ye gatāḥ paramāṃ gatimd jñānena ca prākṛtena nirmukto mṛtyubandhanātd vayaṃ tu vaikṛtaṃ mārgam āśritā vai kṣaraṃ sadād param utsṛjya panthānam amṛtākṣaram eva tud nyūne pathi nimagnās tu aiśvarye ṣṭaguṇe tathād mahimānaṃ pragṛhyemaṃ vicarāmo yathāsukhamd na caitat sukham atyantaṃ nyūnam etad anantaramd mūrtimat param etat syāt tv idam evaṃ susattamad punaḥ punaś ca patanaṃ mūrtimaty upadiśyated na punar mṛtyur ity anyaṃ nirmuktānāṃ tu mūrtitaḥd mṛtyudoṣās tv anantā vai utpadyante kṛtātmanāmd martyeṣu nākapṛṣṭheṣu nirayeṣu mahāmuned tatra majjanti puruṣāḥ sukhaduḥkhena ceṣṭitāḥd sukhaduḥkhavyapetaṃ ca yad āhur amṛtaṃ padamd tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi yathāvac chrutidarśanātd sanatkumāraḥd yad uktaṃ bhavatā vākyaṃ tattvasaṃjñeti dehināmd caturviṃśatim evātra ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥd ke cid āhus trayoviṃśaṃ yathāśrutinidarśanātd vayaṃ tu pañcaviṃśaṃ vai tad adhiṣṭhānasaṃjñitamd tattvaṃ samadhimanyāmaḥ sarvatantrapralāpanātd avyayaś caiva vai vyaktāv ubhāv api pinākadhṛkd saha caiva vinā caiva tāv anyonyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaud hiraṇmayīṃ praviśyaiṣa mūrtiṃ mūrtimatāṃ varad cakāra puruṣas tāta vikārapuruṣāv ubhaud avyaktād eka evaiṣa mahān ātmā prasūyated ahaṃkāreṇa lokāṃś ca vyāpya cāhaṃkṛtena vaid vinā sarvaṃ tad avyaktād abhimanyasva śūladhṛkd bhūtasargam ahaṃkārāt tṛtīyaṃ viddhi vai kramātd ahaṃkārāc ca bhūteṣu caturthaṃ viddhi vaikṛtamd ahaṃkārāc ca jātāni yugapad vibudheśvarad saviśeṣāṇi bhūtāni pañca prāhur manīṣiṇaḥd caturviṃśāt tu vai proktāt pañcaviṃśo dhitiṣṭhatid ete sargā mayā proktāś catvāraḥ prākṛtās tv ihad ahaṃkārāc ca jātāni yugapad vibudheśvarad ahaṃkārāc ca bhūteṣu vividhārthaṃ vyajāyatad indriyair yugapat sarvaiḥ so nityaś ca samīkṣyated maruttvaṃ sattvasargaś ca tuṣṭiḥ siddhis tathaiva cad vaikṛtāni pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tāni mahāmated eṣā tattvacaturviṃśan mayā śāstrānumānataḥd varṇitā tava deveśa pañcaviṃśasamanvitād pañcamo nugrahaś caiva navaite prākṛtaiḥ sahad aindre py aham athāpy anyan mamātmani ca bhāsvaraḥd yac ca dehamayaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyated sarvatraivābhimantavyaṃ tvayā tripurasūdanad anyathā ye tu paśyanti te na paśyanti brahmajad etad avyaktaviṣayaṃ pañcaviṃśasamanvitamd anena kāraṇenaiva tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥd vikāramātram etat tu tattvam ācakṣate paramd nistattvaś caiṣa deveśa boddhavyaṃ tu na budhyated yadi budhyet paraṃ buddhaṃ budhyamānaḥ surarṣabhad sanatkumāraḥd prabuddho hy abhimanyeta yo yaṃ nāham iti prabhod tattvasaṃkhyā śrutā caiṣā yeṣāṃ brahmavidāṃ varad sargasaṃkhyā mayā proktā navānām anupūrvaśaḥd pravakṣyāmi tu te dhyātmam adhibhūtādhidaivatamd naitad yuktair vedavidbhir gṛhasthaird mānyair ebhis tapasā vābhipannaiḥd yatnena dṛṣṭaṃ paramātmatattvaṃd tattvena prāpyaṃ tu yathoktam etatd paraṃ parebhyas tv amṛtārthatattvaṃd svabhāvasattvastham anīśam īśamd kaivalyatāṃ prāpya mahāsurottamad tavaitad ākhyāmi munīndra vṛttyād rahasyam evānyad avāpya divyaṃd pavitrapūtas tava mṛtyujālamd pṛthvīm imāṃ yady api ratnapūrṇāṃd dadyān na deyaṃ tv aparīkṣitāyad nāśraddadhānāya na cānyabuddherd nājñānayuktāya na vismitāyad svādhyāyayuktāya guṇānvitāyad pradeyam etan niyatendriyāyad saṃkṣepaṃ cāpy athaiteṣāṃ tattvānāṃ vṛṣabhadhvajad anulomānujātānāṃ pratilomaṃ pralīyatāmd pravakṣyāmi tam adhyātmaṃ sādhibhūtādhidaivatamd yathāṃśujālam arkasya tathaitat pravadanti vaid saṃkṣīṇe brahmadivase jagaj jaladhim āviśetd pralīyate jale bhūmir jalam agnau pralīyated līyate gnis tathā vāyau vāyur ākāśa eva tud manasi pralīyate khaṃ tu mano haṃkāra eva cad ahaṃkāras tathā tasmin mahati pravilīyated mahān avyakta ity āhus tad ekatvaṃ pracakṣated avyaktasya mahādeva pralayaṃ viddhi brahmaṇid evam asyāsakṛt krīḍām āhus tattvavido janāḥd adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca tathaivāpy adhidaivatamd yathāvad uditaṃ śāstraṃ yoge tu sumahātmabhiḥd tathaiva ceha sāṃkhye tu parisaṃkhyātmacintakaiḥd prapañcitārtham etāvan mahādeva mahātmabhiḥd brahmeti vidyād adhyātmaṃ puruṣaṃ cādhidaivatamd prabhavaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ tatra karma cad adhyātmaṃ prāṇam ity āhuḥ kratum apy adhidaivatamd rathaṃ ca yajñavāho tra karmāhaṃkāra eva cad adhyātmaṃ tu mano vidyāc candramāś cādhidaivatamd daivaṃ ca prabhavaś caiva karma vyāhṛtayas tathād vidyāt tu śrotram adhyātmam ākāśam adhidaivatamd sarvabhāvābhidhānārthaṃ śabdaḥ karma sadā smṛtamd tvag adhyātmam atho vidyād vāyur atrādhidaivatamd saṃnipātaya vijñānaṃ sarvakarma ca tatra had adhyātmaṃ cakṣur ity āhur bhāskaro trādhidaivatamd jñāpanaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ rūpaṃ karma sadā smṛtamd jihveti vidyād adhyātmam āpaś cātrādhidaivatamd pāyur adhyātmam ity āhur yathāvad yatisattamāḥd visargam adhibhūtaṃ ca mitraṃ cāpy adhidaivatamd upastho dhyātmam ity āhur devadeva pinākadhṛkd anubhāvo dhibhūtaṃ tu daivataṃ ca prajāpatiḥd pādāv adhyātmam ity āhus triśūlāṅka manīṣiṇaḥd gantavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu viṣṇus tatrādhidaivatamd vāg adhyātmaṃ tathaivāhuḥ pinākiṃs tattvadarśinaḥd vaktavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu vahnis tatrādhidaivatamd etad adhyātmam atulaṃ sādhibhūtādhidaivatamd mayā tu varṇitaṃ samyag dehinām amararṣabhad etat kīṭapataṃge ca śvapāke śuni hastinid putrikādaṃśamaśake brāhmaṇe gavi pārthived sarvam eva hi draṣṭavyam anyathā mā vicintayad ato nyathā ye paśyanti na samyak teṣu darśanamd devadānavagandharvayakṣarākṣasakiṃnarāḥd yan na jānanti ko hy eṣa kuto vā bhagavān itid om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma yat tat sadasataḥ paramd anādimadhyaparyantaṃ kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvamd yogeśvaraṃ padmanābhaṃ viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ jagatpatimd anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ devadevaṃ sanātanamd aprameyam avijñeyaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhumd kṛtāñjaliḥ śucir bhūtvā praṇamya prayato rcayetd anādyantaṃ paraṃ brahma na devā ṛṣayo viduḥd eko yaṃ veda bhagavāṃs trātā nārāyaṇo hariḥd nārāyaṇād ṛṣigaṇās tataḥ siddhā mahoragāḥd devā devarṣayaś caiva yaṃ vidur duḥkhabheṣajamd yam āhur vijitakleśaṃ yasmiṃś ca vihitāḥ prajāḥd yasmiṃl lokāḥ sphurantīme jāle śakunayo yathād saptarṣayo manaḥ sapta sāṃkhyās tu munidarśanātd saptarṣayaś cendriyāṇi pañca buddhīndriyāṇi cad śrotrayoś ca diśaḥ prāhur manasi tv atha candramāḥd manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ buddhiḥ saptamī hy ātmani sthāpitāniśarīreṣu nātmani d tasya hi kāraṇāni bhavanti sarvāṇy api sarvakarmasu vā viṣayeṣu vā yuñjanti yathātmani svāni karmāṇi pravṛttāni saptasv api viṣayāṇāṃ vyāpakāni  d tāny eva svapato bhūtagrāmasyājam ātmānaṃ devalokasthānasaṃmitaṃ dehāntaragāminaṃ mumukṣuṃ vānupraviśanti sūkṣmāṇi pralīyante d mokṣakāle tam ekaṃ na kaś cid vetti svāparam d evaṃ praviṣṭeṣu bhūteṣu ko jāgartīty ucyate nidrāprasupteṣu vātra jāgrat svapnaśīlo tra sadane ca devadyotano bhagavāṃś cātra kṣetrajño buddhir vā sa hi suptasyāpi svapnadarśanāni paśyati d apratibuddheṣu lokeṣu sa eva pratibudhyate d sanatkumāraḥd sa eṣa prājñaḥ atha taijasaḥ kāyāgniḥ sa hi suptasyātmā vā aviduṣo vāpratibudhyamānasyānnaṃ pacatīty ante vatiṣṭhate etad ātmānam adhikṛtyānujñātam iti d prabhavaś cāpyayas tāta varṇitas te nupūrvaśaḥd tathādhyātmādhibhūtaṃ ca tathaivātrādhidaivatamd nikhilena tu vakṣyāmi daivatānīha dehināmd yāny āśritāni deheṣu yāni pṛcchasi śaṃkarad vācy agnis tv atha jihvāyāṃ somaḥ prāṇe tu mārutaḥd rūpe cāpy atha nakṣatraṃ jihvāyāṃ cāpa eva tud nābhyāṃ samudraś ca vibhur nakharoma tathaiva cad vanaspativanauṣadhyas tv aṅgeṣu marutas tathād saṃvatsarāḥ parvasu ca ākāśe daivamānuṣed udāne vidyud abhavad vyāne parjanya eva cad stanayor eva cākāśaṃ bale cendras tathābhavatd matāv apy atha ceśānas tv apāne rudra eva cad gandharvāpsaraso vyāne satye mitraś ca śaṃkarad prajñāyāṃ varuṇaś caiva cakṣuṣy āditya eva cad śarīre pṛthivī caiva pādayor viṣṇur eva cad pāyau mitras tathopasthe prajāpatir ariṃdamad mūrdhni caiva diśaḥ prāhur buddhau brahmā pratiṣṭhitaḥd budhyamāno tmaniṣṭhaḥ syād adhiṣṭhātā tu śaṃkarad abuddhaś cābhavat tasmād budhyamānān na saṃśayaḥd ābhyām anyaḥ paro buddho vedavādeṣu śaṃkarad yadāśritāni deheṣu daivatāni pṛthak pṛthakd yo gnaye yajate nityam ātmayājī samāhitaḥd ya evam anupaśyeta daivatāni samāhitaḥd so tra yogī bhavaty eva ya evam anupaśyatid sa sarvayajñayājibhyo hy ātmayājī viśiṣyated mukhe juhoti yo nityaṃ kṛtsnaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagatd so tmavit procyate tajjñair mahādeva mahātmabhiḥd sarvebhyaḥ paramebhyo vai daivatebhyo hy ātmayājinād gantavyaṃ param ākāṅkṣan param eva vicintayand yathā saṃkramate dehād dehī tripurasūdanad tathāsya sthānam ākhyāsye pṛthaktveneha śaṃkarad pādābhyāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ sthānam āpnoti viniyojanātd pāyunā mitram āpnoti upasthena prajāpatimd nābhyā ca vāruṇaṃ sthānaṃ stanābhyāṃ tu bhuvo labhetd bāhubhyāṃ vāsavaṃ sthānaṃ śrotrābhyām āpnuyād diśaḥd ādityaṃ cakṣuṣā sthānaṃ mūrdhnā brahmaṇa eva cad atha mūrdhasu yaḥ prāṇān dhārayeta samāhitaḥd buddhyā mānam avāpnoti dravyāvasthaṃ na saṃśayaḥd avyaktāt paramaṃ śuddham aprameyam anāmayamd tam āhuḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ yad yad āpnoti buddhimānd budhyamānāprabuddhābhyāṃ sa buddha iti paṭhyated budhyamānam abuddhaś ca nityam evānupaśyatid vikārapuruṣas tv eṣa budhyamāna iti smṛtaḥd pañcaviṃśatitattvaṃ tat procyate tatra saṃśayaḥd sa eṣa prakṛtisthatvāt tasthur ity upadiśyated mahān ātmā mahādeva mahān atrādhitiṣṭhatid adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā procyate śāstradarśanātd eṣa cetayate deva mohajālam abuddhimānd avyaktasyaiva sādharmyam etad āhur manīṣiṇaḥd so haṃ so ham ato nityād ajñānād iti manyated yadi budhyati caivāyaṃ manyeyam iti bhāsvaraḥd na prabuddho na varteta pānīyaṃ matsyako yathād devatā nikhilenaitāḥ proktās tribhuvaneśvarad yogakṛtyaṃ tu tāvan me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥd śūnyāgāreṣv araṇyeṣu sāgare vā guhāsu vād viṣṭambhayitvā trīn daṇḍān avāpto hy advayo bhavetd prāṅmukhodaṅmukho vāpi tathā paścānmukho pi vād dakṣiṇāvadano vāpi baddhvā vidhivad āsanamd svastikenopasaṃviṣṭaḥ kāyam unnāmya bhāsvaramd yathopadiṣṭaṃ guruṇā tathā tad brahma dhārayetd laghvāhāro yato dāntas trikālaparivarjakaḥd mūtrotsargapurīṣābhyām āhāre ca samāhitaḥd śeṣakālaṃ tu yuñjīta manasā susamāhitaḥd indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo manasā vinivartayetd manas tathaiva saṃgṛhya buddhyā buddhimatāṃ varad vidhāvamānaṃ dhairyeṇa visphurantam itas tataḥd nirudhya sarvasaṃkalpāṃs tato vai sthiratāṃ vrajetd ekāgras tad vijānīyāt sarvaṃ guhyatamaṃ paramd nivātastha ivālolo yathā dīpo tidīpyated ūrdhvam eva na tiryak ca tathaiva bhrāmyate manaḥd hṛdisthas tiṣṭhate yo sau tathaivābhimukho yadād mano bhavati deveśa pāṣāṇam iva niścalamd sa nirjane vinirghoṣe saghoṣe cāvasañ janed yukto yo na vikampeta yogī yogavidhiḥ śrutaḥd tataḥ paśyati tad brahma jvalad ātmani saṃsthitamd vidyud ambudhare yadvat tadvad ekam anāśrayamd tamasy agādhe tiṣṭhantaṃ nistamaskam acetanamd cetayānam acetaṃ ca dīpyamānaṃ svatejasād aṅguṣṭhaparvamātraṃ tan naiḥśreyasam aninditamd mahad bhūtam anantaṃ ca svatantraṃ vigatajvaramd jyotiṣāṃ jyotiṣaṃ devaṃ viṣṇum atyantanirmalamd nārāyaṇam aṇīyāṃsam īśvarāṇām adhīśvaramd viśvataḥ paramaṃ nityaṃ viśvaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhumd avijñāya nimajjanti lokāḥ saṃsārasāgared yaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatayas tāta na śocanti gatajvarāḥd janmamṛtyubhayān muktās tīrṇāḥ saṃsārasāgaramd aṇimā laghimā bhūmā prāptiḥ prākāmyam eva cad īśitvaṃ ca vaśitvaṃ ca yatrakāmāvasāyitād etad aṣṭaguṇaṃ yogaṃ yogānām abhitaḥ smṛtamd dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ nirātmānam aprameyaṃ sanātanamd te viśanti śarīrāṇi yogenānena bhāsvaramd daityadevamanuṣyāṇāṃ balena balavattamāḥd etat tattvam anādyantaṃ yad bhavān anupṛcchatid nityaṃ vayam upāsyāmo yogadharmaṃ sanātanamd yogadharmān na dharmo sti garīyān surasattamad etad dharmaṃ hi dharmāṇām apunarbhavasaṃskṛtamd tattvataḥ param astīti ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥd ke cid āhuḥ paraṃ nāsti ye jñānaphalam āśritāḥd jñānasthaḥ puruṣas tv eṣa vikṛtaḥ svena varṇitaḥd yaṃ dhyānenānupaśyanti nityaṃ yogaparāyaṇāḥd tam eva puruṣaṃ devaṃ ke cid eva maheśvarad nityam anyatamāḥ prāhur jñānaṃ paramakaṃ smṛtamd jñānam eva vinirmuktāḥ sāṃkhyā gacchanti kevalamd cintādhyātmani cānyatra yogāḥ paramabuddhayaḥd uktam etāvad etat te yogadarśanam uttamamd sanatkumāraḥd sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi parisaṃkhyānidarśanamd indriyebhyo manaḥ pūrvam ahaṃkāras tataḥ paramd ahaṃkārāt parā buddhir buddheḥ parataraṃ mahatd mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥd etāvad etat sāṃkhyānāṃ darśanaṃ devasattamad avyaktaṃ buddhyahaṃkārau mahābhūtāni pañca cad manas tathā viśeṣāś ca daśa caivendriyāṇi cad eṣā tattvacaturviṃśan mahāpuruṣasaṃmitād budhyamānena deveśa cetanena mahātmanād saṃyogam etayor nityam āhur avyaktapuṃsayoḥd ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca sargapralayakoṭiśaḥd tamaḥsaṃjñitam etad dhi pravadanti triśūladhṛkd samutpāṭya yathāvyaktāj jīvā yānti punaḥ punaḥd ādir eṣa mahān ātmā guṇānām iti naḥ prabhod guṇasthatvād guṇaṃ tv enam āhur avyaktalakṣaṇamd etenādhyuṣito vyaktas triguṇaṃ cetayaty athad acetanaprakṛtyaiṣa na cānyam anubudhyated budhyamāno hy ahaṃkārī nityaṃ mānāprabodhanātd vimalasya viśuddhasya nīrujasya mahātmanaḥd vimalodāraśīlaḥ syād budhyamānāprabuddhayoḥd draṣṭā bhavaty abhoktā ca sattvamūrtiś ca nirguṇaḥd budhyamānāprabuddhābhyām anya eva tu nirguṇaḥd upekṣakaḥ śucis tābhyām ubhābhyām ayutas tathād budhyamāno na budhyeta buddham evaṃ sanātanamd sa eva buddher avyaktasvabhāvatvād acetanaḥd so ham eva na me nyo sti ya evam abhimanyated na manyate mamānyo sti yena ceto smy acetanaḥd evam evābhimanyeta budhyamāno py anātmavānd aham eva na me nyo sti na prabuddhavaśānugaḥd avyaktastho guṇān eṣa nityam evābhimanyated tenādhiṣṭhitatattvajñair mahadbhir abhidhīyated ahaṃkāreṇa saṃyuktas tatas tam abhimanyated kṣetraṃ praviśya durbuddhir budhyamāno hy anātmavānd aham eva sṛjaty anyaṃ dvitīyaṃ lokasārathiḥd sarvabhāvair ahaṃkārais tṛtīyaṃ sargasaṃjñitamd tato bhūtāny ahaṃkāram ahaṃkāro mano sṛjatd sarvasrotasy abhimukhaṃ saṃprāvartata buddhimānd tathaiva yajñe bhūteṣu viṣayārthī punaḥ punaḥd indriyaiḥ saha śūlāṅka pañcapañcabhir eva cad mano veda na cātmānam ahaṃkāraṃ prajāpatiḥd na veda vāpy ahaṃkāro buddhiṃ buddhimatāṃ varad evam ete mahābhāga netare nayavādinaḥd ahaṃkāreṇa saṃyuktaḥ srotasy abhimukhaḥ sadād evam eṣa vikārātmā mahāpuruṣasaṃjñakaḥd pratanoti jagat kṛtsnaṃ punar ādadate sakṛtd saṃsaktatvāj jagat kṛtsnam avyaktasya hṛdi sthitamd saṃviśad rajanīṃ kṛtsnāṃ niśānte divasāgamed punar ātmā vijayate bahavo nirguṇās tathād ajñānena samāyuktaḥ so vyaktena tamotmanād yadi hy eṣo nu manyeta mamāsti parato paraḥd sa punaḥ punar ātmānaṃ na kuryād ākṣipeta cad etam avyaktaviṣayaṃ sūkṣmaṃ manyeta buddhimānd pañcaviṃśaṃ mahādeva mahāpuruṣavaikṛtamd prabuddho buddhavān etat sṛjamānam abuddhavānd guṇān punaś ca tān eva so tmanātmani nikṣipetd avyaktasya vaśībhūto so jñānasya tamotmanaḥd budhyamāno hy abuddhasya buddhas tad anubhujyated upekṣakaḥ śucir vyagraḥ so liṅgaḥ so vraṇo malaḥd ṣaḍviṃśo bhagavān āste buddhaḥ śuddho nirāmayaḥd avyaktādi viśeṣāntam etad vaidyā vadanty utad etair eva vihīnaṃ tu ke cid āhur manīṣiṇaḥd nistattvaṃ budhyamānās tu ke cid āhur mahāmated ke cid āhur mahātmānas tattvasaṃjñitam eva tud tattvasya śravaṇād enaṃ tattvam eva vadanti vaid tattvasaṃśrayaṇāc caiva sattvavantaṃ maheśvarad evam eṣa vikārātmā budhyamāno mahābhujad avyakto bhavate vyaktau sattvaṃ sattvaṃ tathā guṇaud vidyā ca bhavate vidyā bhavate grahasaṃjñitamd ya evam anubudhyante yogasāṃkhyāś ca tattvataḥd te vyaktaṃ śaṃkarāgāḍhaṃ muñcante śāstrabuddhayaḥd teṣām evaṃ tu vadatāṃ śāstrārthaṃ sūkṣmadarśināmd buddhir vistīryate sarvaṃ tailabindur ivāmbhasid vidyā tu sarvavidyānām avabodha iti smṛtaḥd yena vidyām avidyāṃ ca vindanti yatisattamāḥd saiṣā trayī parā vidyā caturthy ānvīkṣikī smṛtād yāṃ budhyamāno budhyeta buddhyātmani samaṃ gataḥd aprabuddham athāvyaktam avidyāsaṃjñakaṃ smṛtamd vimohanaṃ tu śokena kevalena samanvitamd etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇamd ye tv etan nāvabudhyante te prabuddhavaśānugāḥd te punaḥ punar avyaktāj janiṣyanty abudhātmanaḥd tam eva tulayiṣyanti abuddhavaśavartinaḥd ye cāpy anye tanmanasas te py etatphalabhāginaḥd viditvaitaṃ na śocanti yogopetārthadarśinaḥd svātantryaṃ pratilapsyante kevalatvaṃ ca bhāsvaramd ajñānabandhanān muktās tīrṇāḥ saṃsārabandhanātd ajñānasāgaraṃ ghoram agādhaṃ tam asaṃjñakamd yatra majjanti bhūtāni punaḥ punar ariṃdamad eṣā vidyā tathāvidyā kathitā te mayārthataḥd yasmin deyaṃ ca no grāhyaṃ sāṃkhyāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ tathaiva cad tathā caikatvanānātvam akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva cad nigadiṣyāmi deveśa vimokṣaṃ trividhaṃ ca ted budhyamānāprabuddhābhyām abuddhasya prapañcanamd bhūya eva nibodha tvaṃ devānāṃ devasattamad yac ca kiṃ cic chrutaṃ na syād dṛṣṭaṃ naiva ca kiṃ canad sanatkumāraḥd tac ca te saṃpravakṣyāmi ekāgraḥ śṛṇu tatparaḥd ariṣṭāni pravakṣyāmi tattvena śṛṇu tad bhavānd madhya uttaratas tāta dakṣiṇāmukhaniṣṭhitamd vidyutsaṃsthānapuruṣaṃ yadi paśyeta mānavaḥd varṣatrayeṇa jānīyād dehanyāsam upasthitamd etat phalam ariṣṭasya śaṃkarāhur manīṣiṇaḥd śuddhamaṇḍalam ādityam araśmim atha paśyataḥd varṣārdhakena jānīyād dehanyāsam upasthitamd chidrāṃ candramasaś chāyāṃ pādāv apy anupaśyataḥd saṃvatsareṇa jānīyād dehanyāsam upasthitamd kanīnikāyām aśiraḥ puruṣaṃ yadi paśyatid jānīyāt ṣaṭsu māseṣu dehanyāsam upasthitamd karṇau pidhāya hastābhyāṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇuyād yadid vijānīyāt tu māsena dehanyāsam upasthitamd visragandham upāghrāti surabhiṃ prāpya bhāsvaramd devatāyatanastho pi saptarātreṇa mṛtyubhākd sarvāṅgadhāraṇāvasthāṃ dhārayeta samāhitaḥd yathā sa mṛtyuṃ jayati nānyatheha maheśvarad yadi jīvitum iccheta cirakālaṃ mahāmuned atha necchec ciraṃ kālaṃ tyajed ātmānam ātmanād kevalaṃ cintayānas tu niṣkalaṃ sa nirāmayamd atha taṃ nirvikāraṃ tu prakṛteḥ paramaṃ śuciḥd puruṣaṃ tena sādharmyaṃ dehanyāsam upāśnuyātd jāgrato hi mayoktāni tavāriṣṭāni tattvataḥd dhāraṇāc caiva sarvāṅge mṛtyuṃ jīyāt surarṣabhad ekatvadarśanaṃ bhūyo nānātvaṃ ca nibodha med akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva catuṣṭayavidhānataḥd avyaktādīni tattvāni sarvāṇy eva mahādyuted āhuś caturviṃśatimaṃ vikāraṃ puruṣānvitamd ekatvadarśanaṃ caiva nānātvenāvaraṃ smṛtamd pañcaviṃśativargaḥ syād apavargo jarāmaraḥd sa nirvikāraḥ puruṣas tattvenaivopadiśyated sa eva pañcaviṃśas tu vikāraḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥd yady eṣa nirvikāraḥ syāt tattvaṃ na tu bhaved bhavad vikārā vidyamānās tu tattvasaṃjñaka ucyated yady eṣo vyaktatāṃ naiti vyatirekān na saṃśayaḥd tathā bhavati nistattvas tathā sattvas tathā guṇaḥd vikāraguṇasaṃtyāgāt prakṛtyanyatvataḥ śuciḥd tadā nānātvatām eti sargahīno pavargabhākd bodhyamānaḥ prabudhyeta samo bhavati buddhimānd akṣaraś ca bhavaty eṣa yathā vā cyutavān kṣaṇātd avyaktā vyaktir uktā syān nirguṇasya guṇākarātd etad ekatvanānātvam akṣaraḥ kṣara eva cad vyākhyātaṃ tava śūlāṅka tathāriṣṭāni caiva hid vimokṣalakṣaṇaṃ śeṣaṃ tad apīha bravīmi ted yaṃ jñātvā yatayaḥ prāptāḥ kevalatvam anāmayamd sāṃkhyāś cāpy atha yogāś ca dagdhapaṅkā gatajvarāḥd amūrtitvam anuprāptā nirguṇā nirbhayā bhavad vipāpmāno mahādeva muktāḥ saṃsārasāgarātd saraṇe prajanādāne guṇānāṃ prakṛtiḥ sadād parā pramattā satatam etāvat kāryakāraṇamd asac caiva ca sac caiva kurute sa punaḥ punaḥd caitanyena purāṇena cetanācetanāt paraḥd yas tu cetayate ceto manasā caikabuddhikamd sa naiva san na caivāsat sadasan na ca saṃsmṛtaḥd vyatiriktaś ca śuddhaś ca so nyaś cāprakṛtis tathād upekṣakaś ca prakṛter vikārapuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥd vikārapuruṣeṇaiṣā saṃyuktā sṛjate jagatd punar ādadate caiva guṇānām anyathātmanid matsyodakāt sa saṃjñātaḥ prakṛter eva karmaṇaḥd tadvat kṣetrasahasrāṇi sa eva prakariṣyatid kṣetrapralayatajjñas tu kṣetrajña iti cocyated saṃyogo nitya ity āhur ye janās tattvadarśinaḥd evam eṣa hy asat sac ca vikārapuruṣaḥ smṛtaḥd vikārāpadyamānaṃ tu vikṛtiṃ pravadanti naḥd yadā tv eṣa vikārasya prakṛtānīti manyated tadā vikāratām eti vikārānyatvatāṃ vrajetd prakṛtyā ca vikāraiś ca vyatirikto yadā bhavetd śuci yat paramaṃ śuddhaṃ pratibuddhaṃ sanātanamd ayuktaṃ niṣkalaṃ śuddham avyayājaram avraṇamd sametya tena śuddhena budhyamānaḥ sa bhāsvaraḥd vimokṣaṃ bhajate vyaktād aprabuddhād acetanātd udumbarād vā maśakaḥ pralayān nirgato yathād tathāvyaktasya saṃtyāgān nirmamaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥd yathā puṣkaraparṇastho jalabindur na saṃśliṣetd tathaivāvyaktaviṣaye na lipyet pañcaviṃśakaḥd ākāśa iva niḥsaṅgas tathāsaṅgas tathā varaḥd pañcaviṃśatitamo buddho buddhena samatāṃ gataḥd etad dhi prakṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tattvataś ca samutthitamd pūrvajebhyas tathotpannaṃ brahmajebhyas tato naghad ādisargo mahābāho tāmasenāvṛtaṃ paramd praviṣṭāvayavaṃ devam abhedyam ajarāmaramd sanakaḥ sanandanaś caiva tṛtīyaś ca sanātanaḥd te viduḥ paramaṃ dharmam avyayaṃ vyayadharṣaṇamd avyaktāt paramāt sūkṣmād avraṇān mūrtisaṃjñakātd kṣetrajño bhagavān āste nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥd asmākaṃ sahajātānām utpannaṃ jñānam uttamamd ete hi mūrtimanto vai lokān pravicarāmahed punaḥ punaḥ prajātā vai tatra tatra pinākadhṛkd dvaṃdvair virajyamānasya jñānam utpannam uttamamd kapilān mūlaācāryāt tattvabuddhiviniścayamd yogasāṃkhyam avāptaṃ me kārtsnyena munisattamātd tena saṃbodhitāḥ śiṣyā bahavas tattvadarśinaḥd tad buddhvā bahavaḥ śiṣyā mayāpy etan nidarśitāḥd janmamṛtyuharaṃ tathyaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ sanātanamd yaj jñātvā nānuśocanti tattvajñānān nirindriyāḥd śuddhabījamalāś caiva vipaṅkā vai nirakṣarāḥd svatantrās te svatantreṇa saṃmitā niṣkalāḥ smṛtāḥd śāśvatāś cāvyayāś caiva tamogrāhyāś ca bhāsvarāḥd vipāpmānas tathā sarve sattvasthāś cāpi nirvraṇāḥd vimuktāḥ kevalāś caiva vītamohabhayās tathād amūrtās te mahābhāga sarve ca vigatajvarāḥd hiraṇyanābhas triśirās tathā prahrādabhāskaraud vasur viśvāvasuś caiva sārdhaṃ pañcaśikhas tathād gārgyo thāsurir āvantyo gautamo vrata eva cad kātyāyano tha namucir hariś ca damanaś ca had ete cānye ca bahavas tattvam evopadarśitāḥd ke cin muktāḥ sthitāḥ ke cic chandataś cāpare mṛtāḥd darśitās trividhaṃ bandhaṃ vimokṣaṃ trividhaṃ tathād ajñānaṃ caiva rāgaś ca saṃyogaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathād etebhyo bandhanaṃ proktaṃ vimokṣam api me śṛṇud paritas tāvatā samyak saṃbandho yāvatā kṛtaḥd kṛtsnakṣayaparityāgād vimokṣa iti naḥ śrutiḥd bhīṣmaḥd nivṛttaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyaḥ kevalaḥ puruṣo malaḥd ity evam uktvā bhagavān īśvarāya mahātmaned sanatkumāraḥ prayayāv ākāśaṃ samupāśritaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa yad varaṃ sarvatīrthānāṃ tad bravīhi pitāmahac yatra vai paramaṃ śaucaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi bhīṣma uvācaa sarvāṇi khalu tīrthāni guṇavanti manīṣiṇāmc yat tu tīrthaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca tan me śṛṇu samāhitaḥa agādhe vimale śuddhe satyatoye dhṛtihradec snātavyaṃ mānase tīrthe sattvam ālambya śāśvatama tīrthaśaucam anarthitvamārdavaṃ satyam ārjavamc ahiṃsā sarvabhūtānām ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥa nirmamā nirahaṃkārā nirdvaṃdvā niṣparigrahāḥc śucayas tīrthabhūtās te ye bhaikṣam upabhuñjatea tattvavit tv anahaṃbuddhis tīrthaṃ paramam ucyateb nārāyaṇe tha rudre vā bhaktis tīrthaṃ paraṃ matamc śaucalakṣaṇam etat te sarvatraivānvavekṣaṇama rajas tamaḥ sattvam atho yeṣāṃ nirdhautam ātmanaḥc śaucāśauce na te saktāḥ svakāryaparimārgiṇaḥa sarvatyāgeṣv abhiratāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvadarśinaḥc śaucena vṛttaśaucārthās te tīrthāḥ śucayaś ca tea nodakaklinnagātras tu snāta ity abhidhīyatec sa snāto yo damasnātaḥ sabāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥa atīteṣv anapekṣā ye prāpteṣv artheṣu nirmamāḥc śaucam eva paraṃ teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ notpadyate spṛhāa prajñānaṃ śaucam eveha śarīrasya viśeṣataḥc tathā niṣkiṃcanatvaṃ ca manasaś ca prasannatāa vṛttaśaucaṃ manaḥśaucaṃ tīrthaśaucaṃ paraṃ hitamc jñānotpannaṃ ca yac chaucaṃ tac chaucaṃ paramaṃ matama manasātha pradīpena brahmajñānabalena cac snātā ye mānase tīrthe tajjñāḥ kṣetrajñadarśinaḥa samāropitaśaucas tu nityaṃ bhāvasamanvitaḥc kevalaṃ guṇasaṃpannaḥ śucir eva naraḥ sadāa śarīrasthāni tīrthāni proktāny etāni bhāratac pṛthivyāṃ yāni tīrthāni puṇyāni śṛṇu tāny apia yathā śarīrasyoddeśāḥ śucayaḥ parinirmitāḥc tathā pṛthivyā bhāgāś ca puṇyāni salilāni caa prārthanāc caiva tīrthasya snānāc ca pitṛtarpaṇātc dhunanti pāpaṃ tīrtheṣu pūtā yānti divaṃ sukhama parigrahāc ca sādhūnāṃ pṛthivyāś caiva tejasāc atīva puṇyās te bhāgāḥ salilasya ca tejasāa manasaś ca pṛthivyāś ca puṇyatīrthās tathāparec ubhayor eva yaḥ snātaḥ sa siddhiṃ śīghram āpnuyāta yathā balaṃ kriyāhīnaṃ kriyā vā balavarjitāc neha sādhayate kāryaṃ samāyuktas tu sidhyatia evaṃ śarīraśaucena tīrthaśaucena cānvitaḥc tataḥ siddhim avāpnoti dvividhaṃ śaucam uttamamd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd sarveṣām upavāsānāṃ yac chreyaḥ sumahat phalamd bhīṣmaḥd yac cāpy asaṃśayaṃ loke tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasid śṛṇu rājan yathā gītaṃ svayam eva svayaṃbhuvād yat kṛtvā nirvṛto bhūyāt puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥd dvādaśyāṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu ahorātreṇa keśavamd arcyāśvamedham āpnoti duṣkṛtaṃ cāsya naśyatid tathaiva pauṣamāse tu pūjya nārāyaṇeti cad vājapeyam avāpnoti siddhiṃ ca paramāṃ vrajetd ahorātreṇa dvādaśyāṃ māghamāse tu mādhavamd rājasūyam avāpnoti kulaṃ caiva samuddharetd tathaiva phālgune māsi govindeti ca pūjayetd atirātram avāpnoti somalokaṃ ca gacchatid ahorātreṇa dvādaśyāṃ caitre viṣṇur iti smarand pauṇḍarīkam avāpnoti devalokaṃ ca gacchatid vaiśākhamāse dvādaśyāṃ pūjayan madhusūdanamd agniṣṭomam avāpnoti somalokaṃ ca gacchatid ahorātreṇa dvādaśyāṃ jyeṣṭhe māsi trivikramamd gavāmayam avāpnoti apsarobhiś ca modated āṣāḍhe māsi dvādaśyāṃ vāmaneti ca pūjayetd naramedham avāpnoti puṇyaṃ ca labhate mahatd ahorātreṇa dvādaśyāṃ śrāvaṇe māsi śrīdharamd pañcayajñān avāpnoti vimānasthaḥ sa modated tathā bhādrapade māsi hṛṣīkeśeti pūjayand sautrāmaṇim avāpnoti pūtātmā bhavate ca hid dvādaśyām āśvine māsi padmanābheti cārcayand gosahasraphalaṃ puṇyaṃ prāpnuyān nātra saṃśayaḥd dvādaśyāṃ kārttike māsi pūjya dāmodareti cad gavāṃ yajñam avāpnoti pumān strī vā na saṃśayaḥd abhyarcya puṇḍarīkākṣam evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ tu yaḥd jātismaratvaṃ prāpnoti vindyād bahu suvarṇakamd ahany ahani tadbhāvam upendraṃ yo dhigacchatid samāpte bhojayed viprān atha vā dāpayed dhṛtamd ataḥparaṃ nopavāso bhavatīti viniścayaḥd uvāca bhagavān viṣṇuḥ svayam eva purātanamdA vaiśaṃpāyanaḥdA śaratalpagataṃ bhīṣmaṃ vṛddhaṃ kurupitāmahamdA upagamya mahāprājñaḥ paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥdA yudhiṣṭhiraḥdA jñānaṃ rūpaṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ priyatvaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavetdA bhīṣmaḥdA dharmārthakāmasaṃyuktaḥ sukhabhāgī kathaṃ bhavetdA mārgaśīrṣasya māsasya candre mūlena saṃyutedA pādau mūlena rājendra jaṅghāyām atha rohiṇīmdA aśvinyāṃ sakthinī caiva ūrū cāṣāḍhayos tathādA guhyaṃ tu phālgunī vidyāt kṛttikā kaṭikās tathādA nābhiṃ bhādrapade vidyād revatyām akṣimaṇḍalamdA pṛṣṭham eva dhaniṣṭhāsu anurādhottarās tathādA bāhubhyāṃ tu viśākhāsu hastau hasteṣu nirdiśetdA punarvasv aṅgulī rājann āśleṣāsu nakhās tathādA grīvā jyeṣṭhā ca rājendra śravaṇena tu karṇayoḥdA mukhaṃ puṣyeṇa rājendra dantoṣṭhau svātir ucyatedA hastaṃ śatabhiṣāṃ caiva maghāṃ caivātha nāsikāmdA netre mṛgaśiro vidyāl lalāṭaṃ mitram eva tudA bharaṇyāṃ tu śiro vidyāt keśān ārdrāṃ narādhipadA samāpte tu ghṛtaṃ dadyād brāhmaṇe vedapāragedA subhago darśanīyaś ca jñānī bhogī ca jāyatedA jāyate paripūrṇāṅgaḥ paurṇamāsyām ivoḍurāṭ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa pitāmaha mahābāho sarvaśāstraviśāradac śrotum icchāmi martyānāṃ saṃsāravidhim uttamama kena vṛttena rājendra vartamānā narā yudhic prāpnuvanty uttamaṃ svargaṃ kathaṃ ca narakaṃ nṛpaa mṛtaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥc prayānty amuṃ lokam itaḥ ko vai tān anugacchati bhīṣma uvācaa asāv āyāti bhagavān bṛhaspatir udāradhīḥc pṛcchainaṃ sumahābhāgam etad guhyaṃ sanātanama naitad anyena śakyaṃ hi vaktuṃ kena cid adya vaic vaktā bṛhaspatisamo na hy anyo vidyate kva cit vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ pārthagāṅgeyayos tadāc ājagāma viśuddhātmā bhagavān sa bṛhaspatiḥa tato rājā samutthāya dhṛtarāṣṭrapurogamaḥc pūjām anupamāṃ cakre sarve te ca sabhāsadaḥa tato dharmasuto rājā bhagavantaṃ bṛhaspatimc upagamya yathānyāyaṃ praśnaṃ papraccha suvrataḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa bhagavan sarvadharmajña sarvaśāstraviśāradac martyasya kaḥ sahāyo vai pitā mātā suto guruḥa mṛtaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥc gacchanty amutralokaṃ vai ka enam anugacchati bṛhaspatir uvācaa ekaḥ prasūto rājendra jantur eko vinaśyatic ekas tarati durgāṇi gacchaty ekaś ca durgatima asahāyaḥ pitā mātā tathā bhrātā suto guruḥc jñātisaṃbandhivargaś ca mitravargas tathaiva caa mṛtaṃ śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamaṃ janāḥc muhūrtam upatiṣṭhanti tato yānti parāṅmukhāḥe tais tac charīram utsṛṣṭaṃ dharma eko nugacchatia tasmād dharmaḥ sahāyārthe sevitavyaḥ sadā nṛbhiḥc prāṇī dharmasamāyukto gacchate svargatiṃ parāme tathaivādharmasaṃyukto narakāyopapadyatea tasmān nyāyāgatair arthair dharmaṃ seveta paṇḍitaḥc dharma eko manuṣyāṇāṃ sahāyaḥ pāralaukikaḥa lobhān mohād anukrośād bhayād vāpy abahuśrutaḥc naraḥ karoty akāryāṇi parārthe lobhamohitaḥa dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca tritayaṃ jīvite phalamc etat trayam avāptavyam adharmaparivarjitam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa śrutaṃ bhagavato vākyaṃ dharmayuktaṃ paraṃ hitamc śarīravicayaṃ jñātuṃ buddhis tu mama jāyatea mṛtaṃ śarīrarahitaṃ sūkṣmam avyaktatāṃ gatamc acakṣurviṣayaṃ prāptaṃ kathaṃ dharmo nugacchati bṛhaspatir uvācaa pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamamc buddhir ātmā ca sahitā dharmaṃ paśyanti nityadāa prāṇinām iha sarveṣāṃ sākṣibhūtāni cāniśamc etaiś ca sa ha dharmo pi taṃ jīvam anugacchatia tvagasthimāṃsaṃ śukraṃ ca śoṇitaṃ ca mahāmatec śarīraṃ varjayanty ete jīvitena vivarjitama tato dharmasamāyuktaḥ sa jīvaḥ sukham edhatea prāpnute jīva eva hia tato sya karma paśyanti śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubhama devatāḥ pañcabhūtasthāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasic iha loke pare caiva kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa anudarśitaṃ bhagavatā yathā dharmo nugacchatic etat tu jñātum icchāmi kathaṃ retaḥ pravartate bṛhaspatir uvācaa annam aśnanti ye devāḥ śarīrasthā nareśvarac pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotir manas tathāa tatas tṛpteṣu rājendra teṣu bhūteṣu pañcasuc manaḥṣaṣṭheṣu śuddhātman retaḥ saṃpadyate mahata tato garbhaḥ saṃbhavati strīpuṃsoḥ pārtha saṃgamec etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ākhyātam etad bhavatā garbhaḥ saṃjāyate yathāc yathā jātas tu puruṣaḥ prapadyati tad ucyatām bṛhaspatir uvācaa āsannamātraḥ satataṃ tair bhūtair abhibhūyatec vipramuktaś ca tair bhūtaiḥ punar yāty aparāṃ gatime sa tu bhūtasamāyuktaḥ prāpnute jīva eva haa tato sya karma paśyanti śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubhamc devatāḥ pañcabhūtasthāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa tvagasthimāṃsam utsṛjya taiś ca bhūtair vivarjitaḥc jīvaḥ sa bhagavan kvasthaḥ sukhaduḥkhe samaśnute bṛhaspatir uvāca bhogavaśyaṃ karmavaśyaṃ yātanāvaśyam ity api etat trayāṇām āsādya karmataḥ so śnute phalama jīvo dharmasamāyuktaḥ śīghraṃ retastvam āgataḥc strīṇāṃ puṣpaṃ samāsādya sūte kālena bhārataa yamasya puruṣaiḥ kleśaṃ yamasya puruṣair vadhamc duḥkhaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ ca naraḥ kleśaṃ ca vindatia ihaloke ca sa prāṇī janmaprabhṛti pārthivac svakṛtaṃ karma vai bhuṅkte dharmasya phalam āśritaḥa yadi dharmaṃ yathāśakti janmaprabhṛti sevatec tataḥ sa puruṣo bhūtvā sevate nityadā sukhama athāntarā tu dharmasya adharmam upasevatec sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ sa jīvo py adhigacchatic duḥkhasyānantaraṃ sukhamc etad dvayaṃ dhruvaṃ baddhaḥa adharmeṇa samāyukto yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥc mahad duḥkhaṃ samāsādya tiryagyonau prajāyatea karmaṇā yena yeneha yasyāṃ yonau prajāyatec jīvo mohasamāyuktas tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇua yad etad ucyate śāstre setihāse sacchandasic yamasya viṣayaṃ ghoraṃ martyo lokaḥ prapadyated yad etad ucyate nityam akṛtvā puruṣaḥ sadād kṛmiyonim avāpnoti bahuśaḥ patitas tathād iha sthānāni puṇyāni devatulyāni bhūtaled tiryagyonyatiriktāni gatimanti ca sarvaśaḥd yamasya viṣaye puṇye brahmalokasame guṇaiḥd karmabhir niyatair baddho jantur duḥkhāny upāśnuted yena yena tu pāpena karmaṇā puruṣo gatimd prayāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ tat te vakṣyāmy ataḥ parama adhītya caturo vedān dvijo mohasamanvitaḥc patitāt pratigṛhyātha kharayonau prajāyatea kharo jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhāratac kharo mṛto balīvardaḥ sapta varṣāṇi jīvatia balīvardo mṛtaś cāpi jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥc brahmarakṣas tu trīn māsāṃs tato jāyati brāhmaṇaḥa patitaṃ yājayitvā tu kṛmiyonau prajāyatec tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhārataa kṛmibhāvāt pramuktas tu tato jāyati gardabhaḥc gardabhaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi sūkaraḥd kukkuṭaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi jambukaḥe śvā varṣam ekaṃ bhavati tato jāyati mānavaḥa upādhyāyasya yaḥ pāpaṃ śiṣyaḥ kuryād abuddhimānc sa jīva iha saṃsārāṃs trīn āpnoti na saṃśayaḥa prāk śvā bhavati rājendra tataḥ kravyāt tataḥ kharaḥc tataḥ pretaḥ parikliṣṭaḥ paścāj jāyati brāhmaṇaḥa manasāpi guror bhāryāṃ yaḥ śiṣyo yāti pāpakṛtc so dhamān yāti saṃsārān adharmeṇeha cetasāa śvayonau tu sa saṃbhūtas trīṇi varṣāṇi jīvatic tatrāpi nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ kṛmiyonau prajāyatea kṛmibhāvam anuprāpto varṣam ekaṃ sa jīvatic tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya brahmayonau prajāyatea yadi putrasamaṃ śiṣyaṃ gurur hanyād akāraṇec ātmanaḥ kāmakāreṇa so pi haṃsaḥ prajāyatea pitaraṃ mātaraṃ vāpi yas tu putro vamanyatec so pi rājan mṛto jantuḥ pūrvaṃ jāyati gardabhaḥd gardabhatvaṃ tu saṃprāpya daśa varṣāṇi jīvatid saṃvatsaraṃ tu kumbhīras tato jāyati mānavaḥd putrasya mātāpitarau yasya ruṣṭāv ubhāv apid gurvapadhyānataḥ so pi mṛto jāyati gardabhaḥa kharo jīvati māsāṃs tu daśa śvā ca caturdaśac biḍālaḥ sapta māsāṃs tu tato jāyati mānavaḥa mātāpitaram ākruśya sārikaḥ saṃprajāyatec tāḍayitvā tu tāv eva jāyate kacchapo nṛpaa kacchapo daśa varṣāṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi śalyakaḥc vyālo bhūtvā tu ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyati mānuṣaḥa bhartṛpiṇḍam upāśnan yo rājadviṣṭāni sevatec so pi mohasamāpanno mṛto jāyati vānaraḥa vānaro daśa varṣāṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi mūṣakaḥc śvā bhūtvā cātha ṣaṇ māsāṃs tato jāyati mānuṣaḥd mṛto vānarayonau syāt tato bhavati sūkaraḥd tataḥ śvā cāpi bhavati tato bhavati mānuṣaḥa nyāsāpahartā tu naro yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥc saṃsārāṇāṃ śataṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyatea tatra jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhāratac duṣkṛtasya kṣayaṃ gatvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥa asūyako naraś cāpi mṛto jāyati śārṅgakaḥb asūyakaḥ kutsitaś ca caṇḍālo duḥkham aśnutec viśvāsahartā tu naro mīno jāyati durmatiḥa bhūtvā mīno ṣṭa varṣāṇi mṛgo jāyati bhāratac mṛgas tu caturo māsāṃs tataś chāgaḥ prajāyatea chāgas tu nidhanaṃ prāpya pūrṇe saṃvatsare tataḥc kīṭaḥ saṃjāyate jantus tato jāyati mānuṣaḥa dhānyān yavāṃs tilān māṣān kulatthān sarṣapāṃś caṇānc kalāyān atha mudgāṃś ca godhūmān atasīs tathāa sasyasyānyasya hartā ca mohāj jantur acetanaḥc sa jāyate mahārāja mūṣako nirapatrapaḥd mūṣako jāyate paścāt sūkaro jāyate tataḥa tataḥ pretya mahārāja punar jāyati sūkaraḥc sūkaro jātamātras tu rogeṇa mriyate nṛpaa śvā tato jāyate mūḍhaḥ karmaṇā tena pārthivac śvā bhūtvā pañca varṣāṇi tato jāyati mānuṣaḥa paradārābhimarśaṃ tu kṛtvā jāyati vai vṛkaḥc śvā sṛgālas tato gṛdhro vyālaḥ kaṅko bakas tathāa bhrātur bhāryāṃ tu durbuddhir yo dharṣayati mohitaḥc puṃskokilatvam āpnoti so pi saṃvatsaraṃ nṛpaa sakhibhāryāṃ guror bhāryāṃ rājabhāryāṃ tathaiva cac pradharṣayitvā kāmād yo mṛto jāyati sūkaraḥd śvā biḍālaḥ kukkuṭaś ca jāyetāpi pipīlikāḥa sūkaraḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi śvāvidhaḥb vilāḷaḥ pañca varṣāṇi pañca varṣāṇi kukkuṭaḥc pipīlakas tu ṣaṇ māsān kīṭaḥ syān māsam eva cae etān āsādya saṃsārān kṛmiyonau prajāyatea tatra jīvati māsāṃs tu kṛmiyonau trayodaśac tato dharmakṣayaṃ kṛtvā punar jāyati mānuṣaḥa upasthite vivāhe tu dāne yajñe pi vābhibhoc mohāt karoti yo vighnaṃ sa mṛto jāyate kṛmiḥd devālayādhipatyaṃ hi kuryāt tad dravyabhakṣakaḥd śvā bhūtvā sapta janmāni tato jāyati mānavaḥd dvijagrāmādhipatyaṃ hi kṛtvā brahmasvabhakṣakaḥd śvānayoniśataṃ prāpya caṇḍālaḥ puṣkalas tataḥd varṣāt pañcadaśāt pūrvaṃ kramād bhavati mānuṣaḥa kṛmir jīvati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhāratac adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥa pūrvaṃ dattvā tu yaḥ kanyāṃ dvitīye saṃprayacchatic so pi rājan mṛto jantuḥ kṛmiyonau prajāyatea tatra jīvati varṣāṇi trayodaśa yudhiṣṭhirac adharmasaṃkṣaye yuktas tato jāyati mānuṣaḥd tato nidhanam āpanno mānuṣatvam upāśnutea devakāryam upākṛtya pitṛkāryam athāpi cac anirvāpya samaśnan vai tato jāyati vāyasaḥa vāyaso daśa varṣāṇi tato jāyati kukkuṭaḥc jāyate lavakaś cāpi māsaṃ tasmāt tu mānuṣaḥa jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṛsamaṃ cāpi bhrātaraṃ yo vamanyatec so pi mṛtyum upāgamya krauñcayonau prajāyatea krauñco jīvati māsāṃs tu daśa dvau sapta pañca cac tato nidhanam āpanno mānuṣatvam upāśnutea vṛṣalo brāhmaṇīṃ gatvā kṛmiyonau prajāyatec tatrāpatyaṃ samutpādya tato jāyati mūṣakaḥa kṛtaghnas tu mṛto rājan yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥc yamasya viṣaye kruddhair vadhaṃ prāpnoti dāruṇama paṭṭisaṃ mudgaraṃ śūlam agnikumbhaṃ ca dāruṇamc asipatravanaṃ ghoraṃ vālukāṃ kūṭaśālmalīma etāś cānyāś ca bahvīḥ sa yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥb anyāś ca yātanāḥ prāpya kṛmiyonau prajāyateb tato hataḥ kṛtaghnaḥ sa tatrograir bharatarṣabhac yātanāḥ prāpya tatrogrās tato vadhyati bhārataa saṃsāracakram āsādya kṛmiyonau prajāyatec kṛmir bhavati varṣāṇi daśa pañca ca bhāratae tato garbhaṃ samāsādya tatraiva mriyate śiśuḥa tato garbhaśatair jantur bahubhiḥ saṃprajāyatec saṃsārāṃś ca bahūn gatvā tatas tiryak prajāyatea mṛto duḥkham anuprāpya bahuvarṣagaṇān ihac apunarbhāvasaṃyuktas tataḥ kūrmaḥ prajāyatea aśastraṃ puruṣaṃ hatvā saśastraḥ puruṣādhamaḥc arthārthī yadi vā vairī sa mṛto jāyate kharaḥa kharo jīvati varṣe dve tataḥ śastreṇa vadhyatec sa mṛto mṛgayonau tu nityodvigno bhijāyatea mṛgo vadhyati śastreṇa gate saṃvatsare tu saḥb mṛgo bhūtvā tataḥ śastrair vadhyate bhṛśadāruṇamc hato mṛgas tato mīnaḥ so pi jālena badhyatea māse caturthe saṃprāpte śvāpadaḥ saṃprajāyatec śvāpado daśa varṣāṇi dvīpī varṣāṇi pañca caa tatas tu nidhanaṃ prāptaḥ kālaparyāyacoditaḥc adharmasya kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥa striyaṃ hatvā tu durbuddhir yamasya viṣayaṃ gataḥc bahūn kleśān samāsādya saṃsārāṃś caiva viṃśatima tataḥ paścān mahārāja kṛmiyonau prajāyatec kṛmir viṃśativarṣāṇi bhūtvā jāyati mānuṣaḥa bhojanaṃ corayitvā tu makṣikā jāyate naraḥc makṣikāsaṃghavaśago bahūn māsān bhavaty utae tataḥ pāpakṣayaṃ kṛtvā mānuṣatvam avāpnutea vādyaṃ hṛtvā tu puruṣo maśakaḥ saṃprajāyatec tathā piṇyākasaṃmiśram aśanaṃ corayen naraḥe sa jāyate babhrusamo dāruṇo mūṣako naraḥf daśan vai mānuṣān nityaṃ pāpātmā sa viśāṃ patef ghṛtaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhiḥ kākamadguḥ prajāyatef matsyamāṃsam atho hṛtvā kāko jāyati durmatiḥa lavaṇaṃ corayitvā tu cīrīvākaḥ prajāyatec dadhi hṛtvā bakaś cāpi plavo matsyān asaṃskṛtāna corayitvā payaś cāpi balākā saṃprajāyatec yas tu corayate tailaṃ tailapāyī prajāyatec naro mohasamanvitaḥc so pi rājan mṛto jantuse corayitvā tu durbuddhir madhu daṃśaḥ prajāyatea ayo hṛtvā tu durbuddhir vāyaso jāyate naraḥc pāyasaṃ corayitvā tu tittiritvam avāpnutea hṛtvā paiṣṭam apūpaṃ ca kumbholūkaḥ prajāyatec phalaṃ vā mūlakaṃ hṛtvā apūpaṃ vā pipīlikaḥd phalāni vānaro hṛtvāpūpaṃ hṛtvā pipīlikaḥd corayitvā tu niṣpāvaṃ jāyate halagolakaḥa kāṃsyaṃ hṛtvā tu durbuddhir hārīto jāyate naraḥc rājataṃ bhājanaṃ hṛtvā kapotaḥ saṃprajāyatea hṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kṛmiyonau prajāyateb patrorṇaṃ corayitvā tu kṛkalatvaṃ nigacchatib kauśikaṃ tu tato hṛtvā naro jāyati vartakaḥb aṃśukaṃ corayitvā tu śuko jāyati mānavaḥb corayitvā dukūlaṃ tu mṛto haṃsaḥ prajāyatec krauñcaḥ kārpāsikaṃ hṛtvā mṛto jāyati mānavaḥd sarpaḥ kārpāsakaṃ hṛtvā kṣaumaṃ hṛtvā śaśo bhavetd chāgaś cāpy āvikaṃ hṛtvā kūrmaś carmāpahārakaḥa corayitvā naraḥ paṭṭaṃ tv āvikaṃ vāpi bhāratac kṣaumaṃ ca vastram ādāya śaśo jantuḥ prajāyatea varṇān hṛtvā tu puruṣo mṛto jāyati barhiṇaḥc hṛtvā raktāni vastrāṇi jāyate jīvajīvakaḥa varṇakādīṃs tathā gandhāṃś corayitvā tu mānavaḥc chucchundaritvam āpnoti rājaṃl lobhaparāyaṇaḥd tatra jīvati varṣāṇi tato daśa ca pañca cad adharmasya kṣayaṃ gatvā tato jāyati mānuṣaḥa viśvāsena tu nikṣiptaṃ yo nihnavati mānavaḥc sa gatāsur naras tādṛṅ matsyayonau prajāyatea matsyayonim anuprāpya mṛto jāyati mānuṣaḥc mānuṣatvam anuprāpya kṣīṇāyur upapadyatea pāpāni tu naraḥ kṛtvā tiryag jāyati bhāratac na cātmanaḥ pramāṇaṃ te dharmaṃ jānanti kiṃ canaa ye pāpāni narāḥ kṛtvā nirasyanti vrataiḥ sadāc sukhaduḥkhasamāyuktā vyādhitās te bhavanty utaa asaṃvāsāḥ prajāyante mlecchāś cāpi na saṃśayaḥc narāḥ pāpasamācārā lobhamohasamanvitāḥa varjayanti ca pāpāni janmaprabhṛti ye narāḥb janmaprabhṛti pāpāni varjayanti ca ye narāḥc arogā rūpavantas te dhaninaś ca bhavanty utaa striyo py etena kalpena kṛtvā pāpam avāpnuyuḥc eteṣām eva jantūnāṃ patnītvam upayānti tāḥa parasvaharaṇe doṣāḥ sarva eva prakīrtitāḥc etad vai leśamātreṇa kathitaṃ te mayānaghae aparasmin kathāyoge bhūyaḥ śroṣyasi bhārataa etan mayā mahārāja brahmaṇo vadataḥ purāc surarṣīṇāṃ śrutaṃ madhye pṛṣṭaś cāpi yathātathama mayāpi tava kārtsnyena yathāvad anuvarṇitamc etac chrutvā mahārāja dharme kuru manaḥ sadā yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa adharmasya gatir brahman kathitā me tvayānaghac dharmasya tu gatiṃ śrotum icchāmi vadatāṃ varae kṛtvā karmāṇi pāpāni kathaṃ yānti śubhāṃ gatimf karmaṇā ca kṛteneha kena yānti śubhāṃ gatim bṛhaspatir uvācaa kṛtvā pāpāni karmāṇi adharmavaśam āgataḥc manasā viparītena nirayaṃ pratipadyatea mohād adharmaṃ yaḥ kṛtvā punaḥ samanutapyatec manaḥsamādhisaṃyukto na sa seveta duṣkṛtamd yathā yathā manas tasya duṣkṛtaṃ karma garhated tathā tathā śarīraṃ tu tenādharmeṇa mucyated yadi vyāharate rājan viprāṇāṃ dharmavādināmd tato dharmakṛtāt kṣipram apavādāt pramucyatea yathā yathā naraḥ samyag adharmam anubhāṣatec samāhitena manasā vimucyati tathā tathāe bhujaṃga iva nirmokāt pūrvabhuktāj jarānvitāta adattvāpi pradānāni vividhāni samāhitaḥc manaḥsamādhisaṃyuktaḥ sugatiṃ pratipadyatea pradānāni tu vakṣyāmi yāni dattvā yudhiṣṭhirac naraḥ kṛtvāpy akāryāṇi tadā dharmeṇa yujyatea sarveṣām eva dānānām annaṃ śreṣṭham udāhṛtamc pūrvam annaṃ pradātavyam ṛjunā dharmam icchatāa prāṇā hy annaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmāj jantuś ca jāyatec anne pratiṣṭhitā lokās tasmād annaṃ prakāśatea annam eva praśaṃsanti devarṣipitṛmānavāḥc annasya hi pradānena svargam āpnoti kauśikaḥa nyāyalabdhaṃ pradātavyaṃ dvijebhyo hy annam uttamamc svādhyāyasamupetebhyaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanāa yasya hy annam upāśnanti brāhmaṇānāṃ śatā daśac hṛṣṭena manasā dattaṃ na sa tiryaggatir bhaveta brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśa bhojya nararṣabhac naro dharmāt pramucyeta pāpeṣv abhirataḥ sadāa bhaikṣeṇānnaṃ samāhṛtya vipro vedapuraskṛtaḥb suvarṇadānāt pāpāni naśyanti subahūny apib dattvā vṛttikarīṃ bhūmiṃ pātakenāpi mucyateb pārāyaṇaiś ca vedānāṃ mucyate pātakair dvijaḥb gāyatryāś caiva lakṣeṇa gosahasrasya tarpaṇātb vedārthaṃ jñāpayitvā tu śuddhān viprān yathārthataḥb sarvatyāgādibhiś cāpi mucyate pātakair dvijaḥb sarvātithyaṃ paraṃ hy eṣāṃ tasmād annaṃ paraṃ smṛtamc svādhyāyanirate vipre dattveha sukham edhatea ahiṃsan brāhmaṇaṃ nityaṃ nyāyena paripālya cac kṣatriyas tarasā prāptam annaṃ yo vai prayacchatia dvijebhyo vedavṛddhebhyaḥ prayataḥ susamāhitaḥc tenāpohati dharmātmā duṣkṛtaṃ karma pāṇḍavaa ṣaḍbhāgapariśuddhaṃ ca kṛṣer bhāgam upārjitamc vaiśyo dadad dvijātibhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ parimucyatea avāpya prāṇasaṃdehaṃ kārkaśyena samārjitamc annaṃ dattvā dvijātibhyaḥ śūdraḥ pāpāt pramucyatea aurasena balenānnam arjayitvāvihiṃsakaḥc yaḥ prayacchati viprebhyo na sa durgāṇi sevatea nyāyenāvāptam annaṃ tu naro lobhavivarjitaḥc dvijebhyo vedavṛddhebhyo dattvā pāpāt pramucyatea annam ūrjaskaraṃ loke dattvorjasvī bhaven naraḥb śūdrānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ viprair dharmaparāyaṇaiḥb āpady eva svadāsānāṃ bhoktavyaṃ svayam udyatamc satāṃ panthānam āśritya sarvapāpāt pramucyatea dānakṛdbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthā yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥc te sma prāṇasya dātāras tebhyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥa sarvāvasthaṃ manuṣyeṇa nyāyenānnam upārjitamc kāryaṃ pātragataṃ nityam annaṃ hi paramā gatiḥa annasya hi pradānena naro durgaṃ na sevatec tasmād annaṃ pradātavyam anyāyaparivarjitama yated brāhmaṇapūrvaṃ hi bhoktum annaṃ gṛhī sadāc avandhyaṃ divasaṃ kuryād annadānena mānavaḥa bhojayitvā daśaśataṃ naro vedavidāṃ nṛpac nyāyaviddharmaviduṣām itihāsavidāṃ tathāa na yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ saṃsārāṃś ca na sevatec sarvakāmasamāyuktaḥ pretya cāpy aśnute phalama evaṃ sukhasamāyukto ramate vigatajvaraḥc rūpavān kīrtimāṃś caiva dhanavāṃś copapadyatea etat te sarvam ākhyātam annadānaphalaṃ mahatc mūlam etad dhi dharmāṇāṃ pradānasya ca bhārata yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ahiṃsā vaidikaṃ karma dhyānam indriyasaṃyamaḥc tapo tha guruśuśrūṣā kiṃ śreyaḥ puruṣaṃ prati bṛhaspatir uvācaa sarvāṇy etāni dharmasya pṛthag dvārāṇi sarvaśaḥc śṛṇu saṃkīrtyamānāni ṣaḍ eva bharatarṣabhaa hanta niḥśreyasaṃ jantor ahaṃ vakṣyāmy anuttamamc ahiṃsāpāśrayaṃ dharmaṃ yaḥ sādhayati vai naraḥa trīn doṣān sarvabhūteṣu nidhāya puruṣaḥ sadāc kāmakrodhau ca saṃyamya tataḥ siddhim avāpnutea ahiṃsakāni bhūtāni daṇḍena vinihanti yaḥc ātmanaḥ sukham anvicchan na sa pretya sukhī bhaveta ātmopamaś ca bhūteṣu yo vai bhavati pūruṣaḥc nyastadaṇḍo jitakrodhaḥ sa pretya sukham edhatea sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya sarvabhūtāni paśyataḥc devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥa na tat parasya saṃdadyāt pratikūlaṃ yad ātmanaḥc eṣa saṃkṣepato dharmaḥ kāmād anyaḥ pravartatea pratyākhyāne ca dāne ca sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriyec ātmaupamyena puruṣaḥ samādhim adhigacchatia yathā paraḥ prakramate pareṣutathāparaḥ prakramate parasminc eṣaiva te stūpamā jīvalokeyathā dharmo naipuṇenopadiṣṭaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa ity uktvā taṃ suragurur dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc divam ācakrame dhīmān paśyatām eva nas tadā vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā śaratalpe pitāmahamc punar eva mahātejāḥ papraccha vadatāṃ varama ṛṣayo brāhmaṇā devāḥ praśaṃsanti mahāmatec ahiṃsālakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ vedaprāmāṇyadarśanāta karmaṇā manujaḥ kurvan hiṃsāṃ pārthivasattamac vācā ca manasā caiva kathaṃ duḥkhāt pramucyate bhīṣma uvācaa caturvidheyaṃ nirdiṣṭā ahiṃsā brahmavādibhiḥc eṣaikato pi vibhraṣṭā na bhavaty arisūdanaa yathā sarvaś catuṣpādas tribhiḥ pādair na tiṣṭhatic tathaiveyaṃ mahīpāla procyate kāraṇais tribhiḥa yathā nāgapade nyāni padāni padagāmināmc sarvāṇy evāpidhīyante padajātāni kauñjaree evaṃ lokeṣv ahiṃsā tu nirdiṣṭā dharmataḥ parāa karmaṇā lipyate jantur vācā ca manasaiva caa pūrvaṃ tu manasā tyaktvā tathā vācātha karmaṇāb na bhakṣayeta yo māṃsaṃ trividhaṃ sa vimucyatec trikāraṇaṃ tu nirdiṣṭaṃ śrūyate brahmavādibhiḥa manovāci tathāsvāde doṣā hy eṣu pratiṣṭhitāḥb hiṃsāṃ tu nopayuñjīta tathā hiṃsā caturvidhāb kāye manasi vākye ca doṣā hy ete prakīrtitāḥc na bhakṣayanty ato māṃsaṃ tapoyuktā manīṣiṇaḥa doṣāṃs tu bhakṣaṇe rājan māṃsasyeha nibodha mec putramāṃsopamaṃ jānan khādate yo vicetanaḥd māṃsaṃ mohasamāviṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ so dhamaḥ smṛtaḥa mātāpitṛsamāyoge putratvaṃ jāyate yathāb hiṃsāṃ kṛtvāvaśaḥ pāpo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ jāyate tathāc rasaṃ ca prati jihvāyāḥ prajñānaṃ jāyate tathāe tathā śāstreṣu niyataṃ rāgo hy āsvāditād bhaveta asaṃskṛtāḥ saṃskṛtāś ca lavaṇālavaṇās tathāc prajñāyante yathā bhāvās tathā cittaṃ nirudhyatea bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgādyāṃs tantrīśabdāṃś ca puṣkalānc niṣeviṣyanti vai mandā māṃsabhakṣāḥ kathaṃ narāḥd pareṣāṃ dhanadhānyānāṃ hiṃsakāḥ stāvakās tathād praśaṃsakāś ca māṃsasya nityaṃ svarge bahiṣkṛtāḥa acintitam anuddiṣṭam asaṃkalpitam eva cac rasaṃ gṛddhyābhibhūtā vai praśaṃsanti phalārthinaḥe praśaṃsā hy eva māṃsasya doṣakarmaphalānvitāf bhasma viṣṭhā kṛmir vāpi niṣṭhā yasyedṛśī dhruvāf sa kāyaḥ parapīḍābhiḥ kathaṃ dhāryo vipaścitāa jīvitaṃ hi parityajya bahavaḥ sādhavo janāḥc svamāṃsaiḥ paramāṃsāni paripālya divaṃ gatāḥa evam eṣā mahārāja caturbhiḥ kāraṇair vṛtāc ahiṃsā tava nirdiṣṭā sarvadharmārthasaṃhitā yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ahiṃsā paramo dharma ity uktaṃ bahuśas tvayāc śrāddheṣu ca bhavān āha pitṝn āmiṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥa māṃsair bahuvidhaiḥ proktas tvayā śrāddhavidhiḥ purāc ahatvā ca kuto māṃsam evam etad virudhyatea jāto naḥ saṃśayo dharme māṃsasya parivarjanec doṣo bhakṣayataḥ kaḥ syāt kaś cābhakṣayato guṇaḥa hatvā bhakṣayato vāpi pareṇopahṛtasya vāc hanyād vā yaḥ parasyārthe krītvā vā bhakṣayen naraḥa etad icchāmi tattvena kathyamānaṃ tvayānaghac niścayena cikīrṣāmi dharmam etaṃ sanātanama katham āyur avāpnoti kathaṃ bhavati sattvavānc katham avyaṅgatām eti lakṣaṇyo jāyate katham bhīṣma uvācaa māṃsasya bhakṣaṇe rājan yo dharmaḥ kurupuṃgavac taṃ me śṛṇu yathātattvaṃ yaś cāsya vidhir uttamaḥa rūpam avyaṅgatām āyur buddhiṃ sattvaṃ balaṃ smṛtimc prāptukāmair narair hiṃsā varjitā vai kṛtātmabhiḥa ṛṣīṇām atra saṃvādo bahuśaḥ kurupuṃgavac babhūva teṣāṃ tu mataṃ yat tac chṛṇu yudhiṣṭhiraa yo yajetāśvamedhena māsi māsi yatavrataḥc varjayen madhu māṃsaṃ ca samam etad yudhiṣṭhiraa saptarṣayo vālakhilyās tathaiva ca marīcipāḥc amāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ rājan praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥa na bhakṣayati yo māṃsaṃ na hanyān na ca ghātayetc taṃ mitraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo bravīta adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ viśvāsyaḥ sarvajantuṣuc sādhūnāṃ saṃmato nityaṃ bhaven māṃsasya varjanāta svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsena yo vardhayitum icchatic nāradaḥ prāha dharmātmā niyataṃ so vasīdatid aviśvāsyo vasīdet sa iti hovāca nāradaḥa dadāti yajate cāpi tapasvī ca bhavaty apic madhumāṃsanivṛttyeti prāhaivaṃ sa bṛhaspatiḥa māsi māsy aśvamedhena yo yajeta śataṃ samāḥc na khādati ca yo māṃsaṃ samam etan mataṃ mamaa sadā yajati satreṇa sadā dānaṃ prayacchatic sadā tapasvī bhavati madhumāṃsasya varjanāta sarve vedā na tat kuryuḥ sarvayajñāś ca bhāratac yo bhakṣayitvā māṃsāni paścād api nivartated bhakṣayitvā nimitte pi duṣkaraṃ kurute tapaḥa duṣkaraṃ hi rasajñena māṃsasya parivarjanamc cartuṃ vratam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvaprāṇyabhayapradama sarvabhūteṣu yo vidvān dadāty abhayadakṣiṇāmc dātā bhavati loke sa prāṇānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥa evaṃ vai paramaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥc prāṇā yathātmano bhīṣṭā bhūtānām api te tathāa ātmaupamyena gantavyaṃ buddhimadbhir mahātmabhiḥb vikīrṇakaṇṭakenāpi tṛṇapraspandane bhayamc mṛtyuto bhayam astīti viduṣāṃ bhūtim icchatāma kiṃ punar hanyamānānāṃ tarasā jīvitārthināmc arogāṇām apāpānāṃ pāpair māṃsopajīvibhiḥa tasmād viddhi mahārāja māṃsasya parivarjanamc dharmasyāyatanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ svargasya ca sukhasya cad mṛtyuto bhayam astīti śaṅkāyāṃ duḥkham uttaramd dharmasyāyatanaṃ tasmān māṃsasya parivarjanama ahiṃsā paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā paraṃ tapaḥc ahiṃsā paramaṃ satyaṃ tato dharmaḥ pravartatea na hi māṃsaṃ tṛṇāt kāṣṭhād upalād vāpi jāyatec hatvā jantuṃ tato māṃsaṃ tasmād doṣo sya bhakṣaṇea svāhāsvadhāmṛtabhujo devāḥ satyārjavapriyāḥc kravyādān rākṣasān viddhi jihmānṛtaparāyaṇānd rākṣasendrabhayān muktāḥ sarvabhūtaparāyaṇāḥa kāntāreṣv atha ghoreṣu durgeṣu gahaneṣu cac rātrāv ahani saṃdhyāsu catvareṣu sabhāsu cad udyateṣu ca śastreṣu mṛgavyālabhayeṣu cae amāṃsabhakṣaṇe rājan bhayam ante na gacchatif śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ viśvāsyaḥ sarvajantuṣuf anudvegakaro loke na cāpy udvijate sadāa yadi cet khādako na syān cac saṃsargād vātha pāpānām adharmarucitā nṛṇāma svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsena yo vardhayitum icchatic udvignavāse vasati yatratatrābhijāyatea dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahatc māṃsasyābhakṣaṇaṃ prāhur niyatāḥ paramarṣayaḥa idaṃ tu khalu kaunteya śrutam āsīt purā mayāc mārkaṇḍeyasya vadato ye doṣā māṃsabhakṣaṇed bhīṣmaḥd mārkaṇḍeyena yac coktaṃ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥd yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho ye doṣā māṃsabhakṣaṇea yo hi khādati māṃsāni prāṇināṃ jīvitārthināmc hatānāṃ vā mṛtānāṃ vā yathā hantā tathaiva saḥa dhanena krāyako hanti khādakaś copabhogataḥc ghātako vadhabandhābhyām ity eṣa trividho vadhaḥa akhādann anumodaṃś ca bhāvadoṣeṇa mānavaḥc yo numanyeta hantavyaṃ so pi doṣeṇa lipyatea adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānām āyuṣmān nīrujaḥ sukhīc bhavaty abhakṣayan māṃsaṃ dayāvān prāṇinām ihaa hiraṇyadānair godānair bhūmidānaiś ca sarvaśaḥc māṃsasyābhakṣaṇe dharmo viśiṣṭaḥ syād iti śrutiḥa aprokṣitaṃ vṛthāmāṃsaṃ vidhihīnaṃ na bhakṣayetc bhakṣayan nirayaṃ yāti naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥa prokṣitābhyukṣitaṃ māṃsaṃ tathā brāhmaṇakāmyayāc alpadoṣam iha jñeyaṃ viparīte tu lipyatea khādakasya kṛte jantuṃ yo hanyāt puruṣādhamaḥc mahādoṣakaras tatra khādako na tu ghātakaḥa ijyāyajñaśrutikṛtair yo mārgair abudho janaḥc hanyāj jantuṃ māṃsagṛddhrī sa vai narakabhāṅ naraḥa bhakṣayitvā tu yo māṃsaṃ paścād api nivartatec tasyāpi sumahān dharmo yaḥ pāpād vinivartatea āhartā cānumantā ca viśastā krayavikrayīc saṃskartā copabhoktā ca ghātakāḥ sarva eva tea idam anyat tu vakṣyāmi pramāṇaṃ vidhinirmitamc purāṇam ṛṣibhir juṣṭaṃ vedeṣu pariniścitama pravṛttilakṣaṇe dharme phalārthibhir abhidrutec yathoktaṃ rājaśārdūla na tu tan mokṣakāṅkṣiṇāma havir yat saṃskṛtaṃ mantraiḥ prokṣitābhyukṣitaṃ śucic vedoktena pramāṇena pitṝṇāṃ prakriyāsu cae ato nyathā vṛthāmāṃsam abhakṣyaṃ manur abravīta asvargyam ayaśasyaṃ ca rakṣovad bharatarṣabhac vidhinā hi narāḥ pūrvaṃ māṃsaṃ rājann abhakṣayand vidhināpy avaidikeneti dāntānām iha niścayaḥa ya icchet puruṣo tyantam ātmānaṃ nirupadravamc sa varjayeta māṃsāni prāṇinām iha sarvaśaḥa śrūyate hi purākalpe nṛṇāṃ vrīhimayaḥ paśuḥc yenāyajanta yajvānaḥ puṇyalokaparāyaṇāḥa ṛṣibhiḥ saṃśayaṃ pṛṣṭo vasuś cedipatiḥ purāc abhakṣyam iti māṃsaṃ sa prāha bhakṣyam iti prabhoa ākāśān medinīṃ prāptas tataḥ sa pṛthivīpatiḥc etad eva punaś coktvā viveśa dharaṇītalama prajānāṃ hitakāmena tv agastyena mahātmanāc āraṇyāḥ sarvadaivatyāḥ prokṣitās tapasā mṛgāḥd kṛto hi manaso yajñas tena devāś ca tarpitāḥa kriyā hy evaṃ na hīyante pitṛdaivatasaṃśritāḥc prīyante pitaraś caiva nyāyato māṃsatarpitāḥa idaṃ tu śṛṇu rājendra kīrtyamānaṃ mayānaghac abhakṣaṇe sarvasukhaṃ māṃsasya manujādhipaa yas tu varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ tapas tapyet sudāruṇamc yaś caikaṃ varjayen māṃsaṃ samam etan mataṃ mamaa kaumude tu viśeṣeṇa śuklapakṣe narādhipac varjayet sarvamāṃsāni dharmo hy atra vidhīyatea caturo vārṣikān māsān yo māṃsaṃ parivarjayetc catvāri bhadrāṇy āpnoti kīrtim āyur yaśo balama atha vā māsam apy ekaṃ sarvamāṃsāny abhakṣayanc atītya sarvaduḥkhāni sukhī jīven nirāmayaḥa ye varjayanti māṃsāni māsaśaḥ pakṣaśo pi vāc teṣāṃ hiṃsānivṛttānāṃ brahmaloko vidhīyatea māṃsaṃ tu kaumudaṃ pakṣaṃ varjitaṃ pārtha rājabhiḥc sarvabhūtātmabhūtais tair vijñātārthaparāvaraiḥa nābhāgenāmbarīṣeṇa gayena ca mahātmanāc āyuṣā cānaraṇyena dilīparaghupūrubhiḥa kārtavīryāniruddhābhyāṃ nahuṣeṇa yayātināc nṛgeṇa viṣvagaśvena tathaiva śaśabindunāe yuvanāśvena ca tathā śibinauśīnareṇa caf mucukundena māndhātrā hariścandreṇa cābhibhof satyaṃ vadata māsatyaṃ satyaṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥf hariścandraś carati vai divi satyena candravata śyenacitreṇa lavena cab virūpākṣeṇa kurūṣeṇa nṛgālarkanarais tathāc virūpāśvena niminā janakena ca dhīmatāa silena pṛthunā caiva vīrasenena caiva hac ikṣvākuṇā śaṃbhunā ca śvetena sagareṇa cad ajena dhundhunā caiva tathaiva ca subāhunād haryaśvena ca rājendra kṣupeṇa bharatena caa etaiś cānyaiś ca rājendra purā māṃsaṃ na bhakṣitamc śāradaṃ kaumudaṃ māsaṃ tatas te svargam āpnuvana brahmaloke ca tiṣṭhanti jvalamānāḥ śriyānvitāḥc upāsyamānā gandharvaiḥ strīsahasrasamanvitāḥa tad etad uttamaṃ dharmam ahiṃsālakṣaṇaṃ śubhamc ye caranti mahātmāno nākapṛṣṭhe vasanti tea madhu māṃsaṃ ca ye nityaṃ varjayantīha mucyed baddho mucyeta bandhanātc mucyet tathāturo rogād duḥkhān mucyeta duḥkhitaḥa tiryagyoniṃ na gaccheta rūpavāṃś ca bhaven naraḥc buddhimān vai kuruśreṣṭha prāpnuyāc ca mahad yaśaḥa etat te
