guṇāñ śrotuṃ māṃsasyābhakṣaṇe pi vāc bhakṣaṇe caiva ye doṣās tāṃś caiva puruṣarṣabhaa sarvaṃ tattvena dharmajña yathāvad iha dharmataḥc kiṃ vā bhakṣyam abhakṣyaṃ vā sarvam etad vadasva med yathaitad yādṛśaṃ caitad guṇā ye cāsya varjaned doṣā bhakṣayato ye ca tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhāratac na māṃsāt param atrānyad rasato vidyate bhuvia kṣatakṣīṇābhitaptānāṃ grāmyadharmaratāś ca yec adhvanā karśitānāṃ ca na māṃsād vidyate parama sadyo vardhayati prāṇān puṣṭim agryāṃ dadāti cab nāśo bhakṣaṇadoṣasya dānam eva satāṃ matamb kṣudhitānāṃ dvijānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ caiva jīvanamb dattvā bhavati pūtātmā śraddhayā lobhavarjitaḥb śikṣayanti na yācante darśayantaḥ svamūrtibhiḥb avastheyam adānasya mā bhūd evaṃ bhavān itib dānādyaiḥ suśucir māṃsaṃ punar naiva sa bhakṣayetc na bhakṣo bhyadhikaḥ kaś cin māṃsād asti paraṃtapaa vivarjane tu bahavo guṇāḥ kauravanandanac ye bhavanti manuṣyāṇāṃ tān me nigadataḥ śṛṇua svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsair yo vivardhayitum icchatic nāsti kṣudrataras tasmān na nṛśaṃsataro naraḥa na hi prāṇāt priyataraṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyatec tasmād dayāṃ naraḥ kuryād yathātmani tathā parea śukrāc ca tāta saṃbhūtir māṃsasyeha na saṃśayaḥc bhakṣaṇe tu mahān doṣo vadhena saha kalpatea ahiṃsālakṣaṇo dharma iti vedavido viduḥc yad ahiṃsraṃ bhavet karma tat kuryād ātmavān naraḥa pitṛdaivatayajñeṣu prokṣitaṃ havir ucyatec vidhinā vedadṛṣṭena tad bhuktveha na duṣyatia yajñārthe paśavaḥ sṛṣṭā ity api śrūyate śrutiḥc ato nyathā pravṛttānāṃ rākṣaso vidhir ucyatea kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu yo dṛṣṭo vidhis tam api me śṛṇuc vīryeṇopārjitaṃ māṃsaṃ yathā khādan na duṣyatia āraṇyāḥ sarvadaivatyāḥ prokṣitāḥ sarvaśo mṛgāḥc agastyena purā rājan mṛgayā yena pūjyated rakṣaṇārthāya bhūtānāṃ hiṃsrān hanyān mṛgān punaḥa nātmānam aparityajya mṛgayā nāma vidyatec samatām upasaṃgamya rūpaṃ hanyān na vā nṛpaa ato rājarṣayaḥ sarve mṛgayāṃ yānti bhāratac lipyante na hi doṣeṇa na caitat pātakaṃ viduḥa na hi tatparamaṃ kiṃ cid iha loke paratra cac yat sarveṣv iha lokeṣu dayā kauravanandanaa na bhayaṃ vidyate jātu narasyeha dayāvataḥc dayāvatām ime lokāḥ pare cāpi tapasvināma abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥc abhayaṃ tasya bhūtāni dadatīty anuśuśrumaḥa kṣataṃ ca skhalitaṃ caiva patitaṃ kliṣṭam āhatamc sarvabhūtāni rakṣanti sameṣu viṣameṣu caa nainaṃ vyālamṛgā ghnanti na piśācā na rākṣasāḥc mucyante bhayakāleṣu mokṣayanti ca ye parāna prāṇadānāt paraṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyatic na hy ātmanaḥ priyataraḥ kaś cid astīti niścitama aniṣṭaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ maraṇaṃ nāma bhāratac mṛtyukāle hi bhūtānāṃ sadyo jāyati vepathuḥa jātijanmajarāduḥkhe nityaṃ saṃsārasāgarec jantavaḥ parivartante maraṇād udvijanti caa garbhavāseṣu pacyante kṣārāmlakaṭukai rasaiḥc mūtraśleṣmapurīṣāṇāṃ sparśaiś ca bhṛśadāruṇaiḥa jātāś cāpy avaśās tatra bhidyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥc pāṭyamānāś ca dṛśyante vivaśā māṃsagṛddhinaḥa kumbhīpāke ca pacyante tāṃ tāṃ yonim upāgatāḥc ākramya māryamāṇāś ca bhrāmyante vai punaḥ punaḥa nātmano sti priyataraḥ pṛthivyām anusṛtya hac tasmāt prāṇiṣu sarveṣu dayāvān ātmavān bhaveta sarvamāṃsāni yo rājan yāvajjīvaṃ na bhakṣayetc svarge sa vipulaṃ sthānaṃ prāpnuyān nātra saṃśayaḥa ye bhakṣayanti māṃsāni bhūtānāṃ jīvitaiṣiṇāmc bhakṣyante te pi tair bhūtair iti me nāsti saṃśayaḥa māṃ sa bhakṣayate yasmād bhakṣayiṣye tam apy ahamc etan māṃsasya māṃsatvam ato budhyasva bhārataa ghātako vadhyate nityaṃ tathā vadhyeta bandhakaḥc ākroṣṭākruśyate rājan dveṣṭā dveṣyatvam āpnutea yena yena śarīreṇa yad yat karma karoti yaḥc tena tena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnutea ahiṃsā paramo dharmas tathāhiṃsā paro damaḥc ahiṃsā paramaṃ dānam ahiṃsā paramaṃ tapaḥa ahiṃsā paramo yajñas tathāhiṃsā paraṃ balamc ahiṃsā paramaṃ mitram ahiṃsā paramaṃ sukhame ahiṃsā paramaṃ satyam ahiṃsā paramaṃ śrutama sarvayajñeṣu vā dānaṃ sarvatīrtheṣu cāplutamc sarvadānaphalaṃ vāpi naitat tulyam ahiṃsayāa ahiṃsrasya tapo kṣayyam ahiṃsro yajate sadāc ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yathā mātā yathā pitād agastyena purā rājan māṃsabhakṣaṃ tu jāṅgalea etat phalam ahiṃsāyā bhūyaś ca kurupuṃgavac na hi śakyā guṇā vaktum iha varṣaśatair api yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa akāmāś ca sakāmāś ca hatā ye smin mahāhavec kāṃ yoniṃ pratipannās te tan me brūhi pitāmahaa duḥkhaṃ prāṇaparityāgaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ mahāmṛdhec jānāmi tattvaṃ dharmajña prāṇatyāgaṃ suduṣkarama samṛddhe vāsamṛddhe vā śubhe vā yadi vāśubhec kāraṇaṃ tatra me brūhi sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ bhīṣma uvācaa samṛddhe vāsamṛddhe vā śubhe vā yadi vāśubhec saṃsāre smin samājātāḥ prāṇinaḥ pṛthivīpatea niratā yena bhāvena tatra me śṛṇu kāraṇamc samyak cāyam anupraśnas tvayoktaś ca yudhiṣṭhiraa atra te vartayiṣyāmi purāvṛttam idaṃ nṛpac dvaipāyanasya saṃvādaṃ kīṭasya ca yudhiṣṭhiraa brahmabhūtaś caran vipraḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ purāc dadarśa kīṭaṃ dhāvantaṃ śīghraṃ śakaṭavartmania gatijñaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ rutajñaś ca śarīriṇāmc sarvajñaḥ sarvato dṛṣṭvā kīṭaṃ vacanam abravīta kīṭa saṃtrastarūpo si tvaritaś caiva lakṣyasec kva dhāvasi tad ācakṣva kutas te bhayam āgatam kīṭa uvācaa śakaṭasyāsya mahato ghoṣaṃ śrutvā bhayaṃ mamac āgataṃ vai mahābuddhe svana eṣa hi dāruṇaḥe śrūyate na sa māṃ hanyād iti tasmād apākramea śvasatāṃ ca śṛṇomy evaṃ goputrāṇāṃ pracodyatāmc vahatāṃ sumahābhāraṃ saṃnikarṣe svanaṃ prabhoe nṛṇāṃ ca saṃvāhayatāṃ śrūyate vividhaḥ svanaḥa soḍhum asmadvidhenaiṣa na śakyaḥ kīṭayonināc tasmād apakramāmy eṣa bhayād asmāt sudāruṇāta duḥkhaṃ hi mṛtyur bhūtānāṃ jīvitaṃ ca sudurlabhamc ato bhītaḥ palāyāmi gaccheyaṃ nāsukhaṃ sukhāt bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ sa tu taṃ prāha kutaḥ kīṭa sukhaṃ tavac maraṇaṃ te sukhaṃ manye tiryagyonau hi vartasea śabdaṃ sparśaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ bhogāṃś coccāvacān bahūnc nābhijānāsi kīṭa tvaṃ śreyo maraṇam eva te kīṭa uvācaa sarvatra nirato jīva itīhāpi sukhaṃ mamac cetayāmi mahāprājña tasmād icchāmi jīvituma ihāpi viṣayaḥ sarvo yathādehaṃ pravartitaḥc mānuṣās tiryagāś caiva pṛthagbhogā viśeṣataḥa aham āsaṃ manuṣyo vai śūdro bahudhanaḥ purāc abrahmaṇyo nṛśaṃsaś ca kadaryo vṛddhijīvanaḥa vāktīkṣṇo nikṛtiprajño moṣṭā viśvasya sarvaśaḥc mithaḥkṛto panidhanaḥ parasvaharaṇe rataḥa bhṛtyātithijanaś cāpi gṛhe paryuṣito mayāc mātsaryāt svādukāmena nṛśaṃsena bubhūṣatāa devārthaṃ pitṛyajñārtham annaṃ śraddhākṛtaṃ mayāc na dattam arthakāmena deyam annaṃ punāti haa guptaṃ śaraṇam āśritya bhayeṣu śaraṇāgatāḥc akasmān no bhayāt tyaktā na ca trātābhayaiṣiṇaḥd tyaktvākasmān niśāyāṃ ca na dattam abhayaṃ mayāa dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ priyān dārān yānaṃ vāsas tathādbhutamc śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā manuṣyāṇām asūyāmi nirarthakama īrṣyuḥ parasukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ātatāyy abubhūṣakaḥc trivargahantā cānyeṣām ātmakāmānuvartakaḥa nṛśaṃsaguṇabhūyiṣṭhaṃ purā karma kṛtaṃ mayāb tenaiṣā kṛmitā prāptā bhayasya jananī sadāc smṛtvā tad anutapye haṃ tyaktvā priyam ivātmajama śubhānām api jānāmi kṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalamc mātā ca pūjitā vṛddhā brāhmaṇaś cārcito mayāa sakṛj jātiguṇopetaḥ saṃgatyā gṛham āgataḥc atithiḥ pūjito brahmaṃs tena māṃ nājahāt smṛtiḥa karmaṇā tena caivāhaṃ sukhāśām iha lakṣayec tac chrotum aham icchāmi tvattaḥ śreyas tapodhana vyāsa uvācaa śubhena karmaṇā yad vai tiryagyonau na muhyasec mamaiva kīṭa tat karma yena tvaṃ na pramuhyasea ahaṃ hi darśanād eva tārayāmi tapobalātc tapobalād dhi balavad balam anyan na vidyatea jānāmi pāpaiḥ svakṛtair gataṃ tvāṃ kīṭa kīṭatāmc avāpsyasi paraṃ dharmaṃ dharmastho yadi manyasea karma bhūmikṛtaṃ devā bhuñjate tiryagāś ca yec dharmād api manuṣyeṣu kāmo rthaś ca yathā guṇaiḥa vāgbuddhipāṇipādaiś cāpy upetasya vipaścitaḥc kiṃ hīyate manuṣyasya mandasyāpi hi jīvataḥa jīvan hi kurute pūjāṃ viprāgryaḥ śaśisūryayoḥc bruvann api kathāṃ puṇyāṃ tatra kīṭa tvam eṣyasia guṇabhūtāni bhūtāni tatra tvam upabhokṣyasec tatra te haṃ vineṣyāmi brahmatvaṃ yatra cecchasia sa tatheti pratiśrutya kīṭo vartmany atiṣṭhatab śakaṭavrajaś ca sumahān āgataś ca yadṛcchayāb cakrākrameṇa bhinnaś ca kīṭaḥ prāṇān mumoca hab saṃbhūtaḥ kṣatriyakule prasādād amitaujasaḥc tam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭum agamat sarvāsv anyāsu yoniṣud dadarśa ca mahārāja saṃprāptaṃ rājaputratāma śvāvidgodhāvarāhāṇāṃ tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇāmc śvapākavaiśyaśūdrāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca yoniṣud etāsv eva krameṇaiva yoniṣv āsa svakarmaṇāa sa kīṭety evam ābhāṣya ṛṣiṇā satyavādināc pratismṛtyātha jagrāha pādau mūrdhnā kṛtāñjaliḥd paryāyeṇa tataḥ prāpya kṣātraṃ sthānam anuttamam kīṭa uvācaa idaṃ tad atulaṃ sthānam īpsitaṃ daśabhir guṇaiḥc yad ahaṃ prāpya kīṭatvam āgato rājaputratāma vahanti mām atibalāḥ kuñjarā hemamālinaḥc syandaneṣu ca kāmbojā yuktāḥ paramavājinaḥa uṣṭrāśvatarayuktāni yānāni ca vahanti māmc sabāndhavaḥ sahāmātyaś cāśnāmi piśitaudanama gṛheṣu sunivāseṣu sukheṣu śayaneṣu cac parārdhyeṣu mahābhāga svapāmīha supūjitaḥa sarveṣv apararātreṣu sūtamāgadhabandinaḥc stuvanti māṃ yathā devaṃ mahendraṃ priyavādinaḥa prasādāt satyasaṃdhasya bhavato mitatejasaḥc yad ahaṃ kīṭatāṃ prāpya saṃprāpto rājaputratāma namas te stu mahāprājña kiṃ karomi praśādhi māmc tvattapobalanirdiṣṭam idaṃ hy adhigataṃ mayā vyāsa uvācaa arcito haṃ tvayā rājan vāgbhir adya yadṛcchayāc adya te kīṭatāṃ prāpya smṛtir jātājugupsitāa na tu nāśo sti pāpasya yat tvayopacitaṃ purāc śūdreṇārthapradhānena nṛśaṃsenātatāyināa mama te darśanaṃ prāptaṃ tac caiva sukṛtaṃ purāc tiryagyonau sma jātena mama cāpy arcanāt tathāa itas tvaṃ rājaputratvād brāhmaṇyaṃ samavāpsyasic gobrāhmaṇakṛte prāṇān hutvātmīyān raṇājirea rājaputrasukhaṃ prāpya ṛtūṃś caivāptadakṣiṇānc atha modiṣyase svarge brahmabhūto vyayaḥ sukhīa tiryagyonyāḥ śūdratām abhyupaitiśūdro vaiśyatvaṃ kṣatriyatvaṃ ca vaiśyaḥc vṛttaślāghī kṣatriyo brāhmaṇatvaṃsvargaṃ puṇyaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ sādhuvṛttaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa kṣatradharmam anuprāptaḥ smarann eva sa vīryavānc tyaktvā sa kīṭatāṃ rājaṃś cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥa tasya dharmārthaviduṣo dṛṣṭvā tad vipulaṃ tapaḥc ājagāma dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā vyāsa uvācaa kṣātraṃ caiva vrataṃ kīṭa bhūtānāṃ paripālanamc kṣātraṃ caiva vrataṃ dhyāyaṃs tato vipratvam eṣyasia pāhi sarvāḥ prajāḥ samyak śubhāśubhavid ātmavānc śubhaiḥ saṃvibhajan kāmair aśubhānāṃ ca pāvanaiḥa ātmavān bhava suprītaḥ svadharmacaraṇe rataḥc kṣātrīṃ tanuṃ samutsṛjya tato vipratvam eṣyasi bhīṣma uvācaa so thāraṇyam abhipretya punar eva yudhiṣṭhirac maharṣer vacanaṃ śrutvā prajā dharmeṇa pālya caa acireṇaiva kālena kīṭaḥ pārthivasattamac prajāpālanadharmeṇa pretya vipratvam āgataḥa tatas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar eva mahāyaśāḥc ājagāma mahāprājñaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā vyāsa uvācaa bho bho viprarṣabha śrīman mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ kathaṃ canab pālanāc ca viśiṣṭānāṃ suyuddhamaraṇena cab śiṣṭasaṃsevanāc caiva sa gatiṃ paramāṃ gataḥb tataḥ sa pararāṣṭreṇa rājānaṃ pīḍitāḥ prajāḥb hṛte ca taddhane tāta yuddhāya samupāgataḥb hatvā taṃ nihato yuddhe tasmād vipratvam āgataḥb ājagāma tataḥ prājñaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadāb pārāśaryaṃ mahāprājñam upayāntaṃ dayāparamb nityaṃ prasannavadanaṃ nabhaḥsnigdhāmbudaprabhamb ajñānatimirādityaṃ nityaṃ vyāsaṃ namāmy ahamb ity uktvā patitaṃ padbhyāṃ prītyā prāha mahāmuniḥb brāhmaṇān pūjayasveha japasatyaparāyaṇaḥb kramād brahma prāpsyasi tvaṃ viṣṇudhyānena nirmalamc śubhakṛc chubhayonīṣu pāpakṛt pāpayoniṣue upapadyati dharmajña yathādharmaṃ yathāgamama tasmān mṛtyubhayāt kīṭa mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ kathaṃ canac dharmalopād bhayaṃ te syāt tasmād dharmaṃ carottamam kīṭa uvācaa sukhāt sukhataraṃ prāpto bhagavaṃs tvatkṛte hy ahamb ity uktvā samanujñātas tathā cakre dvijottamaḥc dharmamūlāṃ śriyaṃ prāpya pāpmā naṣṭa ihādya me bhīṣma uvācaa bhagavadvacanāt kīṭo brāhmaṇyaṃ prāpya durlabhamc akarot pṛthivīṃ rājan yajñayūpaśatāṅkitāme tataḥ sālokyam agamad brahmaṇo brahmavittamaḥa avāpa ca paraṃ kīṭaḥ pārtha brahma sanātanamc svakarmaphalanirvṛttaṃ vyāsasya vacanāt tadād śrutvaitad rājaśārdūla satkarmaparamo bhavaa te pi yasmāt svabhāvena hatāḥ kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥc saṃprāptās te gatiṃ puṇyāṃ tasmān mā śoca putraka yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa vidyā tapaś ca dānaṃ ca kim eteṣāṃ viśiṣyatec pṛcchāmi tvā satāṃ śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc maitreyasya ca saṃvādaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanasya caa kṛṣṇadvaipāyano rājann ajñātacaritaṃ caranc vārāṇasyām upātiṣṭhan maitreyaṃ svairiṇīkulea tam upasthitam āsīnaṃ jñātvā sa munisattamamc arcitvā bhojayām āsa maitreyo śanam uttamama tad annam uttamaṃ bhuktvā guṇavat sārvakāmikamc pratiṣṭhamāno smayata prītaḥ kṛṣṇo mahāmanāḥa tam utsmayantaṃ saṃprekṣya maitreyaḥ kṛṣṇam abravītc kāraṇaṃ brūhi dharmātman yo smayiṣṭhāḥ kutaś ca tee tapasvino dhṛtimataḥ pramodaḥ samupāgataḥa etat pṛcchāmi te vidvann abhivādya praṇamya cac ātmanaś ca tapobhāgyaṃ mahābhāgyaṃ tathaiva cad tapobhāgyān mahābhāga sukhabhāgyāt tathaiva caa pṛthag ācaratas tāta pṛthag ātmani cātmanoḥc alpāntaram ahaṃ manye viśiṣṭam api vā tvayā vyāsa uvācaa aticchedātivādābhyāṃ smayo yaṃ samupāgataḥc asatyaṃ vedavacanaṃ kasmād vedo nṛtaṃ vadeta trīṇy eva tu padāny āhuḥ puruṣasyottamaṃ vratamc na druhyec caiva dadyāc ca satyaṃ caiva paraṃ vadete idānīṃ caiva naḥ kṛtyaṃ purastāc ca paraṃ smṛtamf iti vedoktam ṛṣibhiḥ purastāt parikalpitama alpo pi tādṛśo dāyo bhavaty uta mahāphalaḥc tṛṣitāya ca yad dattaṃ hṛdayenānasūyatāa tṛṣitas tṛṣitāya tvaṃ dattvaitad aśanaṃ mamac ajaiṣīr mahato lokān mahāyajñair ivābhibhoe ato dānapavitreṇa prīto smi tapasaiva caa puṇyasyaiva hi te gandhaḥ puṇyasyaiva ca darśanamc puṇyaś ca vāti gandhas te manye karmavidhānataḥa adhikaṃ mārjanāt tāta tathaivāpy anulepanātc śubhaṃ sarvapavitrebhyo dānam eva paraṃ bhavetc dānam eva paraṃ dvijac no cet sarvapavitrebhyoa yānīmāny uttamānīha vedoktāni praśaṃsasic teṣāṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ dānam iti me nāsti saṃśayaḥa dānakṛdbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthā yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥc te hi prāṇasya dātāras teṣu dharmaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥa yathā vedāḥ svadhītāś ca yathā cendriyasaṃyamaḥc sarvatyāgo yathā ceha tathā dānam anuttamama tvaṃ hi tāta sukhād eva sukham eṣyasi śobhanamc sukhāt sukhataraprāptim āpnute matimān naraḥa tan naḥ pratyakṣam evedam upalabdham asaṃśayamc śrīmantam āpnuvanty arthā dānaṃ yajñas tathā sukhama sukhād eva paraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhād anyat paraṃ sukhamc dṛśyate hi mahāprājña niyataṃ vai svabhāvataḥa trividhānīha vṛttāni narasyāhur manīṣiṇaḥc puṇyam anyat pāpam anyan na puṇyaṃ na ca pāpakama na vṛttaṃ manyate nyasya manyate nyasya pāpakamc tathā svakarmanirvṛttaṃ na puṇyaṃ na ca pāpakamd yajñadānatapaḥśīlā narā vai puṇyakarmiṇaḥd ye bhidruhyanti bhūtāni te vai pāpakṛto janāḥd dravyāṇy ādadate caiva duḥkhaṃ yānti patanti cad tato nyat karma yat kiṃ cin na puṇyaṃ na ca pātakamd nityaṃ cākṛpaṇo bhuṅkte svajanair dehi yācitaḥd bhāgyakṣayeṇa kṣīyante nopabhogena saṃcayāḥa ramasvaidhasva modasva dehi caiva yajasva cac na tvām abhibhaviṣyanti vaidyā na ca tapasvinaḥ bhīṣma uvācaa evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca maitreyaḥ karmapūjakaḥc atyantaṃ śrīmati kule jātaḥ prājño bahuśrutaḥa asaṃśayaṃ mahāprājña yathaivāttha tathaiva tatc anujñātas tu bhavatā kiṃ cid brūyām ahaṃ vibho vyāsa uvācaa yad yad icchasi maitreya yāvad yāvad yathā tathāc brūhi tāvan mahāprājña śuśrūṣe vacanaṃ tava maitreya uvācaa nirdoṣaṃ nirmalaṃ caiva vacanaṃ dānasaṃhitamc vidyātapobhyāṃ hi bhavān bhāvitātmā na saṃśayaḥa bhavato bhāvitātmatvād dāyo yaṃ sumahān mamac bhūyo buddhyānupaśyāmi susamṛddhatapā ivaa api me darśanād eva bhavato bhyudayo mahānc manye bhavatprasādo yaṃ tad dhi karma svabhāvataḥa tapaḥ śrutaṃ ca yoniś cāpy etad brāhmaṇyakāraṇamc tribhir guṇaiḥ samuditas tato bhavati vai dvijaḥa tasmiṃs tṛpte ca tṛpyante pitaro daivatāni cac na hi śrutavatāṃ kiṃ cid adhikaṃ brāhmaṇād ṛted andhaṃ syāt tama evedaṃ na prajñāyeta kiṃ canad cāturvarṇyaṃ na varteta dharmādharmāv ṛtānṛted asaṃskārāt kṣatravaiśyau naśyete brāhmaṇād ṛted śūdro naśyaty aśuśrūṣur āśramāṇāṃ yathārhataḥa yathā hi sukṛte kṣetre phalaṃ vindati mānavaḥc evaṃ dattvā śrutavati phalaṃ dātā samaśnutea brāhmaṇaś cen na vidyeta śrutavṛttopasaṃhitaḥc pratigrahītā dānasya moghaṃ syād dhanināṃ dhanama adan hy avidvān hanty annam adyamānaṃ ca hanti tamc taṃ ca hanyati yasyānnaṃ sa hatvā hanyate budhaḥa prabhur hy annam adan vidvān punar janayatīśvaraḥc sa cānnāj jāyate tasmāt sūkṣma eva vyatikramaḥd prabhur hy anupabhogī syād adattvānnam asaṃśayaḥd yas tārayati vai vidvān pitṝn devān samādṛtāna yad eva dadataḥ puṇyaṃ tad eva pratigṛhṇataḥc na hy ekacakraṃ varteta ity evam ṛṣayo viduḥa yatra vai brāhmaṇāḥ santi śrutavṛttopasaṃhitāḥc tatra dānaphalaṃ puṇyam iha cāmutra cāśnutea ye yoniśuddhāḥ satataṃ tapasy abhiratā bhṛśamc dānādhyayanasaṃpannās te vai pūjyatamāḥ sadāa tair hi sadbhiḥ kṛtaḥ panthāś cetayāno na muhyatec te hi svargasya netāro yajñavāhāḥ sanātanāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa evam uktaḥ sa bhagavān maitreyaṃ pratyabhāṣatac diṣṭyaivaṃ tvaṃ vijānāsi diṣṭyā te buddhir īdṛśīe loko hy ayaṃ guṇān eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ sma praśaṃsatia rūpamānavayomānaśrīmānāś cāpy asaṃśayamc diṣṭyā nābhibhavanti tvāṃ daivas te yam anugrahaḥe yat te bhṛśataraṃ dānād vartayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇua yānīhāgamaśāstrāṇi yāś ca kāś cit pravṛttayaḥc tāni vedaṃ puraskṛtya pravṛttāni yathākramama ahaṃ dānaṃ praśaṃsāmi bhavān api tapaḥśruteb tat tad bahuguṇaṃ dānaṃ śraddhayā svaguṇair apic tapaḥ pavitraṃ vedasya tapaḥ svargasya sādhanama tapasā mahad āpnoti vidyayā ceti naḥ śrutamc tapasaiva cāpanuded yac cānyad api duṣkṛtama yad yad dhi kiṃ cit saṃdhāya puruṣas tapyate tapaḥc sarvam etad avāpnoti brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥa duranvayaṃ duṣpradhṛṣyaṃ durāpaṃ duratikramamc sarvaṃ vai tapasābhyeti tapo hi balavattarama surāpo saṃmatādāyī bhrūṇahā gurutalpagaḥc tapasā tarate sarvam enasaś ca pramucyatea sarvavidyas tu cakṣuṣmān api yādṛśatādṛśaḥc tapasvinau ca tāv āhus tābhyāṃ kāryaṃ sadā namaḥa sarve pūjyāḥ śrutadhanās tathaiva ca tapasvinaḥc dānapradāḥ sukhaṃ pretya prāpnuvantīha ca śriyama imaṃ ca brahmalokaṃ ca lokaṃ ca balavattaramc annadānaiḥ sukṛtinaḥ pratipadyanti laukikāḥa pūjitāḥ pūjayanty etān mānitā mānayanti cac adātā yatra yatraiti sarvataḥ saṃpraṇudyatea akartā caiva kartā ca labhate yasya yādṛśamc yady evordhvaṃ yady avāk ca tvaṃ lokam abhiyāsyasia prāpsyase tv annapānāni yāni dāsyasi kāni citc medhāvy asi kule jātaḥ śrutavān anṛśaṃsavāna kaumāradāravratavān maitreya nirato bhavac etad gṛhāṇa prathamaṃ praśastaṃ gṛhamedhināma yo bhartā vāsitātuṣṭo bhartus tuṣṭā ca vāsitāc yasminn evaṃ kule sarvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ tatra vartatea adbhir gātrān malam iva tamo gniprabhayā yathāc dānena tapasā caiva sarvapāpam apohyatec viṣṇor abhyarcanena cac brāhmaṇaḥ sa mahābhāga taret saṃsārasāgarātc svakarmaśuddhasattvānāṃ tapobhir nirmalātmanāmc vidyayā gatamohānāṃ tāraṇāya hariḥ smṛtaḥc tadarcanaparo nityaṃ tadbhaktas taṃ namaskuruc tadbhaktā na vinaśyanti hy aṣṭākṣaraparāyaṇāḥc praṇavopāsanaparāḥ paramārthaparās tv ihac etaiḥ pāvaya cātmānaṃa svasti prāpnuhi maitreya gṛhān sādhu vrajāmy ahamc etan manasi kartavyaṃ śreya evaṃ bhaviṣyatia taṃ praṇamyātha maitreyaḥ kṛtvā cābhipradakṣiṇamb bhīṣmaḥb kṛṣṇadvaipāyano rājan maitreyaṃ dvijasattamamc svasti prāpnotu bhagavān ity uvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa satstrīṇāṃ samudācāraṃ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ varac śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ tvattas taṃ me brūhi pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa sarvajñāṃ sarvadharmajñāṃ devaloke manasvinīmc kaikeyī sumanā nāma śāṇḍilīṃ paryapṛcchataa kena vṛttena kalyāṇi samācāreṇa kena vāc vidhūya sarvapāpāni devalokaṃ tvam āgatāa hutāśanaśikheva tvaṃ jvalamānā svatejasāc sutā tārādhipasyeva prabhayā divam āgatāa arajāṃsi ca vastrāṇi dhārayantī gataklamāc vimānasthā śubhe bhāsi sahasraguṇam ojasāa na tvam alpena tapasā dānena niyamena vāc imaṃ lokam anuprāptā tasmāt tattvaṃ vadasva mea iti pṛṣṭā sumanayā madhuraṃ cāruhāsinīc śāṇḍilī nibhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ sumanām idam abravīta nāhaṃ kāṣāyavasanā nāpi valkaladhāriṇīc na ca muṇḍā na jaṭilā bhūtvā devatvam āgatāa ahitāni ca vākyāni sarvāṇi paruṣāṇi cac apramattā ca bhartāraṃ kadā cin nāham abruvama devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca brāhmaṇānāṃ ca pūjanec apramattā sadāyuktā śvaśrūśvaśuravartinīa paiśunye na pravartāmi na mamaitan manogatamc advāre na ca tiṣṭhāmi ciraṃ na kathayāmi caa asad vā hasitaṃ kiṃ cid ahitaṃ vāpi karmaṇāc rahasyam arahasyaṃ vā na pravartāmi sarvathāa kāryārthe nirgataṃ cāpi bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatamc āsanenopasaṃyojya pūjayāmi samāhitāa yad yac ca nābhijānāti yad bhojyaṃ nābhinandatic bhakṣyaṃ vāpy atha vā lehyaṃ tat sarvaṃ varjayāmy ahama kuṭumbārthe samānītaṃ yat kiṃ cit kāryam eva tuc prātar utthāya tat sarvaṃ kārayāmi karomi cad agnisaṃrakṣaṇaparā gṛhaśuddhiṃ ca kārayed pātrāṇāṃ dhanadhānyānāṃ śayanāsanavastunāmd kumārān pālaye nityaṃ kumārīḥ pariśikṣayed ātmapriyāṇi hitvāpi garbhasaṃrakṣaṇe ratād bālānāṃ varjaye nityaṃ śāpaṃ kopaṃ pratāpanamd avikṣiptāni dhānyāni nānnavikṣepaṇaṃ gṛhed ratnavat spṛhaye gehe gāvaḥ sayavasodakāḥd samudgamya ca śuddhāhaṃ bhikṣāṃ dadyāṃ dvijātiṣua pravāsaṃ yadi me bhartā yāti kāryeṇa kena citc maṅgalair bahubhir yuktā bhavāmi niyatā sadāa añjanaṃ rocanāṃ caiva snānaṃ mālyānulepanamc prasādhanaṃ ca niṣkrānte nābhinandāmi bhartaria notthāpayāmi bhartāraṃ sukhasuptam ahaṃ sadāb notthāpaye sukhaṃ suptaṃ hy āturaṃ pālaye patimc ātureṣv api kāryeṣu tena tuṣyati me manaḥa nāyāsayāmi bhartāraṃ kuṭumbārthe ca sarvadāc guptaguhyā sadā cāsmi susaṃmṛṣṭaniveśanād bandhakīṃ varjayāmy eva kuhakāmūlakarma caa imaṃ dharmapathaṃ nārī pālayantī samāhitāc arundhatīva nārīṇāṃ svargaloke mahīyate bhīṣma uvācaa etad ākhyāya sā devī sumanāyai tapasvinīc patidharmaṃ mahābhāgā jagāmādarśanaṃ tadāa yaś cedaṃ pāṇḍavākhyānaṃ paṭhet parvaṇi parvaṇic sa devalokaṃ saṃprāpya nandane susukhaṃ vasetd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd yaj jñeyaṃ paramaṃ kṛtyam anuṣṭheyaṃ mahātmabhiḥd bhīṣmaḥd sāraṃ me sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ vaktum arhasy anugrahātd śrūyatām idam atyantaṃ gūḍhaṃ saṃsāramocanamd śrotavyaṃ ca tvayā samyag jñātavyaṃ ca viśāṃ pated puṇḍarīkaḥ purā vipraḥ puṇyatīrthe japānvitaḥd nāradaṃ paripapraccha śreyo yogaparaṃ munimd nāradaś cābravīd enaṃ brahmaṇoktaṃ mahātmanād śṛṇuṣvāvahitas tāta jñānayogam anuttamamd aprabhūtaṃ prabhūtārthaṃ vedaśāstrārthasārakamd yaḥ paraḥ prakṛteḥ proktaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥd sa eva sarvabhūtātmā nara ity abhidhīyated narāj jātāni tattvāni nārāṇīti tato viduḥd tāny eva cāyanaṃ tasya tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥd nārāyaṇāj jagat sarvaṃ sargakāle prajāyated tasminn eva punas tac ca pralaye saṃpralīyated nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahma tattvaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥd parād api paraś cāsau tasmān nāsti parāt paramd vāsudevaṃ tathā viṣṇum ātmānaṃ ca tathā viduḥd saṃjñābhedaiḥ sa evaikaḥ sarvaśāstrābhisaṃskṛtaḥd āloḍya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥd idam ekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadād tasmāt tvaṃ gahanān sarvāṃs tyaktvā śāstrārthavistarānd ananyacetā dhyāyasva nārāyaṇam ajaṃ vibhumd muhūrtam api yo dhyāyen nārāyaṇam atandritaḥd so pi tadgatim āpnoti kiṃ punas tatparāyaṇaḥd namo nārāyaṇāyeti yo veda brahma śāśvatamd antakāle japann eti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamd śravaṇān mananāc caiva gītistutyarcanādibhiḥd ārādhyaṃ sarvadā brahma puruṣeṇa hitaiṣiṇād lipyate na sa pāpena nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥd punāti sakalaṃ lokaṃ sahasrāṃśur ivoditaḥd brahmacārī gṛhastho pi vānaprastho tha bhikṣukaḥd keśavārādhanaṃ hitvā naiva yāti parāṃ gatimd janmāntarasahasreṣu durlabhā tadgatā matiḥd tad bhaktavatsalaṃ devaṃ samārādhaya suvratad nāradenaivam uktas tu sa vipro bhyarcayad dharimd svapne pi puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharamd kirīṭakuṇḍaladharaṃ lasacchrīvatsakaustubhamd taṃ dṛṣṭvā devadeveśaṃ prāṇamatsaṃbhramānvitaḥd atha kālena mahatā tathā pratyakṣatāṃ gataḥd saṃstutaḥ stutibhir vedair devagandharvakiṃnaraiḥd atha tenaiva bhagavān ātmalokam adhokṣajaḥd gataḥ saṃpūjitaḥ sarvaiḥ sa yoginilayo hariḥd tasmāt tvam api rājendra tadbhaktas tatparāyaṇaḥd arcayitvā yathāyogaṃ bhajasva puruṣottamamd ajaram amaram ekaṃ dhyeyam ādyantaśūnyaṃd saguṇam aguṇam ādyaṃ sthūlam atyantasūkṣmamd nirupamam upameyaṃ yogivijñānagamyaṃd tribhuvanagurum īśaṃ tvaṃ prapadyasva viṣṇum yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa sāmnā vāpi pradāne vā jyāyaḥ kiṃ bhavato matamc prabrūhi bharataśreṣṭha yad atra vyatiricyate bhīṣma uvācaa sāmnā prasādyate kaś cid dānena ca tathāparaḥc puruṣaḥ prakṛtiṃ jñātvā tayor ekataraṃ bhajeta guṇāṃs tu śṛṇu me rājan sāntvasya bharatarṣabhac dāruṇāny api bhūtāni sāntvenārādhayed yathāa atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanamc gṛhītvā rakṣasā mukto dvijātiḥ kānane yathāa kaś cit tu buddhisaṃpanno brāhmaṇo vijane vanec gṛhītaḥ kṛcchram āpanno rakṣasā bhakṣayiṣyatāa sa buddhiśrutasaṃpannas taṃ dṛṣṭvātīva bhīṣaṇamc sāmaivāsmin prayuyuje na mumoha na vivyathea rakṣas tu vācā saṃpūjya praśnaṃ papraccha taṃ dvijamc mokṣyase brūhi me praśnaṃ kenāsmi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa muhūrtam atha saṃcintya brāhmaṇas tasya rakṣasaḥc ābhir gāthābhir avyagraḥ praśnaṃ pratijagāda haa videśastho vilokastho vinā nūnaṃ suhṛjjanaiḥc viṣayān atulān bhuṅkṣe tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa nūnaṃ mitrāṇi te rakṣaḥ sādhūpacaritāny apic svadoṣād aparajyante tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa dhanaiśvaryādhikāḥ stabdhās tvadguṇaiḥ paramāvarāḥc avajānanti nūnaṃ tvāṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa guṇavān viguṇān anyān nūnaṃ paśyasi satkṛtānc prājño prājñān vinītātmā tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa avṛttyā kliśyamāno pi vṛttyupāyān vigarhayanc māhātmyād vyathase nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa saṃpīḍyātmānam āryatvāt tvayā kaś cid upaskṛtaḥc jitaṃ tvāṃ manyate sādho tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa kliśyamānān vimārgeṣu kāmakrodhāvṛtātmanaḥc manye nu dhyāyasi janāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa prājñaiḥ saṃbhāvito nūnaṃ naprājñair upasaṃhitaḥc hrīmān amarṣī durvṛttais tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa nūnaṃ mitramukhaḥ śatruḥ kaś cid āryavad ācaranc vañcayitvā gatas tvāṃ vai tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa prakāśārthagatir nūnaṃ rahasyakuśalaḥ kṛtīc tajjñair na pūjyase nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd nūnaṃ śaktyā samārambhān vihitān sumahodayānd vipannārthān vijānāsi tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd ekadravyaniviṣṭena tulyārthaśrutasaṃpadād paribhūto si nūnaṃ tvaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa asatsv abhiniviṣṭeṣu bruvato muktasaṃśayamc guṇās te na virājante tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa dhanabuddhiśrutair hīnaḥ kevalaṃ tejasānvitaḥc mahat prārthayase nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa tapaḥpraṇihitātmānaṃ manye tvāraṇyakāṅkṣiṇamc bandhuvargo na gṛhṇāti tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd iṣṭabhāryasya te nūnaṃ prātiveśyo mahādhanaḥd yuvā sulalitaḥ kāmī tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd sudurvinītaḥ putro vā jāmātā vā pramārjakaḥd dārā vā pratikūlās te tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd bhrātaro tīva viṣamāḥ pitā vā kṣutkṣato mṛtaḥd mātā jyeṣṭho gurur vāpi tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd brāhmaṇo vā hato gaur vā brahmasvaṃ vā hṛtaṃ purād devasvaṃ vādhikaṃ kāle tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd hṛtadāro tha vṛddho vā loke dviṣṭo tha vā naraiḥd avijñātena vā vṛddhas tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd vārdhakyārthaṃ dhanaṃ dṛṣṭvā svā śrīr vāpi parair hṛtād vṛttir vā durjanāpekṣā tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd saṃpatkāle na te dharmaḥ kṣīṇas tāta suhṛdbruvaiḥd asaṃnyāsam atas tatra tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa nūnam arthavatāṃ madhye tava vākyam anuttamamc na bhāti kāle bhihitaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa dṛḍhapūrvaśrutaṃ mūrkhaṃ kupitaṃ hṛdayapriyamc anunetuṃ na śaknoṣi tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa nūnam āsaṃjayitvā te kṛtye kasmiṃś cid īpsitec kaś cid arthayate tyarthaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥd parokṣavādibhir mithyā doṣas te saṃpradarśitaḥa nūnaṃ tvā svaguṇāpekṣaṃ pūjayānaṃ suhṛd dhruvamc mayārtha iti jānāti tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa antargatam abhiprāyaṃ na nūnaṃ lajjayecchasic vivaktuṃ prāptiśaithilyāt tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa nānābuddhirucīṃl loke manuṣyān nūnam icchasic grahītuṃ svaguṇaiḥ sarvāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa avidvān bhīrur alpārtho vidyāvikramadānajamb alam arthayase hīnāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥc yaśaḥ prārthayase nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa cirābhilaṣitaṃ kiṃ cit phalam aprāptam eva tec kṛtam anyair apahṛtaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa nūnam ātmakṛtaṃ doṣam apaśyan kiṃ cid ātmanic akāraṇe bhiśasto si tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa suhṛdām apramattānām apramokṣyārthahānijamc duḥkham arthaguṇair hīnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa sādhūn gṛhasthān dṛṣṭvā ca tathāsādhūn vanecarānc muktāṃś cāvasathe saktāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa dharmyam arthaṃ ca kāle ca deśe cābhihitaṃ vacaḥc na pratiṣṭhati te nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa dattān akuśalair arthān manīṣī saṃjijīviṣuḥc prāpya vartayase nūnaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa pāpān vivardhato dṛṣṭvā kalyāṇāṃś cāvasīdataḥc dhruvaṃ mṛgayase yogyaṃ tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa parasparaviruddhānāṃ priyaṃ nūnaṃ cikīrṣasic suhṛdām avirodhena tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa śrotriyāṃś ca vikarmasthān prājñāṃś cāpy ajitendriyānc manye nudhyāyasi janāṃs tenāsi hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥa evaṃ saṃpūjitaṃ rakṣo vipraṃ taṃ pratyapūjayatc sakhāyam akaroc cainaṃ saṃyojyārthair mumoca had yudhiṣṭhiraḥd janma mānuṣyakaṃ prāpya karmakṣetraṃ sudurlabhamd śreyorthinā daridreṇa kiṃ kartavyaṃ pitāmahad dānānām uttamaṃ yac ca deyaṃ yac ca yathā yathād vaiśaṃpāyanaḥd mānyān pūjyāṃś ca gāṅgeya rahasyaṃ vaktum arhasid evaṃ pṛṣṭo narendreṇa pāṇḍavena yaśasvinād bhīṣmaḥd dharmāṇāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ bhīṣmaḥ provāca pārthivamd śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan dharmaguhyāni bhāratad yathā hi bhagavān vyāsaḥ purā kathitavān mayid devaguhyam idaṃ rājan yamenākliṣṭakarmaṇād niyamasthena yuktena tapaso mahataḥ phalamd yena yaḥ prīyate devaḥ prīyante pitaras tathād ṛṣayaḥ pramathāḥ śrīś ca citragupto diśāṃ gajāḥd ṛṣidharmaḥ smṛto yatra sarahasyo mahāphalaḥd mahādānaphalaṃ caiva sarvayajñaphalaṃ tathād yaś caitad evaṃ jānīyāj jñātvā vā kurute naghad sa doṣo doṣavāṃś ceha tair guṇaiḥ saha yujyated daśasūnāsamaṃ cakraṃ daśacakrasamo dhvajaḥd daśadhvajasamā veśyā daśaveśyāsamo nṛpaḥd ardhenaitāni sarvāṇi nṛpatiḥ kathyate dhikaḥd trivargasahitaṃ śāstraṃ pavitraṃ puṇyalakṣaṇamd dharmavyākaraṇaṃ puṇyaṃ rahasyaśravaṇaṃ mahatd śrotavyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ vihitaṃ tridaśaiḥ svayamd pitṝṇāṃ yatra guhyāni procyante śrāddhakarmaṇid devatānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ rahasyaṃ kathyate khilamd ṛṣidharmaḥ smṛto yatra sarahasyo mahāphalaḥd mahāyajñaphalaṃ caiva sarvadānaphalaṃ tathād ye paṭhanti sadā martyā yeṣāṃ caivopatiṣṭhatid śrutvā ca phalam ācaṣṭe svayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥd gavāṃ phalaṃ tīrthaphalaṃ yajñānāṃ caiva yat phalamd etat phalam avāpnoti yo naro tithipūjakaḥd śrotāraḥ śraddadhānāś ca yeṣāṃ śuddhaṃ ca mānasamd teṣāṃ vyaktaṃ jitā lokāḥ śraddadhānena sādhunād mucyate kilbiṣāc caiva na sa pāpena gacchatid uttaraś ca smṛtaḥ kasya etad icchāmi veditumd śraddadhānena dūtena bhāṣitaṃ dharmasaṃhitamd pitaraḥd pūrvasthās tridaśāḥ sarve pitaraḥ pūjya khecaramd svāgataṃ te stu bhadraṃ te śrūyatāṃ khecarottamad gūḍhārthaḥ paramaḥ praśno bhavatā samudīritaḥd śrāddhaṃ dattvā ca bhuktvā ca puruṣo yaḥ striyaṃ vrajetd pitaras tasya taṃ māsaṃ tasmin retasi śerated pravibhāgaṃ tu piṇḍānāṃ pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥd piṇḍo hy adhastād gacchaṃs tu apa āviśya bhāvayetd piṇḍaṃ tu madhyamaṃ tatra patnī tv ekā samaśnuted piṇḍas tṛtīyo yas teṣāṃ taṃ dadyāj jātavedasid eṣa śrāddhavidhiḥ prokto yathā dharmo na lupyated pitaras tasya tuṣyanti prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ sadād devadūtaḥd prajā vivardhate cāsya akṣayaṃ copatiṣṭhatid ānupūrvyeṇa piṇḍānāṃ pravibhāgaḥ pṛthak pṛthakd pitṝṇāṃ triṣu sarveṣāṃ niruktaṃ kathitaṃ tvayād ekaḥ samuddhṛtaḥ piṇḍo hy adhastāt kasya gacchatid kaṃ vā prīṇayate devaṃ kathaṃ tārayate pitṝnd madhyamaṃ tu tadā patnī bhuṅkte nujñātam eva hid kimarthaṃ pitaras tasya kavyam eva ca bhuñjated atra yas tv antimaḥ piṇḍo gacchate jātavedasamd bhavate kā gatis tasya kaṃ vā samanugacchatid etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ piṇḍeṣu triṣu yā gatiḥd pitaraḥd phalaṃ vṛttiṃ ca mārgaṃ ca yaś cainaṃ varjayitvā mahātmānaṃ cirajīvinam uttamamd pitṛbhaktas tu yo vipro varalabdho mahāyaśāḥd trayāṇām api piṇḍānāṃ śrutvā bhagavato gatimd devadūtena yaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śrāddhasya vidhiniścayaḥd gatis trayāṇāṃ piṇḍānāṃ śṛṇuṣvāvahito mamad apo gacchati yo hy atra śaśinaṃ hy eṣa prīṇayetd śaśī prīṇayate devān pitṝṃś caiva mahāmated bhuṅkte tu patnī yaṃ caiṣām anujñātā tu madhyamamd putrakāmāya putraṃ tu prayacchanti pitāmahāḥd havyavāhe tu yaḥ piṇḍo dīyate tan nibodha med pitaras tena tṛpyanti prītāḥ kāmān diśanti cad etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ triṣu piṇḍeṣu yā gatiḥd ṛtvig yo yajamānasya pitṛtvam anugacchatid tasminn ahani manyante parihāryaṃ hi maithunamd śucinā tu sadā śrāddhaṃ bhoktavyaṃ khecarottamad ye mayā kathitā doṣās te tathā syur na cānyathād tasmāt snātaḥ śuciḥ kṣāntaḥ śrāddhaṃ bhuñjīta vai dvijaḥd prajā vivardhate cāsya yaś caivaṃ saṃprayacchatid tato vidyutprabho nāma ṛṣir āha mahātapāḥd ādityatejasā tasya tulyaṃ rūpaṃ prakāśated sa ca dharmarahasyāni śrutvā śakram athābravītd tiryagyonigatān sattvān martyā hiṃsanti mohitāḥd kīṭān pipīlikān sarpān meṣān samṛgapakṣiṇaḥd kilbiṣaṃ subahu prāptāḥ kiṃ svid eṣāṃ pratikriyād tato devagaṇāḥ sarve ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥd śakraḥd pitaraś ca mahābhāgāḥ pūjayanti sma taṃ munimd kurukṣetraṃ gayāṃ gaṅgāṃ prabhāsaṃ puṣkarāṇi cad etāni manasā dhyātvā avagāhet tato jalamd tathā mucyati pāpena rāhuṇā candramā yathād tryahaṃ snātaḥ sa bhavati nirāhāraś ca vartated spṛśate yo gavāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ vāladhiṃ ca namasyatid tato vidyutprabho vākyam abhyabhāṣata vāsavamd ayaṃ sūkṣmataro dharmas taṃ nibodha śatakratod ghṛṣṭo vaṭakaṣāyeṇa anuliptaḥ priyaṅguṇād kṣīreṇa ṣaṣṭikān bhuktvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyated śrūyatāṃ cāparaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyam ṛṣicintitamd śrutaṃ me bhāṣamāṇasya sthāṇoḥ sthāne bṛhaspateḥd rudreṇa saha deveśa tan nibodha śacīpated parvatārohaṇaṃ kṛtvā ekapādo vibhāvasumd nirīkṣeta nirāhāra ūrdhvabāhuḥ kṛtāñjaliḥd tapasā mahatā yukta upavāsaphalaṃ labhetd raśmibhis tāpito rkasya sarvapāpam apohatid grīṣmakāle tha vā śīte evaṃ pāpam apohatid tataḥ pāpāt pramuktasya dyutir bhavati śāśvatīd tejasā sūryavad dīpto bhrājate somavat punaḥd madhye tridaśavargasya devarājaḥ śatakratuḥd uvāca madhuraṃ vākyaṃ bṛhaspatim anuttamamd dharmaguhyaṃ tu bhagavān mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvahamd bṛhaspatiḥd sarahasyāś ca ye doṣās tān yathāvad udīrayad pratimehanti ye sūryam anilaṃ dviṣate ca yed havyavāhe pradīpte ca samidhaṃ ye na juhvatid bālavatsāṃ ca ye dhenuṃ duhanti kṣīrakāraṇātd teṣāṃ doṣān pravakṣyāmi tān nibodha śacīpated bhānumān anilaś caiva havyavāhaś ca vāsavad lokānāṃ mātaraś caiva gāvaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvād lokāṃs tārayituṃ śaktā martyeṣv eteṣu devatāḥd sarve bhavantaḥ śṛṇvantu ekaikaṃ dharmaniścayamd varṣāṇi ṣaḍaśītiṃ tu durvṛttāḥ kulapāṃsanāḥd striyaḥ sarvāś ca durvṛttāḥ pratimehanti yā ravimd aniladveṣiṇaḥ śakra garbhasthā cyavate prajād havyavāhasya dīptasya samidhaṃ ye na juhvatid agnikāryeṣu vai teṣāṃ havyaṃ nāśnāti pāvakaḥd kṣīraṃ tu bālavatsānāṃ ye pibantīha mānavāḥd na teṣāṃ kṣīrapāḥ ke cij jāyante kulavardhanāḥd prajākṣayeṇa yujyante kulavaṃśakṣayeṇa cad evam etat purā dṛṣṭaṃ kulavṛddhair dvijātibhiḥd tasmād varjyāni varjyāni kāryaṃ kāryaṃ ca nityaśaḥd bhūtikāmena martyena satyam etad bravīmi ted tataḥ sarve mahābhāgā devatāḥ samarudgaṇāḥd ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgāḥ pṛcchanti sma pitṝṃs tataḥd pitaraḥ kena tuṣyanti martyānām alpacetasāmd akṣayaṃ ca kathaṃ dānaṃ bhavec caivordhvadehikamd ānṛṇyaṃ vā kathaṃ martyā gaccheyuḥ kena karmaṇād pitaraḥd etad icchāmahe śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥd nyāyato vai mahābhāgāḥ saṃśayaḥ samudāhṛtaḥd śrūyatāṃ yena tuṣyāmo martyānāṃ sādhukarmaṇāmd nīlaṣaṇḍapramokṣeṇa amāvāsyāṃ tilodakaiḥd varṣāsu dīpakaiś caiva pitṝṇām anṛṇo bhavetd akṣayaṃ nirvyalīkaṃ ca dānam etan mahāphalamd asmākaṃ paritoṣaś ca akṣayaḥ parikīrtyated śraddadhānāś ca ye martyā āhariṣyanti saṃtatimd durgāt te tārayiṣyanti narakāt prapitāmahānd pitṝṇāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭaromā tapodhanaḥd vṛddhagārgyo mahātejās tān evaṃ vākyam abravītd ke guṇā nīlaṣaṇḍasya pramuktasya tapodhanāḥd varṣāsu dīpadānena tathaiva ca tilodakaiḥd pitaraḥd nīlaṣaṇḍasya lāṅgūlaṃ toyam abhyuddhared yadid ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi pitaras tena tarpitāḥd yas tu śṛṅgagataṃ paṅkaṃ kūlād uddhṛtya tiṣṭhatid pitaras tena gacchanti somalokam asaṃśayamd varṣāsu dīpadānena śaśivac chobhate naraḥd tamorūpaṃ na tasyāsti dīpakaṃ yaḥ prayacchatid amāvāsyāṃ tu ye martyāḥ prayacchanti tilodakamd pātram audumbaraṃ gṛhya madhumiśraṃ tapodhanad kṛtaṃ bhavati taiḥ śrāddhaṃ sarahasyaṃ yathārthavatd hṛṣṭapuṣṭamanās teṣāṃ prajā bhavati nityadād kulavaṃśasya vṛddhis tu piṇḍadasya phalaṃ bhavetd śraddadhānas tu yaḥ kuryāt pitṝṇām anṛṇo bhavetd evam eṣa samuddiṣṭaḥ śrāddhakālakramas tathād bhīṣmaḥd vidhiḥ pātraṃ phalaṃ caiva yathāvad anukīrtitamd kena te ca bhavet prītiḥ kathaṃ tuṣṭiṃ tu gacchasid iti pṛṣṭaḥ surendreṇa provāca harir avyayaḥd brāhmaṇānāṃ parīvādo mama vidveṣaṇaṃ mahatd brāhmaṇaiḥ pūjitair nityaṃ pūjito haṃ na saṃśayaḥd nityābhivādyā viprendrā bhuktvā pādau tathātmanaḥd teṣāṃ tuṣyāmi martyānāṃ yaś cakre ca baliṃ haretd vāmanaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā varāhaṃ ca jalotthitamd uddhṛtāṃ dharaṇīṃ caiva mūrdhnā dhārayate tu yaḥd na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃ cit kalmaṣaṃ copapadyated aśvatthaṃ rocanāṃ gāṃ ca pūjayed yo naraḥ sadād pūjitaṃ ca jagat tena sadevāsuramānuṣamd tena rūpeṇa teṣāṃ ca pūjāṃ gṛhṇāmi tattvataḥd pūjā mamaiṣā nāsty anyā yāval lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥd anyathā hi vṛthā martyāḥ pūjayanty alpabuddhayaḥd indraḥd nāhaṃ tat pratigṛhṇāmi na sā tuṣṭikarī mamad cakraṃ pādau varāhaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ cāpi vāmanamd uddhṛtāṃ dharaṇīṃ caiva kimarthaṃ tvaṃ praśaṃsasid bhavān sṛjati bhūtāni bhavān saṃharati prajāḥd bhīṣmaḥd prakṛtiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ samartyānāṃ sanātanīd saṃprahasya tato viṣṇur idaṃ vacanam abravītd cakreṇa nihatā daityāḥ padbhyāṃ krāntā vasuṃdharād vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthāya uddhṛtā ca vasuṃdharād vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya jito rājā mayā baliḥd parituṣṭo bhavāmy evaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ mahātmanāmd tan māṃ ye pūjayiṣyanti nāsti teṣāṃ parābhavaḥd api vā brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmacāriṇam āgatamd brāhmaṇāyāhutiṃ dattvā amṛtaṃ tasya bhojanamd aindrīṃ saṃdhyām upāsitvā ādityābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥd sarvatīrtheṣu sa snāto mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥd etad vaḥ kathitaṃ guhyam akhilena tapodhanāḥd baladevaḥd saṃśayaṃ pṛcchamānānāṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmy ahamd śrūyatāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvahamd ajānanto yad abudhāḥ kliśyante bhūtapīḍitāḥd kalya utthāya yo martyaḥ spṛśed gāṃ vai ghṛtaṃ dadhid sarṣapaṃ ca priyaṅguṃ ca kalmaṣāt pratimucyated bhūtāni caiva sarvāṇi agrataḥ pṛṣṭhato pi vād ucchiṣṭaṃ vāpi cchidreṣu varjayanti tapodhanāḥd devāḥd pragṛhyaudumbaraṃ pātraṃ toyapūrṇam udaṅmukhaḥd upavāsaṃ tu gṛhṇīyād yad vā saṃkalpayed vratamd devatās tasya tuṣyanti kāmikaṃ cāpi sidhyatid anyathā hi vṛthā martyāḥ kurvate svalpabuddhayaḥd upavāse balau cāpi tāmrapātraṃ viśiṣyated balir bhikṣā tathārghyaṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca tilodakamd tāmrapātreṇa dātavyam anyathālpaphalaṃ bhavetd guhyam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ yathā tuṣyanti devatāḥd dharmaḥd rājapauruṣike vipre ghāṇṭike paricāraked gorakṣake vāṇijake tathā kārukuśīlaved mitradruhy anadhīyāne yaś ca syād vṛṣalīpatiḥd eteṣu daivaṃ pitryaṃ vā na deyaṃ syāt kathaṃ canad piṇḍadās tasya hīyante na ca prīṇāti vai pitṝnd atithir yasya bhagnāśo gṛhāt pratinivartated pitaras tasya devāś ca agnayaś ca tathaiva hid nirāśāḥ pratigacchanti atither apratigrahātd strīghnair goghnaiḥ kṛtaghnaiś ca brahmaghnair gurutalpagaiḥd agniḥd tulyadoṣo bhavaty ebhir yasyātithir anarcitaḥd pādam udyamya yo martyaḥ spṛśed gāś ca sudurmatiḥd brāhmaṇaṃ vā mahābhāgaṃ dīpyamānaṃ tathānalamd tasya doṣān pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥd divaṃ spṛśaty aśabdo sya trasyanti pitaraś ca vaid vaimanasyaṃ ca devānāṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati puṣkalamd pāvakaś ca mahātejā havyaṃ na pratigṛhṇatid ājanmanāṃ śataṃ caiva narake pacyate tu saḥd niṣkṛtiṃ ca na tasyāpi anumanyanti karhi citd tasmād gāvo na pādena spraṣṭavyā vai kadā canad brāhmaṇaś ca mahātejā dīpyamānas tathānalaḥd śraddadhānena martyena ātmano hitam icchatād viśvāmitraḥd ete doṣā mayā proktās triṣu yaḥ pādam utsṛjetd śrūyatāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyaṃ dharmasaṃhitamd paramānnena yo dadyāt pitṝṇām aupahārikamd gajacchāyāyāṃ pūrvasyāṃ kutupe dakṣiṇāmukhaḥd yadā bhādrapade māsi bhavate bahule maghād śrūyatāṃ tasya dānasya yādṛśo guṇavistaraḥd kṛtaṃ tena mahac chrāddhaṃ varṣāṇīha trayodaśad gāvaḥd bahule samaṅge hy akutobhaye cad kṣeme ca saṃkhyeva hi bhūyasī cad yathā purā brahmapure savatsād śatakrator vajradharasya yajñed bhūyaś ca yā viṣṇupade sthitā yād vibhāvasoś cāpi pathe sthitā yād devāś ca sarve saha nāradenad prakurvate sarvasaheti nāmad mantreṇaitenābhivandeta yo vaid vimucyate pāpakṛtena karmaṇād lokān avāpnoti puraṃdarasyad gavāṃ phalaṃ candramaso dyutiṃ cad etaṃ hi mantraṃ tridaśābhijuṣṭaṃd paṭheta yaḥ parvasu goṣṭhamadhyed na tasya pāpaṃ na bhayaṃ na śokaḥd bhīṣmaḥd sahasranetrasya ca yāti lokamd atha sapta mahābhāgā ṛṣayo lokaviśrutāḥd vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sarve brahmāṇaṃ padmasaṃbhavamd pradakṣiṇam abhikramya sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥd uvāca vacanaṃ teṣāṃ vasiṣṭho brahmavittamaḥd sarvaprāṇihitaṃ praśnaṃ brahmakṣetre viśeṣataḥd dravyahīnāḥ kathaṃ martyā daridrāḥ sādhuvṛttayaḥd prāpnuvantīha yajñasya phalaṃ keneha karmaṇād etac chrutvā vacas teṣāṃ brahmā vacanam abravītd aho praśno mahābhāgā gūḍhārthaḥ paramaḥ śubhaḥd sūkṣmaḥ śreyāṃś ca martyānāṃ bhavadbhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥd śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye nikhilena tapodhanāḥd yathā yajñaphalaṃ martyo labhate nātra saṃśayaḥd pauṣamāsasya śukle vai yadā yujyeta rohiṇīd tena nakṣatrayogena ākāśaśayano bhavetd ekavastraḥ śuciḥ snātaḥ śraddadhānaḥ samāhitaḥd somasya raśmayaḥ pītvā mahāyajñaphalaṃ labhetd etad vaḥ paramaṃ guhyaṃ kathitaṃ dvijasattamāḥd vibhāvasuḥd yan māṃ bhavantaḥ pṛcchanti sūkṣmatattvārthadarśinaḥd salilasyāñjaliṃ pūrṇam akṣatāś ca ghṛtottarāḥd somasyottiṣṭhamānasya taj jalaṃ cākṣatāṃś ca tānd sthito hy abhimukho martyaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ baliṃ haretd agnikāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tena hutāś cāsyāgnayas trayaḥd vanaspatiṃ ca yo hanyād amāvāsyām abuddhimānd api hy ekena patreṇa lipyate brahmahatyayād dantakāṣṭhaṃ tu yaḥ khāded amāvāsyām abuddhimānd hiṃsitaś candramās tena pitaraś codvijanti cad havyaṃ na tasya devāś ca pratigṛhṇanti parvasud śrīḥd kupyante pitaraś cāsya kule vaṃśo sya hīyated prakīrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ yatra pānabhāṇḍam athāsanamd yoṣitaś caiva hanyante kaśmalopahate gṛhed devatāḥ pitaraś caiva utsave parvaṇīṣu vād nirāśāḥ pratigacchanti kaśmalopahatād gṛhātd aṅgirāḥd yas tu saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ dadyād dīpaṃ karañjaked gārgyaḥd suvarcalāmūlahastaḥ prajā tasya vivardhated ātithyaṃ satataṃ kuryād dīpaṃ dadyāt pratiśrayed varjayāno divāsvapnaṃ na ca māṃsāni bhakṣayetd gobrāhmaṇaṃ na hiṃsyāc ca puṣkarāṇi ca kīrtayetd eṣa śreṣṭhatamo dharmaḥ sarahasyo mahāphalaḥd api kratuśatair iṣṭvā kṣayaṃ gacchati tad dhaviḥd na tu kṣīyanti te dharmāḥ śraddadhānaiḥ prayojitāḥd idaṃ ca paramaṃ guhyaṃ sarahasyaṃ nibodhatad śrāddhakalpe ca daive ca tairthike parvaṇīṣu cad rajasvalā ca yā nārī śvitrikāputrikā ca yād etābhiś cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaṃ havir nāśnanti devatāḥd pitaraś ca na tuṣyanti varṣāṇy asya trayodaśad śuklavāsāḥ śucir bhūtvā brāhmaṇān svasti vācayetd dhaumyaḥd kīrtayed bhārataṃ caiva tathā syād akṣayaṃ haviḥd bhinnabhāṇḍaṃ ca khaṭvāṃ ca kukkuṭaṃ śunakaṃ tathād apraśastāni sarvāṇi yaś ca vṛkṣo gṛheruhaḥd bhinnabhāṇḍe kaliṃ prāhuḥ khaṭvāyāṃ tu dhanakṣayaḥd kukkuṭe śunake caiva havir nāśnanti devatāḥd vṛkṣamūle dhruvaṃ sattvaṃ tasmād vṛkṣaṃ na ropayetd jamadagniḥd yo yajed aśvamedhena vājapeyaśatena had avākśirā vā lambeta satraṃ vā sphītam āharetd na cāsya hṛdayaṃ śuddhaṃ narakaṃ sa dhruvaṃ vrajetd tulyaṃ yajñaś ca satyaṃ ca hṛdayasya ca śuddhatād śuddhena manasā dattvā saktuprasthaṃ dvijātayed vāyuḥd brahmalokam anuprāptaḥ paryāptaṃ tannidarśanamd kiṃ cid dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi mānuṣāṇāṃ sukhāvahamd sarahasyāś ca ye doṣās tāñ śṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥd agnikāryaṃ ca kartavyaṃ paramānnena bhojanamd dīpakaś cāpi kartavyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ satilodakaḥd etena vidhinā martyaḥ śraddadhānaḥ samāhitaḥd caturo vārṣikān māsān yo dadāti tilodakamd bhojanaṃ ca yathāśaktyā brāhmaṇe vedapāraged paśubandhaśatasyeha phalaṃ prāpnoti puṣkalamd idaṃ caivāparaṃ guhyam apraśastaṃ nibodhatad agnes tu vṛṣalo netā havir mūḍhāś ca yoṣitaḥd manyate dharma eveti sa cādharmeṇa lipyated agnayas tasya kupyanti śūdrayoniṃ sa gacchatid pitaraś ca na tuṣyanti saha devair viśeṣataḥd prāyaścittaṃ tu yat tatra bruvatas tan nibodha med yat kṛtvā tu naraḥ samyak sukhī bhavati vijvaraḥd gavāṃ mūtrapurīṣeṇa payasā ca ghṛtena cad agnikāryaṃ tryahaṃ kuryān nirāhāraḥ samāhitaḥd tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥd hṛṣyanti pitaraś cāsya śrāddhakāla upasthited eṣa hy adharmo dharmaś ca rahasyaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥd lomaśaḥd martyānāṃ svargakāmānāṃ pretya svargasukhāvahaḥd paradāreṣu ye saktā akṛtvā dārasaṃgrahamd nirāśāḥ pitaras teṣāṃ śrāddhakāle bhavanti vaid paradāraratir yaḥ syād yaś ca vandhyām upāsated brahmasvaṃ harate yaś ca samadoṣā bhavanti ted asaṃbhāṣyā bhavanty ete pitṝṇāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥd devatāḥ pitaraś caiṣāṃ nābhinandanti tad dhaviḥd tasmāt parasya vai dārāṃs tyajed vandhyāṃ ca yoṣitamd brahmasvaṃ hi na hartavyam ātmano hitam icchatād śrūyatāṃ cāparaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyaṃ dharmasaṃhitamd śraddadhānena kartavyaṃ gurūṇāṃ vacanaṃ sadād dvādaśyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca māsi māsi ghṛtākṣatamd brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayaccheta tasya puṇyaṃ nibodhatad somaś ca vardhate tena samudraś ca mahodadhiḥd aśvamedhacaturbhāgaṃ phalaṃ sṛjati vāsavaḥd dānenaitena tejasvī vīryavāṃś ca bhaven naraḥd prītaś ca bhagavān soma iṣṭān kāmān prayacchatid śrūyatāṃ cāparo dharmaḥ sarahasyo mahāphalaḥd imaṃ kaliyugaṃ prāpya manuṣyāṇāṃ sukhāvahaḥd kalyam utthāya yo martyaḥ snātaḥ śuklena vāsasād tilapātraṃ prayaccheta brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥd tilodakaṃ ca yo dadyāt pitṝṇāṃ madhunā sahad dīpakaṃ kṛsaraṃ caiva śrūyatāṃ tasya tat phalamd tilapātre phalaṃ prāha bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥd gopradānaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād bhūmidānaṃ ca śāśvatamd agniṣṭomaṃ ca yo yajñaṃ yajeta bahudakṣiṇamd tilapātraṃ sahaitena samaṃ manyanti devatāḥd tilodakaṃ sadā śrāddhe manyante pitaro kṣayamd dīpe ca kṛsare caiva tuṣyante sya pitāmahāḥd svarge ca pitṛloke ca pitṛdevābhipūjitamd evam etan mayoddiṣṭam ṛṣidṛṣṭaṃ purātanamd bhīṣmaḥd tatas tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ sarve pitaraś ca sadevatāḥd arundhatīṃ tapovṛddhām apṛcchanta samāhitāḥd samānaśīlāṃ vīryeṇa vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥd tvatto dharmarahasyāni śrotum icchāmahe vayamd arundhatīd yat te guhyatamaṃ bhadre tat prabhāṣitum arhasid tapovṛddhir mayā prāptā bhavatāṃ smaraṇena vaid bhavatāṃ ca prasādena dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatānd saguhyān sarahasyāṃś ca tāñ śṛṇudhvam aśeṣataḥd śraddadhāne prayoktavyā yasya śuddhaṃ tathā manaḥd aśraddadhāno mānī ca brahmahā gurutalpagaḥd asaṃbhāṣyā hi catvāro naiṣāṃ dharmaṃ prakāśayetd ahany ahani yo dadyāt kapilāṃ dvādaśīḥ samāḥd māsi māsi ca satreṇa yo yajeta sadā naraḥd gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ ca yo dadyāj jyeṣṭhapuṣkared na tad dharmaphalaṃ tulyam atithir yasya tuṣyatid śrūyatāṃ cāparo dharmo manuṣyāṇāṃ sukhāvahaḥd śraddadhānena kartavyaḥ sarahasyo mahāphalaḥd kalyam utthāya gomadhye gṛhya darbhān sahodakānd niṣiñceta gavāṃ śṛṅge mastakena ca taj jalamd pratīccheta nirāhāras tasya dharmaphalaṃ śṛṇud śrūyante yāni tīrthāni triṣu lokeṣu kāni citd siddhacāraṇajuṣṭāni sevitāni maharṣibhiḥd abhiṣekaḥ samas teṣāṃ gavāṃ śṛṅgodakasya cad sādhu sādhv iti coddiṣṭaṃ daivataiḥ pitṛbhis tathād pitāmahaḥd bhūtaiś caiva susaṃhṛṣṭaiḥ pūjitā sāpy arundhatīd aho dharmo mahābhāge sarahasya udāhṛtaḥd yamaḥd varaṃ dadāmi te dhanye tapas te vardhatāṃ sadād ramaṇīyā kathā divyā yuṣmatto yā mayā śrutād śrūyatāṃ citraguptasya bhāṣitaṃ mama ca priyamd rahasyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śakyaṃ śrotuṃ maharṣibhiḥd śraddadhānena martyena ātmano hitam icchatād na hi puṇyaṃ tathā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃ cid vinaśyatid parvakāle ca yat kiṃ cid ādityaṃ cādhitiṣṭhatid pretalokaṃ gate martye tat tat sarvaṃ vibhāvasuḥd pratijānāti puṇyātmā tac ca tatropayujyated kiṃ cid dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi citraguptamataṃ śubhamd pānīyaṃ caiva dīpaṃ ca dātavyaṃ satataṃ tathād upānahau ca cchatraṃ ca kapilā ca yathātathamd puṣkare kapilā deyā brāhmaṇe vedapāraged agnihotraṃ ca yatnena sarvaśaḥ pratipālayetd ayaṃ caivāparo dharmaś citraguptena bhāṣitaḥd phalam asya pṛthaktvena śrotum arhanti sattamāḥd pralayaṃ sarvabhūtaiś ca gantavyaṃ kālaparyayātd tatra durgam anuprāptāḥ kṣuttṛṣṇāparipīḍitāḥd dahyamānā vipacyante na tatrāsti palāyanamd andhakāraṃ tamo ghoraṃ praviśanty alpabuddhayaḥd tatra dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi yena durgāṇi saṃtaretd alpavyayaṃ mahārthaṃ ca pretya caiva sukhodayamd pānīyasya guṇā divyāḥ pretaloke viśeṣataḥd tatra puṇyodakā nāma nadī teṣāṃ vidhīyated akṣayaṃ salilaṃ tatra śītalaṃ hy amṛtopamamd sa tatra toyaṃ pibati pānīyaṃ yaḥ prayacchatid pradīpasya pradānena śrūyatāṃ guṇavistaraḥd tamondhakāraṃ niyataṃ dīpado na prapaśyatid prabhāṃ cāsya prayacchanti somabhāskarapāvakāḥd devatāś cāsya manyante vimalāḥ sarvatodiśaḥd dyotate ca yathādityaḥ pretalokagato naraḥd tasmād dīpaḥ pradātavyaḥ pānīyaṃ ca viśeṣataḥd kapilāṃ ye prayacchanti brāhmaṇe vedapāraged puṣkare ca viśeṣeṇa śrūyatāṃ tasya yat phalamd gośataṃ savṛṣaṃ tena dattaṃ bhavati śāśvatamd pāpaṃ karma ca yat kiṃ cid brahmahatyāsamaṃ bhavetd śodhayet kapilā hy ekā pradattaṃ gośataṃ yathād tasmāt tu kapilā deyā kaumudyāṃ jyeṣṭhapuṣkared na teṣāṃ viṣamaṃ kiṃ cin na duḥkhaṃ na ca kaṇṭakāḥd upānahau ca yo dadyāt pātrabhūte dvijottamed chatradāne sukhāṃ chāyāṃ labhate paralokagaḥd na hi dattasya dānasya nāśo stīha kadā canad citraguptamataṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭaromā vibhāvasuḥd uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ pitṝṃś caiva mahādyutiḥd śrutaṃ hi citraguptasya dharmaguhyaṃ mahātmanaḥd śraddadhānāś ca ye martyā brāhmaṇeṣu mahātmasud dānam etat prayacchanti na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayamd dharmadoṣās tv ime pañca yeṣāṃ nāstīha niṣkṛtiḥd asaṃbhāṣyā anācārā varjanīyā narādhamāḥd brahmahā caiva goghnaś ca paradārarataś ca yaḥd aśraddadhānaś ca naraḥ striyaṃ yaś copajīvatid pretalokagatā hy ete narake pāpakarmiṇaḥd pacyante vai yathā mīnāḥ pūyaśoṇitabhojanāḥd asaṃbhāṣyāḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca devānāṃ caiva pañca ted bhīṣmaḥd snātakānāṃ ca viprāṇāṃ ye cānye ca tapodhanāḥd tataḥ sarve mahābhāgā devāś ca pitaraś ca had ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgāḥ pramathān vākyam abruvand bhavanto vai mahābhāgā aparokṣaniśācarāḥd ucchiṣṭān aśucīn kṣudrān kathaṃ hiṃsatha mānavānd ke ca smṛtāḥ pratīghātā yena martyān na hiṃsathad rakṣoghnāni ca kāni syur yair gṛheṣu praṇaśyathad pramathāḥd śrotum icchāma yuṣmākaṃ sarvam etan niśācarāḥd maithunena sadocchiṣṭāḥ kṛte caivādharottared mohān māṃsāni khādetha vṛkṣamūle ca yaḥ svapetd āmiṣaṃ śīrṣato yasya pādato yaś ca saṃviśetd tata ucchiṣṭakāḥ sarve bahucchidrāś ca mānavāḥd udake cāpy amedhyāni śleṣmāṇaṃ ca pramuñcatid ete bhakṣyāś ca vadhyāś ca mānuṣā nātra saṃśayaḥd evaṃśīlasamācārān dharṣayāmo hi mānavānd śrūyatāṃ ca pratīghātān yair na śaknuma hiṃsitumd gorocanāsamālambho vacāhastaś ca yo bhavetd ghṛtākṣataṃ ca yo dadyān mastake tatparāyaṇaḥd ye ca māṃsaṃ na khādanti tān na śaknuma hiṃsitumd yasya cāgnir gṛhe nityaṃ divā rātrau ca dīpyated tarakṣoś carma daṃṣṭrāś ca tathaiva girikacchapaḥd ājyadhūmo biḍālaś ca cchāgaḥ kṛṣṇo tha piṅgalaḥd yeṣām etāni tiṣṭhanti gṛheṣu gṛhamedhināmd tāny adhṛṣyāṇy agārāṇi piśitāśaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥd lokān asmadvidhā ye ca vicaranti yathāsukhamd tasmād etāni geheṣu rakṣoghnāni viśāṃ pated bhīṣmaḥd etad vaḥ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yatra vaḥ saṃśayo mahānd tataḥ padmapratīkāśaḥ padmodbhūtaḥ pitāmahaḥd uvāca vacanaṃ devān vāsavaṃ ca śacīpatimd ayaṃ mahābalo nāgo rasātalacaro balīd tejasvī reṇuko nāma mahāsattvaparākramaḥd atitejasvinaḥ sarve mahāvīryā mahāgajāḥd dhārayanti mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ saśailavanakānanāmd bhavadbhiḥ samanujñāto reṇukas tān mahāgajānd dharmaguhyāni sarvāṇi gatvā pṛcchatu tatra vaid pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā te devā reṇukaṃ tadād reṇukaḥd preṣayām āsur avyagrā yatra te dharaṇīdharāḥd anujñāto smi devaiś ca pitṛbhiś ca mahābalāḥd dharmaguhyāni yuṣmākaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥd diggajāḥd kathayadhvaṃ mahābhāgā yad vas tattvaṃ manīṣitamd kārttike māsi cāśleṣā bahulasyāṣṭamī śivād tena nakṣatrayogena yo dadāti guḍaudanamd imaṃ mantraṃ japañ śrāddhe yatāhāro hy akopanaḥd baladevaprabhṛtayo ye nāgā balavattarāḥd anantā hy akṣayā nityaṃ bhoginaḥ sumahābalāḥd teṣāṃ kulodbhavā ye ca mahābhūtā bhujaṃgamāḥd te me baliṃ prayacchantu balatejobhivṛddhayed yadā nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān ujjahāra vasuṃdharāmd tad balaṃ tasya devasya dharām uddharatas tathād evam uktvā baliṃ tatra valmīke tu nivedayetd gajendrakusumākīrṇaṃ nīlavastrānulepanamd nirvapet taṃ tu valmīke astaṃ yāte divākared evaṃ tuṣṭās tataḥ sarve adhastād bhārapīḍitād śramaṃ taṃ nāvabudhyāmo dhārayanto vasuṃdharāmd evaṃ manyāmahe dharmaṃ bhārārtā nirapekṣiṇaḥd brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā yady upoṣitaḥd evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ bahuphalaṃ labhetd valmīke balim ādāya tan no bahuphalaṃ matamd ye ca nāgā mahāvīryās triṣu lokeṣu kṛtsnaśaḥd kṛtātithyā bhaveyus te śataṃ varṣāṇi tattvataḥd diggajānāṃ ca tac chrutvā devatāḥ pitaras tathād maheśvaraḥd ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgāḥ pūjayanti sma reṇukamd sāram uddhṛtya yuṣmābhiḥ sādhu dharma udāhṛtaḥd dharmaguhyam idaṃ mattaḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ sarva eva had yeṣāṃ dharmāśritā buddhiḥ śraddhadhānāś ca ye narāḥd teṣāṃ syād upadeṣṭavyaḥ sarahasyo mahāphalaḥd nirudvignas tu yo dadyān māsam ekaṃ gavāhnikamd ekabhaktaṃ tathāśnīyāc chrūyatāṃ tasya yat phalamd imā gāvo mahābhāgāḥ pavitraṃ paramaṃ smṛtāḥd trīn lokān dhārayanti sma sadevāsuramānuṣānd tāsu caiva mahāpuṇyaṃ śuśrūṣā ca mahāphalamd ahany ahani dharmeṇa yujyate vā gavāhniked mayā hy etā hy anujñātāḥ pūrvam āsan kṛte yuged tato ham anunīto vai brahmaṇā padmayoninād tasmād vrajasthānagatas tiṣṭhaty upari me vṛṣaḥd rame haṃ saha gobhiś ca tasmāt pūjyāḥ sadaiva tāḥd mahāprabhāvā varadā varān dadyur upāsitāḥd tā gāvo syānumanyante sarvakarmasu yat phalamd skandaḥd tasya tatra caturbhāgo yo dadāti gavāhnikamd mamāpy anumato dharmas taṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥd nīlaṣaṇḍasya śṛṅgābhyāṃ gṛhītvā mṛttikāṃ tu yaḥd abhiṣekaṃ tryahaṃ kuryāt tasya dharmaṃ nibodhatad śodhayed aśubhaṃ sarvam ādhipatyaṃ paratra cad yāvac ca jāyate martyas tāvac chūro bhaviṣyatid idaṃ cāpy aparaṃ guhyaṃ sarahasyaṃ nibodhatad pragṛhyaudumbaraṃ pātraṃ pakvānnaṃ madhunā sahad somasyottiṣṭhamānasya paurṇamāsyāṃ baliṃ haretd tasya dharmaphalaṃ nityaṃ śraddadhānā nibodhatad sādhyā rudrās tathādityā viśvedevās tathāśvinaud maruto vasavaś caiva pratigṛhṇanti taṃ balimd somaś ca vardhate tena samudraś ca mahodadhiḥd viṣṇuḥd eṣa dharmo mayoddiṣṭaḥ sarahasyaḥ sukhāvahaḥd dharmaguhyāni sarvāṇi devatānāṃ mahātmanāmd ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva guhyāni yaḥ paṭhed āhnikaṃ sadād śṛṇuyād vānasūyur yaḥ śraddadhānaḥ samāhitaḥd nāsya vighnaḥ prabhavati bhayaṃ cāsya na vidyated ye ca dharmāḥ śubhāḥ puṇyāḥ sarahasyā udāhṛtāḥd teṣāṃ dharmaphalaṃ tasya yaḥ paṭheta jitendriyaḥd nāsya pāpaṃ prabhavati na ca pāpena lipyated paṭhed vā śrāvayed vāpi śrutvā vā labhate phalamd bhuñjate pitaro devā havyaṃ kavyam athākṣayamd śrāvayaṃś cāpi viprendrān parvasu prayato naraḥd ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ caiva nityadād bhavaty abhimataḥ śrīmān dharmeṣu prayataḥ sadād kṛtvāpi pāpakaṃ karma mahāpātakavarjitamd bhīṣmaḥd rahasyadharmaṃ śrutvemaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyated etad dharmarahasyaṃ vai devatānāṃ narādhipad vyāsoddiṣṭaṃ mayā proktaṃ sarvadevanamaskṛtamd pṛthivī ratnasaṃpūrṇā jñānaṃ cedam anuttamamd idam eva tataḥ śrāvyam iti manyeta dharmavitd nāśraddadhānāya na nāstikāyad na naṣṭadharmāya na vanagocaraiḥc vanaṃ gurum ivāsādya vastavyaṃ vanajīvibhiḥa teṣāṃ homakriyā dharmaḥ pañcayajñaniṣevaṇamc nāgapañcamayajñasya vedoktasyānupālanama aṣṭamīyajñaparatā cāturmāsyaniṣevaṇamc paurṇamāsyāṃ tu yo yajño nityayajñas tathaiva caa vimuktā dārasaṃyogair vimuktāḥ sarvasaṃkaraiḥc vimuktāḥ sarvapāpaiś ca caranti munayo vanea srugbhāṇḍaparamā nityaṃ tretāgniśaraṇāḥ sadāc santaḥ satpathanityā ye te yānti paramāṃ gatima brahmalokaṃ mahāpuṇyaṃ somalokaṃ ca śāśvatamc gacchanti munayaḥ siddhā ṛṣidharmavyapāśrayāta eṣa dharmo mayā devi vānaprasthāśritaḥ śubhaḥc vistareṇārthasaṃpanno yathāsthūlam udāhṛtaḥ umovācaa bhagavan devadeveśa sarvabhūtanamaskṛtac yo dharmo munisaṃghasya siddhivādeṣu taṃ vadaa siddhivādeṣu saṃsiddhās tathā vananivāsinaḥc svairiṇo dārasaṃyuktās teṣāṃ dharmaḥ kathaṃ smṛtaḥ maheśvara uvācaa svairiṇas tāpasā devi sarve dāravihāriṇaḥc teṣāṃ mauṇḍyaṃ kaṣāyaś ca vāsarātriś ca kāraṇama trikālam abhiṣekaś ca hotraṃ tv ṛṣikṛtaṃ mahatc samādhiḥ satpathasthānaṃ yathoditaniṣevaṇama ye ca te pūrvakathitā dharmā vananivāsināmc yadi sevanti dharmāṃs tān āpnuvanti tapaḥphalama ye ca daṃpatidharmāṇaḥ svadāraniyatendriyāḥc caranti vidhidṛṣṭaṃ tad ṛtukālābhigāminaḥa teṣām ṛṣikṛto dharmo dharmiṇām upapadyatec na kāmakārāt kāmo nyaḥ saṃsevyo dharmadarśibhiḥa sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ samyag dadāty abhayadakṣiṇāmc hiṃsāroṣavimuktātmā sa vai dharmeṇa yujyatea sarvabhūtānukampī yaḥ sarvabhūtārjavavrataḥc sarvabhūtātmabhūtaś ca sa vai dharmeṇa yujyatea sarvavedeṣu vā snānaṃ sarvabhūteṣu cārjavamc ubhe ete same syātām ārjavaṃ vā viśiṣyatea ārjavaṃ dharma ity āhur adharmo jihma ucyatec ārjaveneha saṃyukto naro dharmeṇa yujyatea ārjavo bhuvane nityaṃ vasaty amarasaṃnidhauc tasmād ārjavanityaḥ syād ya icched dharmam ātmanaḥa kṣānto dānto jitakrodho dharmabhūto vihiṃsakaḥc dharme ratamanā nityaṃ naro dharmeṇa yujyatea vyapetatandro dharmātmā śakyā satpatham āśritaḥc cāritraparamo buddho brahmabhūyāya kalpate umovācaa āśramābhiratā deva tāpasā ye tapodhanāḥc dīptimantaḥ kayā caiva caryayātha bhavanti tea rājāno rājaputrāś ca nirdhanā vā mahādhanāḥc karmaṇā kena bhagavan prāpnuvanti mahāphalama nityaṃ sthānam upāgamya divyacandanarūṣitāḥc kena vā karmaṇā deva bhavanti vanagocarāḥa etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva tapaścaryāgataṃ śubhamc śaṃsa sarvam aśeṣeṇa tryakṣa tripuranāśana maheśvara uvācaa upavāsavratair dāntā ahiṃsrāḥ satyavādinaḥc saṃsiddhāḥ pretya gandharvaiḥ saha modanty anāmayāḥa maṇḍūkayogaśayano yathāsthānaṃ yathāvidhic dīkṣāṃ carati dharmātmā sa nāgaiḥ saha modatea śaṣpaṃ mṛgamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ yo mṛgaiḥ saha sevatec dīkṣito vai mudā yuktaḥ sa gacchaty amarāvatīma śaivālaṃ śīrṇaparṇaṃ vā tad vrato yo niṣevatec śītayogavaho nityaṃ sa gacchet paramāṃ gatima vāyubhakṣo mbubhakṣo vā phalamūlāśano pi vāc yakṣeṣv aiśvaryam ādhāya modate psarasāṃ gaṇaiḥa agniyogavaho grīṣme vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇāc cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi rājā bhavati pārthivaḥa āhāraniyamaṃ kṛtvā munir dvādaśavārṣikamc maruṃ saṃsādhya yatnena rājā bhavati pārthivaḥa sthaṇḍile śuddham ākāśaṃ parigṛhya samantataḥc praviśya ca mudā yukto dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīma sthaṇḍilasya phalāny āhur yānāni śayanāni cac gṛhāṇi ca mahārhāṇi candraśubhrāṇi bhāminia ātmānam upajīvan yo niyato niyatāśanaḥc dehaṃ vānaśane tyaktvā sa svargaṃ samupāśnutea ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīmc tyaktvā mahārṇave dehaṃ vāruṇaṃ lokam aśnutea ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīmc aśmanā caraṇau bhittvā guhyakeṣu sa modatea sādhayitvātmanātmānaṃ nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥc cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatāme svargalokam avāpnoti devaiś ca saha modatea ātmānam upajīvan yo dīkṣāṃ dvādaśavārṣikīmc hutvāgnau deham utsṛjya vahniloke mahīyatea yas tu devi yathānyāyaṃ dīkṣito niyato dvijaḥc ātmany ātmānam ādhāya nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥa cīrtvā dvādaśa varṣāṇi dīkṣām ekāṃ manogatāmc araṇīsahitaṃ skandhe baddhvā gacchaty anāvṛtaḥa vīrādhvānamanā nityaṃ vīrāsanaratas tathāc vīrasthāyī ca satataṃ sa vīragatim āpnuyāta sa śakralokago nityaṃ sarvakāmapuraskṛtaḥc divyapuṣpasamākīrṇo divyacandanabhūṣitaḥe sukhaṃ vasati dharmātmā divi devagaṇaiḥ sahaa vīralokagato vīro vīrayogavahaḥ sadāc sattvasthaḥ sarvam utsṛjya dīkṣito niyataḥ śuciḥe vīrādhvānaṃ prapadyed yas tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥa kāmagena vimānena sa vai carati cchandataḥc śakralokagataḥ śrīmān modate ca nirāmayaḥ umovācaa bhagavan bhaganetraghna pūṣṇo daśanapātanac dakṣakratuhara tryakṣa saṃśayo me mahān ayama cāturvarṇyaṃ bhagavatā pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvāc kena karmavipākena vaiśyo gacchati śūdratāma vaiśyo vā kṣatriyaḥ kena dvijo vā kṣatriyo bhavetc pratilomaḥ kathaṃ deva śakyo dharmo niṣevituma kena vā karmaṇā vipraḥ śūdrayonau prajāyatec kṣatriyaḥ śūdratām eti kena vā karmaṇā vibhoa etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva vada bhūtapate naghac trayo varṇāḥ prakṛtyeha kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam āpnuyuḥ maheśvara uvācaa brāhmaṇyaṃ devi duṣprāpaṃ nisargād brāhmaṇaḥ śubhec kṣatriyo vaiśyaśūdrau vā nisargād iti me matiḥa karmaṇā duṣkṛteneha sthānād bhraśyati vai dvijaḥc jyeṣṭhaṃ varṇam anuprāpya tasmād rakṣeta vai dvijaḥa sthito brāhmaṇadharmeṇa brāhmaṇyam upajīvatic kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā brahmabhūyāya gacchatia yas tu vipratvam utsṛjya kṣātraṃ dharmaṃ niṣevatec brāhmaṇyāt sa paribhraṣṭaḥ kṣatrayonau prajāyatea vaiśyakarma ca yo vipro lobhamohavyapāśrayaḥc brāhmaṇyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya karoty alpamatiḥ sadāa sa dvijo vaiśyatām eti vaiśyo vā śūdratām iyātc svadharmāt pracyuto vipras tataḥ śūdratvam āpnutea tatrāsau nirayaṃ prāpto varṇabhraṣṭo bahiṣkṛtaḥc brahmalokaparibhraṣṭaḥ śūdraḥ samupajāyatea kṣatriyo vā mahābhāge vaiśyo vā dharmacāriṇic svāni karmāṇy apāhāya śūdrakarmāṇi sevatea svasthānāt sa paribhraṣṭo varṇasaṃkaratāṃ gataḥc brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdratvaṃ yāti tādṛśaḥa yas tu śuddhaḥ svadharmeṇa jñānavijñānavāñ śuciḥc dharmajño dharmanirataḥ sa dharmaphalam aśnutea idaṃ caivāparaṃ devi brahmaṇā samudīritamc adhyātmaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ sadbhir dharmakāmair niṣevyatea ugrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi gaṇānnaṃ śrāddhasūtakamc ghuṣṭānnaṃ naiva bhoktavyaṃ śūdrānnaṃ naiva karhi cita śūdrānnaṃ garhitaṃ devi devadevair mahātmabhiḥc pitāmahamukhotsṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇam iti me matiḥa śūdrānnenāvaśeṣeṇa jaṭhare yo mriyeta vaic āhitāgnis tathā yajvā sa śūdragatibhāg bhaveta tena śūdrānnaśeṣeṇa brahmasthānād apākṛtaḥc brāhmaṇaḥ śūdratām eti nāsti tatra vicāraṇāa yasyānnenāvaśeṣeṇa jaṭhare yo mriyeta vaic tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ vrajed vipro yasyānnam upajīvatia brāhmaṇatvaṃ śubhaṃ prāpya durlabhaṃ yo vamanyatec abhojyānnāni cāśnāti sa dvijatvāt pateta vaia surāpo brahmahā kṣudraś cauro bhagnavrato śuciḥc svādhyāyavarjitaḥ pāpo lubdho naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥa avratī vṛṣalībhartā kuṇḍāśī somavikrayīc nihīnasevī vipro hi patati brahmayonitaḥa gurutalpī gurudveṣī gurukutsāratiś ca yaḥc brahmadviṭ cāpi patati brāhmaṇo brahmayonitaḥa ebhis tu karmabhir devi śubhair ācaritais tathāc śūdro brāhmaṇatāṃ gacched vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ vrajeta śūdrakarmāṇi sarvāṇi yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhic śuśrūṣāṃ paricaryāṃ ca jyeṣṭhe varṇe prayatnataḥe kuryād avimanāḥ śūdraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥa daivatadvijasatkartā sarvātithyakṛtavrataḥc ṛtukālābhigāmī ca niyato niyatāśanaḥa caukṣaś caukṣajanānveṣī śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥc vṛthāmāṃsāny abhuñjānaḥ śūdro vaiśyatvam ṛcchatia ṛtavāg anahaṃvādī nirdvaṃdvaḥ śamakovidaḥc yajate nityayajñaiś ca svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥa dānto brāhmaṇasatkartā sarvavarṇabubhūṣakaḥc gṛhasthavratam ātiṣṭhan dvikālakṛtabhojanaḥa śeṣāśī vijitāhāro niṣkāmo nirahaṃvadaḥc agnihotram upāsaṃś ca juhvānaś ca yathāvidhia sarvātithyam upātiṣṭhañ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥc tretāgnimantravihito vaiśyo bhavati vai yadie sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyakule śucau mahati jāyatea sa vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo jāto janmaprabhṛti saṃskṛtaḥc upanīto vrataparo dvijo bhavati satkṛtaḥa dadāti yajate yajñaiḥ saṃskṛtair āptadakṣiṇaiḥc adhīte svargam anvicchaṃs tretāgniśaraṇaḥ sadāa ārtahastaprado nityaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayanc satyaḥ satyāni kurute nityaṃ yaḥ sukhadarśanaḥa dharmadaṇḍo na nirdaṇḍo dharmakāryānuśāsakaḥc yantritaḥ kāryakaraṇe ṣaḍbhāgakṛtalakṣaṇaḥa grāmyadharmān na seveta svacchandenārthakovidaḥc ṛtukāle tu dharmātmā patnīṃ seveta nityadāa sarvopavāsī niyataḥ svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥc barhiṣkāntarite nityaṃ śayāno gnigṛhe sadāa sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya kurvāṇaḥ sumanāḥ sadāc śūdrāṇāṃ cānnakāmānāṃ nityaṃ siddham iti bruvana svārthād vā yadi vā kāmān na kiṃ cid upalakṣayetc pitṛdevātithikṛte sādhanaṃ kurute ca yaḥa svaveśmani yathānyāyam upāste bhaikṣam eva cac trikālam agnihotraṃ ca juhvāno vai yathāvidhia gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya raṇe cābhimukho hataḥc tretāgnimantrapūtaṃ vā samāviśya dvijo bhaveta jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ saṃskṛto vedapāragaḥc vipro bhavati dharmātmā kṣatriyaḥ svena karmaṇāa etaiḥ karmaphalair devi nyūnajātikulodbhavaḥc śūdro py āgamasaṃpanno dvijo bhavati saṃskṛtaḥa brāhmaṇo vāpy asadvṛttaḥ sarvasaṃkarabhojanaḥc brāhmaṇyaṃ puṇyam utsṛjya śūdro bhavati tādṛśaḥa karmabhiḥ śucibhir devi śuddhātmā vijitendriyaḥc śūdro pi dvijavat sevya iti brahmābravīt svayama svabhāvakarma ca śubhaṃ yatra śūdre pi tiṣṭhatic viśuddhaḥ sa dvijātir vai vijñeya iti me matiḥa na yonir nāpi saṃskāro na śrutaṃ na ca saṃnatiḥc kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇama sarvo yaṃ brāhmaṇo loke vṛttena tu vidhīyatec vṛtte sthitaś ca suśroṇi brāhmaṇatvaṃ nigacchatia brāhmaḥ svabhāvaḥ kalyāṇi samaḥ sarvatra me matiḥc nirguṇaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma yatra tiṣṭhati sa dvijaḥa ete yoniphalā devi sthānabhāganidarśakāḥc svayaṃ ca varadenoktā brahmaṇā sṛjatā prajāḥa brāhmaṇo hi mahat kṣetraṃ loke carati pādavatc yat tatra bījaṃ vapati sā kṛṣiḥ pāralaukikīa mitāśinā sadā bhāvyaṃ satpathālambinā sadāc brāhmamārgam atikramya vartitavyaṃ bubhūṣatāa saṃhitādhyāyinā bhāvyaṃ gṛhe vai gṛhamedhināc nityaṃ svādhyāyayuktena dānādhyayanajīvināa evaṃbhūto hi yo vipraḥ satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥc āhitāgnir adhīyāno brahmabhūyāya kalpatea brāhmaṇyam eva saṃprāpya rakṣitavyaṃ yatātmabhiḥc yonipratigrahādānaiḥ karmabhiś ca śucismitea etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā śūdro bhaved dvijaḥc brāhmaṇo vā cyuto dharmād yathā śūdratvam āpnute umovācaa bhagavan sarvabhūteśa surāsuranamaskṛtac dharmādharme nṛṇāṃ deva brūhi me saṃśayaṃ vibhoa karmaṇā manasā vācā trividhaṃ hi naraḥ sadāc badhyate bandhanaiḥ pāśair mucyate py atha vā punaḥa kena śīlena vā deva karmaṇā kīdṛśena vāc samācārair guṇair vākyaiḥ svargaṃ yāntīha mānavāḥ maheśvara uvācaa devi dharmārthatattvajñe satyanitye dame ratec sarvaprāṇihitaḥ praśnaḥ śrūyatāṃ buddhivardhanaḥa satyadharmaratāḥ santaḥ sarvalipsāvivarjitāḥc nādharmeṇa na dharmeṇa badhyante chinnasaṃśayāḥa pralayotpattitattvajñāḥ sarvajñāḥ samadarśinaḥc vītarāgā vimucyante puruṣāḥ sarvabandhanaiḥa karmaṇā manasā vācā ye na hiṃsanti kiṃ canac ye na sajjanti kasmiṃś cid badhyante te na karmabhiḥa prāṇātipātād viratāḥ śīlavanto dayānvitāḥc tulyadveṣyapriyā dāntā mucyante karmabandhanaiḥa sarvabhūtadayāvanto viśvāsyāḥ sarvajantuṣuc tyaktahiṃsāsamācārās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa parasve nirmamā nityaṃ paradāravivarjakāḥc dharmalabdhārthabhoktāras te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa mātṛvat svasṛvac caiva nityaṃ duhitṛvac ca yec paradāreṣu vartante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa stainyān nivṛttāḥ satataṃ saṃtuṣṭāḥ svadhanena cac svabhāgyāny upajīvanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa svadāraniratā ye ca ṛtukālābhigāminaḥc agrāmyasukhabhogāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa paradāreṣu ye nityaṃ cāritrāvṛtalocanāḥc yatendriyāḥ śīlaparās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa eṣa devakṛto mārgaḥ sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥc akaṣāyakṛtaś caiva mārgaḥ sevyaḥ sadā budhaiḥa dānadharmatapoyuktaḥ śīlaśaucadayātmakaḥc vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥe svargavāsam abhīpsadbhir na sevyas tv ata uttaraḥ umovācaa vācātha badhyate yena mucyate py atha vā punaḥc tāni karmāṇi me deva vada bhūtapate nagha maheśvara uvācaa ātmahetoḥ parārthe vā narmahāsyāśrayāt tathāc ye mṛṣā na vadantīha te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa vṛttyarthaṃ dharmahetor vā kāmakārāt tathaiva cac anṛtaṃ ye na bhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa ślakṣṇāṃ vāṇīṃ nirābādhāṃ madhurāṃ pāpavarjitāmc svāgatenābhibhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa kaṭukāṃ ye na bhāṣante paruṣāṃ niṣṭhurāṃ giramc apaiśunyaratāḥ santas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa piśunāṃ ye na bhāṣante mitrabhedakarīṃ giramc ṛtāṃ maitrīṃ prabhāṣante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa varjayanti sadā sūcyaṃ paradrohaṃ ca mānavāḥc sarvabhūtasamā dāntās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa śaṭhapralāpād viratā viruddhaparivarjakāḥc saumyapralāpino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa na kopād vyāharante ye vācaṃ hṛdayadāraṇīmc sāntvaṃ vadanti kruddhāpi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa eṣa vāṇīkṛto devi dharmaḥ sevyaḥ sadā naraiḥc śubhaḥ satyaguṇo nityaṃ varjanīyā mṛṣā budhaiḥ umovācaa manasā badhyate yena karmaṇā puruṣaḥ sadāc tan me brūhi mahābhāga devadeva pinākadhṛk maheśvara uvācaa mānaseneha dharmeṇa saṃyuktāḥ puruṣāḥ sadāc svargaṃ gacchanti kalyāṇi tan me kīrtayataḥ śṛṇua duṣpraṇītena manasā duṣpraṇītatarākṛtiḥc badhyate mānavo yena śṛṇu cānyac chubhānanea araṇye vijane nyastaṃ parasvaṃ vīkṣya ye narāḥc manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa grāme gṛhe vā yad dravyaṃ pārakyaṃ vijane sthitamc nābhinandanti vai nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa tathaiva paradārān ye kāmavṛttān rahogatānc manasāpi na hiṃsanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa śatruṃ mitraṃ ca ye nityaṃ tulyena manasā narāḥc bhajanti maitrāḥ saṃgamya te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa śrutavanto dayāvantaḥ śucayaḥ satyasaṃgarāḥc svair arthaiḥ parisaṃtuṣṭās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa avairā ye tv anāyāsā maitracittaparāḥ sadāc sarvabhūtadayāvantas te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa śraddhāvanto dayāvantaś cokṣāś cokṣajanapriyāḥc dharmādharmavido nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃcayec vipākajñāś ca ye devi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa nyāyopetā guṇopetā devadvijaparāḥ sadāc samatāṃ samanuprāptās te narāḥ svargagāminaḥa śubhaiḥ karmaphalair devi mayaite parikīrtitāḥc svargamārgopagā bhūyaḥ kim anyac chrotum icchasi umovācaa mahān me saṃśayaḥ kaś cin martyān prati maheśvarac tasmāt taṃ naipuṇenādya mamākhyātuṃ tvam arhasia kenāyur labhate dīrghaṃ karmaṇā puruṣaḥ prabhoc tapasā vāpi deveśa kenāyur labhate mahata kṣīṇāyuḥ kena bhavati karmaṇā bhuvi mānavaḥc vipākaṃ karmaṇāṃ deva vaktum arhasy aninditaa apare ca mahābhogā mandabhogās tathāparec akulīnās tathā cānye kulīnāś ca tathāparea durdarśāḥ ke cid ābhānti narāḥ kāṣṭhamayā ivac priyadarśās tathā cānye darśanād eva mānavāḥa duṣprajñāḥ ke cid ābhānti ke cid ābhānti paṇḍitāḥc mahāprajñās tathaivānye jñānavijñānadarśinaḥa alpābādhās tathā ke cin mahābādhās tathāparec dṛśyante puruṣā deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasi maheśvara uvācaa hanta te haṃ pravakṣyāmi devi karmaphalodayamc martyaloke narāḥ sarve yena svaṃ bhuñjate phalama prāṇātipātī yo raudro daṇḍahastodyatas tathāc nityam udyatadaṇḍaś ca hanti bhūtagaṇān naraḥa nirdayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ nityam udvegakārakaḥc api kīṭapipīlānām aśaraṇyaḥ sunirghṛṇaḥa evaṃbhūto naro devi nirayaṃ pratipadyatec viparītas tu dharmātmā rūpavān abhijāyatea nirayaṃ yāti hiṃsātmā yāti svargam ahiṃsakaḥc yātanāṃ niraye raudrāṃ sa kṛcchrāṃ labhate naraḥa atha cen nirayāt tasmāt samuttarati karhi citc mānuṣyaṃ labhate cāpi hīnāyus tatra jāyatea pāpena karmaṇā devi baddho hiṃsāratir naraḥc apriyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hīnāyur upajāyatea yas tu śuklābhijātīyaḥ prāṇighātavivarjakaḥc nikṣiptadaṇḍo nirdaṇḍo na hinasti kadā canaa na ghātayati no hanti ghnantaṃ naivānumodatec sarvabhūteṣu sasneho yathātmani tathāparea īdṛśaḥ puruṣotkarṣo devi devatvam aśnutec upapannān sukhān bhogān upāśnāti mudā yutaḥa atha cen mānuṣe loke kadā cid upapadyatec tatra dīrghāyur utpannaḥ sa naraḥ sukham edhatea evaṃ dīrghāyuṣāṃ mārgaḥ suvṛttānāṃ sukarmaṇāmc prāṇihiṃsāvimokṣeṇa brahmaṇā samudīritaḥ umovācaa kiṃśīlāḥ kiṃsamācārāḥ puruṣāḥ kaiś ca karmabhiḥc svargaṃ samabhipadyante saṃpradānena kena vā maheśvara uvācaa dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā dīnāndhakṛpaṇādiṣuc bhakṣyabhojyānnapānānāṃ vāsasāṃ ca pradāyakaḥa pratiśrayān sabhāḥ kūpān prapāḥ puṣkariṇīs tathāc naityakāni ca sarvāṇi kim icchakam atīva caa āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ dhanaṃ ratnaṃ dīnāndhakṛpaṇān dṛṣṭvā bhikṣukān atithīn apic yācyamānā nivartante jihvālobhasamanvitāḥa na dhanāni na vāsāṃsi na bhogān na ca kāñcanamc na gāvo nānnavikṛtiṃ prayacchanti kadā canaa apravṛttās tu ye āsanārhasya ye pīṭhaṃ na prayacchanty acetasaḥa mārgārhasya ca ye mārgaṃ na yacchanty alpabuddhayaḥc pādyārhasya ca ye pādyaṃ na dadaty alpabuddhayaḥa arghārhān na ca satkārair arcayanti yathāvidhic āpaddharmān anuprekṣya tat kāryam aviśaṅkayāa eṣa deva mayā proktaḥ strīdharmo vacanāt tavac yā tv evaṃbhāvinī nārī sā bhaved dharmabhāginī bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ sa tu deveśaḥ pratipūjya gireḥ mahāmatimd janamejayaḥd prītyā punaḥ sa śuśrūṣur vacanaṃ yad yudhiṣṭhired pitāmaho me viprarṣe bhīṣmaṃ kālavaśaṃ gatamd kim apṛcchat tadā rājā sarvasāmāsikaṃ hitamd ubhayor lokayor yuktaṃ puruṣārtham anuttamamd vaiśaṃpāyanaḥd tan me vada mahāprājña śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi med bhūya eva mahārāja śṛṇu dharmasamuccayamd yad apṛcchat tadā rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥd śaratalpagataṃ bhīṣmaṃ sarvapārthivasaṃnidhaud yudhiṣṭhiraḥd ajātaśatruḥ prītātmā punar evābhyabhāṣatad pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśāradad śrūyatāṃ me hi vacanam arthitvāt prabravīmy ahamd parāvarajño bhūtānāṃ dayāvān sarvajantuṣud āgamair bahubhiḥ sphīto bhavān naḥ paramaḥ kuled tvādṛśo durlabho loke sāṃprataṃ jñānadarśanaḥd bhavatā guruṇā caiva dhanyā bata vayaṃ prabhod ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto durlabho jñātibāndhavaiḥd śāstā nu nāsti naḥ kaś cit tvad ṛte puruṣarṣabhad tasmād dharmārthasaṃyuktam āyatyāṃ ca hitodayamd āścaryaṃ paramaṃ vākyaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhāratad ayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān sarvapārthivasaṃnidhaud bhavantaṃ bahumānāc ca praṇayāc copasevated asyaiva tu samakṣaṃ naḥ pārthivānāṃ tathaiva cad itivṛttaṃ purāṇaṃ ca śrotṝṇāṃ paramaṃ hitamd yadi te ham anugrāhyo bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito naghad vaiśaṃpāyanaḥd matpriyārthaṃ tu kauravya snehād bhāṣitum arhasid tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād āgataviklavaḥd prapibann iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmo vacanam abravītd śṛṇu rājan purā vṛttam itihāsaṃ purātanamd etāvad uktvā gāṅgeyaḥ praṇamya śirasā harimd dharmarājaṃ samīkṣyedaṃ punar vaktuṃ samārabhatd ayaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān putrārthaṃ vratakāṅkṣayād dīkṣito bhūn mahābāhuḥ purā dvādaśavārṣikamd dīkṣitaṃ keśavaṃ draṣṭum abhijagmur maharṣayaḥd sevituṃ ca mahātmānaḥ prīyamāṇā janārdanamd nāradaḥ parvataś caiva kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tathād devalaḥ kāśyapaś caiva hastikāśyapa eva cad jamadagniś ca rājendra dhaumyo vālmīkir eva cad apare pi tapaḥsiddhāḥ satyavrataparāyaṇāḥd śiṣyair anugatāḥ sarve brahmavidbhir akalmaṣaiḥd keśavas tān abhigatān prītyā saṃpratigṛhya cad teṣām atithisatkāraṃ pūjanārthaṃ kulocitamd devakītanayo hṛṣṭo devatulyam akalpayatd upaviṣṭeṣu sarveṣu viṣṭareṣu tadānaghad viśvasteṣu hi tuṣṭeṣu keśavārcanayā punaḥd parasparaṃ kathā divyāḥ prāvartanta manoramāḥd viṣṇor nārāyaṇasyaiva prasādāt kathayāmi tāḥd tasyaiva vratacaryāyāṃ munibhir vismitaḥ purād yaś ca govṛṣabhāṅkasya prabhāvo bhūn mahātmanaḥd yatra devī mahādevam apṛcchat saṃśayān purād kathayām āsa śarvas tān devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayād umāpatyoś ca saṃvādaṃ śṛṇu tāta manoramamd varṇāśramāṇāṃ dharmaś ca tatra tāta samāhitaḥd ṛṣidharmaś ca nikhilo rājadharmaś ca puṣkalaḥd gṛhasthadharmaś ca śubhaḥ karmapākaphalāni cad devaguhyaṃ ca vividhaṃ dānadharmavidhis tadād vidhānam atra saṃproktaṃ yamasya niyamasya cad yamalokavidhānaṃ ca svargalokavidhis tathād prāṇamokṣavidhiś caiva tīrthacaryā ca puṣkalād mokṣadharmavidhānaṃ ca sāṃkhyayogasamanvitamd strīdharmaś ca svayaṃ devyā devadevāya bhāṣitaḥd evamādi śubhaṃ sarvaṃ tatra tāta samāhitamd rudrāṇyāḥ saṃśayapraśno yatra tāta pravartated dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ dharmyaṃ ca paramaṃ hitamd puṣṭiyogam idaṃ divyaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇud itihāsam imaṃ divyaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ śubhamd sāyaṃ prātaḥ sadā samyak śrotavyaṃ ca bubhūṣatād tato nārāyaṇo devaḥ saṃkliṣṭo vratacaryayād vahnir viniḥsṛto vaktrāt kṛṣṇasyādbhutadarśanaḥd agninā tena mahatā niḥsṛtena mukhād vibhoḥd paśyatām eva sarveṣāṃ dagdha eva nagottamaḥd mṛgapakṣisamākīrṇaḥ śvāpadair abhisaṃkulaḥd vṛkṣagulmalatākīrṇo mathito dīnadarśanaḥd punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātreṇa hariṇā saumyacetasād sa babhūva giriḥ kṣipraṃ praphulladrumakānanaḥd siddhacāraṇasaṃghaiś ca prasannair upaśobhitaḥd mattavāraṇasaṃyukto nānāpakṣigaṇair yutaḥd tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca sarveṣām abhavad bhṛśamd taṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaromāṇaḥ sarve munigaṇās tadād vismitāḥ paramāyastāḥ sādhvasākulalocanāḥd na kiṃ cid abruvaṃs tatra śubhaṃ vā yadi vetaratd tato nārāyaṇo devo munisaṃghe suvismited tān samīkṣyaiva madhuraṃ babhāṣe puṣkarekṣaṇaḥd kimarthaṃ munisaṃghasya vismayo yam anuttamaḥd etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarve yāthātathyam aninditāḥd ṛṣayo vaktum arhanti niścayenārthakovidāḥd keśavasya vacaḥ śrutvā tuṣṭuvur munipuṃgavāḥd bhavān sṛjati vai lokān bhavān saṃharati prajāḥd bhavāñ śītaṃ bhavān uṣṇaṃ bhavān satyaṃ bhavān kratuḥd bhavān ādir bhavān anto bhavato nyan na vidyated sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ sarvaṃ tvam eva puruṣottamad tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ tāta lokacakraṃ pravartated tvam evārhasi tad vaktuṃ mukhād agnivinirgamamd etan no vismayakaraṃ babhūva madhusūdanad tato dhigatasaṃtrāsā bhavāma puruṣottamad bhagavānd yad icchet tatra vaktavyaṃ kuto smākaṃ niyogataḥd nityaṃ hitārthaṃ lokānāṃ bhavadbhiḥ kriyate tapaḥd tasmāl lokahitaṃ guhyaṃ śrūyatāṃ kathayāmi vaḥd asuraḥ sāṃprataṃ kaś cid ahito lokanāśanaḥd māyāstrakuśalaś caiva baladarpasamanvitaḥd babhūva sa mayā vadhyo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayād putreṇa me vadho dṛṣṭas tasya vai munipuṃgavāḥd tadarthaṃ putram evāhaṃ sisṛkṣur vanam āgataḥd ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ putram ahaṃ janayituṃ vrataiḥd evaṃ vrataparītasya tapastīvratayā mamad athātmā mama dehasthaḥ so gnir bhūtvā viniḥsṛtaḥd viniḥsṛtya gato draṣṭuṃ kṣaṇena ca pitāmahamd brahmaṇā manmatho naṅgaḥ putratve me prakalpitaḥd anujñātaś ca tenaiva punar āyān mamāntikamd etan me vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo mama vaktrād viniḥsṛtamd tattejasā nirmathitaḥ purato yaṃ giriḥ sthitaḥd dṛṣṭvā nāśaṃ gires tasya saumyabhāvatayā mamad punaḥ sa dṛṣṭamātreṇa girir āsīd yathāpuramd etad guhyaṃ mayā tathyaṃ kathitaṃ vaḥ samāsataḥd bhavanto vyathitā yena vismitāś ca tapodhanāḥd bhagavānd ṛṣīṇām evam uktvā tu tān punaḥ pratyabhāṣatad bhavatāṃ darśanād eva prītir abhyadhikā mamad bahudhā harapāriṣadair bhṛśamd ghorarūpaṃ sudurdarśaṃ rakṣogaṇaśatair vṛtamd samājaṃ tadvane dṛṣṭaṃ mayā bhūtapateḥ purād pranṛttāpsarasaṃ divyaṃ devagandharvanāditamd ṣaṭpadair upagītaṃ ca prathame māsi mādhaved utkrośatkrauñcakuraraiḥ sārasair jīvajīvakaiḥd mattābhiḥ parapuṣṭābhiḥ kūjantībhiḥ samākulamd uttamotsavasaṃkāśaṃ bhīmarūpataraṃ tataḥd draṣṭuṃ bhavati sarvasya dharmabhāgijanasya cad ye cordhvaretasaḥ siddhās tatra tatra samāgatāḥd mārtāṇḍaraśmisaṃcārā viśvedevagaṇās tathād tathā nāgās tathādityā lokapālā hutāśanāḥd vātāś ca sarve vāyanti divyapuṣpasamākulāḥd kirantaḥ sarvapuṣpāṇi kiranto dbhutadarśanāḥd oṣadhyaḥ prajvalantyaś ca dyotayantyo diśo daśad vihagāś ca mudā yuktā nṛtyanti ca nadanti cad giraḥ sumadhurās tatra divyā divyajanapriyāḥd tatra devo giritaṭe maharṣayaḥd tatrasthaṃ devadeveśaṃ bhagavantam upāsated tatas tasmin kṣaṇe devī bhūtastrīgaṇasevitād haratulyāmbaradharā samānavratacāriṇīd kāñcanaṃ kalaśaṃ gṛhya sarvatīrthāmbupūritamd puṣpavṛṣṭyābhivarṣantī divyagandhasamāyutād saridvarābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ pṛṣṭhato nugatā varād sevituṃ bhagavatpārśvam ājagāma śucismitād āgamya tu gireḥ putrī devadevasya cāntikamd manaḥpriyaṃ cikīrṣantī
