śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yat tvaṃ pṛcchasi bhāminid purāsurau mahāghorau lokodvegakarau bhṛśamd sundopasundanāmānāv āsatur bahugarvitaud aśastravadhyau balinau parasparahitaiṣiṇaud tayor eva vināśāya nirmitā viśvakarmaṇād mṛgapakṣigaṇānāṃ ca sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva cad sarvataḥ sāram uddhṛtya tilaśo lokapūjitād tilottameti vikhyātā apsarāḥ sā babhūva had devakāryaṃ kariṣyantī hāvabhāvasamanvitād sā tu paryantam āgamya rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvid mayā bahumatā ceyaṃ devakāryaṃ kariṣyatid iti matvā tadā cāhaṃ kurvantīṃ māṃ pradakṣiṇamd tathaiva tāṃ didṛkṣuś ca caturvaktro bhavaṃ priyed aindraṃ mukham idaṃ pūrvaṃ tapaścaryāparaṃ sadād dakṣiṇaṃ me mukhaṃ divyaṃ raudraṃ saṃharati prajāḥd lokakāryaparaṃ nityaṃ paścimaṃ me mukhaṃ priyed vedān adhīte satatam adbhutaṃ cottaraṃ mukhamd umād etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi śūlapāṇe varapradad maheśvaraḥd kimarthaṃ nīlatā kaṇṭhe bhāti barhanibhā tavad hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitād purā yugāntare yatnād amṛtārthaṃ surāsuraiḥd balavadbhir vimathitaś cirakālaṃ mahodadhiḥd rajjunā nāgarājena mathyamāne mahodadhaud viṣaṃ tatra samudbhūtaṃ sarvalokavināśanamd tad dṛṣṭvā vibudhāḥ sarve tadā vimanaso bhavand grastaṃ hi tan mayā devi lokānāṃ hitakāraṇātd tatkṛtā nīlatā cāsīt kaṇṭhe barhinibhā śubhed tadāprabhṛti caivāhaṃ nīlakaṇṭha iti smṛtaḥd umād etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid nīlakaṇṭha namas te stu sarvalokasukhāvahad bahūnām āyudhānāṃ tvaṃ pinākaṃ dhartum icchasid maheśvaraḥd kimarthaṃ devadeveśa tan me śaṃsitum arhasid śastrāgamaṃ te vakṣyāmi śṛṇu dharmyaṃ śucismited yugāntare mahādevi kaṇvo nāma mahāmuniḥd sa hi divyāṃ tapaścaryāṃ kartum evopacakramed tathā tasya tapo ghoraṃ carataḥ kālaparyayātd valmīkaṃ punar udbhūtaṃ tasyaiva śirasi priyed veṇur valmīkasaṃyogān mūrdhni tasya babhūva had dharamāṇaś ca tat sarvaṃ tapaścaryām athākarotd tasmai brahmā varaṃ dātuṃ jagāma tapasārcitaḥd dattvā tasmai varaṃ devo veṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā tv acintayatd lokakāryaṃ samuddiśya veṇunānena bhāminid cintayitvā tam ādāya kārmukārthe nyayojayatd viṣṇor mama ca sāmarthyaṃ jñātvā lokapitāmahaḥd dhanuṣī dve tadā prādād viṣṇave ca mamaiva cad pinākaṃ nāma me cāpaṃ śārṅgaṃ nāma harer dhanuḥd tṛtīyam avaśeṣeṇa gāṇḍīvam abhavad dhanuḥd tac ca somāya nirdiśya brahmalokaṃ gataḥ punaḥd umād etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ śastrāgamam anindited bhagavan sarvabhūteśa pinākaparaśupriyad vāhaneṣu tathānyeṣu satsu bhūtapate tavad ayaṃ tu vṛṣabhaḥ kasmād vāhanatvam upāgamatd maheśvaraḥd eṣa me saṃśayo deva taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi vāhanaṃ sa yathābhavatd ādisarge purā gāvaḥ śvetavarṇāḥ śucismited balasaṃhananopetā darpayuktāś caranti tāḥd ahaṃ tu tapa ātiṣṭhe tasmin kāle śubhānaned ekapādaś cordhvabāhur lokārthaṃ himavadgiraud gāvo me pārśvam āviśya darpotsiktāḥ samantataḥd sthānabhraṃśaṃ tu me devi cakrire bahuśas tathād apacāreṇa caitāsāṃ manaḥkṣobho bhavan mamad tasmād dagdhā mayā gāvo roṣāviṣṭena cetasād tasmiṃs tu vyasane ghore vartamāne paśūn pratid anena vṛṣabheṇāhaṃ śamitaḥ saṃprasādanaiḥd tadāprabhṛti śāntāś ca varṇabhedatvam āgatāḥd śveto yaṃ vṛṣabho devi pūrvasaṃskārasaṃyutaḥd vāhanatve dhvajatve me tadāprabhṛti yojitaḥd tasmān me gopatitvaṃ ca devair gobhiś ca kalpitamd umād prasannaś cābhavaṃ devi tadā gopatitāṃ gataḥd bhagavan sarvabhūteśa śūlapāṇe vṛṣadhvajad āvāseṣu vicitreṣu ramyeṣu ca śubheṣu cad satsu cānyeṣu deśeṣu śmaśāne ramase kathamd keśāsthikalile bhīme kapālaśatasaṃkuled sṛgālagṛdhrasaṃpūrṇe śavadhūmasamākuled citāgniviṣame ghore gahane ca bhayānaked evaṃ kalevarakṣetre durdarśe ramase kathamd maheśvaraḥd eṣa me saṃśayo deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasid hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitād āvāsārthaṃ purā devi śuddhānveṣī śucismited nādhyagacchaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ deśaṃ śucitamaṃ śubhed eṣa me bhiniveśo bhūt tasmin kāle prajāḥ pratid ākulaṃ sumahad ghoraṃ prādurāsīt samantataḥd saṃbhūtā bhūtasṛṣṭiś ca ghorā lokabhayāvahād nānāvarṇavirūpāś ca tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrāḥ prahāriṇaḥd piśācarakṣovadanāḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇahāriṇaḥd yatas tataś caranti sma nighnantaḥ prāṇino bhṛśamd evaṃ loke kṣayaṃ yāte prāṇihīne pitāmahaḥd cintayaṃs tatpratīkāraṃ māṃ ca śaktaṃ hi nigrahed evaṃ jñātvā tadā brahmā tasmin karmaṇy ayojayatd tac ca prāṇidayārthaṃ tu mayāpy anumataṃ priyed tasmāt saṃrakṣitā devi bhūtebhyaḥ prāṇino bhayātd asmāc chmaśānān medhyaṃ tu nāsti kiṃ cid anindited niḥsaṃpātaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmāc chucitamaṃ smṛtamd bhūtasṛṣṭiṃ tu tāṃ cāhaṃ śmaśāne saṃnyaveśayamd tatrasthaḥ sarvalokānāṃ vinihanmi priye bhayamd na ca bhūtagaṇenāhaṃ vinā vasitum utsahed tasmān me saṃnivāsāya śmaśāne rocate manaḥd medhyakāmair dvijair nityaṃ medhyam ity abhidhīyated ācaradbhir vrataṃ raudraṃ mokṣakāmaiś ca sevyated sthānaṃ me tatra vihitaṃ vīrasthānam iti priyed kapālaśatasaṃpūrṇaṃ bhīmarūpaṃ bhayānakamd madhyāhne saṃdhyayos tatra nakṣatre rudradaivated āyuṣkāmair aśuddhair vā na gantavyam iti sthitiḥd mad anyena na śakyaṃ hi nihantuṃ bhūtajaṃ bhayamd tatrastho haṃ prajāḥ sarvāḥ pālayāmi dine dined manniyogād bhūtasaṃghā na ca ghnantīha kiṃ canad tasmāl lokahitārthāya śmaśāne ramayāmy ahamd umād etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa trinetra vṛṣabhadhvajad piṅgalaṃ vikṛtaṃ bhāti rūpaṃ te subhayānakamd bhasmadigdhaṃ virūpākṣaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ jaṭākulamd vyāghroragatvaksaṃvītaṃ kapilaśmaśrusaṃtatamd raudraṃ bhayānakaṃ ghoraṃ śūlapaṭṭasasaṃyutamd maheśvaraḥd kimartham īdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvaṃ samāhitād dvividho laukiko bhāvaḥ śītam uṣṇam iti priyed tayor vigrathitaṃ sarvaṃ saumyāgneyam idaṃ jagatd saumyatvaṃ satataṃ viṣṇau mayy āgneyaṃ pratiṣṭhitamd anena vapuṣā nityaṃ sarvalokān bibharmy ahamd raudrākṛti virūpākṣaṃ śūlapaṭṭasasaṃyutamd āgneyam iti me rūpaṃ devi lokahite ratamd yady ahaṃ viparītaḥ syām etat tyaktvā śubhānaned tadaiva sarvalokānāṃ viparītaṃ pravartated tasmān mayedaṃ dhriyate rūpaṃ lokahitaiṣiṇād umād iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa śūlapāṇe vṛṣadhvajad kimarthaṃ candrarekhā te śirobhāge virocated maheśvaraḥd śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇamd purāhaṃ kāraṇād devi kopayuktaḥ śucismited dakṣayajñavadhārthāya bhūtasaṃghasamāvṛtaḥd tasmin kratuvadhe ghore yajñabhāganimittataḥd devā vibhraṃśitās te vai yeṣāṃ bhāgaḥ kratau kṛtaḥd somas tatra mayā devi kupitena bhṛśārditaḥd paśyaṃś cānaparādhī san pādāṅguṣṭhena pīḍitaḥd tathā vinikṛtenāhaṃ sāmapūrvaṃ prasāditaḥd tan me cintayataś cāsīt paścāttāpaḥ punaḥ priyed tadāprabhṛti somaṃ hi śirasā dhārayāmy ahamd evaṃ me pāpahānis tu bhaved iti matir mamad tadāprabhṛti vai somo mūrdhni saṃdṛśyate sadād nāradaḥd evaṃ bruvati deveśe vismitāḥ paramarṣayaḥd vāgbhiḥ sāñjalimālābhir abhituṣṭuvur īśvaramd namaḥ śaṃkara deveśa namaḥ sarvajagadgurod namo devādidevāya namaḥ śaśikalādharad namo ghoratarād ghora namo rudra bhayaṃkarad namaḥ śāntatarāc chānta namaś candrasya pālakad namaḥ somāya devāya namas tubhyaṃ caturmukhad namo bhūtapate śaṃbho jahnukanyāmbuśekharad namas triśūlahastāya pannagābharaṇāya cad namo stu viṣamākṣāya dakṣayajñapradāhakad namo stu bahunetrāya lokarakṣaṇatatparad aho devasya māhātmyaṃ mahādevasya vai kṛpād evaṃ dharmaparatvaṃ ca devadevasya cārhatid evaṃ bruvatsu muniṣu vaco devy abravīd dharamd prītyarthaṃ ca munīnāṃ sā kṣaṇajñā paramaṃ hitamd bhagavan devadeveśa sarvalokanamaskṛtad asya vai ṛṣisaṃghasya mama ca priyakāmyayād varṇāśramagataṃ dharmaṃ vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥd na tṛptir asti deveśa śravaṇīyaṃ hi te vacaḥd sadharmacāriṇī ceyaṃ bhaktā ceyam iti prabhod vaktum arhasi deveśa lokānāṃ hitakāmyayād maheśvaraḥd yāthātathyena tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi śaṃkarad hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yat te devi manaḥpriyamd śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ dharmaṃ varṇāśramāśritamd brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ceti caturvidhāḥd brahmaṇā vihitāḥ pūrvaṃ lokatantram abhīpsatād karmāṇi ca tadarhāṇi śāstreṣu vihitāni vaid yadi cedekavarṇaṃ syāj jagat sarvaṃ vinaśyatid sahaiva devair varṇāni catvāri vihitāny utad mukhato brāhmaṇāḥ sṛṣṭās tasmāt te vāgviśāradāḥd bāhubhyāṃ kṣatriyāḥ sṛṣṭās tasmād bāhubalānvitāḥd udarād udgatā vaiśyās tasmād vārtopajīvinaḥd śūdrāś ca pādataḥ sṛṣṭās tasmāt te paricārakāḥd teṣāṃ dharmāṃś ca karmāṇi śṛṇu devi samāhitād viprāḥ kṛtā bhūmidevā lokānāṃ dhāraṇe kṛtāḥd te kaiś cin nāvamantavyā brāhmaṇā hitam icchubhiḥd yadi te brāhmaṇā na syur dānayogavahāḥ sadād ubhayor lokayor devi sthitir na syāt samāsataḥd lokeṣu durlabhaṃ kiṃ tu brāhmaṇatvam iti smṛtamd abudho vā daridro vā pūjanīyaḥ sadaiva saḥd brāhmaṇaṃ yo vamanyeta nindayet krośayec ca vād prahareta hared vāpi dhanaṃ teṣāṃ narādhamaḥd kārayed dhīnakarmāṇi kāmalobhavimohanātd sa ca mām avamanyeta māṃ krośati ca nindatid mām eva praharen mūḍho maddhanasyāpahārakaḥd mamaiva prekṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā nandate mūḍhacetanaḥd svādhyāyo yajanaṃ dānaṃ tasya dharma iti sthitiḥd karmāṇy adhyāpanaṃ caiva yājanaṃ ca pratigrahaḥd satyaṃ śāntis tapaḥ śaucaṃ tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥd vikrayo rasadhānyānāṃ brāhmaṇasya vigarhitaḥd anāpadi ca śūdrānnaṃ vṛṣalīsaṃgrahas tathād tapa eva sadā dharmo brāhmaṇasya na saṃśayaḥd sa tu dharmārtham utpannaḥ pūrvaṃ dhātrā tapobalātd tasyopanayanaṃ dharmo nityaṃ codakadhāraṇamd rahasyaśravaṇaṃ dharmo vedavrataniṣevaṇamd agnikāryaṃ paro dharmo nityaṃ yajñopavītitād śūdrānnavarjanaṃ dharmo dharmaḥ satpathasevanamd dharmo nityopavāsitvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tathād amṛtāśyaṃ paraṃ dharmo gṛhapuṣpabalis tathād gṛhasaṃmārjanaṃ dharma ālepanavidhis tathād atithivratatā dharmo dharmas tretāgnidhāraṇamd iṣṭayaḥ paśubandhāś ca vidhipūrvaṃ paraṃ tapaḥd daṃpatyoḥ samaśīlatvaṃ dharmo vai gṛhamedhināmd eṣa dvijanmano dharmo gārhasthye dharmadhāraṇamd yas tu kṣatragato dharmas tvayā devi pracoditaḥd tam ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitād kṣatriyās tu tathā devi prajānāṃ pālane smṛtāḥd yadi na kṣatriyo loke jagat syād adharottaramd rakṣaṇāt kṣatriyair eva jagad bhavati śāśvatamd tasyāpy adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ yajanaṃ dharmataḥ smṛtamd bhītānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ caiva pāpānām anuśāsanamd satāṃ saṃpoṣaṇaṃ caiva karaṣaḍbhāgajīvanamd utsāhaḥ śastrajīvitvaṃ tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥd bhṛtyānāṃ bharaṇaṃ dharmaḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatād samyag raṇadhṛto dharmo dharmaḥ paurahitakriyād vyavahārasthitir nityaṃ guṇam etan mahīpateḥd ārtahastaprado rājā dharmaṃ prāpnoty anuttamamd evaṃ te vihitāḥ pūrvair dharmāḥ karmavidhānataḥd tathaiva devi vaiśyāś ca lokayātrāhitāḥ smṛtāḥd anye tān upajīvanti pratyakṣaphaladā hi ted yadi na syus tathā vaiśyā na bhaveyus tathā pared teṣām adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ yajanaṃ dharma iṣyated vaiśyasya satataṃ dharmaḥ pāśupālyaṃ kṛṣis tathād agnihotraparispandās trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥd vāṇijyaṃ satpathe sthānam ātitheyaṃ sadā bhavetd viprāṇāṃ svāgataṃ nyāyo vaiśyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥd tilagandharasāś caiva na vikreyāḥ kathaṃ canad vaṇikpatham upāsadbhir vaiśyair vaiśyapathi sthitaiḥd sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti divāniśamd evaṃ te vihitā devi lokayātrā svayaṃbhuvād tathaiva śūdrā vihitāḥ sarvadharmaprasādhakāḥd śūdrāś ca yadi te na syuḥ karmakartā na vidyated trayaḥ pūrve śūdramūlās tasmāt karmakarāḥ smṛtāḥd brāhmaṇādiṣu śuśrūṣā dāsadharma iti smṛtaḥd vārtā ca kārukarmāṇi śilpaṃ nāṭyaṃ tathaiva cad ahiṃsakaḥ śubhācāro daivatadvijavandakaḥd śūdro dharmaphalair iṣṭaiḥ svadharmeṇopayujyated evamādi tathānyac ca śūdrakarma iti smṛtamd te py evaṃ vihitā loke karmayogāḥ śubhānaned evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ puṇyalokāḥ paratra cad vihitāś ca tathā dṛṣṭā yathāvad dharmacāriṇāmd eṣa varṇāśrayo dharmaḥ karma caiva tadarpaṇamd umād kathitaṃ śrotukāmāyāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa namas te vṛṣabhadhvajad maheśvaraḥd śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva dharmam āśramiṇāṃ vibhod athāśramagataṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇu devi samāhitād āśramāṇāṃ tu yo dharmaḥ kriyate brahmavādibhiḥd gṛhasthaḥ pravaras teṣāṃ gārhasthyavratam āśritaḥd pañcayajñakriyā śaucaṃ dāratuṣṭir atandritād ṛtukālābhigamanaṃ dānayajñatapāṃsi cad avipravāsas tasyeṣṭaṃ svādhyāyaś cāgnipūjanamd atithīnām ābhimukhyaṃ śaktyā ceṣṭanimantraṇamd anugrahaś ca sarveṣāṃ manovākkāyakarmabhiḥd evamādi śubhaṃ cānyat kuryāt tadvṛttavān gṛhīd evaṃ saṃcaratas tasya puṇyalokā na saṃśayaḥd tathaiva vānaprasthasya dharmāḥ proktāḥ sanātanāḥd gṛhavāsaṃ samutsṛjya niścityaikamanāḥ śubhaiḥd vanyair eva sadāhārair vartayed iti ca sthitiḥd bhūmiśayyā jaṭāḥ śmaśrucarmavalkaladhāraṇamd devatātithisatkāro mahākṛcchrābhipūjanamd agnihotraṃ triṣavaṇaṃ nityaṃ tasya vidhīyated brahmacaryaṃ kṣamā śaucaṃ tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥd evaṃ sa vigate prāṇe devaloke mahīyated yatidharmās tathā devi saṅgāṃs tyaktvā yatas tataḥd ākiṃcanyam anārambhaḥ sarvataḥ śaucam ārjavamd sarvatra bhaikṣacaryā ca sarvatraiva vivāsanamd sadā dhyānaparatvaṃ ca doṣaśuddhiḥ kṣamā dayād tattvānugatabuddhitvaṃ tasya dharmavidhir bhavetd brahmacārī ca yo devi janmaprabhṛti dīkṣitaḥd brahmacaryaparo bhūtvā saṃśrayed gurum ātmanaḥd sarvakāleṣu sarvatra gurupūjāṃ samācaretd bhaikṣacaryāgnikāryaṃ ca sadā jalaniṣevaṇamd svādhyāyaḥ satataṃ devi tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥd tasya ceṣṭā tu gurvartham āprāṇāntam iti sthitiḥd guror abhāve tatputre guruvad vṛttim ācaretd evaṃ so py amalāṃl lokān brāhmaṇaḥ pratipadyated eṣa te kathito devi dharmaś cāśramavāsināmd cāturvarṇyāśrame yukto loka ity eva vidyated umād kathitaṃ te samāsena kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa tripurāntaka śaṃkarad ayaṃ tv ṛṣigaṇo deva tapas tepa iti prabhod tapasā karśitā nityaṃ taporjanaparāyaṇāḥd asya kiṃlakṣaṇo dharmaḥ kīdṛśaś cāgamas tathād etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me vada varapradad nāradaḥd evaṃ vadantyāṃ rudrāṇyām ṛṣayaḥ sādhu sādhv itid abruvan hṛṣṭamanasaḥ sarve tadgatamānasāḥd śṛṇvantīm ṛṣidharmāṃs tu ṛṣayaś cābhyapūjayand tvatprasādād vayaṃ devi śroṣyāmaḥ paramaṃ hitamd dhanyāḥ khalu vayaṃ sarve pādamūlaṃ tavāśritāḥd maheśvaraḥd iti sarve tadā devīṃ vācā samabhipūjayand nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmā manasvinid hanta te kathayiṣyāmi munidharmaṃ śucismited vānaprasthaṃ samāśritya kriyate bahudhā naraiḥd bahuśākho bahuvidha ṛṣidharmaḥ sanātanaḥd prāyaśaḥ svargabhogārtham ṛṣibhiḥ kriyate tapaḥd tathā saṃcaratāṃ teṣāṃ devi dharmavidhiṃ śṛṇud bhūtvā pūrvaṃ gṛhasthas tu putrānṛṇyam avāpya cad kalatrakāryaṃ saṃsthāpya kāraṇāt saṃtyajed gṛhamd avasthāpya mano dhṛtyā vyavasāyapuraḥsaraḥd nirdvaṃdvo vā sadāro vā vanavāsāya saṃvrajetd deśāḥ paramapuṇyā ye nadīvanasamanvitāḥd ābādhamuktāḥ prāyeṇa tīrthāyatanasaṃyutāḥd tatra gatvā vidhiṃ jñātvā dīkṣāṃ kuryād yathākramamd dīkṣitvaikamanā bhūtvā paricaryāṃ samācaretd kālyotthānaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca sarvadevapraṇāmanamd śakṛdālepanaṃ kāye tyaktadoṣāpramāditād sāyaṃ prātaś cābhiṣekam agnihotraṃ yathāvidhid kāyaśaucaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca jaṭāvalkaladhāraṇamd satataṃ vanacaryā ca samitkusumakāraṇātd nīvāragrahaṇaṃ kāle śākamūlopacāyanamd sadāyatanaśaucaṃ ca tasya dharmāya ceṣyated atithīnām ābhimukhyaṃ tatparatvaṃ ca sarvaśaḥd pādyāsanābhyāṃ saṃpūjā tathāhāranimantraṇamd agrāmyapacanaṃ kāle pitṛdevārcanaṃ tathād paścād atithisatkāras tasya dharmāḥ sanātanāḥd śiṣṭair dharmāsane caiva dharmārthasahitāḥ kathāḥd pratiśrayavibhāgaś ca bhūmiśayyā śilāsu vād vratopavāsayogaś ca kṣamā cendriyanigrahaḥd divā rātrau yathāyogaṃ śaucaṃ dharmārthacintanād evaṃ dharmāḥ purā dṛṣṭāḥ sāmānyā vanavāsināmd evaṃ vai yatamānasya kāladharmo yadā bhavetd tadaiva so bhijāyeta svargalokaṃ śucismited tatra saṃvihitā bhogāḥ svargastrībhir anindited paribhraṣṭo yadā svargād viśiṣṭas tu bhaven nṛpad evaṃ dharmaḥ sadā devi sarveṣāṃ vanavāsināmd umād etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa ṛṣīṇāṃ caritaṃ śubhamd maheśvaraḥd viśeṣadharmān icchāmi śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi med tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitād vananityair vanaratair vānaprasthair maharṣibhiḥd vanaṃ gurum ivālambya vastavyam iti niścayaḥd vīraśayyām upāsadbhir vīrasthānopasevibhiḥd vratopavāsair bahubhir grīṣme pañcatapais tathād pañcayajñaparair nityaṃ paurṇamāsyaparāyaṇaiḥd maṇḍūkaśāyair hemante śaivālāṅkurabhojanaiḥd cīravalkalasaṃvītair mṛgājinadharais tathād cāturmāsyaparaiḥ kaiś cid devadharmaparāyaṇaiḥd evaṃvidhair vanagatais tapyate sumahat tapaḥd evaṃ kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma paścād yāti triviṣṭapamd tatrāpi sumahat kālaṃ sa vihṛtya yathāsukhamd jāyate mānuṣe loke dānabhogasamanvitaḥd umād tapoviśeṣasaṃyuktāḥ kathitās te śucismited bhagavan sarvabhūteśa teṣu ye dārasaṃyutāḥd maheśvaraḥd kīdṛśaṃ caritaṃ teṣāṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ya ekapatnīdharmāṇaś caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥd vindhyapādeṣu ye ke cid ye ca naimiṣavāsinaḥd puṣkareṣu ca ye cānye nadīvanasamāśritāḥd sarve te vidhidṛṣṭena caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥd hiṃsādrohavimuktāś ca sarvabhūtānukampinaḥd śāntā dāntā jitakrodhāḥ sarvātithyaparāyaṇāḥd prāṇiṣv ātmopamā nityam ṛtukālābhigāminaḥd svadārasahitā devi caranti vratam uttamamd vasanti sukham avyagrāḥ putradārasamanvitāḥd teṣāṃ paricchadārambhāḥ kṛtyopakaraṇāni cad gṛhasthavad vidhīyante yathāyogaṃ pramāṇataḥd poṣaṇārthaṃ ca dārāṇām agnikāryārtham eva cad gāvaś ca karṣaṇaṃ caiva sarvam etad vidhīyated evaṃ vanagatair devi kartavyaṃ dārasaṃyutaiḥd te svadāraiḥ samāyānti puṇyāṃl lokān dṛḍhavratāḥd patibhiḥ saha ye dārāś caranti vipulaṃ tapaḥd avyagrabhāvād aikātmyāt te ca gacchanti vai divamd etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid umād bhagavan devadeveśa teṣāṃ karmaphalaṃ vibhod maheśvaraḥd śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva prasādāt te varapradad vānaprasthagataṃ sarvaṃ phalapākaṃ śṛṇu priyed agniyogaṃ vrajan grīṣme naro dvādaśavārṣikamd rudraloke hi jāyeta vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇād udavāsavrataṃ kurvan varṣakāle dṛḍhavrataḥd somaloke bhijāyeta naro dvādaśavārṣikamd kāṣṭhavan maunam āsthāya naro dvādaśavārṣikamd marutāṃ lokam āsthāya tatra bhogaiś ca yujyated kaṇṭaśarkarasaṃyukte sthaṇḍile saṃviśen muniḥd yakṣaloke bhijāyeta sahasrāṇi caturdaśad varṣāṇāṃ bhogasaṃyukto naro dvādaśavārṣikamd vīrāsanagato yas tu kaṇṭakāphalakāśritaḥd gandharveṣv abhijāyeta naro dvādaśavārṣikamd vīrasthāyī cordhvabāhur naro dvādaśavārṣikamd devaloke bhijāyeta divyabhogasamanvitaḥd pādāṅguṣṭhena yas tiṣṭhed ūrdhvabāhur jitendriyaḥd indraloke bhijāyeta sahasrāṇi caturdaśad āhāraniyamaṃ kṛtvā munir dvādaśavārṣikamd nāgaloke bhijāyeta saṃvatsaragaṇān bahūnd evaṃ dṛḍhavratā devi vānaprasthāś ca karmabhiḥd sthāneṣu teṣu tiṣṭhanti tadvad bhogasamanvitāḥd tebhyo bhraṣṭāḥ punar devi jāyante nṛṣu bhoginaḥd varṇottamakuleṣv eva dhanadhānyasamanvitāḥd etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid umād eṣāṃ yāyāvarāṇāṃ tu dharmam icchāmi mānadad maheśvaraḥd kṛpayā parayāviṣṭas taṃ me brūhi maheśvarad dharmaṃ yāyāvarāṇāṃ tu śṛṇu bhāmini tatparād vratopavāsaśuddhāṅgās tīrthasnānaparāyaṇāḥd dhṛtimantaḥ kṣamāyuktāḥ satyavrataparāyaṇāḥd pakṣamāsopavāsaiś ca karśitā dharmadarśinaḥd varṣaśītātapair eva kurvantaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥd kālayogena gacchanti śakralokaṃ śucismited tatra te bhogasaṃyuktā divyagandhasamanvitāḥd divyabhūṣaṇasaṃyuktā vimānavaram āsthitāḥd vicaranti yathākāmaṃ divyastrīgaṇasaṃyutāḥd umād etat te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid maheśvaraḥd teṣāṃ cakracarāṇāṃ tu dharmam icchāmi vai prabhod hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu śākaṭikaṃ śubhed saṃvahanto dhuraṃ dāraiḥ śākaṭānāṃ tu sarvadād prārthayante yathā grāmyāḥ śakaṭair bhaikṣacaryayād taporjanaparādhīnās tapasā kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥd paryaṭanto diśaḥ sarvāḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitāḥd svavaśād eva te mṛtyum abhikāṅkṣanti nityaśaḥd indraloke tathā teṣāṃ nirmitā bhogasaṃcayāḥd amaraiḥ saha te yānti devavad bhogasaṃyutāḥd varāpsarobhiḥ saṃyuktāś cirakālam anindited tenaiva kālayogena tridivaṃ yānti śobhaned tatra pramuditā bhogair vicaranti yathāsukhamd umād etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid maheśvaraḥd vaikhānasānāṃ vai dharmaṃ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabhod teṣu vaikhānasā nāma vānaprasthāḥ śubhekṣaṇed tīvreṇa tapasā yuktā dīptimantaḥ svatejasād satyavrataparādhīnās teṣāṃ niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥd aśmakuṭṭās tathānye ca dantolūkhalinas tathād śīrṇaparṇāśinaś cānye uñchayanti tathāpared kapotavratinaś cānye kāpotīṃ vṛttim āsthitāḥd paśupracāraniratāḥ phenapāś ca tathāpared mṛgavan mṛgacaryāyāṃ saṃcaranti tathāpared abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāś ca nirāhārās tathaiva cad saṃcaranti tapo ghoraṃ vyādhimṛtyuvivarjitāḥd svavaśād eva te mṛtyum abhikāṅkṣanti nityaśaḥd indraloke tathā teṣāṃ nirmitā bhogasaṃcayāḥd amaraiḥ saha te yānti devavad bhogasaṃyutāḥd varāpsarobhiḥ saṃyuktāś cirakālam anindited umād etat te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid maheśvaraḥd bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi vālakhilyāṃs tapodhanānd dharmacaryāṃ tathā devi vālakhilyagatāṃ śṛṇud mṛganirmokavasanā nirdvaṃdvās te tapodhanāḥd aṅguṣṭhamātrāḥ suśroṇi sveṣv evāṅgeṣu saṃyutāḥd te mṛtyuviṣayātītās tapaḥsiddhās tapobalāḥd jitāhārā jitakrodhāḥ sarvabhogeṣu niḥspṛhāḥd tapaścaraṇam icchanto lokārthaṃ paramodyatāḥd udyantaṃ satataṃ sūryaṃ stuvanto vividhaiḥ stavaiḥd bhāskarasyaiva kiraṇaiḥ saha saṃyānti nityadād dyotayante diśaḥ sarvā dharmajñāḥ satyavādinaḥd teṣv eva nirmalaṃ satyaṃ lokārthaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitamd loko yaṃ dhāryate devi teṣām eva tapobalātd mahātmanāṃ tu tapasā satyena ca śucismited kṣamayā ca mahābhāge bhūtānāṃ saṃsthitiṃ viduḥd prajārtham api lokārthaṃ mahadbhiḥ kriyate tapaḥd tapasā prāpyate sarvaṃ tapasā prāpyate phalamd duṣprāpam api yal loke tapasā prāpyate hi tatd pañcabhūtasthitiś caiva lokasṛṣṭivivardhanamd etat sarvaṃ samāsena tapoyogād vinirmitamd tasmād ayaṃ ṛṣigaṇas tapas tepa iti priyed dharmānveṣī tapaḥ kartuṃ yatate satataṃ priyed amaratvaṃ vaśitvaṃ ca tapasā prārthayet sadād etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇvantyās te śrutaṃ priyed priyārtham ṛṣisaṃghasya lokānāṃ hitakāmyayād nāradaḥd iti bruvantaṃ deveśam ṛṣayaś cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥd umād bhūyaḥ paramakaṃ yatnaṃ tadāprabhṛti cakrired uktas tvayā trivargasya dharmaḥ paramakaḥ śubhaḥd maheśvaraḥd sarvavyāpī tu yo dharmo bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi med brāhmaṇā lokasaṃsāre sṛṣṭā dhātrā guṇārthinād lokāṃs tārayituṃ yuktā martyeṣu kṣitidevatāḥd teṣu tāvat pravakṣyāmi dharmaṃ śubhaphalodayamd brāhmaṇeṣv abhayo dharmaḥ paramaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥd ime hi dharmā lokārthaṃ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvād pṛthivyāṃ sajjanair nityaṃ kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha med svadāraniratir dharmo nityaṃ japyaṃ tathaiva cad sarvātithyaṃ trivargasya yathāśakti divāniśamd śūdro dharmaparo nityaṃ śuśrūṣābhimanā bhavetd traividyo brāhmaṇo vṛddho na cādhyayanajīvakaḥd trivargaṃ tu vyatikrāntas tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥd ṣaṭ karmāṇi ca proktāni sṛṣṭāni brahmaṇā purād dharmiṣṭhāni variṣṭhāni yāni tāni śṛṇūttamed yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva dānaṃ pātre pratigrahaḥd adhyāpanam adhyayanaṃ ṣaṭkarmā dharmabhāg ṛjuḥd nityasvādhyāyato dharmo nityayajñaḥ sanātanaḥd dānaṃ praśasyate nityaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu trikarmasud ayaṃ paramako dharmaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ satsu vidyated garbhasthāne viśuddhānāṃ dharmasya niyamo mahānd pañcayajñaviśuddhātmā kratunityo nasūyakaḥd dānto brāhmaṇasatkartā susaṃmṛṣṭaniveśanaḥd cakṣurdo manado jihvāsnigdhavarṇapradaḥ sadād atithyabhyāgatarataḥ śeṣānnakṛtabhojanaḥd pādyam arghyaṃ yathānyāyam āsanaṃ śayanaṃ tathād dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ caiva yo dadāti sa dhārmikaḥd prātar utthāya vai paścād bhojanena nimantrayetd satkṛtyānuvrajed yaś ca tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥd pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo gṛhastheṣu vidhīyated tad ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi trivargeṣu ca yad yathād ekenāṃśena dharmo rthaḥ kartavyo hitam icchatād ekenāṃśena kāmārtham ekam aṃśaṃ vivardhayetd nivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ puṇyo dharmo mokṣe vidhīyated tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi tāṃ śṛṇuṣva samāhitād sarvabhūtadayā dharmo nivṛttiparamaḥ sadād bubhukṣitaṃ pipāsārtam atithiṃ śrāntam āgatamd arcayanti varārohe teṣām api phalaṃ mahatd pātram ity eva dātavyaṃ sarvasmai dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥd āgamiṣyati yat pātraṃ tat pātraṃ tārayiṣyatid kāle saṃprāptam atithiṃ bhoktukāmam upasthitamd cittaṃ saṃbhāvayet tatra vyāso yaṃ samupasthitaḥd tasya pūjāṃ yathāśakti saumyacittaḥ prayojayetd cittamūlo bhaved dharmo dharmamūlaṃ bhaved yaśaḥd tasmāt dṛśyante apratarkyāṇi śobhaned alpam alpam api hy etad dīyamānaṃ vivardhated pīḍayāpi ca bhṛtyānāṃ dānam eva viśiṣyated putradārā dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ na mṛtān anugacchatid śreyo dānaṃ ca bhogaś ca dhanaṃ prāpya yaśasvinid dānena hi mahābhāgā bhavanti manujādhipāḥd nāsti bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti dānasamo nidhiḥd nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nānṛtāt pātakaṃ paramd āśrame yas tu tapyeta tapomūlaphalāśanaḥd ādityābhimukho bhūtvā jaṭāvalkalasaṃvṛtaḥd maṇḍūkaśāyī hemante grīṣme pañcatapā bhavetd samyak tapaś carantīha śraddadhānā vanāśramed gṛhāśramasya te devi kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīmd umād gṛhāśramasya yā caryā vratāni niyamāś ca yed yathā ca devatāḥ pūjyāḥ satataṃ gṛhamedhinād yad yac ca parihartavyaṃ gṛhiṇā tithiparvasud maheśvaraḥd tat sarvaṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyamānaṃ tvayā prabhod gṛhāśramasya yan mūlaṃ phalaṃ dharmo yam uttamaḥd pādaiś caturbhiḥ satataṃ dharmo yatra pratiṣṭhitaḥd sārabhūtaṃ varārohe dadhno ghṛtam ivoddhṛtamd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ dharmacāriṇid śuśrūṣate yaḥ pitaraḥ mātaraṃ ca gṛhāśramed bhartāraṃ caiva yā nārī agnihotraṃ ca ye dvijāḥd teṣu teṣu ca prīṇanti devā indrapurogamāḥd umād pitaraḥ pitṛlokasthāḥ svadharmeṇa sa rajyated mātāpitṛviyuktānāṃ kā caryā gṛhamedhināmd vidhavānāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ bhavān etad bravītu med maheśvaraḥd devatātithiśuśrūṣā guruvṛddhābhivādanamd ahiṃsā sarvabhūtānām alobhaḥ satyasaṃdhatād brahmacaryaṃ śaraṇyatvaṃ śaucaṃ pūrvābhibhāṣaṇamd kṛtajñatvam apaiśunyaṃ satataṃ dharmaśīlatād dine dvir abhiṣekaṃ ca pitṛdaivatapūjanamd gavāhnikapradānaṃ ca saṃvibhāgo tithiṣv apid dīpaṃ pratiśrayaṃ caiva dadyāt pādyāsanaṃ tathād pañcame hani ṣaṣṭhe vā dvādaśe vāpy athāṣṭamed caturdaśe pañcadaśe brahmacārī sadā bhavetd śmaśrukarma śirobhyaṅgam añjanaṃ dantadhāvanamd naiteṣv ahaḥsu kurvīta teṣv alakṣmīḥ pratiṣṭhitād vratopavāsaniyamas tapo dānaṃ ca śaktitaḥd bharaṇaṃ bhṛtyavargasya dīnānām anukampanamd paradāranivṛttiś ca svadāreṣu ratiḥ sadād śarīram ekaṃ daṃpatyor vidhātrā pūrvanirmitamd tasmāt svadāranirato brahmacārī vidhīyated śīlavṛttavinītasya nigṛhītendriyasya cad ārjave vartamānasya sarvabhūtahitaiṣiṇaḥd priyātitheś ca kṣāntasya dharmārjitadhanasya cad gṛhāśramapadasthasya kim anyaiḥ kṛtyam āśramaiḥd yathā mātaram āśritya sarve jīvanti jantavaḥd tathā gṛhāśramaṃ prāpya sarve jīvanti cāśramāḥd rājānaḥ sarvapāṣaṇḍāḥ sarve raṅgopajīvinaḥd vyālagrāhāś ca dambhāś ca corā rājabhaṭās tathād savidyāḥ sarvaśilpajñāḥ sarve caiva cikitsakāḥd dūrādhvānaṃ prapannāś ca kṣīṇapathyodanā narāḥd ete cānye ca bahavas tarkayanti gṛhāśramamd mārjārā mūṣikāḥ śvānaḥ sūkarāś ca śukās tathād kapotakākacaṭakāḥ sarīsṛpaniṣeviṇaḥd araṇyavāsinaś cānye saṃghā ye mṛgapakṣiṇāmd evaṃ bahuvidhā devi loke smin sacarācarāḥd gṛhe kṣetre bile caiva śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd gṛhasthena kṛtaṃ karma sarvais madhyamāḥd prajvalatsu pradīpeṣu svayam eva patanti ted bahūnāṃ mṛgayūthānāṃ nānāvananiṣeviṇāmd yas tu kālahatas teṣāṃ sa vai kālena vadhyated sūnārthaṃ devi baddhānāṃ kṣīṇāyur yo nibadhyated avaśo
