vidher vaśātd śalyakasya ca jihvāgraṃ svayam āruhya śobhaned āyuḥkṣayeṇopahatā nipadyante sarīsṛpāḥd kṛṣatāṃ karṣakāṇāṃ ca nāsti buddhir vihiṃsaned athaiṣāṃ lāṅgalāgrādyair hanyante jantavo kṣayāḥd pādāgreṇaiva caikena yāṃ hiṃsāṃ kurute naraḥd mātaṃgo pi na tāṃ kuryāt krūro janmaśatair apid mriyante yair hi martavyaṃ na tān hanti kṛṣīvalaḥd kṛṣāmīti matis tasya nāsti cintā vihiṃsaned tasmāj jīvasahasrāṇi hatvāpi na sa lipyated vidhinā vihitaḥ pūrvaṃ paścāt prāṇī vipadyated evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu vidhir hi duratikramaḥd gatāyuṣā na śakyaṃ hi muhūrtam api jīvitumd jīvitavye na martavyaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyatid śubhāśubhaṃ karmaphalaṃ na śakyam ativartitumd tathā tābhiś ca martavyaṃ bhoktavyāś caiva tās tathād rantidevasya gāvo vai vidher hi vaśam āgatāḥd svayam āyānti gāvo vai hanyante yatra sundarid gavāṃ vai hanyamānānāṃ rudhiraprabhavā nadīd carmaṇvatīti vikhyātā khuraśṛṅgāsthidurgamād rudhiraṃ tāṃ nadīṃ prāpya toyaṃ bhavati śobhaned medhyaṃ puṇyaṃ pavitraṃ ca gandhavarṇarasair yutamd tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvanti kṛtajapyāḥ kṛtāhnikāḥd dvijā devagaṇāś cāpi lokapālā maheśvarāḥd tasya rājñaḥ sadā satre svayam āgamya sundarid vidhinā pūrvadṛṣṭena tanmāṃsam upakalpitamd mantravat pratigṛhṇanti yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhid samāṃsaṃ ca sadā hy annaṃ śataśo tha sahasraśaḥd bhuñjānānāṃ dvijātīnām astam eti divākaraḥd gāvo yās tatra hanyante rājñas tasya kratūttamed paṭhyamāneṣu mantreṣu yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhid tāś ca svargaṃ gatā gāvo rantidevaś ca pārthivaḥd sadā satravidhānena siddhiṃ prāpto nareśvaraḥd atha yas tu sahāyārtham uktaḥ syāt pārthivair naraḥd bhogānāṃ saṃvibhāgena vastrābharaṇabhūṣaṇaiḥd sahabhojanasaṃbandhaiḥ satkārair vividhair apid sahāyakāle saṃprāpte saṃgrāme śastram uddharetd vyūḍhānīke yathā śastraṃ senayor ubhayor apid hastyaśvarathasaṃpūrṇe padātibalasaṃkuled cāmaracchatraśabale dhvajacarmāyudhojjvaled śaktitomarakuntāsiśūlapaṭṭasadhāribhiḥd kūṭamudgaracāpeṣubhusuṇḍhījuṣṭamuṣṭibhiḥd bhindipālagadācakraprāsakarpaṇadhāribhiḥd nānāpraharaṇair yodhaiḥ senayor ubhayor apid yuddhaśauṇḍaiḥ pragarjadbhir vṛṣeṣu vṛṣabhair ivad śaṅkhaduṃdubhinādena nānātūryaraveṇa cad hayaheṣitaśabdena kuñjarāṇāṃ ca bṛṃhitaiḥd yodhānāṃ siṃhanādaiś ca ghaṇṭānāṃ śiñjitasvanaiḥd diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva samantād badhirīkṛtāḥd grīṣmānteṣu vigarjadbhir nabhasīva balāhakaiḥd rathanemikhuroddhūtair aruṇai raṇareṇubhiḥd kapilābhir ivākāśe chādyamāne samantataḥd pravṛtte śastrasaṃpāte yodhānāṃ tatra senayoḥd teṣāṃ prahārakṣatajaṃ raktacandanasaprabhamd te sravantaḥ svagātrebhyas tarante raṇamūrdhanid palāśāśokapuṣpāṇāṃ jaṃgamā iva rāśayaḥd raṇe samabhivartanta udyatāyudhapāṇayaḥd śobhamānā raṇe śūrā āhvayantaḥ parasparamd hanyamāneṣv abhighnatsu śūreṣu raṇasaṃkaṭed pṛṣṭhaṃ dattvātha ye tatra nāyakasya narādhamāḥd anāhatā nivartante nāyake vāpy abhīpsatid te duṣkṛtaṃ prapadyante nāyakasyākhilaṃ narāḥd yac cāsti sukṛtaṃ teṣāṃ yujyate tena nāyakaḥd ahiṃsā paramo dharma iti ye pi narā viduḥd saṃgrāmeṣu na yudhyante bhṛtāś caivānurūpataḥd narakaṃ yānti te ghoraṃ bhartṛpiṇḍāpahāriṇaḥd yas tu prāṇān parityajya praviśed udyatāyudhaḥd saṃgrāmam agnipratimaṃ pataṃgā iva nirbhayamd sattvam āviśate tatra jñātvā yodhasya niścayamd āviṣṭaś caiva sattvena nirghṛṇo jāyate naraḥd prahārair nandayed devi sattvenādhiṣṭhito hi saḥd prahāravyathitaś caiva na vaiklavyam upaiti saḥd yas tu svaṃ nāyakaṃ rakṣann atighore raṇāṅgaṇed tāpayann arisainyāni siṃho mṛgagaṇān ivad āditya iva madhyāhne durnirīkṣyo raṇājired nirdayo yas tu saṃgrāme praharaty udyatāyudhaḥd yajate sa tu pūtātmā saṃgrāmeṇa mahākratumd varma kṛṣṇājinaṃ tasya daṇḍakāṣṭhaṃ dhanuḥ smṛtamd ratho vedī dhvajo yūpaḥ kuśāś ca ratharaśmayaḥd māno darpas tv ahaṃkāras trayas tretāgnayaḥ smṛtāḥd pratodaś ca sruvas tasya upādhyāyo sya sārathiḥd srug bhāṇḍaṃ cāpi yat kiṃ cid yajñopakaraṇāni cad āyudhāny asya tat sarvaṃ samidhaḥ sāyakāḥ smṛtāḥd svedasrāvaś ca gātrebhyaḥ kṣaudraṃ tasya yaśasvinaḥd puroḍāśā nṛśīrṣāṇi rudhiraṃ cāhutiḥ smṛtamd tūṇaś caiva carur jñeyo vasor dhārā vasā smṛtād kravyādā bhūtasaṃghāś ca tasmin yajñe dvijātayaḥd teṣāṃ bhakṣānnapānāni hatā nṛgajavājinaḥd bhuñjate te yathākāmaṃ yathā yajñe kim icchaked nihatānāṃ tu yodhānāṃ vastrābharaṇabhūṣaṇamd hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca yad vai yajñasya dakṣiṇād yas tatra hanyate devi gajaskandhagato naraḥd brahmalokam avāpnoti raṇeṣv abhimukho hataḥd rathamadhyagato vāpi hayapṛṣṭhagato pi vād hanyate yas tu saṃgrāme śakraloke mahīyated svarge hantā pūjyate tair hatas tatraiva pūjyated dvāv etau sukham edhete hantā yaś caiva hanyated tasmāt saṃgrāmam āsādya prahartavyam abhītavatd nirbhayo yas tu saṃgrāme prahared udyatāyudhaḥd rājño vallabhatām eti kulaṃ bhāvayate svakamd yathā nadīsahasrāṇi praviṣṭāni mahodadhimd tathā sarve na saṃdeho dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vared praviṣṭā rājadharmeṇa ācāryavinayas tathād vedoktāś caiva ye dharmāḥ pāṣaṇḍeṣu ca kīrtitāḥd tathaiva mānavā dharmā dharmāś cānye tathāpared deśajātikulānāṃ ca grāmadharmās tathaiva cad ye dharmāḥ pārvatīyeṣu ye dharmāḥ pattanādiṣud teṣāṃ pūrvapravṛttānāṃ kartavyaṃ parirakṣaṇamd dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥd tasmād dharmo na hantavyaḥ pārthivena viśeṣataḥd prajāḥ pālayate yatra dharmeṇa vasudhādhipaḥd ṣaṭkarmaniratā viprāḥ pūjyante pitṛdevatāḥd naiva tasminn anāvṛṣṭir na rogā nāpy upadravāḥd dharmaśīlāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ svadharmanirate nṛped eṣṭavyaḥ satataṃ devi yuktācāro narādhipaḥd chidrajñaś caiva śatrūṇām apramattaḥ pratāpavānd śūdrāḥ pṛthivyāṃ bahavo rājñāṃ bahuvināśakāḥd tasmāt pramādaṃ suśroṇi na kuryāt paṇḍito nṛpaḥd teṣu mitreṣu tyakteṣu tathā martyeṣu hastiṣud visrambho nopagantavyaḥ snānapāneṣu nityaśaḥd rājño vallabhatām eti kulaṃ bhāvayate svakamd yas tu rāṣṭrahitārthāya gobrāhmaṇakṛte tathād bandigrāhāya mitrārthe prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajānd sarvakāmadughāṃ dhenuṃ dharaṇīṃ lokadhāriṇīmd samudrāntāṃ varārohe saśailavanakānanāmd dadyād devi dvijātibhyo vasupūrṇāṃ vasuṃdharāmd na tatsamaṃ varārohe prāṇatyāgī viśiṣyated sahasram api yajñānāṃ yajate yadi carddhimānd yajñais tasya kim āścaryaṃ prāṇatyāgaḥ suduṣkaraḥd tasmāt sarveṣu yajñeṣu śastrayajño viśiṣyated maheśvaraḥd evaṃ saṃgrāmayajñās te yathātattvam udāhṛtāḥd mṛgayātrāṃ tu vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tāṃ dharmacāriṇid mṛgān hatvā mahīpālo yathā pāpair na lipyated nirmānuṣām imāṃ sarve mṛgā icchanti medinīmd bhakṣayanti ca sasyāni śāsitavyā nṛpeṇa ted duṣṭānāṃ śāsanaṃ dharmaḥ śiṣṭānāṃ paripālanamd kartavyaṃ bhūmipālena nityaṃ kāryeṣu cārjavamd svargaṃ mṛgāś ca gacchanti svayaṃ nṛpatinā hatāḥd yathā gāvo hy agopālās tathā rāṣṭram anāyakamd tasmād aṃśās tu devānāṃ gandharvoragarakṣasāmd rājye niyuktā rāṣṭreṣu prajāpālanakāraṇātd aśiṣṭaśāsane caiva śiṣṭānāṃ paripālaned teṣāṃ caryāṃ pravakṣyāmi śrūyatām anupūrvaśaḥd yathā pracaratāṃ teṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ yaśasvinid rāṣṭraṃ dharmo dhanaṃ caiva yaśaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhated nṛpāṇāṃ pūrvam evāyaṃ dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vared sabhāprapātaṭākāni devatāyatanāni cad brāhmaṇāvasathāś caiva kartavyā nṛpasattamaiḥd brāhmaṇā nāvamantavyā bhasmacchannā ivāgnayaḥd kulam utsādayeyus te krodhāviṣṭā dvijātayaḥd dhmāyamāno yathā hy agnir nirdahet sarvam indhanamd tathā krodhāgninā viprā daheyuḥ pṛthivīm imāmd na hi vipreṣu kruddheṣu rājyaṃ bhuñjanti bhūmipāḥd paribhūya dvijān mohād vātāpinahuṣādayaḥd sabandhumitrā naṣṭās te dagdhā brāhmaṇamanyubhiḥd śarīraṃ cāpi śakrasya kṛtaṃ bhaganirantaramd tato devagaṇāḥ sarve indrasyārthe mahāmatimd prasādaṃ kārayām āsuḥ praṇāmastutivandanaiḥd tena prītena suśroṇi gautamena mahātmanād tac charīraṃ tu śakrasya sahasrabhagacihnitamd kṛtaṃ netrasahasreṇa kṣaṇenaiva nirantaramd chittvā meṣasya vṛṣaṇau gautamenābhimantritaud indrasya vṛṣaṇau bhūtvā kṣipraṃ vai śleṣam āgataud evaṃ vipreṣu kruddheṣu devarājaḥ śatakratuḥd aśaktaḥ śāsituṃ rājyaṃ kiṃ punar mānuṣo bhuvid krodhāviṣṭo dahed vipraḥ śuṣkendhanam ivānalaḥd bhasmīkṛtya jagat sarvaṃ sṛjed anyaj jagat punaḥd adevān api devān sa kuryād devān adevatāḥd tasmān notpādayen manyuṃ manyupraharaṇā dvijāḥd mahatsv apy aparādheṣu śāsanaṃ nārhati dvijaḥd na ca śastranipātāni na ca prāṇair viyojanamd dṛśyate triṣu lokeṣu brāhmaṇānām anindited krodhāś ca vipulā ghorāḥ prasādāś cāpy anuttamāḥd tasmān notpādayet krodhaṃ nityaṃ pūjyā dvijātayaḥd dṛśyate na sa loke smin bhūto vātha bhaviṣyatid kruddheṣu yo vai vipreṣu rājyaṃ bhuṅkte narādhipaḥd na caivopahased viprān na caivopālabhec ca tānd kālam āsādya kupyec ca kāle kuryād anugrahamd saṃprahāsaś ca bhṛtyeṣu na kartavyo narādhipaiḥd laghutvaṃ caiva prāpnoti ājñā cāsya nivartated bhṛtyānāṃ saṃprahāsena pārthivaḥ paribhūyated ayācyāni ca yācanti avaktavyaṃ bruvanti cad pūrvam apy ucitair lābhaiḥ paritoṣaṃ na yānti ted tasmād bhṛtyeṣu nṛpatiḥ saṃprahāsaṃ vivarjayetd na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste ca na viśvasetd sagotreṣu viśeṣeṇa sarvopāyair na viśvasetd viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ hanyād vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥd pramādād dhanyate rājā lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥd tasmāt pramādaṃ lobhaṃ ca na kuryān na ca viśvasetd bhayārtānāṃ paritrātā dīnānugrahakārakaḥd tasmāt kṛtyaviśeṣajño nityaṃ rāṣṭrahite rataḥd satyasaṃdhaḥ sthito rājye prajāpālanatatparaḥd alubdho nyāyavādī ca ṣaḍbhāgaṃ copajīvatid kāryākāryaviśeṣajñaḥ sarvaṃ dharmeṇa paśyatid svarāṣṭreṣu dayāṃ kuryād akāryaṃ na pravartated ye caivainaṃ praśaṃsanti ye ca nindanti mānavāḥd śatruṃ ca mitravat paśyed aparādhavivarjitamd aparādhānurūpeṇa duṣṭaṃ daṇḍena śāsayetd dharmaḥ pravartate tatra yatra daṇḍarucir nṛpaḥd nādharmo vidyate tatra yatra rājā kṣamānvitaḥd aśiṣṭaśāsanaṃ dharmaḥ śiṣṭānāṃ paripālanamd vadhyāṃś ca ghātayed yas tu avadhyān parirakṣatid avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvo dūtaś caiva pitā tathād vidyāṃ grāhayate yaś ca ye ca pūrvopakāriṇaḥd striyaś caiva na hantavyā yaś ca sarvātithir naraḥd dharaṇīṃ gāṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca siddhānnaṃ ca tilān ghṛtamd dadan nityaṃ dvijātibhyo mucyate rājakilbiṣātd evaṃ carati yo nityaṃ rājā rāṣṭrahite rataḥd tasya rāṣṭraṃ dhanaṃ dharmo yaśaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhated na ca pāpair na cānarthair yujyate sa narādhipaḥd ṣaḍbhāgam upayuñjan yaḥ prajā rājā na rakṣatid svacakraparacakrābhyāṃ dhanair vā vikrameṇa vād nirudyogo nṛpo yaś ca pararāṣṭranighātaned svarāṣṭraṃ niṣpratāpasya paracakreṇa hanyated yat pāpaṃ paracakrasya paracakrābhighātaned tat pāpaṃ sakalaṃ rājā hatarāṣṭraḥ prapadyated mātulaṃ bhāgineyaṃ vā mātaraṃ śvaśuraṃ gurumd pitaraṃ varjayitvaikaṃ hanyād ghātakam āgatamd svasya rāṣṭrasya rakṣārthaṃ yudhyamānas tu yo hataḥd saṃgrāme paracakreṇa śrūyatāṃ tasya yā gatiḥd vimāne tu varārohe apsarogaṇasevited śakralokam ito yāti saṃgrāme nihato nṛpaḥd yāvanto lomakūpāḥ syus tasya gātreṣu sundarid tāvad varṣasahasrāṇi śakraloke mahīyated yadi vai mānuṣe loke kadā cid upapadyated rājā vā rājamātro vā bhūyo bhavati vīryavānd tasmād yatno nukartavyaḥ svarāṣṭraparipālaned vyavahāraś ca cāraś ca satataṃ satyasaṃdhatād apramādaḥ pramodaś ca vyavasāye py acaṇḍatād bharaṇaṃ caiva bhṛtyānāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca poṣaṇamd yodhānāṃ caiva satkāraḥ kṛte karmaṇy amoghatād maheśvaraḥd śreya eva narendrāṇām iha caiva paratra cad paśavaḥ paśubandheṣu ye hanyante dhvareṣu cad yūpe nibaddhā mantraiś ca yathānyāyaṃ yathāvidhid mantrāhutivipūtās te svargaṃ yānti yaśasvinid tarpitā yajñabhāgeṣu teṣāṃ māṃsair varānaned agnayas tridaśāś caiva lokapālāḥ saheśvarāḥd teṣu tuṣṭeṣu jāyeta tasya yajñasya yat phalamd tena saṃyujyate devi yajamāno na saṃśayaḥd sapatnīkaḥ saputraḥ sa sa pitṛbhrātṛbhiḥ sahad ye tatra dīkṣitā devi sarve svargaṃ prayānti ted umād etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid bhagavan sarvabhūteśa śūlapāṇe mahādyuted śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ sarveṣāṃ gṛhamedhināmd kīdṛśaṃ caritaṃ teṣāṃ trivargasahitaṃ prabhod pratyāyatiḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ jīvanārtham udāhṛtamd vartamānāḥ kathaṃ sarve prāpnuvanty uttamāṃ gatimd maheśvaraḥd etat sarvaṃ samāsena vaktum arhasi mānadad nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāminid prāyaśo lokasadvṛttam iṣyate gṛhavāsināmd teṣāṃ saṃrakṣaṇārthāya rājānaḥ saṃsmṛtā bhuvid sarveṣām atha martyānāṃ vṛttiṃ sāmānyataḥ śṛṇud vidyā vārttā ca sevā ca kārutvaṃ nāṭyatā tathād ity ete jīvanārthāya martyānāṃ vihitāḥ priyed api janmaphalaṃ tāvan mānuṣāṇāṃ viśeṣataḥd vihitaṃ tat svavṛttena tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇud karmakṣetraṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ bhogaduḥkhayutāḥ pared sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ tasmān mānuṣye vṛttam iṣyated vidyāyogas tu sarveṣāṃ pūrvam eva vidhīyated kāryākāryaṃ vijānāti vidyayā devi nānyathād vidyayā sphīyate jñānaṃ jñānāt tattvavidarśanamd dṛṣṭatattvo vinītātmā sarvārthasya ca bhājanamd śakyaṃ vidyāvinītena loke saṃjīvanaṃ sukhamd ātmānaṃ vidyayā tasmāt pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tu bhājanamd vaśyendriyo jitakrodho bhūtvātmānaṃ tu bhāvayetd bhāvayitvā tathātmānaṃ pūjanīyaḥ satām apid kulānuvṛttaṃ vṛttaṃ vā pūrvam eva samāśrayetd iṣyate gṛhavāsāya dārakarma yathāpuramd yadi ced vidyayā caiva vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣed athātmanaḥd rājavidyāṃ tu vāde pi lokavidyām athāpi vād tīrthataś cāpi gṛhṇīyāc chuśrūṣādiguṇair yutaḥd granthataś cārthataś caiva dṛḍhīkuryāt prayatnataḥd evaṃ vidyāphalaṃ devi prāpnuyān nānyathā naraḥd nyāyād vidyāphalaṃ cecched adharmaṃ tatra varjayetd yadi ced vārttayā vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣeta vidhipūrvakamd kṣetre jalopapanne ca tad yogyāṃ kṛṣim ācaretd vāṇijyaṃ vā yathākālaṃ kuryāt taddeśayogataḥd mūlyam arthaṃ prayāsaṃ ca vicāryaiva phalodayaud paśusaṃjīvakaś caiva deśe gāḥ poṣayed dhruvamd bahuprakārā bahavaḥ paśavas tasya sādhakāḥd yaḥ kaś cit sevayā vṛttiṃ kāṅkṣeta matimān naraḥd yatātmā śravaṇīyānāṃ bhaved vai saṃprayojakaḥd buddhyā vā karmayogād vā yodhanād vā samāśrayetd mārgatas tu samāśritya tadā tatsaṃpriyo bhavetd yathā yathā sa tuṣyeta tathā saṃtoṣayeta tamd anujīviguṇopetaḥ kuryād ātmārtham āśritaḥd vipriyaṃ nācaret tasya eṣā sevā samāsataḥd viprayogāt purā tena gatim anyāṃ na lakṣayetd kārukarma ca nāṭyaṃ ca prāyaśo nīcayoniṣud tayor api yathāyogaṃ nyāyataḥ karmavetanamd ājīvebhyo pi sarvebhyaś cārjavād vetanaṃ haretd anārjavād āharatas tat tu pāpāya kalpated sarveṣāṃ pūrvam ārambhāṃś cintayen nayapūrvakamd ātmaśaktim upāyāṃś ca deśakālau ca śaktitaḥd kāraṇāni pravāsaṃ ca prakṣepaṃ ca phalodayamd evamādīni saṃcintya dṛṣṭvā daivānukūlatāmd ataḥparaṃ samārambhed yatrātmahitam āhitamd vṛttim evaṃ samāsādya tāṃ sadā paripālayetd daivamānuṣavighnebhyo na punar bhraśyate yathād pālayan vardhayan bhuñjaṃs tāṃ prāpya na vināśayetd kṣīyate girisaṃkāśam aśnato hy anapekṣayād ājīvebhyo dhanaṃ prāpya caturdhā vibhajed budhaḥd dharmāyārthāya kāmāya āpatpraśamanāya cad caturṣv api vibhāgeṣu vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhaned yajñārthaṃ cānnadānārthaṃ dīnānugrahakāraṇātd devabrāhmaṇapūjārthaṃ pitṛpūjārtham eva cad kulārthaṃ saṃnivāsārthaṃ kriyānityaiś ca dhārmikaiḥd evamādiṣu cānyeṣu dharmārthaṃ saṃtyajed dhanamd dharmakārye dhanaṃ dadyād anavekṣya phalodayamd aiśvaryasthānalābhārthaṃ rājavāllabhyakāraṇātd vārttāyāṃ ca samārambhe bhṛtyamitraparigrahed āvāhe ca vivāhe ca putrāṇāṃ vṛttikāraṇātd arthodayasamāvāptāv anarthasya vighātaned evamādiṣu cānyeṣu arthārthaṃ vibhajed dhanamd anubandhaṃ phalaṃ hetuṃ dṛṣṭvā vittaṃ parityajetd anarthaṃ bādhate hy artho arthaṃ caiva phalāny utad nādhanāḥ prāpnuvanty arthān narā yatnaśatair apid tasmād dhanaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ dātavyaṃ ca vidhānataḥd śarīrapoṣaṇārthāya āhārasya viśeṣaṇed naṭagāndharvasaṃyoge kāmayātrāvihārayoḥd manaḥpriyāṇāṃ saṃyoge prītidāne tathaiva cad evamādiṣu cānyeṣu kāmārthaṃ visṛjed dhanamd vicārya guṇadoṣau tu mātrayā tatra saṃtyajetd caturthaṃ saṃnidadhyāc ca āpadarthaṃ śucismited rājyabhraṃśavināśārthaṃ durbhikṣārthaṃ ca śobhaned mahāvyādhivimokṣārthaṃ vārddhakasyaiva kāraṇātd śatrūṇāṃ pratikārāya sāhasaiś cāpy amarṣaṇātd prasthāne cānyadeśārtham āpadāṃ vipramokṣaṇed evamādi samuddiśya saṃnidadhyāt svakaṃ dhanamd sukham arthavatāṃ loke kṛcchrāṇāṃ vipramokṣaṇamd yasya nāsti dhanaṃ kiṃ cit tasya lokadvayaṃ na cad aśanād indriyāṇīva sarvam arthāt pravartated nidhānaṃ mātrayā kuryād anyathā vilayaṃ vrajetd evaṃ devi manuṣyāṇāṃ loke tv ājīvanaṃ pratid evaṃ yuktasya lokasya laukyaṃ vṛttaṃ punaḥ śṛṇud dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargīyaṃ paramaṃ vacaḥd trivarge ca yathā yuktaṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃvidhīyated tathā saṃvartamānās tu lokayor hitam āpnuyuḥd kālyotthānaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca devabrāhmaṇabhaktatād gurūṇām eva śuśrūṣā brāhmaṇeṣv abhivādanamd pratyutthānaṃ ca vṛddhānāṃ devasthānapraṇāmanamd ābhimukhyaṃ puraskṛtya atithīnāṃ ca bhojanamd vṛddhopadeśakaraṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ hitapathyayoḥd poṣaṇaṃ bhṛtyavargasya sāntvadānaparigrahaiḥd nyāyataḥ karmakaraṇam anyāyāhitavarjanamd samyag vṛttaṃ svadāreṣu doṣāṇāṃ pratiṣedhanamd putrāṇāṃ vinayaṃ kuryāt tattatkārye niyojayetd varjanaṃ cāśubhārthānāṃ śubhānāṃ joṣaṇaṃ tathād kulocitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathāvat paripālanamd varjanaṃ kalahādīnāṃ bhaktyā saṃśamanaṃ tathād satāṃ vyasanasaṃyoge svaśaktyābhyavapattitād dīnānāṃ saṃgrahaṃ caiva nānṛśaṃsyavyapekṣayād abaddhānṛtaghorāṇāṃ vacanānāṃ vivarjanamd kulasaṃdhāraṇaṃ caiva pauruṣeṇaiva sarvaśaḥd evamādi śubhaṃ sarvaṃ tasya vṛttam iti smṛtamd vṛddhasevī bhaven nityaṃ hitārthaṃ jñānakāṅkṣayād parārthaṃ nāhared dravyam anāmantrya tu sarvadād na yāceta parān dhīraḥ svabāhubalam āśrayetd svaśarīraṃ sadā rakṣed āhārācārayor apid hitaṃ pathyaṃ sadāhāraṃ jīrṇaṃ bhuñjīta mātrayād devatātithisatkāraṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ yathāvidhid śeṣaṃ bhuñjec chucir bhūtvā na ca bhāṣeta vipriyamd pratiśrayaṃ ca pānīyaṃ baliṃ bhikṣāṃ ca sarvaśaḥd gṛhasthaḥ pravahed dadyād gāś ca vatsāṃś ca poṣayetd bahir niṣkramaṇaṃ caiva kuryāt kāraṇato divād madhyāhne vārdharātre vā gamanaṃ naiva rocayetd viṣamān nāvagāheta svaśaktyā samam ācaretd yathāyavyayatā loke gṛhasthānāṃ prapūjitād ayaśaskaram arthaghnaṃ karma yat parapīḍanamd bhayād vā yadi vā lobhān na kurvīta kadā canad buddhipūrvaṃ samālokya dūrato guṇadoṣataḥd ārabheta tadā karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vetaratd ātmā sākṣī bhaven nityam ātmanas tu śubhāśubhed umād manasā karmaṇā vācā na ca kāṅkṣeta pātakamd bhagavan bhaganetraghna kālasūdana śaṃkarad ime tu varṇāś catvāro vihitāḥ svit svabhāvataḥd utāho kriyayā varṇāḥ saṃbhavanti maheśvarad maheśvaraḥd eṣa me saṃśayapraśnas taṃ me chettuṃ tvam arhasid svabhāvād eva vidyante catvāro brāhmaṇādayaḥd ekajātyāḥ suduṣprāpam anyavarṇatvam āgatamd tac ca karma viśeṣeṇa punarjanmani jāyated tasmāt te saṃpravakṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ karma pākataḥd brāhmaṇas tu naro bhūtvā svajātim anupālayetd dṛḍhaṃ brāhmaṇakarmāṇi vedoktāni samācaretd satyārjavaparo bhūtvā dānayajñaparas tathād tasyāṃ jātyāṃ samudito jātidharmān na hāpayetd evaṃ saṃvartamānas tu kāladharmaṃ gataḥ punaḥd svarloke cābhijāyeta svargabhogāya bhāminid tatkṣaye brāhmaṇo bhūtvā tathaiva nṛṣu jāyated evaṃ svakarmaṇā martyaḥ svajātiṃ labhate punaḥd aparas tu tathā kaś cid brahmayonisamudbhavaḥd avamatyaiva tāṃ jātim ajñānatamasāvṛtaḥd anyathā vartamānas tu jātikarmāṇi varjayetd śūdravad vicarel loke śūdrakarmābhilāṣayād śūdraiḥ saha caran nityaṃ śaucamaṅgalavarjitaḥd sa cāpi kāladharmastho yamalokeṣu daṇḍitaḥd yadi jāyeta martyeṣu śūdra evābhijāyated śūdra eva bhaved devi brāhmaṇo pi svakarmaṇād tathaiva śūdras tv aparaḥ śūdrakarmāṇi varjayand satyārjavaparo bhūtvā dānadharmaparas tathād mantrabrāhmaṇasatkartā manasā brāhmaṇapriyaḥd evaṃyuktasamācāraḥ śūdro pi maraṇaṃ gataḥd svargaloke bhijāyeta tatkṣaye nṛṣu jāyated brāhmaṇānāṃ kule mukhye vedasvādhyāyasaṃyuted evam eva sadā loke śūdro brāhmaṇyam āpnuyātd evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyāś ca jātidharmeṇa saṃyutāḥd svakarmaṇaiva jāyante viśiṣṭeṣv adhameṣu cad evaṃ jātiviparyāsaḥ pretyabhāve bhaven nṛṇāmd anyathā tu na śakyante lokasaṃsthitikāraṇātd tasmāj jātiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ tu kathaṃ cit prāpya paṇḍitaḥd sarvathā tāṃ tato rakṣen na punar bhraśyate yathād umād iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid janmaprabhṛti kaiḥ śuddho labhej janmaphalaṃ naraḥd maheśvaraḥd śobhanāśobhanaṃ sarvam adhikāravaśāt svayamd karma kurvan na lipyeta ārjavena samācarand ātmaiva tac chubhaṃ kuryād aśubhe naiva yojayetd śaṭheṣu śaṭhavat kuryād āryeṣv ṛjuvad ācaretd āpatsu nāvasīdec ca ghorān saṃkrāmayet parānd sāmnaiva sarvakāryāṇi kartuṃ pūrvaṃ samārabhetd anarthādharmaśokāṃs tu yathā na prāpnuyāt svayamd prayateta tathā kartum etad vṛttaṃ samāsataḥd etad vṛttaṃ samāsādya gṛham āśritya mānavāḥd nirābādhā nirudvegāḥ prāpnuvanty uttamāṃ gatimd etaj janmaphalaṃ nityaṃ sarveṣāṃ gṛhavāsināmd evaṃ gṛhagatair nityaṃ vartitavyam iti sthitiḥd etat sarvaṃ mayā proktaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid umād surāsurapate deva varada prītivardhanad mānuṣeṣv eva ye ke cid āḍhyāḥ kleśavivarjitāḥd bhuñjānā vividhān bhogān dṛśyante nirupadravāḥd apare kleśasaṃyuktā daridrā bhogavarjitāḥd kimarthaṃ mānuṣe loke na samatvena kalpitāḥd maheśvaraḥd etac chrotuṃ mahādeva kautūhalam atīva med nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāminid śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ hitaṃ vacaḥd ādisarge purā brahmā samatvenāsṛjat prajāḥd nityaṃ na bhavato hy asya rāgadveṣau prajāpateḥd tadā tasmāt samāḥ sarve babhūvuḥ sarvato narāḥd evaṃ saṃvartamāne tu yuge kālaviparyayātd ke cit prapedire tatra viṣamaṃ buddhimohitāḥd teṣāṃ hāniṃ tato dṛṣṭvā tulyānām eva bhāminid brahmāṇaṃ te samājagmus tatkāraṇanivedakāḥd kartuṃ nārhasi deveśa pakṣapātaṃ tvam īdṛśamd putrabhāve same deva kimarthaṃ no bhavet kaliḥd ity evaṃ tair upālabdho brahmā vacanam abravītd yūyaṃ mā kārṣṭa me roṣaṃ svakṛtaṃ smarata prajāḥd yuṣmābhir eva yuṣmākaṃ grathitaṃ hi śubhāśubhamd yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalam aśnuted svakṛtasya phalaṃ bhuṅkte nānyas tad bhoktum arhatid evaṃ saṃbodhitās tena lokakartrā svayaṃbhuvād punar nivṛtya karmāṇi śubhāny eva prapedired evaṃ vijñātatattvās te dānadharmaparāyaṇāḥd śubhāni vidhivat kṛtvā kāladharmagatāḥ punaḥd tāni dānaphalāny eva bhuñjate sukhabhoginaḥd svakṛtaṃ tu naras tasmāt svayam eva prapadyated apare dharmakāryebhyo nivṛttās tu śubhekṣaṇed kadaryā niranukrośāḥ prāyeṇātmaparāyaṇāḥd tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned umād daridrāḥ kleśasaṃyuktā bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥd mānuṣeṣv eva ye ke cid dhanadhānyasamanvitāḥd bhogahīnāḥ pradṛśyante sarvabhogeṣu satsv apid maheśvaraḥd na bhuñjate kimarthaṃ te tan me śaṃsitum arhasid paraiḥ saṃcoditā dharmaṃ kurvate na svakāmataḥd svayaṃ śraddhāṃ bahiṣkṛtya kurvanti ca rudanti cad tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned phalāni tāni saṃprāpya bhuñjate na kadā canad umād rakṣanto vardhayantaś ca āsate nidhipālavatd ke cid dhanaviyuktāś ca bhogayuktā maheśvarad maheśvaraḥd mānuṣāḥ saṃpradṛśyante tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ānṛśaṃsyaparā ye tu dharmakāmāś ca durgatāḥd paropakāraṃ kurvanti dīnānugrahakāraṇātd pratidadyuḥ paradhanaṃ naṣṭaṃ vānyair hṛtaṃ dhanamd nityaṃ ye dātumanaso narā vitteṣv asatsv apid kāladharmavaśaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani te narāḥd ete dhanaviyuktāś ca bhogayuktā bhavanty utad dharmadānopadeśaṃ vā kartavyam iti niścayaḥd umād iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa triyakṣa vṛṣabhadhvajad mānuṣās trividhā deva dṛśyante satataṃ vibhod āsīnā eva bhuñjante sthānaiśvaryaparigrahaiḥd apare yatnapūrvaṃ tu labhante bhogasaṃgrahamd apare yatamānās tu labhante na tu kiṃ canad maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi bhāminid ye loke mānuṣā devi dānadharmaparāyaṇāḥd pātrāṇi vidhivaj jñātvā dūrato hy anumānataḥd abhigamya svayaṃ tatra grāhayanti prasādya cad dānāni ceṅgitair eva tair avijñātam eva vād punarjanmani deveśi tādṛśāḥ śobhanā narāḥd ayatnatas tu tāny eva phalāni prāpnuvanty utad āsīnā eva bhuñjante bhogān sukṛtabhoginaḥd apare ye ca dānāni dadaty eva prayācitāḥd yathā yathā te dīnatvāt punar dāsyanti yācitāḥd tāvat kālaṃ tathā devi punarjanmani te narāḥd yatnataḥ śramasaṃyuktāḥ punas tāny āpnuvanty utad yācitā api ye ke cin na dadaty eva kiṃ canad abhyasūyāparā martyā lobhopahatacetasaḥd te punarjanmani śubhe yatante bahudhā narāḥd na prāpnuvanti manujā mārgantas te pi kiṃ canad nānuptaṃ rohate sasyaṃ tadvad dānaphalaṃ viduḥd yad yad dadāti puruṣas tat tat prāpnoti kevalamd iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid umād bhagavan bhaganetraghna ke cid vārddhakasaṃyutāḥd abhogayogyakāle tu bhogāṃś caiva dhanāni cad labhante sthavirā bhūtvā bhogaiśvaryaṃ yatas tataḥd yena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitād dharmakāryaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ vismṛtya dhanasaṃyutāḥd prāṇāntakāle saṃprāpte vyādhibhiś ca nipīḍitāḥd ārabhante punar dharmaṃ dātuṃ dānāni vā narāḥd te punarjanmani śubhe bhūtvā duḥkhapariplutāḥd atītayauvane kāle sthaviratvam upāgatāḥd labhante pūrvadattānāṃ phalāni śubhalakṣaṇed evaṃ karmaphalaṃ devi kālayogād bhavaty utad umād bhogayuktā mahādeva ke cid vyādhipariplutāḥd maheśvaraḥd asamarthāś ca tān bhoktuṃ bhavanti kim u kāraṇamd vyādhiyogaparikliṣṭā ye nirāśāḥ svajīvited ārabhante tadā kartuṃ dānāni śubhalakṣaṇed te punarjanmani śubhe prāpya tāni phalāny utad umād asamarthāś ca tān bhoktuṃ vyādhitās te bhavanty utad bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣeṣv eva ke canad rūpayuktāḥ pradṛśyante śubhāṅgā priyadarśanāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitād ye purā manujā devi lajjāyuktāḥ priyaṃvadāḥd śaktāḥ sumadhurā nityaṃ bhūtvā caiva svabhāvataḥd amāṃsabhojinaś caiva sadā prāṇidayāyutāḥd pratikarmapradā vāpi vastradā dharmakāraṇātd bhūmiśuddhikarā vāpi kāraṇād agnipūjakāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani te narāḥd umād rūpeṇa spṛhaṇīyās tu bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥd virūpāś ca pradṛśyante mānuṣeṣv eva ke canad maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇamd rūpayogāt purā martyā darpāhaṃkārasaṃyutāḥd virūpahāsakāś caiva stutinindādibhir bhṛśamd paropatāpinaś caiva māṃsādāś ca tathaiva cad abhyasūyāparāś caiva aśuddhāś ca tathaiva cad evaṃyuktasamācārā yamaloke sudaṇḍitāḥd kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ tatra te rūpavarjitāḥd virūpāḥ saṃbhavanty eva nāsti tatra vicāraṇād umād bhagavan devadeveśa ke cit saubhāgyasaṃyutāḥd rūpabhogavihīnāś ca dṛśyante pramadāpriyāḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd ye purā manujā devi saumyaśīlāḥ priyaṃvadāḥd svadārair eva saṃtuṣṭā dāreṣu samavṛttayaḥd dākṣiṇyenaiva vartante pramadāsv apriyāsv apid na tu pratyādiśanty eva strīdoṣān guhyasaṃśritānd annapānīyadāḥ kāle nṛṇāṃ svādupradāś ca yed svadāravartinaś caiva dhṛtimanto niratyayāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned mānuṣās te bhavanty eva satataṃ subhagā bhṛśamd arthād ṛte pi te devi bhavanti pramadāpriyāḥd umād durbhagāḥ saṃpradṛśyante āḍhyā bhogayutā apid maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu sarvaṃ samāhitād ye purā manujā devi svadāreṣv anapekṣayād yatheṣṭavṛttayaś caiva nirlajjā vītasaṃbhramāḥd pareṣāṃ vipriyakarā vāṅmanaḥkāyakarmabhiḥd nirāśrayā nirannādyāḥ strīṇāṃ hṛdayakopanāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani te narāḥd durbhagāḥ saṃbhavanty eva strīṇāṃ hṛdayavipriyāḥd umād nāsti teṣāṃ ratisukhaṃ svadāreṣv api kiṃ canad bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣeṣv eva ke canad jñānavijñānasaṃpannā buddhimanto vicakṣaṇāḥd durgatās tu pradṛśyante yatamānā yathāvidhid maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇamd ye purā manujā devi śrutavanto pi kevalamd nirāśrayā nirannādyā bhṛśam ātmaparāyaṇāḥd te punarjanmani śubhe jñānabuddhiyutā apid niṣkiṃcanā bhavanty eva anuptaṃ na hi rohatid umād mūrkhā loke pradṛśyante dṛḍhaṃ mūḍhā vicetasaḥd jñānavijñānarahitāḥ samṛddhāś ca samantataḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd ye purā manujā devi bāliśā api sarvataḥd samācaranti dānāni dīnānugrahakāraṇātd abuddhipūrvaṃ vadatāṃ dadaty eva yatas tataḥd te punarjanmani śubhe prāpnuvanty eva tat tathād paṇḍito paṇḍito vāpi bhuṅkte dānaphalaṃ naraḥd umād buddhyānapekṣitaṃ dānaṃ sarvathā tat phalaty utad bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣeṣv eva ke canad medhāvinaḥ śrutidharā bhavanti viśadākṣarāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi guruśuśrūṣakā bhṛśamd jñānārthaṃ te tu saṃgṛhya tīrthato vidhipūrvakamd vidhinaiva parāṃś caiva grāhayanti na cānyathād aślāghamānā jñānena praśāntā yatavācakāḥd vidyāsthānāni ye loke sthāpayanti ca yatnataḥd tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned umād medhāvinaḥ śrutidharā bhavanti viśadākṣarāḥd apare mānuṣā deva yatnato pi yatas tataḥd bahiṣkṛtāḥ pradṛśyante śrutavijñānabuddhibhiḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd ye purā manujā devi jñānadarpasamanvitāḥd ślāghamānāś ca tat prāpya jñānāhaṃkāramohitāḥd tapanti ye parān nityaṃ jñānādhikyena darpitāḥd jñānād asūyāṃ kurvanti na sahanty eva cāparānd tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned mānuṣyaṃ suciraṃ prāpya tatra bodhavivarjitāḥd umād bhavanti satataṃ devi yatanto hīnamedhasaḥd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit sarvakalyāṇasaṃyutāḥd putrair dārair guṇayutair dāsīdāsaparicchadaiḥd paraspararddhisaṃyuktāḥ sthānaiśvaryaparigrahaiḥd vyādhihīnā nirābādhā rūpārogyabalair yutāḥd dhanadhānyena saṃpannāḥ prāsādair yānavāhanaiḥd sarvopabhogasaṃyuktā nānācitrair manoharaiḥd jñātibhiḥ saha modante avighnaṃ tu dine dined maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu sarvaṃ samāhitād ye purā manujā devi āḍhyā vā itare pi vād śrutavṛttasamāyuktā dānakāmāḥ śrutapriyāḥd pareṅgitaparā nityaṃ dātavyam iti niścitāḥd satyasaṃdhāḥ kṣamāśīlā lobhamohavivarjitāḥd dātāraḥ pātrato dānaṃ vratair niyamasaṃyutāḥd svaduḥkham iva saṃsmṛtya paraduḥkhaṃ mahātmanaḥd saumyaśīlāḥ śubhācārā devabrāhmaṇapūjakāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned divi vā bhuvi vā devi jāyante karmabhoginaḥd mānuṣeṣv api ye jātās tādṛśāḥ saṃbhavanti ted yādṛśās tu tvayā proktāḥ sarve kalyāṇasaṃyutāḥd rūpaṃ dravyaṃ balaṃ cāyur bhogaiśvaryaṃ kulaṃ śrutamd ity etat sarvasādguṇyaṃ dānād bhavati nānyathād umād tapodānamayaṃ sarvam iti viddhi śubhānaned atha ke cit pradṛśyante mānuṣeṣv eva mānuṣāḥd durgatāḥ kleśabhūyiṣṭhā dānabhogavivarjitāḥd bhayais tribhiḥ sadā juṣṭā vyādhikṣudbhayapīḍitāḥd duṣkalatrābhibhūtāś ca satataṃ vighnadarśakāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥd krodhalobharatā nityaṃ nirannādyāś ca niṣkriyāḥd nāstikāś caiva dhūrtāś ca mūrkhāś cātmaparāyaṇāḥd paropatāpino devi prāyaśaḥ prāṇinirdayāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ tatra te duḥkhapīḍitāḥd sarvataḥ saṃbhavanty eva pūrvam ātmapramādataḥd yathā te pūrvakathitaṃ tathā te saṃbhavanty utad śubhāśubhaṃ kṛtaṃ karma sukhaduḥkhaphalodayamd umād iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa mama prītivivardhanad jātyandhāś caiva dṛśyante jātā vā naṣṭacakṣuṣaḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇamd ye purā kāmarāgeṇa paraveśmasu lolupāḥd parastriyo bhivīkṣante duṣṭenaiva svacakṣuṣād andhīkurvanti ye martyān krodhalobhasamanvitāḥd lakṣaṇajñāś ca rūpeṣu ayathāvat pradarśakāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ kāladharmagatās tu ted daṇḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priyed yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs tādṛśā narāḥd svabhāvato vā jātā vā andhā eva bhavanti ted akṣirogayutā vāpi nāsti tatra vicāraṇād umād mukharogayutāḥ ke cit kliśyante satataṃ narāḥd dantakarṇakapolasthair vyādhibhir bahupīḍitāḥd ādiprabhṛti martyā vā jātā vāpy atha kāraṇātd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitād kuvaktāras tu ye devi jihvayā kaṭukaṃ bhṛśamd asatyaṃ paruṣaṃ ghoraṃ gurūn prati parān pratid jihvābādhāṃ tathānyeṣāṃ kurvate kopakāraṇātd prāyaśo nṛtabhūyiṣṭhā narāḥ kāryavaśena vād teṣāṃ jihvāpradeśasthā vyādhayaḥ saṃbhavanti ted kuśrotāras tu ye cārthaṃ pareṣāṃ karṇanāśakāḥd karṇarogān bahuvidhāṃl labhante te punarbhaved dantarogaśirorogakarṇarogās tathaiva cad umād anye mukhāśritā doṣāḥ sarve cātmakṛtaṃ phalamd pīḍyante satataṃ deva mānuṣeṣv eva ke canad kukṣipakṣāśritair doṣair vyādhibhiś codarāśritaiḥd tīkṣṇaśūlaiś ca pīḍyante narā duḥkhapariplutāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi kāmakrodhayutā bhṛśamd ātmārtham eva cāhāraṃ bhuñjate nirapekṣakāḥd abhakṣyāhāradāś caiva viśvastānāṃ viṣapradāḥd abhakṣyabhakṣyadāś caiva śaucamaṅgalavarjitāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ tatra te vyādhipīḍitāḥd tais tair bahuvidhākārair vyādhibhir duḥkhapīḍitāḥd umād bhavanty eva tathā devi yathā yena kṛtaṃ purād dṛśyante satataṃ deva vyādhibhir mehanāśritaiḥd pīḍyamānās tathā martyā aśmarīśarkarādibhiḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi paradārapradharṣakāḥd tiryagyoniṣu dhūrtā vai maithunārthaṃ caranti cad kāmadoṣeṇa ye dhūrtāḥ kanyāsu vidhavāsu cad balātkāreṇa gacchanti rūpadarpadhanānvitāḥd tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥd umād tatra mehanajair ghoraiḥ pīḍyante vyādhibhiḥ priyed bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid dṛśyante śoṣiṇaḥ kṛśāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi māṃsalubdhāḥ sulolupāḥd ātmārthaṃ svādugṛddhāś ca parabhogopatāpinaḥd abhyasūyāparāś caiva parabhogeṣu ye narāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned śoṣavyādhiyutās tatra narā dhamanisaṃtatāḥd umād bhavanty eva narā devi pāpakarmopabhoginaḥd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit kliśyante kuṣṭharogiṇaḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi pareṣāṃ rūpanāśakāḥd āghātavadhabandhaiś ca vṛthādaṇḍena mohitāḥd iṣṭanāśakarā ye tu apathyāhāradā narāḥd cikitsakā vā duṣṭāś ca lobhamohasamanvitāḥd nirdayāḥ prāṇihiṃsāyāṃ maladāś cittanāśakāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned yadi vai mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te suduḥkhitāḥd atra te kleśasaṃyuktāḥ kuṣṭharogasamanvitāḥd ke cit tvagdoṣasaṃyuktā vraṇakuṣṭhaiś ca saṃyutāḥd śvitrakuṣṭhayutā vāpi bahudhā kuṣṭhasaṃyutāḥd umād bhavanty eva narā devi yathā yena kṛtaṃ phalamd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid aṅgahīnāś ca paṅgavaḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd ye purā manujā devi lobhamohasamāvṛtāḥd prāṇināṃ prāṇahiṃsārtham aṅgahīnaṃ prakurvated śastreṇotkṛtya vā devi prāṇināṃ ceṣṭanāśakāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned tadaṅgahīnā vai pretya bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥd umād svabhāvato vā jātā vā paṅgavas tu bhavanti ted bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid granthibhiḥ piṭakais tathād maheśvaraḥd kliśyamānāḥ pradṛśyante tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi granthibhedakarā nṛṇāmd muṣṭiprahāraparuṣā nṛśaṃsāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥd pāṭakās todakāś caiva śūlatunnās tathaiva cad evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned umād granthibhiḥ piṭakaiś caiva kliśyante bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit pādarogasamanvitāḥd maheśvaraḥd dṛśyante satataṃ deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi krodhalobhasamanvitāḥd manujā devatāsthānaṃ svapādair bhraṃśayanty utad jānubhiḥ pārṣṇibhiś caiva prāṇihiṃsāṃ prakurvated evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned umād pādarogair bahuvidhair bādhyante ślīpadādibhiḥd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid dṛśyante bahavo bhuvid vātajaiḥ pittajai rogair yugapat sāṃnipātikaiḥd rogair bahuvidhair deva kliśyamānāḥ suduḥkhitāḥd asamastaiḥ samastaiś ca āḍhyā vā durgatās tathād kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇamd ye purā manujā devi āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥd svavaśāḥ kopanaparā guruvidveṣiṇas tathād pareṣāṃ duḥkhajanakā manovākkāyakarmabhiḥd chindan bhindaṃs tudann eva nityaṃ prāṇiṣu nirdayāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned yadi vai mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥd tatra te bahubhir ghorais tapyante vyādhibhiḥ priyed ke cic chlīpadasaṃyuktāḥ ke cit kāsasamanvitāḥd jvarātisāratṛṣṇābhiḥ pīḍyamānās tathāpared vātagulmaiś ca bahubhiḥ śophodarasamanvitāḥd pādarogaiś ca vividhair vraṇakuṣṭhabhagaṃdaraiḥd āḍhyā vā durgatā vāpi dṛśyante vyādhipīḍitāḥd evam ātmakṛtaṃ karma bhuñjate tatra tatra vaid gūhituṃ na ca śakyaṃ vai kena cit svakṛtaṃ phalamd umād iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa bhūtapāla namo stu ted hrasvāṅgāś caiva vakrāṅgāḥ kubjā vāmanakās tathād apare mānuṣā deva dṛśyante kuṇibāhavaḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi lobhamohasamanvitāḥd dhānyamānān vikurvanti krayavikrayakāraṇātd tulādoṣaṃ tathā devi dhṛtamāneṣu nityaśaḥd arghāpakaraṇaṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ krayavikrayed aṅgadoṣakarā ye tu pareṣāṃ kopakāraṇātd māṃsādāś caiva ye mūrkhā ayathāvad vṛthā sadād evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned umād hrasvāṅgā vāmanāś caiva kubjāś caiva bhavanti ted bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid dṛśyante mānuṣeṣu vaid unmattāś ca piśācāś ca paryaṭanto yatas tataḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi darpāhaṃkārasaṃyutāḥd bahudhā pralapanty eva prahasanti parān bhṛśamd mohayanti parān bhogair madanair lobhakāraṇātd vṛddhān gurūṃś ca ye mūrkhā vṛthaivāpahasanti cad śauṇḍā vidagdhāḥ śāstreṣu tathaivānṛtavādinaḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned unmattāś ca piśācāś ca bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥd umād bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cin nirapatyāḥ suduḥkhitāḥd yatanto na labhanty eva apatyāni yatas tataḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd ye purā manujā devi sarvaprāṇiṣu nirdayāḥd ghnanti bālāṃś ca bhuñjante mṛgāṇāṃ pakṣiṇām apid guruvidveṣiṇaś caiva paraputrābhyasūyakāḥd pitṛpūjāṃ na kurvanti yathoktaṃ cāṣṭakādibhiḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned mānuṣyaṃ sucirāt prāpya nirapatyā bhavanti ted umād putraśokayutā vāpi nāsti tatra vicāraṇād bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit pradṛśyante suduḥkhitāḥd udvegavāsaniratāḥ sodvegāś ca yatas tataḥd nityaśokasamāviṣṭā durgatāś ca tathaiva cad maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā nityam utkocanaparāyaṇāḥd bhīṣayanti parān nityaṃ vikurvanti tathaiva cad ṛṇair vṛddhiṃ ca ye kṛtvā daridrebhyo yatheṣṭataḥd ṛṇārtham abhigacchanti satataṃ vṛddhirūpakāḥd udvijante hi tān dṛṣṭvā dhārakās tv atha kāraṇātd ativṛddhir na kartavyā daridrebhyaś ca dharmataḥd ye śvabhiḥ krīḍamānāś ca trāsayanti vane mṛgānd prāṇihiṃsāṃ tathā devi kurvanti ca yatas tataḥd yeṣāṃ gṛheṣu vai śvānas trāsayanti vṛthā narānd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ kāladharmagatāḥ punaḥd pīḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priyed kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ tatra te duḥkhasaṃyutāḥd kudeśe duḥkhabhūyiṣṭhe vyāghātaśatasaṃkuled umād jāyante tatra śocantaḥ sodvegāś ca yatas tataḥd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid aiśvaryasthānasaṃyutāḥd mlecchabhūmiṣu dṛśyante mlecchaiśvaryasamanvitāḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd ye purā manujā devi dhanadhānyasamanvitāḥd ayathāvat prayacchanti śraddhāvarjitam eva vād apātrebhyaś ca ye dānaṃ śaucamaṅgalavarjitāḥd dadaty eva ca ye mūrkhāḥ ślāghayāvajñayāpi vād evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned kudeśe mlecchabhūyiṣṭhe durgame vanasaṃkaṭed umād mlecchādhipatyaṃ saṃprāpya jāyante tatra tatra vaid bhagavan bhaganetraghna mānuṣeṣv eva ke canad klībā napuṃsakāś caiva dṛśyante paṇḍakās tathād nīcakarmaratā nīcā nīcasaukhyās tathā bhuvid maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇamd ye purā manujā bhūtvā ghorakarmaratās tathād paśupuṃstvopaghātena jīvanti ca ramanti cad puṃstvopaghātinaś caiva narāṇāṃ kopakāraṇātd ye dhūrtāḥ strīṣu gacchanti ayathāvad yatheṣṭataḥd kāmavighnakarā ye tu dveṣapaiśunyakāraṇātd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned daṇḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priyed yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥd klībā varṣavarāś caiva paṇḍakāś ca bhavanti ted nīcakarmaratā loke nirlajjā vītasaṃbhramāḥd paranindāṃ puraskṛtya te bhavanti svakarmaṇād yadi cet saṃvimṛśyeraṃs te mucyante hi kilbiṣātd tatrāpi te pramādyeyuḥ patanti narakālayed strīṇām api tathā devi yathā puṃsāṃ tu karmajamd umād iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa śūlapāṇe vṛṣadhvajad puṃścalya iti yāḥ strīṣu nīcavṛttaratāḥ smṛtāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid yāḥ purā pramadā devi buddhimohasamanvitāḥd kāmarāgasamāyuktāḥ patīn apacaranti vaid pratikūlaparā yās tu patīn prati yathā tathād śaucaṃ lajjāṃ tu vismṛtya yatheṣṭaparicārakāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārā yamaloke sudaṇḍitāḥd yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs tās tathāvidhāḥd bahusādhāraṇā evaṃ puṃścalyaś ca bhavanti tāḥd pauṃścalyaṃ yat tu tad vṛttaṃ strīṇāṃ kaṣṭatamaṃ smṛtamd tataḥprabhṛti tā devi patanty eva na saṃśayaḥd umād śocanti cet tu tad vṛttaṃ manasā hitam āpnuyuḥd bhagavan devadeveśa pramadā vidhavā bhṛśamd dṛśyante mānuṣe loke sarvakalyāṇavarjitāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid yā purā pramadā devi buddhimohasamanvitāḥd kuṭumbaṃ tatra vai patyur nāśayanti vṛthā tathād viṣadāś cāgnidāś caiva patīn prati sunirdayāḥd anyāsāṃ hi patīn yānti svapatidveṣakāraṇātd evaṃyuktasamācārā yamaloke sudaṇḍitāḥd nirayasthāś ciraṃ kālaṃ kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣamd umād tatra tā bhogarahitā vidhavās tu bhavanti vaid bhagavan pramadās tv anyāḥ patau jñātiṣu satsv apid liṅginyaḥ saṃpradṛśyante pāṣaṇḍaṃ dharmam āśritāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid yāḥ purā bhāvadoṣeṇa lobhamohasamanvitāḥd paradravyaparā lobhāt pareṣāṃ dravyahārakāḥd abhyasūyāparā yās tu sapatnīnāṃ pradūṣakāḥd īrṣyāparāḥ kopanāś ca bandhūnāṃ viphalāḥ sadād evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani tāḥ priyed apalakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ pāṣaṇḍaṃ dharmam āśritāḥd umād striyaḥ pravrājaśīlāś ca bhavanty eva na saṃśayaḥd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit kāruvṛttiṃ samāśritāḥd pradṛśyante manuṣyeṣu nīcakarmaratā janāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi stabdhā mānayutā bhṛśamd darpāhaṃkārasaṃyuktāḥ kevalātmaparāyaṇāḥd tādṛśā manujā devi punarjanmani śobhaned kāravo naṭagandharvāḥ saṃbhavanti yathā tathād nāpitā bandinaś caiva tathā vaitālikāḥ priyed evaṃbhūtās tv adhovṛttiṃ jīvanty āśritya mānavāḥd paraprasādanakarās te paraiḥ kṛtavetanāḥd umād parāvamānasya phalaṃ bhuñjate paurvadehikamd bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣeṣv eva ke canad dāsabhūtāḥ pradṛśyante sarvakarmakarā bhṛśamd āghātabhartsanasahāḥ pīḍyamānāś ca sarvaśaḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇamd ye purā manujā devi pareṣāṃ vittahārakāḥd ṛṇavṛddhikaraṃ kuryān nyāsadattaṃ tathaiva cad nikṣepakāraṇād dattaṃ pareṣāṃ dravyahāriṇaḥd pramādād vismṛtaṃ naṣṭaṃ pareṣāṃ dhanahārakāḥd vadhabandhaparikleśair dāsatve kurvate parānd tādṛśā maraṇaṃ prāptā daṇḍitā yamaśāsanaiḥd kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ tatra te devi sarvathād dāsabhūtā bhavanty eva janmaprabhṛti mānavāḥd teṣāṃ karmāṇi kurvanti yeṣāṃ te dhanahārakāḥd ā samāpteḥ svapāpasya kurvantīti viniścayaḥd paśubhūtās tathā cānye bhavanti dhanahārakāḥd tat tathā kṣīyate karma teṣāṃ pūrvāparādhajamd ato nyathā na tac chakyaṃ karma hātuṃ surāsuraiḥd kiṃ tu mokṣavidhis teṣāṃ sarvathā tatprasādanamd ayathāvan mokṣakāmaḥ punarjanmani ceṣyated mokṣakāmī yathānyāyaṃ kurvan karmāṇi sarvaśaḥd bhartuḥ prasādam ākāṅkṣed āghātān sarvadā sahand prītipūrvaṃ tu yo bhartrā mukto muktaḥ svapāpataḥd tathābhūtān karmakarān sadā saṃpoṣayet patiḥd yathārhaṃ kārayet karma daṇḍaṃ kāraṇataḥ kṣipetd vṛddhān bālāṃs tathā kṣīṇān pālayan dharmam āpnuyātd umād iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan mānuṣeṣv eva mānuṣāḥ samadarśanāḥd caṇḍālā iva dṛśyante sparśamātreṇa dūṣakāḥd nīcakarmakarā deva sarveṣāṃ malahārakāḥd durgatāḥ kleśabhūyiṣṭhā virūpā duṣṭacetasaḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tvam ekāgramanāḥ śṛṇud ye purā manujā ghorā atimānayutā bhṛśamd ātmasaṃbhāvanāyuktāḥ stabdhā darpasamanvitāḥd praṇāmaṃ na tu kurvanti gurūṇām api pāpakāḥd ye svadharmārpaṇaṃ kāryam atimānān na kurvated parān saṃnāmayanty eva ājñayātmani ye balātd ṛddhiyogāt parān nityam avamanyanti mānavānd pānapāḥ sarvabhakṣāś ca paruṣāḥ kaṭukā narāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārā daṇḍitā yamaśāsanaiḥd kathaṃ cit prāpya mānuṣyaṃ caṇḍālāḥ saṃbhavanti ted nīcakarmaratāś caiva sarveṣāṃ malahārakāḥd pareṣāṃ vandanaparās te bhavanty avamānitāḥd virūpāḥ pāpayonisthāḥ sparśanād api varjitāḥd kuvṛttim upajīvanti bhūtvā te rajakādayaḥd purātimānadoṣāt tu bhuñjate svakṛtaṃ phalamd tān apy avasthākṛpaṇāṃś caṇḍālān api buddhimānd na ca ninden nātikupyed bhuñjate svakṛtaṃ phalamd umād caṇḍālā api tāṃ jātiṃ śocantaḥ śuddhim āpnuyuḥd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid āśāpāśaśatair vṛtāḥd pareṣāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhanti pratiṣiddhāḥ praveśaned draṣṭuṃ jñāpayituṃ caiva na labhante ca yatnataḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi aiśvaryasthānasaṃyutāḥd saṃvidaṃ tu na kurvanti parair aiśvaryamohitāḥd dvārāṇi na dadaty eva dveṣalobhādibhir vṛtāḥd avasthāmohasaṃyuktāḥ svārthamātraparāyaṇāḥd lubdhā bhogayutā vāpi sarveṣāṃ niṣphalā bhṛśamd api śaktā na kuryur ye parānugrahakāraṇātd nirdayāś caiva nirdvārā bhogaiśvaryagatiṃ pratid evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ punarjanmani śobhaned yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥd durgatā duravasthāś ca karmavyākṣepasaṃyutāḥd abhidhāvanti te sarve tam artham abhivedinaḥd rājñāṃ vā rājamātrāṇāṃ dvāri tiṣṭhanti vāritāḥd karma vijñāpituṃ bhadre na labhante kathaṃ canad umād praveṣṭum api te dvāri bahis tiṣṭhanti kāṅkṣayād bhagavan mānuṣe loke mānuṣeṣu bahuṣv apid sahasā naṣṭasarvasvā bhraṣṭakośaparigrahāḥd dṛśyante mānuṣāḥ ke cid rājacorodakādibhiḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥd pareṣāṃ vṛttināśaṃ tu kurvate dveṣalobhataḥd utkocanaparāś caiva piśunāś ca tathāvidhāḥd paradravyaharā ghorāś cauryād vānyena karmaṇād nirdayā niranukrośāḥ pareṣāṃ vṛttināśakāḥd nāstikānṛtabhūyiṣṭhāḥ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥd evaṃyuktasamācārā daṇḍitā yamaśāsanaiḥd nirayasthāś ciraṃ kālaṃ tatra duḥkhasamanvitāḥd yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥd tatrasthāḥ prāpnuvanty eva sahasā dravyanāśanamd kaṣṭaṃ ca prāpnuvanty eva kāraṇākāraṇād apid umād nāśaṃ vināśaṃ dravyāṇām upaghātāṃś ca sarvaśaḥd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid bāndhavaiḥ sahasā pṛthakd kāraṇākāraṇād eva sahasā prāṇanāśanamd śastreṇa vānyathā vāpi prāpnuvanti vadhaṃ narāḥd maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi ghorakarmaratā narāḥd āsurāḥ prāyaśo mūrkhāḥ prāṇihiṃsāpriyā bhṛśamd nirdayāḥ prāṇihiṃsāyāṃ tathā prāṇavighātakāḥd viśvastaghātakāś caiva tathā suptavighātakāḥd prāyaśo nṛtabhūyiṣṭhā nāstikā māṃsabhojinaḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ prāṇidharmagatāḥ punaḥd daṇḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priyed tiryagyoniṃ punaḥ prāpya tatra duḥkhaparikṣayātd yadi cen mānuṣaṃ janma labheraṃs te tathāvidhāḥd tatra te prāpnuvanty eva vadhabandhān yathā tathād āḍhyā vā durgatā vāpi bhuñjate svakṛtaṃ phalamd suptā mattāś ca viśvastās tathā te prāpnuvanty utad prāṇābādhakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ bāndhavaiḥ sahasā pṛthakd umād putradāravināśaṃ vā śastreṇānyena vā vadhamd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cid rājabhir nītikovidaiḥd daṇḍyante mānuṣe loke mānuṣāḥ satataṃ bhuvid maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi manujāṃś cetarāṃś ca vād kliṣṭaghātena nighnanti prāṇān prāṇiṣu nirdayāḥd asurā ghorakarmāṇaḥ krūradaṇḍavadhapriyāḥd ye daṇḍayanty adaṇḍyāṃs tu rājānaḥ kopamohitāḥd hiṃsāvihārāḥ puruṣā māṃsādā nāstikāḥ śubhed ke cit strīpuruṣaghnāś ca gurughnāś ca tathā priyed evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ prāṇidharmagatāḥ punaḥd daṇḍitā yamadaṇḍena nirayasthāś ciraṃ priyed pūrvadehakṛtaṃ karma bhuñjate tad iha prajāḥd ihaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tat paratra phalaty utad eṣā vyavasthitir devi mānuṣeṣv eva dṛśyated na ṛṣīṇāṃ na devānām amaratvāt tapobalātd tair ekena śarīreṇa bhujyate karmaṇaḥ phalamd umād na tathā mānuṣāṇāṃ syād antardhāya bhaved dhi tamd kimarthaṃ mānuṣā loke daṇḍyante pṛthivīśvaraiḥd kṛtāparādham uddiśya hantā hartāyam ity utad putrārthī putrakāmeṣṭyā ihaiva labhate sutānd tenaiva hi śarīreṇa bhuñjānāḥ karmaṇāṃ phalamd dṛśyante mānuṣe loke tad bhavān anumanyated maheśvaraḥd etan me saṃśayasthānaṃ tat tvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasid sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi tat tvaṃ śṛṇu samāhitād karma karmaphalaṃ ceti yugapad bhuvi neṣyated yat tvayābhihitaṃ devi hantā hartāyam ity apid teṣāṃ tatpūrvakaṃ karma daṇḍyate yatra rājabhiḥd daihikaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ teṣāṃ hetur bhavati śāsaned aparādhāpadeśena rājā daṇḍayati prajāḥd ihaloke vyavasthārthaṃ rājabhir daṇḍanaṃ smṛtamd udvejanārthaṃ śeṣāṇām aparādhaṃ tam uddiśand purākṛtaphalaṃ daṇḍo daṇḍyamānasya tad dhruvamd umād prāg eva ca mayā proktaṃ tatra niḥsaṃśayā bhavad bhagavan bhuvi martyānāṃ daṇḍitānāṃ nareśvaraiḥd daṇḍenaiva tu teneha pāpanāśo bhaven na vād maheśvaraḥd etan mayā saṃśayitaṃ tad bhavāṃś chettum arhatid sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitād ye nṛpair daṇḍitā bhūmāv aparādhāpadeśataḥd yamaloke na daṇḍyante tatra te yamadaṇḍanaiḥd adaṇḍitā vā ye mithyā martyā vā daṇḍitā bhuvid tān yamo daṇḍayaty eva sa hi veda kṛtākṛtamd nātikramed yamaṃ kaś cit karma kṛtveha mānuṣaḥd rājā yamaś ca kurvāte daṇḍamātraṃ tu śobhaned ubhābhyāṃ yamarājabhyāṃ daṇḍito daṇḍito pi vād paścāt karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte narake mānuṣeṣu vād nāsti karmaphalacchettā kaś cil lokatraye pi cad umād iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ nirviśaṅkā bhava priyed kimarthaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtvā mānuṣā bhuvi nityaśaḥd punas tatkarmanāśāya prāyaścittāni kurvated sarvapāpaharaṃ ceti hayamedhaṃ vadanti cad prāyaścittāni cānyāni pāpanāśāya kurvated maheśvaraḥd tasmān me saṃśayo jātas tvaṃ taṃ chettum ihārhasid sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitād saṃśayo hi mahān eṣa pūrveṣāṃ ca manīṣiṇāmd dvidhā tu kriyate pāpaṃ sadbhiś cāsadbhir eva cad abhisaṃdhāya vā nityam anyathā vā yadṛcchayād kevalaṃ cābhisaṃdhāya saṃrambhāc ca karoti yatd karmaṇas tasya nāśas tu na kathaṃ cana vidyated abhisaṃdhikṛtasyeha naiva nāśo sti karmaṇaḥd aśvamedhasahasrair vā prāyaścittaśatair apid anyathā yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pramādād vā yadṛcchayād prāyaścittāśvamedhābhyāṃ śodhanāt tu praṇaśyatid lokasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ prāyaścittādir iṣyated viddhy evaṃ pāpake kārye nirviśaṅkā bhava priyed umād iti te kathitaṃ devi kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa mānuṣāś cetarā apid mriyante bahudhā loke kāraṇākāraṇād apid maheśvaraḥd kena karmavipākena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ye purā manujā devi kāraṇākāraṇād apid yathāsubhir viyojyante prāṇinaḥ prāṇinirdayaiḥd tathaiva te prāpnuvanti yathaivātmakṛtaṃ phalamd viṣadas tu viṣeṇaiva śastraiḥ śastreṇa ghātakaḥd evam eva yathā loke mānuṣā ghnanti mānuṣānd kāraṇair eva te tena tathā svaprāṇanāśanamd prāpnuvanti punar devi nāsti tatra vicāraṇād iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ pāpakarmaphalaṃ priyed bhūyas tava samāsena kathayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇud satyapramāṇakaraṇaṃ nityam avyabhicāri cad yaiḥ purā manujair devi yasmin kāle yathā kṛtamd yenaiva kāraṇenāpi karma yat tu śubhāśubhamd tasmin kāle tathā devi tenaiva karaṇena ted prāpnuvanti narāḥ pretya niḥsaṃdehaṃ śubhāśubhamd iti satyaṃ vijānīhi lokatantravidhiṃ pratid karma kṛtvā naro bhoktā sa nāsti divi vā bhuvid na śakyaṃ karma cābhoktuṃ sadevāsuramānuṣaiḥd karmaṇā grathito loka ādiprabhṛti vartated etad uddeśataḥ proktaṃ karmapākaphalaṃ priyed yad anyac ca mayā noktaṃ yasmiṃs te karmasaṃgrahed buddhitarkeṇa tat sarvaṃ tathā veditum arhasid umād kathitaṃ śrotukāmāyāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasid bhagavan sarvalokeśa lokapālanamaskṛtad prasādāt te mahādeva śrutā me karmaṇāṃ gatiḥd saṃgṛhītaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ tattvato mṛtasaṃnibhamd karmaṇā grathitaṃ sarvam iti vedmi śubhāśubhamd govatsavac ca jananīṃ nimnaṃ salilavat tathād kartāraṃ svakṛtaṃ karma nityaṃ tam anudhāvatid kṛtasya karmaṇaś ceha na nāśo stīti niścayaḥd aśubhasya śubhasyāpi tad apy avagataṃ mayād bhūya eva mahādeva varada prītivardhanad karmaṇāṃ gatim āśritya saṃśayān moktum arhasid maheśvaraḥd yat te vivakṣitaṃ devi guhyam apy asitekṣaṇed umād tat sarvaṃ nirviśaṅkā tvaṃ pṛccha māṃ śubhalakṣaṇed evaṃ vyavasthite loke karmaṇā vṛṣabhadhvajad kṛtvā tat puruṣaḥ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vetaratd karmaṇaḥ svakṛtasyeha kadā bhuṅkte phalaṃ punaḥd maheśvaraḥd iha vā pretya vā deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasid sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi tad dhi guhyatamaṃ śṛṇud tvatpriyārthaṃ pravakṣyāmi devaguhyaṃ śubhānaned pūrvadehakṛtaṃ karma bhuñjate tad iha prajāḥd ihaiva yat kṛtaṃ puṃsāṃ tat paratra phaliṣyatid eṣā vyavasthitir devi mānuṣeṣv eva dṛśyated devānām asurāṇāṃ ca amaratvāt tapobalātd ekenaiva śarīreṇa bhujyate karmaṇāṃ phalamd umād mānuṣair na tathā devi antaraṃ tv etad iṣyated bhagavan bhaganetraghna mānuṣāṇāṃ viceṣṭitamd sarvam ātmakṛtaṃ ceti śrutaṃ me bhagavanmatamd loke grahakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ matvā karma śubhāśubhamd sadaiva grahanakṣatraṃ prāyaśaḥ paryupāsated maheśvaraḥd etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ deva tadgataṃ chettum arhasid sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu tattvaviniścayamd nakṣatrāṇi grahāś caiva śubhāśubhanivedakāḥd mānavānāṃ mahābhāge na tu karmakarāḥ svayamd prajānāṃ tu hitārthāya śubhāśubhavidhiṃ pratid anāgatam atikrāntaṃ jyotiścakreṇa bodhyated kiṃ tu tatra śubhaṃ karma sugrahais tan nivedyated duṣkṛtasyāśubhair eva samavāyo bhaved itid tasmād dhi grahavaiṣamye vaiṣamyaṃ kurute janaḥd grahasāmye śubhaṃ kuryāj jātyāṃ jātyāṃ purākṛtamd kevalaṃ grahanakṣatraṃ na karoti śubhāśubhamd sarvam ātmakṛtaṃ karma lokavādo grahā itid pṛthag grahāḥ pṛthak kartā kartrā svaṃ bhujyate phalamd umād iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ viśaṅkāṃ jahi śobhaned bhagavan vividhaṃ karma kṛtvā jantuḥ śubhāśubhamd kiṃ tayoḥ pūrvakataraṃ bhuṅkte janmāntare punaḥd maheśvaraḥd eṣa me saṃśayo deva taṃ me chettum ihārhasid sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi tat te vakṣyāmi tattvataḥd aśubhaṃ pūrvam ity āhur apare śubham ity apid mithyā tad ubhayaṃ proktaṃ kevalaṃ tad bravīmi ted mānuṣe tu pade karma yugapad bhujyate sadād yathākṛtaṃ yathāyogam ubhayaṃ bhujyate kramātd bhuñjānāś caiva dṛśyante kramaśo bhuvi mānavāḥd ṛddhiṃ hāniṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham abhayaṃ bhayam eva cad duḥkhāny anubhavanty āḍhyā daridrāś ca sukhāni cad yaugapadyāc ca bhuñjānā dṛśyante lokasākṣikamd narake svargaloke ca na tathā saṃsthitiḥ priyed nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi narake svarge nityaṃ sukhaṃ tathād śubhāśubhānām ādhikyāt karmaṇā tatra sevyated nirantaraṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ svarge ca narake bhavetd tatrāpi sumahat kṛtvā pūrvam alpaṃ punaḥ śubhed umād etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid bhagavan prāṇino loke mriyante kena hetunād jātā jātā na tiṣṭhanti tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvaṃ samāhitād ātmakarmakṣayād dehaṃ yathā muñcanti tac chṛṇud śarīrātmasamāhāro jantur ity abhidhīyated tatrātmānaṃ nityam āhur anityaṃ kṣetram ucyated tat tu kālavaśāl loke jīrṇaṃ bhavati śobhaned kālaś chinatti cāyūṃṣi dinamāsartuhāyanaiḥd kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālenākulitaṃ jagatd kālaṃ nātikrameran hi sadevāsuramānavāḥd yathākāśe na tiṣṭheta dravyaṃ kiṃ cid acetanamd tathā dhāvati kālo yaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kiṃ cin na tiṣṭhatid evaṃ kālena saṃkrāntaṃ śarīraṃ jarjarīkṛtamd akarmayogyaṃ saṃśīrṇaṃ tyaktvā dehī tato vrajetd nityasyānityasaṃtyāgāl loke tan maraṇaṃ viduḥd na ca nityasya jīvasya vināśo vidyate śubhed sa punar jāyate nyatra śarīraṃ navam āviśand umād evaṃ lokagatir nityam ādiprabhṛti vartated bhagavan prāṇināṃ bālā dṛśyante maraṇaṃ gatāḥd ativṛddhāś ca jīvanto dṛśyante cirajīvinaḥd kevalaṃ kālamaraṇaṃ na pramāṇaṃ maheśvarad maheśvaraḥd tasmān me saṃśayaṃ brūhi prāṇināṃ jīvakāraṇamd śṛṇu tatkāraṇaṃ devi nirṇayas tv eka eva saḥd jīrṇatvamātraṃ kurute kālo dehaṃ na pātayetd jīrṇe karmaṇi saṃghātaḥ svayam eva viśīryated pūrvakarmapramāṇena jīvitaṃ mṛtyur eva vād yāvat pūrvakṛtaṃ karma tāvaj jīvati mānavaḥd tadvat kālavaśād bālā mriyante bhogasaṃkṣayātd jīvanti ciravṛddhāś ca tathā karmapramāṇataḥd umād iti te kathitaṃ devi nirviśaṅkā bhava priyed bhagavan kena vṛttena bhavanti cirajīvinaḥd maheśvaraḥd alpāyuṣo narāḥ kena tan me śaṃsitum arhasid śṛṇu tat sarvam akhilaṃ guhyaṃ pathyataraṃ nṛṇāmd ye narā vṛttasaṃpannā bhavanti cirajīvinaḥd ahiṃsā satyavacanam akrodhaḥ kṣāntir ārjavamd gurūṇāṃ nityaśuśrūṣā vṛddhānām api pūjanamd śaucaṃ cākāryasaṃtyāgaḥ sadā pathyasya bhojanamd evamādi śubhaṃ vṛttaṃ narāṇāṃ dīrghajīvināmd tapasā brahmacaryeṇa rasāyananiṣevaṇātd udagrasattvā balino bhavanti cirajīvinaḥd svarge vā mānuṣe vāpi ciraṃ tiṣṭhanti dhārmikāḥd apare pāpakarmāṇaḥ prāyaśo nṛtavādinaḥd hiṃsāpriyā gurudviṣṭā niṣkriyāḥ śaucavarjitāḥd nāstikā ghorakarmāṇaḥ satataṃ māṃsapānapāḥd pāpācārā gurudveṣāḥ kopanāḥ kalahapriyāḥd evam evāśubhācārās tiṣṭhanti niraye ciramd tiryagyonau tathātyantam alpaṃ tiṣṭhanti mānuṣed tasmād alpāyuṣo martyās tādṛśāḥ saṃbhavanti ted agamyadeśagamanād apathyānāṃ ca bhojanātd āyuḥkṣayo bhaven nṝṇām āyuḥkṣayakarā hi ted bhavanty alpāyuṣas tais tair anyathā cirajīvinaḥd umād etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa śrutaṃ me paramaṃ hitamd ātmano jātisaṃbandhaṃ brūhi strīpuruṣāntared strīprāṇaḥ puruṣaprāṇa ekaḥ sa pṛthag eva vād maheśvaraḥd eṣa me saṃśayo deva taṃ me chettuṃ tvam arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu sarvaṃ samāhitād puṃstvaṃ strītvam iti prāṇe sthitir nāsti śubhekṣaṇed nirvikārī sadaivātmā strītvaṃ puṃstvaṃ na cātmanid karmaprakāreṇa tathā jātyāṃ jātyāṃ prajāyated akartā cāvikārī ca nityaś ca puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥd strīśarīrakṛtaṃ karma strībhāvenopabhujyated puruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma puruṣeṇaiva bhujyated evaṃ prasajyate loke bhāvaikatvena bhūyaśaḥd śarīraṃ karmanānātvād dṛśyate viparītavatd kṛtvā tu pauruṣaṃ karma strī pumān api jāyated umād strībhāvayuk pumān kṛtvā karmaṇā pramadā bhavetd bhagavan sarvalokeśa karmātmā na karoti cetd maheśvaraḥd ko nyaḥ karmakaras tatra dehe tad vaktum arhasid śṛṇu bhāmini kartāram ātmā hi na ca karmakṛtd prakṛtyā guṇayuktena kriyate karma nityaśaḥd śarīraṃ prāṇināṃ loke yathā pittakaphānilaiḥd vyāptam eva tribhir doṣais tathā vyāptaṃ guṇais tribhiḥd sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇās tv ete śarīriṇaḥd prakāśātmakam eteṣāṃ sattvaṃ satatam iṣyated rajo duḥkhātmakaṃ tatra tamo mohātmakaṃ smṛtamd tribhir etair guṇaiḥ sarvaṃ loke karma pravartated satyaṃ prāṇidayā śaucaṃ śreyaḥ prītiḥ kṣamā damaḥd evamādi tathānyac ca karma sāttvikam iṣyated dākṣyaṃ karmaparatvaṃ ca lobho bhogavidhiṃ pratid kalatrasaṅgo mādhuryaṃ nityam aiśvaryalubdhatād rajasaś codbhavaṃ caitat karma nānāvidhaṃ sadād anṛtaṃ caiva pāruṣyaṃ śrutividveṣatā bhṛśamd hiṃsāparatvaṃ nāstikyaṃ nidrālasyabhayāni cad tamasaś codbhavaṃ caitat karma pāpayutaṃ sadād tasmād guṇamayaḥ sarvaḥ kāryārambhaḥ śubhāśubhaḥd tasmād ātmānam avyagraṃ viddhy akartāram avyayamd sāttvikāḥ puṇyalokeṣu rājasā mānuṣe paded umād tiryagyonau ca narake tiṣṭheyus tāmasā narāḥd kimartham ātmā bhedyaḥ sandehe śastreṇa vā hated maheśvaraḥd svayaṃ praṇaśyate dehī tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu kalyāṇi kāraṇamd etan naiyāyikaiś cāpi muhyate sūkṣmabuddhibhiḥd karmakṣaye tu saṃprāpte prāṇināṃ dehadhāriṇāmd upadravo bhaved dehe yena kenāpi hetunād tannimittaṃ śarīrī tu śarīraṃ prāptasaṃkṣayamd apayāti parityajya tataḥ karmavaśena saḥd dehakṣate pi naivātmā vedanābhir na cālyated tiṣṭhet karmaphalaṃ yāvad vrajet karmakṣaye punaḥd ādiprabhṛti loke sminn evam ātmagatiḥ sadād umād etat te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid bhagavan devadeveśa karmaṇaiva śubhāśubhamd yathāyogaṃ phalaṃ jantuḥ prāpnotīti viniścayaḥd pareṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kurvan yathā saṃprāpnuyāc chubhamd maheśvaraḥd yady etad asti ced deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad apy asti mahābhāge abhisaṃdhiphalaṃ nṛṇāmd hitārthaṃ duḥkham anyeṣāṃ kṛtvāśubham avāpnuyātd daṇḍayan bhartsayan rājā prajāḥ puṇyam avāpnuyātd guruḥ saṃtarjayañ śiṣyān bhartā bhṛtyajanaṃ svakamd unmārgapratipannāṃś ca śāstā dharmaphalaṃ labhetd cikitsakaś ca duḥkhāni janayan hitam āpnuyātd yajñārthaṃ paśuhiṃsāṃ ca kurvann api na hiṃsakaḥd evam anye sumanaso hiṃsakāḥ svargam āpnuyuḥd ekasmin nihate bhadre bahavaḥ sukham āpnuyuḥd tasmin hate bhaved dharmaḥ kuta eva tu pāpakamd abhisaṃdher ajihmatvāc chuddhe dharmasya gauravātd umād etat kṛtvā tu pāpiṣṭhān doṣān na prāpnuyāt kva citd bhagavan sarvamartyānāṃ jñānī bhavati sattamaḥd kim avekṣya tad utpannaṃ jñānaṃ tasya phalaṃ ca yatd nāradaḥd kṛtrimaṃ tat svabhāvaṃ vā tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd etac chrutvā mahādevo jagau jñānasya saṃbhavamd sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ ceti jagad dvividham ucyated catasro jātayas tatra prajānāṃ kramaśo yathād teṣām udbhedajā vṛkṣā latā vallyaś ca vīrudhaḥd daṃśayūkādayaś cānye svedajāḥ kṛmijātayaḥd pakṣiṇaś chidrakarṇāś ca prāṇinas tv aṇḍajāḥ smṛtāḥd mṛgavyālamanuṣyāṃś ca viddhi teṣāṃ jarāyujānd evaṃ caturvidhāṃ jātim ātmā saṃśritya tiṣṭhatid sparśenaikendriyeṇātmā tiṣṭhaty kledajāḥ priyed aṇḍajāś cāpi saṃyogāj jāyante kṣetrabījayoḥd śuklaśoṇitasaṃyogāt saṃbhavanti jarāyujāḥd jarāyujānāṃ sarveṣāṃ mānuṣaṃ padam uttamamd sakalair indriyair martyāḥ saṃyuktā jalpinas tathād bhayaṃ ratiś ca cittaṃ tad vidyate mṛgapakṣiṣud dharmādharmau ca vijñānaṃ naiva pakṣimṛgādiṣud buddhiḥ sattvaṃ dhṛtir lajjā jñānaṃ vijñānam eva cad ūhāpohau ca martyeṣu guṇā nānāvidhāḥ smṛtāḥd mānuṣaṃ hi padaṃ tasmād viśiṣṭam iha lakṣyated mahatā dharmakāryeṇa prāpyate janma mānuṣamd ataḥ paraṃ tamotpattiṃ śṛṇu devi samāhitād dvividhaṃ hi tamo loke śārvaraṃ dehajaṃ tathād jyotirbhiś cāgninā loke nāśaṃ gacchati śārvaramd dehajaṃ tu tamo ghoraṃ taiḥ samastair na śāmyatid tamasas tasya nāśārthaṃ nopāyam adhijagmivānd tapaś cakāra vipulaṃ lokakartā pitāmahaḥd caturas tu samudbhūtā vedāḥ sāṅgāḥ sahottarāḥd tāṃl labdhvā mumude brahmā lokānāṃ hitakāraṇātd dehajaṃ tat tamo ghoram abhūt tenaiva nāśitamd kāryākāryam idaṃ ceti vācyāvācyam idaṃ tv itid yadi cen na bhavel loke śrutaṃ cāritradeśikamd paśubhir nirviśeṣaṃ tu ceṣṭante mānuṣās tv itid yajñādīnāṃ samārambhaḥ śrutenaiva vidhīyated yajñasya phalayogena devalokaḥ samṛdhyated prītiyuktāḥ punar devā mānuṣāṇāṃ phalanty utad evaṃ nityaṃ pravardhete rodasī ca parasparamd lokasaṃdhāraṇaṃ tasmāc chrutam ity avadhārayad jñānād viśiṣṭaṃ jantūnāṃ nāsti lokatraye pi cad sahajaṃ tat pradhānaṃ syād aparaṃ kṛtrimaṃ śrutamd ubhayaṃ yatra saṃpannaṃ bhavet tatra tu śobhanamd saṃpragṛhya śrutaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtakṛtyā bhavanty utad uparīva ca martyānāṃ devavat saṃprakāśated kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ darpam ajñānaṃ caiva buddhijamd tac chrutaṃ nudati sarvaṃ kathitaṃ te śubhekṣaṇed bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cij jātismaraṇasaṃyutāḥd kimarthaṃ te bhijāyante jānantaḥ paurvadehikamd maheśvaraḥd etan me tattvato deva mānuṣeṣu vadasva bhoḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ śṛṇu śobhaned ye mṛtāḥ sahasā martyā jāyante sahasā punaḥd teṣāṃ paurāṇiko bhyāsaḥ kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa tiṣṭhatid tasmāj jātismarā loke jāyante bodhasaṃyutāḥd teṣāṃ vivardhatāṃ saṃjñā svapnavat sā praṇaśyatid umād paralokasya cāstitve mūḍhānāṃ kāraṇaṃ ca tatd bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cin mṛtā bhūtvā hi saṃpratid nivartamānā dṛśyante deheṣv eva punar narāḥd maheśvaraḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ śṛṇu śobhaned prāṇair viyojyamānānāṃ bahutvāt prāṇināṃ kṣayed tathaiva nāmasāmānyād yamadūtā nṛṇāṃ bhuvid vahanti te kva cin mohād anyāṃs ta iti yāmikāḥd nirvikāraṃ hi tat sarvaṃ yamo veda kṛtākṛtamd tasmāt saṃyaminīṃ prāpya yamenaite vimokṣitāḥd punar eva nivartante śeṣaṃ bhoktuṃ svakarmaṇaḥd umād svakarmaṇy asamāpte tu na mriyante hi mānavāḥd bhagavan suptamātrāṇāṃ martyānāṃ svapnadarśanamd maheśvaraḥd kiṃ tat svabhāvam anyad vā tan me śaṃsitum arhasid suptānāṃ tu punaś ceṣṭā svapna ity abhidhīyated anāgatam atikrāntaṃ paśyate saṃcaran manaḥd nimittaṃ ca bhavet tasmāt prāṇināṃ svapnadarśanamd umād evaṃ te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid bhagavan sarvabhūteśa loke karmakriyāpathed daivāt pravartate sarvam iti ke cid vyavasthitāḥd apare ceṣṭayā ceti dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ kriyāmd pakṣabhede dvidhā cāsmin saṃśayasthaṃ mano mamad tattvaṃ vada mahādeva śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi med maheśvaraḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitād na daivaṃ kurute karma loke devi śubhāśubhamd lakṣyate dvividhaṃ karma mānuṣāṇāṃ śubhānaned purākṛtaṃ tayor ekam aihikaṃ ca paraṃ tathād adṛṣṭaṃ paurvikaṃ karma tad daivam iti lakṣyated aihikaṃ dṛṣṭakaraṇaṃ tan mānuṣam iti smṛtamd mānuṣaṃ ca kriyāmātraṃ daivāt saṃbhavate phalamd evaṃ tad ubhayaṃ sarvaṃ mānuṣaṃ vidyate nṛṣud laukikaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi daivamānuṣanirmitamd kṛṣau tu dṛśyate karma karṣaṇaṃ vapanaṃ tathād ropaṇaṃ caiva lavanaṃ yac cānyat pauruṣaṃ smṛtamd kāle vṛṣṭiḥ suvāpaś ca prarohaḥ paktir eva cad evamādi tu yac cānyat tad daivatam iti smṛtamd pravāpaḥ pauruṣaṃ karma siddhir daivam iti smṛtamd daivād asiddhiś ca bhaved duṣkṛtaṃ cāsti pauruṣed suyatnāl labhate kīrtiṃ duryatnād ayaśas tathād umād evaṃ lokagatir devi ādiprabhṛti vartated bhagavan sarvabhūteśa surāsuranamaskṛtad katham ātmā sadā garbhaṃ saṃviśet karmakāraṇātd maheśvaraḥd tan me vada mahādeva tad dhi guhyaṃ paraṃ mamad śṛṇu bhāmini tad guhyaṃ guhyānāṃ paramaṃ priyed devaguhyād api param ātmaguhyam iti smṛtamd devāsurās daivaṃ cāpy atra kāraṇamd bījaśoṇitasaṃyogo yadā saṃbhavate śubhed tadātmā viśate garbham evam aṇḍajarāyujed śītoṣṇayos tu saṃyoge kledajeṣv avatiṣṭhatid bījabhūmijalānāṃ tu yogād udbhedajeṣu cad evaṃ saṃyogakāle tu ātmā garbhatvam eyivānd kalalāj jāyate piṇḍaṃ piṇḍāt peśyarbudaṃ bhavetd vyaktibhāvaṃ gate caiva karma tv āśrayate kramātd evaṃ strīpuruṣasaṃyogaṃ pauruṣaṃ viddhi bhāminid apatyalābho yac cānyat tad daivam iti saṃsmṛtamd evaṃ vivardhamānena karmātmā saha vartated evam ātmagatiṃ viddhi yan māṃ pṛcchasi suvrated pañcabhūtasthitiś caiva jyotiṣām ayanaṃ tathād abuddhigamyaṃ yan martyair hetubhir vā na vidyated tādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ daivaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vetaratd yādṛśaṃ cātmanā śakyaṃ tat pauruṣam iti smṛtamd kevalaṃ phalaniṣpattir ekena na tu śakyated pauruṣeṇa ca daivena yugapad grathitaṃ priyed tayoḥ samāhitaṃ karma śītoṣṇaṃ yugapat tathād pauruṣaṃ tu tayoḥ pūrvam ārabdhavyaṃ vijānatād ātmanā naiva śakyaṃ hi na tathā kīrtim āpnuyātd khananān mathanāl loke jalāgniprāpaṇaṃ yathād tathā puruṣakāre tu daivasaṃpat samāhitād narasyākurvataḥ karma daivasaṃpan na labhyated tasmāt sarvasamārambho daivamānuṣanirmitaḥd asurā rākṣasāś caiva manyante lokanāyakāḥd na paśyante ca te
