vṛttāntaṃ lokayor dvayoḥd yathaivātmakṛtaṃ vidyur deśāntaragatā narāḥd vidyus tathaivāntakāle svakṛtaṃ paurvadehikamd evaṃ vyavasthite loke sarve dharmaparābhavand acireṇaiva kālena svargaḥ saṃpūritas tadād devānām api saṃbādhaṃ dṛṣṭvā brahmāpy acintayatd saṃcarante kathaṃ devā mānuṣāḥ praviśanti hid ity evam anucintyaiṣa mānuṣān samamohayatd tadāprabhṛti te martyā na vidus te purātanamd kāmakrodhau ca tatkāle mānuṣeṣu nyapātayatd tābhyām abhihatā martyāḥ svargalokaṃ na lebhired purākṛtasyāvijñānāt kāmakrodhābhipīḍanātd naitad astīti manvānā vikārāṃś cakrire punaḥd akāryādīn mahādoṣān ārabhantātmakāraṇātd vismṛtya dharmakāryāṇi paralokabhayaṃ tathād evaṃ vyavasthite loke kaśmalaṃ samapadyatad lokānāṃ caiva vedānāṃ kṣayāyaiva tadā priyed narakāḥ pūritāś cāsan prāṇibhiḥ pāpakāribhiḥd punar eva tu tad dṛṣṭvā lokakartā pitāmahaḥd acintayat tam evārthaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāraṇātd samatvena kathaṃ loko varteteti muhur muhuḥd cintayitvā tadā brahmā jñānena tapasā priyed umād akaroj jñānadṛśyaṃ tu paralokaṃ na cakṣuṣād bhagavan mṛtamātras tu yo yaṃ jāta iti smṛtaḥd tathaiva dṛśyate jātas tatrātmā tu kathaṃ bhavetd garbhādāv eva saṃviṣṭa ātmeti bhagavanmatamd eṣa me saṃśayo deva tan me chettuṃ tvam arhasid maheśvaraḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tat tvaṃ samāhitād anyo garbhagato bhūtvā tatraiva nidhanaṃ gataḥd punar anyac charīraṃ tadāviśya bhuvi jāyated tat kva cin naiva sarvatra daivayogaṃ tu tad bhavetd sūtikāyā hitārthaṃ ca mohanārthaṃ ca dehināmd yamakarmavidhānaṃ tad ity evaṃ viddhi śobhaned kaukṣamātraṃ tu narakaṃ bhuktvā ke cit prayānti hid māyā sā yāmikā nāma yaj janmamaraṇāntared iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid umād bhagavan sarvabhūteśa lokanātha vṛṣadhvajad nāsty ātmā karmabhokteti mṛto jantur na jāyated svabhāvāj jāyate sarvaṃ yathā vṛkṣaphalaṃ tathād yathormayaḥ saṃbhavanti tathaiva jagadākṛtiḥd tapodānādi yat karma tatrātmā dṛśyate vṛthād nāsti paunarbhavaṃ janma iti ke cid vyavasthitāḥd parokṣavacanaṃ śrutvā na pratyakṣasya darśanātd tat sarvaṃ nāsti vāstīti saṃśayasthās tathāpared pakṣabhedāntare cāsmiṃs tattvaṃ me vaktum arhasid nāradaḥd uktaṃ bhagavatā yat tu tat tu lokasya saṃsthitiḥd praśnam etaṃ tu pṛcchantyāṃ rudrāṇyāṃ pariṣat tadād maheśvaraḥd kautūhalayutā śrotuṃ samāhitamanābhavatd naitad asti mahābhāge yad vadantīha nāstikāḥd etad evābhiśastānāṃ śrutividveṣiṇāṃ matamd sarvam arthaṃ śrutaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yat prāg uktaṃ mayā tavad tadāprabhṛti martyānāṃ śrutam āśritya paṇḍitāḥd kāmān saṃchindya parighān dhṛtyā vai paramāsinād abhiyānty eva te svargaṃ paśyantaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalamd evaṃ śraddhāphalaṃ loke parataḥ sumahat phalamd buddhiḥ śraddhā ca śuśrūṣā kāraṇāni hitaiṣiṇāmd tasmāt svargābhigantāraḥ kati cit tv abhavan narāḥd anye karaṇahīnatvān nāstikyaṃ bhāvam āśritāḥd śrutavidveṣiṇo mūrkhā nāstikā dṛḍhaniścayāḥd niṣkriyāś ca nirannādyāḥ patanty evādhamāṃ gatimd nāstīti vai punarjanma kavayo py atra mohitāḥd nādhigacchanti tan nityaṃ hetuvādaśatair apid eṣā brahmakṛtā māyā durvijñeyā surāsuraiḥd kiṃ punar mānuṣair loke jñātukāmaiḥ svakarmabhiḥd kevalaṃ śraddhayā devi śrutimātraniviṣṭayād tad astīty eva mantavyaṃ tathā hi tam avāpnuyātd vedaguhyeṣu cānyeṣu hetur devi nirarthakaḥd badhirāndhavad evātra vartitavyaṃ hitaiṣiṇād etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ devaguhyaṃ prajāhitamd tvatprītyartham idaṃ guhyam avācyam api bhāṣitamd umād bhagavan sarvabhūteśa tripurārdana śaṃkarad kīdṛśā yamadaṇḍās te kīdṛśāḥ paricārakāḥd kathaṃ mṛtās te gacchanti prāṇino yamasādanamd kīdṛśaṃ bhavanaṃ tasya kathaṃ daṇḍayati prajāḥd maheśvaraḥd etat sarvaṃ mahādeva śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabhod śṛṇu kalyāṇi tat sarvaṃ yat tad devi manaḥpriyamd dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhe yamasya sadanaṃ mahatd vicitraṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca nānābhāvasamanvitamd pitṛbhiḥ pretasaṃghaiś ca yamadūtaiś ca saṃtatamd prāṇisaṃghaiḥ subahubhiḥ karmavaśyais tu pūritamd tatrāste daṇḍayan nityaṃ yamo lokahite rataḥd māyayā satataṃ vetti prāṇināṃ yac chubhāśubhamd māyayā saṃharaṃs tatra prāṇisaṃghān yatas tataḥd tasya māyāmayāḥ pāśā na vedyante surāsuraiḥd ko hi mānuṣamātras tu vettā tac caritaṃ mahatd evaṃ hi śāsatas tasya yamasya paricārakāḥd gṛhītvā saṃnayanty eva prāṇinaḥ kṣīṇakarmiṇaḥd yena kenāpadeśena apadeśas tadudbhavaḥd karmaṇā prāṇino loka uttamādhamamadhyamāḥd yathārhaṃ tān samādāya nayanti yamasādanamd dhārmikān uttamān viddhi svargīyās te yathāmarāḥd nṛṣu janma labhante ye karmaṇā madhyamāḥ smṛtāḥd tiryaṅnarakagantāro hy adhamās te narādhamāḥd panthānas trividhā dṛṣṭā sarveṣāṃ gatijīvināmd ramaṇīyaṃ nirābādhaṃ durdarśam iti nāmataḥd ramaṇīyaṃ tu sanmārgaṃ patākādhvajasaṃkulamd dhūpitaṃ siktasaṃmṛṣṭaṃ puṣpamālābhisaṃkulamd manoharaṃ sukhasparśaṃ gacchatām eva tad bhavetd nirābādhaṃ yathā loke supraśastaṃ tathā bhavetd tṛtīyaṃ tat tu durdarśaṃ durgandhi tamasāvṛtamd paruṣaṃ śarkarākīrṇaṃ śvadaṃṣṭrābahulaṃ bhṛśamd kṛmikīṭasamākīrṇaṃ gacchatām atidurgamamd mārgair ebhis tribhir nityam uttamādhamamadhyamānd saṃnayanti yathā kāle tan me śṛṇu śucismited uttamān antakāle tu yamadūtāḥ susaṃyatāḥd umād nayanti sukham ādāya ramaṇīyapathena vaid bhagavaṃs tatra cātmānaṃ tyaktadehaṃ nirāśrayamd maheśvaraḥd adṛśyaṃ katham ādāya saṃnayanti yamāntikamd śṛṇu bhāmini tat sarvaṃ trividhaṃ dehadhāraṇamd karmavaśyaṃ bhogavaśyaṃ duḥkhavaśyam iti priyed mānuṣaṃ karmavaśyaṃ syāt svargīyaṃ bhogasādhanamd tṛtīyaṃ yātanāvaśyaṃ śarīraṃ māyayā kṛtamd yamaloke na cānyatra dṛśyate yātanāyutamd śarīrair yātanāvaśyair jīvam āmucya bhāminid nayanti yāmikās tatra prāṇino māyayā mṛtānd madhyamān atha veṣeṇa madhyamena pathā tathād caṇḍālaveṣās tv adhamān gṛhītvā bhartsya tarjanaiḥd ākarṣantas tathā pāśair durdarśena nayanti tānd trividhān evam ādāya nayanti yamasādanamd dharmāsanagataṃ dakṣaṃ bhrājamānaṃ svatejasād lokapālaṃ sabhādhyakṣaṃ tathaiva pariṣadgatamd darśayanti mahābhāge yāmikās tān nivedya ted pūjayan daṇḍayan kāṃś cit teṣāṃ śṛṇvañ śubhāśubhamd vyāpṛto bahusāhasrais tatrāste satataṃ yamaḥd gatānāṃ tu yamas teṣām uttamān abhipūjayād abhisaṃgamya vidhivat pṛṣṭvā svāgatakauśalamd prastutya satkathāṃ teṣāṃ lokaṃ saṃdiśate yamaḥd yamenaivam anujñātā yānti paścān triviṣṭapamd madhyamānāṃ yamas teṣāṃ śrutvā karma yathātathamd jāyantāṃ mānuṣeṣv eva iti saṃdiśate ca tānd adhamān pāpasaṃyuktān yamo nāvekṣate gatānd yamasya puruṣā ghorāś caṇḍālasamadarśanāḥd yātanā yāpayanty etāṃl lokapālasya śāsanātd chindantaś ca nudantaś ca prakarṣante yatas tataḥd krośataḥ pātayanty etān mitho garteṣv avāṅmukhānd saṃghātinyaḥ śilāś caiṣāṃ patanti śirasi priyed ayomukhāḥ kākabalā bhakṣayanti sudāruṇāḥd asipatravane ghore cārayanti tathāparānd tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrās tathā śvānaḥ kāṃś cit tatra daśanti vaid tatra vaitaraṇī nāma nadī grāhasamākulād duṣpraveśā ca ghorā ca mūtraśoṇitavāhinīd tasyāṃ saṃmajjayanty etāṃs tṛṣitān pāyayanti tānd āropayanti vai kāṃś cit tatra kaṇṭakaśalmalīmd yantracakreṣu tilavat pīḍyante tatra ke canad aṅgāreṣu ca dahyante tathā duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥd kumbhīpākeṣu pacyante bharjyante saghṛteṣu vaid pāṭyante taruvac chastraiḥ pīḍyante locanādiṣud bhidyante thāṅgaśaḥ śūlais tudyante sūkṣmasūcibhiḥd evaṃ tvayā kṛto doṣas tadarthaṃ daṇḍanaṃ tv idamd vācaivaṃ ghoṣayanti sma daṇḍyamānān samantataḥd evaṃ te yātanāḥ prāpya śarīrair yātanāvaśaiḥd prasahantaś ca tad duḥkhaṃ smarantaḥ svāparādhajamd krośantaś ca rudantaś ca na mucyante kathaṃ canad smarantas tatra tapyante pāpam ātmakṛtaṃ phalamd evaṃ bahuvidhā daṇḍā bhujyante pāpakāribhiḥd yātanāś ca tathā bhuktvā pacyante narake punaḥd apare yātanā bhuktvā mucyante tatra kilbiṣātd pāpadoṣakṣayakarā yātanā saṃsmṛtā nṛṇāmd umād bahutaptaṃ yathā lohaṃ nirmalaṃ tat tathā bhavetd bhagavaṃs te kathaṃ tatra daṇḍyante narakeṣu vaid maheśvaraḥd kati te nirayā ghorāḥ kīdṛśās te maheśvarad śṛṇu bhāmini tat sarvaṃ pañcaite narakāhvayāḥd bhūmer adhastād vihitā ghorā duṣkṛtakarmaṇāmd prathamaṃ rauravaṃ nāma śatayojanam āyatamd tāvat pramāṇaṃ vistīrṇaṃ tāmasaṃ pāpapīḍitamd bhṛśaṃ durgandhi paruṣaṃ kṛmibhir dāruṇair yutamd atighoram anirdeśyaṃ pratikūlaṃ yatas tataḥd te ciraṃ tatra tiṣṭhanti na tatra śayanāsaned kṛmibhir bhakṣyamāṇāś ca visragandhasamāyutāḥd evaṃpramāṇam udvignā yānti tiṣṭhanti tatra ted yātanābhyo daśaguṇaṃ narake duḥkham iṣyated tatra cātyantikaṃ duḥkham iti viddhi śubhekṣaṇed krośantaś ca rudantaś ca vedanās tatra bhuñjated bhramanti duḥkhamokṣārthaṃ trātā kaś cin na vidyated duḥkhasyāntaramātraṃ tu dvāraṃ vā na ca labhyated mahārauravasaṃjñaṃ tu dvitīyaṃ narakaṃ priyed tasmād dviguṇitaṃ viddhi māne duḥkhe ca rauravātd tṛtīyaṃ narakaṃ tatra kaṇṭakāvanasaṃjñitamd tato dviguṇitaṃ taṃ ca pūrvābhyāṃ duḥkhamānayoḥd mahāpātakasaṃyuktā ghorās tasmin viśanti hid agnikuṇḍam iti khyātaṃ caturthaṃ narakaṃ priyed etad dviguṇitaṃ tasmād yathāniṣṭasukhaṃ tathād tatra duḥkhaṃ hi sumahad amānuṣam iti smṛtamd bhuñjate tatra tatraiva duḥkhaṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥd pañcakaṣṭam iti khyātaṃ pañcamaṃ narakaṃ priyed tatra duḥkham anirdeśyaṃ mahāghoraṃ yathātathamd pañcendriyair asahyatvāt pañcakaṣṭam iti smṛtamd bhuñjate tatra tatraiva duḥkhaṃ duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥd amānuṣārhaṃ tad duḥkhaṃ mahābhūtais tu bhujyated atighoraṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā mahābhūtāni yānti tamd pañcakaṣṭena hi samaṃ nāsti duḥkhaṃ tathāvidhamd duḥkhasyāntam iti prāhuḥ pañcakaṣṭaṃ sadā priyed evaṃ te teṣu tiṣṭhanti prāṇino duḥkhabhāginaḥd anye ca narakāḥ santi avīcipramukhāḥ priyed krośantaś ca rudantaś ca vedanārtā bhṛśāturāḥd ke cid bhramanti veṣṭante ke cid dhāvanti cāturāḥd ādhāvante nivāryante śūlahastair yatas tataḥd rujārditās tṛṣāyuktāḥ prāṇinaḥ pāpakāriṇaḥd krośantaś ca nadantaś ca na mucyante kathaṃ canad kṛmibhir bhakṣyamāṇāś ca vedanārtās tṛṣānvitāḥd saṃsmarantaḥ svakaṃ karma kṛtam ātmāparādhajamd śocantas tatra tiṣṭhanti yāvat pāpakṣayaṃ priyed evaṃ bhuktvā tu narakaṃ mucyante pāpasaṃkṣayātd umād bhagavan katikālaṃ te tiṣṭhante narakeṣu vaid maheśvaraḥd etad veditum icchāmi tan me brūhi maheśvarad śataṃ sahasraṃ varṣāṇām ādiṃ kṛtvā hi jantavaḥd umād tiṣṭhanti narakāvāsāḥ pralayāntam iti sthitiḥd maheśvaraḥd bhagavaṃs teṣu te kutra tiṣṭhantīti vada prabhod raurave śatasāhasraṃ varṣāṇām iti saṃsthitiḥd mānuṣaghnāḥ kṛtaghnāś ca tathaivānṛtavādinaḥd jāracorāś ca nārī ca sarvataś cāpacāriṇīd utkocakāś ca piśunā varṇasaṃbhedakārakāḥd tādṛśāḥ paripacyante raurave narake narāḥd deśaghnāś caiva rājaghnāḥ pitṛmātṛvighātinaḥd rājā cānyāyataḥ śāstā sākṣitve nṛtavādinaḥd bahughnāś ca kulaghnāś ca bhrūṇaghnā gurughātinaḥd viśvastaghātakāś caivam ātmaghnāḥ kopakāraṇātd patighnyaḥ pramadā mohād yajñavighnakarāś ca yed dvitīye dviguṇaṃ kālaṃ pacyante tādṛśāḥ narāḥd mahāpātakayuktās tu tṛtīye duḥkham āpnuyuḥd etāvan mānuṣasahaṃ param anyeṣu lakṣyated yakṣā vidyādharāś caiva kādraveyāś ca kiṃnarāḥd gandharvā bhūtasaṃghāś ca teṣāṃ pāpayutā bhṛśamd caturthe paripacyante yāvad yugaviparyayaḥd sahantas tādṛśaṃ ghoraṃ pañcakaṣṭe ca yādṛśamd tādṛgvidhasya duḥkhasya ayogyān viddhi mānuṣānd evaṃ te narakān bhuktvā tatra kṣapitakalmaṣāḥd narakebhyo vimuktāś ca jāyante kṛmijātiṣud udbhedajeṣu vā ke cit tatrāpi kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥd punar eva prajāyante mṛgapakṣiṣu śobhaned umād mṛgapakṣiṣu tad bhuktvā labhante mānuṣaṃ padamd nānājātiṣu kenaiva jāyante pāpakāriṇaḥd maheśvaraḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yat tvam icchasi bhāminid sarvathātmā karmavaśān nānājātiṣu dṛśyated yaś ca māṃsapriyo nityaṃ kaṅkagṛdhrān sa saṃspṛśetd surāpaḥ satataṃ martyaḥ sūkaratvaṃ vrajed dhruvamd abhakṣyabhakṣaṇo martyaḥ kākajātiṣu saṃspṛśetd parodvegakaro nityaṃ vyālajātiṣu jāyated ātmaghno yo naraḥ kopāt pretajātiṣu tiṣṭhatid paiśunyāt parivādāc ca kukkuṭatvaṃ samaśnuyātd nāstikaś caiva yo mūrkho mṛgajātiṃ sa gacchatid hiṃsāvihāras tu naraḥ kṛmikīṭeṣu jāyated atra mānayuto nityaṃ pretya gardabhatāṃ vrajetd asatyaṃ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ yo vaden matsyatāṃ vrajetd agamyāgamanāc caiva paradārābhimarśanātd mūṣikatvaṃ vrajen martyo nāsti tatra vicāraṇād kṛtaghno mitraghātī ca sṛgālavṛkajātiṣud gurughnaḥ pitṛghātī ca sthāvareṣv avatiṣṭhatid vācikaiḥ pakṣimṛgatāṃ mānasair anyajātitāmd śarīrajaiḥ karmadoṣair yāti sthāvaratāṃ naraḥd evamādy aśubhaṃ kṛtvā narā nirayam āśritāḥd tāṃs tān bhāvān prapadyante svakṛtasyaiva kāraṇātd evaṃ jātiṣu nirdagdhāḥ prāṇinaḥ pāpakāriṇaḥd kathaṃ cit punar utpadya labhante mānuṣaṃ padamd bahukṛtvo tisaṃtaptaṃ lohaṃ śucitamaṃ yathād bahuduḥkhābhisaṃtaptas tathātmā śudhyate malātd umād tasmāt sudurlabhaṃ ceti viddhi janma sumānuṣamd bhagavan devadeveśa śūlapāṇe vṛṣadhvajad śrutaṃ me paramaṃ guhyaṃ prasādāt te varapradad śrotuṃ bhūyo ham icchāmi prajānāṃ hitakāraṇātd śubhāśubham iti proktaṃ karma sarvaṃ samāsataḥd tan me vistaraśo brūhi śubhāśubhavidhiṃ pratid aśubhaṃ kīdṛśaṃ karma prāṇino dho nipātayetd śubhaṃ karma kathaṃ deva prajānām ūrdhvato nayetd etan me vada deveśa śrotukāmāsmi kīrtayad maheśvaraḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu śobhaned sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ceti dvividhaḥ karmavistaraḥd tayor yad duṣkṛtaṃ karma tac ca saṃjāyate tridhād manasā karmaṇā vācā buddhimohasamudbhavamd manaḥpūrvaṃ tu vākkarma vartate vāṅmayaṃ tataḥd jāyate vai kriyāyogam evaṃ ceṣṭākramaṃ priyed abhidroho bhyasūyā ca parārthe cakṣuṣā spṛhād śubhāśubhānāṃ martyānāṃ vartanaṃ viparītataḥd dharmakārye yad aśraddhā pāpakarmaṇi harṣaṇamd evamādy aśubhaṃ karma manasā pāpam ucyated anṛtaṃ yac ca paruṣam abaddhavacanaṃ kaṭud asatyaṃ parivādaś ca pāpam etat tu vāṅmayamd agamyāgamanaṃ caiva paradāraniṣevaṇamd vadhabandhaparikleśaiḥ paraprāṇopatāpanamd cauryaṃ pareṣāṃ dravyāṇāṃ haraṇaṃ nāśanaṃ tathād abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaṃ caiva vyasaneṣv abhiṣaṅgatād darpāt stambhābhimānāc ca pareṣām upatāpanamd akāryāṇāṃ ca karaṇam aśaucaṃ pānam eva cad dauḥśīlyaṃ kṣudrasaṃparkaḥ sāhāyyaṃ pāpakarmaṇid adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca kāryaṃ tasya niṣevaṇamd evamādy aśubhaṃ cānyac charīraṃ pāpam ucyated mānasād vāṅmayaṃ pāpaṃ viśiṣṭam iti vakṣyated vāṅmayād api vai pāpaṃ śārīraṃ gaṇyate bahud evaṃ pāpayutaṃ karma pātayet trividhaṃ naramd paropatāpajananam atyantaṃ pāpakaṃ smṛtamd dvividhaṃ tat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kartāraṃ narakaṃ nayetd pātakaṃ tv api yat karma karaṇād buddhipūrvakamd sāpadeśam avaśyaṃ tu kartavyam iti yat kṛtamd kathaṃ cit tat kṛtam api kartā tena na lipyated umād avaśyabhāvadeśena pratihanyeta kāraṇamd bhagavan pāpakaṃ karma yathā kṛtvā na lipyated maheśvaraḥd anṛtaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca tan me śaṃsitum arhasid yo naro naparādhī sann ātmaprāṇasya rakṣaṇātd śatrum udyataśastraṃ vā pūrvaṃ tena hato pi vād pratigatya naro hiṃsyān na sa pāpena lipyated corāṭavikasaṃtrastās tatpratīkāraceṣṭayād tān pratighnan naro hiṃsyān na sa pāpena lipyated vṛttighnaṃ tu naro hiṃsyān na sa pāpena lipyated grāmārthaṃ bhartṛpiṇḍārthaṃ dīnānugrahakāraṇātd vadhabandhaparikleśān kurvan pāpāt pramucyated durbhikṣe cātmavṛttyartham ekāyanagatas tathād akāryaṃ vāpy abhakṣyaṃ vā kṛtvā pāpair na lipyated vyādhito rogamokṣārtham abhakṣyeṇa na lipyated anṛtaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca dākṣiṇyāt strīṣu bhāṣitamd ātmaprāṇabhayād uktaṃ mokṣārthaṃ cāpy adhārmikātd vivāhakaraṇe caiva laukikenānṛtaṃ bruvand saṃstambhanārthaṃ trastānām anṛtena na lipyated vidhir eṣa gṛhasthānāṃ prāyeṇaivopadiśyated avācyaṃ vāpy akāryaṃ vā deśakālavaśena tud buddhipūrvaṃ naraḥ kurvaṃs tat prayojanamātrayād kiṃ cid vā lipyate pāpair atha vā na ca lipyated umād evaṃ devi vijānīhi nāsti tatra vicāraṇād bhagavan pānadoṣāṃś ca peyāpeyatvakāraṇamd maheśvaraḥd etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me vada maheśvarad hanta te kathayiṣyāmi pānotpattiṃ śucismited purā sarve bhavan martyā buddhimanto nayānugāḥd śucayaḥ subhagācārāḥ sarve sumanasaḥ priyed evaṃbhūte tadā loke preṣyatvaṃ na parasparamd preṣyābhāvān manuṣyāṇāṃ karmārambho nanāśa had ubhayor lokayor nāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā karmakṣayāt prabhuḥd yajñakarma kathaṃ loke varteteti pitāmahaḥd ājñāpayat surān devi mohayasveti mānuṣānd tamasaḥ sāram uddhṛtya pānaṃ buddhipraṇāśanamd nyapātayan manuṣyeṣu pāpadoṣāvahaṃ priyed tadāprabhṛti tat pītvā mumuhur mānuṣā bhuvid kāryākāryam ajānanto vācyāvācyaṃ guṇāguṇamd ke cid dhasanti tat pītvā prarudanti tathā pared nṛtyanti muditāḥ ke cid gāyanti ca śubhāśubhamd kalahaṃ kurvate bhīkṣṇaṃ praharanti parasparamd ke cid dhāvanti sahasā praskhalanti patanti cad ayuktaṃ bahu bhāṣante yatrakvacana śerated nagnā vikṣipya gātrāṇi naṣṭasaṃjñā mṛtā ivad evaṃ bahuvidhān pāpān kurvanti hṛtacetasaḥd ye pibanti mahāmohaṃ pānaṃ pāpayutā narāḥd dhṛtiṃ lajjāṃ ca buddhiṃ ca pānaṃ pītaṃ praṇāśayetd tasmān narāḥ saṃbhavanti nirlajjā nirapatrapāḥd buddhisattvaiḥ parikṣīṇās tejohīnā malānvitāḥd pītvā pītvā tṛṣāyuktāḥ pānapāḥ saṃbhavanti cad pānakāmāḥ pānakathāḥ pānakālābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥd pānārthaṃ karmavaśyās te saṃbhavanti narādhamāḥd pānakāmās tṛṣāyogād buddhisattvaparikṣayātd pānapānāṃ preṣyakarāḥ pānapās tv abhavan bhṛśamd tadāprabhṛti vai loke nīcaiḥ pānavaśair naraiḥd kārayanti ca karmāṇi buddhimantas tv apānapāḥd kārutvam atha dāsatvaṃ preṣyatām etya pānapāḥd sarvakarmakarāś cāsan paśuvad rajjubandhitāḥd pānapās tu madāndhatvāt tadā buddhipraṇāśanātd kāryākāryasya cājñānād yatheṣṭakaraṇāt svayamd viduṣām avidheyatvāt pāpam evābhipadyated paribhūto bhavel loke madyapo mitrabhedakaḥd sarvakālam aśuddhaś ca sarvabhakṣas tathābhavatd viśiṣṭair jñātibhir dveṣyaḥ satataṃ kalibhāvanaḥd kaṭukaṃ paruṣaṃ ghoraṃ vākyaṃ vadati sarvataḥd gurūn ativaden mattaḥ paradārān pradharṣayetd saṃvidaṃ kurute śauṇḍair na śṛṇoti hitaṃ kva citd evaṃ bahuvidhā doṣāḥ pānape santi śobhaned kevalaṃ narakaṃ yānti nāsti tatra vicāraṇād tasmāt tad varjitaṃ sadbhiḥ pānam ātmahitaiṣibhiḥd yadi pānaṃ na varjeran santaś cāritrakāraṇātd bhaved evaṃ jagat sarvaṃ nirmaryādaṃ ca niṣkriyamd tasmād buddher hi rakṣārthaṃ sadbhiḥ pānaṃ vivarjitamd iti te duṣkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ trividhaṃ kathitaṃ priyed maheśvaraḥd vidhānaṃ sukṛtasyāpi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu śucismited procyate tat tridhā devi sukṛta ca samāsataḥd yad auparamikaṃ caiva sukṛtaṃ nirupadravamd tathaiva sopakaraṇaṃ tāvatā sukṛtaṃ viduḥd nivṛttiḥ pāpakarmabhyas tad auparamikaṃ priyed manovākkāyajā doṣāḥ śṛṇu me varjanāc chubhamd traividhyadoṣoparame yas tu doṣavyapekṣayād sa tu prāpnoti sakalaṃ sarvaduṣkṛtavarjanātd vratavad varjayed doṣān yugapat pṛthag eva vād tathā dharmam avāpnoti doṣatyāgo hi duṣkaraḥd doṣasākalyasaṃtyāgān munir bhavati mānavaḥd saukaryaṃ paradharmasya kāryārambhād ṛte pi cad ātmanā sthāpanāmātrāl labhyate sukṛtaṃ paramd aho nṛśaṃsāḥ pacyante mānuṣāḥ svalpabuddhayaḥd ye tādṛśaṃ na budhyante ātmādhīnaṃ ca nirvyayamd duṣkṛtatyāgamātreṇa padam ūrdhvaṃ hi labhyated pāpabhīrutvamātreṇa doṣāṇāṃ parivarjanātd suśobhanaṃ bhaved devi kim u dharmavyapekṣayād ity auparamikaṃ devi sukṛtaṃ kathitaṃ tavad śrutāc ca vṛddhasaṃyogād indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahātd saṃtoṣāc ca dhṛteś caiva śakyate doṣavarjanamd tad eva yama ity āhur doṣasaṃyamanaṃ priyed yamadharmeṇa dharmo sti nānyaḥ śubhataraḥ śubhed yamadharmeṇa yatayaḥ prāpnuvanty uttamāṃ gatimd īśvarāṇāṃ prabhavatāṃ daridrāṇāṃ ca vai nṛṇāmd saphalo doṣasaṃtyāgo dānād api śubhād apid tapo dānaṃ mahādevi doṣam alpaṃ vinirdahetd sukṛtaṃ yāmikaṃ proktaṃ pathyaṃ nirupasādhanamd sukhābhisaṃdhir lokānāṃ satyaṃ śaucam athārjavamd vratopavāsaḥ prītiś ca brahmacaryaṃ damaḥ śamaḥd evamādi śubhaṃ karma sukṛtaṃ niyamāśritamd śṛṇu teṣāṃ viśeṣāṃś ca kīrtayiṣyāmi bhāminid satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya naur ivad nāsti satyāt paraṃ dānaṃ nāsti satyāt paraṃ tapaḥd yathā śrutaṃ yathā dṛṣṭam ātmanā yad yathā kṛtamd tathā tasyāvikāreṇa vacanaṃ satyalakṣaṇamd yac chalenābhisaṃyuktaṃ satyarūpaṃ mṛṣaiva tatd nityam eva pravaktavyaṃ pārāvaryaṃ vijānatād dīrghāyuś ca bhavet satyāt kulasaṃtānapālakaḥd lokasaṃsthitipālaś ca bhavet satyena mānavaḥd umād maheśvaraḥd kathaṃ saṃdhārayan martyo vrataṃ śubham avāpnuyātd pūrvam uktaṃ tu yat pāpaṃ manovākkāyakarmabhiḥd vratavat tasya saṃtyāgas tad auparamikaṃ vratamd tena dharmam avāpnoti vratavat paripālayand maṅgalaṃ śubhakarmāṇi vratenaiva samācaretd naro dharmam avāpnoti śubhasaṃjoṣaṇaṃ vratamd yad yad ātmapriyaṃ nityaṃ manovākkāyakarmabhiḥd vratavat tasya saṃtyāgas tapovratam iti sthitamd tyājyaṃ vā yadi vā joṣyam avratena vṛthā carand tathā phalaṃ na labhate tasmād dharmaṃ vratāc caretd śuddhakāyo naro bhūtvā snātvā tīrthe yathāvidhid pañca bhūtāni candrārkau saṃdhye dharmaṃ yamaṃ pitṝnd ātmanaivaṃ tathātmānaṃ nivedya vratavac caretd vratamā maraṇād vāpi kālacchedena vā caretd śākādiṣu vrataṃ kuryāt tathā puṣpaphalādiṣud brahmacaryaṃ vrataṃ kuryād upavāsaṃ tathā vratamd evam anyeṣu bahuṣu vrataṃ kāryaṃ hitaiṣiṇād vratabhaṅgo yathā na syād rakṣitavyaṃ tathā budhaiḥd vratabhaṅgo mahat pāpam iti viddhi śubhekṣaṇed auṣadhārthaṃ yad ajñānād gurūṇāṃ vacanād apid anugrahārthaṃ bandhūnāṃ vratabhaṅgo na duṣyated vratāpavargakāleṣu devabrāhmaṇapūjanamd umād nareṇa tu yathāśakti kāryaṃ siddhiṃ tathāpnuyātd maheśvaraḥd kathaṃ śaucavidhis tatra tan me śaṃsitum arhasid bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ ceti dvividhaṃ śaucam iṣyated mānasaṃ sukṛtaṃ yat tac chaucam ābhyantaraṃ smṛtamd sadāhāraviśuddhiś ca kāyaprakṣālanaṃ ca yatd bāhyaṃ śaucaṃ bhaved etat tathaivācamanādi cad mṛc caiva śuddhadeśasthā gośakṛnmūtram eva cad dravyāṇi gandhayuktāni yāni puṣṭikarāṇi cad etaiḥ saṃmārjayet kāyam ambhasā ca punaḥ punaḥd akṣobhyaṃ yat prakīrṇaṃ ca nityasrotaś ca yaj jalamd prāyaśas tādṛśe majjed anyathā cāpi varjayetd trir ācamanakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ niṣphenair nirmalair jalaiḥd tathā viṇmūtrayoḥ śuddhir adbhir bahumṛdā bhavetd tadaiva jalasaṃśuddhir yat saṃśuddhaṃ tu saṃspṛśetd śakṛtā bhūmiśuddhiḥ syāl lohānāṃ bhasmanā smṛtād takṣaṇaṃ gharṣaṇaṃ caiva dāravāṇāṃ viśodhanamd dahanaṃ mṛnmayānāṃ ca martyānāṃ kṛcchradhāraṇamd śeṣāṇāṃ devi sarveṣām ātapena jalena cad brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vākyena sadā saṃśodhanaṃ bhavetd aduṣṭam adbhir nirṇiktaṃ yac ca vācā praśasyated evam āpadi saṃśuddhir evaṃ śaucaṃ vidhīyated umād maheśvaraḥd āhāraśuddhis tu kathaṃ tan me vada mahāprabhod amāṃsamadyam akledyam aparyuṣitam eva cad atikaṭvamlalavaṇair hīnaṃ ca śubhagandhi cad kṛmikīṭamalair hīnaṃ saṃbhṛtaṃ śuddhabhājaned evaṃvidhaṃ sadāhāraṃ devabrāhmaṇasatkṛtamd śuddham ity eva vijñeyam anyathā tv aśubhaṃ bhavetd grāmyād āraṇyakaiḥ siddhaṃ śuddham ity avadhārayad atimātragṛhītāt tu alpadattaṃ bhavec chucid yajñaśeṣaṃ haviḥśeṣaṃ pitṛśeṣaṃ ca nirmalamd umād iti te kathitaṃ devi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid bhakṣayanty apare māṃsaṃ varjayanty apare bhuvid maheśvaraḥd tan me vada mahādeva bhakṣyābhakṣyasya kāraṇamd māṃsasya bhakṣaṇe doṣo yaś cāsyābhakṣaṇe guṇaḥd tad ahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi tan nibodha yathātathamd iṣṭaṃ dattam adhītaṃ ca kratavaś ca sadakṣiṇāḥd amāṃsabhakṣaṇasyaite kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīmd ātmārthaṃ yaḥ paraprāṇān hiṃsyāt svāduphalepsayād vyālagṛdhrasṛgālaiś ca rākṣasaiś ca samas tu saḥd yo vṛthānityamāṃsāśī sa pumān adhamo bhavetd tataḥ kaṣṭataraṃ nāsti svayam āhṛtya bhakṣaṇātd svamāṃsaṃ paramāṃsena yo vardhayitum icchatid udvignavāsaṃ labhate yatra yatropajāyated saṃchedanaṃ svamāṃsasya yathā saṃjanayed rujamd tathaiva paramāṃse pi veditavyaṃ vijānatād yas tu sarvāṇi māṃsāni yāvajjīvaṃ na bhakṣayetd sa svarge vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥd yas tu varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ tapyate paramaṃ tapaḥd yaś cāpi varjayen māṃsaṃ samam etan na vā samamd na hi prāṇaiḥ priyatamaṃ loke kiṃ cana vidyated tasmāt prāṇidayā kāryā yathātmani tathā pared sarve yajñā na tat kuryuḥ sarve vedāś ca bhāminid yan māṃsarasam āsvādya punar māṃsāni varjayetd dharmyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahatd ity evaṃ munayaḥ prāhur māṃsasyābhakṣaṇe guṇānd evaṃ bahuguṇaṃ devi nṛṇāṃ māṃsavivarjanamd na śaknuyād yadā jīvaṃs tyaktuṃ māṃsaṃ kathaṃ canad tripuṇyamāsamātraṃ vā varjanīyaṃ viśeṣataḥd na śaknuyād api tathā kaumudīmāsam eva cad janmanakṣatratithiṣu sadā parvasu rātriṣud varjanīyaṃ tathā māṃsaṃ paratra hitam icchatād aśaktaḥ kāraṇān martyo bhoktum icched vidhiṃ śṛṇud anena vidhinā khādan kalmaṣeṇa na lipyated sūnāyāṃ ca gataprāṇaṃ krītvā nyāyena bhāminid brāhmaṇātithipūjārthaṃ bhoktavyaṃ hitam icchatād bhaiṣajyakāraṇād vyādhau khādan pāpair na lipyated pitṛśeṣaṃ tathaivāśnan māṃsaṃ nāśubham ṛcchatid umād maheśvaraḥd gurupūjā kathaṃ deva kriyate dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥd gurupūjāṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat tava śobhaned kṛtajñānāṃ paro dharma iti vedānuśāsanamd tasmāt svaguravaḥ pūjyās te hi pūrvopakāriṇaḥd gurūṇāṃ ca garīyāṃsas trayo lokeṣu pūjitāḥd upādhyāyaḥ pitā mātā saṃpūjyās te viśeṣataḥd ye pitṛbhrātaro jyeṣṭhā ye ca tasyānujās tathād pituḥ pitā ca sarve te pūjanīyā yathā pitād mātur yā bhaginī jyeṣṭhā mātur yā ca yavīyasīd mātāmahī ca dhātrī ca sarvās tā mātaraḥ smṛtāḥd upādhyāyasya yaḥ putro yaś ca tasya bhaved guruḥd ṛtvig guruḥ pitā ceti guravaḥ parikīrtitāḥd jyeṣṭho bhrātā narendraś ca mātulaḥ śvaśuras tathād bhayatrātā ca bhartā ca guravas te prakīrtitāḥd ity eṣa kathitaḥ svargyo gurūṇāṃ sarvasaṃgrahaḥd anuvṛttiṃ ca pūjāṃ ca teṣām api nibodha med avadhyau mātṛpitarau upādhyāyas tathaiva cad kathaṃ cin nāvamantavyā nareṇa hitam icchatād yena prīṇāti ca pitā tena prītaḥ prajāpatiḥd yena prīṇāti cen mātā prītāḥ syur devamātaraḥd yena prīṇāty upādhyāyo brahmā tenābhipūjitaḥd aprīteṣu punas teṣu naro narakam eti hid gurūṇāṃ vairanirbandho na kartavyaḥ kathaṃ canad narakaṃ sa guruprītyā manasāpi na gacchatid na brūyād vipriyaṃ teṣām aniṣṭe na pravartayetd vigṛhya na vadet teṣāṃ samīpe spardhayā kva citd yad yad icchanti te kartum asvatantras tad ācaretd vedānuśāsanasamaṃ guruśāsanam iṣyated kalahāṃś ca vivādāṃś ca gurubhiḥ saha varjayetd kaitavaṃ parihāsāṃś ca manyukāmāśrayāḥ kathāḥd gurūṇāṃ yo nahaṃvādī karoty ājñām atandritaḥd na tasmāt sarvamartyeṣu vidyate puṇyakṛttamaḥd asūyām apavādāṃś ca gurūṇāṃ parivarjayetd teṣāṃ priyahitānveṣī bhūtvā paricaret sadād na tad yajñaphalaṃ kuryāt tapo vācaritaṃ mahatd yat kuryāt puruṣasyeha gurupūjā sadā kṛtād anuvṛtter vinā dharmo nāsti sarvāśrameṣv apid tasmāt samādṛtaḥ kāle guruvṛttiṃ samācaretd svam arthaṃ svaśarīraṃ ca gurvarthaṃ saṃtyajed budhaḥd vivādaṃ dhanahetor vā mohād vā tair na rocayetd brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca dānāni vividhāni cad gurubhiḥ pratiṣiddhasya sarvam etad apārthakamd upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cad ye bhidruhyur manasā karmaṇā vād teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃd tebhyo nānyaḥ pāpakṛd asti loked umād maheśvaraḥd upavāsavidhiṃ tatra tan me śaṃsitum arhasid śarīramalakārśyārtham indriyocchoṣaṇāya cad ekabhuktopavāsais tu dhārayante vrataṃ narāḥd labhante vipulaṃ dharmaṃ tathāhāraparikṣayātd bahūnām uparodhaṃ tu na kuryād ātmakāraṇātd jīvopaghātaṃ ca tathā dhānyaṃ saṃjīvyam iṣyated tasmāt puṇyaṃ labhen martyaḥ svayam āhārakarśanātd tad gṛhasthair yathāśakti kartavyam iti niścayaḥd upavāsārdite kāya āpadarthaṃ payo jalamd umād bhuñjan na vrataghātī syād brāhmaṇān anumānya cad brahmacaryaṃ kathaṃ deva rakṣitavyaṃ vijānatād maheśvaraḥd tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitād brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ śaucaṃ brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tapaḥd kevalaṃ brahmacaryeṇa prāpyate paramaṃ padamd saṃkalpād darśanāc caiva tad yuktavacanād apid saṃsparśād atha saṃyogāt pañcadhā rakṣitaṃ paramd vratavad dhāritaṃ caiva brahmacaryam akalmaṣamd nityasaṃrakṣaṇaṃ tasya naiṣṭhikānāṃ vidhīyated tad iṣyate gṛhasthānāṃ kālam uddiśya kāraṇamd janmanakṣatrayogeṣu puṇyavāseṣu parvasud devatādharmakāryeṣu brahmacaryavrataṃ caretd brahmacaryavrataphalaṃ labhed dāravratī sadād śaucam āyus tathārogyaṃ labhyate brahmacāribhiḥd umād tīrthacaryā kathaṃ deva kriyate dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥd maheśvaraḥd kāni tīrthāni lokeśa tan me śaṃsitum arhasid hanta te kathayiṣyāmi tīrthasnānavidhiṃ priyed pāvanārthaṃ ca śaucārthaṃ brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purād yās tu loke mahānadyas tāḥ sarvās tīrthasaṃjñitāḥd tāsāṃ prāk srotasaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ saṃgamaś ca parasparamd tāsāṃ sāgarasaṃyogo variṣṭhaś ceti vidyated tāsām ubhayataḥ kūlaṃ yatra tatra maharṣibhiḥd devair vā sevitaṃ devi tat tīrthaṃ paramaṃ smṛtamd samudraś ca mahātīrthaṃ pāvanaṃ paramaṃ śubhamd tasya kūlagatās tīrthā mahadbhiś ca samāplutāḥd srotasāṃ parvatānāṃ ca joṣitānāṃ maharṣibhiḥd api kūpataṭākaṃ vā munibhiḥ sevitaṃ priyed tat tu tīrtham iti jñeyaṃ prabhāvāt tu tapasvināmd tadāprabhṛti tīrthatvaṃ lebhe lokahitāya vaid evaṃ tīrthodbhavaṃ viddhi tasya snānavidhiṃ śṛṇud tanmanā vratabhūyiṣṭho gatvā tīrthābhikāṅkṣayād upavāsatrayaṃ kuryād ekaṃ vā niyamānvitaḥd puṇyamāsayute kāle paurṇamāsyāṃ yathāvidhid bahir eva śucir bhūtvā tat tīrthaṃ tanmanāviśetd trir āplutya jalābhyāśe dattvā brāhmaṇadakṣiṇāmd abhyarcya devāyatanaṃ tataḥ prāyād yathāgatamd etad vidhānaṃ sarveṣāṃ pātrabhūtaṃ tu dūrastham abhigamya prasādya cad dātā dānaṃ tathā dadyād yathā tuṣyeta tena saḥd eṣa dānavidhiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ samāhūya tu madhyamaḥd pūrvaṃ ca pātratāṃ jñātvā samāhūya nivedya cad śaucārcanasamāyuktaṃ dātavyaṃ śraddhayā priyed yācitṝṇāṃ tu paramam ābhimukhyapuraskṛtamd saṃmānapūrvaṃ saṃgṛhya dātavyaṃ deśakālayoḥd apātrebhyo pi cānyebhyo dātavyaṃ bhūtim icchatād pātrāṇi saṃparīkṣyaiva dātā vai dānamātrayoḥd atiśaktyā paraṃ dānaṃ yathāśakti tu madhyamamd tṛtīyaṃ cāparaṃ dānaṃ nānurūpam ivātmanaḥd yathāsaṃbhāvitaṃ pūrvaṃ dātavyaṃ tat tathaiva cad puṇyakṣetreṣu yad dattaṃ puṇyakāleṣu vā tathād umād tac chobhanataraṃ viddhi gauravād deśakālayoḥd yaś ca puṇyatamo deśas tathā kālaś ca śaṃsa med maheśvaraḥd kurukṣetraṃ mahānadyo yac ca devarṣisevitamd girir varaś ca phalamd bhagavan kāni deyāni dharmam uddiśya mānavaiḥd maheśvaraḥd tāny ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tan me śaṃsitum arhasid ajasraṃ dharmakāryaṃ ca tathā naimittikaṃ priyed annaṃ pratiśrayo dīpaḥ pānīyaṃ tṛṇam indhanamd sneho gandhaś ca bhaiṣajyaṃ tilāś ca lavaṇaṃ tathād evamādi tathānyac ca dānam ājasram ucyated ajasradānāt satatam ājasram iti niścitamd sāmānyaṃ sarvavarṇānāṃ dānaṃ śṛṇu samāhitād nandanti suvṛṣṭyā karṣakā ivad putro vā yasya pautro vā śrotriyān bhojayiṣyatid api caṇḍālaśūdrāṇām annadānān na garhyated tasmāt sarvaprayatnena dadyād annam amatsaraḥd kalatraṃ pīḍayitvāpi poṣayed vaiḍūryārciḥprakāśāni rukmarūpyanibhāni cad nānāsaṃsthānarūpāṇi nānāratnamayāni cad candramaṇḍalaśubhrāṇi kiṅkiṇījālavanti cad taruṇādityavarṇāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi cad yatheṣṭabhakṣyabhojyāni svargyaṃ svastyayanaṃ mahatd tasmāt tad varṇayiṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥd api pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ krūraṃ dattaṃ rukmaṃ praṇāśayetd suvarṇaṃ ye prayacchanti śrotriyebhyaḥ sucetasaḥd devatās te tarpayanti samastā iti vaidikamd agnir hi devatāḥ sarvāḥ suvarṇaṃ cāgnir ucyated tasmāt suvarṇadānena dattāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥd agnyabhāve tu kurvanti vahnisthāneṣu kāñcanamd tasmāt suvarṇadātāraḥ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyuḥd ādityasya hutāśasya lokān nānāvidhāñ śubhānd kāñcanaṃ saṃpradāyāśu praviśanti na saṃśayaḥd alaṃkārakṛtaṃ cāpi kevalāt praviśiṣyated sauvarṇair brāhmaṇān kāle tair alaṃkṛtya bhojayetd etat paramakaṃ dānaṃ dattvāsau varṇam adbhutamd dyutiṃ medhāṃ vapuḥ kīrtiṃ punar jāte labhed dhruvamd tasmāt svaśaktyā dātavyaṃ kāñcanaṃ bhuvi mānavaiḥd na hy etasmāt paraṃ lokeṣv anyat pāvanam ucyated ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi gavāṃ dānam anindited na hi gobhyaḥ paraṃ dānaṃ vidyate jagati priyed lokān sisṛkṣuṇā pūrvaṃ gāvaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvād vṛttyarthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmāt tā mātaraḥ smṛtāḥd lokajyeṣṭhā lokavṛttyāṃ pravṛttād mayy āyattāḥ somaviṣyandabhūtāḥd saumyāḥ puṇyāḥ kāmadāḥ prāṇadāś cad tasmāt pūjyāḥ puṇyakāmair manuṣyaiḥd dhenuṃ hi dattvā nibhṛtām arogāṃd kalyāṇavatsāṃ ca payasvinīṃ cad yāvanti lomāni bhavanti tasyāsd tāvat samāḥ svargaphalāni bhuṅkted prayacchate yaḥ kapilāṃ sacelāṃd kāṃsyopadohāṃ kanakāgraśṛṅgīmd putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca kulaṃ ca sarvamd āsaptamaṃ tārayate paratrad antarjātāḥ krītakā dyūtalabdhāḥd prāṇakrītāḥ sodakāś caujasā vād kṛcchrotsṛṣṭāḥ poṣaṇārthāgatāś cad dvārair etais tāḥ pralabdhāḥ pradadyātd kṛśāya bahuputrāya śrotriyāyāhitāgnayed pradāya nīrujāṃ dhenuṃ lokān prāpnoty anuttamānd nṛśaṃsasya kṛtaghnasya lubdhasyānṛtavādinaḥd havyakavyavyapetasya na dadyād gāḥ kathaṃ canad samānavatsāṃ yo dadyād dhenuṃ vipre payasvinīmd suvastrāṃ vastrasaṃdānāṃ somaloke mahīyated samānavatsāṃ yo dhenuṃ kṛṣṇāṃ dadyāt payasvinīmd suvṛttāṃ vastrasaṃdānāṃ lokān prāpnoty apāṃ pateḥd samānavatsāṃ yo dhenuṃ dadyād gaurīṃ payasvinīmd suvṛttāṃ vastrasaṃdānām agniloke mahīyated hiraṇyavarṇāṃ piṅgākṣīṃ savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanāmd pradāya vastrasaṃdānāṃ yāti kauberasadma saḥd vāyureṇusavarṇāṃ tu savatsāṃ kāṃsyadohanāmd pradāya vastrasaṃdānāṃ vāyuloke mahīyated yuvānaṃ balinaṃ śyāmaṃ śatena saha yūthapamd gavendraṃ brāhmaṇendrāya bhūriśṛṅgam alaṃkṛtamd ṛṣabhaṃ ye prayacchanti śrotriyāṇāṃ mahātmanāmd aiśvaryam abhijāyante jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥd gavāṃ mūtrapurīṣāṇi nodvijeta kadā canad na cāsāṃ māṃsam aśnīyād goṣu bhaktaḥ sadā bhavetd grāsamuṣṭiṃ paragave dadyāt saṃvatsaraṃ śuciḥd akṛtvā svayam āhāraṃ vrataṃ tat sārvakāmikamd gavām ubhayataḥkāle nityaṃ svastyayanaṃ vadetd na cāsāṃ cintayet pāpam iti dharmavido viduḥd gāvaḥ pavitraṃ paramaṃ goṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥd kathaṃ cin nāvamantavyā gāvo lokasya mātaraḥd tasmād eva gavāṃ dānaṃ viśiṣṭam iti kathyated goṣu pūjā ca bhaktiś ca narasyāyuṣyam āvahetd ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi bhūmidānaṃ mahāphalamd bhūmidānasamaṃ dānaṃ na kilāstīti niścayaḥd gṛhayuk kṣetrayug vāpi bhūmibhāgaḥ pradīyated sukhabhogyaṃ nirākrośaṃ vāstupūrvaṃ prakalpya cad grahītāram alaṃkṛtya vastrapuṣpānulepanaiḥd sabhṛtyaṃ saparīvāraṃ bhojayitvā yatheṣṭataḥd yo dadyād dakṣiṇākāle trir adbhir gṛhyatām itid evaṃ bhūmyāṃ pradattāyāṃ śraddhayā vītamatsaraiḥd yāvat tiṣṭhati sā bhūmis tāvat tasya phalaṃ viduḥd bhūmidaḥ svargam āruhya ramate śāśvatīḥ samāḥd acalā hy akṣayā bhūmiḥ sarvān kāmān dudhukṣatid yad yac ca kurute pāpaṃ puruṣo vṛttikarśitaḥd api gokarṇamātreṇa bhūmidānena mucyated suvarṇarajataṃ vastraṃ maṇimuktāvasūni cad sarvam etan mahāprājñe bhūmidāne pratiṣṭhitamd bhartur niḥśreyase yuktās tyaktātmāno raṇe hatāḥd brahmalokāya saṃsiddhā nātikrāmanti bhūmidamd halakṛṣṭāṃ mahīṃ dadyād yaḥ sabījaphalānvitāmd sakūpaśaraṇāṃ vāpi sā bhavet sarvakāmadād niṣpannasasyāṃ pṛthivīṃ yo dadāti dvijanmanāmd vimuktaḥ kaluṣaiḥ sarvaiḥ śakralokaṃ sa gacchatid yathā janitrī kṣīreṇa svaputram abhivardhayetd evaṃ sarvaphalair bhūmir dātāram abhivardhayetd brāhmaṇaṃ vṛttasaṃpannam āhitāgniṃ śucivratamd grāhayitvā nijāṃ bhūmiṃ na yāti yamasādanamd yathā candramaso vṛddhir ahany ahani dṛśyated tathā bhūmikṛtaṃ dānaṃ sasye sasye vivardhated yathā bījāni rohanti prakīrṇāni mahītaled tathā kāmāḥ prarohanti bhūmidānaguṇārjitāḥd pitaraḥ pitṛlokasthā devatāś ca divi sthitāḥd saṃtarpayanti bhogais taṃ yo dadāti vasuṃdharāmd dīrghāyuṣṭvam arogatvaṃ sphītāṃ ca śriyam uttamāmd paratra labhate martyaḥ saṃpradāya vasuṃdharāmd etat sarvaṃ mayoddiṣṭaṃ bhūmidānasya yat phalamd śraddadhānair narair nityaṃ śrāvyam etat sanātanamd ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kanyādānaṃ yathāvidhid kanyā deyā tathā devi pareṣām ātmano pi vād kanyāṃ śuddhavratācārāṃ kularūpasamanvitāmd yasmai ditsati pātrāya tenāpi bhṛśakāmitāmd prathamaṃ tat samākalpya bandhubhiḥ kṛtaniścayamd kārayitvā gṛhaṃ pūrvaṃ dāsīdāsaparicchadaiḥd gṛhopakaraṇaṃ caiva śuddhadhānyena saṃyutamd dārārthine tadarhāya kanyāṃ tāṃ samalaṃkṛtāmd savivāhaṃ yathānyāyaṃ prayacched agnisākṣikamd vṛttyāyatiṃ tathā kṛtvā sadgṛhe tau niveśayetd evaṃ kṛtvā vadhūdānaṃ tasya dānasya gauravātd pretyabhāve mahīyeta svargaloke yathāsukhamd punarjātau ca saubhāgyaṃ kulavṛddhiṃ tathāpnuyātd vidyādānaṃ tathā devi pātrabhūtāya vai dadatd svayaṃdattena tulyaṃ syād iti viddhi śubhānaned evaṃ te kathitāny eva mahādānāni bhāminid tvatpriyārthaṃ mahādevi bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid umād bhagavan devadeveśa kathaṃ deyaṃ tilānvitamd maheśvaraḥd tasya tasya phalaṃ brūhi dattasya ca kṛtasya cad tilakalpavidhiṃ devi tvaṃ me śṛṇu samāhitād samṛddhair asamṛddhair vā tilā deyā viśeṣataḥd tilāḥ pavitrāḥ pāpaghnāḥ supuṇyā iti saṃsmṛtāḥd nyāyatas tu tilāñ śuddhān saṃbhṛtyātha svaśaktitaḥd tilarāśiṃ punaḥ kuryāt parvatābhaṃ saratnakamd mahāntaṃ yadi vā stokaṃ nānādravyasamāyutamd suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ ca maṇimuktāpravālakaiḥd alaṃkṛtya yathāyogaṃ sapatākaṃ savedikamd sabhūṣaṇaṃ savastraṃ ca śayanāsanasaṃyutamd prāyaśaḥ kaumudīmāse paurṇamāsyāṃ viśeṣataḥd bhojayitvā ca vidhivad brāhmaṇān arhato bahūnd svayaṃ kṛtvopavāsaṃ ca vṛttaśaucasamanvitaḥd dadyāt pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tilarāśiṃ sadakṣiṇamd ekasya vā bahūnāṃ vā dātavyaṃ bhūtim icchatād tasya dānaphalaṃ devi agniṣṭomena saṃmitamd kevalaṃ vā tilair eva bhūmau kṛtvā gavākṛtimd saratnakaṃ savastraṃ ca puṃsā godānakāṅkṣiṇād tad arhāya pradātavyaṃ tasya godānavat phalamd śarāvāṃs tilasaṃpūrṇān sahiraṇyān sacampakānd jalair dadad brāhmaṇāya sa puṇyaphalabhāg bhavetd evaṃ tilamayaṃ deyaṃ nareṇa hitam icchatād nānādānaphalaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu devi samāhitād balam āyuṣyam ārogyam annadānāl labhen naraḥd pānīyadas tu saubhāgyaṃ rasajñānaṃ labhen naraḥd vastradānād vapuḥśobhām alaṃkāraṃ labhen naraḥd dīpado buddhivaimalyaṃ dyutiṃ śobhāṃ labhet punaḥd rājapīḍāvimokṣaṃ tac chatrado labhate phalamd dāsīdāsapradānāt tu bhavet karmāntabhāṅ naraḥd dāsīdāsaṃ ca vividhaṃ labhet pretya guṇānvitamd yānāni vāhanaṃ caiva tadarhāya dadan naraḥd pādarogaparikleśān muktaś cotsāhavān bhavetd vicitraṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca labhate yānavāhanamd pratiśrayapradānāc ca tadarhāya tad icchated varṣakāle tu rātrau ca labhet pakṣabalaṃ śubhamd setukūpataṭākānāṃ kartā tu labhate naraḥd dīrghāyuṣṭvaṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ tathā pretyāyatīṃ śubhāmd vṛkṣapaṅktikaro yas tu cchāyāpuṣpaphalapradaḥd pretyabhāve labhet puṇyam abhigamyo bhaven naraḥd yas tu saṃkramakṛl loke nadīṣu jalatāriṇāmd labhet puṇyaphalaṃ pretya vyasanebhyo vimokṣaṇamd mārgakṛt satataṃ martyo bhavet saṃtānavān punaḥd kāyadoṣavimuktas tu tīrthakṛt satataṃ bhavetd auṣadhānāṃ pradātā ca satataṃ kṛpayānvitaḥd bhaved vyādhivihīnaś ca dīrghāyuś ca viśeṣataḥd anāthān poṣayed yas tu kṛpaṇāndhakapaṅgukānd sa tu puṇyaphalaṃ pretya labhate kṛcchramokṣaṇamd devagoṣṭhān sabhāḥ śālā bhikṣūṇāṃ ca pratiśrayamd yaḥ kuryāl labhate nityaṃ naraḥ pretya phalaṃ śubhamd prāsādavāsaṃ vividhaṃ pakṣaśobhāṃ labhen naraḥd vividhaṃ vividhākāraṃ bhakṣyabhojyaguṇānvitamd ramyaṃ sadaiva govāṭaṃ yaḥ kuryāl labhate naraḥd pretyabhāve śubhāṃ jātiṃ vyādhimokṣaṃ tathaiva cad umād evaṃ nānāvidhaṃ dravyaṃ dātā kartā labhet phalamd kṛtaṃ dattaṃ yathā yāvat tasya yal labhate phalamd maheśvaraḥd etan me vada deveśa tatra kautūhalaṃ mahatd pretyabhāve śṛṇu phalaṃ dattasya ca kṛtasya cad dānaṃ vā ṣaḍguṇayutaṃ tadarhāya yathāvidhid yathāvibhavato dānaṃ dātavyam iti mānavaiḥd buddhim āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ kulaṃ bhāgyaṃ tathāgamamd rūpeṇa saptadhā bhūtvā mānuṣyaṃ phalati dhruvamd idaṃ dattam idaṃ me syād ity evaṃ phalakāṅkṣayād yad dattaṃ tat tad eva syān na tu kiṃ cana labhyated dhruvaṃ devy uttame dāne madhyame tv adhame phalamd umād bhagavan devadeveśa viśiṣṭaṃ yajñam ucyated maheśvaraḥd laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ caiva tan me śaṃsitum arhasid devatānāṃ ca saṃpūjā yajñeṣv eva samāhitād yajñā vedeṣv adhīnāś ca vedā brāhmaṇasaṃyutāḥd idaṃ tu sakalaṃ dravyaṃ divi vā bhuvi vā priyed yajñārthaṃ viddhi tat sṛṣṭaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayād evaṃ vijñāya tatkartā sadāraḥ satataṃ dvijaḥd pretyabhāve labhel lokān brahmakarmasamādhinād brāhmaṇeṣv api tad brahma nityaṃ devi samāhitamd tasmād viprair yathāśāstraṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇād yajñakarma kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ devatā abhitarpayetd brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś caiva yajñārhāḥ prāyaśaḥ smṛtāḥd agniṣṭomādibhir yajñair vedeṣu parikalpitaiḥd suśuddhair yajamānaiś ca ṛtvigbhiś ca yathāvidhid śuddhair dravyopakaraṇair yaṣṭavyam iti niścayaḥd tathā kṛteṣu yajñeṣu devānāṃ toṣaṇaṃ bhavetd tuṣṭeṣu devasaṃgheṣu yajvā yajñaphalaṃ labhetd devāḥ saṃtoṣitā yajñair lokān saṃvardhayanty utad ubhayor lokayor bhūtir devi yajñaiḥ pradṛśyated tasmād yajvā divaṃ gatvā amaraiḥ saha modated nāsti yajñasamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti yajñasamo nidhiḥd sarvadharmasamuddeśo devi yajñe samāhitaḥd eṣā yajñakṛtā pūjā laukikīm aparāṃ śṛṇud devasatkāram uddiśya kriyante laukikotsavāḥd devagoṣṭhān hi saṃskṛtya cotsavaṃ yaḥ karoti vaid yāgān devopahārāṃś ca śucir bhūtvā yathāvidhid devān saṃtoṣayitvā sa devi dharmam avāpnuyātd gandhamālyaiś ca vividhaiḥ paramānnena dhūpanaiḥd bahubhiḥ stutibhiś caiva stuvantaḥ prayatā narāḥd nṛttair vādyaiś ca gāndharvair anyair dṛṣṭivilobhanaiḥd devasatkāram uddiśya kurvate ye narā bhuvid teṣāṃ bhaktikṛtenaiva satkāreṇābhipūjitāḥd tathaiva toṣaṃ saṃyānti devi devās triviṣṭaped mānuṣair aparair vāpi śucibhis tatparāyaṇaiḥd brahmacaryaparair etat kṛtaṃ dharmaphalaṃ bhavetd kevalaiḥ stutibhir devi gandhamālyasamāyutaiḥd prayataiḥ śuddhagātrais tu śuddhadeśe supūjitāḥd saṃtoṣaṃ yānti vai devā bhaktaiḥ saṃpūjitās tathād umād devān saṃtoṣayitvaiva devi dharmam avāpnuyātd triviṣṭapasthā vai devā bhūmau mānuṣaceṣṭitamd maheśvaraḥd kathaṃ jñāsyanti vividhaṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi yathā tair vidyate priyed prāṇināṃ tu śarīreṣu antarātmā vyavasthitaḥd ātmānaṃ paramaṃ devam iti viddhi śubhekṣaṇed ātmā manovyavasthānāt sarvaṃ vetti śubhāśubhamd ātmaiva devās tad vidyur avyagramanasaḥ kṛtamd satāṃ manovyavasthānāc chubhaṃ bhavati vai nṛṇāmd tasmād devābhisaṃpūjā pitṛpūjā tathaiva cad yajñāś ca dharmakāryāṇi gurupūjāś ca śobhaned śuddhagātrair vṛttayuktais tanmayais tatparāyaṇaiḥd evaṃ vyavasthitair nityaṃ kartavyam iti niścayaḥd evaṃ kṛtvā śubhākāṅkṣī paratreha ca modated anyathā mana āveśya kṛtaṃ na phalati priyed umād ṛte pi tu mano devi aśubhaṃ phalati dhruvamd pitṛmedhaḥ kathaṃ deva tan me śaṃsitum arhasid sarveṣāṃ pitaraḥ pūjyāḥ sarvasaṃpatpradāyinaḥd maheśvaraḥd pitṛmedhaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat tanmanāḥ śṛṇud deśakālau vidhānaṃ ca tatkriyāyāḥ śubhāśubhamd lokeṣu pitaraḥ pūjyā devatānāṃ ca devatāḥd śucayo nirmalāḥ puṇyā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥd yathā vṛṣṭiṃ pratīkṣante bhūmiṣṭhāḥ sarvajantavaḥd pitaraś ca tathā loke pitṛmedhaṃ śubhekṣaṇed tasya deśāḥ kurukṣetraṃ gayā gaṅgā sarasvatīd prabhāsaṃ puṣkaraṃ ceti teṣu dattaṃ mahāphalamd tīrthāni saritaḥ puṇyā viviktāni vanāni cad nadīnāṃ pulinānīti deśāḥ śrāddhasya pūjitāḥd maghāprauṣṭhapadau māsau śrāddhakarmaṇi pūjitaud pakṣayoḥ kṛṣṇapakṣaś ca pūrvapakṣāt praśasyated amāvāsyāṃ trayodaśyāṃ navamyāṃ pratipatsu cad tithiṣv etāsu tuṣyanti datteneha pitāmahāḥd pūrvāhṇe śuklapakṣe vā rātrau janmadineṣu vād yugmeṣv ahaḥsu ca śrāddhaṃ na ca kurvīta paṇḍitaḥd eṣa kālo mayā proktaḥ pitṛmedhasya pūjitaḥd yasmin vā brāhmaṇaṃ pātraṃ paśyet kālaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥd apāṅkteyā dvijā varjyā grāhyās te paṅktipāvanāḥd pūjayed yadi pāpiṣṭhāñ śrāddheṣu narakaṃ vrajetd vṛttaśrutakulopetān sakalatrān guṇānvitānd tadarhāñ śrotriyān viddhi brāhmaṇān ayujaḥ śubhed etān nimantrayed vidvān pūrvedyuḥ prātar eva vād tatra śrāddhakriyāṃ paścād ārabheta yathāvidhid trīṇi śrāddhe pavitrāṇi dauhitraḥ kutapas tilāḥd trīṇi cātra praśaṃsanti śaucam akrodham atvarāmd kutapasya ca lomāni kuśā darbhās tilā madhud nīlaśākaṃ gajacchāyā pavitraṃ śrāddhakarmasud tilān avakiret tatra nānāvarṇān samantataḥd aśuddhaṃ pitṛyajñeṣu tilaiḥ śudhyati śobhaned nīlakāṣāyavastraṃ ca bhinnakarṇaṃ navavraṇamd hīnāṅgam aśuciṃ vāpi varjayet tatra dūrataḥd kukkuṭāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca nagnaṃ klībaṃ rajasvalāmd āyasaṃ trapu sīsaṃ ca śrāddhakarmaṇi varjayetd māṃsaiḥ prīṇanti pitaro mudgamāṣayavair ihad śaśarauravamāṃsena ṣaṇmāsaṃ tṛptir iṣyated saṃvatsaraṃ ca gavyena haviṣā pāyasena cad vārdhrāṇasasya māṃsena tṛptir dvādaśavārṣikīd ānantyāya bhaved dattaṃ khaḍgamāṃsaṃ pitṛkṣayed pāyasaṃ satilaṃ kṣaudraṃ khaḍgamāṃsena saṃmitamd mahāśaphariṇo matsyāś chāgo vā sarvalohitaḥd kālaśākakam ity eva tadānantyaṃ prakīrtitamd sāpūpaṃ sāmiṣaṃ snigdham āhāram upakalpayetd upakalpya tadāhāraṃ brāhmaṇān arcayet tataḥd śmaśrukarmaśiraḥsnātān samāropyāsanaṃ kramātd sugandhamālyābharaṇaiḥ sragbhir etān vibhūṣayetd alaṃkṛtopaviṣṭāṃs tān piṇḍāvāpaṃ nivedayetd tataḥ prastīrya darbhāṇāṃ prastaraṃ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥd tatsamīpe gnibhiddhvā ca svadhāṃ ca juhuyāt tataḥd samīpe tv agnīṣomābhyāṃ pitṛbhyo juhuyāt tathād tato darbheṣu piṇḍāṃs trīn nivaped dakṣiṇāmukhamd apasavyam apāṅguṣṭhaṃ nāmadheyapuraskṛtamd etena vidhinā dattaṃ pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ bhavetd tato viprān yathākāmaṃ pūjayen niyataḥ śuciḥd sadakṣiṇaṃ sasaṃbhāraṃ yathā tuṣyanti te dvijāḥd yatra tat kriyate karma paitṛke brāhmaṇān pratid tat sarvam akhilaṃ kuryād vaiśvadevasya pūrvakamd aśrūn na pātayet tatra na jalpen na japen mithaḥd niyamya vācaṃ dehaṃ ca śrāddhakarma samārabhetd tato nirvapaṇe vṛtte tān piṇḍāṃs tadantaramd brāhmaṇo gnirajo gaur vā bhakṣayed apsu vā kṣipetd patnīṃ vā madhyamaṃ piṇḍaṃ putrakāmo hi prāśayetd ādhatta pitaro garbhaṃ kumāraṃ puṣkarasrajamd tṛptān utthāpya tān viprān annaśeṣaṃ nivedayetd taccheṣaṃ bahubhiḥ paścāt sabhṛtyo bhakṣayen naraḥd eṣa proktaḥ samāsena pitṛyajñaḥ sanātanaḥd pitaras tena tuṣyanti kartā ca phalam āpnuyātd ahany ahani vā kuryān māse māse tha vā punaḥd saṃvatsarasya dviḥ kuryāc catur vāpi ca śaktitaḥd dīrghāyuś ca bhavet svasthaḥ pitṛmedhena mānavaḥd saputro bahubhṛtyaś ca prabhūtadhanadhānyavānd śrāddhadaḥ svargam āpnoti nirmalaṃ vividhādbhutamd apsarogaṇasaṃghuṣṭaṃ virajaskam anantakamd śrāddhāni puṣṭikāmā ye prakurvanti ca paṇḍitāḥd teṣāṃ puṣṭiṃ prajāś caiva dāsyanti pitaraḥ sadād dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ śatruvināśanamd umād kulasaṃdhāraṇaṃ ceti śrāddham āhur manīṣiṇaḥd bhagavan devadeveśa mṛtās te bhuvi jantavaḥd nānājātiṣu jāyante śīghraṃ karmavaśāt punaḥd pitaras tv iti te tatra kathaṃ tiṣṭhanti devavatd pitṝṇāṃ katamo deśaḥ piṇḍān aśnanti te kathamd anne datte mṛtānāṃ tu katham āpyāyanaṃ bhavetd nāradaḥd evaṃ mayā saṃśayitaṃ bhagavañ chettum arhasid etad viruddhaṃ rudrāṇyāṃ pṛcchantyāṃ pariṣad bhṛśamd maheśvaraḥd babhūva sarvā muditā śrotuṃ paramakaṃ hi tatd sthāne saṃśayitaṃ devi śṛṇu kalyāṇi tattvataḥd guhyānāṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ khilānāṃ paramaṃ khilamd yathā devagaṇā devi tathā pitṛgaṇāḥ priyed dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhe sarve pitṛgaṇāḥ sthitāḥd pretān uddiśya yā pūjā kriyate mānuṣair ihad tena tuṣyanti pitaro na pretāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥd uttarasyāṃ yathā devā ramante yajñakarmabhiḥd dakṣiṇasyāṃ tathā te ca tuṣyanti vividhair makhaiḥd dvividhaṃ kriyate karma havyakavyasamāśritamd tayor havyakriyā devān kavyam āpyāyayet pitṝnd prasavyaṃ maṅgalair dravyair havyakarma vidhīyated apasavyam amaṅgalyaiḥ kavyaṃ cāpi vidhīyated sadevāsuragandharvāḥ pitṝn abhyarcayanti cad āpyāyitāś ca te śrāddhaiḥ punar āpyāyayanti tānd aniṣṭvā ca pitṝn pūrvaṃ yaḥ kriyāṃ prakaroti cetd rakṣāṃsi ca piśācāś ca phalaṃ bhokṣyanti tasya tatd havyakavyakriyā tasmāt kartavyā bhuvi mānavaiḥd karmakṣetraṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ tad anyatra na vidyated kavyena saṃtatir dṛṣṭā havye bhūtiḥ pṛthagvidhād umād iti te kathitaṃ devi devaguhyaṃ sanātanamd evaṃ kṛtasya dharmasya śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabhod maheśvaraḥd pramāṇaṃ phalamānānāṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasid pramāṇakalpanāṃ devi dānasya śṛṇu bhāminid yatsāras tu naro loke tad dānaṃ cottamaṃ smṛtamd sarvadānavidhiṃ prāhus tad eva bhuvi śobhaned prasthaṃ sāraṃ daridrasya śataṃ koṭidhanasya cad prasthasāras tu tat prasthaṃ dadan mahad avāpnuyātd koṭisāras tu tāṃ koṭiṃ dadan mahad avāpnuyātd ubhayaṃ tan mahat tac ca phalenaiva samaṃ smṛtamd dharmārthakāmabhogeṣu śakyabhāvaṃ tu madhyamamd svadravyād atihīnaṃ tu tad dānam adhamaṃ smṛtamd śṛṇu dattasya vai devi pañcadhā phalakalpanamd ānantyaṃ ca mahac caiva samaṃ hīnaṃ ca pātakamd teṣāṃ viśeṣān vakṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitād dustyajasya ca vai dānaṃ pātra ānantyam ucyated dānaṃ ṣaḍguṇayuktaṃ tu mahad ity abhidhīyated yathāśraddhaṃ tu vai dānaṃ yathārhaṃ samam ucyated guṇatas tu tathā hīnaṃ dānaṃ hīnam iti smṛtamd dānaṃ pātakam ity āhuḥ ṣaḍguṇānāṃ viparyayed devaloke mahat kālam ānantyasya phalaṃ viduḥd mahatas tu tathā dānaṃ svargaloke tu pūjyated samasya tu tathā dānaṃ mānuṣaṃ bhogam āvahetd dānaṃ niṣphalam ity āhur vihīnaṃ kriyayā śubhed atha vā mlecchadeśeṣu tatra tatphalatāṃ vrajetd umād narakaṃ pretya tiryakṣu gacched aśubhadānataḥd maheśvaraḥd aśubhasyāpi dānasya śubhaṃ syāc ca phalaṃ kathamd manasā tattvataḥ śuddham anṛśaṃsapuraḥsaramd prītyā tu sarvadānāni dattvā phalam avāpnuyātd rahasyaṃ sarvadānānām etad viddhi śubhekṣaṇed anyāni sarvakāryāṇi śṛṇu sadbhiḥ kṛtāni cad ārāmaṃ devagoṣṭhāni saṃkramāḥ kūpa eva cad govāṭaṃ ca taṭākaṃ ca sabhāḥ śālāś ca sarvaśaḥd bhikṣukāvasathāś caiva pānīyaṃ gotṛṇāni cad vyādhitānāṃ ca bhaiṣajyam anāthānāṃ ca bhojanamd anāthaśavasaṃskāras tīrthamārgaviśodhanamd vyasanābhyavapattiś ca sarveṣāṃ ca svaśaktitaḥd etat sarvaṃ samāsena dharmakāryam iti smṛtamd tat kartavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa svaśaktyā śraddhayā śubhed pretyabhāve labhet puṇyaṃ nāsti tatra vicāraṇād rūpaṃ saubhāgyam ārogyaṃ balaṃ saukhyaṃ labhen naraḥd umād svarge vā mānuṣe vāpi tais tair āpyāyate hi saḥd bhagavaṃl lokapāleśa dharmas tu katibhedakaḥd dṛśyate caritaḥ sadbhis tan me śaṃsitum arhasid maheśvaraḥd śṛṇu devi samuddeśān nānātvaṃ dharmasaṃkaṭed dharmā bahuvidhā loke śrutā vedamukhodbhavāḥd smṛtidharmaś ca bahudhā sadbhir ācāra iṣyated deśadharmāś ca dṛśyante kuladharmās tathaiva cad jātidharmāś ca vai dharmā gaṇadharmāś ca śobhaned śarīrakālavaiṣamyād āpaddharmaś ca dṛśyated etad dharmasya nānātvaṃ kriyate lokavāsibhiḥd kāraṇāt tatra tatraiva phalaṃ dharmasya ceṣyated tatkāraṇasamāyoge labhet kurvan phalaṃ naraḥd anyathā na labhet puṇyam atadarhaḥ samādiśand evaṃ dharmasya nānātvaṃ phalaṃ kurvaṃl labhen naraḥd śrautaḥ smārtas tu dharmāṇāṃ prākṛto dharma ucyated umād iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasid bhagavan sarvabhūteśa tripurārdana śaṃkarad śrutaṃ pāpakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yamaloke varapradad śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ deva nṛṇāṃ sukṛtakarmaṇāmd kathaṃ te bhuñjate lokān svargaloke maheśvarad kathitāḥ kīdṛśā lokā nṛṇāṃ sukṛtakāriṇāmd maheśvaraḥd etan me vada deveśa śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi med śṛṇu kalyāṇi tat sarvaṃ yat tvam icchasi bhāminid vividhāḥ puṇyalokās te karmākarmaṇyatāṃ gatāḥd meruṃ hi kanakātmānaṃ paritaḥ sarvatodiśamd bhadrāśvaḥ ketumālaś ca uttarāḥ kuravas tathād jambūvanādayaḥ svargā ity ete karmavarjitāḥd teṣu bhogāḥ svayaṃbhūtāḥ pradṛśyante yatas tataḥd yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ tu ekaikaṃ mānamātrayād nityapuṣpaphalopetās tatra vṛkṣāḥ samantataḥd āsaktavastrābharaṇāḥ sarve kanakasaṃnibhāḥd dvirephāś cāṇḍajās tatra pravālamaṇisaṃnibhāḥd vicitrāś ca manojñāś ca kūjitaiḥ śobhayanti tānd kuśeśayavanaiś channā nalinyaś ca manoramāḥd tatra vānty anilā nityaṃ divyagandhāḥ sukhāvahāḥd sarve cāmlānamālyāś ca virajombarasaṃvṛtāḥd evaṃ bahuvidhā devi divi bhogāḥ sukhāvahāḥd striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva sarve sukṛtakāriṇaḥd ramante tatra cānyonyaṃ kāmarāgasamanvitāḥd divyabhūṣaṇasaṃyuktā divyagandhasamanvitāḥd manoramā mahābhāgāḥ sarve lalitakuṇḍalāḥd evaṃ tatragatā martyāḥ pramadāḥ priyadarśanāḥd nānābhāvasamāyuktā yauvanasthāḥ sadaiva tud kamanīyāḥ kāmayutāḥ kāmajñā lalitās tathād manonukūlā madhurā bhoginām upakalpitāḥd pramadāś codbhavanty eva svargaloke yathā tathād evaṃvidhāḥ striyaś cātra puruṣāś ca parasparamd ramante cendriyaiḥ svasthaiḥ śarīrair bhogasaṃskṛtaiḥd kāmaharṣau guṇāv āstāṃ nānye krodhādayaḥ priyed kṣut pipāsā na cāsty atra gātrakleśāś ca śobhaned sarvato ramaṇīyaś ca sarvartukusumānvitamd yāvat puṇyaphalaṃ tāvad ramante tatra saṃgatāḥd nirantaraṃ bhogayutā ramante svargavāsinaḥd tatra bhogān yathāyogaṃ bhuktvā puṇyakṣayāt punaḥd naśyanti jāyamānās te śarīraiḥ sahasā priyed svargalokāt paribhraṣṭā jāyante mānuṣe punaḥd pūrvapuṇyāvaśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭāḥ saṃbhavanti ted eṣā svargagatiḥ proktā pṛcchantyās tava bhāminid ata ūrdhvaṃ padāny aṣṭau karmaṇyāni śṛṇu priyed bhogayuktāni puṇyāni ucchritāni parasparamd vidyādharāḥ kiṃpuruṣā yakṣagandharvakiṃnarāḥd apsaro dānavā devā yathākramam udāhṛtāḥd teṣu sthāneṣu jāyante prāṇinaḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥd teṣām api ca ye lokāḥ svargalokopamāḥ smṛtāḥd svargavat tatra te bhogān bhuñjate ca ramanti cad rūpasattvabalopetāḥ sarve dīrghāyuṣas tathād teṣāṃ sarvakriyārambho mānuṣeṣv eva dṛśyated atimānuṣam āścaryam astramāyābalātkṛtamd jarāprasūtimaraṇaṃ teṣu sthāneṣu dṛśyated guṇadoṣāś ca santy atra ākāśagamanaṃ tathād antardhānaṃ balaṃ sarvam āyuś ca cirajīvanamd tapoviśeṣāj jāyante teṣāṃ karmāṇi bhāminid devalokapravṛttis tu teṣām eva vidhīyated na tathā devaloko hi tadviśiṣṭāḥ surāḥ smṛtāḥd tatra bhogam anirdeśyam amṛtatvaṃ ca vidyated vimānagamanaṃ nityam apsarogaṇasevitamd evam anyac ca tat karma daivatebhyo viśiṣyated pratyakṣaṃ tava tat sarvaṃ devalokapravartanamd tasmān na varṇaye devi viditaṃ hi tvayā śubhed umād tat sarvaṃ sukṛtenaiva prāpyate cottamaṃ padamd mānuṣeṣv eva jīvatsu gatir vijñāyate na vād ayaṃ śubhagatir jīvann asau tv aśubhabhāg itid maheśvaraḥd etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me śaṃsitum arhasid tad ahaṃ te pravakṣyāmi jīvatāṃ vidyate yathād dvividhāḥ prāṇino loke daivāsurasamāśritāḥd manasā karmaṇā vācā pratikūlā bhavanti yed tādṛśān āsurān viddhi martyās te narakālayāḥd rāgadveṣayutā ye tu nirlajjā nirapatrapāḥd darpāhaṃkārasaṃyuktā narā narakagāminaḥd nāstikāś ca śaṭhā ghorāḥ pareṣām upatāpinaḥd yatheṣṭavṛttayaś caiva narā narakagāminaḥd duṣpratītamanā yas tu calacitto nirākṛtiḥd śiśnodararatir mūḍho nirayaṃ yāti so dhamaḥd māṃsapānapriyā nityaṃ kaṭhorā nīcavṛttayaḥd tādṛśān āsurān viddhi sarve te narakālayāḥd hiṃsāvihārā ye nityaṃ nirdayāḥ prāṇināśaned svadharmavimukhāś caiva parasveṣv abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥd yuddhamātsaryasaṃyuktā grāmyabhogaparāyaṇāḥd tādṛśān āsurān viddhi narān narakagāminaḥd darpotsekasamāyuktā mūrkhās tattvabahiṣkṛtāḥd śrutividveṣiṇo nityaṃ te narā narakālayāḥd nityaṃ vadanti ye mohād anṛtaṃ kaṭukaṃ vacaḥd kṛtaghnāḥ piśunā ghorā bhavanti narakālayāḥd hiṃsrāś corāś ca dhūrtāś ca paradārābhimarśinaḥd nīcakarmakarā ye ca śaucamaṅgalavarjitāḥd śrutividveṣiṇaḥ pāpā lokacāritradūṣakāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārā jīvanto narakālayāḥd lokodvegakarāś cānye paśavaś ca sarīsṛpāḥd vṛkṣāḥ kaṇṭakino rūkṣās tādṛśān viddhi cāsurānd aparān devapakṣāṃs tu śṛṇu devi samāhitād manovākkarmabhir nityam anukūlā bhavanti yed tādṛśān amarān viddhi te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd śaucārjavaparādhīnāḥ parārthaṃ na haranti yed ye samāḥ sarvabhūteṣu te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd bhayād vā vṛttihetor vā anṛtaṃ na bruvanti yed satyaṃ vadanti satataṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd dhārmikāḥ śaucasaṃpannāḥ śuklā madhurabhāṣiṇaḥd nākāryaṃ manasecchanti te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd daridrā api ye ke cid yācitāḥ prītipūrvakamd dadaty eva ca yat kiṃ cit te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd āstikā maṅgalaparāḥ satataṃ vṛddhasevinaḥd puṇyakarmaparā nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd svaduḥkham iva manyante pareṣāṃ duḥkhavedanāmd śaktyā cābhyavapadyante te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd vratino dānaśīlāś ca sukhaśīlāś ca mānavāḥd ṛjavo mṛdavo nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd guruśuśrūṣaṇaparā devabrāhmaṇapūjakāḥd kṛtajñāḥ kṛtavidyāś ca te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd jitendriyā jitakrodhā jitamānamadaspṛhāḥd lobhamātsaryahīnā ye te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd nirmamā nirahaṃkārāḥ svānukrośāḥ svabandhuṣud dīnānukampino nityaṃ te narāḥ svargagāminaḥd aihikena tu vṛttena pāratram anumīyated evaṃvidhā narā loke jīvantaḥ svargagāminaḥd yad anyac ca śubhaṃ loke prajānugrahakāri cad paśavaś caiva vṛkṣāś ca prajānāṃ hitakāriṇaḥd tādṛśān devapakṣasthān iti viddhi śubhānaned śubhāśubhamayaṃ loke sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamamd umād daivaṃ śubham iti prāhur āsuraṃ hy aśubhaṃ priyed bhagavan mānuṣāḥ ke cit kāladharmam upasthitāḥd prāṇamokṣaṃ kathaṃ kṛtvā paratra hitam āpnuyuḥd maheśvaraḥd hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu devi samāhitād dvividhaṃ maraṇaṃ loke svabhāvād yatnatas tathād tayoḥ svabhāvaṃ nopāyaṃ yatnajaṃ kāraṇodbhavamd etayor ubhayor devi vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhaned kalyākalyaśarīrasya yatnajaṃ dvividhaṃ smṛtamd yatnajaṃ nāma maraṇam ātmatyāgo mumūrṣayād tatrākalyaśarīrasya jarā vyādhiś ca kāraṇamd mahāprasthānagamanaṃ tathā prāyopaveśanamd jalāvagāhanaṃ caiva agnicityāpraveśanamd evaṃ caturvidhaḥ prokta ātmatyāgo mumūrṣatāmd eteṣāṃ kramayogena vidhānaṃ śṛṇu śobhaned svadharmayuktaṃ gārhasthyaṃ ciram ūḍhvā vidhānataḥd tatrānṛṇyaṃ ca saṃprāpya vṛddho vā vyādhito pi vād darśayitvā svadaurbalyaṃ sarvān evānumānya cad saṃvidhāya svabandhūṃś ca karmaṇāṃ bharaṇaṃ tathād dānāni vidhivat kṛtvā dharmakāryārtham ātmanaḥd anujñāpya janaṃ sarvaṃ vācā madhurayā bruvand ahataṃ vastram ācchādya baddhvā tat kuśarajjunād upaspṛśya pratijñāya vyavasāyapuraḥsaramd parityajya tato grāmaṃ paścāt kuryād yathepsitamd mahāprasthānam icchec cet pratiṣṭhetottarāṃ diśamd bhūtvā tāvan nirāhāro yāvat prāṇavimokṣaṇamd ceṣṭāhānau śayitvāpi tanmanāḥ prāṇam utsṛjetd evaṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān amalān pratipadyated prāyopaveśanaṃ cecchet tenaiva vidhinā naraḥd deśe puṇyatame śreṣṭhe nirāhāras tu saṃviśetd āprāṇāntaṃ śucir bhūtvā kurvan dānaṃ svaśaktitaḥd hariṃ smaraṃs tyajet prāṇān eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥd evaṃ kalevaraṃ tyaktvā svargaloke mahīyated agnipraveśanaṃ cecchet tenaiva vidhinā śubhed kṛtvā kāṣṭhamayaṃ cityaṃ puṇyakṣetre nadīṣu vād daivatebhyo namaskṛtya kṛtvā cāgniṃ pradakṣiṇamd bhūtvā śucir vyavasitaḥ praviśed agnisaṃstaramd so pi lokān yathānyāyaṃ prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇāmd jalāvagāhanaṃ cecchet tenaiva vidhinā śubhed khyāte puṇyatame tīrthe nimajjet svakṛtaṃ smarand so pi puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān nisargāt pratipadyated tataḥ kalyaśarīrasya saṃtyāgaṃ śṛṇu tattvataḥd rakṣārthaṃ kṣatriyasyeṣṭaḥ prajāpālanakāraṇātd yodhānāṃ bhartṛpiṇḍārthaṃ gurvarthaṃ brahmacāriṇāmd gobrāhmaṇārthaṃ grāmārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca vidhīyated svarāṣṭrarakṣaṇārthaṃ vā kunṛpaiḥ pīḍitāḥ prajāḥd moktukāmas tyajet prāṇān yuddhamārge yathāvidhid susaṃnaddho vyavasitaḥ saṃpraviśyāparāṅmukhaḥd evaṃ rājā mṛtaḥ sadyaḥ svargaloke mahīyated tādṛśī sugatir nāsti kṣatriyasya viśeṣataḥd bhṛtyo vā bhartṛpiṇḍārthaṃ bhartṛkarmaṇy upasthited kurvaṃs tatra tu sāhāyyam ātmaprāṇānapekṣayād svāmyarthaṃ saṃtyajet prāṇān puṇyāṃl lokān sa gacchatid spṛhaṇīyaḥ suragaṇais tatra nāsti vicāraṇād evaṃ gobrāhmaṇārthaṃ vā dīnārthaṃ vā tyajet tanumd so pi puṇyam avāpnoti ānṛśaṃsyavyapekṣayād ity ete jīvitatyāge mārgās te samudāhṛtāḥd kāmāt krodhād bhayān mohād yadi cet saṃtyajet tanumd so nantaṃ narakaṃ yāti ātmahantṛtvakāraṇātd svabhāvamaraṇaṃ nāma na tu cātmecchayā bhavetd tathā mṛtānāṃ yat kāryaṃ tan me śṛṇu yathāvidhid tatrāpi bodhasaṃtyāgān mūḍhatyāgo viśiṣyated bhūmau saṃveśayed dehaṃ narasya vinaśiṣyataḥd nirjīvaṃ vṛṇuyāt sadyo vāsasā tu kalevaramd mālyagandhair alaṃkṛtya suvarṇena ca bhāminid śmaśāne dakṣiṇe deśe citāgnau pradahen mṛtamd atha vā nikṣiped bhūmau śarīraṃ jīvavarjitamd divā ca śuklapakṣaś ca uttarāyaṇam eva cad mumūrṣūṇāṃ praśastāni viparītaṃ tu garhitamd audakaṃ cāṣṭakāśrāddhaṃ bahubhir bahuśaḥ kṛtamd āpyāyanaṃ mṛtānāṃ tat paraloke bhavec chubhamd etat sarvaṃ mayā proktaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya cad umād devadeva namas te stu kālasūdana śaṃkarad lokeṣu vividhā dharmās tvatprasādān mayā śrutāḥd viśiṣṭaṃ sarvadharmebhyaḥ śāśvataṃ dhruvam avyayamd śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ dharmaṃ tatra muhyati me manaḥd ke cin mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti ke cid yajñaphalaṃ dvijāḥd vānaprasthaṃ punaḥ ke cid gārhasthyaṃ ke cid āśramamd rājadharmāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cit svādhyāyam eva cad brahmacaryāśramaṃ ke cit ke cid vāksaṃyamāśrayamd mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ke cit sevamānā divaṃ gatāḥd ahiṃsayāparaḥ svarge satyena ca mahīyated āhave bhimukhāḥ ke cin nihatās tridivaṃ gatāḥd ke cid uñchavrate siddhāḥ svargamārgaṃ samāśritāḥd ārjavenāpare yuktā hatāś cānārjavair janaiḥd ṛjavo nākapṛṣṭhe tu śuddhātmānaḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥd evaṃ bahuvidhair loke dharmadvāraiḥ susaṃvṛtaiḥd mamāpi matir āviddhā meghalekheva vāyunād etasmin saṃśayasthāne saṃśayacchedakāri yatd nāradaḥd vacanaṃ brūhi deveśa niścayajñānasaṃjñitamd evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ devyā mahādevaḥ pinākadhṛkd provāca madhuraṃ vākyaṃ sūkṣmam adhyātmasaṃjñitamd maheśvaraḥd nyāyatas tvaṃ mahābhāge śrotukāmāsi niścayamd etad eva viśiṣṭaṃ te yat tvaṃ pṛcchasi māṃ priyed sarvatra vihito dharmaḥ svargalokaphalāśritaḥd bahudvārasya dharmasya nehāsti viphalā kriyād yasmin yasmiṃś ca viṣaye yo yo yāti viniścayamd taṃ tam evābhijānāti nānyaṃ dharmaṃ śucismited śṛṇu devi samāsena mokṣajñānam anuttamamd etad dhi sarvadharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ guhyam avyayamd nāsti mokṣāt paraṃ devi mokṣa eva parā gatiḥd sukham ātyantikaṃ śreṣṭham anivarti ca tad viduḥd nātra devi jarāmṛtyū śoko vā duḥkham eva vād anuttamam acintyaṃ ca tad devi paramaṃ sukhamd jñānānām uttamaṃ jñānaṃ mokṣajñānaṃ vidur budhāḥd ṛṣibhir devasaṃghaiś ca procyate paramaṃ padamd nityam akṣaram akṣobhyam ajaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivamd uśanti tat padaṃ prājñāḥ spṛhaṇīyaṃ surāsuraiḥd duḥkhādi ca durantaṃ ca saṃkṣayaṃ ca virodhi cad mithaḥ satatakāryaṃ ca trivargaṃ sukham ucyated tasmān mokṣaḥ pradhānas tu trivargāc ca viśeṣataḥd mokṣasya tasya mārgo yaṃ śrūyatāṃ śubhalakṣaṇed brahmādisthāvarāntaś ca saṃsāro yaṃ pravartated śokavyādhijarādoṣair maraṇena ca saṃyutaḥd yathā jyotirgaṇā vyomni nivartante punaḥ punaḥd saṃsāre prāṇinaḥ sarve nivartante tathā punaḥd tatra saṃsāracakrasya mokṣo jñānena dṛśyated adhyātmatattvavijñānaṃ jñānam ity abhidhīyated jñānasya grahaṇopāyam ācāraṃ jñāninas tathād yathāvat saṃpravakṣyāmi tattvam ekamanāḥ śṛṇud brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi bhūtvā pūrvaṃ gṛhe sthitaḥd gṛhṇīyād apy upādhyāyān mokṣajñānam atandritaḥd dvividhaś ca punar mokṣaḥ sāṃkhyo yoga iti smṛtaḥd pañcaviṃśativijñānaṃ sāṃkhyam ity abhidhīyated aiśvaryaṃ devasāyujyaṃ yogaśāstrasya nirṇayed tayor anyataraṃ jñānaṃ śṛṇuyāc chiṣyatāṃ gataḥd nāmuṇḍo nāpy akāṣāyī nāpy asaṃvatsaroṣitaḥd sāṃkhyayogau na ca śrāvyau guruṇā snehapūrvakamd samaḥ śītoṣṇaharṣādīn viṣaheta sadā muniḥd adhṛṣyaḥ kṣutpipāsābhyāṃ bhavej jñānasamādhinād na kurvītānyam ārambham anivedya svakaṃ gurumd chāyābhūto parityāgī nityam eva bhaved guraud indriyāṇīndriyārthebhya ucitebhyo nivartayetd tyajet saṃkalpajān adarśanād āpatitāḥ punaś cādarśanaṃ gatāḥd snehas tatra na kartavyo viprayogo hi tair dhruvamd kuṭumbaṃ putradāraṃ ca śarīraṃ dhanasaṃcayaḥd pārakyam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛted putradārakuṭumbeṣu saktāḥ sīdanti jantavaḥd saraḥpaṅkārṇave magnā jīrṇā iva mahāgajāḥd mātāpitṛsahasrāṇi putradāraśatāni cad asaṃkhyeyāny atītāni tathaivānāgatāni cad na teṣāṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ mama tair apid atītam anatītaṃ tad iti paśyan na muhyatid duḥkhopaghāte śārīre mānase vā samutthited yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnāt tan nānucintayetd yannimittaṃ bhavec chokas trāso vā duḥkham eva vād āyāso vā yatomūlas tad ekāṅgam api tyajetd anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ ratnasaṃcayaḥd aiśvaryaṃ svasthatā ceti na muhyet tatra paṇḍitaḥd sukham ekāntato nāsti śakrasyāpi triviṣṭaped tatrāpi sumahad duḥkhaṃ sukham alpataraṃ bhavetd na nityaṃ labhate duḥkhaṃ na nityaṃ labhate sukhamd sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyānantaraṃ sukhamd kṣayāntā nicayāḥ sarve patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥd saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitamd ucchrayān vinipātāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣataḥ svayamd anityam asukhaṃ ceti vyavasyet sarvam eva cad arthānām ārjane duḥkham ārjitānāṃ ca rakṣaṇed nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ dhig arthaṃ duḥkhabhājanamd arthavantaṃ naraṃ nityaṃ pañca nighnanti śatravaḥd rājataskaradāyādā bhūtāni kṣaya eva cad artha eva hy anarthasya mūlam ity avadhārayad na hy anarthāḥ prabādhante naram arthavivarjitamd arthaprāptir mahad duḥkham ākiṃcanyaṃ paraṃ sukhamd upadraveṣu cārthānāṃ duḥkhaṃ hi niyataṃ bhavetd dhanalābhena tṛṣṇāyā na tṛptir upalabhyated labdhvā bhūyo vivardheta samidbhir iva pāvakaḥd jitvāpi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ catuḥsāgaramekhalāmd sāgarāṇāṃ punaḥ pāraṃ jetum icchaty asaṃśayamd alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥd kośakāraḥ kṛmir devi badhyate hi parigrahātd ya ekāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām ekacchatrāṃ praśāsti cad ekasminn eva rāṣṭre tu sa cāpi nivasen nṛpaḥd tasmin rāṣṭre pi nagaram ekam evādhitiṣṭhatid nagare pi gṛhaṃ caikaṃ bhavet tasya niveśanamd eka eva pratiṣṭhā syād āvāsaṃ tadgṛhe pi cad āvāse śayanaṃ caikaṃ niśi yatra pralīyated śayanasyārdham evāsya striyās tv ardhaṃ vidhīyated tad anena prasaṅgena svalpenaiva hi yujyated sarvaṃ mameti saṃmūḍho janaḥ paśyati bāliśaḥd evaṃ sarvopabhogeṣu svalpam asya prayojanamd taṇḍulaprasthamātreṇa yātrā syāt sarvadehināmd tato bhūyastaro bhāgo duḥkhāya patanāya cad nāsti tṛṣṇāsamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukhamd sarvān kāmān parityajya brahmabhūyāya kalpated yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥd yo sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukhamd na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyatid haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhated alābheneha kāmānāṃ kāmāṃs tyajati paṇḍitaḥd āyāsavikaṭas tīvraḥ kāmāgnis tarṣaṇāraṇiḥd indriyārtheṣu saṃmohāt pacaty akuśalaṃ janamd yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥd nālam ekasya paryāptam iti paśyan na muhyatid yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukhamd tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṃ kalāmd indriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu naiva dhīro niyojayetd manaḥṣaṣṭhāni saṃyamya nityam ātmani yojayetd indriyāṇāṃ visargeṇa doṣam ṛcchaty asaṃśayamd saṃniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhim avāpnuyātd ṣaṇṇām ātmani yuktānām aiśvaryaṃ yo dhigacchatid na sa pāpair na cānarthaiḥ saṃyujyeta vicakṣaṇaḥd apramattaḥ sadā rakṣed indriyāṇi vicakṣaṇaḥd arakṣiteṣu teṣv āśu naro narakam eti hid hṛdi kāmamayaś citro mohasaṃcayasaṃbhavaḥd ajñānarūḍhamūlas tu vidhitsāpariṣecanaḥd roṣalobhamahāskandhaḥ purāduṣkṛtasāravānd āyāsaviṭapas tīvraḥ śokapuṣpo bhayāṅkuraḥd nānāsaṃkalpapatrāḍhyaḥ pramādaparivardhitaḥd mahatībhiḥ pipāsābhiḥ samantāt parivardhitaḥd saṃrohaty akṛtaprajñaḥ pādapaḥ kāmasaṃbhavaḥd naiva rohati tattvajñe rūḍho vā chidyate punaḥd kṛcchropāyeṣv anityeṣu niḥsāreṣu caleṣu cad duḥkhādiṣu duranteṣu kāmabhogeṣu kā ratiḥd yena saṃvatsaro dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛt kāmaś ca sevitaḥd tena sarvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ punarāvartakaṃ jagatd bhogā bhuktā manuṣyeṇa svapnā iva bhavanti ted svapnopabhogatulyeṣu kāmabhogeṣu kā ratiḥd indriyeṣu ca jīryatsu chidyamāne tathāyuṣid purastāc ca sthite mṛtyau kiṃ sukhaṃ paśyataḥ śubhed vyādhibhiḥ pīḍyamānasya nityaṃ śārīramānasaiḥd narasyākṛtakṛtyasya kiṃ sukhaṃ bhavati priyed saṃcinvānakam evārthaṃ kāmānām avitṛptakamd vyāghraḥ paśum ivāraṇye mṛtyur ādāya gacchatid janmamṛtyujarāduḥkhaiḥ satataṃ samabhidrutaḥd umād saṃsāre pacyamānas tu pāpān nodvijate janaḥd kenopāyena martyānāṃ nivartete jarāntakaud yady asti bhagavan mahyam etad ācakṣva māciramd tapasā vā sumahatā karmaṇā vā śrutena vād maheśvaraḥd rasāyanaprayogair vā kenātyeti jarāntakaud naitad asti mahābhāge jarāmṛtyunivartanamd sarvalokeṣu jānīhi mokṣād anyatra bhāminid na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasāpi vād maraṇaṃ nātivartante vinā muktyā śarīriṇaḥd aśvamedhasahasreṇa vājapeyaśatena cad na taranti jarāmṛtyū nirvāṇādhigamād vinād aiśvaryaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ ca vidyā lābhas tapas tathād rasāyanaprayogaś ca na taranti jarāntakaud dānayajñatapaḥśīlā rasāyanavido pi vād svādhyāyaniratā vāpi na taranti jarāntakaud devadānavagandharvakiṃnaroragarākṣasānd svavaśe kurute kālo na kālasyāsty agocaraḥd na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ kṣapāḥd so yaṃ prapadyate dhvānam ajasraṃ dhruvam avyayamd sravanti na nivartante srotāṃsi saritām ivad āyur ādāya martyānām ahorātrāṇi saṃtatamd jīvitaṃ sarvabhūtānām akṣayaḥ kṣapayann asaud ādityo hy astam abhyeti punaḥ punar udeti cad yasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām āyur alpataraṃ bhavetd gādhodake matsya iva kiṃ nu tasya kumāratād maraṇaṃ hi śarīrasya niyataṃ dhruvam eva cad tiṣṭhann eva kṣaṇaṃ sarvaḥ kālasyaiti vaśaṃ punaḥd na mriyeran na jīryeran yadi syuḥ sarvadehinaḥd na cāniṣṭaṃ pravarteta śoko vā prāṇināṃ kva citd apramattaḥ pramatteṣu kālo bhūteṣu tiṣṭhatid apramattasya kālasya kṣayaṃ prāpto na mucyated śvaḥ kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikamd ko hi tad veda yatrāsau mṛtyunā nābhivīkṣitaḥd varṣāsv idaṃ kariṣyāmi idaṃ grīṣmavasantayoḥd iti bālaś cintayati antarāyaṃ na budhyated idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād ity evaṃmanaso narāḥd anavāpteṣu kāmeṣu hriyante maraṇaṃ pratid kālapāśena baddhānām ahany ahani jīryatāmd kā śraddhā prāṇināṃ mārge viṣame bhramatāṃ sadād yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād animittaṃ hi jīvitamd phalānām iva pakvānāṃ sadā hi patanād bhayamd martyasya kim u tair dāraiḥ putrair bhogaiḥ priyair apid ekāhnā sarvam utsṛjya mṛtyor hi vaśam eyivānd jāyamānāṃś ca saṃprekṣya mriyamāṇāṃs tathaiva cad na saṃvego sti cet puṃsaḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamo hi saḥd vināśino hy adhruvajīvitasyad kiṃ bandhubhir mitraparigrahaiś cad vihāya yad gacchati sarvam evad kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate cad evaṃ cintayato nityaṃ sarvārthānām anityatāmd udvego jāyate nityaṃ nirvāṇasya puraḥsaraḥd tenodvegena cāpy asya vimarśo jāyate punaḥd vimarśenātha vairāgyaṃ sarvatrāsyopajāyated vairāgyeṇa parāṃ śāntiṃ labhante mānavāḥ śubhed mokṣasyopaniṣad devi vairāgyam iti kīrtitamd etat te kathitaṃ devi vairāgyotpādanaṃ vacaḥd maheśvaraḥd etat sarvaṃ hi saṃcintya mucyante hi mumukṣavaḥd sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvat te śucismited yaj jñātvā na punar martyaḥ saṃsāreṣu pravartated jñānenaiva vimuktās te sāṃkhyāḥ saṃnyāsakovidāḥd śārīraṃ tu tapo ghoraṃ sāṃkhyāḥ prāhur nirarthakamd pañcaviṃśatikaṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ jñānam iti smṛtamd mūlaprakṛtir avyaktam avyaktāj jāyate mahānd mahato bhūd ahaṃkāras tasmāt tanmātrapañcakamd indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca tanmātrebhyo bhavanty utad tebhyo bhūtāni pañca syur iti kṣetrasamuccayaḥd asya kṣetrasya saṃkṣepaś caturviṃśatir iṣyated pañcaviṃśatir ity āhuḥ puruṣeṇeha saṃkhyayād sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥd taiḥ sṛjaty akhilaṃ lokaṃ prakṛtiḥ svātmajair guṇaiḥd icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥd vikārāḥ prakṛteś caite veditavyā manīṣibhiḥd lakṣaṇaṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ vikalpaṃ cāditaḥ pṛthakd vistareṇa pravakṣyāmi tasya vyākhyām imāṃ śṛṇud nityam ekam aṇu vyāpi kriyāhīnam ahetukamd agrāhyam indriyaiḥ sarvair etad avyaktalakṣaṇamd avyaktaṃ prakṛtir mūlaṃ pradhānaṃ yonir avyayamd avyaktasyaiva nāmāni śabdaiḥ paryāyavācakaiḥd tat sūkṣmatvād anirdeśyaṃ tat sad ity abhidhīyated tanmūlaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ tanmūlā sṛṣṭir iṣyated sattvādayaḥ prakṛtijā guṇās tān prabravīmy ahamd sukhaṃ tuṣṭiḥ prakāśaś ca trayas te sāttvikā guṇāḥd rāgadveṣau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ stambhaś ca rajaso guṇāḥd aprakāśo bhayaṃ mohas tandrī ca tamaso guṇāḥd śraddhā praharṣo vijñānam asaṃmoho dayā dhṛtiḥd sattve pravṛddhe vardhante viparīte viparyayaḥd kāmaḥ krodho manastāpo droho lobhas tathā tṛṣād pravṛddhe parivardhante rajasy etāni nityaśaḥd viṣādaḥ saṃśayo mohas tandrī nidrā bhayaṃ tathād tamasy etāni vardhante pravṛddhe hetvahetubhiḥd evam anyonyam etāni vardhante ca punaḥ punaḥd hīyante ca tathā nityam abhibhūtāni bhūribhiḥd tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavetd vartate sāttviko bhāva ity upekṣeta tat tathād yadā saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ cittakṣobhakaraṃ bhavetd vartate raja ity evaṃ tadā tad abhicintayetd yadā saṃmohasaṃyuktaṃ yad viṣādakaraṃ bhavetd apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayetd samāsāt sāttviko dharmaḥ samāsād rājasaṃ dhanamd samāsāt tāmasaḥ kāmas trivarge triguṇakramātd brahmādidevasṛṣṭir yā sāttvikīti prakīrtyated rājasī mānuṣī sṛṣṭis tiryagyonis tu tāmasīd ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥd jaghanyaguṇavṛttisthā adho gacchanti tāmasāḥd devamānuṣatiryakṣu yad bhūtaṃ sacarācaramd ādiprabhṛti saṃyuktaṃ vyāptam ebhis tribhir guṇaiḥd ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi mahadādīni liṅgataḥd vijñānaṃ ca vivekaś ca mahato lakṣaṇaṃ bhavetd mahān buddhir matiḥ prajñā nāmāni mahato viduḥd mahadādikriyāyoge mahattvaṃ copajāyated abhimānaḥ punas tatra mahato vaikṛtād bhavetd ahaṃkāraḥ sa vijñeyo lakṣaṇena samāsataḥd ahaṃkāreṇa bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayaud ahaṃkāranivṛttir hi nirvāṇāyopapadyated khaṃ vāyur agniḥ salilaṃ pṛthivī ceti pañcamīd mahābhūtāni bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayaud śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśasaṃbhavamd sparśas tvak prāṇināṃ ceṣṭā pavanasya guṇāḥ smṛtāḥd rūpaṃ pāko kṣiṇī jyotiś catvāras tejaso guṇāḥd rasaḥ snehas tathā jihvā śaityaṃ ca jalajā guṇāḥd gandho ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivyās te guṇās trayaḥd iti sarvaguṇā devi vyākhyātāḥ pāñcabhautikāḥd guṇān pūrvasya pūrvasya prāpnuvanty uttarāṇi tud tasmān naikaguṇāś ceha dṛśyante bhūtasṛṣṭayaḥd upalabhyāpsu ye gandhaṃ ke cid brūyur anaipuṇāḥd apāṃ gandhaguṇaṃ prājñā necchanti kamalekṣaṇed tad gandhatvam apāṃ nāsti pṛthivyā eva tadguṇaḥd bhūmer gandho rase sneho jyotiś cakṣuṣi saṃsthitamd prāṇāpānāśrayo vāyuḥ kheṣv ākāśaḥ śarīriṇāmd keśāsthinakhadantatvakpāṇipādaśirāṃsi cad pṛṣṭhodarakaṭigrīvāḥ sarvaṃ bhūmyātmakaṃ smṛtamd yat kiṃ cid api kāye smin dhātudoṣamalāśritamd tat sarvaṃ bhautikaṃ viddhi dehe naivāsty abhautikamd buddhīndriyāṇi karṇas tvag akṣi jihvātha nāsikād karmendriyāṇi vāk pāṇiḥ pādo meḍhraṃ gudaṃ tathād śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥd buddhīndriyārthāñ jānīyād bhūtebhyas tv abhiniḥsṛtānd vākyaṃ kriyā gatiḥ prītir utsargaś ceti pañcadhād karmendriyārthāñ jānīyāt te ca bhūtodbhavā matāḥd indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣām īśvaraṃ mana ucyated prārthanālakṣaṇaṃ tac ca indriyaṃ tu manaḥ smṛtamd niyuṅkte ca sadā tāni bhūtātmā manasā sahad niyame ca visarge ca manasaḥ kāraṇaṃ prabhuḥd indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca svabhāvaś cetanā dhṛtiḥd bhūtābhūtavikāraś ca śarīram iti saṃjñitamd śarīrāc ca paro dehī śarīraṃ ca vyapāśritaḥd śarīriṇaḥ śarīrasya yo ntaraṃ vetti vai muniḥd arasasparśagandhaṃ ca rūpaśabdavivarjitamd aśarīraṃ śarīreṣu didṛkṣeta nirindriyamd avyaktaṃ sarvadeheṣu martyeṣv amaram āśritamd yaḥ paśyet paramātmānaṃ bandhanaiḥ sa vimucyated naivāyaṃ cakṣuṣā grāhyo nāparair indriyair apid manasaiṣa pradīpena mahān ātmā pradṛśyated sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu cad vasaty eko mahāvīryo nānābhāvasamanvitaḥd naiva cordhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādhastān na kutaś canad indriyair iha buddhyā vā na dṛśyeta kadā canad navadvāraṃ puraṃ gatvā haṃso sau nīyate vaśamd īśvaraḥ sarvabhūteṣu sthāvarasya carasya cad tam evāhur aṇubhyo ṇuṃ taṃ mahadbhyo mahattaramd bahudhā sarvabhūtāni vyāpya tiṣṭhati śāśvataḥd kṣetrajñam ekataḥ kṛtvā sarvaṃ kṣetram athaikataḥd evaṃ saṃvimṛśej jñānī saṃyataḥ satataṃ hṛdād puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇānd akartālepako nityo madhyasthaḥ sarvakarmaṇāmd kāryakāraṇakartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyated puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyated ajaro yam acintyo yam avyakto yaṃ sanātanaḥd dehe tejomayo dehī tiṣṭhatīty apare viduḥd jñānam ūṣmā ca vāyuś ca śarīre jīvasaṃjñitaḥd ity eke niścitā buddhyā tatra ye buddhicintakāḥd apare sarvalokāṃś ca vyāpya tiṣṭhantam īśvaramd bruvate ke cid atraiva tile tailavad āsthitamd apare nāstikā mūḍhā hīnatvāt sūkṣmalakṣaṇaiḥd nāsty ātmeti viniścitya prāhus te nirayālayāḥd evaṃ nānāvidhānena vimṛśanti maheśvaramd ūhavān brāhmaṇo loke nityam avyayam akṣaramd asty ātmā sarvadeheṣu hetus tatra sudurgamaḥd ṛṣibhiś cāpi devaiś ca vyaktam eṣa tu dṛśyated dṛṣṭvātataṃ mahātmānaṃ punas tan na nivartated tasmāt taddarśanād eva vindate paramāṃ gatimd iti te kathito devi sāṃkhyadharmaḥ sanātanaḥd maheśvaraḥd kapilādibhir ācāryaiḥ sevitaḥ paramarṣibhiḥd sāṃkhyajñānena yuktānāṃ tad etat kīrtitaṃ mayād yogadharmaṃ punaḥ kṛtsnaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi me śṛṇud sa ca yogo dvidhā bhinno brahmadevarṣisevitaḥd samānam ubhayatrāpi vṛttaṃ śāstrapracoditamd sa cāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryam adhikṛtya vidhīyated sāyujyaṃ sarvadevānāṃ yogadharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥd jñānaṃ sarvasya yogasya mūlam ity avadhārayad vratopavāsaniyamais tais tais tat paribṛṃhayetd aikātmyaṃ buddhimanasor indriyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥd ātmany avyayini prājñe jñānam etat tu yogināmd arcayed brāhmaṇān agnīn devatāyatanāni cad varjayed aśivāṃ vācaṃ bhavet sattvam upāśritaḥd dānam adhyayanaṃ śraddhā vratāni niyamās tathād samyag āhāraśuddhiś ca śaucam indriyanigrahaḥd etais tu vardhate tejaḥ pāpaṃ cāpy avadhūyated dhūtapāpmā ca tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥd niḥśoko nirmalo dāntaḥ paścād yogaṃ samācaretd avadadhyān manaḥ pūrvaṃ matsyaghāta ivāmiṣamd ekānte vijane deśe sarvataḥ saṃvṛte śucaud kalpayed āsanaṃ tatra tapodhanāḥd tvatpriyārtham ahaṃ devi madvibhūtiṃ bravīmi ted āśramebhyaś caturbhyo haṃ caturo brāhmaṇāñ śubhed madbhaktān nirmalān puṇyān samānīya tapasvinaḥd vyācakhye haṃ tadā devi yogaṃ pāśupataṃ
