lokāḥ santi te śubhed svadharmavimukhāsi tvaṃ tasmāl lokā na santi ted daivataṃ hi patir nāryāḥ sthāpitaṃ sarvadaivataiḥd avamatya śubhe taṃ tvaṃ kathaṃ lokān gamiṣyasid mohena tvaṃ varārohe na jānīṣe svadaivatamd patimatyā striyā kāryo dharmaḥ patyarpitas tv itid tasmāt tvaṃ hi nivartasva kuru patyāśritaṃ hitamd tadā gantāsi lokāṃs tān yān gacchanti pativratāḥd nānyathā śakyate prāptuṃ patnīnāṃ loka uttamaḥd yamenaivaṃvidhaṃ coktvā nivṛtya punar eva sād babhūva patim ālambya patipriyaparāyaṇād evam etan mahādeva daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyaḥd umād tasmāt patiparā bhūtvā patiṃ paricared itid patimatyā divārātraṃ vṛttāntaḥ śrūyatāṃ śubhaḥd patyuḥ pūrvaṃ samutthāya prātaḥkarma samādiśetd patyur bhāvaṃ viditvā tu paścāt saṃbodhayet patimd tataḥ paurvāhṇikaṃ kāryaṃ svayaṃ kuryād yathāvidhid nivedya ca tathāhāraṃ yathā saṃpadyatām itid tathaiva kuryāt tat sarvaṃ yathā patyuḥ priyaṃ bhavetd yathā patyus tathā bhartur gurūṇāṃ pratipadyated śuśrūṣāpoṣaṇavidhau patipriyacikīrṣayād bhartur niṣkramaṇe kāryaṃ saṃsmared apramādataḥd āgataṃ tu patiṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā paricārakaiḥd svayaṃ kurvīta saṃprītyā kāyaśramaharaṃ paramd pādyāsanābhyāṃ śayanair vākyaiś ca hṛdayapriyaiḥd atithīnām āgamane prītiyuktā sadā bhavetd karmaṇā vacanenāpi toṣayed atithīn sadād maṅgalyaṃ gṛhaśaucaṃ ca sarvopakaraṇāni cad sarvakālam avekṣeta kārayantī ca kurvatīd dharmakārye tu saṃprāpte tadvad dharmaparā bhavetd arthakārye punar bhartuḥ pramādālasyavarjitād sā yatnaṃ paramaṃ kuryāt tasya sāhāyyakāraṇātd yugaṃdharā bhavet sādhvī patyur dharmārthayoḥ sadād vihārakāle vai bhartur jñātvā bhāvaṃ hṛdi sthitamd alaṃkṛtya yathāyogaṃ hāvabhāvasamanvitād vākyair madhurasaṃyuktaiḥ smayantī toṣayet patimd yena yena yathā tuṣyet tathā sā toṣayet patimd kaṭhorāṇi na vācyāni anyadā pramadāntared yasyāṃ kāmī bhaved bhartā tasyāḥ prītikarā bhavetd apramādaṃ puraskṛtya manasā joṣayet patimd anantaraṃ tathānyeṣāṃ bhojanāvekṣaṇaṃ caretd dāsīdāsabalīvardāṃś caṇḍālāṃś ca śunas tathād anāthān kṛpaṇāṃś caiva bhikṣukāṃś ca tathaiva cad pūjayed balibhaikṣeṇa patyur dharmavivṛddhayed kupitaṃ vārthahīnaṃ vā śrāntaṃ vopacaret patimd yathā sa tuṣṭaḥ svasthaś ca bhavet saṃtoṣayet patimd tathā kuṭumbacintāyāṃ vivāde cārthasaṃśayed āhūtā ca sahāyārthaṃ tadā priyahitaṃ vadetd apriyaṃ vā hitaṃ brūyāt tasya kāmārthakāṅkṣayād ekāntacaryākathanaṃ kalahaṃ varjayet paraiḥd bahir ālokanaṃ caiva mohaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca paiśunamd bahvāśitvaṃ divāsvapnam evamādīni varjayetd rahasy ekāsanaṃ sādhvī na kuryād ātmajair apid yad yad dadyān nidhatsveti nyāsavat paripālayetd vismṛtaṃ vā patidravyaṃ pratidadyāt svaśaucataḥd yat kiṃ cit patinā dattaṃ tal labdhvā sumukhī bhavetd atiyācñām atīrṣyāṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayetd bālavad vṛddhavan nāryāḥ sadaivāturavat patiḥd bhāryayā vratam ity eva bhartavyaḥ satataṃ vibhod etat pativratāvṛttam uktaṃ deva samāsataḥd na ca bhoge na caiśvarye na dhane na sukhe tathād spṛhā yasyā yathā patyau sā nārīṇāṃ pativratād patir hi daivataṃ strīṇāṃ patir bandhuḥ patir gatiḥd nānyāṃ gatim ahaṃ paśye pramadānāṃ yathā patiḥd jātiṣv api ca vai strītvaṃ viśiṣṭam iti me matiḥd kāyakleśena mahatā puruṣaḥ prāpnuyāt phalamd tat sarvaṃ labhate nārī sevantīndriyagocarānd yathāsukhaṃ patimatī sarvaṃ patyanukūlataḥd īdṛśaṃ dharmasaukaryaṃ paśyadhvaṃ pramadāḥ pratid etad vismṛtya vartante kustriyaḥ pāpamohitāḥd tapaścaryā ca dānaṃ ca patau tasyāḥ samarpitaud rūpaṃ kulaṃ yaśaḥ svargaḥ sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitamd evaṃvṛttasamācārā svavṛttenaiva śobhanād patinā ca samaṃ gacchet puṇyalokān svakarmaṇād vṛddho virūpo bībhatsur dhanavān nirdhano pi vād evaṃbhūto pi bhartā vai strīṇāṃ bhūṣaṇam uttamamd āḍhyaṃ vā rūpayuktaṃ vā virūpaṃ dhanavarjitamd yā patiṃ toṣayet sādhvī sā nārīṇāṃ pativratād daridrāṃś ca virūpāṃś ca pramūḍhān kuṣṭhasaṃyutānd evaṃvidhān patīn deva toṣayitvā pativratād upary upari tāṃl lokān patyaiva saha gacchatid evaṃ pravartamānāyāḥ patiḥ pūrvaṃ mriyeta cetd tadānumaraṇaṃ gacchet punar dharmaṃ careta vād umād etad evaṃ mayā proktaṃ strīṇāṃ dharmāśritaṃ hitamd evam etan mayā proktaṃ striyas tu bahudhā smṛtāḥd devatānāgagandharvamanuṣyā iti naikadhād saumyaśīlāḥ śubhācārāḥ sarvās tāḥ saṃbhavanti hid athāśubhaṃ pravakṣyāmi strīṇāṃ vṛttaṃ maheśvarad āsuryaś caiva paiśācyo rākṣasyaś ca bhavanti yāḥd tāsāṃ vṛttam aśeṣeṇa śrūyatāṃ lokakāraṇātd nyāyato vānyathā proktā bhāvadoṣasamanvitāḥd bhartṝn apacaranty eva rāgadveṣabalātkṛtāḥd svadharmavimukhā bhūtvā praduṣyanti yatas tataḥd pravṛddhaviṣayā nityaṃ pratikūlaṃ vadanti cad arthān vināśayanty eva na gṛhṇanti hitaṃ kva citd svabuddhiniratā bhūtvā jīvanti ca yathā tathād guṇavatyaḥ kva cid bhūtvā patidharmaparā ivad punar bhavanti pāpiṣṭhā viṣamaṃ vṛttam āśritāḥd anavasthitamaryādā bahuveṣā vyayapriyāḥd asaṃtuṣṭāś ca lubdhāś ca īrṣyākrodhayutā bhṛśamd bhogapriyā hitadveṣyāḥ kāmabhogaparāyaṇāḥd patīn paribhavanty eva pratikūlaparāyaṇāḥd prāyaśo nṛtabhūyiṣṭhā gurūṇāṃ pratilomakāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārā āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥd aparāḥ pāpakāriṇyaḥ satataṃ kalahapriyāḥd paruṣā rūkṣavacanā nirghṛṇā nirapatrapāḥd niḥsnehāḥ kopanāś caiva bhartṛputrasvabandhuṣud ghorā māṃsapriyā nityaṃ hasanti ca rudanti cad patīn vyabhicaranty evam unmārgeṇa yathā tathād bandhubhir bhartsitā bhūtvā gṛhakāryāṇi kurvated atha vā bhartsitā deva nīcavṛttāḥ svabandhuṣud tathaivātmavadhaṃ ghoraṃ vyavasyeyur na saṃśayaḥd nirdayā niranukrośāḥ kuṭumbārthavilopanāḥd dharmārtharahitā ghorāḥ satataṃ kurvate kriyāḥd anarthanipuṇāḥ pāpāḥ paraprāṇeṣu nirdayāḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ striyaḥ paiśācyam āśritāḥd aparā mohasaṃyuktā nirlajjā rodanapriyāḥd aśuddhā maladigdhāṅgāḥ pānamāṃsaratā bhṛśamd vadanty anṛtavākyāni hasanti vilapanti cad duṣprasādā mahākrodhāḥ svapnaśīlā nirantaramd tāmasyo naṣṭatattvārthā mandaśīlā mahodarāḥd bhuñjanti vividhaṃ siddhaṃ bhojanaṃ tīvrasaṃbhramāḥd guṇarūpavayoyuktaṃ patiṃ kāmukam uttamamd hitvānyān eva gacchanti sarvathā bhṛśapāpikāḥd nirlajjā dharmasaṃdigdhāḥ pratikūlāḥ samantataḥd evaṃyuktasamācārāḥ striyo rākṣasyam āśritāḥd evaṃvidhānāṃ sarvāsāṃ na paratreha vā sukhamd etāsām eva kustrīṇāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca maheśvarad asaṃśayaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ narake vāsa iṣyated narakād dhi vimuktānāṃ kathaṃ cit kālaparyayātd iṣyate janma mānuṣyaṃ kaṣṭaṃ tatrāpi bhuñjated tāsāṃ duṣkṛtasaṃyogād duḥkhaṃ janmāntareṣv apid daridrāḥ kleśabhūyiṣṭhā virūpāḥ kutsitāḥ paraiḥd vidhavā durbhagā vāpi labhante duḥkham īdṛśamd śatavarṣasahasrāntam ātmānaṃ vyabhicāriṇīd nayej jāraṃ ca nirayaṃ patiṃ pāpena yojayetd etad yadi tu vijñāya punaś ced dhitam ātmanaḥd kuryur bhartāram āśritya tathā dharmam avāpnuyuḥd abhisaṃyānti tā lokān puṇyān paramaśobhanānd avamatya tu yāḥ pūrvaṃ patiṃ duṣṭena cetasād vartamānāś ca satataṃ bhartṝṇāṃ pratikūlatāmd bhartrānumaraṇaṃ kāle yāḥ kurvanti tathāvidhāḥd kāmāt krodhād bhayān mohād apahāsyā bhavanti tāḥd ādiprabhṛti kustrīṇāṃ tathānumaraṇaṃ vṛthād ādiprabhṛti yā sādhvī bhartuḥ priyaparāyaṇād ūrdhvaṃ gacchati sā tatra bhartrānumaraṇaṃ gatād evaṃ mṛtāyā vai lokān ahaṃ paśyāmi cakṣuṣād spṛhaṇīyān suragaṇair yān gacchanti pativratāḥd atha vā bhartari mṛte vaidhavyaṃ dharmam āśritād mṛtaṃ ca patim uddiśya kuryāc caivaṃvidhaṃ tapaḥd evaṃ gacchati sā nārī patīnāṃ lokam uttamamd ramaṇīyam anirdeśyaṃ duṣprāpaṃ devamānuṣaiḥd prāpnuyāt tādṛśaṃ lokaṃ kevalaṃ yā pativratād iti te kathitaṃ deva strīṇāṃ dharmam anuttamamd tavaiva priyakāminyā yan mayoktaṃ tavāgrataḥd nāradaḥd cāpalyān mama deveśa tad bhavān kṣantum arhatid evaṃ vadantīṃ rudrāṇīṃ lajjābhāvasamanvitāmd toṣayām āsa deveśo vācā saṃpūjayan priyāmd ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ sāsurāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥd daivatapramadāś cāpi devanadyaś ca saṃgatāḥd praṇamya śirasā devīṃ stutibhiś cāpi tuṣṭuvuḥd pūjayām āsur apare devadevaṃ mudā yutāḥd apare vismayān nocus tam artham abhicintya vaid saṃprahṛṣṭamanāḥ śarvaḥ saṃvādaṃ cintayan muhuḥd tatra tasmin kṣaṇe devīṃ devo vacanam abravītd śṛṇu kalyāṇi madvākyaṃ yad idaṃ tu tvayā mayād kṛtaṃ saṃvādam abhavat tat trilokaṃ gamiṣyatid puṇyaṃ pavitram ākhyānaṃ bhavitā tan na saṃśayaḥd ya idaṃ śrāvayed vidvān saṃvādaṃ tv āvayoḥ priyed śucir bhūtvā narān yuktān sa yajñaphalam āpnuyātd ye tv enaṃ śṛṇuyur nityaṃ dharmyaṃ tadgatamānasāḥd śravaṇād eva teṣāṃ tu mahad dharmaphalaṃ bhavetd kathayec chṛṇuyād vāpi yaḥ kaś cin nityam āhnikamd sa bhaven matpriyo devi taṃ smarāmi dine dined ya imaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ saṃvādaṃ cāvayoḥ śubhamd kīrtim āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ paratreha sa vindatid nāradaḥd śrutvā cemaṃ prayoktā tu kathaṃ sa na bhaven mahānd kathitaṃ sarvaṃ tava keśava śṛṇvataḥd etāvad uktvā devarṣir nārado virarāma had vaiśaṃpāyanaḥd tad adya nikhilenaiva kathitaṃ te yudhiṣṭhirad dharmarājas tu tac chrutvā bhrātṛbhir mudito bhavatd tat sarvaṃ nikhilaṃ proktaṃ taveha janamejayad ṛṣayaḥd pinākin bhaganetraghna sarvalokanamaskṛtad maheśvaraḥd māhātmyaṃ vāsudevasya śrotum icchāma śaṃkarad pitāmahād api varaḥ śāśvataḥ puruṣo hariḥd kṛṣṇo jāmbūnadābhāso vyabhre sūrya ivoditaḥd daśabāhur mahātejā devatāriniṣūdanaḥd śrīvatsāṅko hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvadaivatapūjitaḥd brahmā tasyodaraśayas tathāhaṃ ca śirobhavaḥd śiroruhebhyo jyotīṃṣi romabhyaś ca surāsurāḥd ṛṣayo dehasaṃbhūtās tasya lokāś ca śāśvatāḥd pitāmahagṛhaṃ sākṣāt sarvadevagṛhaṃ ca saḥd so syāḥ pṛthivyāḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ sraṣṭā tribhuvaneśvaraḥd saṃhartā caiva bhūtānāṃ sthāvarasya carasya cad sa devaripujit sākṣād devanāthaḥ paraṃtapaḥd sarvajñaḥ sarvasaṃśliṣṭaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvatomukhaḥd paramātmā hṛṣīkeśaḥ sarvavyāpī maheśvaraḥd na tasmāt paramaṃ bhūtaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ canad surakāryārtham utpanno mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthitaḥd na hi devagaṇāḥ śaktās trivikramavinākṛtāḥd bhuvane devakāryāṇi kartuṃ nāyakavarjitāḥd nāyakaḥ sarvadevānāṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥd etasya devanāthasya devakāryaparasya cad brahmabhūtasya satataṃ brahmarṣiśaraṇasya cad brahmā vasati garbhasthaḥ śarīre sukhasaṃsthitaḥd sarvāḥ sukhasthitāś caiva śarīre tasya devatāḥd sa devaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ śrīgarbhaḥ śrīsahoṣitaḥd śārṅgacakrāyudhaḥ khaḍgī sarvanāgaripudhvajaḥd uttamena ca śaucena śīlena ca damena cad parākrameṇa vīryeṇa vapuṣā darśanena cad āroheṇa pramāṇena dhairyeṇārjavasaṃpadād ānṛśaṃsyena rūpeṇa balena ca samanvitaḥd astraiḥ samuditaḥ sarvair divyaiś cādbhutadarśanaiḥd yogamāyaḥ sahasrākṣo niravadyo mahāmanāḥd dhīro mitrajanaślāghī jñātibandhujanapriyaḥd kṣamāvān anahaṃvādī brahmaṇyo brahmanāyakaḥd bhayahartā bhayārtānāṃ mitrāṇāṃ nandivardhanaḥd śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dīnānāṃ pālane rataḥd śrutavān arthasaṃpannaḥ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥd samāśritānām upakṛc chatrūṇām api dharmavitd matimān nītisaṃpanno brahmacārī jitendriyaḥd bhavārtham iha devānāṃ buddhyā paramayā yutaḥd prājāpatye śubhe mārge mānave dharmasaṃhited samutpatsyati govindo manor vaṃśe mahātmanaḥd aṅganāmā manoḥ putras tv antardhāmā tataḥ paraḥd antardhāmno havirdhāmā prajāpatir aninditaḥd prācīnabarhir bhavitā havirdhāmasuto mahānd tasya pracetaḥpramukhā bhaviṣyanti daśātmajāḥd prācetasas tathā dakṣo bhaviteha prajāpatiḥd dākṣāyiṇyās tathādityo manur ādityatas tathād manoś ca vaṃśaja iḍā sudyumnaś ca bhaviṣyatid budhāt purūravāś cāpi tasmād āyur bhaviṣyatid nahuṣo bhavitā tasmād yayātis tasya cātmajaḥd yadus tasmān mahāsattvaḥ kroṣṭā tasmād bhaviṣyatid kroṣṭuś caiva mahān putro vṛjinīvān bhaviṣyatid vṛjinīvato hi bhavitā uṣadgur aparājitaḥd uṣadgor bhavitā putraḥ śūraś citrarathas tathād tasya tv avarajaḥ putraḥ śūro nāma bhaviṣyatid teṣāṃ vikhyātavīryāṇāṃ cāritraguṇaśālināmd yajvināṃ suviśuddhānāṃ vaṃśe brāhmaṇasaṃmated sa śūraḥ kṣatriyaśreṣṭho mahāvīryo mahāyaśāḥd svavaṃśavistarakaraṃ janayiṣyati mānadaḥd vasudeva iti khyātaṃ putram ānakaduṃdubhimd tasya putraś caturbāhur vāsudevo bhaviṣyatid dātā brāhmaṇasatkartā brahmabhūto dvijapriyaḥd rājñaḥ sarvāṃś ca ruddhān sa mokṣayiṣyati mānadaḥd jarāsaṃdhaṃ ca rājānaṃ nirjitya girigahvared sarvapārthivaratnāḍhyo bhaviṣyati sa vīryavānd pṛthivyām apratihato vīryeṇa ca bhaviṣyatid vikrameṇa ca saṃpannaḥ sarvapārthivapārthivaḥd śūraseneṣu saṃbhūto dvārakāyāṃ vasan prabhuḥd pālayiṣyati gāṃ devīṃ vijitya nayavat sadād taṃ bhavantaḥ samāsādya vāṅmālyair arhaṇair varaiḥd arcayantu yathānyāyaṃ brahmāṇam iva śāśvatamd yo hi māṃ draṣṭum iccheta brahmāṇaṃ vā pitāmahamd draṣṭavyas tena bhagavān vāsudevaḥ pratāpavānd dṛṣṭe tasminn ahaṃ dṛṣṭo na me trāsti vicāraṇād pitāmaho vā deveśa iti vitta tapodhanāḥd sa yasya puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ prītiyukto bhaviṣyatid tasya devagaṇaḥ prīto brahmapūrvo bhaviṣyatid yaś ca taṃ mānavo loke saṃśrayiṣyati keśavamd tasya kīrtir jayaś caiva svargaś caiva bhaviṣyatid dharmāṇāṃ deśikaḥ sākṣāt sa bhaviṣyati dharmabhākd dharmavidbhiḥ sa deveśo namaskāryaḥ sadodyataiḥd dharma eva paro hi syāt tasminn abhyarcite vibhaud sa hi devo mahātejāḥ prajāhitacikīrṣayād dharmārthaṃ puruṣavyāghra ṛṣikoṭīḥ sasarja had tāḥ sṛṣṭās tena vibhunā parvate gandhamādaned sanatkumārapramukhās tiṣṭhanti tapasānvitāḥd tasmāt sa vāgmī dharmajño namasyo dvijapuṃgavāḥd vandito hi sa vandeta mānito mānayeta cad arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ pūjitaḥ pratipūjayetd dṛṣṭaḥ paśyed aharahaḥ saṃśritaḥ pratisaṃśrayetd arcitaś cārcayen nityaṃ sa devo dvijasattamāḥd etat tasyānavadyasya viṣṇor vai paramaṃ vratamd ādidevasya mahataḥ sajjanācaritaṃ sadād bhuvane bhyarcito nityaṃ devair api sanātanaḥd ubhayenānurūpeṇa yajante tam anuvratāḥd karmaṇā manasā vācā namasyaḥ sa dvijaiḥ sadād yatnavadbhir upasthāya draṣṭavyo devakīsutaḥd eṣa vo bhihito mārgo mayā vai munisattamāḥd taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvaśo devā dṛṣṭāḥ syur munisattamāḥd mahāvarāhaṃ taṃ devaṃ sarvalokapitāmahamd ahaṃ caiva namasyāmi nityam eva jagatpatimd tatra vas tritayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥd samastā hi vayaṃ devās tasya dehe vasāmahed tasya caivāgrajo bhrātā sitābhranicayaprabhaḥd halī bala iti khyāto bhaviṣyati dharādharaḥd triśirās tasya devasya śātakaumbhamayo drumaḥd dhvajas tṛṇendro devasya bhaviṣyati rathāśritaḥd śiro nāgair mahābhogaiḥ parikīrṇaṃ mahātmanaḥd bhaviṣyati mahābāhoḥ sarvalokeśvarasya hid cintitāni sameṣyanti śastrāṇy astrāṇi caiva had anantaś ca sa evokto bhagavān harir avyayaḥd samādiṣṭaḥ sa vibudhair darśayantam iti prabhod suparṇo yasya vīryeṇa kaśyapasyātmajo balīd antaṃ naivāśakad draṣṭuṃ devasya paramātmanaḥd sa ca śeṣe vicarate parayā vai mudā yutaḥd antar vasati bhogena parirabhya vasuṃdharāmd sa eṣa viṣṇuḥ so nanto bhagavān vasudhādharaḥd yo rāmaḥ sa hṛṣīkeśo yo cyutaḥ sa dharādharaḥd tāv ubhau puruṣavyāghrau divyau divyavapurdharaud draṣṭavyau mānanīyau ca cakralāṅgaladhāriṇaud eṣa yo nugrahaḥ prokto mayā puṇyas tapodhanāḥd nāradaḥd yaṃ bhavanto dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pūjayeyuḥ prayatnataḥd atha vyomni mahāñ śabdaḥ savidyut stanayitnumānd meghaiś ca gaganaṃ nīlaiḥ saṃruddham abhavad ghanaiḥd prāvṛṣīva ca parjanyo vavṛṣe nirmalaṃ payaḥd nabhaś caivābhavad ghoraṃ diśaś ca na cakāśired tato devagirau tasmin ramye puṇye sanātaned na śarvaṃ bhūtasaṃghaṃ vā dadṛśur munayas tadād vyabhraṃ ca gaganaṃ sadyaḥ kṣaṇena samapadyatad tīrthayātrāṃ tato viprā jagmuś cānye yathāgatamd tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā te vismitābhavand śaṃkarasyomayā sārdhaṃ saṃvādaṃ tatkathāśrayamd bhagavān puruṣavyāghro brahmabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥd yadartham anuśiṣṭāḥ smo giripṛṣṭhe mahātmanād dvitīyam adbhutam idaṃ tvattejaḥkṛtam adya vaid dṛṣṭvātivismitāḥ kṛṣṇa sā ca naḥ smṛtir āgatād etat te devadevasya māhātmyaṃ kathitaṃ vibhod kapardino girīśasya mahābāho janārdanad ity uktaḥ sa tadā kṛṣṇas tapovananivāsibhiḥd mānayām āsa tān sarvān ṛṣīn devakinandanaḥd atharṣayaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ punas te kṛṣṇam abruvand punaḥ saṃdarśayasvāsmān sadaiva madhusūdanad na hi naḥ sā ratiḥ svarge yā ca tvaddarśane vibhod tādṛśaṃ ca mahābāho yathāha bhagavān bhavaḥd etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ rahasyam arikarśanad tvam eva hy arthatattvajñaḥ pṛṣṭo smān pṛcchase sadād tad asmābhir idaṃ guhyaṃ tvatpriyārtham udāhṛtamd na ca te viditaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyated janma caiva prasūtiś ca yac cānyat kāraṇaṃ bhuvid vayaṃ tu baṭucāpalyād aśaktā guhyadhāraṇed tataḥ sthite tvayi vibho laghutvāt pralapāmahed na hi kiṃ cit tad āścaryaṃ yan na vetti bhavān ihad divi vā bhuvi vā deva sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tavad sādhayāma vayaṃ deva vṛddhiṃ puṣṭim avāpnuhid putras te sadṛśas tāta viśiṣṭo vā bhaviṣyatid bhīṣmaḥd mahāprabhāvasaṃyukto dīptikīrtikaraḥ prabhod tataḥ praṇamya deveśaṃ yādavaṃ puruṣottamamd pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya prajagmus te maharṣayaḥd so yaṃ nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān dīptyā paramayā yutaḥd vrataṃ yathāvat tac cīrtvā dvārakāṃ punar āgamatd pūrṇe ca daśame māsi putro sya paramādbhutaḥd rukmiṇyāṃ saṃmato jajñe śūro vaṃśadharaḥ prabhod sa kāmaḥ sarvajantūnāṃ sarvabhāgavato nṛpad surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca caraty antargataḥ sadād so yaṃ puruṣaśārdūlo meghavarṇaś caturbhujaḥd saṃśritaḥ pāṇḍavān premṇā bhavantaś cainam āśritāḥd kīrtir lakṣmīr dhṛtiś caiva svargamārgas tathaiva cad yatraiṣa saṃsthitas tatra devo viṣṇus trivikramaḥd sendrā devās trayastriṃśat sthitā nātra vicāraṇād ādidevo mahādevo bhūtānāṃ ca pratiśrayaḥd anādinidhano vyakto mahātmā madhusūdanaḥd svayaṃjāto mahātejāḥ surāṇām arthasiddhayed sudustarārthatattvasya vaktā kartā ca mādhavaḥd tava pārtha jayaḥ kṛtsnas tava kīrtis tathātulād taveyaṃ pṛthivī kṛtsnā nārāyaṇasamāśrayātd ayaṃ nāthas tavācintyo yasya nārāyaṇo hṛdid sa bhavān bhūmipādhvaryū raṇāgnau hutavān nṛpānd kṛṣṇaḥ sruveṇa mahatā yugāntāgnisamena vaid duryodhanas tu śocyo sau saputrabhrātṛbāndhavaḥd kṛtavān yo budhaḥ kopād dharigāṇḍīvavigrahamd daiteyā dānavendrāś ca mahākāyā mahābalāḥd cakrāgnau kṣayam āpannā dāvāgnau śalabhā ivad pratiyoddhuṃ na śakyo hi mānuṣair eṣa saṃyuged nihīnaiḥ puruṣavyāghra sattvaśaktibalādibhiḥd jayo yo yaṃ yugāntābhaḥ savyasācī raṇāgragaḥd tejasā hatavān sarvaṃ suyodhanabalaṃ nṛpad yat tu vai vṛṣabhāṅkena munibhyaḥ samudāhṛtamd purāṇaṃ himavatpṛṣṭhe tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇud yāvad asyodbhavas tuṣṭis tejo vīryaṃ parākramaḥd prabhāvaḥ sannatir janma kṛṣṇe tat tritayaṃ vibhod na śakyam anyathā kartuṃ tad yadi syāt tathāpy aṇud yatra kṛṣṇo hi bhagavāṃs tatra tuṣṭir anuttamād vayaṃ hi bālamatayaḥ paranetrāḥ suviklavāḥd jñānapūrvaṃ prapannāḥ smo mṛtyoḥ panthānam uttamamd bhavāṃś cāpy ārjavaparaḥ sarvaṃ kṛtvā pratiśrayamd rājavṛttān na calate pratijñāpālane rataḥd apy evātmavadhaṃ loke rājaṃs tvaṃ bahu manyased na hi pratijñayā dattaṃ taṃ prahātum ariṃdamad kālenāyaṃ janaḥ sarvo nihato raṇamūrdhanid vayaṃ ca kālena hatāḥ kālo hi parameśvaraḥd na hi kālena kālajña spṛṣṭaḥ śocitum arhatid kālo lohitaraktākṣaḥ kṛṣṇo daṇḍī sanātanaḥd tasmāt kuntīsuta jñātīn neha śocitum arhasid vyapetamanyur nityaṃ tvaṃ bhava kauravanandanad mādhavasya ca māhātmyaṃ śrutaṃ yat kathitaṃ mayād tad eva tava paryāptaṃ sajjanasya nidarśanamd vyāsasya vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya ca dhīmataḥd svayaṃ caiva mahārāja kṛṣṇasyārhattamasya vaid prabhāvaś carṣipūgasya kathitaḥ sumahān mayād maheśvarasya saṃvādaḥ śailaputryāś ca bhāratad dhārayiṣyati yaś cemaṃ mahāpuruṣasaṃbhavamd śṛṇuyāt kathayed vā yaḥ sa vai śreyo labhet paramd bhavitāraś ca tasyātha sarve kāmā yathepsitāḥd pretya māheśvaraṃ lokaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥd nāyaṃ śreyobhikāmena pratipattuṃ janārdaned eṣa vai cākṣayo vipraiḥ smṛto rājañ janārdanaḥd maheśvaramukhotsṛṣṭā ye ca dharmaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥd te tvayā manasā dhāryāḥ kururāja divāniśamd evaṃ te vartamānasya samyagdaṇḍadharasya cad prajāpālanadakṣasya svargaloko bhaviṣyatid dharmeṇa hi sadā rājā prajā rakṣitum arhatid yas tasya vipulo daṇḍaḥ samyag dharmaḥ sa kīrtyated sa eṣa kathito rājan mayā sajjanasaṃnidhaud śaṃkarasyomayā sārdhaṃ saṃvādo dharmasaṃhitaḥd śrutvā vā śrotukāmo vāpy arcayed vṛṣabhadhvajamd viśuddhena hi bhāvena ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥd eṣa tasyānavadyasya nāradasya mahātmanaḥd saṃdeśo devapūjārthaṃ taṃ tathā kuru pāṇḍavad etad atyadbhutaṃ vṛttaṃ puṇyaṃ haimavate giraud vāsudevasya kaunteya sthāṇoś caiva svabhāvajamd daśa varṣasahasrāṇi badaryām eṣa sātvataḥd tapaś cacāra vipulaṃ saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanād triyugau puṇḍarīkākṣau vāsudevadhanaṃjayaud viditau nāradād etau mama vyāsāc ca pārthivad bāla eva mahābāhuś cakāra kadanaṃ mahatd kaṃsasya puṇḍarīkākṣo jñātitrāṇārthakāraṇātd karmaṇām asya kaunteya nāntaṃ saṃkhyātum utsahed śāśvatasya purāṇasya puruṣasya yudhiṣṭhirad dhruvaṃ śreyaḥ paraṃ tāta bhaviṣyati tavottamamd yasya te puruṣavyāghraḥ sahāyo yaṃ janārdanaḥd duryodhanaṃ tu śocāmi pretyaloke tidurmatimd yatkṛte pṛthivī sarvā vinaṣṭā sahayadvipād duryodhanāparādhena karṇasya śakunes tathād vaiśaṃpāyanaḥd duḥśāsanacaturthānāṃ kuravo nidhanaṃ gatāḥd evaṃ prabhāṣamāṇe tu gāṅgeye puruṣarṣabhed tūṣṇīṃ babhūva kauravyo madhye teṣāṃ mahātmanāmd tac chrutvā vismayaṃ jagmur dhṛtarāṣṭrādayo nṛpāḥd saṃpūjya manasā kṛṣṇaṃ sarve prāñjalayo bhavand ṛṣayaś cāpi te sarve nāradapramukhās tathād pratigṛhyābhyanandanta tad vākyaṃ pratipūjya cad ity etad akhilaṃ sarvaṃ pāṇḍavo bhrātṛbhiḥ sahad śrutavān sumahac citraṃ puṇyaṃ bhīṣmānuśāsanamd yudhiṣṭhiras tu gāṅgeyaṃ viśrāntaṃ bhūridakṣiṇamd punar eva mahābuddhiḥ paryapṛcchan mahīpatiḥd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd ka upāyo varaprāptau sarveṣāṃ pāpakarmaṇāmd bhīṣmaḥd jñānasya ca parasyeha tan me brūhi pitāmahad upāyo yaṃ varaprāptau paramaḥ parikīrtitaḥd nārāyaṇasya tu dhyānam arcanaṃ yajanaṃ stutiḥd śravaṇaṃ tatkathānāṃ ca vidvatsaṃrakṣaṇaṃ tathād vidvacchuśrūṣaṇaprītir upadeśānupālanamd saṃdhyānena japenāśu mucyate prākṛto pi cad japaś caturvidhaḥ prokto vaidikas tāntriko pi cad paurāṇiko tha vidvadbhiḥ kathitaḥ smārta eva cad dvijaśuśrūṣayā jñānaṃ vidvatsaṃrakṣaṇena vād nāsādhyaṃ jñānināṃ kiṃ cit tasmād rakṣyā dvijās tvayād suvratā bandhuhīnaikā vane pūrvaṃ yamena tud āsīd āśvāsitā vidvatsaṃrakṣaṇaphalāt kilad viprasya maraṇe hetus tatpatnī pitṛśokadād vaiśyā tvam abhilāṣeyaṃ viprakanyeti sāṃpratamd ity uktāśvāsitāpṛcchat kenaivaṃ pāpasaṃyutād yamaḥd jātā viprakule samyak śreyaś cāpi bravīhi med anyajanmani vidvāṃsaṃ prahārair abhipīḍitamd coraśaṅkāvimokṣeṇa mokṣayitvā sujanmikād ity uktāṣṭākṣaradhyānajapādiśreyasā tu sād yamenānugṛhītābhūt puṇyalokanivāsinīd tan nityaṃ viduṣāṃ rakṣātatparo bhava bhūpated teṣāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāt tuṣṭaḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa śrutvā dharmān aśeṣeṇa pāvanāni ca sarvaśaḥc yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śāṃtanavaṃ punar evābhyabhāṣataa kim ekaṃ daivataṃ loke kiṃ vāpy ekaṃ parāyaṇamc stuvantaḥ kaṃ kam arcantaḥ prāpnuyur mānavāḥ śubhama ko dharmaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhavataḥ paramo mataḥc kiṃ japan mucyate jantur janmasaṃsārabandhanāt bhīṣma uvācaa jagatprabhuṃ devadevam anantaṃ puruṣottamamc stuvan nāmasahasreṇa puruṣaḥ satatotthitaḥa tam eva cārcayan nityaṃ bhaktyā puruṣam avyayamc dhyāyan stuvan namasyaṃś ca yajamānas tam eva caa anādinidhanaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvalokamaheśvaramc lokādhyakṣaṃ stuvan nityaṃ sarvaduḥkhātigo bhaveta brahmaṇyaṃ sarvadharmajñaṃ lokānāṃ kīrtivardhanamc lokanāthaṃ mahad bhūtaṃ sarvabhūtabhavodbhavama eṣa me sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmo dhikatamo mataḥc yad bhaktyā puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ stavair arcen naraḥ sadāa paramaṃ yo mahat tejaḥ paramaṃ yo mahat tapaḥc paramaṃ yo mahad brahma paramaṃ yaḥ parāyaṇama pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ yo maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalamc daivataṃ devatānāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ yo vyayaḥ pitāa yataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhavanty ādiyugāgamec yasmiṃś ca pralayaṃ yānti punar eva yugakṣayea tasya lokapradhānasya jagannāthasya bhūpatec viṣṇor nāmasahasraṃ me śṛṇu pāpabhayāpahama yāni nāmāni gauṇāni vikhyātāni mahātmanaḥc ṛṣibhiḥ parigītāni tāni vakṣyāmi bhūtaye viṣṇor nāmasahasrasya vedavyāso mahān ṛṣiḥ chando nuṣṭup tathā devo bhagavān viśvarūpadhṛk ṛṣir nāmnāṃ sahasrasya vedavyāso mahāmuniḥ chando nuṣṭup tathā devo bhagavān devakīsutaḥ amṛtāṃśūdbhavo bījaṃ śaktir devakīnandanaḥ trisāmā hṛdayaṃ tasya śāntyarthe viniyujyate viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ mahāviṣṇuṃ prabhaviṣṇuṃ maheśvaram anekarūpadaityāntaṃ namāmi puruṣottamama viśvaṃ viṣṇur vaṣaṭkāro bhūtabhavyabhavatprabhuḥc bhūtakṛd bhūtabhṛd bhāvo bhūtātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥa pūtātmā paramātmā ca muktānāṃ paramā gatiḥc avyayaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣī kṣetrajño kṣara eva caa yogo yogavidāṃ netā pradhānapuruṣeśvaraḥc nārasiṃhavapuḥ śrīmān keśavaḥ puruṣottamaḥa sarvaḥ śarvaḥ śivaḥ sthāṇur bhūtādir nidhir avyayaḥc saṃbhavo bhāvano bhartā prabhavaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥa svayaṃbhūḥ śaṃbhur ādityaḥ puṣkarākṣo mahāsvanaḥc anādinidhano dhātā vidhātā dhātur uttamaḥa aprameyo hṛṣīkeśaḥ padmanābho maraprabhuḥc viśvakarmā manus tvaṣṭā sthaviṣṭhaḥ sthaviro dhruvaḥa agrāhyaḥ śāśvataḥ kṛṣṇo lohitākṣaḥ pratardanaḥc prabhūtas trikakubdhāma pavitraṃ maṅgalaṃ parama īśānaḥ prāṇadaḥ prāṇo jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ prajāpatiḥc hiraṇyagarbho bhūgarbho mādhavo madhusūdanaḥa īśvaro vikramī dhanvī medhāvī vikramaḥ kramaḥc anuttamo durādharṣaḥ kṛtajñaḥ kṛtir ātmavāna sureśaḥ śaraṇaṃ śarma viśvaretāḥ prajābhavaḥc ahaḥ saṃvatsaro vyālaḥ pratyayaḥ sarvadarśanaḥa ajaḥ sarveśvaraḥ siddhaḥ siddhiḥ sarvādir acyutaḥc vṛṣākapir ameyātmā sarvayogaviniḥsṛtaḥa vasur vasumanāḥ satyaḥ samātmā saṃmitaḥ samaḥc amoghaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo vṛṣakarmā vṛṣākṛtiḥa rudro bahuśirā babhrur viśvayoniḥ śuciśravāḥc amṛtaḥ śāśvataḥ sthāṇur varāroho mahātapāḥd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśāradad kiṃ japyaṃ japato nityaṃ bhaved dharmaphalaṃ mahatd prasthāne vā praveśe vā pravṛtte vāpi karmaṇid daive vā śrāddhakāle vā kiṃ japyaṃ karmasādhanamd śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ rakṣā śatrughnaṃ bhayanāśanamd bhīṣmaḥd japyaṃ yad brahmasamitaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhatid vyāsaproktam imaṃ mantraṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpad sāvitryā vihitaṃ divyaṃ sadyaḥ pāpavimocanamd śṛṇu mantravidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ procyamānaṃ mayānaghad yaṃ śrutvā pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyated rātrāv ahani dharmajña yena pāpair na lipyated tat te haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpad āyuṣmān bhavate caiva yaṃ śrutvā pārthivātmajad puruṣas tu susiddhārthaḥ pretya ceha ca modated sevitaṃ satataṃ rājan purā rājarṣisattamaiḥd kṣatradharmaparair nityaṃ satyavrataparāyaṇaiḥd idam āhnikam avyagraṃ kurvadbhir niyataiḥ sadād nṛpair bharataśārdūla prāpyate śrīr anuttamād namo vasiṣṭhāya mahāvratāyad parāśaraṃ vedanidhiṃ praṇamyad namo stv anantāya mahoragāyad namo stu siddhebhya ihākṣayebhyaḥd namo stv ṛṣibhyaḥ paramaṃ pareṣāṃd deveṣu devaṃ varadaṃ varāṇāmd sahasraśīrṣāya namaḥ śivāyad sahasranāmāya janārdanāyad ajaikapād ahirbudhnyaḥ pinākī cāparājitaḥd ṛtaś ca pitṛrūpaś ca tryambakaś ca maheśvaraḥd vṛṣākapiś ca śaṃbhuś ca havano theśvaras tathād ekādaśaite prathitā rudrās tribhuvaneśvarāḥd śatam etat samākhyātaṃ śatarudre mahātmanāmd aṃśo bhagaś ca mitraś ca varuṇaś ca jaleśvaraḥd tathā dhātāryamā caiva jayanto bhāskaras tathād tvaṣṭā pūṣā tathaivendro dvādaśo viṣṇur ucyated ity ete dvādaśādityāḥ kāśyapeyā iti śrutiḥd dharo dhruvaś ca somaś ca sāvitro thānilo nalaḥd pratyūṣaś ca prabhāsaś ca vasavo ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥd nāsatyaś cāpi dasraś ca smṛtau dvāv aśvināv apid mārtaṇḍasyātmajāv etau saṃjñānāsāvinirgataud ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi lokānāṃ karmasākṣiṇaḥd api yajñasya vettāro dattasya sukṛtasya cad adṛśyāḥ sarvabhūteṣu paśyanti tridaśeśvarāḥd śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi mṛtyuḥ kālaś ca sarvaśaḥd viśvedevāḥ pitṛgaṇā mūrtimantas tapodhanāḥd munayaś caiva siddhāś ca tapomokṣaparāyaṇāḥd śucismitāḥ kīrtayatāṃ prayacchanti śubhaṃ nṛṇāmd prajāpatikṛtān etāṃl lokān divyena tejasād vasanti sarvalokeṣu prayatāḥ sarvakarmasud prāṇānām īśvarān etān kīrtayan prayato naraḥd dharmārthakāmair vipulair yujyate sa hi nityaśaḥd lokāṃś ca labhate puṇyān viśveśvarakṛtāñ śubhānd ete devās trayastriṃśat sarvabhūtagaṇeśvarāḥd nandīśvaro mahākāyo grāmaṇīr vṛṣabhadhvajaḥd īśvarāḥ sarvalokānāṃ gaṇeśvaravināyakāḥd saumyā raudragaṇāś caiva yogabhūtagaṇās tathād jyotīṃṣi sarito vyoma suparṇaḥ patageśvaraḥd pṛthivyāṃ tapasā siddhāḥ sthāvarāś ca carāś ca had himavān girayaś caiva catvāraś ca mahārṇavāḥd bhavasyānucarāḥ sarve haratulyaparākramāḥd viṣṇur devo tha jiṣṇuś ca skandaś cāmbikayā sahad kīrtayan prayataḥ sarvān sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyated ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi mānavān ṛṣisattamānd yavakrītaś ca raibhyaś ca arvāvasuparāvasūd auśijaś caiva kakṣīvān balaś cāṅgirasaḥ sutaḥd ṛṣir medhātitheḥ putraḥ kaṇvo barhiṣadas tathād brahmatejomayāḥ sarve kīrtitā lokabhāvanāḥd labhante hi śubhaṃ sarve rudrānalavasuprabhāḥd bhuvi kṛtvā śubhaṃ karma modante divi daivataiḥd mahendraguravaḥ sapta prācīṃ vai diśam āśritāḥd prayataḥ kīrtayann etāñ śakraloke mahīyated unmucuḥ pramucuś caiva svastyātreyaś ca vīryavānd dṛḍhavyaś cordhvabāhuś ca tṛṇasomāṅgirās tathād mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putras tathāgastyaḥ pratāpavānd dharmarājartvijaḥ sapta dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥd dṛḍheyuś ca ṛteyuś ca parivyādhaś ca kīrtimānd ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś cādityasaṃnibhāḥd atreḥ putraś ca dharmātmā ṛṣiḥ sārasvatas tathād varuṇasyartvijaḥ sapta paścimāṃ diśam āśritāḥd atrir vasiṣṭho bhagavān kaśyapaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥd gautamaś ca bharadvājo viśvāmitro tha kauśikaḥd ṛcīkatanayaś cogro jamadagniḥ pratāpavānd dhaneśvarasya guravaḥ saptaite uttarāṃ śritāḥd apare munayaḥ sapta dikṣu sarvāsu dhiṣṭhitāḥd kīrtisvastikarā nṝṇāṃ kīrtitā lokabhāvanāḥd dharmaḥ kāmaś ca kālaś ca vasur vāsukir eva cad anantaḥ kapilaś caiva saptaite dharaṇīdharāḥd rāmo vyāsas tathā drauṇir aśvatthāmā ca lomaśaḥd ity ete munayo divyā ekaikaḥ saptasaptadhād śāntisvastikarā loke diśāṃ pālāḥ prakīrtitāḥd yasyāṃ yasyāṃ diśi hy ete tanmukhaḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajetd sraṣṭāraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ kīrtitā lokapāvanāḥd saṃvarto merusāvarṇo mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dhārmikaḥd sāṃkhyayogau nāradaś ca durvāsāś ca mahān ṛṣiḥd atyantatapaso dāntās triṣu lokeṣu viśrutāḥd apare rudrasaṃkāśāḥ kīrtitā brahmalaukikāḥd aputro labhate putraṃ daridro labhate dhanamd tathā dharmārthakāmeṣu siddhiṃ ca labhate naraḥd pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ nṛpavaraṃ pṛthvī yasyābhavat sutād prajāpatiṃ sārvabhaumaṃ kīrtayed vasudhādhipamd ādityavaṃśaprabhavaṃ mahendrasamavikramamd purūravasamailaṃ ca triṣu lokeṣu viśrutamd budhasya dayitaṃ putraṃ kīrtayed vasudhādhipamd trilokaviśrutaṃ vīraṃ bharataṃ ca prakīrtayetd gavāmayena yajñena yeneṣṭaṃ vai kṛte yuged rantidevaṃ mahādevaṃ kīrtayet paramadyutimd viśvajit tapasopetaṃ lakṣaṇyaṃ kāmalakṣaṇamd tathā śvetaṃ ca rājarṣiṃ kīrtayet paramadyutimd sthāṇuḥ prasādito yena yasyārthe hy andhako hataḥd mahādevaprasādena yena gaṅgāvatāritād bhagīrathaṃ durādharṣaṃ kīrtayet paramadyutimd sagarasyātmajā yena plāvitās tāritās tathād hutāśanasamān etān mahārūpān mahaujasaḥd ugrakopān mahāsattvān kīrtayet kīrtivardhanānd devān ṛṣigaṇāṃś caiva nṛpāṃś ca jagatīśvarānd sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca paramaṃ havyaṃ kavyaṃ tathaiva cad kīrtitaṃ paramaṃ brahma sarvaśrutiparāyaṇamd maṅgalyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ pavitraṃ bahukīrtitamd vyādhipraśamanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ sarvakarmaṇāmd prayataḥ kīrtayec caitān kalyaṃ sāyaṃ ca bhāratad ete vai yānti varṣanti bhānti vānti sṛjanti cad ete vināyakāḥ śreṣṭhā dakṣāḥ kṣāntā jitendriyāḥd narāṇām aśubhaṃ sarve vyapohanti prakīrtitāḥd sākṣibhūtā mahātmānaḥ pāpasya sukṛtasya cad etān vai kalyam utthāya kīrtayañ śubham aśnuted nāgnicorabhayaṃ tatra na mārgapratirodhanamd etān kīrtayatāṃ nityaṃ duḥsvapno naśyate nṛṇāmd mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ svastimāṃś ca gṛhān vrajetd dīkṣākāleṣu sarveṣu yaḥ paṭhen niyato dvijaḥd nyāyavān ātmanirataḥ kṣānto dānto nasūyakaḥd rogārto vābhiyukto vā paṭhan pāpāt pramucyated vāstumadhye tu paṭhataḥ kulasvastyayanaṃ bhavetd kṣetramadhye tu paṭhataḥ sarvaṃ sasyaṃ prarohatid gacchataḥ kṣemam adhvānaṃ grāmāntaragataḥ paṭhand ātmanaś ca sutānāṃ ca dārāṇāṃ ca dhanasya cad bījānām oṣadhīnāṃ ca rakṣām etāṃ prayojayetd etān saṃgrāmakāle tu paṭhataḥ kṣatriyasya tud vrajanti ripavo nāśaṃ kṣemaṃ ca vinivartated etān daive ca pitrye ca paṭhataḥ puruṣasya hid bhuñjate pitaro havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca tridivaukasaḥd na vyādhiśvāpadabhayaṃ na dvipān na hi taskarātd kaśmalaṃ laghutāṃ yāti pāpmanā ca pramucyated yānapātre ca yāne ca pravāse rājaveśmanid parāṃ siddhim avāpnoti sāvitrīṃ hy uttamāṃ paṭhand na ca rājabhayaṃ teṣāṃ na piśācān na rākṣasātd nāgnyambupavanavyālād bhayaṃ tasyopajāyated caturṇām api varṇānām āśramasya viśeṣataḥd karoti satataṃ śāntiṃ sāvitrīm uttamāṃ paṭhand nāgnir dahati kāṣṭhāni sāvitrī yatra paṭhyated na tatra bālo mriyate na ca tiṣṭhanti pannagāḥd na teṣāṃ vidyate duḥkhaṃ gacchanti paramāṃ gatimd ye śṛṇvanti mahad brahma sāvitrīguṇakīrtanamd gavāṃ madhye tu paṭhato gāvo sya bahuvatsalāḥd prasthāne vā praveśe vā sarvāvasthāgataḥ paṭhetd japatāṃ juhvatāṃ caiva nityaṃ ca prayatātmanāmd ṛṣīṇāṃ paramaṃ japyaṃ guhyam etan narādhipad yāthātathyena saṃgamya itihāsaṃ purātanamd parāśaramataṃ divyaṃ śakrāya kathitaṃ purād tad etat te samākhyātaṃ tathyaṃ brahma sanātanamd hṛdayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śrutir eṣā purātanīd somādityānvayāḥ sarve rāghavāḥ kuravas tathād paṭhanti śucayo nityaṃ sāvitrīṃ prāṇināṃ gatimd abhyāśe nityaṃ devānāṃ saptarṣīṇāṃ dhruvasya cad mokṣaṇaṃ sarvakṛcchrāṇāṃ mocayaty aśubhāt sadād vṛddhaiḥ kāśyapagautamaprabhṛtibhir bhṛgvaṅgirotryādibhiḥd śukrāgastyabṛhaspatiprabhṛtibhir brahmarṣibhiḥ sevitamd bhāradvājamataṃ ṛcīkatanayaiḥ prāptaṃ vasiṣṭhāt punaḥd sāvitrīm adhigamya śakravasubhiḥ kṛtsnā jitā dānavāḥd yo gośataṃ kanakaśṛṅgamayaṃ dadātid viprāya vedaviduṣe ca bahuśrutāyad divyāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ kathayec ca nityaṃd tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya caivad dharmo vivardhati bhṛgoḥ parikīrtanenad vīryaṃ vivardhati vasiṣṭhanamonatenad saṃgrāmajid bhavati caiva raghuṃ namasyand syād aśvinau ca parikīrtayato na rogaḥd eṣā te kathitā rājan sāvitrī brahma śāśvatīd vivakṣur asi yac cānyat tat te vakṣyāmi bhārataa sarvagaḥ sarvavid bhānur viṣvakseno janārdanaḥc vedo vedavid avyaṅgo vedāṅgo vedavit kaviḥa lokādhyakṣaḥ surādhyakṣo dharmādhyakṣaḥ kṛtākṛtaḥc caturātmā caturvyūhaś caturdaṃṣṭraś caturbhujaḥa bhrājiṣṇur bhojanaṃ bhoktā sahiṣṇur jagadādijaḥc anagho vijayo jetā viśvayoniḥ punarvasuḥa upendro vāmanaḥ prāṃśur amoghaḥ śucir ūrjitaḥc atīndraḥ saṃgrahaḥ sargo dhṛtātmā niyamo yamaḥa vedyo vaidyaḥ sadāyogī vīrahā mādhavo madhuḥc atīndriyo mahāmāyo mahotsāho mahābalaḥa mahābuddhir mahāvīryo mahāśaktir mahādyutiḥc anirdeśyavapuḥ śrīmān ameyātmā mahādridhṛka maheṣvāso mahībhartā śrīnivāsaḥ satāṃ gatiḥc aniruddhaḥ surānando govindo govidāṃ patiḥa marīcir damano haṃsaḥ suparṇo bhujagottamaḥc hiraṇyanābhaḥ sutapāḥ padmanābhaḥ prajāpatiḥa amṛtyuḥ sarvadṛk siṃhaḥ saṃdhātā saṃdhimān sthiraḥc ajo durmarṣaṇaḥ śāstā viśrutātmā surārihāa gurur gurutamo dhāma satyaḥ satyaparākramaḥc nimiṣo nimiṣaḥ sragvī vācaspatir udāradhīḥa agraṇīr grāmaṇīḥ śrīmān nyāyo netā samīraṇaḥc sahasramūrdhā viśvātmā sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāta āvartano nivṛttātmā saṃvṛtaḥ saṃpramardanaḥc ahaḥ saṃvartako vahnir anilo dharaṇīdharaḥa suprasādaḥ prasannātmā viśvadhṛg viśvabhug vibhuḥc satkartā satkṛtaḥ sādhur jahnur nārāyaṇo naraḥa asaṃkhyeyo prameyātmā viśiṣṭaḥ śiṣṭakṛc chuciḥc siddhārthaḥ siddhasaṃkalpaḥ siddhidaḥ siddhisādhanaḥa vṛṣāhī vṛṣabho viṣṇur vṛṣaparvā vṛṣodaraḥc vardhano vardhamānaś ca viviktaḥ śrutisāgaraḥa subhujo durdharo vāgmī mahendro vasudo vasuḥc naikarūpo bṛhadrūpaḥ śipiviṣṭaḥ prakāśanaḥa ojas tejo dyutidharaḥ prakāśātmā pratāpanaḥc ṛddhaḥ spaṣṭākṣaro mantraś candrāṃśur bhāskaradyutiḥa amṛtāṃśūdbhavo bhānuḥ śaśabinduḥ sureśvaraḥc auṣadhaṃ jagataḥ setuḥ satyadharmaparākramaḥa bhūtabhavyabhavannāthaḥ pavanaḥ pāvano nilaḥc kāmahā kāmakṛt kāntaḥ kāmaḥ kāmapradaḥ prabhuḥa yugādikṛd yugāvarto naikamāyo mahāśanaḥc adṛśyo vyaktarūpaś ca sahasrajid anantajita iṣṭo viśiṣṭaḥ śiṣṭeṣṭaḥ śikhaṇḍī nahuṣo vṛṣaḥc krodhahā krodhakṛt kartā viśvabāhur mahīdharaḥa acyutaḥ prathitaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇado vāsavānujaḥc apāṃ nidhir adhiṣṭhānam apramattaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥa skandaḥ skandadharo dhuryo varado vāyuvāhanaḥc vāsudevo bṛhadbhānur ādidevaḥ puraṃdaraḥa aśokas tāraṇas tāraḥ śūraḥ śaurir janeśvaraḥc anukūlaḥ śatāvartaḥ padmī padmanibhekṣaṇaḥa padmanābho ravindākṣaḥ padmagarbhaḥ śarīrabhṛtc maharddhir ṛddho vṛddhātmā mahākṣo garuḍadhvajaḥa atulaḥ śarabho bhīmaḥ samayajño havir hariḥc sarvalakṣaṇalakṣaṇyo lakṣmīvān samitiṃjayaḥa vikṣaro rohito mārgo hetur dāmodaraḥ sahaḥc mahīdharo mahābhāgo vegavān amitāśanaḥa udbhavaḥ kṣobhaṇo devaḥ śrīgarbhaḥ parameśvaraḥc karaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ kartā vikartā gahano guhaḥa vyavasāyo vyavasthānaḥ saṃsthānaḥ sthānado dhruvaḥc pararddhiḥ paramaḥ spaṣṭas tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ śubhekṣaṇaḥa rāmo virāmo virato mārgo neyo nayo nayaḥc vīraḥ śaktimatāṃ śreṣṭho dharmo dharmavid uttamaḥa vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇadaḥ praṇavaḥ pṛthuḥc hiraṇyagarbhaḥ śatrughno vyāpto vāyur adhokṣajaḥa ṛtuḥ sudarśanaḥ kālaḥ parameṣṭhī parigrahaḥc ugraḥ saṃvatsaro dakṣo viśrāmo viśvadakṣiṇaḥa vistāraḥ sthāvaraḥ sthāṇuḥ pramāṇaṃ bījam avyayamc artho nartho mahākośo mahābhogo mahādhanaḥa anirviṇṇaḥ sthaviṣṭho bhūr dharmayūpo mahāmakhaḥc nakṣatranemir nakṣatrī kṣamaḥ kṣāmaḥ samīhanaḥa yajña ijyo mahejyaś ca kratuḥ satraṃ satāṃ gatiḥc sarvadarśī vimuktātmā sarvajño jñānam uttamama suvrataḥ sumukhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sughoṣaḥ sukhadaḥ suhṛtc manoharo jitakrodho vīrabāhur vidāraṇaḥa svāpanaḥ svavaśo vyāpī naikātmā naikakarmakṛtc vatsaro vatsalo vatsī ratnagarbho dhaneśvaraḥa dharmagub dharmakṛd dharmī sad asat kṣaram akṣaramc avijñātā sahasrāṃśur vidhātā kṛtalakṣaṇaḥa gabhastinemiḥ sattvasthaḥ siṃho bhūtamaheśvaraḥc ādidevo mahādevo deveśo devabhṛd guruḥa uttaro gopatir goptā jñānagamyaḥ purātanaḥc śarīrabhūtabhṛd bhoktā kapīndro bhūridakṣiṇaḥa somapo mṛtapaḥ somaḥ purujit purusattamaḥc vinayo jayaḥ satyasaṃdho dāśārhaḥ sātvatāṃ patiḥa jīvo vinayitā sākṣī mukundo mitavikramaḥc ambhonidhir anantātmā mahodadhiśayo ntakaḥa ajo mahārhaḥ svābhāvyo jitāmitraḥ pramodanaḥc ānando nandano nandaḥ satyadharmā trivikramaḥa maharṣiḥ kapilācāryaḥ kṛtajño medinīpatiḥc tripadas tridaśādhyakṣo mahāśṛṅgaḥ kṛtāntakṛta mahāvarāho govindaḥ suṣeṇaḥ kanakāṅgadīc guhyo gabhīro gahano guptaś cakragadādharaḥa vedhāḥ svāṅgo jitaḥ kṛṣṇo dṛḍhaḥ saṃkarṣaṇo cyutaḥc varuṇo vāruṇo vṛkṣaḥ puṣkarākṣo mahāmanāḥa bhagavān bhagahā nandī vanamālī halāyudhaḥc ādityo jyotir ādityaḥ sahiṣṇur gatisattamaḥa sudhanvā khaṇḍaparaśur dāruṇo draviṇapradaḥc divaḥspṛk sarvadṛg vyāso vācaspatir ayonijaḥa trisāmā sāmagaḥ sāma nirvāṇaṃ bheṣajaṃ bhiṣakc saṃnyāsakṛc chamaḥ śānto niṣṭhā śāntiḥ parāyaṇama śubhāṅgaḥ śāntidaḥ sraṣṭā kumudaḥ kuvaleśayaḥc gohito gopatir goptā vṛṣabhākṣo vṛṣapriyaḥa anivartī nivṛttātmā saṃkṣeptā kṣemakṛc chivaḥc śrīvatsavakṣāḥ śrīvāsaḥ śrīpatiḥ śrīmatāṃ varaḥa śrīdaḥ śrīśaḥ śrīnivāsaḥ śrīnidhiḥ śrīvibhāvanaḥc śrīdharaḥ śrīkaraḥ śreyaḥ śrīmāṃl lokatrayāśrayaḥa svakṣaḥ svaṅgaḥ śatānando nandir jyotir gaṇeśvaraḥc vijitātmā vidheyātmā satkīrtiś chinnasaṃśayaḥa udīrṇaḥ sarvataścakṣur anīśaḥ śāśvataḥ sthiraḥc bhūśayo bhūṣaṇo bhūtir viśokaḥ śokanāśanaḥa arciṣmān arcitaḥ kumbho viśuddhātmā viśodhanaḥc aniruddho pratirathaḥ pradyumno mitavikramaḥa kālaneminihā vīraḥ śūraḥ śaurir janeśvaraḥc trilokātmā trilokeśaḥ keśavaḥ keśihā hariḥa kāmadevaḥ kāmapālaḥ kāmī kāntaḥ kṛtāgamaḥc anirdeśyavapur viṣṇur vīro nanto dhanaṃjayaḥa brahmaṇyo brahmakṛd brahmā brahma brahmavivardhanaḥc brahmavid brāhmaṇo brahmī brahmajño brāhmaṇapriyaḥa mahākramo mahākarmā mahātejā mahoragaḥc mahākratur mahāyajvā mahāyajño mahāhaviḥa stavyaḥ stavapriyaḥ stotraṃ stutiḥ stotā raṇapriyaḥc pūrṇaḥ pūrayitā puṇyaḥ puṇyakīrtir anāmayaḥa manojavas tīrthakaro vasuretā vasupradaḥc vasuprado vāsudevo vasur vasumanā haviḥa sadgatiḥ satkṛtiḥ sattā sadbhūtiḥ satparāyaṇaḥc śūraseno yaduśreṣṭhaḥ sannivāsaḥ suyāmunaḥa bhūtāvāso vāsudevo sarvāsunilayo nalaḥc darpahā darpado dṛpto durdharo thāparājitaḥa viśvamūrtir mahāmūrtir dīptamūrtir amūrtimānc anekamūrtir avyaktaḥ śatamūrtiḥ śatānanaḥa eko naikaḥ savaḥ kaḥ kiṃ yat tat padam anuttamamc lokabandhur lokanātho mādhavo bhaktavatsalaḥa suvarṇavarṇo hemāṅgo varāṅgaś candanāṅgadīc vīrahā viṣamaḥ śūnyo ghṛtāśīr acalaś calaḥa amānī mānado mānyo lokasvāmī trilokadhṛkc sumedhā medhajo dhanyaḥ satyamedhā dharādharaḥa tejo vṛṣo dyutidharaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥc pragraho nigraho vyagro naikaśṛṅgo gadāgrajaḥa caturmūrtiś caturbāhuś caturvyūhaś caturgatiḥc caturātmā caturbhāvaś caturvedavid ekapāta samāvarto nivṛttātmā durjayo duratikramaḥc durlabho durgamo atandritaḥa athāgamya mahārāja namaskṛtya ca kaśyapamc pṛthivī kāśyapī jajñe sutā tasya mahātmanaḥa eṣa rājann īdṛśo vai brāhmaṇaḥ kaśyapo bhavatc anyaṃ prabrūhi vāpi tvaṃ kaśyapāt kṣatriyaṃ varama tūṣṇīṃ babhūva nṛpatiḥ pavanas tv abravīt punaḥc śṛṇu rājann utathyasya jātasyāṅgirase kulea bhadrā somasya duhitā rūpeṇa paramā matāc tasyās tulyaṃ patiṃ soma utathyaṃ samapaśyataa sā ca tīvraṃ tapas tepe mahābhāgā yaśasvinīc utathyaṃ tu mahābhāgaṃ tatkṛte varayat tadād utathyārthe tu cārvaṅgī paraṃ niyamam āsthitāa tata āhūya sotathyaṃ dadāv atra yaśasvinīmc bhāryārthe sa ca jagrāha vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaa tāṃ tv akāmayata śrīmān varuṇaḥ pūrvam eva hac sa cāgamya vanaprasthaṃ yamunāyāṃ jahāra tāma jaleśvaras tu hṛtvā tām anayat svapuraṃ pratic paramādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ ṣaṭsahasraśatahradama na hi ramyataraṃ kiṃ cit tasmād anyat purottamamc prāsādair apsarobhiś ca divyaiḥ kāmaiś ca śobhitame tatra devas tayā sārdhaṃ reme rājañ jaleśvaraḥa athākhyātam utathyāya tataḥ patnyavamardanama tac chrutvā nāradāt sarvam utathyo nāradaṃ tadāc provāca gaccha brūhi tvaṃ varuṇaṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥe madvākyān muñca me bhāryāṃ kasmād vā hṛtavān asia lokapālo si lokānāṃ na lokasya vilopakaḥc somena dattā bhāryā me tvayā cāpahṛtādya vaia ity ukto vacanāt tasya nāradena jaleśvaraḥc muñca bhāryām utathyasyety atha taṃ varuṇo bravītc kasmāt tvaṃ hatavān asic iti śrutvā vacas tasyae mamaiṣā supriyā bhāryā nainām utsraṣṭum utsahea ity ukto varuṇenātha nāradaḥ prāpya taṃ munimc utathyam abravīd vākyaṃ nātihṛṣṭamanā ivaa gale gṛhītvā kṣipto smi varuṇena mahāmunec na prayacchati te bhāryāṃ yat te kāryaṃ kuruṣva tata nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhaḥ prājvalad aṅgirāḥc apibat tejasā vāri viṣṭabhya sumahātapāḥa pīyamāne ca sarvasmiṃs toye vai salileśvaraḥc suhṛdbhiḥ kṣipyamāṇo pi naivāmuñcata tāṃ tadāa tataḥ kruddho bravīd bhūmim utathyo brāhmaṇottamaḥc darśayasva sthalaṃ bhadre ṣaṭsahasraśatahradama tatas tad iriṇaṃ jātaṃ samudraś cāpasarpitaḥc tasmād deśān nadīṃ caiva provācāsau dvijottamaḥa adṛśyā gaccha bhīru tvaṃ sarasvati maruṃ pratic apuṇya eṣa bhavatu deśas tyaktas tvayā śubhea tasmin saṃcūrṇite deśe bhadrām ādāya vāripaḥc adadāc charaṇaṃ gatvā bhāryām āṅgirasāya vaia pratigṛhya tu tāṃ bhāryām utathyaḥ sumanābhavatc mumoca ca jagad duḥkhād varuṇaṃ caiva haihayaa tataḥ sa labdhvā tāṃ bhāryāṃ varuṇaṃ prāha dharmavitb aspṛśyo pānayogyaś ca kṣipram eva bhaviṣyatic utathyaḥ sumahātejā yat tac chṛṇu narādhipad muktas tvam āyuḥśeṣeṇa mā bhair gaccha jaleśvarad māvamaṃsthāḥ punar mohān mā tvāṃ ninyur yamakṣayama mayaiṣā tapasā prāptā krośatas te jalādhipac ity uktvā tām upādāya svam eva bhavanaṃ yayaua eṣa rājann īdṛśo vai utathyo brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥc bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam utathyāt kṣatriyaṃ varam bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tato bravītc śṛṇu rājann agastyasya māhātmyaṃ brāhmaṇasya haa asurair nirjitā devā nirutsāhāś ca te kṛtāḥc yajñāś caiṣāṃ hṛtāḥ sarve pitṛbhyaś ca svadhā tathāa karmejyā mānavānāṃ ca dānavair haihayarṣabhac bhraṣṭaiśvaryās tato devāś ceruḥ pṛthvīm iti śrutiḥa tataḥ kadā cit te rājan dīptam ādityavarcasamc dadṛśus tejasā yuktam agastyaṃ vipulavratama abhivādya ca taṃ devā dṛṣṭvā ca yaśasā vṛtamc idam ūcur mahātmānaṃ vākyaṃ kāle janādhipaa dānavair yudhi bhagnāḥ sma tathaiśvaryāc ca bhraṃśitāḥc tad asmān no bhayāt tīvrāt trāhi tvaṃ munipuṃgavaa ity uktaḥ sa tadā devair agastyaḥ kupito bhavatc prajajvāla ca tejasvī kālāgnir iva saṃkṣayea tena dīptāṃśujālena nirdagdhā dānavās tadāc antarikṣān mahārāja nyapatanta sahasraśaḥa dahyamānās tu te daityās tasyāgastyasya tejasāc ubhau lokau parityajya yayuḥ kāṣṭhāṃ sma dakṣiṇāma balis tu yajate yajñam aśvamedhaṃ mahīṃ gataḥc ye nye svasthā mahīsthāś ca te na dagdhā mahāsurāḥa tato lokāḥ punaḥ prāptāḥ suraiḥ śāntaṃ ca tad rajaḥc athainam abruvan devā bhūmiṣṭhān asurāñ jahia ity ukta āha devān sa na śaknomi mahīgatānc dagdhuṃ tapo hi kṣīyen me dhakṣyāmīti ca pārthivaa evaṃ dagdhā bhagavatā dānavāḥ svena tejasāc agastyena tadā rājaṃs tapasā bhāvitātmanāa īdṛśaś cāpy agastyo hi kathitas te mayānaghac bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam agastyāt kṣatriyaṃ varama ity uktaḥ sa tadā tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tato bravītc śṛṇu rājan vasiṣṭhasya mukhyaṃ karma yaśasvinaḥd vaikhānasavidhānena gaṅgātīraṃ samāśritāḥa ādityāḥ satram āsanta saro vai mānasaṃ pratic vasiṣṭhaṃ manasā gatvā śrutvā tatrāsya gocarama yajamānāṃs tu tān dṛṣṭvā vyagrān dīkṣānukarśitānc hantum icchanti śailābhāḥ khalino nāma dānavāḥa adūrāt tu tatas teṣāṃ brahmadattavaraṃ saraḥc hatā hatā vai te tatra jīvanty āplutya dānavāḥa te pragṛhya mahāghorān parvatān parighān drumānc vikṣobhayantaḥ salilam utthitāḥ śatayojanama abhyadravanta devāṃs te sahasrāṇi daśaiva hac tatas tair arditā devāḥ śaraṇaṃ vāsavaṃ yayuḥa sa ca tair vyathitaḥ śakro vasiṣṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayauc tato bhayaṃ dadau tebhyo vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥa tathā tān duḥkhitāñ jānann ānṛśaṃsyaparo muniḥc ayatnenādahat sarvān khalinaḥ svena tejasāa kailāsaṃ prasthitāṃ cāpi nadīṃ gaṅgāṃ mahātapāḥc ānayat tat saro divyaṃ tayā bhinnaṃ ca tat saraḥa saro bhinnaṃ tayā nadyā sarayūḥ sā tato bhavatc hatāś ca khalino yatra sa deśaḥ khalino bhavata evaṃ sendrā vasiṣṭhena rakṣitās tridivaukasaḥc brahmadattavarāś caiva hatā daityā mahātmanāa etat karma vasiṣṭhasya kathitaṃ te mayānaghac bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvaṃ vasiṣṭhāt kṣatriyaṃ varam bhīṣma uvācaa ity uktas tv arjunas tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravītc śṛṇu me haihayaśreṣṭha karmātreḥ sumahātmanaḥa ghore tamasy ayudhyanta sahitā devadānavāḥc avidhyata śarais tatra svarbhānuḥ somabhāskaraua atha te tamasā grastā nihanyante sma dānavaiḥc devā nṛpatiśārdūla sahaiva balibhis tadāa asurair vadhyamānās te kṣīṇaprāṇā divaukasaḥc apaśyanta tapasyantam atriṃ vipraṃ mahāvanea athainam abruvan devāḥ śāntakrodhaṃ jitendriyamc asurair iṣubhir viddhau candrādityāv imāv ubhaua vayaṃ vadhyāmahe cāpi śatrubhis tamasāvṛtec nādhigacchāma śāntiṃ ca bhayāt trāyasva naḥ prabhoa kathaṃ rakṣāmi bhavatas te bruvaṃś candramā bhavac timiraghnaś ca savitā dasyuhā caiva no bhavaa evam uktas tadātris tu tamonud abhavac chaśīc apaśyat saumyabhāvaṃ ca sūryasya pratidarśanama dṛṣṭvā nātiprabhaṃ somaṃ tathā sūryaṃ ca pārthivac prakāśam akarod atris tapasā svena saṃyugea jagad vitimiraṃ cāpi pradīptam akarot tadāc vyajayac chatrusaṃghāṃś ca devānāṃ svena tejasāa atriṇā dahyamānāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā devā mahāsurānc parākramais te pi tadā vyatyaghnann atrirakṣitāḥa udbhāsitaś ca savitā devās trātā hatāsurāḥc atriṇā tv atha somatvaṃ kṛtam uttamatejasāa advitīyena muninā japatā carmavāsasāc phalabhakṣeṇa rājarṣe paśya karmātriṇā kṛtama tasyāpi vistareṇoktaṃ karmātreḥ sumahātmanaḥc bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvam atritaḥ kṣatriyaṃ varamd evam atrer mahārāja kathitaṃ karma cādbhutama ity uktas tv arjunas tūṣṇīm abhūd vāyus tam abravītc śṛṇu rājan mahat karma cyavanasya mahātmanaḥa aśvinoḥ pratisaṃśrutya cyavanaḥ pākaśāsanamc provāca sahitaṃ devaiḥ somapāv aśvinau kurud cyavanasya mahārāja śṛṇu māhātmyam uttamamd iṣṭvā yajñaṃ mahābhāga cyavanaḥ sumahātapāḥd nāsatyau balinau rājaṃś cakre vai somapīthinau indra uvācaa asmābhir varjitāv etau bhavetāṃ somapau kathamc devair na saṃmitāv etau tasmān maivaṃ vadasva naḥa aśvibhyāṃ saha necchāmaḥ pātuṃ somaṃ mahāvratab cyavana uvācab yad anyad vakṣyase vipra tat kariṣyāma te vacaḥb pibetām aśvinau somaṃ bhavadbhiḥ sahitāv imaub ubhāv etāv api surau sūryaputrau sureśvarab kriyatāṃ madvaco devā yathā vai samudāhṛtamb indra uvācab etad vaḥ kurvatāṃ śreyo bhaven naitad akurvatāmb aśvibhyāṃ saha somaṃ vai na pāsyāmi dvijottamac pibantv anye yathākāmaṃ nāhaṃ pātum ihotsahe cyavana uvācaa na cet kariṣyasi vaco mayoktaṃ balasūdanac mayā pramathitaḥ sadyaḥ somaṃ pāsyasi vai makhea tataḥ karma samārabdhaṃ hitāya sahasāśvinoḥc cyavanena tato mantrair abhibhūtāḥ surābhavana tat tu karma samārabdhaṃ dṛṣṭvendraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥc udyamya vipulaṃ śailaṃ cyavanaṃ samupādravate tathā vajreṇa bhagavān amarṣākulalocanaḥa tam āpatantaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva cyavanas tapasānvitaḥc adbhiḥ siktvāstambhayat taṃ savajraṃ sahaparvatama athendrasya mahāghoraṃ so sṛjac chatrum eva hac madaṃ mantrāhutimayaṃ vyāditāsyaṃ mahāmuniḥa tasya dantasahasraṃ tu babhūva śatayojanamc dviyojanaśatās tasya daṃṣṭrāḥ paramadāruṇāḥe hanus tasyābhavad bhūmāv ekaś cāsyāspṛśad divama jihvāmūle sthitās tasya sarve devāḥ savāsavāḥc timer āsyam anuprāptā yathā matsyā mahārṇavea te saṃmantrya tato devā madasyāsyagatās tadāc abruvan sahitāḥ śakraṃ praṇamāsmai dvijātayee aśvibhyāṃ saha somaṃ ca pibāmo vigatajvarāḥa tataḥ sa praṇataḥ śakraś cakāra cyavanasya tatb tatheti śakras tasyātha praṇāmam akaron nṛpac cyavanaḥ kṛtavāṃs tau cāpy aśvinau somapīthinaua tataḥ pratyāharat karma madaṃ ca vyabhajan muniḥc akṣeṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca pāne strīṣu ca vīryavāna etair doṣair naro rājan kṣayaṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥc tasmād etān naro nityaṃ dūrataḥ parivarjayeta etat te cyavanasyāpi karma rājan prakīrtitamc bravīmy ahaṃ brūhi vā tvaṃ cyavanāt kṣatriyaṃ varam bhīṣma uvācaa tūṣṇīm āsīd arjunas tu pavanas tv abravīt punaḥc śṛṇu me brāhmaṇeṣv eva mukhyaṃ karma janādhipaa madasyāsyam anuprāptā yadā sendrā divaukasaḥc tadeyaṃ cyavaneneha hṛtā teṣāṃ vasuṃdharāa ubhau lokau hṛtau matvā te devā duḥkhitābhavanc śokārtāś ca mahātmānaṃ brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ devā ūcuḥa madāsyavyatiṣiktānām asmākaṃ lokapūjitac cyavanena hṛtā bhūmiḥ kapaiś cāpi divaṃ prabho brahmovācaa gacchadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ viprān āśu sendrā divaukasaḥc prasādya tān ubhau lokāv avāpsyatha yathā purāa te yayuḥ śaraṇaṃ viprāṃs ta ūcuḥ kāñ jayāmahec ity uktās te dvijān prāhur jayateha kapān itie bhūgatān hi vijetāro vayam ity eva pārthivaa tataḥ karma samārabdhaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ kapanāśanamc tac chrutvā preṣito dūto brāhmaṇebhyo dhanī kapaiḥa sa ca tān brāhmaṇān āha dhanī kapavaco yathāc bhavadbhiḥ sadṛśāḥ sarve kapāḥ kim iha vartatea sarve vedavidaḥ prājñāḥ sarve ca kratuyājinaḥc sarve satyavratāś caiva sarve tulyā maharṣibhiḥa śrīś caiva ramate teṣu dhārayanti śriyaṃ ca tec vṛthā dārān na gacchanti vṛthāmāṃsaṃ na bhuñjatea dīptam agniṃ juhvati ca gurūṇāṃ vacane sthitāḥc sarve ca niyatātmāno bālānāṃ saṃvibhāginaḥa upetya śakaṭair yānti na sevanti rajasvalāmb sugatiṃ caiva gacchanti tathaiva śubhakarmiṇaḥc abhuktavatsu nāśnanti divā caiva na śeratec garbhiṇīvatsakādiṣuc pūrvāhṇeṣu na dīvyantia etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir guṇair yuktān kathaṃ kapānc vijeṣyatha nivartadhvaṃ nivṛttānāṃ śubhaṃ hi vaḥ brāhmaṇā ūcuḥa kapān vayaṃ vijeṣyāmo ye devās te vayaṃ smṛtāḥc tasmād vadhyāḥ kapāsmākaṃ dhanin yāhi yathāgatama dhanī gatvā kapān āha na vo viprāḥ priyaṃkarāḥc gṛhītvāstrāṇy atho viprān kapāḥ sarve samādravana samudagradhvajān dṛṣṭvā kapān sarve dvijātayaḥc vyasṛjañ jvalitān agnīn kapānāṃ prāṇanāśanāna brahmasṛṣṭā havyabhujaḥ kapān bhuktvā sanātanāḥc nabhasīva yathābhrāṇi vyarājanta narādhipad hatvā vai dānavān devāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃyuged te nābhyajānan hi tadā brāhmaṇair nihatān kapānd athāgamya mahātejā nārado kathayad vibhod yathā hatā mahābhāgais tejasā brāhmaṇaiḥ kapāḥd nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā prītāḥ sarve divaukasaḥe praśaśaṃsur dvijāṃś caiva brahmāṇaṃ ca yaśasvinama teṣāṃ tejas tathā vīryaṃ devānāṃ vavṛdhe tataḥc avāpnuvaṃś cāmaratvaṃ triṣu lokeṣu pūjitama ity uktavacanaṃ vāyum arjunaḥ pratyabhāṣatac pratipūjya mahābāho yat tac chṛṇu narādhipaa jīvāmy ahaṃ brāhmaṇārthe sarvathā satataṃ prabhoc brahmaṇe brāhmaṇebhyaś ca praṇamāmi ca nityaśaḥa dattātreyaprasādāc ca mayā prāptam idaṃ yaśaḥc loke ca paramā kīrtir dharmaś ca carito mahāna aho brāhmaṇakarmāṇi yathā māruta tattvataḥc tvayā proktāni kārtsnyena śrutāni prayatena ha vāyur uvācaa brāhmaṇān kṣatradharmeṇa pālayasvendriyāṇi cac bhṛgubhyas te bhayaṃ ghoraṃ tat tu kālād bhaviṣyati yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa brāhmaṇān arcase rājan satataṃ saṃśitavratānc kaṃ tu karmodayaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān arcasi narādhipaa kāṃ vā brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāvratac tān arcasi mahābāho sarvam etad vadasva me bhīṣma uvācaa eṣa te keśavaḥ sarvam ākhyāsyati mahāmatiḥc vyuṣṭiṃ brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ dṛṣṭavyuṣṭir mahāvrataḥa balaṃ śrotre vāṅ manaś cakṣuṣī cajñānaṃ tathā na viśuddhaṃ mamādyac dehanyāso nāticirān mato mena cātitūrṇaṃ savitādya yātia uktā dharmā ye purāṇe mahāntobrāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ cac paurāṇaṃ ye daṇḍam upāsate caśeṣaṃ kṛṣṇād upaśikṣasva pārthaa ahaṃ hy enaṃ vedmi tattvena kṛṣṇaṃyo yaṃ hi yac cāsya balaṃ purāṇamc ameyātmā keśavaḥ kauravendraso yaṃ dharmaṃ vakṣyati saṃśayeṣua kṛṣṇaḥ pṛthvīm asṛjat khaṃ divaṃ cavarāho yaṃ bhīmabalaḥ purāṇaḥa kṛṣṇasya dehān medinī saṃbabhūvaa kṛtsnam etat sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ cab sa parvatān vyasṛjad vai diśaś cac asya cādho thāntarikṣaṃ divaṃ cadiśaś catasraḥ pradiśaś catasraḥe sṛṣṭis tathaiveyam anuprasūtāsa nirmame viśvam idaṃ purāṇama asya nābhyāṃ puṣkaraṃ saṃprasūtaṃyatrotpannaḥ svayam evāmitaujāḥc yenācchinnaṃ tat tamaḥ pārtha ghoraṃyat tat tiṣṭhaty arṇavaṃ tarjayānama kṛte yuge dharma āsīt samagrastretākāle jñānam anuprapannaḥc balaṃ tv āsīd dvāpare pārtha kṛṣṇaḥkalāv adharmaḥ kṣitim ājagāmaa sa pūrvadevo nijaghāna daityānsa pūrvadevaś ca babhūva samrāṭc sa bhūtānāṃ bhāvano bhūtabhavyaḥsa viśvasyāsya jagataś cāpi goptāa yadā dharmo glāyati vai surāṇāṃtadā kṛṣṇo jāyate mānuṣeṣuc dharme sthitvā sa tu vai bhāvitātmāparāṃś ca lokān aparāṃś ca yātia tyājyāṃs tyaktvāthāsurāṇāṃ vadhāyakāryākārye kāraṇaṃ caiva pārthac kṛtaṃ kariṣyat kriyate ca devomuhuḥ somaṃ viddhi ca śakram etama sa viśvakarmā sa ca viśvarūpaḥsa viśvabhṛd viśvasṛg viśvajic cab śatakratuṃ jitya sa viśvakarmāb sa viśvasṛk pārtha sa viśvarūpaḥb sa viśvabhug viśvadhṛg viśvajic cac sa śūlabhṛc choṇitabhṛt karālastaṃ karmabhir viditaṃ vai stuvantia taṃ gandharvā apsarasaś ca nityamupatiṣṭhante vibudhānāṃ śatānic taṃ rākṣasāś ca parisaṃvahanterāyaspoṣaḥ sa vijigīṣur ekaḥa tam adhvare śaṃsitāraḥ stuvantirathaṃtare sāmagāś ca stuvantic taṃ brāhmaṇā brahmamantraiḥ stuvantitasmai havir adhvaryavaḥ kalpayantia sa paurāṇīṃ brahmaguhāṃ praviṣṭomahīsatraṃ bhāratāgre dadarśac sa caiva gām uddadhārāgryakarmāvikṣobhya daityān uragān dānavāṃś cad taṃ ghoṣārthe gīrbhir indrāḥ stuvantid sa cāpīśo bhārataikaḥ paśūnāma tasya bhakṣān vividhān vedayantitam evājau vāhanaṃ vedayantic tasyāntarikṣaṃ pṛthivī divaṃ casarvaṃ vaśe tiṣṭhati śāśvatasyaa sa kumbharetāḥ sasṛje purāṇaṃyatrotpannam ṛṣim āhur vasiṣṭhamc sa mātariśvā vibhur aśvavājīsa raśmimān savitā cādidevaḥa tenāsurā vijitāḥ sarva evatasya vikrāntair vijitānīha trīṇic sa devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃtam evāhur yajñavidāṃ vitānama sa eva kālaṃ vibhajann udetitasyottaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ cāyane dvec tasyaivordhvaṃ tiryag adhaś carantigabhastayo medinīṃ tāpayantaḥa taṃ brāhmaṇā vedavido juṣantitasyādityo bhām upayujya bhātic sa māsi māsy adhvarakṛd vidhattetam adhvare vedavidaḥ paṭhantia sa ekayuk cakram idaṃ trinābhisaptāśvayuktaṃ vahate vai tridhāmāc mahātejāḥ sarvagaḥ sarvasiṃhaḥkṛṣṇo lokān dhārayate tathaikaḥc hiraṇmayaḥ saptagūḍhaḥ sasaṃvicc caturbāhuḥ padmagaḥ padmanābhaḥe aśnann anaśnaṃś ca tathaiva dhīraḥkṛṣṇaṃ sadā pārtha kartāram ehia sa ekadā kakṣagato mahātmātṛpto vibhuḥ khāṇḍave dhūmaketuḥc sa rākṣasān uragāṃś cāvajityasarvatragaḥ sarvam agnau juhotia sa evāśvaḥ śvetam aśvaṃ prayacchatsa evāśvān atha sarvāṃś cakārac trivandhuras tasya rathas tricakrastrivṛcchirāś caturasraś ca tasyaa sa vihāyo vyadadhāt pañcanābhiḥsa nirmame gāṃ divam antarikṣamc evaṃ ramyān asṛjat parvatāṃś cahṛṣīkeśo mitadīptāgnitejāḥa sa laṅghayan vai sarito jighāṃsansa taṃ vajraṃ praharantaṃ nirāsac sa mahendraḥ stūyate vai mahādhvareviprair eko ṛksahasraiḥ purāṇaiḥd tam ṛksahasraiḥ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃd suparṇam ādau cayanaiḥ stuvantia durvāsā vai tena nānyena śakyogṛhe rājan vāsayituṃ mahaujāḥc tam evāhur ṛṣim ekaṃ purāṇaṃsa viśvakṛd vidadhāty ātmabhāvāna vedāṃś ca yo vedayate dhidevovidhīṃś ca yaś cāśrayate purāṇānc kāme vede laukike yat phalaṃ caviṣvaksene sarvam etat pratīhia jyotīṃṣi śuklāni ca sarvaloketrayo lokā lokapālās trayaś cac trayo gnayo vyāhṛtayaś ca tisraḥsarve devā devakīputra evaa saṃvatsaraḥ sa ṛtuḥ so rdhamāsaḥso horātraḥ sa kalā vai sa kāṣṭhāḥc mātrā muhūrtāś ca lavāḥ kṣaṇāś caviṣvaksene sarvam etat pratīhia candrādityau grahanakṣatratārāḥsarvāṇi darśāny atha paurṇamāsyaḥc nakṣatrayogā ṛtavaś ca pārthaviṣvaksenāt sarvam etat prasūtama rudrādityā vasavo thāśvinau casādhyā viśve marutāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇāś cac prajāpatir devamātāditiś casarve kṛṣṇād ṛṣayaś caiva saptaa vāyur bhūtvā vikṣipate ca viśvamagnir bhūtvā dahate viśvarūpaḥc āpo bhūtvā majjayate ca sarvaṃbrahmā bhūtvā sṛjate viśvasaṃghāna vedyaṃ ca yad vedayate ca vedānvidhiś ca yaś cāśrayate vidheyānc dharme ca vede ca bale ca sarvaṃcarācaraṃ keśavaṃ tvaṃ pratīhid vaśe sthitaṃ tasya samastayoneḥa jyotirbhūtaḥ paramo sau purastātprakāśayan prabhayā viśvarūpaḥc apaḥ sṛṣṭvā hy ātmabhūr ātmayoniḥpurākarot sarvam evātha viśvama ṛtūn utpātān vividhāny adbhutānimeghān vidyut sarvam airāvataṃ cab ṛtūn māsān vividhaṃ kāryajātaṃb vidyutsaṃghair āpatantaś ca meghāḥc sarvaṃ kṛṣṇāt sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caviśvākhyātād viṣṇum enaṃ pratīhia viśvāvāsaṃ nirguṇaṃ vāsudevaṃsaṃkarṣaṇaṃ jīvabhūtaṃ vadantic tataḥ pradyumnam aniruddhaṃ caturthamājñāpayaty ātmayonir mahātmāa sa pañcadhā pañcajanopapannaṃsaṃcodayan viśvam idaṃ sisṛkṣuḥc tataś cakārāvanimārutau cakhaṃ jyotir āpaś ca tathaiva pārthaa sa sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caivam etaccaturvidhaṃ lokam imaṃ ca kṛtvāb sṛṣṭvā viśvaṃ viśvayonir mahātmāb tatrātiṣṭhad viśvarūpo hi yogātc tato bhūmiṃ vyadadhāt pañcabījāṃdyauḥ pṛthivyāṃ dhāsyati bhūri vārie tena viśvaṃ kṛtam etad dhi rājansa jīvayaty ātmanaivātmayoniḥa tato devān asurān mānuṣāṃś calokān ṛṣīṃś cātha pitṝn prajāś cac samāsena vividhān prāṇilokānsarvān sadā bhūtapatiḥ sisṛkṣuḥa śubhāśubhaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caviṣvaksenāt sarvam etat pratīhic yad vartate yac ca bhaviṣyatīhasarvam etat keśavaṃ tvaṃ pratīhia mṛtyuś caiva prāṇinām antakālesākṣāt kṛṣṇaḥ śāśvato dharmavāhaḥc bhūtaṃ ca yac ceha na vidma kiṃ cidviṣvaksenāt sarvam etat pratīhia yat praśastaṃ ca lokeṣu puṇyaṃ yac ca śubhāśubhamc tat sarvaṃ keśavo cintyo viparītam ato bhaveta etādṛśaḥ keśavo yaṃ svayaṃbhūrnārāyaṇaḥ paramaś cāvyayaś cac madhyaṃ cāsya jagatas tasthuṣaś casarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prabhavaś cāpyayaś cad tādṛśaḥ keśavo devo bhūyo nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥd ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ ca deśataḥ kālato hariḥd jagatāṃ tasthuṣāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā rājaṃs te prapitāmahaḥ praṇamya puṇḍarīkākṣam idaṃ vacanam abravīt yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa brūhi brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ vyuṣṭiṃ tvaṃ madhusūdanac vettā tvam asya cārthasya veda tvāṃ hi pitāmahaḥ vāsudeva uvācaa śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan dvijānāṃ bharatarṣabhac yathātattvena vadato guṇān me kurusattamad dvāravatyāṃ samāsīnaṃ purā māṃ kurunandanaa pradyumnaḥ paripapraccha brāhmaṇaiḥ parikopitaḥc kiṃ phalaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv asti pūjāyāṃ madhusūdanae īśvarasya satas tasya iha caiva paratra caa sadā dvijātīn saṃpūjya kiṃ phalaṃ tatra mānadac etad brūhi pitaḥ sarvaṃ sumahān saṃśayo tra mea ity uktavacanas tena pradyumnena tadā tv ahamc pratyabruvaṃ mahārāja yat tac chṛṇu samāhitaḥa vyuṣṭiṃ brāhmaṇapūjāyāṃ raukmiṇeya nibodha meb trivarge cāpavarge ca yaśaḥśrīrogaśāntiṣub devatāpitṛpūjāsu saṃtoṣyā eva no dvijāḥc ete hi somarājāna īśvarāḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥa asmiṃl loke raukmiṇeya tathāmuṣmiṃś ca putrakac brāhmaṇapramukhaṃ saukhyaṃ na me trāsti vicāraṇāa brāhmaṇapramukhaṃ vīryam āyuḥ kīrtir yaśo balamc lokā lokeśvarāś caiva sarve brāhmaṇapūrvakāḥa tat kathaṃ nādriyeyaṃ vai īśvaro smīti putrakac mā te manyur mahābāho bhavatv atra dvijān pratia brāhmaṇo hi mahad bhūtam asmiṃl loke paratra cac bhasma kuryur jagad idaṃ kruddhāḥ pratyakṣadarśinaḥa anyān api sṛjeyuś ca lokāṃl lokeśvarāṃs tathāc kathaṃ teṣu na varteya samyag jñānāt sutejasaḥa avasan madgṛhe tāta brāhmaṇo haripiṅgalaḥc cīravāsā bilvadaṇḍī dīrghaśmaśrunakhādimāne dīrghebhyaś ca manuṣyebhyaḥ pramāṇād adhiko bhuvia sa sma saṃcarate lokān ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥc imā gāthā gāyamānaś catvareṣu sabhāsu caa durvāsasaṃ vāsayet ko brāhmaṇaṃ satkṛtaṃ gṛheb roṣaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sūkṣme py apakṛte kṛtec paribhāṣāṃ ca me śrutvā ko nu dadyāt pratiśrayame yo māṃ kaś cid vāsayeta na sa māṃ kopayed ihaa taṃ sma nādriyate kaś cit tato haṃ tam avāsayama sa sma bhuṅkte sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnām annam ekadāc ekadā smālpakaṃ bhuṅkte na vaiti ca punar gṛhāna akasmāc ca prahasati tathākasmāt praroditic na cāsya vayasā tulyaḥ pṛthivyām abhavat tadāa so smadāvasathaṃ gatvā śayyāś cāstaraṇāni cac kanyāś cālaṃkṛtā dagdhvā tato vyapagataḥ svayamd adahat sa mahātejās tataś cābhyapatat svayama atha mām abravīd bhūyaḥ sa muniḥ saṃśitavrataḥc kṛṣṇa pāyasam icchāmi bhoktum ity eva satvaraḥa sadaiva tu mayā tasya cittajñena gṛhe janaḥc sarvāṇy evānnapānāni bhakṣyāś coccāvacās tathāe bhavantu satkṛtānīti pūrvam eva pracoditaḥa tato haṃ jvalamānaṃ vai pāyasaṃ pratyavedayamc tad bhuktvaiva tu sa kṣipraṃ tato vacanam abravīte kṣipram aṅgāni limpasva pāyaseneti sa sma haa avimṛśyaiva ca tataḥ kṛtavān asmi tat tathāc tenocchiṣṭena gātrāṇi śiraś caivābhyamṛkṣayama sa dadarśa tadābhyāśe mātaraṃ te śubhānanāmc tām api smayamānaḥ sa pāyasenābhyalepayata muniḥ pāyasadigdhāṅgīṃ rathe tūrṇam ayojayatc tam āruhya rathaṃ caiva niryayau sa gṛhān mamaa agnivarṇo jvalan dhīmān sa dvijo rathadhuryavatc pratodenātudad bālāṃ rukmiṇīṃ mama paśyataḥa na ca me stokam apy āsīd duḥkham īrṣyākṛtaṃ tadāc tataḥ sa rājamārgeṇa mahatā niryayau bahiḥa tad dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryaṃ dāśārhā jātamanyavaḥc tatrājalpan mithaḥ ke cit samābhāṣya parasparama brāhmaṇā eva jāyeran nānyo varṇaḥ kathaṃ canac ko hy enaṃ ratham āsthāya jīved anyaḥ pumān ihaa āśīviṣaviṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ tatas tīkṣṇataraṃ viṣamc brahmāśīviṣadagdhasya nāsti kaś cic cikitsakaḥa tasmin vrajati durdharṣe prāskhalad rukmiṇī pathic tāṃ nāmarṣayata śrīmāṃs tatas tūrṇam acodayata tataḥ paramasaṃkruddho rathāt praskandya sa dvijaḥc padātir utpathenaiva prādhāvad dakṣiṇāmukhaḥa tam utpathena dhāvantam anvadhāvaṃ dvijottamamc tathaiva pāyasādigdhaḥ prasīda bhagavann itia tato vilokya tejasvī brāhmaṇo mām uvāca hac jitaḥ krodhas tvayā kṛṣṇa prakṛtyaiva mahābhujaa na te parādham iha vai dṛṣṭavān asmi suvratac prīto smi tava govinda vṛṇu kāmān yathepsitāne prasannasya ca me tāta paśya vyuṣṭir yathāvidhāa yāvad eva manuṣyāṇām anne bhāvo bhaviṣyatic yathaivānne tathā teṣāṃ tvayi bhāvo bhaviṣyatia yāvac ca puṇyā lokeṣu tvayi kīrtir bhaviṣyatic triṣu lokeṣu tāvac ca vaiśiṣṭyaṃ pratipatsyasee supriyaḥ sarvalokasya bhaviṣyasi janārdanaa yat te bhinnaṃ ca dagdhaṃ ca yac ca kiṃ cid vināśitamc sarvaṃ tathaiva draṣṭāsi viśiṣṭaṃ vā janārdanaa yāvad etat praliptaṃ te gātreṣu madhusūdanac ato mṛtyubhayaṃ nāsti yāvadicchā tavācyutaa na tu pādatale lipte kasmāt te putrakādya vaic naitan me priyam ity eva sa māṃ prīto bravīt tadāe ity ukto haṃ śarīraṃ svam apaśyaṃ śrīsamāyutama rukmiṇīṃ cābravīt prītaḥ sarvastrīṇāṃ varaṃ yaśaḥc kīrtiṃ cānuttamāṃ loke samavāpsyasi śobhanea na tvāṃ jarā vā rogo vā vaivarṇyaṃ cāpi bhāminic sprakṣyanti puṇyagandhā ca kṛṣṇam ārādhayiṣyasia ṣoḍaśānāṃ sahasrāṇāṃ vadhūnāṃ keśavasya hac variṣṭhā sahalokyā ca keśavasya bhaviṣyasia tava mātaram ity uktvā tato māṃ punar abravītc prasthitaḥ sumahātejā durvāsā vahnivaj jvalana eṣaiva te buddhir astu brāhmaṇān prati keśavac ity uktvā sa tadā putra tatraivāntaradhīyataa tasminn antarhite cāham upāṃśuvratam ādiśamc yat kiṃ cid brāhmaṇo brūyāt sarvaṃ kuryām iti prabhoa etad vratam ahaṃ kṛtvā mātrā te saha putrakac tataḥ paramahṛṣṭātmā prāviśaṃ gṛham eva caa praviṣṭamātraś ca gṛhe sarvaṃ paśyāmi tan navamc yad bhinnaṃ yac ca vai dagdhaṃ tena vipreṇa putrakaa tato haṃ vismayaṃ prāptaḥ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ dṛḍhamc apūjayaṃ ca manasā raukmiṇeya dvijaṃ tadāa ity ahaṃ raukmiṇeyasya pṛcchato bharatarṣabhac māhātmyaṃ dvijamukhyasya sarvam ākhyātavāṃs tadāa tathā tvam api kaunteya brāhmaṇān satataṃ prabhoc pūjayasva mahābhāgān vāgbhir dānaiś ca nityadāa evaṃ vyuṣṭim ahaṃ prāpto brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādajāmc yac ca mām āha bhīṣmo yaṃ tat satyaṃ bharatarṣabha yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa durvāsasaḥ prasādāt te yat tadā madhusūdanac avāptam iha vijñānaṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasia mahābhāgyaṃ ca yat tasya nāmāni ca mahātmanaḥc tattvato jñātum icchāmi sarvaṃ matimatāṃ vara vāsudeva uvācaa hanta te kathayiṣyāmi namaskṛtvā kapardinec yad avāptaṃ mahārāja śreyo yac cārjitaṃ yaśaḥa prayataḥ prātar utthāya yad adhīye viśāṃ patec prāñjaliḥ śatarudrīyaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇud śivaḥ sarvagato rudraḥ sraṣṭā yas taṃ śṛṇuṣva mea prajāpatis tat sasṛje tapaso nte mahātapāḥc śaṃkaras tv asṛjat tāta prajāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥa nāsti kiṃ cit paraṃ bhūtaṃ mahādevād viśāṃ patec iha triṣv api lokeṣu bhūtānāṃ prabhavo hi saḥa na caivotsahate sthātuṃ kaś cid agre mahātmanaḥc na hi bhūtaṃ samaṃ tena triṣu lokeṣu vidyatea gandhenāpi hi saṃgrāme tasya kruddhasya śatravaḥc visaṃjñā hatabhūyiṣṭhā vepanti ca patanti caa ghoraṃ ca ninadaṃ tasya parjanyaninadopamamc śrutvā vidīryed dhṛdayaṃ devānām api saṃyugea yāṃś ca ghoreṇa rūpeṇa paśyet kruddhaḥ pinākadhṛkb tatkṣaṇād eva kuryāt sa bhasma vahniśikhā yathāc na surā nāsurā loke na gandharvā na pannagāḥe kupite sukham edhante tasminn api guhāgatāḥa prajāpateś ca dakṣasya yajato vitate kratauc vivyādha kupito yajñaṃ nirbhayas tu bhavas tadāe dhanuṣā bāṇam utsṛjya saghoṣaṃ vinanāda caa te na śarma kutaḥ śāntiṃ viṣādaṃ lebhire surāḥc vidrute sahasā yajñe kupite ca maheśvarea tena jyātalaghoṣeṇa sarve lokāḥ samākulāḥc babhūvur avaśāḥ pārtha viṣeduś ca surāsurāḥa āpaś cukṣubhire caiva cakampe ca vasuṃdharāc vyadravan girayaś cāpi dyauḥ paphāla ca sarvaśaḥa andhena tamasā lokāḥ prāvṛtā na cakāśirec pranaṣṭā jyotiṣāṃ bhāś ca saha sūryeṇa bhārataa bhṛśaṃ bhītās tataḥ śāntiṃ cakruḥ svastyayanāni cac ṛṣayaḥ sarvabhūtānām ātmanaś ca hitaiṣiṇaḥa tataḥ so bhyadravad devān kruddho raudraparākramaḥc bhagasya nayane kruddhaḥ prahāreṇa vyaśātayata pūṣāṇaṃ cābhidudrāva pareṇa vapuṣānvitaḥc puroḍāśaṃ bhakṣayato daśanān vai vyaśātayata tataḥ praṇemur devās te vepamānāḥ sma śaṃkaramc punaś ca saṃdadhe rudro dīptaṃ suniśitaṃ śarama rudrasya vikramaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥc tataḥ prasādayām āsuḥ śarvaṃ te vibudhottamāḥa jepuś ca śatarudrīyaṃ devāḥ kṛtvāñjaliṃ tataḥc saṃstūyamānas tridaśaiḥ prasasāda maheśvaraḥa rudrasya bhāgaṃ yajñe ca viśiṣṭaṃ te tv akalpayanc bhayena tridaśā rājañ śaraṇaṃ ca prapedirea tena caivātikopena sa yajñaḥ saṃdhito bhavatc yad yac cāpi hataṃ tatra tat tathaiva pradīyate yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tripurāṇi mahābāho jitavān sa maheśvaraḥ vāsudevaḥ ācakṣva me yathātattvaṃ sarvajña madhusūdana śṛṇu me gadatas tāta yathā dagdhaṃ puratrayama asurāṇāṃ purāṇy āsaṃs trīṇi vīryavatāṃ divic āyasaṃ rājataṃ caiva sauvarṇam aparaṃ tathāa nāśakat tāni maghavā bhettuṃ sarvāyudhair apic atha sarve marā rudraṃ jagmuḥ śaraṇamarditāḥa tata ūcur mahātmāno devāḥ sarve samāgatāḥc rudra raudrā bhaviṣyanti paśavaḥ sarvakarmasud rudraṃ taṃ raudrakarmāṇi sarvāstrakuśalaṃ prabhume jahi daityān saha purair lokāṃs trāyasva mānadaa sa tathoktas tathety uktvā viṣṇuṃ kṛtvā śarottamamc śalyam agniṃ tathā kṛtvā puṅkhaṃ vaivasvataṃ yamame vedān kṛtvā dhanuḥ sarvāñ jyāṃ ca sāvitrim uttamāma devān rathavaraṃ kṛtvā viniyujya ca sarvaśaḥc triparvaṇā triśalyena tena tāni bibheda saḥa śareṇādityavarṇena kālāgnisamatejasāc te surāḥ sapurās tatra dagdhā rudreṇa bhāratad hatāni petuḥ sahasā vipule sāgarāmbhasia taṃ caivāṅkagataṃ dṛṣṭvā bālaṃ pañcaśikhaṃ punaḥc umā jijñāsamānā vai ko yam ity abravīt tadāa asūyataś ca śakrasya vajreṇa prahariṣyataḥc savajraṃ stambhayām āsa taṃ bāhuṃ parighopamama na saṃbubudhire cainaṃ devās taṃ bhuvaneśvaramc saprajāpatayaḥ sarve tasmin mumuhur īśvarea tato dhyātvātha bhagavān brahmā tam amitaujasamc ayaṃ śreṣṭha iti jñātvā vavande tam umāpatima tataḥ prasādayām āsur umāṃ rudraṃ ca te surāḥc babhūva sa tadā bāhur balahantur yathā purāa sa cāpi brāhmaṇo bhūtvā durvāsā nāma vīryavānc dvāravatyāṃ mama gṛhe ciraṃ kālam upāvasata viprakārān prayuṅkte sma subahūn mama veśmanic tān udāratayā cāham akṣamaṃ tasya duḥsahamd sa vai rudraḥ sa ca śivaḥ so gniḥ śarvaḥ sa sarvajita sa devendraś ca vāyuś ca so śvinau sa ca vidyutaḥc sa candramāḥ sa ceśānaḥ sa sūryo varuṇaś ca saḥa sa kālaḥ so ntako mṛtyuḥ sa tamo rātryahāni cac māsārdhamāsā ṛtavaḥ saṃdhye saṃvatsaraś ca saḥa sa dhātā sa vidhātā ca viśvakarmā sa sarvavitc nakṣatrāṇi diśaś caiva pradiśo tha grahās tathāe viśvamūrtir ameyātmā bhagavān amitadyutiḥa ekadhā ca dvidhā caiva bahudhā ca sa eva cac śatadhā sahasradhā caiva tathā śatasahasradhāa īdṛśaḥ sa mahādevo bhūyaś ca bhagavān ataḥc na hi śakyā guṇā vaktum api varṣaśatair api vāsudeva uvācaa yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho mahābhāgyaṃ mahātmanaḥc rudrāya bahurūpāya bahunāmne nibodha mea vadanty agniṃ mahādevaṃ tathā sthāṇuṃ maheśvaramc ekākṣaṃ tryambakaṃ caiva viśvarūpaṃ śivaṃ tathāa dve tanū tasya devasya vedajñā brāhmaṇā viduḥc ghorām anyāṃ śivām anyāṃ te tanū bahudhā punaḥa ugrā ghorā tanūr yāsya so gnir vidyut sa bhāskaraḥc śivā saumyā ca yā tasya dharmas tv āpo tha candramāḥa ātmano rdhaṃ tu tasyāgnir ucyate bharatarṣabhac brahmacaryaṃ caraty eṣa śivā yāsya tanus tathāa yāsya ghoratamā mūrtir jagat saṃharate tayāc īśvaratvān mahattvāc ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥa yan nirdahati yat tīkṣṇo yad ugro yat pratāpavānc māṃsaśoṇitamajjādo yat tato rudra ucyatea devānāṃ sumahān yac ca yac cāsya viṣayo mahānc yac ca viśvaṃ mahat pāti mahādevas tataḥ smṛtaḥa samedhayati yan nityaṃ sarvārthān sarvakarmabhiḥc śivam icchan manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād eṣa śivaḥ smṛtaḥa dahaty ūrdhvaṃ sthito yac ca prāṇotpattiḥ sthitiś ca yatc sthiraliṅgaś ca yan nityaṃ tasmāt sthāṇur iti smṛtaḥa yad asya bahudhā rūpaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavat tathāc sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bahurūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥa dhūmraṃ rūpaṃ ca yat tasya dhūrjaṭīty ata ucyatec viśve devāś ca yat tasmin viśvarūpas tataḥ smṛtaḥa sahasrākṣo yutākṣo vā sarvatokṣimayo pi vāc cakṣuṣaḥ prabhavas tejo nāsty anto thāsya cakṣuṣāma sarvathā yat paśūn pāti taiś ca yad ramate punaḥc teṣām adhipatir yac ca tasmāt paśupatiḥ smṛtaḥa nityena brahmacaryeṇa liṅgam asya yadā sthitamc mahayanty asya lokāś ca maheśvara iti smṛtaḥd arcayanti ca ye lokāḥ priyās tasya mahātmanaḥd bhaktānugrahaṇārthāya gūḍhaliṅgas tataḥ smṛtaḥa vigrahaṃ pūjayed yo vai liṅgaṃ vāpi mahātmanaḥc liṅgaṃ pūjayitā nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnutea ṛṣayaś cāpi devāś ca gandharvāpsarasas tathāc liṅgam evārcayanti sma yat tad ūrdhvaṃ samāsthitama pūjyamāne tatas tasmin modate sa maheśvaraḥc sukhaṃ dadāti prītātmā bhaktānāṃ bhaktavatsalaḥc prahṛṣṭaś caiva śaṃkaraḥc sukhaṃ vittaṃ paraṃ lokea eṣa eva śmaśāneṣu devo vasati nityaśaḥc yajante taṃ janās tatra vīrasthānaniṣeviṇama viṣamasthaḥ śarīreṣu sa mṛtyuḥ prāṇinām ihac sa ca vāyuḥ śarīreṣu prāṇo pānaḥ śarīriṇāma tasya ghorāṇi rūpāṇi dīptāni ca bahūni cac loke yāny asya pūjyante viprās tāni vidur budhāḥa nāmadheyāni vedeṣu bahūny asya yathārthataḥc nirucyante mahattvāc ca vibhutvāt karmabhis tathāa vede cāsya vidur viprāḥ śatarudrīyam uttamamc vyāsād anantaraṃ yac cāpy upasthānaṃ mahātmanaḥa pradātā sarvalokānāṃ viśvaṃ cāpy ucyate mahatc jyeṣṭhabhūtaṃ vadanty enaṃ brāhmaṇā ṛṣayo parea prathamo hy eṣa devānāṃ mukhād agnir ajāyatac grahair bahuvidhaiḥ prāṇān saṃruddhān utsṛjaty apia sa mocayati puṇyātmā śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatānc āyur ārogyam aiśvaryaṃ vittaṃ kāmāṃś ca puṣkalāna sa dadāti manuṣyebhyaḥ sa evākṣipate punaḥc śakrādiṣu ca deveṣu tasya caiśvaryam ucyatea sa evābhyadhiko nityaṃ trailokyasya śubhāśubhec aiśvaryāc caiva kāmānām īśvaraḥ punar ucyatea maheśvaraś ca lokānāṃ mahatām īśvaraś ca saḥc bahubhir vividhai rūpair viśvaṃ vyāptam idaṃ jagate tasya devasya yad vaktraṃ samudre vaḍavāmukham vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa ity uktavati vākyaṃ tu kṛṣṇe devakinandanec bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ bhūyaḥ paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥa nirṇaye vā mahābuddhe sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ varac pratyakṣam āgamo veti kiṃ tayoḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavet bhīṣma uvācaa nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ kaś cid iti me vartate matiḥc śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te prājña samyak tvam anupṛcchasia saṃśayaḥ sugamo rājan nirṇayas tv atra durgamaḥc dṛṣṭaṃ śrutam anantaṃ hi yatra saṃśayadarśanama pratyakṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ hetukāḥ prājñamāninaḥc nāstīty evaṃ vyavasyanti satyaṃ saṃśayam eva cae tad ayuktaṃ vyavasyanti bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥa atha cen manyase caikaṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ bhaved itic śakyaṃ dīrgheṇa kālena yuktenātandritena cae prāṇayātrām anekāṃ ca kalpayānena bhārataa tatpareṇaiva nānyena śakyaṃ hy etat tu kāraṇamc hetūnām antam āsādya vipulaṃ jñānam uttamamd hetunāmantrite vāpi dharmaśāstreṇa cottamame jyotiḥ sarvasya lokasya vipulaṃ pratipadyatea tattvenāgamanaṃ rājan hetvantagamanaṃ tathāc agrāhyam anibaddhaṃ ca vācaḥ saṃparivarjanam yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa pratyakṣaṃ lokataḥ siddhaṃ lokāś cāgamapūrvakāḥc śiṣṭācāro bahuvidho brūhi tan me pitāmaha bhīṣma uvācaa dharmasya hriyamāṇasya balavadbhir durātmabhiḥc saṃsthā yatnair api kṛtā kālena paribhidyatea adharmā dharmarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpā ivāvṛtāḥc tatas tair bhidyate vṛttaṃ śṛṇu caiva yudhiṣṭhiraa avṛttyā ye ca bhindanti śrutatyāgaparāyaṇāḥc dharmavidveṣiṇo mandā ity uktas teṣu saṃśayaḥa atṛpyantas tu sādhūnāṃ ya evāgamabuddhayaḥc param ity eva saṃtuṣṭās tān upāssva ca pṛccha caa kāmārthau pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā lobhamohānusāriṇauc dharma ity eva saṃbuddhās tān upāssva ca pṛccha caa na teṣāṃ bhidyate vṛttaṃ yajñasvādhyāyakarmabhiḥb mūlācāras tu sādhūnāṃ yajñasvādhyāyavṛttataḥc ācāraḥ kāraṇaṃ caiva dharmaś caiva trayaṃ punaḥd ye dharmam abhyasūyante te dharmaṃ paryupāsate yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa punar eveha me buddhiḥ saṃśaye parimuhyatec apāre mārgamāṇasya paraṃ tīram apaśyataḥa vedāḥ pratyakṣam ācāraḥ pramāṇaṃ tat trayaṃ yadic pṛthaktvaṃ labhyate caiṣāṃ dharmaś caikas trayaṃ katham bhīṣma uvācaa dharmasya hriyamāṇasya balavadbhir durātmabhiḥc yady evaṃ manyase rājaṃs tridhā dharmavicāraṇāa eka eveti jānīhi tridhā tasya pradarśanamc pṛthaktve caiva me buddhis trayāṇām api vai tathāa ukto mārgas trayāṇāṃ ca tat tathaiva samācarac jijñāsā tu na kartavyā dharmasya paritarkaṇāta sadaiva bharataśreṣṭha mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥc andho jaḍa ivāśaṅko yad bravīmi tad ācaraa ahiṃsā satyam akrodho dānam etac catuṣṭayamc ajātaśatro sevasva dharma eṣa sanātanaḥa brāhmaṇeṣu ca vṛttir yā pitṛpaitāmahocitāc tām anvehi mahābāho svargasyaite hi deśikāḥa pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ vai yaḥ kuryād abudho naraḥc na sa pramāṇatām arho vivādajanano hi saḥa brāhmaṇān eva sevasva satkṛtya bahumanya cac eteṣv eva tv ime lokāḥ kṛtsnā iti nibodha tān yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa ye ca dharmam asūyanti ye cainaṃ paryupāsatec bravītu bhagavān etat kva te gacchanti tādṛśāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa rajasā tamasā caiva samavastīrṇacetasaḥc narakaṃ pratipadyante dharmavidveṣiṇo narāḥa ye tu dharmaṃ mahārāja satataṃ paryupāsatec satyārjavaparāḥ santas te vai svargabhujo narāḥa dharma eva ratis teṣām ācāryopāsanād bhavetc devalokaṃ prapadyante ye dharmaṃ paryupāsatea manuṣyā yadi vā devāḥ śarīram upatāpya vaic dharmiṇaḥ sukham edhante lobhadveṣavivarjitāḥa prathamaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putraṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥc dharmiṇaḥ paryupāsante phalaṃ pakvam ivāśayaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa asatāṃ kīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ sādhavaḥ kiṃ ca kurvatec bravītu me bhavān etat santo santaś ca kīdṛśāḥ bhīṣma uvācaa durācārāś ca durdharṣā durmukhāś cāpy asādhavaḥc sādhavaḥ śīlasaṃpannāḥ śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇamc satyārjavaparāyaṇāḥc eteṣāṃ dharmaśīlānāṃa rājamārge gavāṃ madhye goṣṭhamadhye ca dharmiṇaḥc nopasevanti rājendra sargaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥa pañcānām aśanaṃ dattvā śeṣam aśnanti sādhavaḥc na jalpanti ca bhuñjānā na nidrānty ārdrapāṇayaḥa citrabhānum anaḍvāhaṃ devaṃ goṣṭhaṃ catuṣpathamc brāhmaṇaṃ dhārmikaṃ caityaṃ te kurvanti pradakṣiṇama vṛddhānāṃ bhārataptānāṃ strīṇāṃ bālāturasya cac brāhmaṇānāṃ gavāṃ rājñāṃ panthānaṃ dadate ca tea atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya cab sāmānyaṃ bhojanaṃ kuryāt svayaṃ nāgryāśanaṃ vrajetb na satyārjavadharmasya tulyam anyac ca vidyateb bahulā nāma gaus tena gatim agryāṃ gatā kilab muniśāpād dvijaḥ kaś cid vyāghratāṃ samupāgataḥb bahulāṃ bhakṣaṇarucim āsvādya śapathena tub vimucya pītavatsāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā purātanamb jagāma lokān amalān sā svarāṣṭraṃ tathā punaḥb tasmāt satyārjavarato rājā rāṣṭraṃ samānavamb tārayitvā sukhaṃ svargaṃ gantāsi bharatarṣabhac tathā śaraṇakāmānāṃ goptā syāt svāgatapradaḥa sāyaṃ prātar manuṣyāṇām aśanaṃ devanirmitamc nāntarā bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭam upavāsavidhir hi saḥa homakāle yathā vahniḥ kālam eva pratīkṣatec ṛtukāle tathā nārī ṛtum eva pratīkṣatee na cānyāṃ gacchate yas tu brahmacaryaṃ hi tat smṛtama amṛtaṃ brāhmaṇā gāva ity etat trayam ekataḥc tasmād gobrāhmaṇaṃ nityam arcayeta yathāvidhia yajuṣā saṃskṛtaṃ māṃsam upabhuñjan na duṣyatic pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ vṛthāmāṃsaṃ putramāṃsaṃ ca tat samama svadeśe paradeśe vāpy atithiṃ nopavāsayetc karma vai saphalaṃ kṛtvā gurūṇāṃ pratipādayeta gurubhya āsanaṃ deyam abhivādyābhipūjya cac gurūn abhyarcya vardhante āyuṣā yaśasā śriyāa vṛddhān nātivadej jātu na ca saṃpreṣayed apic nāsīnaḥ syāt sthiteṣv evam āyur asya na riṣyatea na nagnām īkṣate nārīṃ na vidvān puruṣān apic maithunaṃ satataṃ guptam āhāraṃ ca samācareta tīrthānāṃ guravas tīrthaṃ śucīnāṃ hṛdayaṃ śucic darśanānāṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukhama sāyaṃ prātaś ca vṛddhānāṃ śṛṇuyāt puṣkalā giraḥc śrutam āpnoti hi naraḥ satataṃ vṛddhasevayād dānāgāre gavāṃ caiva brāhmaṇānāṃ ca saṃnidhaua svādhyāye bhojane caiva dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇim uddharetc yacched vāṅmanasī nityam indriyāṇāṃ ca vibhramama saṃskṛtaṃ pāyasaṃ nityaṃ yavāgūṃ kṛsaraṃ haviḥc aṣṭakāḥ pitṛdaivatyā vṛddhānām abhipūjanama śmaśrukarmaṇi maṅgalyaṃ kṣutānām abhinandanamc vyādhitānāṃ ca sarveṣām āyuṣaḥ pratinandanama na jātu tvam iti brūyād āpanno pi mahattaramc tvaṃkāro vā vadho veti vidvatsu na viśiṣyatee avarāṇāṃ samānānāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ ca samācareta pāpam ācakṣate nityaṃ hṛdayaṃ pāpakarmiṇāmc jñānapūrvaṃ vinaśyanti gūhamānā mahājanea jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ karma cchādayante hy asādhavaḥc na māṃ manuṣyāḥ paśyanti na māṃ paśyanti devatāḥe pāpenābhihataḥ pāpaḥ pāpam evābhijāyatea yathā vārdhuṣiko vṛddhiṃ dehabhede pratīkṣatec dharmeṇāpihitaṃ pāpaṃ dharmam evābhivardhayeta yathā lavaṇam ambhobhir āplutaṃ pravilīyatec prāyaścittahataṃ pāpaṃ tathā sadyaḥ praṇaśyatia tasmāt pāpaṃ na gūheta gūhamānaṃ vivardhatec kṛtvā tu sādhuṣv ākhyeyaṃ te tat praśamayanty utaa āśayā saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ yat kāle nopabhujyatec anye caitat prapadyante viyoge tasya dehinaḥd tad dharmasādhanaṃ nityaṃ saṃkalpād dhanam ārjayeta mānasaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥc tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni dharmam eva samāsatea eka eva cared dharmaṃ na dharmadhvajiko bhavetc dharmavāṇijakā hy ete ye dharmam upabhuñjatea arced devān adambhena sevetāmāyayā gurūnc nidhiṃ nidadhyāt pāratryaṃ yātrārthaṃ dānaśabditamd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd mānasānīha tīrthāni praśaṃsanti maharṣayaḥd bhīṣmaḥd tāni me kuruśārdūla yathāvad vaktum arhasid śṛṇu tīrthāni gadato mānasānīha mānadad yeṣu samyaṅ naraḥ snātvā prayāti paramāṃ gatimd satyaṃ tīrthaṃ kṣamā tīrthaṃ satyam indriyanigrahaḥd sarvabhūtadayā tīrthaṃ tīrtham ārjavam eva cad dānaṃ tīrthaṃ damas tīrthaṃ saṃtoṣas tīrtham uttamamd brahmacaryaṃ paraṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ ca priyavāditād jñānaṃ tīrthaṃ tapas tīrthaṃ dhṛtis tīrtham udāhṛtamd tīrthānām api yat tīrthaṃ viśuddhir manasaḥ parād nodakaklinnagātro hi snāta ity abhidhīyated sa snāto yo damasnātaḥ suviśuddhamanomalaḥd yo lubdhaḥ piśunaḥ krūro dāmbhiko viṣayātmakaḥd sarvatīrtheṣv api snātaḥ pāpo malina eva saḥd na ca gacchanti te svargam aviśuddhamanomalāḥd viṣayeṣv api saṃrāgo mānaso mala ucyated teṣv eva ca virāgo sya nirmalatvam udāhṛtamd cittam antargataṃ duṣṭaṃ tīrthasnānair na śudhyatid śataśo pi jale dhautaṃ surābhāṇḍam ivāśucid nigṛhītendriyagrāmo yatraiva nivasen naraḥd tatra tasya kurukṣetraṃ naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ gayād jñānahrade satyajale rāgadveṣamalāpahed yudhiṣṭhiraḥd yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe sa yāti paramāṃ gatimd pāpasya kim adhiṣṭhānaṃ kā prasūtiś ca bhāratad bhīṣmaḥd kiṃ cāsya kāraṇaṃ proktaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmahad lobhaḥ pratiṣṭhā pāpasya prasūtir lobha eva cad atra te saṃśayo mā bhūl lobhaḥ pāpasya kāraṇamd lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhād drohaḥ pravartated lobhān mohaś ca māyā ca mānān mātsaryam eva cad nārthaiḥ pūrayituṃ śakyo lobho bahuvidhair apid nityaṃ gambhīratoyābhir āpagābhir ivārṇavaḥd sarvabhūteṣv aviśvāsaḥ sarvabhūteṣv anirdayaḥd sarvabhūteṣv ajihmaś ca lobhād bhavati bhāratad sumahānty api śāstrāṇi dhārayanto bahuśrutāḥd chettāraḥ saṃśayānāṃ ca lobhagrastāḥ pratyānty adhaḥd lobhakṣaye kṣayaṃ yānti sarvapāpāni dehināmd lobhavṛddhau ca vardhante nṛpate nātra saṃśayaḥd tasmāt sarvaprayatnena tyaja lobhaṃ yudhiṣṭhirad yadīcchasi mahārāja śāśvatīṃ gatim ātmanaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa nābhāgadheyaḥ prāpnoti dhanaṃ subalavān apic bhāgadheyānvitas tv arthān kṛśo bālaś ca vindatid tat kathaṃ labhate kena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasia nālābhakāle bahavo janāḥa yadi yatno bhaven martyaḥ sa sarvaṃ phalam āpnuyātc nālabhyaṃ copalabhyeta nṛṇāṃ bharatasattamaa yadā prayatnaṃ kṛtavān dṛśyate hy aphalo naraḥc mārgan nayaśatair arthān amārgaṃś cāparaḥ sukhīa akāryam asakṛt kṛtvā dṛśyante hy adhanā narāḥc dhanayuktās tv adharmasthā dṛśyante cāpare janāḥa adhītya nītiṃ yasmāc ca nītiyukto na dṛśyatec anabhijñaś ca sācivyaṃ gamitaḥ kena hetunāe
