kāmarūpī bhayaṃkaraḥd dvīpī śoṇitamāṃsāśī mahādaṃṣṭro mahābalaḥd mahāparvatasaṃkāśo meghagarjitanisvanaḥd mahāguhādarīvaktras tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭro nakhāyudhaḥd nandī nāma sa dharmātmā sa ca gopahite rataḥd acchinnāgrais tṛṇair dīrghair godhanaṃ parirakṣatid tasya yūthaparibhraṣṭā bahulā tṛṇatṛṣṇayād carantī vyāghrapurataḥ sā dhenuḥ samupasthitād abhidravaṃś ca tāṃ vyāghras tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravītd tvam adya vihito bhakṣaḥ svayaṃ prāptāsi me vanamd vyāghrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā niṣṭhuraṃ lomaharṣaṇamd sutaṃ rūpānvitaṃ bālaṃ candrarūpasamaprabhamd vatsaṃ smarati sā dhenuḥ snehārtā gadgadasvarād dahyantī putraśokena bahulā putravatsalād rudantī karuṇaṃ sā tu nirāśā putradarśaned dṛṣṭvā tu bahulāṃ vyāghraḥ krandamānāṃ suduḥkhitāmd uvāca vacanaṃ ghoraṃ bahule kiṃ prarudyated daivād yathopapannāsi bhakṣas tvaṃ me yadṛcchayād na rudantyā vā hasantyā vā tathā te jīvitaṃ bhavetd vihitaṃ bhujyate loke svayaṃ prāptāsi dhenuked mṛtyus te vihito dyaiva vṛthā kim anuśocasid papraccha ca punar vyāghraḥ kimarthaṃ ruditaṃ tvayād kautukaṃ me dya saṃjātam aśeṣaṃ kathayasva naḥd vyāghrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bahulā vākyam abravītd kṣantum arhasi me nātha kāmarūpa namo stu ted tvāṃ samālokya lokasya paritrāṇaṃ na vidyated jīvitārthaṃ na śocāmi prāptavyaṃ maraṇaṃ mayād jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya cad tasmād aparihārye rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasid devair api sadā sarvair martavyam avaśair dhruvamd tasmāt tan nāham evaikaṃ vyāghra śocāmi jīvitamd kiṃ tu snehavaśād vyāghra duḥkhena ruditaṃ mayād asti me hṛdi saṃtāpas taṃ ca tvaṃ śrotum arhasid agre vayasi vartantī prasūtāhaṃ mṛgādhipad iṣṭaḥ prathamajātas tu sutaś ca mama bālakaḥd kṣīraṃ pibati me vatsas tṛṇaṃ nādyāpi jighratid sa ca gopakule baddhaḥ kṣudhito mām udīkṣated sutaṃ tam anuśocāmi kathaṃ jīviṣyate sutaḥd tasyecchāmi stanaṃ dātuṃ putrasnehavaśānugād pāyayitvā ca taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhanid sakhīnām arpayitvā ca saṃdiśya ca hitāhitamd punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyāmi yatheṣṭaṃ bhakṣayiṣyasid śīghrāham āgamiṣyāmi mahāvyāghra tavāntikamd bahulāyā vacaḥ śrutvā mṛgendraḥ punar abravītd kiṃ te putreṇa kartavyaṃ maraṇaṃ kiṃ na paśyasid trasanti sarvabhūtāni māṃ nirīkṣya mriyanti cad tvaṃ punaḥ kṛpayāviṣṭā putra putreti bhāṣased na mantrā na tapo dānaṃ na mātā na pitā sutaḥd śaknuvanti paritrātum āgatāṃ matsamīpataḥd kathaṃ tad gokulaṃ gatvā gopījanasamākulamd vṛṣabhair nāditaṃ ramyaṃ bālavatsavibhūṣitamd bhūṣaṇaṃ devalokasya svargatulyaṃ na saṃśayaḥd nityaṃ pramuditaṃ ramyaṃ sarvadaivatapūjitamd pavitraṃ tat pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalamd yat tīrthaṃ sarvatīrthānāṃ ramyāṇāṃ yad gopaiḥ pālitaṃ śūrair bāhuyuddhaviśāradaiḥd pragītanṛtyasaṃlāpaṃ valgutāsphoṭanāditamd itas tataḥ sthitair vatsair arghyamānaiḥ samantataḥd sarovad bhrājate goṣṭhaṃ śrīmadbhir iva paṅkajaiḥd tac chrīniketanaṃ ramyaṃ mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ sutamd dṛṣṭvā sakhījanaṃ bhūyaḥ kathaṃ pratyāgamiṣyasid pañca bhūtāni me bhadre pibantu rudhiraṃ tavad bahulād na nirāśāni bhūtāni vāṅmātreṇa karomy ahamd prathamaṃ dṛṣṭavatsāhaṃ mṛgendra śṛṇu me vacaḥd dṛṣṭvā sakhījanaṃ bālaṃ gopāṃś ca paricārakānd gopījanaṃ samāgamya jananīṃ ca viśeṣataḥd vyāghraḥd śapathair āgamiṣyāmi manyase yadi muñca māmd śapathāḥ kīdṛśā bhadre ye tvayā parinoditāḥd bahulād pratyayaṃ caivam ākhyāhi bahule mama yatnataḥd yadi te nāsti viśvāso mamopari mṛgādhipad śapathair āgamiṣyāmi satyaṃ brūyāṃ na saṃśayaḥd mā dadasveti yo brūyād gurvagnibrāhmaṇeṣu cad tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd madhumāṃse ca yat pāpaṃ lākṣāvikrayaṇe tathād tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd yo vedavikrayī vipraś catvare paṭhate tu yaḥd asaṃtoṣī ca yo vipro nityaṃ bhavati yācakaḥd tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd matsarī gotrabhāvena bhūtānāṃ guṇanāśakaḥd kaumāraṃ cāpi bhartāraṃ yā nārī nānumanyated paradravyopayogena yajñaṃ kurvanti ye dvijāḥd tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd svapākaṃ ca parityajya parapākaratāś ca yed ye saktā gurudāreṣu svāmidāreṣu ye narāḥd brāhmaṇo vṛṣalīṃ gatvā na tu tīrthāni sevated tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtasaṃskāraḥ śūdraprekṣaṇakārakaḥd tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd anṛtaṃ dhanasaṃbaddhe kūṭasākṣyaṃ yaḥ kanyāṃ dvitīyāya prayacchatid tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd kathāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyām antarāyaṃ karoti yaḥd tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd gṛhe yasyāgato vipro nirāśaḥ pratigacchatid tena pāpena lipyāmi yat te haṃ nāgame punaḥd dvibhāryaḥ puruṣo yas tu ekāṃ snehena paśyatid tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd ekākī mṛṣṭam aśnāti yaḥ kaś cit puruṣādhamaḥd tena pāpena lipye haṃ yady ahaṃ nāgame punaḥd yas trīn hale balīvardān viṣamaṃ vāhayeta yaḥd tena pāpena lipye haṃ yadi nāyāṃ tavāntikamd ity etaiḥ pātakair ghorair āgamiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥd labdhvā sa pratyayaṃ vyāghraḥ punar vacanam abravītd saṃjātaḥ pratyayo smākaṃ śapathair bahule tavad kadā cin manyase gatvā mūrkho sau vañcito mayād loke smin nāstikāḥ ke cin mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥd bhrāmayanti ca te buddhiṃ cakrārūḍha ivekṣaṇamd atathyāny api tathyāni darśayanty api peśalāḥd same nimnonnatānīva citraṃ karmavido janāḥd prāyaḥ kṛtārtho loko yaṃ manyate nopakāriṇamd vatsaḥ kṣīrakṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā parityajati mātaramd na taṃ paśyāmi loke smin kṛte pratikaroti yaḥd sarvasya hi kṛtārthasya matir anyā pravartated ṛṣidevāsuragaṇaiḥ śapathāḥ kāryasiddhayed kṛtāḥ parasparaṃ pūrvaṃ tan na manyāmahe kathamd satyenābhiśaped yas tu devāgnigurusaṃnidhaud tasya vaivasvato rājā dharmasyārdhaṃ nikṛntatid mā te buddhir bhaved evaṃ śapathair eva yantritād tenaivaṃ darśitaṃ pūrvaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ kuru sāṃpratamd bahule gaccha paśya tvaṃ putrakaṃ putravatsaled pāyayitvā ca taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhanid mātaraṃ bhrātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā sakhīḥ svajanabāndhavānd bhīṣmaḥd satyam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā śīghram āgamanaṃ kurud evaṃ sā pratyayaṃ kṛtvā bahulā satyavādinīd anujñātā mṛgendreṇa prayātā putravatsalād aśrupūrṇamukhī dīnā vepamānā suduḥkhitād kurarī niḥśvasantīva patitā śokasāgared kariṇīva hi nāgena gṛhītā salilāśayed aśaktātmaparitrāṇe vilapantī muhur muhuḥd sā tu gopakulaṃ gatvā bahulā hṛtavikramād śrutvātmavatsaṃ krośantaṃ paryadhāvata tanmukhīd upāsarpata taṃ vatsaṃ bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇād sa prāptāṃ mātaraṃ vatsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ paripṛcchatid na te paśyāmi saumyatvaṃ durmanā iva lakṣyased bahulād udvignā cāpi te dṛṣṭir bhītabhītā ca dṛśyated piba putra stanaṃ mahyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadi pṛcchasid āgatā ca tava snehāt kuru tṛptiṃ yathepsitāmd apaścimam idaṃ vatsa durlabhaṃ mātṛdarśanamd ekāham atha māṃ pītvā pratyūṣe kasya pāsyasid mayā tu putra gantavyaṃ śapathair āgatā hy ahamd kāmarūpasya vyāghrasya dātavyaṃ jīvitaṃ mayād bahulāyā vacaḥ śrutvā vatso vacanam abravītd ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatra tvaṃ gantum icchasid ślāghyaṃ mamāpi maraṇaṃ tvayā saha na saṃśayaḥd ekākināpi martavyaṃ mayāvaśyaṃ tvayā vinād yadi māṃ sahitaṃ mātar vane vyāghro haniṣyatid yā gatir mātṛbhaktānāṃ dhruvaṃ sā me bhaviṣyatid tasmād avaśyaṃ yāsyāmi tvayā saha na saṃśayaḥd atha mātaś ca tiṣṭha tvaṃ śapathāḥ santu te mamad jananyā viprayuktasya jīvite kiṃ prayojanamd anāthasya vane nityaṃ ko me nātho bhaviṣyatid nāsti mātṛsamo bandhur bālānāṃ kṣīrapāyināmd nāsti mātṛsamo nātho nāsti mātṛsamā gatiḥd nāsti mātṛsamaḥ sneho nāsti mātṛsamaṃ sukhamd nāsti mātṛsamo deva ihaloke paratra cad eṣa naḥ paramo dharmaḥ prajāpativinirmitaḥd ye tu tiṣṭhanti satputrās te yānti paramāṃ gatimd mamaiva vihito mṛtyur na tvaṃ putra gamiṣyasid na cāyam anyajīvānāṃ mṛtyuḥ syād anyamṛtyunād apaścimam imaṃ putra mātuḥ saṃdeśam uttamamd anutiṣṭhasva madvākyaṃ tatra śuśrūṣaṇaṃ paramd vane jale ca vicaran mā pramādaṃ kariṣyasid pramādāt sarvabhūtāni vinaśyanti na saṃśayaḥd na ca lobhena vartavyaṃ viṣamasthaṃ tṛṇaṃ kva citd lobhād vināśaḥ sarveṣām iha loke paratra cad samudram aṭavīṃ yuddhaṃ viśanto lobhamohitāḥd lobhād akāryam atyugraṃ vidvān api samācaretd lobhāt pramādād viśrambhāt tribhir vai badhyate pumānd tasmāl lobhaṃ na kurvīta na pramādaṃ na viśvasetd ātmā ca satataṃ putra rakṣitavyaḥ prayatnataḥd sarpebhyaḥ śvāpadebhyaś ca mlecchacorādisaṃkaṭed tiraścāṃ pāpajātīnām ekatra vasatām apid viparītāni cittāni na jñāyante ha putrakad nadīnāṃ nakhināṃ caiva śṛṅgiṇāṃ śastrapāṇināmd viśvāso naiva kartavyaḥ strīṇāṃ veśyājanasya cad na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste pi na viśvasetd viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntatid na viśvaset svadehe pi calato jīvacetasaḥd tad vyaktimūḍham atyarthaṃ sadā suptaṃ vicārayetd gandhaḥ sarvatra satatam āghrātavyaḥ prayatnataḥd gāvaḥ paśyanti gandhena vedaiḥ paśyanti brāhmaṇāḥd cāraiḥ paśyanti rājānaś cakṣurbhyām itare janāḥd naikas tiṣṭhed vane ghore dharmam ekaś ca cintayetd na codvegas tvayā kāryaḥ sarvasya maraṇaṃ dhruvamd yathā hi pathikaḥ kaś cic chāyām āśritya viśrametd viśramya ca punar gacchet tadvad bhūtasamāgamaḥd yatrānityaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tatraikaḥ śocyate kathamd vatsāntaḥśokam utsṛjya madvākyam anupālayad śirasy āghrāya taṃ vatsam avalihya ca mūrdhanid śokena mahatāviṣṭā bāṣpavyākulalocanād viniḥśvasantī mārgīva vyāghrāṇāṃ vaśam āgatād putrahīnā jagat sarvaṃ paśyanty andheva sābhavatd mahāpaṅkavinirmagnā tiṣṭhanty evātra sīdatid vilapya bahulā putram uvācedaṃ punar vacaḥd nāsti putrasamaḥ sneho nāsti putrasamaṃ sukhamd nāsti putrasamā prītir nāsti putrasamā gatiḥd aputrasya jagac chūnyam aputrasya gṛhaṃ kutaḥd putreṇa jayate lokān putreṇa narakaṃ jayetd anṛtaṃ vadate lokaś candanaṃ kila śītalamd putragātrapariṣvaṅgaś candanād api śītalaḥd digambaraṃ gatavrīḍaṃ jaṭilaṃ dhūlidhūsaramd puṇyair vinā na paśyanti gaṅgādharam ivātmajamd kiṃ candanena pīyūṣabindunā kiṃ kim indunād putragātrapariṣvaṅgapātraṃ gātraṃ bhaved yadid iti putraguṇān uktvā nirīkṣya ca muhur muhuḥd svamātaraṃ sakhīr gopān kramāt tān anupṛcchatid yūthasyāgre carantīṃ mām āsasāda mṛgādhipaḥd muktāhaṃ tena śapathaiḥ kulaṃ dṛṣṭvāgamiṣyasid sāhaṃ bhavantaṃ saṃdraṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ svakulaṃ sutamd āgatā satyavākyena punar yāsyāmi tatra cad mātaḥ kṣamasva tat sarvaṃ bālatve yat kṛtaṃ mayād nyāsas tavāyaṃ dauhitraḥ kim anyat prabravīmi ted vipule campake dāme bhadre surabhi mālinid vasudhāre śriye nande mahānande ghaṭasraved ajñānāj jñānato vāpi yad uktaṃ kva cid apriyamd tat kṣamadhvaṃ mahābhāgāḥ paścād yac ca kṛtaṃ mayād sarvāḥ sarvaguṇopetāḥ sarvalokasya mātaraḥd sarvāḥ sarvapradā nityaṃ rakṣadhvaṃ mama bālakamd anātham abalaṃ dīnaṃ sīdantaṃ mama putrakamd mātṛśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ bhaginyaḥ pālayiṣyathad bhaginīnām ayaṃ putraḥ sāṃprataṃ ca viśeṣataḥd bālo balābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ poṣyaḥ pālyaś ca putravatd carantaṃ viṣame sthāne gacchantaṃ paragokuled akāryeṣu pravartantaṃ he sakhyo vārayiṣyathad paraputrātmaputreṣu yāsāṃ cittaṃ samaṃ bhavetd tā dhanyās tāḥ kṛtārthāś ca tāḥ striyas tāś ca mātaraḥd modante devalokeṣu tā gāvas tāś ca yoṣitaḥd yāḥ pālayanty anāthāṃś ca paraputrān ātmaputravatd tasmād anāthaṃ matputraṃ putravat pālayiṣyathad rakṣadhvaṃ ca mahābhāgā yāsyāmi satyasaṃśrayātd yataḥ sarvasya jātasya sthitaṃ maraṇam agrataḥd na cāsmadgamane manyuḥ sakhyaḥ kāryaḥ kathaṃ canad śrutvaitad bahulāvākyaṃ mātā sakhyaś ca vihvalāḥd viṣādaṃ paramaṃ jagmur idam ūcuḥ suvismitāḥd aho sumahad āścaryaṃ yad vyāghravadanaṃ mahatd praveṣṭum udyatā bhīmaṃ bahulā satyavākyataḥd śapathaiḥ satyavākyena vañcayitvā yato bhayamd nāśitavyaṃ prayatnena tat kathaṃ gamyate punaḥd bahule naiva gantavyaṃ dharmo yaṃ katamas tavad yad bālaṃ svakulaṃ tyaktvā satyalobhena gamyated atra gāthāḥ purā gītā ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥd prāṇatyāge samutpanne śapathair nāsti pātakamd uktvānṛtaṃ bhaved yatra prāṇināṃ prāṇarakṣaṇamd anṛtaṃ tatra vai satyaṃ satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ bhavetd kāminīṣu vivāheṣu gavāṃ kārye tathaiva cad bahulād brāhmaṇābhyupapattau ca śapathair nāsti pātakamd pareṣāṃ prāṇarakṣārthaṃ vadāmy evānṛtaṃ vacaḥd nātmārtham utsahe vaktuṃ svalpam apy anṛtaṃ kva citd ekaḥ saṃśliṣyate garbhe jāyetaiko mriyeta cad bhuṅkte caikaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ mātaḥ satyaṃ vadāmy ahamd satye pratiṣṭhito loko dharmaḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥd udadhiḥ satyavākyena maryādāṃ na vilaṅghatid viṣṇave pṛthivīṃ dattvā baliḥ pātālam āśritaḥd chadmanā ca balir baddhaḥ satyavākyena tiṣṭhatid pravardhamānaḥ śailendraḥ śatayojanam ucchritaḥd satyena saṃsthito vindhyo na pravṛddhaḥ sa sāṃpratamd svargāpavarganarakāḥ sarve vāci pratiṣṭhitāḥd yas tāṃ lopayate vācam aśeṣaṃ tena lopitamd yo nyathā santam ātmānam anyathā satsu bhāṣated kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇād tasmān naivāham ātmānam asatyena ca lopayed yāsyāmi narakaṃ ghoraṃ vilopyātmānam ātmanād agādhe vipule śuddhe satyatīrthe kṣamāhraded snātvā pāpavinirmuktaḥ prayāti paramāṃ gatimd aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtamd aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyated satyaṃ sādhu tapaḥ śrutaṃ ca paramaṃ kleśādibhir varjitaṃd svādhīnaṃ ca sudurlabhaṃ ca jagataḥ sādhāraṇaṃ bhūṣaṇamd sādhūnāṃ nikaṣaṃ satāṃ kuladhanaṃ sarvāśramāṇāṃ balaṃd yan mleccho pi vidhāya gacchati divaṃ tat tyajya tiṣṭhet kathamd sakhyaḥd bahule tvaṃ namaskāryā sarvair api surāsuraiḥd mā tvaṃ paramasatyena prāṇāṃs tyajasi dustyajānd brūmaḥ kim atra kalyāṇi yā tvaṃ dharmadhuraṃdharād tyāgenānena yat prāpyaṃ trailokye kaḥ samo sti ted adhiyogaṃ ca paśyāmas tyāgād asmāt sutena ted na hi kalyāṇacittānām āpadaḥ santi kutra citd dṛṣṭvā gopāñjanaṃ sarvaṃ parikramya ca gokulamd bahulā prasthitā devān vṛkṣāṃś cāpṛcchya tān punaḥd kṣitiṃ ca jalam agniṃ ca vāyuṃ khārkaniśākaramd daśadigdevatām adrīn nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathād sarvān vijñāpayāmy adya praṇipatya muhur muhuḥd svaiḥ svaiḥ prabhāvai rakṣadhvam anāthaṃ mama vatsakamd karuṇāhitacittānāṃ na syāt parajano yataḥd tasmāt karuṇayā bālam anāthaṃ pālayiṣyathad ye saṃśritā vane siddhāḥ sarvāś ca vanadevatāḥd vane carantaṃ me bālaṃ te rakṣantu sutaṃ mamad campakāśokapuṃnāgasaralārjunakiṃśukāḥd śṛṇvantu pādapāḥ sarve saṃdeśaṃ mama viklavamd bālam ekākinaṃ dīnaṃ carantaṃ viṣame vaned rakṣadhvaṃ vatsakaṃ bālaṃ snehāt putram ivaurasamd mātāpitṛvinirmuktam anāthaṃ dīnam āturamd vicarantam imāṃ bhūmiṃ krandamānaṃ suduḥkhitamd tasyehākrandamānasya matputrasya mahāvaned mātṛśokābhibhūtasya kṣutpipāsāturasya cad nyastasyaikākinaḥ śūnyaṃ jagat sarvaṃ prapaśyataḥd caramāṇasya kartavyaṃ sānukrośasya rakṣaṇamd evaṃ saṃdiśya bahulā putrasnehavaśaṃ gatād śokāgninātisaṃtaptā chinnāśā putradarśaned viyuktā cakravākīva lateva patitā taroḥd andheva yaṣṭirahitā praskhalantī pade paded gatvā tu sā punas tatra yatrāsau piśitāśanaḥd āste visphūrjitamukhas tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭro bhayānakaḥd vyāghraṃ dṛṣṭvā tu sā dhenur idaṃ vacanam abravītd āgatāhaṃ mahābhāga satyadharmavyavasthayād kuru tṛptiṃ yathākāmaṃ mama māṃsena sāṃpratamd tarpayasva svabhūtāni pañcāsya śoṇitena med vyāghraḥd svāgataṃ tava kalyāṇi bahule satyavādinid na hi satyavatāṃ kiṃ cid aśubhaṃ vidyate kva citd tvayoktaṃ bahule pūrvaṃ satyāt pratyāgatā punaḥd tena naḥ kautukaṃ jātaṃ prāptāgacchet kathaṃ punaḥd anyathā māṃ samāsādya jīvantī yāsyase kathamd tac ca naḥ kautukaṃ pūrṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ satyaṃ gavāṃ mayād tasmād anena satyena vimuktāsi mayādhunād satye pratiṣṭhitā lokā dharmaḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥd satye pratiṣṭhitaṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitamd satyena devās tuṣyanti satyena pitaras tathād satyena ṛṣayaḥ siddhāḥ sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitamd dhanyā gāvaḥ kṣitir dhanyā dhanyā tvam api dhenuked dhanyaḥ sa rājā yatra tvaṃ vasase satyavādinid dhanyaḥ sarāṣṭraḥ satṛṇaḥ prāṇivṛkṣasamanvitaḥd cacāra bahulā yatra diṣṭyā pāpavināśinīd te dhanyās te kṛtārthāś ca tair eva sukṛtaṃ kṛtamd taiḥ prāptaṃ janmanaḥ sāraṃ ye pibanti gavāṃ payaḥd mṛgendraḥ pratyayaṃ gatvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥd pratyādeśo yam asmākaṃ sarvair devaiḥ pradarśitaḥd tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ karma yena mokṣyāmi kilbiṣātd mayā jīvasahasrāṇi bhakṣitāni hatāni cad gatiṃ kāṃ nu gamiṣyāmi dṛṣṭvā gosatyam īdṛśamd ahaṃ pāpī durācāro nṛśaṃso jīvaghātakaḥd kāṃl lokān hi gamiṣyāmi kṛtvā karma sudāruṇamd gamiṣye puṇyatīrthāni kariṣye kāyaśodhanamd patiṣye girim āsādya viśe vāpi hutāśanamd bahule yan mayā kāryaṃ tapaḥ pāpaviśuddhayed bahulād tad ādeśaya saṃkṣepān na kālo vistarasya med tapaḥ kṛte praśaṃsanti tretāyāṃ yajñakarma cad dvāpare dhyānayogaṃ ca dānam ekaṃ kalau yuged sarveṣām eva dānānām idam evaikam uttamamd abhayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ nāsti dānam ataḥ paramd carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānām abhayaṃ yaḥ prayacchatid sa sarvabhayanirmuktaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchatid nāsty ahiṃsāparaṃ dānaṃ nāsty ahiṃsāparo damaḥd yathā hastipadenānyat padaṃ sarvaṃ pralīyated sarve dharmās tathā vyāghra vidhīyante hy ahiṃsayād yogavṛkṣasya yā chāyā tāpatrayavināśinīd dharmajñānasupuṣpasya svargamokṣaphalasya cad duḥkhatrayārkasaṃtaptaś chāyāṃ yogataroḥ śritaḥd na badhyate punar duḥkhaiḥ prāpya nirvāṇam uttamamd ity evaṃ paramaṃ śreyaḥ kīrtitaṃ te samāsataḥd vyāghraḥd jñātaṃ caitat tvayā sarvaṃ kevalaṃ māṃ hi pṛcchasid ahaṃ devaiḥ purā sarvair vyāghrarūpeṇa pātitaḥd tatra prāṇivadhe ghore aśeṣaṃ mama vismṛtamd tvatsaṃparkopadeśena saṃjātaṃ smaraṇaṃ punaḥd muktaśāpaś ca saṃjātaḥ prasādāt tava dhenuked bahule gaccha tuṣṭo smi putreṇa sahitā bhavad tvaṃ cāpy anena satyena gamiṣyasi parāṃ gatimd tato yogaṃ samāśritya vyāghras tadgatamānasaḥd prāṇāyāmaiḥ svakaṃ dehaṃ parityajya divaṃ gataḥd sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā yogaiśvaryasamanvitaḥd vimāne haṃsasaṃyukte mahatā apsarogaṇaiḥd vimānasaṃsthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥd bahulā hṛṣṭatuṣṭāṅgī gokulaṃ punar āgatād āgatya ca yathāvṛttaṃ vyāghrasaṃvādam uttamamd sakhībhyaḥ kathayām āsa putrasya ca viśeṣataḥd bahulā putrasaṃyuktā suprītā sunirākulād godhanair vṛṣabhair vatsair gopagopījanair vṛtād vicacārāṭavīṃ sarvām aśeṣabhayavarjitād yatheṣṭaceṣṭam abhavad gokulaṃ tatprabhāvataḥd sarāṣṭrabhṛtyarājānaṃ sāntaḥpuraparicchadamd sarvān gopāṃś ca tān dṛṣṭvā gopīgomaṇḍalāni cad iti saṃgṛhya tān sarvān bahulā prasthitā divamd mahāvimānaiḥ śrīmadbhir asaṃkhyaiḥ sarvatovṛtamd prāpya svargaṃ kramād ūrdhvam aśeṣaiḥ sahitā punaḥd upary upari lokānāṃ gatvā golokam āsthitād tatra saṃbhogasaṃkīrṇe asaṃkhyātaiḥ purottamaiḥd bhīṣmaḥd krīḍate sahitā sarvair yāvad ābhūtasaṃplavamd ity etat satyavākyasya māhābhāgyam udāhṛtamd yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi svargalokaṃ sa gacchatid bahulāvyāghrasaṃvādaṃ yaḥ paṭhet satataṃ dvijaḥd śṛṇuyād ekacittaś ca sa vyāghrair nābhibhūyated viyuktā yā sutair nārī naro vāpi paṭhet sadād so pi pāpair vinirmuktaḥ putrair bhavati saṃgataḥd yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya caturdaśyaṣṭamīṣu cad satāṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān gacchate nātra saṃśayaḥd gavāṃ goṣṭhe ca paṭhatāṃ govṛddhir nātra saṃśayaḥd kṣetramadhye ca paṭhatāṃ sasyavṛddhiḥ prajāyated gṛhamadhye ca paṭhatāṃ bālānāṃ śāntivardhanamd bhaved grahābhibhūtānāṃ rakṣām etāṃ ca yaḥ paṭhetd durgeṣu paṭhatāṃ nityam aṭavyāyataneṣu cad divā vā yadi vā rātrau na bhayaṃ vidyate kva citd duḥsvapnāriṣṭadurmitraṃ śrutvedaṃ saṃpraṇaśyatid vandhyāyāś ca bhavet putraḥ saṃmataś ca patir bhavetd kumārī ca sadā śṛṇvan vīraṃ patim avāpnuyātd nārī vā puruṣo vāpi durbhagaḥ subhago bhavetd gavāṃ parvasu bhaktyā ca māhātmyaṃ purataḥ paṭhetd sa govṛddhim avāpnoti golokaṃ caiva gacchatid śūdro haṃ nādhikāro me cāturāśramyasevaned iti vijñānam apare nātmany upadadhaty utad viśeṣeṇa ca vakṣyāmi cāturvarṇyasya liṅgataḥd pañcabhūtaśarīrāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sadṛśātmanāmd lokadharme ca dharme ca viśeṣakaraṇaṃ kṛtamd yatraikatvaṃ punar yānti prāṇinas tatra vistaraḥd adhruvo hi kathaṃ lokaḥ smṛto dharmaḥ kathaṃ dhruvaḥd yatra kālo dhruvas tāta tatra dharmaḥ sanātanaḥd sarveṣāṃ tulyadehānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sadṛśātmanāmd kālo dharmeṇa saṃyuktaḥ śeṣa eva susaṃgrahaḥd evaṃ sati na doṣo sti bhūtānāṃ dharmasevaned tiryagyonāv api satāṃ loka eva mato guruḥd pālaya tvaṃ prajāḥ sarvāḥ śāntātmā cānuśāsitaḥd dvaipāyanas tv ayaṃ cakṣuḥ kṛṣṇas te stu parāyaṇamd ity uktvopāsanārthāya virarāma mahāmatiḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca śaratalpagataṃ bhīṣmaṃ pāṇḍavo tha kurūdvahaḥ yudhiṣṭhiro hitaprepsur apṛcchat kalmaṣāpaham yudhiṣṭhira uvācaa kiṃ śreyaḥ puruṣasyeha kiṃ kurvan sukham edhatec vipāpmā ca bhavet kena kiṃ vā kalmaṣanāśanamd tasmai śuśrūṣamāṇāya bhūyaḥ śāṃtanavas tadād devavaṃśaṃ yathānyāyam ācaṣṭa puruṣarṣabha bhīṣma uvācaa ayaṃ daivatavaṃśo vai ṛṣivaṃśasamanvitaḥc dvisaṃdhyaṃ paṭhitaḥ putra kalmaṣāpaharaḥ paraḥd yudhiṣṭhiraḥd sarvaśāntikaraṃ japyaṃ dāridryāturaduḥkhināmd tuṣṭipuṣṭipradaṃ nityaṃ pitāmaha vadasva med bhīṣmaḥd ayaṃ śasto mahājapyo devarājarṣisaṃyutaḥd sevan naro na duḥkhena bhayena ca vimuhyatid yad ahnā kurute pāpam indriyaiḥ puruṣaś carand buddhipūrvam abuddhir vā rātrau yaś cāpi saṃdhyayoḥd mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ kīrtayan vai śuciḥ sadād nāndho na badhiraḥ kāle kurute svastimān sadād tiryagyoniṃ na gacchec ca narakaṃ saṃkarāṇi cad na ca duḥkhabhayaṃ tasya maraṇe na sa muhyatia devāsuragurur devaḥ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtaḥc acintyo thāpy anirdeśyaḥ sarvaprāṇo hy ayonijaḥa pitāmaho jagannāthaḥ sāvitrī brahmaṇaḥ satīc vedabhūr atha kartā ca viṣṇur nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥd viṣṇor nābhisarojāto brahmā bhuvanapāvanaḥa umāpatir virūpākṣaḥ skandaḥ senāpatis tathāc viśākho hutabhug vāyuś candrādityau prabhākaraua śakraḥ śacīpatir devo yamo dhūmorṇayā sahac varuṇaḥ saha gauryā ca saha ṛddhyā dhaneśvaraḥa saumyā gauḥ surabhir devī viśravāś ca mahān ṛṣiḥc ṣaṭkālaḥ sāgaro gaṅgā sravantyo tha marudgaṇāḥa vālakhilyās tapaḥsiddhāḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tathāc nāradaḥ parvataś caiva viśvāvasur hahāhuhūḥa tumbaruś citrasenaś ca devadūtaś ca viśrutaḥc devakanyā mahābhāgā divyāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥa urvaśī menakā rambhā miśrakeśī alambuṣāc viśvācī ca ghṛtācī ca pañcacūḍā tilottamāa ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sāśvinaḥ pitaro pi cac dharmaḥ satyaṃ tapo dīkṣā vyavasāyaḥ pitāmahaḥa śarvaryo divasāś caiva mārīcaḥ kaśyapas tathāc śukro bṛhaspatir bhaumo budho rāhuḥ śanaiścaraḥa nakṣatrāṇy ṛtavaś caiva māsāḥ saṃdhyāḥ savatsarāḥc vainateyāḥ samudrāś ca kadrujāḥ pannagās tathād ananto nāgarājaś ca vāsukis takṣakas tathād mahāpadmaś ca vikhyātaḥ karkoṭakadhanaṃjayaua śatadrūś ca vipāśā ca candrabhāgā sarasvatīc sindhuś ca devikā caiva puṣkaraṃ tīrtham eva caa gaṅgā mahānadī caiva kapilā narmadā tathāc kampunā ca viśalyā ca karatoyāmbuvāhinīa sarayūr gaṇḍakī caiva lohityaś ca mahānadaḥc tāmrāruṇā vetravatī parṇāśā gautamī tathāa godāvarī ca veṇṇā ca kṛṣṇaveṇā tathādrijāc dṛṣadvatī ca kāverī vaṃkṣur mandākinī tathāa prayāgaṃ ca prabhāsaṃ ca puṇyaṃ naimiṣam eva cac tac ca viśveśvarasthānaṃ yatra tad vimalaṃ saraḥa puṇyatīrthaiś ca kalilaṃ kurukṣetraṃ prakīrtitamc sindhūttamaṃ tapodānaṃ jambūmārgam athāpi caa hiraṇvatī vitastā ca tathaivekṣumatī nadīc vedasmṛtir vaidasinī malavāsāś ca nady apia bhūmibhāgās tathā puṇyā gaṅgādvāram athāpi cac ṛṣikulyās tathā medhyā nadī citrapathā tathāa kauśikī yamunā sītā tathā carmaṇvatī nadīb carmaṇvatī nadī puṇyā kauśikī yamunā tathāc nadī bhīmarathī caiva bāhudā ca mahānadīe mahendravāṇī tridivā nīlikā ca sarasvatīa nandā cāparanandā ca tathā tīrthaṃ mahāhradamc gayātha phalgutīrthaṃ ca dharmāraṇyaṃ surair vṛtama tathā devanadī puṇyā saraś ca brahmanirmitamc puṇyaṃ trilokavikhyātaṃ sarvapāpaharaṃ śivamd etāḥ pāpaharāḥ sarvā devanadyaḥ prakīrtitāḥa himavān parvataś caiva divyauṣadhisamanvitaḥc vindhyo dhātuvicitrāṅgas tīrthavān auṣadhānvitaḥa merur mahendro malayaḥ śvetaś ca rajatācitaḥc śṛṅgavān mandaro nīlo niṣadho darduras tathāa citrakūṭo ñjanābhaś ca parvato gandhamādanaḥc puṇyaḥ somagiriś caiva tathaivānye mahīdharāḥe diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva kṣitiḥ sarve mahīruhāḥa viśvedevā nabhaś caiva nakṣatrāṇi grahās tathāc pāntu vaḥ satataṃ devāḥ kīrtitākīrtitā mayāa kīrtayāno naro hy etān mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥc stuvaṃś ca pratinandaṃś ca mucyate sarvato bhayāte sarvasaṃkarapāpebhyo devatāstavanandakaḥa devatānantaraṃ viprāṃs tapaḥsiddhāṃs tapodhikānc kīrtitān kīrtayiṣyāmi sarvapāpapramocanāna yavakrīto tha raibhyaś ca kakṣīvān auśijas tathāc bhṛgvaṅgirās tathā kaṇvo medhātithir atha prabhuḥe barhī ca guṇasaṃpannaḥ prācīṃ diśam upāśritāḥa bhadrāṃ diśaṃ mahābhāgā ulmucuḥ pramucus tathāc mumucuś ca mahābhāgaḥ svastyātreyaś ca vīryavāna mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putras tathāgastyaḥ pratāpavānc dṛḍhāyuś cordhvabāhuś ca viśrutāv ṛṣisattamaua paścimāṃ diśam āśritya ya edhante nibodha tānc uṣadguḥ saha sodaryaiḥ parivyādhaś ca vīryavāna ṛṣir dīrghatamāś caiva gautamaḥ kaśyapas tathāc ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥe atreḥ putraś ca dharmātmā tathā sārasvataḥ prabhuḥa uttarāṃ diśam āśritya ya edhante nibodha tānc atrir vasiṣṭhaḥ śaktiś ca pārāśaryaś ca vīryavāna viśvāmitro bharadvājo jamadagnis tathaiva cac ṛcīkapautro rāmaś ca ṛṣir auddālakis tathāa śvetaketuḥ kohalaś ca vipulo devalas tathāc devaśarmā ca dhaumyaś ca hastikāśyapa eva caa lomaśo nāciketaś ca lomaharṣaṇa eva cac ṛṣir ugraśravāś caiva bhārgavaś cyavanas tathāa eṣa vai samavāyas te ṛṣidevasamanvitaḥc ādyaḥ prakīrtito rājan sarvapāpapramocanaḥa nṛgo yayātir nahuṣo yaduḥ pūruś ca vīryavānc dhundhumāro dilīpaś ca sagaraś ca pratāpavāna kṛśāśvo yauvanāśvaś ca citrāśvaḥ satyavāṃs tathāc duḥṣanto bharataś caiva cakravartī mahāyaśāḥa yavano janakaś caiva tathā dṛḍharatho nṛpaḥc raghur naravaraś caiva tathā daśaratho nṛpaḥd rājā rathaṃtaraś caiva bhārgavaś cyavanas tathāa rāmo rākṣasahā vīraḥ śaśabindur bhagīrathaḥc hariścandro maruttaś ca jahnur jāhnavisevitāa mahodayo hy alarkaś ca ailaś caiva narādhipaḥb udarkaś caiva māndhātā tathaivoḍo mahodayaḥc karaṃdhamo naraśreṣṭhaḥ kadhmoraś ca narādhipaḥa dakṣo mbarīṣaḥ kukuro ravataś ca mahāyaśāḥb kuruḥ saṃvaraṇaś caiva māndhātā satyavikramaḥc mucukundaś ca rājarṣir mitrabhānuḥ priyaṃkaraḥc jahnur jāhnavisevitaḥc ādirājaḥ pṛthur vainyoa trasadasyus tathā rājā śveto rājarṣisattamaḥc mahābhiṣaś ca vikhyāto nimirājas tathāṣṭakaḥa āyuḥ kṣupaś ca rājarṣiḥ kakṣeyuś ca narādhipaḥc śibir auśīnaraś caiva gayaś caiva narādhipaḥd pṛthus tathoparicaraḥ kekayaś ca mahāyaśāḥa pratardano divodāsaḥ saudāsaḥ kosaleśvaraḥc ailo nalaś ca rājarṣir manuś caiva prajāpatiḥa havidhraś ca pṛṣadhraś ca pratīpaḥ śaṃtanus tathāb pṛṣadhruś ca pratīpaś ca śaṃtanuś ca tathā nṛpaḥb havidhraś ca ajaś caiva rantidevaḥ purūravāḥb ajaḥ prācīnabarhiś ca tathekṣvākur mahāyaśāḥb anaraṇyo narapatir jānujaṅghas tathaiva cab suhotraḥ sṛñjayaś caiva rantidevas tathaiva cab rambhodbhavaś ca rājarṣir māndhātā rājasattamaḥc kakṣasenaś ca rājarṣir ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥd kalyam utthāya yo nityaṃ saṃdhye dve stamayodayed paṭhec chucir anāvṛttaḥ sa dharmaphalabhāg bhavetd devā devarṣayaś caiva stutā rājarṣayas tathād puṣṭim āyur yaśaḥ svargaṃ vidhāsyanti mameśvarāḥa mā vighnaṃ mā ca me pāpaṃ mā ca me paripanthinaḥc dhruvo jayo me nityaṃ syāt paratra ca parā gatiḥd namas tebhyo namas tebhyo mā ca me paripanthinaḥd parāt paratarā caiva gatiḥ syād iti tat paṭhetd avikārāya śuddhāya nityāya paramātmaned sadaikarūparūpāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca janamejaya uvāca śaratalpagate bhīṣme kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdhare śayāne vīraśayane pāṇḍavaiḥ samupasthite yudhiṣṭhiro mahāprājño mama pūrvapitāmahaḥ dharmāṇām āgamaṃ śrutvā viditvā dharmasaṃśayān dānānāṃ ca vidhiṃ śrutvā chinnadharmārthasaṃśayaḥ yad anyad akarod vipra tan me śaṃsitum arhasi vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca abhūn muhūrtaṃ stimitaṃ sarvaṃ tad rājamaṇḍalama tūṣṇīṃbhūte tadā bhīṣme paṭe citram ivārpitamc muhūrtam iva ca dhyātvā vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥe nṛpaṃ śayānaṃ gāṅgeyam idam āha vacas tadāa rājan prakṛtim āpannaḥ kururājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc sahito bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvaiḥ pārthivaiś cānuyāyibhiḥa upāste tvāṃ naravyāghra saha kṛṣṇena dhīmatāc tam imaṃ purayānāya tvam anujñātum arhasia evam ukto bhagavatā vyāsena pṛthivīpatiḥc yudhiṣṭhiraṃ sahāmātyam anujajñe nadīsutaḥa uvāca cainaṃ madhuraṃ tataḥ śāṃtanavo nṛpaḥc praviśasva puraṃ rājan vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥa yajasva vividhair yajñair bahvannaiḥ svāptadakṣiṇaiḥc yayātir iva rājendra śraddhādamapuraḥsaraḥa kṣatradharmarataḥ pārtha pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayac śreyasā yokṣyase caiva vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥa rañjayasva prajāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtīḥ parisāntvayac suhṛdaḥ phalasatkārair abhyarcaya yathārhataḥa anu tvāṃ tāta jīvantu mitrāṇi suhṛdas tathāc caityasthāne sthitaṃ vṛkṣaṃ phalavantam iva dvijāḥa āgantavyaṃ ca bhavatā samaye mama pārthivac vinivṛtte dinakare pravṛtte cottarāyaṇea tathety uktvā tu kaunteyaḥ so bhivādya pitāmahamc prayayau saparīvāro nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayama dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ puraskṛtya gāndhārīṃ ca pativratāmc saha tair ṛṣibhiḥ sarvair bhrātṛbhiḥ keśavena caa paurajānapadaiś caiva mantrivṛddhaiś ca pārthivaḥc praviveśa kuruśreṣṭha puraṃ vāraṇasāhvayam vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa tataḥ kuntīsuto rājā paurajānapadaṃ janamc pūjayitvā yathānyāyam anujajñe gṛhān pratia sāntvayām āsa nārīś ca hatavīrā hateśvarāḥc vipulair arthadānaiś ca tadā pāṇḍusuto nṛpaḥa so bhiṣikto mahāprājñaḥ prāpya rājyaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥc avasthāpya naraśreṣṭhaḥ sarvāḥ svaprakṛtīs tadāa dvijebhyo balamukhyebhyo naigamebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥc pratigṛhyāśiṣo mukhyās tadā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥa uṣitvā śarvarīḥ śrīmān pañcāśan nagarottamec samayaṃ kauravāgryasya sasmāra puruṣarṣabhaḥd tataś ca puṇḍarīkākṣam āha dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥd bhagavan yogayukto si tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyasi śatruhand brūhi māṃ puruṣaśreṣṭha ājñāpyo bhavatā hy ahamd dhyāyasva puṇḍarīkākṣa śreyo me paramaṃ hitamd śrībhagavānd śaratalpagato bhīṣmaḥ śāmyann iva hutāśanaḥd māṃ dhyāti puruṣavyāghras tato me tadgataṃ manaḥa sa niryayau gajapurād yājakaiḥ parivāritaḥc dṛṣṭvā nivṛttam ādityaṃ pravṛttaṃ cottarāyaṇama ghṛtaṃ mālyaṃ ca gandhāṃś ca kṣaumāṇi ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥc candanāgarumukhyāni tathā kālāgarūṇi caa prasthāpya pūrvaṃ kaunteyo bhīṣmasaṃsādhanāya vaic mālyāni ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni caa dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ puraskṛtya gāndhārīṃ ca yaśasvinīmc mātaraṃ ca pṛthāṃ dhīmān bhrātṝṃś ca puruṣarṣabhaḥd bhrātṝṃś caiva puraskṛtya mātaraṃ ca pṛthām apia janārdanenānugato vidureṇa ca dhīmatāc yuyutsunā ca kauravyo yuyudhānena cābhibhoa mahatā rājabhogyena paribarheṇa saṃvṛtaḥc stūyamāno mahārāja bhīṣmasyāgnīn anuvrajana niścakrāma purāt tasmād yathā devapatis tathāc āsasāda kurukṣetre tataḥ śāṃtanavaṃ nṛpama upāsyamānaṃ vyāsena pārāśaryeṇa dhīmatāc nāradena ca rājarṣe devalenāsitena caa hataśiṣṭair nṛpaiś cānyair nānādeśasamāgataiḥc rakṣibhiś ca mahātmānaṃ rakṣyamāṇaṃ samantataḥa śayānaṃ vīraśayane dadarśa nṛpatis tataḥb dhyāyantaṃ paramātmānaṃ kṛṣṇadharmaṃ sanātanamc tato rathād avārohad bhrātṛbhiḥ saha dharmarāṭa abhivādyātha kaunteyaḥ pitāmaham ariṃdamamc dvaipāyanādīn viprāṃś ca taiś ca pratyabhinanditaḥd dvaipāyanaprabhṛtibhir munibhiḥ pratinanditaḥa ṛtvigbhir brahmakalpaiś ca bhrātṛbhiś ca sahācyutaḥb mādhavena mahārājaḥ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇāc āsādya śaratalpastham ṛṣibhiḥ parivāritama abravīd bharataśreṣṭhaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥc bhrātṛbhiḥ saha kauravya śayānaṃ nimnagāsutama yudhiṣṭhiro haṃ nṛpate namas te jāhnavīsutac śṛṇoṣi cen mahābāho brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi tea prāpto smi samaye rājann agnīn ādāya te vibhoc ācāryā brāhmaṇāś caiva ṛtvijo bhrātaraś ca mea putraś ca te mahātejā dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥc upasthitaḥ sahāmātyo vāsudevaś ca vīryavāna hataśiṣṭāś ca rājānaḥ sarve ca kurujāṅgalāḥc tān paśya kuruśārdūla samunmīlaya locanea yac ceha kiṃ cit kartavyaṃ tat sarvaṃ prāpitaṃ mayāc yathoktaṃ bhavatā kāle sarvam eva ca tat kṛtama evam uktas tu gāṅgeyaḥ kuntīputreṇa dhīmatāc dadarśa bhāratān sarvān sthitān saṃparivārya tama tataś calavalir bhīṣmaḥ pragṛhya vipulaṃ bhujamc oghameghasvano vāgmī kāle vacanam abravīta diṣṭyā prāpto si kaunteya sahāmātyo yudhiṣṭhirac parivṛtto hi bhagavān sahasrāṃśur divākaraḥa aṣṭapañcāśataṃ rātryaḥ śayānasyādya me gatāḥc śareṣu niśitāgreṣu yathā varṣaśataṃ tathāa māgho yaṃ samanuprāpto māsaḥ puṇyo yudhiṣṭhirac tribhāgaśeṣaḥ pakṣo yaṃ śuklo bhavitum arhatia evam uktvā tu gāṅgeyo dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiramc dhṛtarāṣṭram athāmantrya kāle vacanam abravīta rājan viditadharmo si sunirṇītārthasaṃśayaḥc bahuśrutā hi te viprā bahavaḥ paryupāsitāḥa vedaśāstrāṇi sarvāṇi dharmāṃś ca manujeśvarac vedāṃś ca caturaḥ sāṅgān nikhilenāvabudhyasea na śocitavyaṃ kauravya bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathāc śrutaṃ devarahasyaṃ te kṛṣṇadvaipāyanād apia yathā pāṇḍoḥ sutā rājaṃs tathaiva tava dharmataḥc tān pālaya sthito dharme guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratāna dharmarājo hi śuddhātmā nideśe sthāsyate tavac ānṛśaṃsyaparaṃ hy enaṃ jānāmi guruvatsalama tava putrā durātmānaḥ krodhalobhaparāyaṇāḥc īrṣyābhibhūtā durvṛttās tān na śocitum arhasi vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ manīṣiṇamc vāsudevaṃ mahābāhum abhyabhāṣata kauravaḥa bhagavan devadeveśa surāsuranamaskṛtac trivikrama namas te stu śaṅkhacakragadādharad vāsudevo hiraṇyātmā puruṣaḥ savitā virāṭd jīvabhūto nurūpas tvaṃ paramātmā sanātanaḥd tvadbhaktaṃ tvadgatasvāntam adāram aparigrahamd trāyasva puṇḍarīkākṣa puruṣottama nityaśaḥa anujānīhi māṃ kṛṣṇa vaikuṇṭha puruṣottamac rakṣyāś ca te pāṇḍaveyā bhavān hy eṣāṃ parāyaṇama uktavān asmi durbuddhiṃ mandaṃ duryodhanaṃ purāb duryodhanaṃ durācāraṃ kṣatriyāntakaraṃ raṇec yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato dharmo yato dharmas tato jayaḥa vāsudevena tīrthena putra saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥb suhṛdbhiḥ sahito rājan bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakamc saṃdhānasya paraḥ kālas taveti ca punaḥ punaḥa na ca me tad vaco mūḍhaḥ kṛtavān sa sumandadhīḥc ghātayitveha pṛthivīṃ tataḥ sa nidhanaṃ gataḥa tvāṃ ca jānāmy ahaṃ vīra purāṇam ṛṣisattamamc nareṇa sahitaṃ devaṃ badaryāṃ suciroṣitama tathā me nāradaḥ prāha vyāsaś ca sumahātapāḥc naranārāyaṇāv etau saṃbhūtau manujeṣv itid sa māṃ tvam anujānīhi kṛṣṇa mokṣye kalevaramd tvayāhaṃ samanujñāto gaccheyaṃ paramāṃ gatim vāsudeva uvācaa anujānāmi bhīṣma tvāṃ vasūn āpnuhi pārthivac na te sti vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cin mayā dṛṣṭaṃ mahādyutea pitṛbhakto si rājarṣe mārkaṇḍeya ivāparaḥc tena mṛtyus tava vaśe sthito bhṛtya ivānataḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam uktas tu gāṅgeyaḥ pāṇḍavān idam abravītc dhṛtarāṣṭramukhāṃś cāpi sarvān sasuhṛdas tathāa prāṇān utsraṣṭum icchāmi tan mānujñātum arhathac satye prayatitavyaṃ vaḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ balama ānṛśaṃsyaparair bhāvyaṃ sadaiva niyatātmabhiḥc brahmaṇyair dharmaśīlaiś ca taponītyaiś ca bhārataa ity uktvā suhṛdaḥ sarvān saṃpariṣvajya caiva hab dhanaṃ bahuvidhaṃ rājan dattvā nityaṃ dvijātiṣuc punar evābravīd dhīmān yudhiṣṭhiram idaṃ vacaḥa brāhmaṇāś caiva te nityaṃ prājñāś caiva viśeṣataḥc ācāryā ṛtvijaś caiva pūjanīyā narādhipa vaiśaṃpāyana uvācaa evam uktvā kurūn sarvān bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tadāc tūṣṇīṃ babhūva kauravyaḥ sa muhūrtam ariṃdamaa dhārayām āsa cātmānaṃ dhāraṇāsu yathākramamc tasyordhvam agaman prāṇāḥ saṃniruddhā mahātmanaḥa idam āścaryam āsīc ca madhye teṣāṃ mahātmanāmc yad yan muñcati gātrāṇāṃ sa śaṃtanusutas tadāe tat tad viśalyaṃ bhavati yogayuktasya tasya vaia kṣaṇena prekṣatāṃ teṣāṃ viśalyaḥ so bhavat tadāc taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve vāsudevapurogamāḥe saha tair munibhiḥ sarvais tadā vyāsādibhir nṛpaa saṃniruddhas tu tenātmā sarveṣv āyataneṣu vaic jagāma bhittvā mūrdhānaṃ divam abhyutpapāta cad devaduṃdubhinādaś ca puṣpavarṣaiḥ sahābhavatd siddhā brahmarṣayaś caiva sādhu sādhv iti harṣitāḥa maholkeva ca bhīṣmasya mūrdhadeśāj janādhipac niḥsṛtyākāśam āviśya kṣaṇenāntaradhīyataa evaṃ sa nṛpaśārdūla nṛpaḥ śāṃtanavas tadāc samayujyata lokaiḥ svair bharatānāṃ kulodvahaḥa tatas tv ādāya dārūṇi gandhāṃś ca vividhān bahūnb candanānāṃ ca khaṇḍāni mahārghāṇi bahūni cac citāṃ cakrur mahātmānaḥ pāṇḍavā viduras tathāe yuyutsuś cāpi kauravyaḥ prekṣakās tv itare bhavana yudhiṣṭhiras tu gāṅgeyaṃ viduraś ca mahāmatiḥc chādayām āsatur ubhau kṣaumair mālyaiś ca kauravama dhārayām āsa tasyātha yuyutsuś chatram uttamamc cāmaravyajane śubhre bhīmasenārjunāv ubhaue uṣṇīṣe paryagṛhṇītāṃ mādrīputrāv ubhau tadāf yudhiṣṭhireṇa sahitau dhṛtarāṣṭras tu pādataḥa striyaḥ kauravanāthasya bhīṣmaṃ kurukulodbhavamc tālavṛntāny upādāya paryavījan samantataḥa tato sya vidhivac cakruḥ pitṛmedhaṃ mahātmanaḥc yājakā juhuvuś cāgniṃ jaguḥ sāmāni sāmagāḥa tataś candanakāṣṭhaiś ca tathā kāleyakair apic kālāgaruprabhṛtibhir gandhaiś coccāvacais tathāa samavacchādya gāṅgeyaṃ prajvālya ca hutāśanamc apasavyam akurvanta dhṛtarāṣṭramukhā nṛpāḥa saṃskṛtya ca kuruśreṣṭhaṃ gāṅgeyaṃ kurusattamāḥc jagmur bhāgīrathītīram ṛṣijuṣṭaṃ kurūdvahāḥa anugamyamānā vyāsena nāradenāsitena cac kṛṣṇena bharatastrībhir ye ca paurāḥ samāgatāḥa udakaṃ cakrire caiva gāṅgeyasya mahātmanaḥc vidhivat kṣatriyaśreṣṭhāḥ sa ca sarvo janas tadāa tato bhāgīrathī devī tanayasyodake kṛtec utthāya salilāt tasmād rudatī śokalālasāa paridevayatī tatra kauravān abhyabhāṣatac nibodhata yathāvṛttam ucyamānaṃ mayānaghāḥa rājavṛttena saṃpannaḥ prajñayābhijanena cac satkartā kuruvṛddhānāṃ pitṛbhakto dṛḍhavrataḥa jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa purā yo na parājitaḥc divyair astrair mahāvīryaḥ sa hato dya śikhaṇḍināa aśmasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mama pārthivāḥc apaśyantyāḥ priyaṃ putraṃ yatra dīryati me dya vaia sametaṃ pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ kāśipuryāṃ svayaṃvarec vijityaikarathenājau kanyās tā yo jahāra haa yasya nāsti bale tulyaḥ pṛthivyām api kaś canac hataṃ śikhaṇḍinā śrutvā yan na dīryati me manaḥa jāmadagnyaḥ kurukṣetre yudhi yena mahātmanāc pīḍito nātiyatnena nihataḥ sa śikhaṇḍināa evaṃvidhaṃ bahu tadā vilapantīṃ mahānadīmc āśvāsayām āsa tadā sāmnā dāmodaro vibhuḥa samāśvasihi bhadre tvaṃ mā śucaḥ śubhadarśanec gataḥ sa paramāṃ siddhiṃ tava putro na saṃśayaḥa vasur eṣa mahātejāḥ śāpadoṣeṇa śobhanec manuṣyatām anuprāpto nainaṃ śocitum arhasia sa eṣa kṣatradharmeṇa yudhyamāno raṇājirec dhanaṃjayena nihato naiṣa nunnaḥ śikhaṇḍināa bhīṣmaṃ hi kuruśārdūlam udyateṣuṃ mahāraṇec na śaktaḥ saṃyuge hantuṃ sākṣād api śatakratuḥa svacchandena sutas tubhyaṃ gataḥ svargaṃ śubhānanec na śaktāḥ syur nihantuṃ hi raṇe taṃ sarvadevatāḥa tasmān mā tvaṃ saricchreṣṭhe śocasva kurunandanamc vasūn eṣa gato devi putras te vijvarā bhavaa ity uktā sā tu kṛṣṇena vyāsena ca saridvarāc tyaktvā śokaṃ mahārāja svaṃ vāry avatatāra haa satkṛtya te tāṃ saritaṃ tataḥ kṛṣṇamukhā nṛpāḥc anujñātās tayā sarve nyavartanta janādhipāḥd sarve te dīnamanasaḥ śocamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥd hastyaśvarathayānaiś ca saṃprāptā hastināpuramd ity etad bahuvistāram ānuśāsanikaṃ śubhamd yatroktāḥ sarvadharmāś ca parvaṇy asmiṃs trayodaśed śrutvā yān svasthatām āpa dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥd bhīṣmād bhāgīrathīputrāt sarvasaṃdehahāriṇaḥd etat trayodaśaṃ parva dharmaniścayakārakamd adhyāyānāṃ śataṃ cātra ṣaṭcatvāriṃśad eva tud nava ślokasahasrāṇi śatāny aṣṭau tathaiva cad vyāsenodāramatinā dṛṣṭo grantho mahātmanād ānuśāsanikaṃ parva śrutvā bhaktisamanvitaḥd mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ sarvadharmaphalaṃ labhetd nārāyaṇaṃ pūjayitvā bhaktyā paramayā tataḥd bhīṣmoddeśena kartavyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca tarpaṇamd vyāsarūpī hariḥ sākṣāt paśyatām iti kīrtayetd dadyād dhenuhiraṇyādi vācakāya viśeṣataḥd sarvakāmān avāpnoti dīrgham āyuś ca vindatid dvaipāyanaprasādena nityam utsavavān bhavet
